1b1(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra shi kha ra ma hA gu h+ya yo ga tan+ta/ bod skad du/ gsang
1b2(rgyud 'bum): brnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo rje rtse mo/ oM kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
1b3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la
2a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'chang // kun mchog srid pa'i dbang phyug
2a2(rgyud 'bum): gis/ / 'khor lo de ni brtags byas nas// rnal 'byor can ni mi gsung bzhugs// mgon po chen po
2a3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun/ / ma lus thub pa'i skyes mchog gis// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// thub pa'i
2a4(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug la gsol 'debs/ / rnal 'byor tshul chen sgrub byed cing // cho ga sna tshogs yang dag 'byung /
2b1(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor 'byung ba'i// 'khor lo mchog ni bshad du gsol// mgon po khyod ni skal chen te//
2b2(rgyud 'bum): khyod ni bya ba don sems byed// gsang ba mkhyen cing dgongs bshad mkhyen// rnal 'byor rig pas mchog gyur gsungs//
2b3(rgyud 'bum): de nyid rjes kyis de nyid ldan// rnal 'byor bdag nyid rnal 'byor che// rdo rje chen po byang chub sems// gsungs shig gsung
2b4(rgyud 'bum): shig tshul chen po/ / rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ste// rdo rje rnal 'byor sna tshogs bdag/ gsang ba'i snying po dkyil
2b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor che/ / chos kyi tshul ni sgrub byed pa// rtog pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi// chos kyi don 'di ci yin brjod// 'dir ni/
3a1(rgyud 'bum): rtog pa ji lta bu// sgrub pa'i don ni ji ltar lags// ci phyir 'di ni rgyud phyi ma// rgyud don ci yin brjod par bgyi//
3a2(rgyud 'bum): ci phyir rgyud dang phyi ma lags// rgyud kyi don ni ji ltar byung // rdo rje 'chang dag 'di ci zhig/ drag po'i don ni ji ltar byung // rdo rje zhi ba 'di ci zhig
3a3(rgyud 'bum): ci yi phyir na zhi bar brjod/ / phyag na rdo rje ci yi phyir// rdo rje gtum po'ang ci zhig lags// ci yi phyir na gtum par brjod// rdo rje rdo rje zhes gsungs
3a4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / ci phyir rdo rje brjod par bgyi// rdo rje 'chang zhes gsungs 'di ci// de yi rdo rje ji lta bu// rdo rje 'chang ba rnams ni du// rdo rje rigs kun gang gi lags//
3a5(rgyud 'bum): chen po gnas gang zhig na gnas// rigs ni rnam pa du yin brjod// ci yi phyir na rigs su brjod// rigs bdag rang bzhin 'di ci zhig/ ci yi phyir na
3a6(rgyud 'bum): sems dpar brjod/ / rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam pa du// ci yi rdo rje sems dpa' lags// rdo rje rgyal po ci yin brjod// rdo rje chags pa 'di don gyi/
3b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje legs pa ci yin brjod// rdo rje rin chen ci yi phyir// rdo rje gzi brjid ci yin brjod// rdo rje rgyal mtshan bzhad pa che// gsungs shig ci yin brjod pa gsungs// ci yi phyir na rdo rje chos/
3b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rnon po ci yin brjod// rdo rje rgyu ni 'khor lo che// rdo rje smra ba ci yin brjod// rdo rje las dang gnod sbyin che// rdo rje gnod sbyin drag po che// rdo rje srung ba khu tshur che// gsungs shig ci yin brjod par
3b3(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / sems dpa' 'di rnams gang las byung // de bzhin pha dang ma ni gang // dang po gang zhig gleng gzhi dang // dmigs pa'i rkyen ni gang zhig lags// gsang ba 'di ni gang las byung
3b4(rgyud 'bum): khyab bdag 'di rnams gang nas byung / / thog ma tha ma med 'di ci// gsang ba'i dbang phyug chen pos gsungs// rab tu dga' nyid rab bza' nyid// rdo rje snying bdag ji lta bur// ci yi phyir na
3b5(rgyud 'bum): kun tu bzang / / de bzhin rdo rje rdo rje 'chang // dang po'i rigs ni ji ltar byung // chos kun skye ba med pa dang // 'byung ba ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' ci yin brjod// ci phyir sang
3b6(rgyud 'bum): / rgyas brjod par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa ci yin brjod// bcom ldan 'das bcom ci yin brjod// de bzhin ston pa'i ston pa ci// ci yi phyir na ye shes brjod// shes rab ye shes ci yin brjod//
3b7(rgyud 'bum): ci phyir shes rab brjod par bya// de bzhin shes rab pha rol phyin// tshul ni ci zhig ting 'dzin gang // bsam gtan rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ci// srid gsum 'jig rten gsum don ci// ci yi phyir yang
4a1(rgyud 'bum): khams gsum pa// 'khor ba'i don ni ci zhig yin// mya ngan 'das pa'ang ci yin brjod// rtag dang 'jig dang de bzhin dag/ theg pa chen po ci yin brjod//
4a2(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' yang ni ci yi phyir// sa nyid kyang ni ci yin brjod// 'byung ba chen po gang las 'byung // 'gog pa ci zhig gang gis byed// ci yi phyir na phyag rgyar brjod// ci phyir sngags su brjod par bya//
4a3(rgyud 'bum): ci yi phyir na rig sngags brjod// de bzhin kho nar gzungs sngags rnams// phyag rgya yi ni mtshan nyid gsungs// sngags kyi mtshan nyid brjod par bya// rig sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid gsungs// de bzhin
4a4(rgyud 'bum): kho nar gzungs sngags rnams/ / rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i gnas ni gang // ji ltar bcing ba thub chen po// phyag rgya dag ni 'ching ba na// ji ltar rdo rje can kun mnyes// rig sngags ji ltar bzlas par bgyi//
4a5(rgyud 'bum): thub pa chen po de gsungs shig/ rig sngags dag ni zlos pa ni// ji ltar yid kyis rdo rje bzlas// dri ba'i tshogs mdor bstan pa'o// oM ni ci zhig yin par bshad// yi ge hUM ni ci yin brjod// ci yi
4a6(rgyud 'bum): phyir na yi ge phaT/ / swA hA zhes pa ci yin brjod// mchod par ci phyir brjod par bya// de bzhin dam tshig shes nyid kyang // ci yi phyir na dkyil 'khor yin// dkyil 'khor dang por zhugs pa yi// skyes
4a7(rgyud 'bum): pa yang na bud med kyis/ / bya ba gang zhig bya ba ni// gsungs shig gsang ba'i dbang phyug che// thub pa'i dkyil 'khor zhugs pa la// sdom pa ji ltar sbyin par bgyi// de yi srog gi phyir yang ni//
4b1(rgyud 'bum): dor bar mi bya gang zhig lags// khrus kyi las ni ji ltar bya// de bzhin kho nar phyogs bcings pa// bgegs rnams bcing ba dang bcas pa'i// log 'dren ji ltar bskrad par bgyi// dga' ba chen po
4b2(rgyud 'bum): / lta bu// rab tu gus bcas phyag dag bgyi// spos dang me tog de bzhin du// mar me mchod sogs ji ltar lags// dkyil 'khor brtag pa ji lta bur// gzhug pa yang ni ji ltar lags// dam tshig
4b3(rgyud 'bum): ci zhig yin par bshad/ / rdo rje slob ma'i cho ga gang // sngon du bsnyen pa ji ltar bgyi// sgrub pa'i don ni ji ltar lags// gsang ba'i rnal 'byor ji lta bu// snyoms 'jug ji lta bu zhig lags// mdun
4b4(rgyud 'bum): du dgug pa'i don ni ji ltar lags/ / 'dir ni rjes su chags pa'ang ji lta bu// bcing bar bya ba'i las ni ji lta bu// 'dren pa rnams ni mnyes par ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar 'dir ni gshegs su
4b5(rgyud 'bum): gsol ba lags/ / dkyil 'khor mchog ni ji ltar gdeg par bgyi// 'gro ba'i bya ba yang nI ji ltar bgyi// las kyi cho ga'i bya ba ji ltar bgyi// dge ba stug po gsang chen ji lta bu// las rnams tha
4b6(rgyud 'bum): dang bya ba ji lta bu/ / phyag rgya phyag rgya'i lan ni ji ltar bgyi// mchod dang mchod pa'i lan nI ji ltar blang // dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'khor lo ji ltar dbyung // 'khor lo'i rnam pa'i bye brag du zhig mchis/
4b7(rgyud 'bum): dngos dang dngos med ji ltar spang ba lags// bla ma'i gsang byung 'od zer gsang ba ni// sbyin sreg rnam pa du ru brjod// thag chung ji lta bu zhig lags// sbyin sreg mdor bsdus ji lta bu// las
5a1(rgyud 'bum): @##/ / rnams rnam pa du ru brjod// gsang ba rnams ni rnam pa du// mchog tu gsang ba ji ltar brjod// de nyid ji lta bu zhig lags// phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya ci// mchod pa'i phyag
5a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyu ji ltar lags/ / rigs kyi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// ji ltar bsgrub bya shin tu sgrub// rdo rje phra mo ji ltar brjed// bgegs ni ji ltar bsal bar gyi// mdor na rig pa 'dzin pa dang // slob dpon
5a3(rgyud 'bum): ji lta bu zhig lags/ / dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang ldan pa'i// 'khor lo rnam pa du ru brjod// dngos grub mtshan nyid sgrub byed pa'i// sna tshogs rtog pa ji lta bu// thig rnams brtag pa nyid dang ni//
5a4(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub ji ltar nye bar brjod// dngos grub tshogs ni ji lta bu// gsang ba kun nas btud pa gsungs// bdag nyid la ni dbang bskur bar// bya ba'i cho ga ji lta bu// yang na gzhan dag nyid la ni//
5a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur ba ni ji ltar lags// ji ltar sems ni bskyed par bgyi// ting 'dzin ji lta bu zhig lags// de nyid rig pa 'di rtag tu// rdo rje ye shes ji lta bu// gzhan yang dgongs pa ji lta bu//
5a6(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa ji lta bu zhig lags// gang yang rung ba'i rtags las byung // ming dang ming min shes pa'i mtshan// las 'bras med par byed pa dang // 'dzin par byed par gang las bshad// lus ni nam
5a7(rgyud 'bum): mkha' bzhin 'byung ba/ / gang las byung bar brjod par bya// ci yi phyir na thar par brjod// rnal 'byor pa don ci yin brjod// rdo rje dbyings ni skyed byed pa'i// rdo rje phra mo'i rnal 'byor gang // gzhan yang
5b1(rgyud 'bum): rang gi rigs dag las/ / rnal 'byor brtul zhugs ji ltar brtsam// mdor na dbang du bya ba dang // de nyid gsang ba gang zhig lags// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa'i// gsang ba rtog chen las
5b2(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa/ / dgod pa rnam pa du ma yis// gsang ba gsungs shig blo gros che// rnal 'byor rnam pa du ru brjod// rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung du// ji ltar rtsa ba'i rgyud du brjod// gsang ba'i rigs
5b3(rgyud 'bum): byung ji lta bu/ / dra ni rang byung nyid yin te// khams gsum 'jig rten sa 'og dang // sa stengs swa b+hU mya ngan 'das// ji skad bshad pa'i gsang ba gzhan// rdo rje can nyid khyab 'jug rang nyid yin// /
5b4(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma zla ba gshin rje drag po nyid// rang nyid skye dgu'i bdag ste pha ma yin// 'gal ba'i tshig ni ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// dri ba'i tshogs gnyis pa mdor bstan pa'o// // tshangs pa
5b5(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gsum lus dbang phyug che/ / gdong drug tshogs bcas lha'i rigs dkyil 'khor rnams// gzhan yang gza' dang tshogs sogs gang yin pa// nga bdag nyid ces ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// /
5b6(rgyud 'bum): nga ni 'dod pa thar pa nga // nga ni dmyal ba'i dmyal ba pa// nga ni yi dgas dud 'gro bdag/ tshig de ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang 'dod la chags sems ldan// lha bcas tshig
5b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'dzin pa'i lha la chags/ / mu stegs theg dman mngon dga' skye dgu'i rigs// ji ltar 'dod bzhin don rnams rtog byed cing // ji skad bshad pa'i sna tshogs rigs dkyil 'khor// dag
6a1(rgyud 'bum): @##/ pa'i chos kyi 'byung gnas dgongs mi shes// rang gi 'dod pas mya ngan rtog byed pa// de la skye dgu'i bdag chen brtse bas gsungs// mchod 'os chen po mchog dang
6a2(rgyud 'bum): yi gnas/ / gsang ba'i gsang mchog mngon bsdus dbye bar gsol// skye dgu'i bdag po'i dkyil 'khor gsang mdun du// dam tshig mchod pas ji ltar mchod par bya// 'dod yon lngar bcas
6a3(rgyud 'bum): rol par byed pa yis/ / dngos grub tshogs mchog chen po thob par 'gyur// dman pa'i 'dod las rigs kyi dngos grub 'byung // 'gal ba'i tshig dag ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// de bzhin b+ha ga ji
6a4(rgyud 'bum): ltar rtags ci 'dra/ / de yi 'jug pa yang ni ji ltar 'gyur// rdzas de dag ni ji ltar rab tu sgrub// 'jig rten gsum na dman pa ji ltar 'gyur// de nas 'dod chags zhen pas dngos grub thob// 'dod chag/
6a5(rgyud 'bum): dag phyir de ni ji ltar rung // chags bral sdigs pas chags dang bral ba la// gsang ba bsten pas sdig dngos ji ltar 'gyur// gtor mas bsod nams mchog thob ji lta bu// skye dgu bsad pas
6a6(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams ji lta bu/ / ma byin blangs pas bsod nams 'gyur zhes pa'i// 'gal ba'i tshig dag ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// dga' ba chen po'i bud med bsten pa yis// tshe 'di la ni sangs rgyas
6a7(rgyud 'bum): mchog 'grub pa/ / mi gtsang 'dod pa bsten pas sangs rgyas dang // rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung ba ji ltar 'gyur// 'dir ni brdzun dang mtshungs pa'i bsod nams med// ji ltar brdzun ni bsod nams
6b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan par brjod/ / 'dir ni sems can gzhan bsad bza' bar bya// 'gal ba'i tshig ni ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// 'khor ba spangs kyang chos min 'gyur ba dang // mya ngan 'das la gzhol ba chos ma
6b2(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / sangs rgyas rnal 'byor gyi ni rjes 'jug pa// chos min 'gyur zhes ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// dregs dang ser sna sdang ba'i sems ldan pa// chos min spyod cing brdzun pa'i tshig la chags// /
6b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa'i 'dod chags bcas pa'i lhag par rgyal// rigs kyi rnal 'byor las byung ji ltar 'grub// bla med go 'phang dngos grub 'dod pa yis// dag cing rnal 'byor rnal 'byor lhur blang bya//
6b4(rgyud 'bum): sbyor gcin 'thung dang bshang ba za ba yis// dag cing mchog gyur rnal 'byor dngos grub 'dod// mi gtsang bshang gci zos shing 'thungs pa yis// yid 'dod dngos grub ji ltar dngos grub 'dod// /
6b5(rgyud 'bum): bud med bcas par lhan cig chos spyod cing // gnyis ka lhan cig gyur pas dag gtsang mchod// ji ltar bud med lhan cig dkyil 'khor mchod// dngos grub dam pa mchog tu ji ltar 'gyur//
6b6(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang rdo rje rigs 'byung kun ldan zhing // mchog tu mi bzad drag po'i las can te// dag cing shin tu sdug pa mtho bar 'gro// 'gal ba de ni ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// gzhan yang brdeg dang bsad pa
6b7(rgyud 'bum): lhur len zhing / / bskrad dang drag po'i las can de dag ni// dag cing shin tu sdug la mtho bar 'gro// 'gal ba de ni ji ltar rung ba yin// gzhan yang bza' dang btung ba lhur len cing // snying 'byin pa
7a1(rgyud 'bum): @#yis dag par 'dod pa nyid/ / de ni dag cing sdug la mtho bar 'gro// 'gal ba de ni ji ltar rung ba yin// gzhan yang nor bu rin chen 'phrog pa yis// sdug cing bstan la
7a2(rgyud 'bum): dag cing mthor 'gro dang / / gzhan yang nga rgyal ser sna lhur len pas// dag par 'gyur ba nyid ni 'gal ba yin// gzhan yang las kyi rig pa byung ba yis// mi dge ba yi las rnams thams
7a3(rgyud 'bum): cad bya/ / 'khrig sogs las kyi the tshogs rnam mang po'i// las byed pa ni ji ltar skyon mi 'gyur// gzhan yang brdzun tshig de bzhin 'khrig pa yis// ngag 'dod 'phags pa min pas gsang ba/
7a4(rgyud 'bum): yi// rgyal ba'i dbang chen 'dod pas bdud rtsi ltar// sdug cing mthor 'gro ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// kye mgon khyod ni dag pa'i chos kyi tshogs te khyod ni rtag tu rnal 'byor 'gyur// kye mgon khyod
7a5(rgyud 'bum): ni dgyes chen bdud rtsi 'chang ba dam chos gang ba'i 'byung gnas te/ / kye rgyal khyod ni dri med nyi ma bzhin du mi shes kun tu sbyong mdzad pa// khyab byed rgyal ba'i ngang tshul 'jig rten gsum gyi 'dren
7a6(rgyud 'bum): chen byang sems dga' kye/ / mdor bsdu ba'o// // kun mchog thams cad rig pa ste// kun mkhyen dri ma gsum spangs pa// byang sems sangs rgyas rgyal po che// de bzhin gshegs
7a7(rgyud 'bum): pa de nyid ni/ / ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas kyang // phyogs rnams kun tu gzigs mdzad de// thub pas mgon rnams rab btud nas// sangs rgyas kun la 'di skad gsungs/
7b1(rgyud 'bum): kye ma'o rnam dag ye shes bdag/ kye ma'o sangs rgyas nyer thob pa// kye ma'o gar mkhan 'khor lo 'di// rang gi ye shes 'dri bar byed// rtog pa thams cad kun bsdus pa'i// mchog tu
7b2(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba bshad par bya/ / shin tu rnyed dka' dam pa yi// rin chen sgom gyi kha dbye bya// bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi// rgyal mtshan dam pa bsgreng bar bya// rin chen sgrom gyi kha phye nas// shes rab
7b3(rgyud 'bum): kyis ni snang bar bya/ / de nas gsang ba mchog gyur pa// dam pa yang dag bshad par bya// bya ba sgrub pa'i thabs chen po// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang // gsang ba'i bye brag 'byed byed cing /
7b4(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor dgongs pa rnam par grol// de nyid dam pa shes byed pa'i// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang // rdo rje rnal 'byor cho ga dang // 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor cho ga ste// mchog tu gsang ba
7b5(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya de'i/ / rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang // dus gsum khyab pa'i bya bar ldan// gsang ba rnal 'byor kun 'byung zhing // bya ba kun gyi thabs chen gyis// rtog pa thams cad bsdus
7b6(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / sangs rgyas rnal 'byor cho gar ldan// rdo rje chos ni rab 'jug pa// sku gsum zhes bya gsang chen gyi// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang // rdo rje rnal 'byor cho ga ldan// ma rung thams
7b7(rgyud 'bum): cad 'dul byed pa/ / khams gsum rnam rgyal zhes bya yi// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang // chos kyi rnal 'byor cho gar ldan// pad+ma gar mkhan skyed byed pa// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya
8a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i/ / rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang // sbyin pa bzhi dang yang dag ldan// rin chen 'khor lo skyed byed cing // byang chub sems dpa' yid ches byed// rtog pa thams cad
8a2(rgyud 'bum): bsdus pa dang / / sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen po// sna tshogs gar mkhan skyed byed pa// las kyi rnal 'byor cho ga yi// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang // de nyid shes shing dgongs pa shes/
8a3(rgyud 'bum): tshul chen mchog ni shes byed cing // mchog gi dang po sangs rgyas mchog/ rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa ste// go rims bzhin du 'jug byed pa'o// gcig par sems can bya ba byed/
8a4(rgyud 'bum): bya ba chen po mchog zhi ba// chos dang longs spyod mchog gyur pas// sangs rgyas gar mkhan 'khor lo ni// mchog tu ngo mtshar gyur pa 'di// skal ba ji bzhin gsang ji bzhin// ji ltar sems
8a5(rgyud 'bum): can 'dul 'gyur bshad/ / sngon 'gyur 'das pa'i dus su ni// byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin cing // thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na// spro ba chen pos
8a6(rgyud 'bum): / ngo mtshar che// dka' ba dpag tu med pa spyad// go rims bzhin du de yis ni// dbang bskur bar du legs thob 'gyur// shes rab chen pos sa mthar phyin// gos kyi dbang ni thob gyur nas//
8a7(rgyud 'bum): 'og min stug po nyams dga' bar// blo gros chen po zhugs par gyur// bdag ni sangs mchog 'gyur zhes// rnal 'byor pa yis bsams nas ni// bya ba mthar phyin bdag gis ni// sems
8b1(rgyud 'bum): can don 'byung thob bya zhes/ / bya ba de la dgongs nas ni// sngon dang phyi mar bde chen med// chos kyi dga' ba rmad chen po'i// dka' ba spyad par bya snyam ste// byang chub shing drung bzhugs gyur nas// /
8b2(rgyud 'bum): bya dka'i bya ba kun ldan de// dbugs 'byung rngub pa 'gog pa dang // sems dpa' med cing g.yo ba med// lus mi gang yang mi 'gul zhing // yan lag skyod par mi byed de// de bas g.yo ba med
8b3(rgyud 'bum): chos la/ / yun ring du ni gnas par 'gyur// phyogs bcu yi ni thub dbang po// sangs rgyas kun gyis dgongs gyur pa// 'di ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub dus// sdug bsngal bya bar rigs pa min//
8b4(rgyud 'bum): de bas bdag cag kun lhan cig/ bskul bar bya phyir 'gro snyam du// dgongs nas thams cad rab chas te// stug po ru ni byon par gyur// byon nas thub pa thams cad kyis// bskul ba mchog ni mdzad
8b5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / oM badz+ra u ta tiSh+Tha zhes pa'i// rig pas se gol brdabs nas ni// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bslang // phyogs rnams kun tu bltas pa na// sangs rgyas kyi ni rgya mtsho mthong //
8b6(rgyud 'bum): thub pas mgon rnams la btud de// bka' stsol zhes ni gsol ba btab// mgon chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// gsung gcig gis ni bka' stsal pa// sems kyi spyod yul ci 'dra zhes//
8b7(rgyud 'bum): rang gi sems ni so sor rtog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung thos nas// rang gi sems la rtog bzhin du// yun ring du ni gnas pa ni// sems kyi rnam pa ma mthong ste// yan lag kun gyis rab btud nas//
9a1(rgyud 'bum): @##// zhus pa bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// sems kyi rnam bya ma mthong ste// sems kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu// de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa// sems kyi spyod yul shes par
9a2(rgyud 'bum): dka'/ / khyod la snying po rab sbyin gyis// phra mo'i bzlas pa rab tu spyod// oM tsit+ta pra ti be d+haM kA ro mi// snying po dag pa blangs na ni// rang gi sems la rtog bzhin du// thang cig de la gnas
9a3(rgyud 'bum): pa na/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du mthong // de nas sems 'di ci zhig yin// nyon mongs sa bon can nam ci// dge ba'am mi dge ba yi sems// kun gzhi'i sa bon can sems sam// chos
9a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi rgyu mthun rtogs gyur nas/ / pha rol phyin pa drug bsten pa// 'di ni sems can dag pa ste// kun nas nyon mongs gnas ma yin// yun 'di du ni bsod nams dang // ye shes tshogs chen bsags
9a5(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ / ji ltar zla ba gang ba 'di// dag cing dang la rnyog ma med// de bzhin tshogs ni rdzogs pa'i phyir// sems 'di zla ba gang dang mtshungs// dngos po yod dang med min pa// ji ltar zla ba mtshungs
9a6(rgyud 'bum): nyid yin/ / 'on kyang bsod nams ye shes che// rdzogs pa zla ba dang mtshungs bstan// legs byas tshogs ldan rang sems kyi// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong nas ni// dga' zhing mgu ba skyes nas
9a7(rgyud 'bum): kyang / / slar yang tshig ni rab smras pa// bcom ldan mgon po bdag gis ni// nyon mongs dri ma kun dag cing // gzung dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i// rang sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong //
9b1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa// thog mar byung ba'i sems 'di bzang // dang por glo bur nyon mongs rnams// byang chub sems kyis dag par byed// dngos po thams cad rnam spangs pa'i//
9b2(rgyud 'bum): dag pa yi ni snying po 'dis// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// byang chub kyi ni sems la rtogs// oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ud pA da yA mi// snying po dag pa blangs nas ni// sems kyi dbus su rtog pa na//
9b3(rgyud 'bum): zla ba'i dbus su yang zla ba'i// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa mthong ba ni// thub pa rnams la tshig smras pa// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa dag mthong ngo // de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa// byang chub sems
9b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi rang bzhin brtan/ / brtan par bya ba'i ched du ni// de ni legs par sgrub par gyis// khyod la snying po sbyin bya ste// zlos shing de ni bstan par dgongs// oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i dbus
9b5(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa'i/ / rdo rje chen po sems byed cing // thang cig so sor brtags pa na// shin tu brtan pa mthong gyur nas// smras pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// dkyil 'khor dbus su rdo rje mthong // zla ba'i
9b6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gnyis pa yi/ / dbus na rdo rje dang ldan mthong // de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa// lha rnams kun gyi rdo rje che// rdo rje dbyings ni bskyed pa yi// shin tu brtan pa 'di smos shig/ oM badz+ra AH
9b7(rgyud 'bum): ko haM/ / snying po dag pa blangs nas ni// rdo rje'i lus su rnam bsgoms pas// des ni sra brtan khong stong med// rdo rje'i sku ni thob gyur nas// spras pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rang bdag rdo rje'i
10a1(rgyud 'bum): skur mthong ngo / / de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa// sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam par sgom// oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga tastA thA a haM/ snying po dag pa blangs nas ni/
10a2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam bsgoms pas// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i// kun mkhyen ye shes thob par gyur// sangs rgyas kun la rab btud nas// smras pa bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs//
10a3(rgyud 'bum): mgon po bdag la byin rlob cing // bdag gi byang chub brtan par mdzod// grags chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// rdo rje dbyings kyi tshig thos nas// mgon rnams thugs kar zhugs par gyur//
10a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje yi ni rnal 'byor gsungs// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi sa ma bo d+hi dri D+ha badz+ra ban+d+ha// grags chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// rig sngags chen po brjod pa na// rdo rje dbyings ni shin tu brtan//
10a5(rgyud 'bum): de nyid ye shes mngon sangs rgyas// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad ni// rdo rje thugs ka nas byung ste// chos kyi dbang bskur bzhi po yi// de tshe thub pa dbang bskur gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' byas pa yi//
10a6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur ba// 'bras bu byang chub sems ldan gang // rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur yin// bskal pa grangs med gsum dag gi/ sbyin dang sbyin pa'i 'bras bzang dang /
10a7(rgyud 'bum): mkha' mtshungs rin chen thob byed pa/ nor bu rin chen dbang bskur yin// bskal pa grang med gsum du ni// gzhan gyis dka' ba spyad pa dang // brtson 'grus kyis ni 'bras sgrub pa// rdo rje las kyi dbang
10b1(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur yin/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dag/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul chen te// nyon mongs 'dam gyi ma gos pa// rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang bskur yin// byang chub sems rdzogs rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi//
10b2(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur bzhi po de rnams chos kyi dbyings// de nas gzhan yang gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba// sangs rgyas rang bzhin yon tan dam pa'i tshogs// rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur bas// ngo bo nyid kyi sku ru
10b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dod/ / rdo rje chos kyi dbang bskur bas// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ru 'dod// rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur bas// de bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad do// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes che// mkha' mtshungs ches
10b4(rgyud 'bum): nyid snying po can/ / rdo rje las kyi dbang bskur bas// sprul pa yi ni skur 'dod do// gsang ba bzhi yi dbang bskur bas// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob// de nas ming gi dbang bskur bas// thub de
10b5(rgyud 'bum): rnam snang mdzad chen gyur/ / chos nyid kyang ni yang dag rtogs// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs par brtag/ chos kun dngos po med pa ste// mtshan ma med cing gsal byed med// mtshan nyid med cing mkha'
10b6(rgyud 'bum): dang mtshungs/ / dmigs pa rnam par spangs pa ste// rang bzhin med cing brjod du med// chos kun tshig gi spyod yul min// gzhan yang gsang bar brtags pa ste// de phyir 'dir ni rtogs par brjod//
10b7(rgyud 'bum): rtog pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi// chos kyi don 'di ci yin brjod// bdag med dngos po yod pa min// chos rnams med cing rtog pa med// 'on kyang chos nyid yang dag rtogs// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs
11a1(rgyud 'bum): par rtogs/ / rtogs pa nyams su myong bar brjod// 'dir ni ngo mtshar nyid du rtogs// chos kun gzugs can min pa dang // gzugs can du yang 'di ru bstan// chos kun tshig
11a2(rgyud 'bum): gi spyod yul min/ / sla ru yang ni 'dir bstan te// de bas ngo mtshar chos 'di ru// rtog pa rtog pa yin par brjod// ci phyir 'di ni ngo mtshar chos// de nyid gsang ba sgrub pa'i phyir// las rnams drug po
11a3(rgyud 'bum): nyid dang ni/ / gzugs can tshig gi mthu dag dang // 'bras phyir sdom pa'i ngo mtshar te// de phyir 'di ni ngo mtshar chos// de phyir 'di ni rtog par brjod// de bas ngo mtshar chos 'di ru// rtog pa 'ba' zhig
11a4(rgyud 'bum): rtog pa yin/ / yang 'dir rtog pa ji lta bu// sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir// byang chub tu ni sems bskyed na// pha rol phyin drug spyod pa dang // bsten pa rtog pa nyid yin no// sgrub pa'i don ni ji lta bu//
11a5(rgyud 'bum): gang zag chos las bdag med dang // gzung dang 'dzin pa spangs pa yi// rab tu dga' ba'i sa sgrub pa// de tshe sgrub pa'i don yin no// ci phyir 'di ni rgyud phyi ma// rgyud ni rgyun chags zhes bya ste//
11a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor ba rgyud du 'dod pa yin// phyi ma zhes bya pha rol te// rgyud ni rgyun chags zhes bya ste// phyi ma snga ma las byung ba'i// de nyid gsang ba sbas shes pa// rgyud ni phyi mar brjod pa yin// ci phyir rgyud dang phyi
11a7(rgyud 'bum): ma yin/ / sa mthar phyin pa'i rgyal ba mchog/ srid pa'i btson ra las rgal yin// yang na gang zhig brgal gyur pa// rgyud ni phyi ma yin par bshad// rgyud kyi don ni ji ltar byung // sems can kun la
11b1(rgyud 'bum): phan pa'i phyir/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos longs spyod// sangs rgyas thugs rjes bskul ba ni// rgyud don yang dag byung ba yin// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs byung ba'i// chos dang longs spyod byung ba
11b2(rgyud 'bum): ste/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen ni// rgyud don yang dag byung ba yin// rdo rje 'chang drag 'di ci zhig/ sangs rgyas gzugs kyi mi 'dul ba'i// sems can gdug tshogs de yi phyir// rang gi ye
11b3(rgyud 'bum): shes byang chub sems/ / rdo rje drag por yang dag 'byung // drag po'i don ni ji ltar 'byung // drag po drag po'i mig gis ni// drag po'i khro be zhes su bstan// drag po'i las ni spyod byed rnams//
11b4(rgyud 'bum): 'chos shing bzlog par bya ba yin// rdo rje zhi ba 'di ci zhig/ gdug pa de kun btul nas ni// slar yang zhi bar yang dag byung // de nyid rgyal po rdo rje 'chang // sems can don gyi thabs stor mdzad//
11b5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad ni// khro bo'i dbang phyug dag tu bstan// de nyid zhi dang drag po dang // phyag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul tshe// ci yi phyir na zhi bar brjod// sna tshogs gzugs can rnal 'byor che/
11b6(rgyud 'bum): sems can smin bya 'ba' zhig phyir// nyon mongs gdul la brtser dgongs shing // zhi ba'i don ni yang dag byung // phyag na rdo rje ci yi phyir// nyon mongs gdug pa nyes gzhom phyir// byang chub sems
11b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi rang bzhin bzang / / rdo rje phyag na bsnams mdzad pa// de ni phyag na rdo rjer brjod// dus gsum bdud rnams de bzhin du// mi mthun phyogs kyis mi shigs pa// byang sems rang bzhin rdo rjen/
12a1(rgyud 'bum): / sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa'i tshogs// de nas sangs rgyas kun dang ldan// gsang chen rdo rje de lta bu// phyag na rtag tu bsnams pas na// de ni phyag na rdo rjer brjod//
12a2(rgyud 'bum): rdorje gtum po'i don ci zhig/ rdo rje gtum po gnod sbyin che// rdo rje gnod sbyin shin tu bstan// nga rgyal nyon mongs zhugs pa za// byang chub sems dpa' rang byung ba// ci yi phyir na gtum por
12a3(rgyud 'bum): brjod/ / gtum gdug drag po chen po ni// rang byung ba nyid kho na ste// sod pa'i zhags pa gcod byed cing // drug po'i don ni gtum po yin// rdo rje khro bo co yin brjod// gsod dang spyod pa /
12a4(rgyud 'bum): po u0f7f// de ni khro bo'i don du brjod// nga ni rdo rje me sbyar 'brar// nyon mongs phyogs rnams sreg byed yin// rdo rje rdo rje zhes gsus pa// ci phyir rdo rjer brjod par bya// swA 'ang snying po long zhing med/
12a5(rgyud 'bum): gtsung dang gzhig par bya ba min// bsreg par bya min 'jig med pas// stong nyid rdo rjer brjod par bya// 'gro drug 'khor lo spong byed cing // sdig pa bral bar byed pa yi// byang chub sems
12a6(rgyud 'bum): rdorje/ / nyon mongs thams cad sel bar byed// rdo rje 'chang zhes gsungs 'di ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes dang // byang sems brtan pa gang yin pa// de ni rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// de bzhin
12a7(rgyud 'bum): shegs pa can gyi bdag/ de mi ngongs na// rtog pa thams cad dang bral zhing / chos su 'dzin pa rnam sbas pa/ chos rnams sun gyi de bzhin nyid// stong pa nyid ni rje ma@
12b1(rgyud 'bum): sogs chos kyi rang bzhin gang / / 'gyur ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan pa gang // de lta bu ni 'di rdo rje// rdo rje rigs kyi don 'di ci// bden zhing don yod de bzhin nyid//
12b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba med cing skye ba med// 'gag med de kho na nyid gang // de lta bu ni rdo rje yin// don yod 'gyur ba med pa yi// de lta bu yi rigs gyur pa// byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su brjod//
12b3(rgyud 'bum): de ni rdo rje'i rigs zhes bya// thog ma tha ma med pa'i chos// byang chub sems dpa' zhes su brjod// bden zhing slu ba med pa yi// byang chub sems gang de rigs yin// rdo rje 'chang ba rnams ni
12b4(rgyud 'bum): du/ / phyogs rnams thams cad kun khyab pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa ni// chos dbyings dang mnyam thug pa med// rdo rje 'chang rnams de snyed do// rdo rje'i rigs kun gang gi yin//
12b5(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi bdag po bla med pa// rnam par snang mdzad rdzogs sangs rgyas// mgon des yongs su gzung ba de'i// de yi dkyil 'khor yin gsungs pa// ston pa gang zhig 'di rnams su'i// rjes su
12b6(rgyud 'bum): ston par byed pa gang / / de yi spyod lam bya ba ni// gsang ba kun tu bsdus pas gsungs// 'di yi ston pa byang chub sems// rjes su ston byed shes rab thabs// phyag rgya rnams ni spyod lam skye//
12b7(rgyud 'bum): sngags rnams de yi bya ba yi// rdo rje 'chang gi rigs gang yin// rdo rje 'chang ba de kun gyi// rigs ni byang chub sems yin te// byang chub sems dpa' brtul zhugs bzang // sangs rgyas kyi yang de
13a1(rgyud 'bum): nyid yul/ / chen po gnas gang zhig na gnas// chos rnams kun la gnas med de// rtsa ba med sems spyod yul lo// chos rnams thams cad gzugs can min// chos kyi dbyings
13a2(rgyud 'bum): te spyod yul med/ / rigs ni rnam pa du yin brjod// rigs ni rnam pa brgyar gsungs te// mdo ru bsdun rnam pa lnga// sangs rgyas rdo rje rin chen dang // chos dang las dang rnam pa lnga// mi yi phyir na rigs
13a3(rgyud 'bum): su brjod/ / mchog dang dman pa'i bye brag gis// rigs zhes bya ba de rnam gnyis// sems can lam ngan zhugs pa yi// rigs ni dman pa yin par brjod// lam ngan 'gro ba spangs nas ni// byang chub
13a4(rgyud 'bum): sems la 'jug pa chos/ / de bas rdo rje rigs brjod pa// rigs de yang ni lnga pa yin// rigs bdag rang bzhin 'di ci zhig/ byang chub sems ni rgyal po che// rdo rje sems dpa' 'jigs pa med//
13a5(rgyud 'bum): mgon po chen po rigs kyi bdag/ de ni rigs kyang lnga pa yin// ci yi phyir na sems dpar brjod// sems dpa' zhes bya rnam gsum ste// byis pa de bzhin mkhas pa dang // de bzhin byang chub sems
13a6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' dang / / rnam gsum sems dpa' brjod par bya// yang gsungs pa/ ci yi phyir na sems par brjod// sems dpa' ci yin byis pa brjod// sems dpa' mkhas pa ci yi phyir// byang chub sems
13a7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' ci yin brjod/ / gnas gang zhig tu brjed bya ba// de ni de yi sems dpar brjod// chos sam yang na chos min dang // legs byas nyes par byas pa la// mi shes mun pas bsgribs gyur cing //
13b1(rgyud 'bum): chos la nyon mongs bdag nyid 'dzin// dman zhing gti mug rigs can gyur// de lta bu ni byis par brjod// nyon mongs kun la chags pa dang // de bzhin srid pa ngan song gsum// mi shes mun pa la
13b2(rgyud 'bum): chags pa/ / de 'dir byis par brjod par bya// sems dpa' mkhas pa gang zhig yin// dri ma las 'das nyon mongs spong // rnal 'byor ldan zhing brtul zhugs che// mi shes ling tog 'joms byed pa/
13b3(rgyud 'bum): de nin sems dpa' mkhas par brjod// 'dir na byang chub sems dpa' gang // chos kyi de nyid rtogs gyur cing // 'khor ba'i gnas nas sad 'gyur te// sems can rnams ni sad byed pa// de ni byang chub
13b4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpar brjod/ / rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam pa du// de la byang chub rnam gsum ste// dman dang mchog dang bar ma'o// dman pa nyan thos sems yin te// bar ma rang rgyal byang chub po// mchog ni
13b5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems yin te/ / de ni mi 'gyur rdo rje yin// sku gsung thugs rnams bzhag pa gang // byang chub mchog tu brjod par bya// ci phyir rdo rje sems dpa' yin// byang chub mchog gi ye shes gang // de ni
13b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje nges par brjod/ / ye shes rdo rje las byung ba// de ni rdo rje sems dpar brjod// rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rgyal// ci yi phyir na sems dpar brjod// rdo rje sems dpa' mgon po che// dga' chen 'di ni
13b7(rgyud 'bum): chags sam ci/ / sems can thams cad dgrol ba'i phyir// sems can rnams la chags pa ste// de ni rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes su bsgrags// byang chub sems kyi 'bras bu ni/
14a1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas ye shes bla med gang // de ni rdo rje sems rang bzhin// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa'o// rdo rje rgyal po ci yin brjod// rdo rje rigs kun rgyal po ste// rdo rje lcags
14a2(rgyud 'bum): kyu zhes su brjod/ / dgug dang dbab pa'i rdo rje ni// de ni rdo rje rgyal po brjod// bsdu ba yi ni dngos po bzhi// bcom ldan 'das kyis gang spyad pa// sems can dgug pa'i thabs zhes pa// rdo rje rgyal por
14a3(rgyud 'bum): yang dag byung / / rdo rje chags pa 'di don ci// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed pa// rjes su chags pa zhes su brjod// rdo rje chags pa bdud chen po// de ni rdo rje chags par brjod// sems can sman phyir
14a4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan gyi/ / gang tshe byang chub spyod pa spyad// byang chub spyod pa rjes chags pa// rdo rje chags par yang dag 'byung // rdo rje legs pa ci yin brjod// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed cing // legs so/
14a5(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya rab ster byed// byang chub sems dpa' kun mgu byed// de ni rdo rje legs par brjod// sems can dag pa mgu byed cing // rdo rje 'chang rnams sgrub par byed// sems can mkhas rnams dga'
14a6(rgyud 'bum): byed cing / / gsang ba 'dzin pa rangs par byed// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sku'i phyir// bcom ldan 'das 'di chos rnam drug/ gang gi tshe ni sngon sgrubs pa// rdo rje legs par yang dag byung /
14a7(rgyud 'bum): rdorje rin chen ci yi phyir// byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa gang // mkha' mnyam rin chen lta bu ste// rdo rje rin chen skal ba che// de ni rdo rje rin chen brjod// sems dpa' chen po'i dbang bskur te/
14b1(rgyud 'bum): sems can kun gyi dbang bskur ba// byang chub snying po'i dbang bskur gyis// rgyal ba'i sras rnams 'dzin par byed// sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyin pa gang // mkha' mtshungs rdo rje yang dag byung // de ni rin chen
14b2(rgyud 'bum): don yod de/ / de ni rdo rje rin chen brjod// ma rig ling tog 'khor ba yi// mi shes mun pa 'joms byed cing // thar pa'i snang ba gzi brjid che// de ni rdo rje gzi brjid do// ci phyir rdo rje rgyal mtshan
14b3(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin// thar pa'i lam 'gro rgyal mtshan te// chos kyi rgyal mtshan rgyal mtshan che// de ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan brjod// rdo rje bzhad pa ci yin brjod// rnal 'byor chen po
14b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje bzhad/ / sangs rgyas thams cad bzhad byed cing // byang chub sems dpa' kun dbugs 'byin// de ni rdo rje bzhad par brjod// ci yi phyir na rdo rje chos// rnal 'byor chen po sangs rgyas chos// sangs
14b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas sems can rtogs byed pa/ / dag pa de bzhin gshegs snying po// de ni rdo rje chos su brjod// rdo rje rnon po ci yin brjod// shes rab rnon po ye shes che// shin tu sdug pa'i nyon mongs gcod// shes
14b6(rgyud 'bum): bya'i sgrib pa'ang gcod pas na/ / de ni rdo rje rnon por brjod// rdo rje rgyu yi don ci zhig/ 'khor lo sangs rgyas gar byed pas// chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu brtan// dam chos ro yi bcud las byung // de ni rdo rje rgyu zhes
14b7(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / rdo rje smra ba ci yin brjod// sangs rgyas kun gyi chos chen po// mkha' mtshungs tshig dang bral ba ste// tshig med tshig las yang dag byung // de ni de rje sba bar brjod// ci yi phyir na rdo rje las// sems can
15a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyin dang krol ba yi/ / sangs rgyas san gyi las gang dang // sangs rgyas las ni bdug med pa// do na rdo rje lus zhes u0f7f// rdoH srung ba chi yin brjod// byang chub sems dpa'i sna s
15a2(rgyud 'bum): te/ theg pa dman pa spong byed cing // rtse mo nas lhung srung byed pa// de ni rdo rje srung bar brjod// rdo rje gnod sbyin 'di don ci// thig pa thams cad zang byed cing // nyon mongs thams cad nges par gcod/
15a3(rgyud 'bum): srid pa za byed gnod sbyin che// de ni rdo rje gnod sbyin brjod// rdo rje khu tshur ci yin brjod// bden zhing gzhan min de bzhin nyid// 'gyur med de kho na nyid gang // sangs rgyas de bzhin nyid ye shes//
15a4(rgyud 'bum): de ni rdo rje khu tshur brjod// sngon du byang chub sems 'gyur gang // rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag byung // bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po ni// rdo rje rgyal por yang dag byung // sems can smin byed chags pa'o//
15a5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub spyod pa legs pa ste// de nyid ces bya dam tshig tshe// byang chub sems las yang dag byung // sngon gyi sbyin pa'i spyod gyur gang // de ni rdo rje rin chen brjod// sems can kun la mi 'jigs
15a6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin/ / de ni rdo rje gzi brjid brjod// 'byung po kun la byams pa ni// rdo rje rgyal mtshan yang dag byung // chos kyi sbyin pa bzhad pa ste// dbang bskur bzhi por brtan pa yin// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi
15a7(rgyud 'bum): ting 'dzin gang / / rdo rje chos ni de las byung // nyon mongs gcod byed rdo rje che// rdo rje rnon por yang dag byung // mngon shes dang ni mthu la sogs// de ni rdo rje rgyu ru brjod// gzungs la sogs pa grub pa
15b1(rgyud 'bum): ni/ rdo rje smra bar yang dag byung // ye shes chen po chos chen po// dab tshig ces bya'i dga' chen po// ye shes mngon par rtogs te dag/ rdo rje chos las yang dag byung // brtson 'grus pha rol phyin rgyal
15b2(rgyud 'bum): po rdo rje las su yang dag byung / / theg pa dman pa spong byed pa// de phyir rdo rje srung bar brjod// nyon mongs srid pa'i gdon chen po// rdo rje gnod sbyin yang dag byung // de nyid ye shes mngon byang chub
15b3(rgyud 'bum): de nyid rdo rje khu tshur brjod/ / las kyi dam tshig bzhi po ste// las kyi sems dpa' bdag nyid che// las kyi 'khor lo las byung ba'i// rdo rje las ni de las byung // gzhan yang / byang chub sems
15b4(rgyud 'bum): ni bskyed pa las/ / rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag byung // rdo rje rang bzhin sems de yang // rnam pa bzhi ru byung ba ste// sgrol ba dang ni grol ba dang // dbugs 'byin mya ngan 'das 'god byed// sems dpa'
15b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po chags pa che/ / rdo rje legs par yang dag byung // bsod nams ye shes tshogs nyid las// rdo rje rin chen rab tu bsgrags// bsod nams rang bzhin rin chen de// rnam pa ni ji skad bshad pa
15b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin/ / ye shes kyi ni tshogs brjod pa// de ni rdo rje chos zhes bya// ye shes rang bzhin chos de yang // rnam pa bzhir ni yang dag byung // brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa nyid// de ni rdo rje las su
15b7(rgyud 'bum): brjod/ / brtson 'grus rang bzhin las de yang // rnam pa bzhir ni yang dag byung // brtson dang sbyong ba zhes bya dang // so sor rtog dang sgrub pa ste// brtson 'grus de bzhin las bzhi po// de las mthar gyi byung
16a1(rgyud 'bum): ba yin/ / sems dpa' 'di rnams gang las byung // rdo rje sems sogs de bzhin du// byang chub sems las yang dag byung // pha rol phyin drug spyod pa las// rdo rje can rnams
16a2(rgyud 'bum): byung bar 'dod/ / de bzhin pa dang ma ni gang // ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin// pha ni thabs la mkhas pa ste// pad+ma las ni sangs rgyas sras// rdo rje can rnams gang las byung // rdo rje rgyal po de bzhin
16a3(rgyud 'bum): chags/ / rdo rje rin chen rgyal mtshan dang // rdo rje chos dang de bzhin no// de rnams shes rab gtso bor bstan// rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje legs// gzi brjid de bzhin bzhad pa nyid// rgyu dang smra ba sems
16a4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' che/ / de rnams thabs las byung ba yin// rdo rje las dang rdo rje srung // gnod sbyin de bzhin khu tshur nyid// shes rab thabs su grags pa ste// bstan pa chen po chogasu bshad// rdo rje'i rigs
16a5(rgyud 'bum): rnams kun gyi gtso/ / rdo rje lcags kyu ma ru bshad// rdo rje rin chen mchog gyur pa// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin pa// pha ni rdo rje rgyal po rgya// ma ni rdo rje rnon po ste// pad+ma'i rigs chen bzang po yi/
16a6(rgyud 'bum): pad 'dzin gang las byung ba'o// rdo rje gzi brjid rin chen pa// rgyal mtshan ma ni yin par bstan// nor bu rigs chen bzang po yi// rin chen gang las byung ba'o// pha ni rgyal po rdo rje las// ma ni gnod sbyin
16a7(rgyud 'bum): srung ba ste/ / las kyi rigs can bzang po yi// las rnams gang las byung ba'o// dang po gang zhig ci zhe na// dngos kun dang po sa bon te// rdo rje can kun dang po sems// 'dun dang bran dang ting
16b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin/ / rigs rnams kun gyi dang por bshad// yang gleng gzhi ci yin zhe na// rigs bzhi las ni yang dag byung // tshangs pa'i gnas chen dang ldan pa// snying rje bdag nyid can rnams kyi/
16b2(rgyud 'bum): snying rje chen po gleng gzhi yin// dmigs pa gang zhig yin zhe na// rtog pa med cing dmigs pa med// dang por byang chub sems byung ba'i// pha rol phyin pa mchog drug ni// de yi dmigs pa
16b3(rgyud 'bum): yin par bshad/ / rkyen gang zhe na/ rtag tu srid gsum mngon dga' ba// sems can sdug bsngal gyur bltas nas// snying dang ni ldan pa yi// byang chub sems kyi bskul ba'o// gsang ba 'di ni gang
16b4(rgyud 'bum): du byung / / 'og min stug po nyams dga' zhing // stug po'i zhing khams 'jig med pa// de nas sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos// rdzogs par longs spyod tshul 'di byung // khyab bdag 'di rnams gang nas
16b5(rgyud 'bum): byung / / rdo rje rin chen mchog chen gyi// gzhal yas khang pa yid 'ong zhing // sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos ldan pa// de nas khyab bdag 'di rnams byung // thog ma tha ma med 'di ci// gsang ba'i dbang phyug
16b6(rgyud 'bum): chen pos gsungs/ / sems can kun gyi shes pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po gang // chos dbyings rdo rje chen po ste// thog ma tha ma med par bshad// rab tu dga' ba nyid 'di ci// bde chen rab
16b7(rgyud 'bum): tu grub bya'i phyir/ / sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// rab tu dga' ba nyid ces bshad// rab bzang nyid ni ji lta bu// dngos po kun mchog rdo rje ni// byang chub kyi ni sems
17a1(rgyud 'bum): zhes brjod/ / sangs rgyas skyed byed bzang po yi// rdo rje rab bzang nyid ces bshad// rdo rje snying bdag ji lta bu// gdul bya 'phags pa'i skyes mchog nyid// de ni rdo rje snying por
17a2(rgyud 'bum): brjod/ / de rnams bdag po rgyal po ni// rdo rje snying po'i bdag por bshad// ci yi phyir na kun tu bzang // byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ldan pa'i// 'gro ba srid pa'i skye gnas gang // de kun rtag tu
17a3(rgyud 'bum): bzang bas na/ / kun tu bzang por brjod par bya// rdo rje rdo rje 'chang ba gang // byang chub sems gang de rdo rje// rdo rje gang de rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// rdo rje rdo rje 'chang bar brjod// dang po'i
17a4(rgyud 'bum): rigs ni ji ltar byung / / rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyis// grags chen rdzogs par byang chub pa// de ni dang po'i rigs byung ste// de kho na nyid rig las so// yang na rab tu mkhas pa rnams// bskal
17a5(rgyud 'bum): pa grangs med 'das nas ni/ / rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob gang // de ni dang po'i rigs byung yin// chos kun skye ba med pa dang // 'byung ba ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// de nyid rtogs shing shes pa yis// chos
17a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams thams cad rtog pa med/ / chos dang gang zag bdag med las// rigs de byung ba nyid du 'dod// chos rnams 'ga' yang skye ba med// chos rnams 'gag par 'gyur ba med// rnam par rtog pa nyer zhi
17a7(rgyud 'bum): gang / / de nyid sangs rgyas rigs chen yin// byang chub sems dpa' ci yin brjod// chos rnams thams cad rtogs pa dang // 'khor ba'i gnas las sad gyur cing // sems can rnams kyis rtogs byed pa/
17b1(rgyud 'bum): de ni byang chub sems dpar brjod// ci phyir sangs rgyas brjod par bya// de bzhin nyid bden shin tu brtan// de kho na nyid gang rtogs nas// chos kun rtogs pa zhes bya gang // de ni rtogs pas sangs rgyas
17b2(rgyud 'bum): brjod/ / de bzhin gshegs pa ci yin brjod// chos kyi de bzhin yang dag gnas// slar yang gzhan du mi 'gyur zhing // de nyid lam ni ston byed pa// de ni de bzhin bshegs zhes bya// bcom ldan 'das ni/
17b3(rgyud 'bum): ci yin brjod// las dang nyon mongs de bzhin skye// de bzhin nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib// mi mthun phyogs kyi chos rnams gang // de bcom pas na bcom ldan brjod// de yi bcom pa ci yin brjod// /
17b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan de bzhin bcom par brjod// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags gcod byed cing // nyon mongs 'joms shing pham byed pa// de ni de yi bcom par brjod// de bzhin ston pa'i ston pa ci// nyon mongs
17b5(rgyud 'bum): bdud sogs gcod byed cing / / skye dgu ma lus thabs chen gyis// ngan 'gro srid las skyob byed pa// ston pa'i ston par brjod pa yin// ci yi phyir na ye shes brjod// de nyid shes pas ye shes te// slar yang
17b6(rgyud 'bum): chos su rtog pa min/ / rtag dang chad pa spong byed cing // 'chi med de bzhin ye shes yin// shes rab ye shes ci yin brjod// rnam pa mang po shes byed cing // rtogs pas sdug bsngal las grol byed//
17b7(rgyud 'bum): kun nas nyon mongs chos spong ba// shes rab ye shes zhes su brjod// ci phyir shes rab brjod par bya// rab sbyor sbyor ba shes 'gyur zhing // khyad par du ni rtogs par byed// bden pa de bzhin nyid
18a1(rgyud 'bum): @shes pa'i/ / shes rab shes rab ces su bshad// shes rab pha rol byin don ci// nyan thos rang rgyal phyi rol gyi// shes rab las ni snga mar brjod// de bzhin nyid gnol pa
18a2(rgyud 'bum): byin/ / shes rab pha rol byin zhes bshad// tshul zhes bya don ci yin brjod// na ni dgag pa'i don chen te// dngos med dngos po med min pas// gang du dri ma med gyur pa// de ni de yi tshul du brjod/
18a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin don 'di ci yin brjod// chos kun dngos po med ces pa'i// mnyam pa nyid du rab gnas pa'i// shes rab can gyis lhag par bsten// sems la dmigs par brjod par bya// ci yi phyir na bas
18a4(rgyud 'bum): gtan brjod/ / sdug bsngal thams cad spong byed cing // nyon mongs dra ba rab 'joms pa'i// shes rab bcas par sems pa ni// srid pa 'joms par byed pa'i mchog/ rnal 'byor don ni ci brjod
18a5(rgyud 'bum): chos rgya chen po dam pa dang / / zab mo'i mchog tu gyur pa des// kun shes kun rig ldan 'byor pa'i// rnal 'byor du ni brjod par bya// rnal 'byor pa ni ci yin brjod// shes rab kyis ni nges sem
18a6(rgyud 'bum): pa/ rnal 'byor rnal 'byor don sems shing // sems can kun gyi don sems gang // de ni rnal 'byor pa don brjod// nga ni kun gyi rgyal po che// thams cad rig cing thams cad ster// rdo rje 'chang
18a7(rgyud 'bum): chen dang po ste/ / bde ba yi ni rgyu 'di yis// de bzhin nga ni 'jig rten gsum// khams gsum rnal 'byor rig pa'i mchog/ de bzhin 'khor ba mya ngan 'das// bde 'gro dang ni ngan 'gro dang // 'dod pa lnga la
18b1(rgyud 'bum): longs spyod yin/ / srid gsum 'di yi don ci zhig/ sems can kun gyi sems gang yin// srid pa gsum du brjod par bya// 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med las// 'di ltar thams cad rig pa
18b2(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ bdag med byed pa po yang med// chos kyang yod pa ma yin te// dge dang mi dger byed pa yi// bag chags kyis ni kun tu bsgribs// chos ni thog med dus can te// byed pa po ni yod ma yin//
18b3(rgyud 'bum): rtog pas nyams pa'i sems ldan pas// rgyu dang 'bras bur mthong bar 'gyur// kun gzhi sa bon thams cad pa// de ni chos kun skyed par byed// bsgos shing bag chags dang ldan pa// de ni srid pa gsun
18b4(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya/ / 'dod pa'i las skyes khams gsum gyi// gyur ni kun gzhi de nyid snang // gzugs dang gzugs med 'gro ba yi// chos rnams kun gyi gnas kyang yin// chos kun rnam par dag pa'i phyir//
18b5(rgyud 'bum): nyes pa kun dang bral ba ste// thog ma med 'byung chos snying po// blo bur dri mas nyon mongs 'gyur// nga ni kho na chos chen po// nga ni chos kyi snying por bshad// de bas nga ni rgyal po che// nga ni srid pa
18b6(rgyud 'bum): gsum du bsgrags/ / 'jig rten gsum ni ci yin brjod// 'dod pa 'jig rten de bzhin gzugs// gzugs med pa yi skye dgu rnams// 'jig rten gsum po zhes pa de// rang byung nga nyid kho na
18b7(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / 'dod pa zhes bya chos chen te// dag pa btsal bar bya ba'i phyir// gzung 'dzin chos rnams zhes bya ba'i// de bzhin nyid las so sor rtog/ chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med phyir// nga ni
19a1(rgyud 'bum): chos de dag par byed/ / de bas nga ni rgyal po che// 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag por bstan// ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin gzugs// de bzhin gzugs med rab tu bsgrags// slong
19a2(rgyud 'bum): pa nyid dang dbyer med pas/ / nga ni snying po'i bdag por bshad// khams gsum pa yi don ci zhig/ 'dod khams de bzhin gzugs khams dang // gzugs med pa ni nyid dag dang // khams gsum
19a3(rgyud 'bum): bzang po 'di dag ni/ / rang byung nga nyid kho na yin// 'di ni khams dang rgyu dang don// khams gsum gyi ni rgyu sems pa// stong dang mtshan ma med bshad cing // smon pa med pa nga nyid bstan// 'khor ba'i
19a4(rgyud 'bum): don ni ci zhig yin/ / byis pa rnams ni kun tu 'byung // de bzhin yang dang yang du 'khor// 'khor ba dag pa'i bdag nyid de// rang byung nga nyid kho na yin// gang la 'khor ba yod pa yi// chos ni rdul tsam yod ma
19a5(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / yang dag ma yin kun brtags phyir// de ni thog mtha' med pa yin// med gang de ni stong pa ste// stong pa nyid gang nga nyid do// de bas 'khor ba de nyid ni/ rdo rje 'chang rgyal
19a6(rgyud 'bum): dunyid bsgrags/ / mya ngan 'dras pa ci yin brjod// gang zhig de bzhin nyid rtog stong // bden bzhi rang bzhin bzang po nyid// mtshan nyid dang ni dngos po gzugs// mtshan ma nyid kyang rnam par spangs//
19a7(rgyud 'bum): tshig dang sgra yis gzung bya min// rnam par rtog pa yod ma yin// de bas mya ngan 'das sba ru// nga nyid kho na rab shes bya// de yi rtag pa'i don ci zhig/ rtag nyid rtag la 'byung gnas te// rnam par rtog
19b1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang bral gang / / rtag pa de nyid kho na ni// mya ngan 'das pa'i sgra ru bsgrags// 'jig pa yang ni ci yin brjod// gang zhig 'khor bar mi 'jug cing // thams cad mi rtag pa nyid dang // sdug bsngal 'byung
19b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gog byed pa yi/ / 'jig pa mya ngan 'das sgra yin// dag pa yang ni ci yin brjod// yod pa'ang ma yin med pa'ang min// brjod bya rjod byed ma yin min// dag pa mya ngan 'das nyid yin// theg pa
19b3(rgyud 'bum): chen po ci yin brjod/ / sangs rgyas thams cad gshegs gyur cing // theg pa kun las nges rgyal ba// yang dag gyur pa'i sems can ni// theg pa chen po zhes su bstan// mthu dang las rnams
19b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa dang / / tshogs rnams rnal 'byor ngo mtshar rnams// rgya che zhes pa theg chen te// sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo mtshar mchog/ nam mkha'i don ni ci zhig yin// sa nyid kyang ni ci yin brjod//
19b5(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba med cing rdzas kyang med// skye ba med cing 'chi ba med// dus gsum dngos po dang bral mchog/ nam mkha' zhes pa'i sgra ru bstan// yang dang yang du skye ba dang // de bzhin nyon mongs kun
19b6(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid/ / grangs med dpag med dang bral ba// de ni sa nyid brjod par bya// 'byung ba chen po gang las byung // 'gog pa ci yin gang gis byed// ma rig nyon mongs la sogs las// 'byung ba chen
19b7(rgyud 'bum): po yang dag 'byung / / sa bon kun ldan kun gzhi ni// phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid 'dod// gnas ni yongs su gyur pa dang // kun gzhi sa bon mi 'byung zhing // rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba// 'byung ba
20a1(rgyud 'bum): chen po 'gog pa yin/ / rtog chen po'i rgyal po mchog tu gsang zhing sbas pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo rje rtse mo las shin tu gsang ba stug po'i tshogs kyi las thams cad
20a2(rgyud 'bum): bsdus pa ste drug pa las/ sems dpa' bcu drug gi bshad pa zhes bya ba bshad pa'i dang po rdzogs so// // ci yi phyir na phyag rgyar brjod// gang gis phyag rgya bcings gyur pa/
20a3(rgyud 'bum): de ni srog chags gdug kun dang // 'gro ba sdig can thams cad dang // rtag tu rgyas ni btab par 'gyur// ci phyir sngags su brjod par bya// gsang sngags rnams ni 'bod byed cing // gdug pa thams cad
20a4(rgyud 'bum): skrod par byed/ / nyon mongs sngags rnams 'joms byed cing // sangs rgyas chos ni spyan 'dren yin// ci phyir zhe na rig sngags brjod// 'dod chags mun pa rnams 'dul zhing // nyon mongs rnams kyang rnam
20a5(rgyud 'bum): par 'dul/ / ma rig pa ni zlog byed pa// de ni rig sngags legs par brjod// gzungs sngags rnam ni ci yin brjod// chos rnams kyi ni rten byed cing // srid pa'i phyogs ni rab 'joms byed// sangs rgyas
20a6(rgyud 'bum): chos rnams thob byed cing / / dge ba la rten sbyin pa'ang yin// phyag rgya yi ni mtshan nyid brjod// sangs rgyas kun dang brtul zhugs ldan// byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni// rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad
20a7(rgyud 'bum): dag/ spyod lam phyag rgyas mtshon par byed// sngags rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid kyang // sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs yin te// chos kyi snying po sgrub byed cing // chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag ldan// sngags
20b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi mtshan nyid yin par brjod/ / rig sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid gsungs// 'khor bar myong ba'i sdug bsngal dang // 'dod chags la sogs nyes pa'i tshogs// rigs dang bcas pa zhi byed pa'i// rig sngags//
20b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi ni mtshan nyid brjod// de bzhin kho nar gzungs sngags kyi// sangs rgyas chos rnams 'dzin byed cing // chos rnams 'dzin par byed pa dang // dge ba zhes bya 'dzin byed pa// gzungs sngags kyi ni mtshan/
20b3(rgyud 'bum): nyid brjod// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i gnas ni gang // ji ltar bcing ba thub chen po// phyag rgya dag ni 'ching ba na// ji ltar rdo rje can kun mnyes// dang po kho nar khrus bya zhing // de bzhin phyogs dag bcing ba
20b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / / log 'dren rnams kyang bcing bya ste// gos dag gtsang ma bgo bya zhing // grong dang yul 'khor dag dang ni// grong khyer dang ni grong rdal rnams// de yi dbus su phyag rgya dang // nam yang bcing bar
20b5(rgyud 'bum): na pa / sa()/ rgyus chogs kyis na / la med pa gnas / de kyi thas rdzu// gis
20b6(rgyud 'bum): nyidi b+ha)/ / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' yis// kyang chub snying por bcings pa zhin// der ni mig dgra btsum bu zhing // so la so ni gzhag par bya// btsug nyi sa ga cang mnyam na ning/
20b7(rgyud 'bum): gyi ci gyis sa kyang / khyong me myong jams pa zhing // chug chen pa / yub kyi'i rnam pa sa tha'o// kyis papa dzin can sa/ rnags pa /
21a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug chen po gsang ba gsungs// rig sngags dag ni bzlas pa na// ji ltar yid kyis rdo rje bzlas// skyil kyang ji lta ba bzhin bya// dran dang yid ni ma yengs pas// rig snga/
21a2(rgyud 'bum): dag ni bzla bya zhing // sku nyid kyang ni bsam par bya// mchu yis ma yin lces kyang min// dkan nyid kyis kyang ma yin te// lce dang lkog mas kyang ma yin// rtag tu snying kha nas kyang min// shin tu
21a3(rgyud 'bum): phra ba'i yid kyis ni/ / sems ni chos nyid nang chud bya// de ltar bzlas pa byas nas ni// yid kyis rdo rje bzlas pa yin// oM ni ci zhig yin par bshad// mchog dang nor ster dpal dang g.yang //
21a4(rgyud 'bum): skal bzang rnam pa dang ldan zhing // dam bca' ba dang bkra shis don// nor bu 'dzin pa'i snying po yin// yi ge hUM ni ci yin brjod// sdug bsngal 'chos shing 'joms par byed// srid pa'i zhags pa
21a5(rgyud 'bum): gcod byed cing / / gdug pa dngangs shing bsod byed pa'i// hUM ni mchog tu dran par bya// yi ge phaT ni ci yin brjod// gdug dang sdug bsngal 'joms byed cing // bde ba dag ni 'gugs par byed// phaT
21a6(rgyud 'bum): ni 'joms byed sgra yin te/ / grogs dang bcas pa 'joms par byed// swA hA zhes pa ci yin brjod// sdig pa thams cad zhi byed cing // dge ba'i tshogs ni 'phel bar byed// nyes par byas pa
21a7(rgyud 'bum): 'phrog byed cing / / sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms pa'i mchog/ mchod pa ci phyir brjod par bya// mchod par byed pas mchod pa ste// gang du gsad bya mi 'jigs pa'i// de yi mchod pa rnam mang
21b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / phyi rol gyi ni mchod pa min// 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyis mchod// de bzhin du ni thar pa'i mchog/ gsang ba'i mchod pa de rnams ni// 'jigs med rgyal sras rnams kyis ni// sangs rgyas
21b2(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi rang bzhin dang / / nyid kyi sras kyi mtshungs med pa'i// cho ga sgrub pa'i gsang ba ni// rtag tu rig pa 'dzin pa'i mchog/ de bzhin dam tshig shes nyid kyang // zhugs pa gang dang gang yin pa//
21b3(rgyud 'bum): de ni dam tshig shes pa yin// dam tshig goms par byed pa yang // dam tshig shes pa yin par brjod// bskal pa grangs med 'das pa yi// byang chub sems dang mtshungs par 'gyur// gsang
21b4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dam tshig la zhugs pa/ / de yi dam tshig shes par brjod// ci yi phyir na dkyil 'khor yin// dam pa'i chos kyi bcud snying po// 'byung bas de ni dkyil 'khor brjod// dkyil 'khor
21b5(rgyud 'bum): chen po gsang ba che/ / chos chen shin tu bstan pa'o// dkyil 'khor cho ga ji lta bu// cho ga chos dang rnal 'byor te// gsang ba'i thar pa yang dag 'byung // skye ba 'di nyid kho na la// rab dga' sgrub
21b6(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa'i mchog/ dkyil 'khor du ni zhugs pa yi// skyes pa'am yang na bud med kyis// bya ba gang zhig bya ba ni// gsungs shig gsang ba'i dbang phyug che// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs/
21b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gro dang // byang chub sems chen bskyed pa dang // de bzhin du ni sgrub pa'i mchog/ shin tu brtan par bya ba yin// thub pa'i dkyil 'khor zhugs pa la// sdom pa ji ltar sbyin par bya// khyod kyi
22a1(rgyud 'bum): srog chags gsang mi bya/ / ma byin par yang thang mi bya// 'dod pas log par g.yem mi bya// brdzun du yang ni sgra mi bya// nyes pa kun gyi rtsa ba yi// chang dag 'thung ba spang
22a2(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / bya ba ma yin thams cad dor// mchog tu sems can gdul bar bya// dam pa rnams la rim gro dang // rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya// rnal 'byor rig par sgrub pa'i phyir// mkhas
22a3(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams la brten par bya/ / lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang // ngag gi yang ni rnam pa bani// yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag kyang // ci nus par ni bsrung bar bya// slob dpon brnyas par mi bya ste// bla
22a4(rgyud 'bum): ma sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs/ / sngags dang phyag rgya rnams la yang // nam yang brnyas par mi bya'o// 'khor lo rdo rje pad+ma sogs// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya gang yin pa// 'gom pa nyid du mi bya zhing //
22a5(rgyud 'bum): bza' bar yang ni mi bya'o// de bzhin dman ma lha yi grib// rkang pa dag gis brdzi mi bya// de yi steng du 'dug mi bya// slar yang gzhag par mi bya'o// lha yi phyag mtshan bzang po dang // lha yi
22a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhon pa'i mtshan ma rnams/ / mgom zhing brnyas par mi bya ste// sems can la ni gnod mi bya// de yis srog gi phyir yang ni// 'dor bar mi bya gang zhig yin// 'tsho ba'i srog gi phyir yang ni/
22a7(rgyud 'bum): / byang chub sems ni dor mi bya// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni// nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// dkon mchog gsum la dad pa yang // rnam pa kun tu gtang mi bya// sdom pa gtang bar mi bya zhing // bdag
22b1(rgyud 'bum): nyid gdung bar mi bya'o/ / khrus kyi las ni ji ltar bya// mi dge bcu ni spangs nas su// dge ba bcu ni sten byed cing // 'byung po rnams la phan 'dod pa// nang gi bdag nyid khrus su 'dod// bdag nyid
22b2(rgyud 'bum): rab tu dag bya'i phyir/ / bdag nyid phyag rgyas rgyas gdab phyir// phyag rgya thams cad yang dag bcing // rnal 'byor pa yi khrus su brjod// gsang ba'i mkhas ldan las len pa'i// chu yi khrus ni bya/
22b3(rgyud 'bum): pa ste// las 'di rnam par rtog pa'i khrus// rdo rje slob dpon bdag gis bya// yang na cho gas khrus bya ba// mchog tu ngo mtshar bshad bya ste// dang por bdag nyid go bgo zhing // khro bo yang ni dran par bya//
22b4(rgyud 'bum): don kun rab tu sgrub byed pa'i// yig gnyis go cha bzang po yin// rdo rje gnod sbyin drag chen dang // khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ste// oM badz+ra kI li kI la badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM trAM/ go cha'o// oM hUM A/
22b5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi'o// oM a mr-i te hUM phaT/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i 'o// rdo rje'i gsang sngags 'di dang ni// rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis// rdo rje 'bar rab bzod dka' bas// bdag nyid dag ni 'bar bar
22b6(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / oM d+hU bi d+hU pi kA ya d+hU pi pra dz+wA la ni swA hA// chu yi nang du 'jug pa dang // snyim pa gsum ni blugs pa dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi rigs dag la// rig sngags 'di ni 'don pa yin// rig sngags
22b7(rgyud 'bum): mngon par bzlas pa yi/ / sa yi phung po gsum dag ni// bdag gi stod dang smad dang dbus// rab tu dag byed mchog yin no// oM b+h+yaHdza la hUM/ sangs rgyas thams cad rjes dran pas/
23a1(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags thams cad mngon bzlas pa'i// chu ni phyag rgya kun gyis byung // rig sngags 'di ni gsang bar 'dod// phyogs ni ji ltar bcing ba yin// me lha rgyal chen shar
23a2(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su/ / lho yi phyogs su gshin rje dang // nub tu rlung lha nyid dang ni// byang du chu lha gzhom par 'dod// rnal 'byor pa yis gzugs bzhi ni// phyogs bzhi dag tu nges par bcing // de nas
23a3(rgyud 'bum): steng 'og mtshams rnams su/ / rdo rje nag mos nges par gcad// bgegs bcing ba ni ji ltar lags// rdo rje khu tshur rab 'bar dang // rdo rje nyi ma ltar 'bar dang // rdo rje spyan gyi phyag rgya yis// bgegs
23a4(rgyud 'bum): bcing ba ni brtan par 'gyur/ / dga' ba chen po ji lta bu// rab tu gus bcas phyag dag bya// phyag rgya bzhi yis phyogs bzhi ru// lnga pa brtsegs pa'i phyag rgya yis// steng dang 'og dang mtshams rnams su//
23a5(rgyud 'bum): bstod dang bcas pa'i phyag bya'o// rdo rje slob dpon skal chen gyis// mchog tu gsang ba'i dam pa yis// brtsegs pa'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du// de bzhin du ni bcing bar bya// mchod pa ji ltar
23a6(rgyud 'bum): yin zhe na/ / rig sngags mngon par bzlas mchod dang // phyag rgya bcing ba lhur len dang // rnal 'byor sgom pa'i mchod pa dang // sgrub pa dag gi mchod pa'o// sbyin sreg las ni ji lta bu// lus
23a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi las ni rnam gsungs/ / ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang // yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag dang // bsreg bya sbyin sreg mchog yin no// rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung ba'o// de nas rdo rje rig 'dzin gyi// snying po
23b1(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba kun bsdus pa'i/ / shin tu sbas pa dam pa'i mchog/ de kho na nyid bshad par bya// rdo rje slob dpon spyod chen ldan// dkyil 'khor gsang bar rab tu zhugs// slob dpon las ni dbang
23b2(rgyud 'bum): bskur thob/ / gsang dang dgongs pa kun shes shing // dpa' zhing brtan la brtson 'grus che// yid gzhungs 'dzin cing gsal bar ldan// dul drang ba shes gnyen can dag gis// rdo rje slob
23b3(rgyud 'bum): dpon nyid bya'o/ / dang por ji srid tshogs bar du// zla ba 'am yang na zla ba phyed// yang na lo yi bar du ni// rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad par bya// gal te de ni sangs rgyas kyi// rig 'dzin grub pa
23b4(rgyud 'bum): rnam gsum mo/ / ci ste rdo rje can gyi yin// rnam pa gsum du nges pa yin// nor bu rigs can bzang po la// rnal 'byor bzhi po nyid bya'o// ci ste pad+ma 'byung ba la// rnal 'byor bzhi ni rab tu sgrug/
23b5(rgyud 'bum): ciste las kyi rang bzhin bzang // las rnams kun gyi rigs las ni// sbyor ba bzhi ni yang dag byung // rnam pa bco brgyad dag tu 'gyur// snga dro phyi dro nyi phyed dang // nam gyi gung smad gung la ni//
23b6(rgyud 'bum): / byab chen po kun bya ste// de bzhin sangs rgyas rdo rje'i rigs// dang por re zhig rnal byor ches// chen pos phyogs kun phyag bya ste// rdo rje rnal 'byor cho ga yis// rdo rje slob dpon nyid bya'o// shes
23b7(rgyud 'bum): rab chen po sangs rgyas kun/ / yang dang yang du dran bya ste// bdag nyid chen po sangs rgyas kun// rdo rje'i sngags kyis bskul bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza pa pra brta nA ya At+ma naM nir+yA ta ya mi/
24a1(rgyud 'bum): sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/ shar gyi phyogs su song nas ni// yan lag kun gyis phyag byas te// rdo rje'i gsang sngags 'di yis ni// bdag nyid dbul bar
24a2(rgyud 'bum): bya ba yin/ / oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza a b+hi She kA ya At+ma nAM nair+yA ta yA mi// sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ rdo rje gsang sngags 'di yis ni// lho phyogs su ni phyag byas te// sangs rgyas
24a3(rgyud 'bum): dag ni thams cad la/ / bdag ni dbul bar bya ba yin// de nas nub kyi phyogs su ni// sngags 'di yis ni phyag byas te// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza pra brta nA ya At+ma naM nir+yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta
24a4(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra d+harma pra brta ya mAM/ / dag pa'i chos can slob dpon ches// nub phyogs su ni phyag byas te// rdo rje'i sngags 'dis bskul bya zhing // bdag nyid rab tu dbul bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza karma Ne AH
24a5(rgyud 'bum): naM nir+yA ta yA mi/ / sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra karma ku ru mAM// mchod dang dbang bskur las ldan zhing // byang du chos la nges sbyor bas// byang phyogs su ni phyag byas te// bdag nyid rdo rje las su 'gyur/
24a6(rgyud 'bum): shar du mchod pa'i las yin te// lce phyogs su ni dbang bskur ba// nu bo phyogs su ni chos chen po// byang du chos la nges par sbyor// thub pa kun gyi nyi ma'o// mgon po chen po rab btud nas/
24a7(rgyud 'bum): phyogs rnams kun tu sngags 'di yis// phyag ni rab tu btsal bar bya/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAka tsit+ta pra Na me na badz+ra ban d+ha naM ka ro mi// de nas ji skad bshad pa'i phyag bya ba// sangs rgyas la
24b1(rgyud 'bum): dmigs sems kyis ni/ / rab tu gus bcas phyag rgya rnams// myur du bsnyen pa'i sgrub pa yin// phyag byas 'og tu langs nas ni// bdag nyid kyis ni las rnams bya// bdag nyid dbul ba bzang
24b2(rgyud 'bum): po yi/ / sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya ste// ma lus phyogs bzhugs mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol// 'di ltar nye bar zhi ba bdag/ ci nas rdo rje nyid gyur mdzod//
24b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i rigs kyi mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad la// rtag tu rnam pa thams cad kyis// bdag nyid dag ni dbul bar bya// rdo rje'i gsang sngags de yis ni// bdag nyid dbul
24b4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ba yin/ / sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad ni// yang dang yang du rjes dran te// sdig pa la sogs nyon mongs kun// mya ngan 'das par bshags par bya// skye ba 'di 'am gzhan
24b5(rgyud 'bum): dag gi/ sdig pa thams cad rnam spangs nas// sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad kyi// bsod nams ye shes tshogs bskyed dang // de bzhin sems can kun gyi la// rjes su yi rang bya ba yin// /
24b6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub mya ngan mi 'da' bar// sangs rgyas kun la gsol ba gdab// byang chub sems ni thabs chen gyis// sems can sangs rgyas rjes dran bya// shin tu ngo mtshar mchod pa ni// ci nus par yang
24b7(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub par bya/ / yang na mya ngan 'das sogs dang // rnal 'byor dge ba sogs pa la// ngo mtshar gyur pa'i mchod pa yis// mchod pa'i sprin dag dbul bar bya// gnas 'di 'am ni gzhan dag na//
25a1(rgyud 'bum): lha sogs bdag gir ma byas pa'i// me tog chu skyes thang skyes rnams// thabs chen sangs rgyas thams cad dang // de yi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor nas// thub pa'i dbang po rnams
25a2(rgyud 'bum): la dbul/ / rdo rje'i rnal 'byor 'di yis ni// me tog mchod pas rab mchod cing // phyag rgya rnal 'byor bcas pa yis// phyogs rnams kun tu nges par spro// oM sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pa pU dza me
25a3(rgyud 'bum): / g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ gang dag spos kyi shing bzang po// thub pa'i dbang phyug rnams la dbul// lha yi spos sogs rmad byung ba// phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta
25a4(rgyud 'bum): d+hU pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ dri yi shing rnams bzang po ni// thub pa'i dbang phyug rnams la ni// phyag rgyar bcas rab bskul nas ni// phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya// oM sarba ta
25a5(rgyud 'bum): / thA ga ta gan+d+ha pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ rin chen rang bzhin rgya mtsho dang // rin chen ri bo la sogs mchog/ mchod pa'i sprin ni spro ba yis// phyogs rnams kun tu dbul bar bya'o//
25a6(rgyud 'bum): oM sarba ta thA ga ta bo d+hang ga rat+na a laM kA ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha rA Na sa ma ye hUM/ rtsed 'jo bde ba dga' chen dang // rgod dang sgeg la sogs pa'i tshogs// phyogs rnams kun tu thams cad nas//
25a7(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba'i mchog ni spro bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta hA s+ye lA swe ra ti kr-i ta sau khya a nut+ta ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ gos dang rgyan sogs 'byung ba yi// de bzhin dpag bsam shing bca
25b1(rgyud 'bum): po/ de yi sngags ni brjod bya zhing // sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nud+ha ra bo d+hi A lang kA ra wasta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ rin chen bzang po cher
25b2(rgyud 'bum): 'bar dang / / snang ba'i shing las byung ba dang // zla ba nyi ma la sogs 'od// phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta A lo ke pU dza me b+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sems can kun gyi
25b3(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal che/ / yang dang yang du rjes dran nas// snying rje bskyed pa'i sbyor ba yis// byang chub sems ni bskyed par bya// byang chub tu ni sems bskyed nas// sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir// sangs
25b4(rgyud 'bum): kun la dbul bya zhing / / phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra be d+hi tsit+ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sems can kun la bde legs dang // 'byung po kun la byams
25b5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / dud 'gro kun la mi 'jigs sbyin// ngan 'gro thams cad zhi 'dod dang // byams dang snying rje btang snyoms dang // dga' ba tshangs pa'i rnal 'byor 'byung // rdo rje'i sngags ni brjod bya zhing //
25b6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nud+ha ra ma hA brah+ma bi hA ra pU dza me b+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sems can thams cad dpal dang ni// nor dang ldan pa grub par shog/
25b7(rgyud 'bum): bde ba ma tshang med par shog/ ces pas dbul zhing spro bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA badz+ro d+ha ba dA na pa ra mi tra pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sems can thams cad byang chub dang // sdom la
26a1(rgyud 'bum): rab tu gnas par shog/ rgyags sogs nyes pa chen po rnams// zhi 'gyur kun tu spro bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta u nut+tA ra mahA bo d+hi hA ra shI la pA ra mi tA pU dza me g+ha s+ya mu/
26a2(rgyud 'bum): dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ 'jigs dang kho na sogs sdug bsngal la// sogs pa'i 'jigs kun zhi gyur cig/ byams dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// chos la bdag med bsgrub par bya// oM
26a3(rgyud 'bum): sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+ta ra ma hA d+harma a ba bo d+hi k+ShAn+ti bA ra mi ta pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ / 'khor ba mthar thug bar du ni// bdag 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ de bzhin sems can
26a4(rgyud 'bum): / thams cad ni// de nyid sgrub pa byed par shogaM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta san sA ra pa ri t+ye ka a nut+ta ra bIr+ya pA ra mi tA pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra swa ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ srog chags kun gyi 'dod chags sogs//
26a5(rgyud 'bum): / nyon mongs chen po zhi bar shog/ sems can thams cad g.yeng med cing // bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan par shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+ta ra ma hA siM khya bi hA ra d+ha na pA ra mi tatA pU dza me b+ha sa mu dra sA
26a6(rgyud 'bum): ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ sangs rgyas ye shes shes rab che// sdug bsngal gcod byed bla na med// shes rab sbyor bas dag byed pa'i// sas rgyas sems can dag gyur cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+ta ra kla
26a7(rgyud 'bum): shats+tshed sarba d+harmA sa man+ta dz+nyA na ma hA pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ / stong gsum gyi ni rdul snyed kyi// bdag nyid kyis ni rnam bsam zhing // mchod pa'i phyir ni rnam bsams nas/
26b1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya nir+yA tA na pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ stong gsum gyi ni rdul snyed kyi// bdag nyid kyis ni rnam bsam zhing // lce ni de snyed
26b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan dang bcas/ / sangs rgyas bsngags pa brjod par bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta bAka nir+ya tA na pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M/ de nas rnal 'byor de nyid kyis// lus dang ngag sems byung ba yi//
26b3(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa dag ni bsdus nas su// sangs rgyas kun la dbul ba bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsat+te nir+ya ta na pA dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM// grags chen ldan pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// ma lus kun
26b4(rgyud 'bum): la mchod nas ni/ / dge ba dag ni bsdus byas nas// sems can don du bsngo bar bya// sangs rgyas thams cad rjes dran nas// sems dpa'i skyil krung bca' bar bya// byams sogs rnal 'byor chen po
26b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya// go cha mchog gi yig gnyis kyis// blo ldan bdag nyid go bgo zhing // rig sngags gang zhig mngon 'dod pa'i// rig sngags de ni bzla bar bya// rgyud
26b6(rgyud 'bum): / chen gsang ba 'di ru ni// rnal 'byor chen pa'i sngags bzlas pa// brgya rtsa bcu ru bshad pa yin// yang na nyi shu rtsa gcig go/ cho ga'i sbyor ba 'bring la ni// thun mong du ni rnam lngar bshad// gang gis
26b7(rgyud 'bum): sdig can 'grub 'gyur ba'i/ / gsang ba'i bzlas pa rnal 'byor che// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs mchog la// bzlas pa 'di ni mchog yin no// bkra shis skyil krung bcas nas ni// sems kyis
27a1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas la dmigs nas/ / blo dang ldan pa bdag nyid ni// rtag tu kun mkhyen sangs rgyas bsam// gtsug tor la sogs mtshan bzang dang // ldan par bdag gis
27a2(rgyud 'bum): lus bsams te/ / sangs rgyas snying po nang 'dug cing // nga nyid sangs rgyas zhes su bsam// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las byung ba'i/ gang gis 'khor lo rnam sprul pa// mngon par byang chub chen
27a3(rgyud 'bum): po yi/ / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya// gdul bya'i tshogs ni longs spyod pa'i// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa'ang 'grub// gnas ni yongs su gyur pa yis// sems ni kun gzhi las byung
27a4(rgyud 'bum): min/ / bsod nams ye shes rab rdzogs phyir// zla ba gang bar rnam par brtag/ zla ba gang ba dri med pa// snying kha ru ni bsgom par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rig pa'i yi ge rnam
27a5(rgyud 'bum): par sgom/ / de lta bu yi tshul mchog gis// zla ba phyed na 'grub par 'gyur// mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang // lo gcig na ni 'grub par 'gyur// ji srid skyo bar mi 'gyur ba'i// de srid rnal
27a6(rgyud 'bum): 'byor chen pos bzlas/ / lus ni ral bar gyur pa na// phyag rgya bcing ba brtsam par bya// bde bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzlas pa'i// de tshe byang chub mchog bcing bya// yang na chos 'byung zhes
27a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'am/ / shin tu rmad byung dpal be'u'o// de nas rdo rje'i rigs bzlas pa// phyag na rdo rje rang bdag nyid// byang chub snying po la gnas bdag/ bdag ni phyag na rdo rje bstan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
27b1(rgyud 'bum): dbus su ni/ / rdo rje'i gzugs ni rnam par sgom// gsang chen rdo rje'i dbus su ni// rig pa'i yi ge rnam par sgom// de nas pad+ma'i rigs bzlas pa// pad+ma sems dpa' rang bdag nyid//
27b2(rgyud 'bum): zla ba'i dbus su pad+ma che// pad+ma'i dbus su yi ge rnams// bde bzhin rin chen rigs bzlas pa'i// rin chen rgyal po rigs bdag nyid// zla ba'i dbus su rin chen che// rin chen dbus su'ang
27b3(rgyud 'bum): yi ge rnams/ / de nas las kyi rigs bzang po// rnal 'byor don kun sgrub byed la// sangs rgyas snying po rang bdag nyid// rdo rje las su rnam par sgom// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni//
27b4(rgyud 'bum): rin chen rdo rje rnam par sgom// rin chen rtse mo rdo rje che// de yi dbus su'ang yi ge rnams// rigs lnga yi ni bzlas pa 'di// gsang ba'i bzlas pa brjod par bya// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste//
27b5(rgyud 'bum): bzlas rgyud gsang ba mchog 'dzin pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzlas pa'i// sangs rgyas bdag nyid bkra shis 'dzin// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir// sangs rgyas gzugs su//
27b6(rgyud 'bum): rnam par sgom// sangs rgyas de yi thugs dbus su// rig pa'i yi ge rnam par sgom// rang gi lus ni bdag med cing // chos dang gang zag stong pa nyid// sangs rgyas de dag gi gzugs ni//
27b7(rgyud 'bum): bdag med par ni rnam par bsam// lus ni sangs rgyas zhes brjod pas// sangs rgyas de yang yod ma yin// phung po dang ni skye mched khams// chos zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas med// gang zag
28a1(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyis sangs rgyas med/ / sangs rgyas med pa yang ma yin// pha rol phyin drug sa bon te// shes rab sa bon sbyong mdzad pa'i// gnas dang gnas min skal ldan pa//
28a2(rgyud 'bum): de nyid byang chub bdag med 'dzin// de lta bus ni gsang chen gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzlas na// myur bar slob dpon chen po yis// rab tu dga' ba 'grub par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje'i
28a3(rgyud 'bum): rigs bzlas pa/ / rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir// rdo rje'i gzugs su rnam par sgom// rdo rje de yi lte dbus su// rig pa'i yi ge rnam par sgom//
28a4(rgyud 'bum): dngos med ces bya rdo rje de// byang chub 'bras bu gang yin pa'o// gang zhig rdo rje zhes su bshad// gang zhig de nyid 'gyur med pa'i// lus kyi de nyid ces brjod la// gang zhig chos dang chos nyid stob//
28a5(rgyud 'bum): gzugs la sogs pa'i chos chen po// 'byung ba che sgra 'dzin pa med// lus ni gzugs zhes bya bar brjod// gzugs zhes bya ba yod ma yin// gzugs de yang ni rnam phye la// phra mo'i 'du shes
28a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam par sgom/ / cha shas su ni rnam phye na// gzugs zhes bya ba yod ma yin// gzugs ni stong pa zhes bshad do// 'di de rdo rje zhes byar bstan// gzugs sogs chos rnams thams cad ni//
28a7(rgyud 'bum): stong pa nyid ni rnam par sgom// de lta bu yi rnal 'byor gyis// rab tu dga' ba bsgrub par bya// de nas rin chen rigs bzlas pa// rdo rje rin chen rigs bdag nyid// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig
28b1(rgyud 'bum): rten 'dir/ / stong nyid nam mkhar rnam par sgom// de ni nam mkhar rnal 'byor chos// rtog pa dang bcas yi ger bsam// chos kun dngos med ces bya ba// stong nyid de bzhin nyid ces brjod//
28b2(rgyud 'bum): dngos med ces bya'i gzugs med de// mkha' mtshungs sangs rgyas spyod yul lo// gang la gzugs ni yod min pa'i// mig ces bya ba ci yin brjod// mig de yang ni gang zhig gi/ mig ces
28b3(rgyud 'bum): bya ba yin par brjod/ / bdag po rgyal po 'di gang zhig/ 'di yi skye ba'ang ji lta bu'i// 'byung ba chen po bzhi 'dus las// mig gi dbang po yang dag byung // mig de la yang gzugs med la// ci zhig
28b4(rgyud 'bum): byed de yod pa'ang min/ / mig ni ji lta ba bzhin du// thams cad gzung dang 'dzin pa spangs// bzlas pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// chos chen po yi dbang bskur 'gyur// de nas pad+ma'i rigs bzlas
28b5(rgyud 'bum): papad+ma'i sems dpa' rang bdag nyid/ / stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir// pad+ma'i gzugs su rnam par sgom// pad+ma shin tu dag de la// rig pa'i ye shes rnam par sgom// shes rab chen pos pad+ma de// chos kyi snying por bsam par bya// d+da chu yis ma gos shing
28b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dam gyi nyes pas gos mi 'gyur/ / sems can thams cad de bzhin dag/ chos ni gzod nas ma skyes pa'i// de bzhin gshegs nyid 'di gang zhig/ chos dang chos nyid stong gang yin// gzugs
28b7(rgyud 'bum): sogs chos rnams thams cad kyi/ / chos nyid de bzhin nyid du 'dod// de nas las kyi rigs bzlas pa'i// las kyi rnal 'byor rnam par bsam// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'khor lo 'di// chos dang
29a1(rgyud 'bum): longs spyod thob byed yin/ / gang la chos zhes bya ba med// sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam 'phrul snang // e ma'o sangs rgyas de dag snang // rang gi las kyang sgrub par mdzad// de lta bu yi rnal
29a2(rgyud 'bum): 'byor gyis/ / rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che// tshe 'di nyid la dam pa yi// sangs rgyas nyid ni mchog thob 'gyur// rdo rje'i snying sogs phyag rgya ni// rdo rje rigs la badrag por bshad// rin chen la sos/
29a3(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur zhing // dag pa'i mchog ni pad mchog 'dzin// sangs rgyas sku ni chos chen la// rdo rje rnal 'byer nges bstan bya// byang chub mchog ni kun 'dul ba// 'di ni bzlas pa dam par 'dod// de nas
29a4(rgyud 'bum): slob dpon rdo rje 'dzin/ / 'phreng ba nges par bsten par bya// gang du bzlas pa bya ba byed// rnam gnyis rnam gsum nyung ba'ang rung // 'phreng ba sangs rgyas la mdzub bcas// gung mos rdo rje'i rnal 'byor skyes//
29a5(rgyud 'bum): srin lag steng du rin chen skyes// mthe'u chung gis ni pad kha phye// las kyi 'phreng bas las byed pa// sor mo kun gyis bya bar bshad// rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa yi// 'di ni gsang ba'i bzlas pa che//
29a6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rnal 'byor bau de tse// rdo rje can la ru rag sha// phyi rol rdor rigs dbang po ste// mu tig nor bu'i rnal 'byor can// pad+ma'i snying po'i 'phreng ba ni// pad+ma'i rigs rnams kun la bsngags//
29a7(rgyud 'bum): yang na kun las mchog gyur pa// bo de tse de srog 'dzin pa// lcags kyi bzlas pa nyis 'gyur te// zangs kyi yang ni bzhir 'gyur ro// ru rag sha yi bye ba gnyis// mu tig gi ni brgyar 'gyur ro// dbang
