29b1(rgyud 'bum): po'i stong 'gyur rnal 'byor te/ / dngul gyi 'bum du 'gyur ba yin// pad+ma'i bye ba brgyar 'gyur brjod// bo de tsa yi grangs med do// lag pa g.yon pas phyag rgya bcing // g.yas pa 'phreng ba dang ldan bya//
29b2(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar sngar bshad gsang ba sogs// rmad byung chen po'i bzlas pa bya// ci yi phyir na bzlas pa brjod// dge ba la brtson rgyal 'gyur zhing // rmad byung rnams kyang mthong 'gyur zhing // byang chub spyod pa rgyal 'gyur/
29b3(rgyud 'bum): zhing // sangs rgyas rol pa mngon par 'gyur// bzlas pas skyo na langs nas ni// phyag rgya dag ni bcing bar bya// sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir// phyogs kun tu ni 'dud pa bshad// byang chub sems tshul
29b4(rgyud 'bum): thob byed pa'i/ / mdo sogs gsang ba bklag par bya// bsod nams tshogs ni bskyed pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas mchod pa yang dag bya// de nas zas kyi dus su ni// rnam pa kun tu chang bu sbyin// sangs
29b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas rigs pas mngon bsrungs la/ / bza' ba dag pa dbul bar bya// sangs rgyas bdag nyid bza' ba dbul// legs par bgos nas bza' ba dbul// snga dro sdom pa blang bya ste// de nyid nyi phyed dang
29b6(rgyud 'bum): mtshams su/ / nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du// sangs rgyas rdo rje nor bu dang // pad+ma byed pa'i rnal 'byor gang // rnam pa bzhi po de las sbyor// sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs byang chub//
29b7(rgyud 'bum): nyin dang mtshan la rnam pa drug/ rdo rje dril bu tshogs slob dpon// rdo rje can rnams de bzhin drug/ zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang ni// byams pa nyin zhag kun la brgyad// chos gsum tshangs pa bzhi zhes
30a1(rgyud 'bum): pa/ rnam pa brgyad du bzlas par bya// 'di yi chos chen gsum po la// rtag tu snyoms par 'jug par bya// gsang mchog dkyil 'khor mchog dang ni// de bzhin las
30a2(rgyud 'bum): kun byed pa'o/ / gang du sdig par mi 'gyur ba'i// thams cad bza' zhing thams cad len// lus nas lhag mar gyur pa spangs// de bzhin dri ma thams cad spang // nyin re zhing ni lan gsum du//
30a3(rgyud 'bum): khrus gsum bya zhing gsang blang ba// gos kyang lan gsum brje bar bya// gtsang gos lan gsum yang ni sbyin// sha dang chang btsong la sogs pa// dri ngan kha yi sgregs pa dang // 'khrig pa 'dod
30a4(rgyud 'bum): dang bsten pa dang / / sems can 'tshe la dga' mi bya// brtson zhing las mkhas spyod par ldan// sgrin zhing dul la dga' dang gtsang // bya ba byed cing bla ma khur// dge legs rgyan ni 'chang bar byed//
30a5(rgyud 'bum): kun rdzob don dam rnam pa gnyis// bslab pa'i sdom pa blang bar bya// kha ni nang du lta yid ches// sngags dang phyag rgya rig sngags dang // gzungs dang lha dang bla ma dang // rdo rje la sogs mtshon cha bzang //
30a6(rgyud 'bum): lha yi gnas dang yang dag ldan// 'jigs min g.yo dang sgyu can min// mi brtan pa yi blo can min// mya ngan 'das la dga' ba min// blo ldan 'jig rten 'dir mi dga'// de bzhin pha rol dga'
30a7(rgyud 'bum): ba min/ / lus srog btang snyoms mi bya zhing // bslab pa las ni 'da' mi bya// skrag ldan nga rgyal ldan pa min// 'jig rten bya ba 'dod mi bya// de lta'i ngo mtshar tshul la ni// rnal 'byor pa yis bsgrub
30b1(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / smra ba spang zhing brjod chen ldan// rnyed pa spang zhing legs rnyed ldan// dpa' zhing brtan la bla ma gus// sdig pas 'jigs shing kun tu bsdams// ci nus ji ltar spro bar bya// zla ba 'am
30b2(rgyud 'bum): yang na lo re 'am/ / nyin zhag gcig la lan gnyis su// de bzhin bla ma blta bar bya// mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang // de lta bu yi tshul gnas shing // phyag rgya rnam pa brgyad bcings nas// rtag tu
30b3(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'gyur pa yin/ / brtul zhugs tshangs par rdzogs 'gyur nas// rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje 'chang ba slob dpon la// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur 'gyur//
30b4(rgyud 'bum): rig pa kun bdag rgyal po ste// dkyil 'khor kun gyi de nyid rig/ rnal 'byor cho ga de nyid shes// de bzhin lha yi rigs rnams mthong // sdom pa blangs shing rnam par mkhas// rig pa'i slob
30b5(rgyud 'bum): dpon dbang bskur 'gyur/ / lam rnams chen po byed rgyal po// rig pa ldan zhing de nyid shes// phan pa dang ni gnod pa shes// lha la sogs pa kun dbang byed// gnod sbyin 'byung po lha dbang sogs//
30b6(rgyud 'bum): rig pa'i rgyal po mngag gzhug pa// 'di ni chos kyi gru la gnas// sangs rgyas mchod pa legs mchod byed// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rgyal po// mdzod 'dzin rtag tu gsang ba 'dzin// 'khor
30b7(rgyud 'bum): le grong khyer chen por gnas/ / byang chub sems dpa'i tshul 'dzin pa'i// dam chos bcud kyi snying po skyes// snying po 'dzin cing dkyil 'khor mchod// dgongs pa de nyid tshul shes 'di// theg pa
31a1(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i tshul don shes/ / mchod sbyin lhag pa'i mchod dam pa'i// gsang ba yi ri dkyil 'khor bya// rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis// gang zhig gi ni thog pa ru// bgegs kun/
31a2(rgyud 'bum): nges par 'joms pa yi// gsang sngags drag po brjod par bya// bkra shis sdig pa 'joms byed pa// bzlas brjod sbyin sreg cho ga yang // nga ni rdo rje me ltar 'bar// drag po'i bzod dka' ye shes
31a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin/ / dkyil 'khor mchod pa bya ba ni// yo byad yongs su brtag par bya// yang na phyi nas byed pa yis// ci rigs par ni brtag par bya// dpag tshad las lhag mi bya zhing // khru drug las ni chung ba
31a4(rgyud 'bum): min/ / sgrub pa bcu gnyis zhes bya ste// gzhan yang byed pa bcu gnyis so// gal te de ni rgyal por 'gyur// dpag tshad kyi ni khyon tsam bya// yang na kun nas bzang po ste// nges bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan//
31a5(rgyud 'bum): yang na sgrub pa blon po yin// khru stong yod pa mchog yin no// yang na kun nas bzang ba yi// khru drug pa las chung mi bya// yang na ded dpon yin yang rung // ngos bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan// lnga pa las ni chung mi
31a6(rgyud 'bum): d+hu/ yang na gang zhig gzhan dag gam// sgrub pa po dag yin yang rung // bcu pa las ni chung mi bya// zur bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan// rgya cher yang ni mi bya'o// yang na sgrub byed slob dpon yin// drug pa bas
31a7(rgyud 'bum): nichung mi bya/ / yang na dpag tshad dang ldan pa'o// yang na yo byad ldan par bya// gal te sgrub byed de rgyal po// rin chen phye ma rab tu bya// rin chen btags las legs bya zhing // shin tu khyad 'phags yid du 'ong /
31b1(rgyud 'bum): in+d+ra nI la sngon po che// tshon rtsi sngon po rab tu bya// pad+ma rA ga rA ga che// tshon rtsi dmar po yang dag ldan// tshon rtsi ser po mdog bzang po// dri ma med pa'i 'od zer ldan// tshon rtsi dkar po ldan pa yi// dkar po
31b2(rgyud 'bum): dag ni shel las bya/ / bai DUR+Ya dang btsod mdog ste// tshon rtse lnga zhes bya bar bshad// gal te de ni ma 'byor na// rin po che dang bsres pas bya// tshong dpon yang na ded dpon rung // tshon rtsi dag la rab tu
31b3(rgyud 'bum): bya/ yang na gzhan ni 'ga' zhig yin// tshon rtsi gzhan ni dam par sbyar// thal ba yis kyang dus ji bzhin// 'dir ni slob dpon dag gis bya// rin chen phye mar yang dag ldan// yang na yo byad dang ldan pa//
31b4(rgyud 'bum): gal te sgrub byed de rgyal po// sna tshogs byed pa'i tshad du bya// yang na 'bum dang yang dag ldan// stong las nyung ba'i mi bya'o// spos dang mar me mchod bstod dang // dri yi bum pa nyid dang ni// de bzhin bum gang
31b5(rgyud 'bum): gtor ma dang / / bum pa rnam dang mar me dag/ tshong dpon yang na ded dpon rung // bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o// gzhan 'ga' zhig ni 'od kyang rung // bca' ba dag ni stong phrag bcu// bcu las nyung bar
31b6(rgyud 'bum): mi bya'o/ / bza' ba dag ni brgya'am stong // bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o// g.yos kyi rnam pa kun dang ni// de bzhin dri rnams thams cad kun// rol mo sgeg dang rtsed mo dang // de bzhin phun sum tshogs
31b7(rgyud 'bum): pa kun/ / de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// de che mchod pa byas nas su// ci nas sang ni khyed rnams cag/ grub par bya phyir brtul zhugs brtsam// rang nyid khrus byas yan lag byugs// dag cing gtsang ma'i
32a1(rgyud 'bum): gos gyon cing / / rnam par dben pa'i gnas 'dug ste// sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya// me tog spos snod lag thogs shing // phyogs rnams kun tu phyag bya'o// sangs
32a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas ye shes mchog ldan pa'i/ / sangs rgyas la sogs kun gshegs shing // gsang ba'i spyan ni 'gugs pa yi// rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya// rdo rje'i sngags dang phyag rgya yis// sangs rgyas thams
32a3(rgyud 'bum): cad spyan drang bya/ / de nas gnas ni yang dag sgrub// dben zhing kun tu g.yeng ba med// ri bo 'am ni dgon pa 'am// de bzhin phug gi nang dag gam// shing drung gi ni gnas dag gam// chu bo'i 'gram mam
32a4(rgyud 'bum): yang na ngogs/ / dngos grub gnas su 'dug nas ni// lha rnams myur du gshegs par 'gyur// rdo dang gseg ma rus par ldan// thal ba ldan ljin mi gtsang bcas// rtsub cing rtsa ba'i khyab la sogs//
32a5(rgyud 'bum): de 'dra'i sa gzhi rnam par spang // shin tu bzang zhing 'od bzang snum// tshad dang ldan zhing gseg ma med// 'dom gang yang na khru gang tsam// dkyil 'khor gnas ni sbyang bar bya// grong dang yul 'khor nyid
32a6(rgyud 'bum): dag dang / / grong khyer dag dang ldong dang ni// rgyal po'i pho brang tsheng dus dang // dkyil 'khor chen po bya ba min// de 'dra'i sa gzhi bsgrubs nas ni// steng gi char ni bsgrub par bya// 'dom gang yang na khru gang
32a7(rgyud 'bum): tsam/ / skas gdang bzhi dang ldan pa ru// sbyangs te de nas gnas kyi ni// dbus su phur pa gzugs par bya// rdo rje phur bu'i phyag rgya yis// mchod pa'i sa gzhi mdzes par bya// rig pa 'dzin pa byed pas
32b1(rgyud 'bum): bcag/ bgegs bcing ba yi phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams kun tu bcing bar bya// me dang gshin rje chu dang ni// rlung dang dbang po rdo rje phyogs// rdo rje bzod dka'i phyag rgya dang // rdo rje'i sngags kyis sbyang
32b2(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / mchod gnas dpag tshad tshad tsam du// bcom ldan sa ni yang dag brtsam// gnyis pa 'am ni gsum pa yis// nya la nyes par mi 'gyur ro// ci ste 'byor pa med na ni// zla ba gcig tsam
32b3(rgyud 'bum): rab tu sbyar/ / bco lnga las ni yang dag brtsam// bco lnga la ni rdzogs par bya// ci ste zla ba phyed rtsam du// bco lnga la ni rnam par byang // ci ste rings na tshes brgyad nas// bco lnga la ni rdzogs par bya//
32b4(rgyud 'bum): tshechos dgu dang ni bcu dang ni// bcu gsum pa dang bcu bzhi pa// bdun pa lnga pa nyid nas ni// nya la nyes par mi 'gyur ro// ci ste nyin zhag de brtsams nas// de nyid la ni yongs rdzogs bya// rnal 'byor chen po dag
32b5(rgyud 'bum): bya'i phyir/ / rnal 'byor sa gzhi rab tu sgrub// rang nyid khrus byas yan lag byugs// rnam pa sna tshogs gos bgo zhing // rgyan rnams kun gyis rab tu spras// rdo rje slob dpon rnam par brgyan// gtsang
32b6(rgyud 'bum): zhing gtsang ma'i gos dang ldan/ / gtsang ma'i grogs dang lhan cig tu// sems can kun don yang dag ldan// byang chub sems ni yang dag gzung // bskal pa brgya phrag stong du yang // ci nas mngon par brtson byas
32b7(rgyud 'bum): kyang / / gang zag bzhi po 'jig rten du// bsgrubs kyang 'grub pa nyid mi 'gyur// sems ni bskyed par ma gyur dang // dad med 'grub par mi 'gyur nyid// the tshom 'dzin pa nyid dag dang // bka'
33a1(rgyud 'bum): bsgo ba ni mi byed pa'o/ / dri yi chu yis legs bskus pa'i// de nas dkyil 'khor gnas de ni// dri dang ldan pa'i chu dag gis// phyogs rnams kun tu chag chag btab// ba yi lci bas
33a2(rgyud 'bum): legs sbyangs te/ / dri dang bcas pas legs byugs te// de nas gur kum la sogs pa'i// dri dag gtsang mar sbyar bar bya// rdo rje dkyil 'khor phyag rgya yis// dkyil 'khor yang dag byin gyis
33a3(rgyud 'bum): brlab/ / rdo rje spun gyi phyag rgya yis// pad+ma'i mig can dag gis blta// dkyil 'khor bar dang tha ma ru// sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam// sbyin sreg las ni rnam par sbyar// rig pa'i dngos grub
33a4(rgyud 'bum): che ga la/ / sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam// de bzhin sngags dang phyag rgya tshogs// de 'dra'i sngags dang phyag rgya'ang min// sngon la bgegs rnams gzhom par bya// de nas sbyin sreg yang dag brtsam// /
33a5(rgyud 'bum): de 'og gsang ba'i mchod chen gyi// dkyil 'khor kun tu bri bar bya// sbyin sreg rnam pa lnga ru bshad// yang na bcu drug dag tu 'gyur// rang rang gi ni cho ga bzhin// sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam//
33a6(rgyud 'bum): dgongs pa'i gang zhig sgrub pa'i phyir// gang zhig mchod pa yang dag brtsam// gal te mi nus skal chen gyis// bza' ba dag ni rab tu bya// dri dang bcas pa dang sbyar ba'i// yang na dkar gsum bza'
33a7(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / 'di ltar rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// byin gyis rlob pa mdzad par 'gyur// bgegs rnams nges 'joms nga yi ni// slob dpon gyi ni las bzang po// bgegs rnams zlog par byed pa'i mchog/
33b1(rgyud 'bum): bcing ba dam pa bshad par bya// rtag tu rdo rje khro bo dang // rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag bya zhing // rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yi// bgegs rnams thams cad dgug par bya// rdo rje zhags pa'i phyig
33b2(rgyud 'bum): rgya yis/ / bgegs rnams thams cad drang bar bya// rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad kun tu dgug/ sdig pa med kyis ma 'jigs shig/ sems can rnam par 'tshe ba'ang med//
33b3(rgyud 'bum): rang gi rnam rtog las byung bgegs// ma rig las byung mi dge bzhin// rdo rje lugs sgrog phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bcing bar bya// rdo rje ra ba'i phyag rgya yis// thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin
33b4(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / rdo rje gnod sbyin phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad gzir bar bya// rdo rje lug rgyud phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bkri bar bya// rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams
33b5(rgyud 'bum): cad kun tu dbab/ / rdo rje brdab pa'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad brdab par bya// rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad sbar bar bya// rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs
33b6(rgyud 'bum): rnam sa thams cad gcad par bya/ / rdo rje cod pan phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad brdung bar bya// rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya// rdo rje 'khrul 'khor
33b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya yis/ / bgegs rnams thams cad btsir bar bya// rdo rje kha T+wAM phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad gtub par bya// rdo rje mdung thung phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad dbugs par
34a1(rgyud 'bum): bya/ rdo rje sreg byed phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bsreg par bya// rdo rje 'khor byed phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bskor bar bya// rdo rje srad bu'i phyag
34a2(rgyud 'bum): rgya yis/ / bgegs rnams thams cad bskyod par bya// rdo rje glog byed phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad rnam par brlag/ rdo rje 'joms byed phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad gzhom
34a3(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / rdo rje 'jigs byed phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad 'jig par byed// rdo rje za byed phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bza' bar bya// rdo rje 'cha' byed phyag rgya yis//
34a4(rgyud 'bum): bgegs rnams thams cad bca' bar bya// rdo rje dral ba'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad dral bar bya// rdo rje skyel byed phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bsgyel bar bya//
34a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje slong ba'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bslang bar bya// rdo rje gsad pa'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad gsad par bya// rdo rje 'tsho byed phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnam
34a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'tsho bar bya/ / rdo rje sgrub pa'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad yang dag sgrub// rdo rje rgyas 'debs phyag rgya yis// gdug pa thams cad rgyas gdab bya// rdo rje rlung gi phyag rgya yis//
34a7(rgyud 'bum): bgegs rnams thams cad rlung la bkur// rdo rje chu yi phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad tshu la g.yang // rdo rje ma ni rab rno bas// bgegs rnams thams cad bsreg par bya// rdo rje brgyal byed
34b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya yis/ / bgegs rnams thams cad brgyal bar bya// rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad sbyin sreg bya// rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad gzung
34b2(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad sos gdab bya// rdo rje 'bigs pa'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad dbug par bya// rdo rje 'jig byed phyag rgya yis//
34b3(rgyud 'bum): bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya// rdo rje bka' bzhin byed pa yis// bkug nas bka' la dgod par bya// rdo rje sdigs mdzub phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bsdigs
34b4(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / rdo rje 'gas byed phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad dgas par bya// rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya yis// bgegs kyi rigs kun gzhom par bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin bzod dka' dang // rdo rje
34b5(rgyud 'bum): me ltar 'bar ba dang / / rdo rje 'jigs byed phyag rgya yis// rdo rje rkang pas bsnun par bya// bgegs 'joms pa yis phyag rgya yis// de nas steng gi bgegs gzhom bya// mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i
34b6(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ rdo rje chen po'i gsang rgyud las// rdo rje khro bo'i snyoms 'jug bya// brgya dang rtsa bcu lhag pa dang // rdo rje slob dpon gsang ba ni// rgyas pa ru ni yongs su bstan// bgegs la sogs pa gdug
34b7(rgyud 'bum): pa kun/ / chad pa gcad phyir btus pa yin// dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub bya'i phyir// sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam// rnam pa brgya dang rtsa bcu lhag/ rdo rje slob dpon gsang ba ni// 'di ni gsang
35a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rgyud chen po/ / rgyud de las ni rab tu bshad// gsang ba'i sbyin sreg cho gar bcas// gzhan yang dang por rab bshad bya// rnal 'byor chen po gsang ba'i las// sbyin sreg
35a2(rgyud 'bum): las ni rgyun mi chad/ / las rnams thams cad btus pa yis// gsang ba rgyud chen 'di ru ni// sbyin sreg rnam pa nyi shu yis// thams cad bsdus par 'gyur ba yin// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // mngon
35a3(rgyud 'bum): spyod kyi ni las dang ni/ / tshe spel pa dang dgug pa dang // nor dang 'bru ni 'phel ba dang // srung dang srung ba min dang bgegs// sdig pa thams cad rab gzhom dang // bcing dang gsad dang drag po dang /
35a4(rgyud 'bum): chags dang rjes su bcom pa dang // dbang du bya dang gzugs bzang nyid// 'dod dga'i gzugs su snang ba dang // mkha' la 'gro dang dngos grub kyi// rdzas ni grub par bya ba la// sgrub pa'i dkyil
35a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor byed pa yi/ / rdo rje slob dpon gyis de bya// de lta bu yi rnam pa yi// sbyin sreg bzang po nyi shur bshad// ji ltar sbyin sreg cho ga bzhin// sngon du thab khung bya ba yin// gru bzhi la ni rgyas pa ste//
35a6(rgyud 'bum): zlum po la ni zhi ba'o// gang zhig 'gugs par byed pa yi// rdo rje'i rnam par yang dag bya// de bzhin pad+ma'i rnam pa bzhin// mngon spyod la ni gru gsum ste// sdig pa thams cad rab gzhom phyir// zlum
35a7(rgyud 'bum): po rta babs ldan pa yin/ / rin chen rnam pa rigs rgyas la// tshe 'phel ba dang 'grib pa dang // shin tu dag phyir phyag rgya'i dbyibs// srung la go cha lta bu yin// bcing ba la ni 'obs kyis bskor//
35b1(rgyud 'bum): gsad la mche ba dang ldan pa'i// ci 'dod gzugs la gang yang rung // mi snang ba la gzhu dang ldan// phyogs dang mkha' 'phur la lcags kyu// bka' byed phyag rgya sgrub pa dang // dkyil 'khor chen po
35b2(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa la/ / 'khor lo 'am ni gru bzhi'o// rdzas dang sman ni 'grub pa la// thab khung bud med yan lag mtshungs// yang na thun mong dngos grub kyi// dkyil 'khor yang dag bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor
35b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo bilta ba/ / sbyin sreg thag cang de mtshungs 'gyur// rig 'dzin dngos grub bzang ldan zhing // thams cad phun tshogs de ltar 'gyur// 'khor lo sogs la cung zad mthar// sbyin sreg thag cang
35b4(rgyud 'bum): brko bar bya/ / / thab cang nyi shu'o// dkyil 'khor cho ga thams cad la// thab khung gang zhig mthong tsam gyis// sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur// thag lung bstan pa bshad par bya//
35b5(rgyud 'bum): sngon du thig ni gdab bya zhing // tshon gyi sa phyogs legs par bri// gru bzhir thig brgyad ces bya ba// dbus kyi 'khor lo dbyung bar bya// gru bzhi'i cha ni mnyam pa ste// legs par bgos shing legs bris
35b6(rgyud 'bum): pa rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ / sgo khyud rnams kyis legs par spras// sgo bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan// sgro ni cha brgyad ldan par bya// dra ba zla ba phyed pas spras// rdo rje sgo khyud rdo rjer ldan//
35b7(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i nags kyi lcug ma dang // 'phreng ba rab tu 'khor ba dang // spyi blugs phyag rgya chen po dang // shar gyi phyogs kyi cha ru bri// rtse gsum zla ba phyed pa dang // ral gri khyu mchog mdzes rgyal mtshan//
36a1(rgyud 'bum): @'od bcas bde ba phyag rgya che// lho yi phyogs su bri bar bya// 'khor lo drung dang dbyug to dang // rta babs glang po dang ni phag/ phyag rgya nub tu bri bar bya// mdung thung dril bu ba dan dang //
36a2(rgyud 'bum): rma bya de bzhin ra skyes dang // khyim bya 'thab mo la phyogs pa// byang gi phyogs su bri bar bya// de yi dam tshig 'khor lo la// sangs rgyas phyag rgya yang dag bri// dbus kyi gnas su cod pan te// phyi rol rdo rjes
36a3(rgyud 'bum): nye bar spras/ / rdo rje 'bar ba 'bar ba yi// rdo rje shar gyi phyogs cha ru// lho ru nor bu sna tshogs pa// nub tu pad+ma rdo rje'o// byang du rdo rje hUM mdzad de// gdug pa thams cad 'joms mdzad pa'o// sangs rgyas rdo rje
36a4(rgyud 'bum): thabs chen rnams/ / phyi rol phyag rgya bcu drug tu// thab khung brkos pa gang yin pa// de yi bla re rnam par sgom// me tog shing dang spos sogs kyis// ji bzhin du ni dkyil 'khor mchod// rang nyid khrus chus
36a5(rgyud 'bum): yan lag byugs/ / sna tshogs gos dang rgyan ldan pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis rab tu spras// dri dag bzang po dbang bskur 'gyur// nga ni pad 'dzin rgyal po ste// thor tsugs dbus na de bzhin gshegs//
36a6(rgyud 'bum): yang na rdo rje sems dpa' 'am// rdo rje sems dpa' dbang skur ldan// bud med sdug dang lhan cig tu// dpung pa dam du bsdams byas te// mtshan ma 'greng bar rab gyur nas// sbyin sreg las ni yang
36a7(rgyud 'bum): ngag brtsam/ / e ma'o bde ba bde chen po// 'dod chags bde ba bla na med// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dod chags che// 'jig rten dbang phyug bdag grub mdzod// 'dod chags bde ba rjes dran nas// 'dod
36b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'dod chags brtag mi bya/ / bud med khams ni bkug nas su// 'khrig pa bdun ni spang bar bya// mtshan ma langs par rab gyur nas// dbang po nye bar zhi byas te// 'dod chags rjes dran gyur nas ni//
36b2(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam// mtshan ma phyag mtshan zhes brjod do// langs pa lhag par bya ba yin// rdo rje can gyi phyag mtshan las// mkhas pas lhag par bcang bar bya// rdo rje can dang byang sems
36b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi/ byang chub sems ni brtan pa dang // pha rol phyin pa drug gi mtshan// brtse bas rjes chags dngos grub ster// shes rab thabs la dga' ba bstan// rtag tu bsten par bya ba yin// mtshan ma langs par
36b4(rgyud 'bum): rab gyur nas/ / lhag par yang ni bsten par bya// mngon 'dod rig ma sdug gang yin// de la rnal 'byor pas 'o bya// lhag pas phyag rgya che gyur nas// dpung pa dam du bsdam par bya// rab tu dga' ba mang
36b5(rgyud 'bum): po gang / / de ni rab dga'i sa ru 'dod// gang la chags par rab brtags pa// yang dang yang du dran par bya// brtse dang byams pas yang dag byugs// khrel yod pa yi gos kyis dgab// tshul khrims brtul
36b6(rgyud 'bum): zhugs yang dag byugs/ / byang chub kyi ni sems kyis brgyan// de 'drar brtul zhugs ldan pa yi// tshen rtsi chen po bsten par bya// gzhan yang phyi yi yan lag dag/ gang phyir rdo rje can gyis 'dzin// sbyin
36b7(rgyud 'bum): sreg las kyi cho ga bzhin/ / shar du kha bltas sbyin sreg bya// ji skad gzhung las gsungs pa bzhin// rdo rje slob dpon gyis de bya// zhi la sangs rgyas byang chub mchog/ rgyas la rdo rje rin chen gyis//
37a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i khro bo mngon spyod la// lcags kyu yis ni 'gugs par bshad// bcud kyis len la rdo rje'i sman// tshe 'phel de bzhin mi g.yo ba'i// rdo rje sman gyi rgya chen dang // rdo rje'i rtse mo/
37a2(rgyud 'bum): nor 'phel la// srung la 'khor le cho ga ste// bzlog pa la ni rdo rje gzung // g.yon pa lcags sgrog phyag rgya ches// sdig pa gzhom par bya bar bshad// bcing la rdo rje bcing ba ste// gsod la rdo rje gsod byed
37a3(rgyud 'bum): do/ chags la rdo rje chags pa yis// rjes su bstan pa la yang bshad// dbang la rdo rje dbang gis so// ci 'dod gzugs la sna tshogs te// mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub la// rdo rje'i dngos grub rnam 'phrul
37a4(rgyud 'bum): gyis/ / pad+ma'i sman gyi phyag rgya ches// rdzas grub pa yi bde mchog yin// dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i grub pa la// rdo rje dkyil 'khor phyag rgya yis// rig pa kun bdag rgyal po yis// phyag rgya'i mchog de yongs
37a5(rgyud 'bum): su gzung / / dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa la// pad+ma chen po'i sman mchog gis// lag pa g.yon pas phyag rgya bcing // g.yas pa yis ni sbyin sreg bya// rdo rje sna tshogs phyag rgya yis// sbyin sreg las la
37a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas gdab bya/ / g.yon pa hUM ldan sdigs mdzub ste// g.yas pa mche ba gtsigs pa ste// mngon spyod kyi ni phyag rgya yis// rus pa'i phye mas phyogs rnams kyi// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM// gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa
37a7(rgyud 'bum): ya grah+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn bid+yA rA dza hUM phaT/ g.yon pa chos 'chad dang ldan zhing // g.yas pa yis ni sbyin sreg bya// sangs rgyas chos ni snyoms 'jug pas// til bsregs pas ni sdig
37b1(rgyud 'bum): pa sreg/ oM sarba pA paM da ha na badz+rA ya swAhA/ lag pa g.yon pa rin chen gyur// g.yas pa yis ni sbyin sreg bya// 'bru bdun yang nu rin chen nas// yo byad kun gyis mnyes par bya// oM ma Ni rat+na kra ma kA
37b2(rgyud 'bum): ye swA hA/ / shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas ni// mngar bas me ni rab sbar te// rnal 'byor pas ni 'bras bsregs na// khyim ni nges par rgyas par 'gyur// oM badz+ra puSh+pa ye swA hA// shin tu mngar ba'i
37b3(rgyud 'bum): bud shing gis/ / me ni rab tu sbar byas te// ku sha'i myu gu til bcas pas// sbyin sreg byas na srung don mchog/ oM badz+ra a pra ti ha ta badz+ra swA hA/ yam shing mngar po nyid dang ni// de bzhin dur ba'i myu gu
37b4(rgyud 'bum): dag/ ma skyugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya yis// bsregs na tshe 'phel byed pa'i mchog/ oM badz+ra A yu She swA hA// bud shing tsha ba rnams kyi ni// rdo rje khro bdag ting 'dzin gyis// thab khung du ni me sbyar te// tsher ma
37b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis dgug par bya/ / oM badz+ra A kaR+Sha ya swA hA// de bzhin sna tshogs thams cad kyis// mkhas pa yis ni me sbar te// rtag tu chu skyes sbyin sreg byas// rdo rje 'ching bar 'gyur ba yin// oM badz+ra
37b6(rgyud 'bum): ban d+ha ya baM/ de bzhin sbyor ba'i cho ga yis// mkhas pas yam shing bsreg bya zhing // 'bras bu kha ba'i sbyin sreg byas// skad cig gis ni gsod par 'gyur// oM badz+ra mA ra Na ye hUM/ de bzhin pa la
37b7(rgyud 'bum): sha dmar po/ / bsregs na dbang du byed par 'gyur// oM badz+ra rA ga na ye hrIH/ sha pus pas ni sbyin sreg byas// de bzhin chags par byed pa'i mchog/ oM badz+ra shaM ka rA ya swAhA// khros pas 'dod pa'i
38a1(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bsregs na/ / ci 'dod gzugs ni thob par 'gyur// oM badz+ra kA ma ru pa Ni sAH// oM badz+ra kha ra tsi ri Ni swAhA// bud shing ro ni kha ba yis// shin tu khros pas me sbar te/
38a2(rgyud 'bum): / khros pas rdo rje me tog bsregs// rdo rje bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur// hUM badz+ra shaM ka ra ye swAt+ma// oM b+hU ta ba shaM ka rA ya swAhA// dngos grub kun gyi cho ga bzhin// mkhas pas nyung kar sbyin sreg bya//
38a3(rgyud 'bum): yungs kar shin tu bkra shis pas// dngos grub sbyin sreg mchog yin no// oM sarba sid d+ha ye swAhA// rig pa 'dzin pa grub bya'i phyir// mkhas pas swasti ka bsreg bya// grub pa'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis
38a4(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du/ / oM sid d+ha sid d+ha ye swA hA// oM da la a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA// maN+Da la a d+hi pa ta ye swAhA/ oM b+hu swA hA// oM b+hu ba swAhA/ oM swa swA hA/ oM b+hur b+hu ba swA hA// oM swasti swA hA/
38a5(rgyud 'bum): oM swasti nA ma swA hA/ oM sid d+hi pra b+hU ta ye swA hA/ oM sarba duHkha u pa sha ma ne swA hA/ oM badz+ra sid d+ha ye swA hA/ oM kar+ya ka/ ne pusta shan ti ke swAhA/ yi ge phaT ni mngon spyod la// yi ge dza yis 'gug
38a6(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / yi ge baM ni bcing la sbyar// dbang du bya la yi ge shrI// yi ge hUM ni bsdigs la sbyar// gsad pa la yang yi ge hUM// ha ni srung ba bzang po la// yi ge hUM ni bzlog pa la// shrIs ni sna tshogs
38a7(rgyud 'bum): gzugs bsgrub bya/ / oM ni mi snang bstan pa la// ho ni chags dang dgug pa la// u ni gsang ba'i dag pa 'dzin// mngon spyod ldan la yi ge hUM// hUM ni rdzu 'phrul sgrub byed pa// lha mo chen po sgrub la AH
38b1(rgyud 'bum): oM ni kun la nges par sbyar/ / yam shing ser po rgyas pa la// zhi ba la ni dkar po'o// dbang du bya ba dmar po ste// nag po mngon spyod las la'o// zhi la mar gyis byugs pa ste// rgyas pa la ni 'o mar bcas/
38b2(rgyud 'bum): dbang du bya la lan tshwar ldan// tsha ba dang bcas mngon spyod la// dbye ba rgya chen dag gis ni// sbyin sreg las rnams shes par bya// de nyid sbyin sreg nyi shu 'di// rdo rje 'chang gi gsang ba yin// de kho na nyi shu
38b3(rgyud 'bum): pa zhes bya ba sbyin sreg gi gsang ba'o/ / // de nas dngos grub thabs chen po// thams cad 'grub 'dod dkyil 'khor du// grub pa'i sbyor ba'i cho ga yis// dngos grub tshegs kyi sbyor ldan
38b4(rgyud 'bum): zhing / / rdo rje yi ni slob dpon che// brtan bcas rigs su yang dag skyes// theg pa chen por yang dag gnas// bskal pa grangs med mthar thug par// chos kyi shing rta che la zhon// shes rab thabs dang yang dag
38b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan/ / sems can kun gyi don la brtson// sangs rgyas kun gyis yongs su bzung // slob dpon chen po'i tshul la gnas// mchog tu sa yi mthar phyir pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi rigs su skyes// rdo rje slob dpon
38b6(rgyud 'bum): dka' thub che/ / bgegs rnams thams cad bsal nas ni// dkyil 'khor gnas su yang dag ldan// sbyin sreg cho ga byas nas kyang // chos sbyin chen po yang dag brtsam// dam chos snying po bcud las byung //
38b7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas mchod pa bla med pa// byang chub sems pa'i rnam par 'phrul// shes rab thabs kyi tshul thob byed// rgyal chen shes rab chen po dang // thabs kyis rmad byung chos nyid do// bram ze bzhin du rigs
39a1(rgyud 'bum): mchog skyes/ / byang chub sems dpa'i gsang chen 'dzin// gal te nus na skal chen gyis// gang tshe mchod pa rtsom pa nas// ji srid zin par gyur kyi bar// bza' ba dag ni mi bya'o//
39a2(rgyud 'bum): dri dang bcas pa'i legs sbyar ba'i// yang ni dkar gsum bza' bar bya// gang phyir rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// byin gyis rlob pa mdzad par 'gyur// ci ste bzod ldan nyin mtshan du// bza' ba dag ni mi bya ste// /
39a3(rgyud 'bum): gang phyir chos kyi rang bzhin zas// tshim par 'gyur bar the tshom med// dkyil 'khor dag ni dag byas shing // dri rnams kun gyis mngon 'dus byas// sngags kyis bsangs pa'i chu yis ni// thams
39a4(rgyud 'bum): cad kun nas chag chag gdab/ / gang tshe mchod par byed pa na// phyogs rnams kun nas phyag bya zhing // bshags dang gsol ba gdab nyid dang // mchod pa'i sprin dang rjes yi rang // bdag nyid dbul ba
39a5(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa'i/ / las rnams rim bzhin byas nas ni// dkyil 'khor chen po mnyam dbus su// sems dpa'i skyil krung bca' bar bya// dkyil 'khor thams cad bsdus pa yi// skyil krung rnam pa bcu
39a6(rgyud 'bum): ru bshad/ / gsang chen de nyid mchog 'di ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa'o// dpal dang bkra shis sdigs mdzub byed// de bzhin g.yas kyi phyed krung nyid// phyi rol brkyang dang bzhugs pa'o//
39a7(rgyud 'bum): bde bzhin rin chen rang bzhin te// de dag bcu ru rang bzhin bshad// skyil krung brgya dang bcu lhag pa/ gsang ba'i rgyud kyi gsang ba yi// rgyud de las ni rab tu bshad// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas te//
39b1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas la dmigs sems kyis ni// rgyu dang mi rgyu 'jig rten gsum// byams pa chen po rjes dran nas// dang po sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin mchog/ rnal 'byor las ni snyoms 'jug bya// de nas dkyil
39b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor rgyal po mchog/ de nas yang ni las rgyal po// ting 'dzin lhag pa'i bzang po nas// bcu phrag gcig lhag brgya ru bshad// las thams cad pa gsum du brjod// gsang ba'i rgyud las rab
39b3(rgyud 'bum): tu bshad/ / ting 'dzin sbyor ba med par ni// dkyil 'khor brtan par mi 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor sbyor ba med par ni// dngos grub nyid ni 'byung mi 'gyur// de bas rtag tu 'bad pas ni// ting 'dzin dngos
39b4(rgyud 'bum): grub dkyil 'khor bya/ / gal te mchog tu gsang ba ni// tha med theg pa'i gsang 'dod na// ting 'dzin gsum gyi spyod yul ni// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// de nas byang sems rnam 'phrul du//
39b5(rgyud 'bum): so so'i skye bos mi nus so// de rnams kyi ni ting 'dzin mchog/ sems nyid kyis ni yang dag bya// dang po'i rgyud las bshad pa bzhin// sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam 'phrul bshad// blo ldan byang sems ting
39b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin gyis/ / bdag nyid rdzu 'phrul chen por bsam// dka' thub sna tshogs drag po ni// bdag gis byas par bas par bya// 'og min zhes bya gnas yin pa// lha yi gnas ni bsam par bya// sangs rgyas/
39b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'dus pa yis// dag pa'i 'dus pa rnam par bsam// dang por sangs rgyas phyag byas nas// de nas thub rnams la de bzhin// bka' mnos ji skad bstan pa yi// slar yang skyil krung bca' bar
40a1(rgyud 'bum): bya/ mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga// kun tu dga' byed bsam par bya// mtshan nyid thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i// bdag nyid sangs rgyas sku dang ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang
40a2(rgyud 'bum): bskur ba/ / lnga ni bdag nyid la bsam bya// rdo rje'i gnas su 'dug bya zhing // rtse mo mthon por bsam par bya// dang po sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// / rdo rje shar du 'dug bya zhing /
40a3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas 'khor lo rnam par 'phrul// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang spro// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rnam par sprul// rgyal po dang bcas rigs dkyil 'khor// sgo srungs sgeg mo la sogs
40a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / / lha mo dang bcas phyag rgya yi// sbyor bas rdo rje car dbang bskur// rdo rje'i las su yang dag bya'o// bdag nyid kyis ni mkha' dbyings su// sangs rgyas thams cad mos byas te// sangs rgyas
40a5(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi rang bzhin nyid/ / dbang bskur bar ni yang dag bya// rdo rje chos 'dzin rgyal po ru// dkyil 'khor bkod la brtag par bya// sangs rgyas thams cad dgug bya zhing // rdo rje can rnams mchog gzhug
40a6(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / bsgrub pa dang ni dbang du bya// bya ba 'di ni mchog yin no// rang gi rigs gang dkyil 'khor du// gnas de lhag par mos par bya// 'khor lo ji bzhin bkod ji bzhin// phyag rgya ji bzhin dbang
40a7(rgyud 'bum): byas pa'o/ / las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// // rang nyid khrus byas yan lag blugs// rgyan dang gos ni sna tshogs ldan// dpung rgyan gdu bu nyid dang ni// de bzhin
40b1(rgyud 'bum): sor gdub dbu rgyan bcas/ / gser skud mu tig dang ldan pa'i// lag pa rkang pa de nas ske// lus kun rnam par rgyun 'gyur ba// de bzhin ka shi'i ras lhag pa'i// gos dag bzang po bgos shing gsang
40b2(rgyud 'bum): yang na chos gos 'dzin pa ste/ / sangs rgyas phyag rgya rgyal mtshan bzhin// gal te sgra bregs dge slong de// ring zhing 'khyil la mdog sngo ba'i// sgra ni sngon po bcang bar bya// yang na rang gi mgo la skyes//
40b3(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' 'am// yang na rdo rje las su bya// rnal 'byor rang bzhin gsang med par// dngos grub bzang po thob mi 'gyur// dkyil 'khor dbus su mnyam pa ru// ci rigs par ni
40b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dug nas su/ / shar du kha bltas langs nas ni// khengs pa med cing ma 'khrul bar// rdo rje snyems par yongs su bskor// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni// lan cig tu ni brjod par bya// bstod
40b5(rgyud 'bum): pa byas nas rang bdag nyid/ / dngos grub sbyar ba yang dag bya// snying rje chen po sbyor ba yis// bdag gis drang srong bskul bar bya// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// don yod dbang phyug dam pa ste/
40b6(rgyud 'bum): theg pa che mchog skyes pa'i mchog/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod// sems dpa' chen po thabs chen po// rdo rje 'khor lo mchod pa che// dngos grub chen po rdzu 'phrul che// rdo rje sems
40b7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ / rdo rje ming ni yang dag gzung // phyogs mas kun tu yang dag bskor// dkyil 'khor rdzogs par blta bya zhing // rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rjes dran bya// slar yang skyil mo krung bcas te/
41a1(rgyud 'bum): nga ni rang nyid 'khor los sgyur// phyag rgya'i tshogs ni bcing ba la// stong las nyung bar mi bya'o// tha na rdo rje sems dpa' ni// de nyid phyag rgya yongs su gzung // langs
41a2(rgyud 'bum): nas tshig ni brjod par bya/ / bdag ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste// dkyil 'khor chen po rab sgrub pa// rdo rje la sogs kun gshegs shig/ bdag ni rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje sems dpar bdag
41a3(rgyud 'bum): grub mdzod/ / tshon chen kha bsgyur dri ldan pa'i// srang bu lhag pa grims par bsgril// rdo rje srad bu phyag rgya ches// dkyil 'khor chen po thig gdab bya// 'khor lo ji bzhir bkod ji bzhin// ji bzhin gzhung
41a4(rgyud 'bum): gi rjes 'brangs nas/ / dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ji bzhin bri// rdo rje'i thig ni yongs su gdab// de nas de yi rang rig gsang // 'khor lo chen po rab tu grub// dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lo ni// go rim
41a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du bshad par bya/ / gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes byas pa'i// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dar dang 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// mtshams kyi cha ni thams cad dang //
41a6(rgyud 'bum): sgo yi sgo khyung mtshams su ni// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya// de yi nang gi rim pa ni// 'khor lo lta bur bri bar bya// rdo rje 'phreng bas yongs su bskor// ka ba brgyad kyis
41a7(rgyud 'bum): nye bar mdzes/ / rdo rje ka ba'i mdun gnas pa'i// dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par brgyan// ji ltar phyi dang nang gnas pa'i// dkyil 'khor re re rnam par dbye// dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du/
41b1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor lnga bris gang yin te// ka ba mchog ni brgyad kyis spras// dkyil 'khor bzhi pa yin par bshad// dbus kyi shin tu dbus song nas// chos 'dzin rgyal po chen po ste// rnam par
41b2(rgyud 'bum): sdang mdzad khyab bdag che/ / sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya// sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun tu// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus su ni// dam tshig mchog rnams bzhi po yang // go rims
41b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du yang dag bri/ / rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// mdun rgyab tu ni gnas pa yin// rdo rje lcags kyu g.yas phyogs su// nub kyi phyogs su bdud 'joms pa// rdo rje legs pa rgyal po che//
41b4(rgyud 'bum): chos 'dzin chen po dbang dang ldan// chos 'dzin pa ni byang du ste// mdun du rdo rje bsnyems tshul lo// de la de yi snying po gsang // shin tu rtogs par byed pa'i mchog/ sdug bsngal kun las rab grol
41b5(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / byang chub sems ni rab bskul ba// hUM dzaHhos/ shar phyogs cha yi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus de ru// mi bskyod pa ni dgod par
41b6(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / rdo rje shugs kyi snying po ni// the tshom gcod pa sngon 'gro can// tshogs sngon 'gro ba bzang po ste// sdig pa thams cad rab 'joms byed// oM be gA kra ma ho/ sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che/
41b7(rgyud 'bum): thub pa skyes mchog mi bskyod pa// glang po phyag rgya la gnas shing // zhi ba'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin// de la snying po 'di yin te// hUM/ de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rdo rje mchog rnams dgod pa
42a1(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / rgyan rnams thams cad kyis smras shing // khros bcas bzhin ni 'dzum ldan pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// rdo rje lcags kyu bskrun pa // rdo rje 'dod chags
42a2(rgyud 'bum): bdud chen po/ / rdo rje legs pa rdzu 'phrul che// rdo rje rin chen dgod par bya// rdo rje chags pa gang bshad pa// rdo rje chos ni dgod par bya// rdo rje legs par gang bshad pa// rdo rje las ni yongs su gzung //
42a3(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig rnam pa bzhi po ni// 'khor los sgyur ba dgod par bya// thams cad sangs rgyas cod pan ldan// 'khor los sgyur bar dbang bskur ba// rdo rje rin chen de bzhin las// pad+ma sna tshogs dga' chen po// bcom
42a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ / byang chub mchog de yang dag gzung // yan lag 'gyur ba lhag ma rnams// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs dgod// de nas sangs rgyas rigs bzhag ste// rdo rje'i rigs kyi
42a5(rgyud 'bum): snying po la/ / phyag rgya dang ni snying po bshad// rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su gzung // hUM dza ho swa/ yi ge dza sogs bshad pa la// yi ge oM ni yang dag dgod// he d+hi chos dbyings yi ge a// yi ge sa ni
42a6(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bsgyur/ / rdo rje shugs kyis lhor song nas// rin chen 'byung ldan dkyil 'khor lo// bcom ldan mchog ni yongs su 'dzin// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rdo rje rin chen la sogs bri// rin
42a7(rgyud 'bum): chen gzi brjid rgyal mtshan dang / / rin chen so yi rgyan bcas pa// de la de rnams kyi snying po ni/ oM a tra ha/ nub kyi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas su// de yi dbus su rdo
42b1(rgyud 'bum): rjes chos/ / 'od dpag med ni dgod par bya'o// de'i snying po ni hrIH/ de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rdo rje pad+ma la sogs bri// pad+ma rnon po de bzhin rgyu// smra ba pad+ma phyag rgya bcas// de la 'di rnams kyi
42b2(rgyud 'bum): snying po ni/ hI d+hi maM raM/ rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// byang gi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// bcom ldan 'das ni don yod grub// sangs rgyas nyid ni dgod par bya// de'i snying po ni kaM/ de yi phyogs
42b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams thams cad du/ / rdo rje la sogs pa bri// thams cad srung ba gnod sbyin che// las dang khu tshur shin tu brtan// de la 'di rnams kyi snying po ni// kaM haM hUM baM/ dbus kyi 'khor lo'i grwa bzhi ru//
42b4(rgyud 'bum): lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri// rdo rje rin chen de bzhin las// pad+ma lha mo bzhi ru bshad// de la de rnams kyi snying po ni// oM a hI aM// thams cad kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor chen po las// cha dang po'i/
42b5(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor dbus ma rdzogs so// / dkyil 'khor dbus ma rdzogs nas ni// phyag rgya thams cad yongs su bri// phyag rgya de ni byin rlabs pa// rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su bzung //
42b6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub mchog tu dbus nas mchog/ shis pa shar gyi phyag rgya ste// lho yi phyogs su mchog sbyin no// nub tu chos kyi 'khor lo 'dzin// byang du mi 'jigs sbyin zhes bya// don yod grub pas yod
42b7(rgyud 'bum): su gzung / / phyag rgya lhag ma phyag mtshan bcas// de nas rdo rje sems tshogs bri// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po las// rdo rje 'khor lo chen po'i dbus kyi cha zhes
43a1(rgyud 'bum): bya ba rdzogs so/ / / rdo rje shugs kyis song nas su// shar phyogs kyi ni dkyil 'khor la// rdo rje rigs chen nyams dga' ba'i// dkyil 'khor ldan
43a2(rgyud 'bum): yang dag bri/ / ka ba brgyad ni rdo rje che// dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par brgyan// dkyil 'khor bzhi dang ldan pa yi// rdo rje'i 'khor lo yongs su dgod// de yi shAr gyi dbus su ni//
43a3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas gzugs can yang dag bri// ut+pal sngon po 'od chen ldan// khro bcas bzhin ni 'dzum ldan pa'i// drag po 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas khyab// rdo rje ti rin ti ri 'dzin// khro bo rdo rje'i
43a4(rgyud 'bum): lta ba 'dzin/ / gtum pa thams cad rab 'dul byed// sangs rgyas mdun du rdo rje 'dzin// 'bar ba'i dbus su dgod par bya// de bzhin 'bar dbus pad+ma dang // de bzhin rin chen sna tshogs
43a5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan/ / de nyid shar gyi 'khor lo che// shar gyi cha ru song nas ni// de yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje hUM mdzad yang dag bri// zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa// phyag rgya brgyad ni yongs
43a6(rgyud 'bum): su 'dzin/ / mche ba dag ni cung zad gtsigs// khro bcas bzhin ni 'dzum ldan pa'i// lcags kyu rdo rje lcags sgrog dang // zhags pa phyag rgya bzhi ru bshad// mnga' dang gzhu ni gnyis su
43a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin/ / gnyis ni yi ge hUM gis bsdus// des ni rkang pa g.yon pa yis// dbang phyug chen po mnan par bya// g.yas pas lha mo u ma yi// nu ma'i bar du mnan pa ste// g.yon brkyang
43b1(rgyud 'bum): ba yis legs par gnas/ / 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas khyab 'od ldan// sku mdog sngon po drag po ste// sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs byed pa// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rdo rje
43b2(rgyud 'bum): khro bo dgod par bya/ / thams cad khro bo'i 'bar bas khyab// mche ba dag ni cung zad gtsigs// khro bo sems dpa' khro rdo rje// de bzhin khro bo chags pa ste// khro bo legs pa drag po ste/
43b3(rgyud 'bum): dbus kyi dkyil 'khor bskor bar bya// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// khro bo'i rgyal po g.yas phyogs su// khro bo'i bdag nyid chen pos bskor// dbus su khro bo khro gnyer can// de yi phyogs
43b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams thams cad du/ / rdo rje khro bo'i dbang skur ldan// thams cad bri zhing yang dag dgod// khro gnyer can gyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rin chen khro ba
43b5(rgyud 'bum): dgod par bya/ / khro gnyer nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang // khro bo bzhad pa shin tu byung // dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum pa ru// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// khro bo'i bdag nyid chen por bskor//
43b6(rgyud 'bum): rdorje'i sde ni yang dag bri// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// pad+ma'i khro bo dgod par bya// chos dang rnon po de bzhin rgyu// bzhad pa khro bo rdzu 'phrul che// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni//
43b7(rgyud 'bum): las kyi rigs mchog chen po la// las kyi rgyal po bdag nyid che// rdo rje dbab pa yang dag bri// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// las kyi khro bo la sogs bri// las kyi gnod sbyin srin
44a1(rgyud 'bum): po dang / / bsdu ba'i rdzu 'phrul wa nur che// dkyil 'khor lta pro kA swA tA thA// de rdo rdo rje rigs su bshad// dkyil 'khor chen po che zhes bya// gsang ba de nyid tshogs
44a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi bdag/ de nas kun gyi snying po ni// rdo rje rigs kun nyams dga' ba'i// yi ge hU~M ni 'dir brjod do// drag po ha ha zhes sgrog hUM// hUM hUM zhes sgrog 'jigs par byed// de yi dkyil
44a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor rgyal po ni/ / rdo rje'i gsang ba legs 'dus bya// 'khor lo dkyil 'khor za rnams su// lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri// khro bo'i sems ma rin chen dang // pad+ma dang ni las zhes bya/
44a4(rgyud 'bum): kun nas mtshams rnams dag tu ni// phyag rgya dam bcas de dag gzung // dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po las cha gnyis pa rdzogs so// // shar phyogs kyi cha'i
44a5(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor yang rdzogs so/ / / dbus kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yi// ka ba'i phyi rol dkyil 'khor du// sgeg mo 'phreng ba de bzhin glu// gar ma lha mo phyag rgya bcas/
44a6(rgyud 'bum): shar gyi rdo rje rigs nyid la// phyi rol gnas su de bzhin nyid// nyi ma la bskyed bzhi po ni// rdo rje lha mos yongs su gzung // rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor sbyor 'byung ba// yi ge hUM ni kun tu dgod//
44a7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin sangs rgyas rigs rgyal po// yi ge hUM ni 'dir brjod do// phyag rgya rang gi yan lag 'gyur// rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su gzung // phyag rgya thams cad rab sbyor bas// de dag gsang
44b1(rgyud 'bum): zhing mchog gsang bshad/ / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las// rdo rje rigs chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
44b2(rgyud 'bum): / lho yi rin chen dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // de ru phun tshegs dkyil 'khor gyi// 'khor lo lnga po dgod par bya// de yi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la/
44b3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya// rin chen chen po rta la bcibs// sangs rgyas nyi ma de bzhin gshegs// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas khyab pa'i sku// 'od zer 'phreng bas kun tu khyag
44b4(rgyud 'bum): rin chen 'phreng ba mchog 'dzin pa'i/ / rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa// so yi 'phreng ba rab bzhad cing // so yi 'phreng ba'i phyag rgyar ldan// mthe bo'i rtse mo rgyal mtshan 'dzin//
44b5(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma'i dbus na sangs rgyas che// zla ba lta bu'i bdud rtsi'i sku// rdo rje rin chen skal ba che// rdo rje nyi ma'i rigs mchog go// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rin chen sems dpa'
44b6(rgyud 'bum): yang dag ldan/ / rin chen sems dpa' pad+ma dang // de bzhin rdo rje las nyid do// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis smras pa// 'khor los sgyur bas rnam par brgyan// rin chen chen po rigs las
44b7(rgyud 'bum): 'byung / nong bu'i rdo rje nyi ma 'dzin// de nas snying po ni tA// lho yi shar gyi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// de yi dbus su sems dpa' che// nor bu'i 'od can yang
45a1(rgyud 'bum): bri/ rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa// sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang bskur ldan// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rin chen de bzhin yang dag bri// rin chen sems
45a2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' de bzhin chags/ / rgyal po legs pa rdzu 'phrul che// rdo rje rin chen sogs phyag rgya// rang gi phyag rgya phyag mtshan phrag/ rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // lho yi gnas kyi steng 'dug
45a3(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / rin chen rigs chen bzang po la// rdo rje rin chen bzang po bri// rin chen bzhi yi dbang bskur ldan// sangs rgyas spyi bo 'dzin pa'i mchog/ rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa/
45a4(rgyud 'bum): rin chen 'phreng ba'i dbang bskur ldan// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// sems dpa' bzhi ni yang dag bri// rin chen rgyal po rgyal mtshan dang // bzhad dang rin chen rgyal po che// rdo rje shug+sa
45a5(rgyud 'bum): kyis song nas kyang / / nub kyi rdo rje dkyil 'khor la// pad+ma rin chen bdag nyid che// rin chen 'phreng bas dbang bskur 'di// rin chen pad+ma'i mchog 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas dbu rgyan sems dpa'
45a6(rgyud 'bum): che/ rin chen zhi ba yongs su 'dzin// zur mig 'dod chags chags pa'i spyan// skyes bu 'dul ba la gzigs pa// pad+ma 'dzin pa'i rgyal po che// 'jig rten dbang phyug tshe dpag
45a7(rgyud 'bum): med/ / de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rin chen pad+ma yang dag bri// rin tshon pad+ma de bzhin no// de bzhin rgyu dang smra ba 'dzin// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // byang gi phyogs kyi dkyil
45b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor la/ / rin chen las chen rgyal po ni// bdag nyid chen pos yang dag bri// bcom ldan thub pa'i dbang po don yod grub// las kun 'dzin pas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa'i// rdo rje las
45b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po mdzod 'dzin pa/ / 'khor los sgyur ba'i gtso bo mchog dam pa// sangs rgyas dbu rgyan las rnams bzhi dang ldan// rgyan rnams kun gyis yan lag legs par brgyan// sa
45b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi rin chen dam pas rgyas gdab cing / / rin chen dkyil 'khor tshogs chen mchog gyur pa'i// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// las kyi rin chen yang dag bri// las kyi srin po
45b4(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin dang / / de yi bsdu ba'i khu tshur 'dzin// de nas kun gyi snying po ni// traM/ rin chen rigs chen rnal 'byor pa// yi ge tAM ni brjod par bya// ci rigs par ni rang nyid kyi//
45b5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya phyag mtshan yang dag bri// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po las rkang pa gsum pa rdzogs so// / lho phyogs kyi cha'i dkyil 'khor la
45b6(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs so/ / / de nyid kyi ni grwa bzhi ru// lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri// phyi yi dkyil 'khor mdun gnas su// lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri// sems ma'i rin chen de bzhin
45b7(rgyud 'bum): chos/ / lA ma 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du// sgeg mo 'phreng ba de bzhin zla// gar ma rnam par sreg ma yi// nor bu rigs chen bzang po ni// rin chen phyag rgyas kun khyab la// phyag mcho
46a1(rgyud 'bum): rang gi phyag rgyas mtshon/ / 'od zer 'phreng bas khyab 'od ldan// rin chen rdo rjes dngadu bskur ba// rang rung phyug rgya yongs su badzin// rin chen mtshon cha sna tshogs
46a2(rgyud 'bum): thogs/ / rin chen las byung rin chen ldan// rin chen rang bzhin khang par gnas// spos dang rin chen me tog bcas// rin chen mchog chen la gnas shing // lus la rin chen gos gyon
46a3(rgyud 'bum): pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las/ nor bu'i rigs chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
46a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // nub kyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor la// pad+ma'i rigs chen bzang po ni// dga' ba chen pos yang dag bri// de yi nub kyi dkyil 'khor la// dkyil
46a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lnga ni yang dag bri/ / dbus kyi lte ba'i 'khor lo la// sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya// pad+ma bzang po 'dab ma brgyad// 'dab ma brgyad pa yid 'ong ba// chos
46a6(rgyud 'bum): dbyings brtan pa'i rnal 'byor can/ / pad+ma'i 'phreng bas rnam par mdzes// de yi dbus su rgyal po che// sna tshogs gzugs can rang bzhin mchog/ sangs rgyas shes rab thabs ldan pa//
46a7(rgyud 'bum): chechos kyi 'khor lo yongs su 'dzin// pad+ma gcig pu de gnas shing // de yi dkyil 'khor la brten pa// pad+ma'i sems dpa' bzhi po bri// 'khor los sgyur ba 'jigs pa med// rgyan rnams
46b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis spras pa/ / sangs rgyas pad+ma dbang bskur ldan// rdo rje pad+ma la sogs bri// pad+ma'i sems dpa' 'jigs pa med// kun kyang sangs rgyas cod pan ldan// chos kyi 'phreng bas
46b2(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur bas/ / pad+ma'i phyag mtshan mtshon cha bsnams// sangs rgyas 'phrul pas rnam par rol// pad+ma'i sems dang de bzhin rgyal// rin chen chos ni tshul chen po// dam tshig mchog
46b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams bzhi po ni/ / rim pa bzhin du yang dag bri// nub kyi shar gyi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje'i shugs kyis song nas kyang // de yi dbus su rgyal po che// sna tshogs 'khor lo dgod par
46b4(rgyud 'bum): byachos kyi snying po rab tu gnas/ / pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la brten// pad+ma'i ge sar dbus su ni// sna tshogs gzugs can dgod par bya// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa// gzugs
46b5(rgyud 'bum): bzang ldan pa'i sku mnga' ba/ / sangs rgyas lnga yi dbang bskur ldan// spyan gsum phyag ni brgyad po ste// thor tsugs tshangs pa dpral bar dbang // me tog mtshon cha smin mtshams su/
46b6(rgyud 'bum): mig la nyi ma zla ba dgod// tha skar gzhon nu rna ba la// khyab 'jug sna yi rtse mo ste// mche ba nag po gsus po che// lce la dbyangs can ma yin te// gsung dbyangs la ni dbyangs chen ma//
46b7(rgyud 'bum): ku mu da dang par 'phreng can// kha dang 'gram pa dag la gnas// spyan la shes rab pha rol phyin// gdong gi phyed ni sprul par byed// phrag par g.yas par seng ge ste// g.yon pa phag ni yang dag
47a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / sna yi bu gu gnyis pa ni// rgya mamonye bar gdung ba dag/ dga' bo nye dga' dpung pa la// lto ba la ni rgya mtsho gnas// brla gnyis pa la dpung chen gnas/
47a2(rgyud 'bum): tshogs kyi dbang phyug dpung pa la// lha chen dbang phyug chen po ni// mtshan ma'i steng gi sgon gnas// dpal be'u snying kha la gnas te// lhag pa lha mo chen mo dpal// 'og gi kha yi sgo ru ni/
47a3(rgyud 'bum): gshin rje'i rgyal po rnam par brten// rdzong dang 'jigs byed lha mo che// pus mo la ni yang dag gnas// rkang pa'i sor mo bcu la ni// ma mo bcu ni kun tu gnas// drag po rje ngar gnas pa nyid//
47a4(rgyud 'bum): chu yi lha mo rgyab na gnas// dbying dang sos ka dbyar dang ni// ston dang dgun dang dgun spad lha// g.yas pa dang ni g.yon pa yi// rkang pa dag la yang dag gnas// 'og gi 'khor lo rtsibs stong
47a5(rgyud 'bum): la/ drag po'i phung po 'chang ba dang // sgra gcan thag zangs ris sdang byed// lha ma yin rnams kun tu gnas// lag pa bcu yi thal mo la// pha rol phyin pa bcu dag gnas// mngon par 'dod
47a6(rgyud 'bum): pa nyid dag gi/ lha chen la sogs 'di dag bri// zhal bzhi phyag ni brgyad pa ste// zhal re zhing ni spyan gsum pa'i// gos dang gzugs ni bzang por ldan// de 'dra'i rang bzhin thub pa dgod//
47a7(rgyud 'bum): de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// pad+ma'i sems dpa' yang dag bri// pad+ma'i sems dpa' lcags kyu dang // mda' dang pad+ma legs par sbyin// nub kyi lha mo'i phyogs mchog tu// pad+ma'i shug+sa
47b1(rgyud 'bum): kyis song nas kyang / / de yi dbus su sems dpa' che// rin chen pad+ma yang dag bri// zhal ni bcu gnyis ldan pa nyid// phyag bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i mchog/ rin chen pad+mar yang dag bzhugs//
47b2(rgyud 'bum): rin chen las ni 'byung bar 'dod// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// pad+ma'i rin chen drag sogs bri// khro gnyer nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang // de bzhin zhal ni bcu gcig pa// nub kyi phyogs
47b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi dkyil 'khor du/ / rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // de yi dbus su sems dpa' che// 'od dpag med ni dgod par bya// pad+ma chen po rab ster ba// pad+ma gar gi dbang phyug gtso// spyan
47b4(rgyud 'bum): dang phyag ni stong par ldan/ / phyag rgya mtshon cha thams cad bcang // zhal bcu gnyis pa bzang po ste// pad+ma'i lha mo yang dag ldan// pha rol phyin pa bcu dang ldan// tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par
47b5(rgyud 'bum): rol/ / de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// pad+ma'i sems dpa' yang dag bri// sgrol ma'i gzhon nu'i mthu can dang // mgrin sngon tshangs pa'i mdog las byung // nub kyi byang gi cha ru ni//
47b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // de yi dbus su sems dpa' che// pad+ma la sogs dgod par bya// zhal drug phyag ni bcu gnyis pa'i// phyag rgya mtshon cha 'dzin pa'i mchog/ chen po sna tshogs
47b7(rgyud 'bum): rab ster ba/ / pad+ma las ni yang dag bri// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug rgyal// dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun gnas pa// pad+ma'i srin po gnod sbyin dang // pad+ma'i
48a1(rgyud 'bum): khu tshur yang dag bri/ / g.yas dang g.yon dang rgyab dang ni// mdun nyid kyi ni dkyil 'khor lo// de nas snying po niH/ sangs rgyas kyi snying po de we/ thams ca cing
48a2(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las rkang pa bzhi pa rdzogs so// / pad+ma'i rigs kyi
48a3(rgyud 'bum): tshogs dag gi/ dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs nas ni// de yi 'khor lo'i grwa bzhi ru// lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri// pad+ma'i sems dpa'i rin chen dang // las dang chos ma yang dag bri/
48a4(rgyud 'bum): sgeg mo 'phreng ba de bzhin glu// gar ma 'di ni yang dag bri// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po las/ pad+ma'i rigs chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
48a5(rgyud 'bum): / byang gi las kyi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // de yi dkyil 'khor rgyal po ni// 'khor lo lnga lnga dgod par bya// de yi dbus su las chen po// sangs
48a6(rgyud 'bum): gzugs ni dgod par bya/ / chos 'dzin pa yi rgyal po che// nam mkha' lding gi gdan la bzhugs// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// las kyi phyag rgya yang dag bri// las kyi sems dang
48a7(rgyud 'bum): rin chen dang / / de bzhin las dang chos nyid do// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// byang gyi shar gyi dkyil 'khor la// mi bskyod pa ni sangs rgyas che// rdo rje las ni dgod par bya// de yi
48b1(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa mtshon cha bcas/ / de yi phyag rgya bcas pa bzung // las chen 'dzin pa bzang po ste// sangs rgyas mdzad pa yang dag ldan// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// las kyi sems
48b2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' yang dag bri/ / sems dpa' chags pa'i rgyal po che// leg pa de bzhin las nyid do// rdo rje shugs kyi song nas kyang // byang gi lho yi cha ru ni// rin chen ting 'dzin rgyal po che//
48b3(rgyud 'bum): rin chen las ni yang dag bri// rin chen char ni rab 'bebs shing // sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu 'joms// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rin chen las ni yang dag bri// sems
48b4(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i gzi brjid rgyal mtshan dang / / las dang bzhad pa rnam skyong pa// las kyi rin chen bzang po la// rin chen dkyil 'khor yang dag ldan// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // byang gi
48b5(rgyud 'bum): nub kyi cha ru ni/ / pad+ma'i las kyi sems dpa' che// dkyil 'khor dbus su yang dag bri// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// pad+ma'i lam ni yang dag bri// pad+ma rnon po de bzhin rgyu// de
48b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin smra ba las yin no/ / rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // byang gi byung phyogs dkyil 'khor la// las chen 'dzin pa dbang ldan pa// las kyis rgyal po yang dag bri// de mi phyogs
48b7(rgyud 'bum): rnams thams cad du/ / las kyi sems dpa' dgod par bya// las kyi srin po gnod sbyin dang // de bzhin bsdu ba'i khu tshur nyid// de nas snying po ni a/ sangs rgyas kyi snying po ni a ste/
49a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi snying po yin no// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba zhes b+hA ba las rkang pa lnga pa rdzogs so//
49a2(rgyud 'bum): byang gi cha'i dkyil 'khor yang rdzogaso// / byang du ji ltar rigs byas te// las kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs nas ni// de yi 'khor lo'i grwa bzhi ru/
49a3(rgyud 'bum): lha mo bzhi ni dgod par bya// sngar gyi dam tshig bzhi po ni// thams cad sum cu rtsa gsum yin// dbus ma zhes bya sum cu gsum// shar gyi phyogs na sum cu gsum// de bzhin nub
49a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi phyogs cha'o/ / byang dang lho yang de bzhin no// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba las/ las kyi rigs zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
49a5(rgyud 'bum): / dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo thams cad kyang rdzogs so// / brgya drug cu rtsa lnga'o// de nas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo mchog/ thar pa'i
49a6(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin grong khyer che/ / 'khor lo chen po'i grwa bzhi ru// dkyil 'khor bzhi ni bri bar bya// 'khor lo sbyor chen shar lho ru// zla ba'i gzugs su bkod par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'a
49a7(rgyud 'bum): dbus su ni/ / rdo rje sems dpa' dgod par bya// 'dzum zhing zla ba'i mdog can te// 'od zer dmar po sna tshogs 'bar// sems dpa'i skyil krung yang dag bzhugs// rdo rje bsnyems tshul
49b1(rgyud 'bum): 'chang ba'i mchog/ phyag g.yas pa na rdo rje bsnams// de bzhin g.yon na dril bu bsnams// mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems dpa' che// sems can kun gyi don sems dpa'// de yi pad+ma
49b2(rgyud 'bum): yang dag gnas/ / de 'od dkyil 'khor la brten pa// lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri// gsang ba lnga ni yang dag bstan// dang po dang ni gnyis pa ni// g.yas kyi phyogs na yang dag gnas//
49b3(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa dang ni bzhi pa ni// g.yon logs na ni rab tu gnas// lha mo rdo rje caco sgrog/ dbus khyed rang gi lha mo de// de yi glo na mgo bsgyur zhing // 'dzum bcus kun tu lta bste// bcom ldan
49b4(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyi phyag la 'jus/ / chu srid gyi ni rgyal mtshan bsgreng // de yi glon pand bcas shing // dege gleng skye dgu'i bdag mo yi// rdorje tsa tsoN+Di lkog dang // de bzhin rdo rje na yang dga'// nA u0f7f '
49b5(rgyud 'bum): dod dbang phyug/ gzi brjid dga' ba'i rdo rje ma// lci da ngabanub kyi mtshams su ni// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // de yi dkyil 'khor dbus su mi// dad+ma chen po dgod par bya// pad+ma'i
49b6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dngas sa ni/ / ban+d+ha'i sems dpa' dgod par bya// zhal bani phyag ni brgya pa ste// 'phe la'i dkyil 'khor 'ong bcas pa// de yi bad+mar yang dag gnas// de 'od dkyil la mal na /
49b7(rgyud 'bum): mas can la mazung ba// mo ban ni yang dag gi// kun nas gsang ba'i lha mo mo// de nas ming ni rab bshad bya// rdo rje dpal dang rdo ji dkar// rdo nga tsun ma rdo can// rdo rje shug
50a1(rgyud 'bum): song nas kyang / / rlub byung mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du// nAm mkha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// rdo rje nyi ma yang dag ldan// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dkyus su ni// rin
50a2(rgyud 'bum): chen sems dgod par bya/ / sngon dmar gyi ni 'od kyi khyab// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i// de yi pad+ma yang dag gnas// de 'od dkyil 'khor la brten pa// rin chen rigs chen las byung
50a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i/ / lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri// nam mkha' las byung mkha' rdo rje// nam mkha'i mdog can skye dgu'i bdag/ rin chen dpal ldan lha mo che// rin chen dang bcas rigs mdzes ma//
50a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // byang shar mtshams kyi 'khor lo la// de bzhin ut+pal sngon po'i mdog/ dkyil 'khor yang dag bri bar bya// ut+pal sngon po de dbus su// las rnams 'dzin
50a5(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po'i mchog/ sangs rgyas kun la sogs bshad pa// rdo rje'i las ni dgod par bya// de yi pad+mar yang dag gnas// de 'od dkyil 'khor la brten cing // las kyi rigs can las
50a6(rgyud 'bum): byung ba'i/ / lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri// las kyi rdo rje rin chen ma// las ma chos ma dpal ldan che// ji ltar sngon du rdo rje'i rigs// de bzhin dkyil 'khor thams cad la// de nyid pho nya mo ru gnas
50a7(rgyud 'bum): de nyid lha mor yang dag gnas/ / de nyid sgeg mo rnam sgeg sogs// phyag rgya'i rgya mtsho gzhan yang byed// ser mo dmar mo nyi ma mtshungs// ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab 'drar 'gyur// bsnyems bcas
50b1(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba'i dbang bskur ldan/ / rang gi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin// de nas snying po ni// hUM trAM oM A/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba zhes
50b2(rgyud 'bum): ba las rkang pa drug pa rdzogs so/ / // mtshams rnams kyi dkyil 'khor yang rdzogs so// // brgya dang brgyad cu rtsa lngar ldan// 'khor lo yongs
50b3(rgyud 'bum): su rdzogs nas kyang / / de yi mtshams kyi logs rnams su// lha bzhi dag ni yang dag bri// shar du rdo rje chen po ste// rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'o// rdo rje rigs chen mtshan ma ste// 'bar ba'i
50b4(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba rab 'jigs pa'i/ / lho ru rin chen phun tshegs pa// chu lha rin chen chu srin rnams// rin chen rigs chen mtshan ma ste// sangs rgyas chos kyi 'byung gnas brjod// nub tu sa lha
50b5(rgyud 'bum): bridri bar bya/ / rtsal ldan skyes bu zhes bya yi// dkyil 'khor chen po 'dzin byed cing // pad+ma'i rigs kyi mtshan ma'ang yin// byang du rlung gi skyes bu ni// rlung gyi shugs kyis gos 'chang zhing /
50b6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin las kyi rig 'dzin ma// g.yo zhing rtsal ldan bri bar bya// brgya dang brgyad cu rtsa dgu ru// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag sgrub// chos kyi tshul gyi gru chen po// thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer che//
50b7(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po las/ 'khor lo chen po'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so// / thun mong mchog tu gsang ba yi//
51a1(rgyud 'bum): / rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa'i mchog/ rang rigs 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ni// phyogs gcig tu ni bshad par bya// dkyil 'khor kun gyi dbus su ni// thub pa'i dbang phyug
51a2(rgyud 'bum): rnam snang mdzad/ / seng ge pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// de ni byang chub mchog 'dzin pa// mi bskyod pa ni glang chen bcibs// rin chen dbang ni rta la brtsibs// bcom ldan tshe dpag med pa ni//
51a3(rgyud 'bum): rma bya'i khri la yang dag bzhugs// don yod grub pa bla na med// mkha' lding dbang po yang dag bzhugs// 'di rnams kyi ni bzhon par bshad// rigs mchog kun gyi dbye ba'o// mi bskyod
51a4(rgyud 'bum): pa yi sa gnon te/ / de bzhin rin chen dbang mchog sbyin// tshe dpag med kyi ting 'dzin sbyin// don yod grub pa'i mi 'jigs sbyin// sngon po ser po de bzhin dmar// kha dog ljang khu las
51a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yid 'ong // sku mdog dkar po rab tu bsgrag so// de bzhin rdo rje rin chen la// rdo rje 'phreng bas rdo rje mtshan// rdo rje dkyil 'khor sbyor byung ba// rdo rje
51a6(rgyud 'bum): ri mo yang dag bri/ / pad+ma'i rigs chen bzang po la// pad+ma'i 'phreng bas pad+ma mtshan// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor sbyor byung ba// pad+ma'i srad bus thig gdab bya// rin chen rigs can bzang po
51a7(rgyud 'bum): la/ / rin chen 'phreng bas rin chen mtshan// rin chen dkyil 'khor sbyor byung ba// rin chen ri mo rnam par mdzes// las kyi rigs ni sna tshogs bshad// de bzhin sangs rgyas rigs mchog la//
51b1(rgyud 'bum): 'or kyang rdo rje khyad par gyis// rdo rje dkyil 'khor sbyor byung ba'i// rdo rje shar gyi phyogs cha ru// lho ru rin chen dkyil 'khor te// nub tu pad+ma yang dag bshad// byang du las ni yang dag sbyor// rdo rje can
51b2(rgyud 'bum): kun khro gnyer can/ / rin chen tshogs ni rab bshad pa// pad+ma chen po dul zhing zhi// drag po zhi ba las 'dzin pa// dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lo ru// 'khor lo chen po yang dag bri// de nas
51b3(rgyud 'bum): phyi rol 'khor lo sogs/ / cho ga 'di kun de dang 'dra// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po gsang ba chen po mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil khor chen po las/ gsang ba zhes bya ba rkang pa
51b4(rgyud 'bum): bdun pa rdzogs so/ / / las kyi rnal 'byor las byung ba rdzogs so// / nang gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs nas ni// tshon rtsi lngas ni dgang bar bya'o//
51b5(rgyud 'bum): thig dang ri mo thams cad ni// tshon rtsi kun gyis rab tu dag // dang po nas ni tha ma ru// phyi rol dkyil 'khor kun tu bri// mnyam zhing kun tu cha mnyam pas// gru bzhi ru ni rab tu
51b6(rgyud 'bum): brtag/ zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rtag babs bzhis ni mdzes byas pa// ka ba brgyad dang yang dag ldan// yid du 'ong zhing legs par phye// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dar dang
51b7(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ / rdo rje rin chen srang bu yis// phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya// kha khyer gyis ni yongs su bskor// rdo rje kha khyer mdzes byas la// zla ba phreng pa'i lcags
52a1(rgyud 'bum): mas khyab/ / rdo rje 'phreng ba'i tshogs dang ldan// dra ba dra ba phyed pas spras// zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes// g.yer ka'i dra ba yang dag ldan// kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa
52a2(rgyud 'bum): brgyan/ / de dang dbus kyi bar thig la// byang chub sems rnams yang dag bri// bskal pa bzang po stong dag gis// 'das pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams// shar du thams cad rdo rje mtshan/
52a3(rgyud 'bum): lho ru rin chen phyag mtshan rnams// nub tu pad+ma rdo rje sogs// byang du las kyi rdo rje bsnams// rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha gang dag/ phyi rol thig la yang dag bri// drag po la sogs lha chen rnams//
52a4(rgyud 'bum): snam bu las ni lus phyed phyung // dbang phyug chen po tshangs pa che// khyab 'jug g.yung drung gzhon nu ni// rigs bcas dpung dang bcas rgyal po// shar gyi dkyil 'khor yang dag bri// 'khyil
52a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i 'od can gtum po dang / / ser skya rdo rje ser skya rnams// rigs bcas 'khor lo yang dag ldan// lho yi phyogs su yang dag bri// myos pa 'phreng ldan rgyal nyid pa// rnam par rgyal dang
52a6(rgyud 'bum): skyel byed rnams/ / rigs bcas dpung dang yang dag ldan// nub kyi cha ru yang dag bri// ko shi gos can me dang rlung // rdo rje 'jigs byed la sogs rnams// nub kyi cha las 'og tu ni// byang
52a7(rgyud 'bum): gi cha ru yang dag bri/ / de bzhin dpung dang bdag por bcas// ma mo 'jig rten rab grags dang // gtso bo 'khor lo rnam rol pa// lha min la sogs rdzu 'phrul che// phyi rol 'khor lo'i rigs
52b1(rgyud 'bum): su bshad/ / rgyud chen gsang ba zhes bya las// stong phrag bcu ru bshad pa rnams// ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bri// phyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas zur du// dkyil 'khor bzhi ni bri bar bya// me
52b2(rgyud 'bum): tog spos la sogs ldan pa/ / mchod pa'i lha mo yang dag bri// ji ltar nus shing bri ba dang // ji ltar mdzes shing rjes su mthun// ji ltar rang gi rigs bshad pa// ji ltar mngon par 'dod
52b3(rgyud 'bum): pa bri/ / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las/ phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor mchog tu mdzes pa zhes bya ba rkang pa brgyad pa
52b4(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs so/ / // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po ma lus pa rdzogs so// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
52b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ma lus pa dgug pa 'di 'byung ngo / / 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems dang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dgug pa nyid dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i
52b6(rgyud 'bum): sa la thabs la mkhas pa chen po 'jug par byed pa nyid dang / don thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa dang / byang chub chen po'i tshogs bsags pa sems
52b7(rgyud 'bum): can gyi don la mi slu ba dang / theg pa chen po 'di las theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa mi skyed cing 'gyur ba med par 'ching ba nyid dang / thabs dang / shes rab dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
53a1(rgyud 'bum): gzungs dang / spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa sdud par byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po nyid la yang dag par byed pa nyid do// de la shar gyi sgor rdo rje lcags kyu chen po
53a2(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba rdo rje 'dzin dgod par bya'o/ / lho ru ni rdo rje zhags pa zhes bya ba dang / nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog ces bya ba dang / byang du rdo rje dril bu zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dgod par bya'o// dkyil 'khor thams cad
53a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba zhes bya ba las/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshul ched du brjod pa las rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs so//
53a4(rgyud 'bum): / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yin no// byang chub sems dpa'i tshul thob byed// dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs nas ni// dam tshig mchog chen sems dpa' yis// bskor ba dag ni lan gsum
53a5(rgyud 'bum): bya/ ma lus gsang ba lta bya zhing // kun tu tshogs nas dga' bar bya// gsang ba chad na dag bya zhing // lhag pa rnam par sbyar bar bya// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi// myur du phyag rgya che bsten bya// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam
53a6(rgyud 'bum): dam pa ni/ / lan cig tu ni brjod par bya// 'khor lo zur ni yang dag gnas// rdo rje lha mo spyan drang bya// phyi rol dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas mchod rten spyan drang bya// sgo yi dbus na gang gnas pa/
53a7(rgyud 'bum): sgo srungs rnams ni spyan drang bya// phyi rol dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// sems dpa' chen po spyan drang bya// de nas sgo rnams thams cad du// lcags kyu la sogs las byas te// phyag rgya bzhi ni yang dag bcing // brgya dang
53b1(rgyud 'bum): rtsa brgyad dag bya ba/ / rdo rje lcags kyu kun tu dgug/ rdo rje zhags pas gzhug par bya// rdo rje lcags sgrog kun tu bcing // rdo rje dril bu dbab par bya// sgo'i bya ba'o// de nas dbus su 'dug byas nas/
53b2(rgyud 'bum): rdorje slob dpon dka' thub che// rdo rje dbye ba'i phyag rgya yis// sgo rnams thams cad dbye bar bya// sgo srungs bar du dmigs nas ni// sgo rnams dbye bar bya ba yi// rdo rje sdigs mdzub phyag rgya
53b3(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / gdug pa thams cad bsdigs par bya// gang tshe mchod pa yang dag rtsom// ji srid dus kyis rdzogs 'gyur ba// grwa ni thams cad dag tu ni// gdug spos rnams ni dbul bar bya// sngon du sgo
53b4(rgyud 'bum): yi las byas te/ / de nas mchod pa yang dag bya// dang por me tog shing la sogs// spros dang mar me phyag rgyar bcas// mtshams kyi dus las sngon du ni// bum pa rdo rje spyan drang bya// rdo rje bum
53b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyag rgya yis/ / ci nus par ni spyan drang bya// bum pa shin tu bzang po mchog/ rin chen sna bdun las byas mdzes// yang na rin chen dang bsres pa'i// rdo rje dri yi chu ldan bya// rdo rje chu yi sngag
53b6(rgyud 'bum): dang ni/ / rdo rje phyag rgya chu gtsang ma// stong dang rtsa brgyad bzlas byas na// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu ru 'gyur// bum pa'i sngags ni/ oM badz+ra u da ka hUM/ me tog gi sngags ni/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe hUM/ mar me'i
53b7(rgyud 'bum): sngags ni/ oM badz+ra A lo ke hUM/ dri'i sngags ni/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he hUM/ bdug spos kyi sngags ni/ oM badz+ra d+hU pe hUM/ spos dang me tog la sogs pa// thams cad phyag rgya ldan par bya/
54a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje phyag rgya bzung byas nas// rdo rje'i sngags kyis rab tu sbyor// dgongs ka'i dus nas brtsams nas ni// khrus kyi cho ga yang dag bya// lus la dri yis byugs pa
54a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / / rgyan rnams kun gyis legs par brgyan// rdo rje'i shugs kyi sngags dang ni// rdo rje shugs kyi phyag rgya yis// 'byung ba dang ni 'jug pa yis// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor nyes mi 'gyur/
54a3(rgyud 'bum): smin ma rdo rje ri mo mtshan// sangs rgyas phyag rgya la sogs tshegs// sems dpa' thams cad mgom byas kyang // rdo rje'i rnal 'byor nyes mi 'gyur// der ni 'gyod pa med par 'gyur// rdo rje
54a4(rgyud 'bum): dril bu dkrol ba yis/ / cho ga chad dam lhag kyang rung // 'grub 'gyur nyes par mi 'gyur ro// gal te 'di ni cho gar ldan// kun tu 'jigs par mi bya'o// grub pa'i rnal 'byor go cha yis//
54a5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas skyon du 'dzin mi mdzad// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya ches// dkyil 'khor mchod phyir 'jug par bya'o// zhugs nas dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje dag ni dgug par bya// rdo rje
54a6(rgyud 'bum): lcags kyu kun bcings nas/ / sor mo yis ni dgug par bya// de nyid rdo rje lcags kyu yis// rgyud las dgug pa nyid du gsungs// de bzhin rdo rje rigs chen la// rdo rje lcags kyu yang dag bcing //
54a7(rgyud 'bum): rin chen lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis// rin po che ni dgug par bya// pad+ma lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ni// pad+ma'i rin chen dag la bshad// las kyi lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis// las kyi rigs chen dgug
54b1(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / rdo rje chen po'i lcags kyu bcing // sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya// dkyil 'khor lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis// dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang bya// phyi rol rdo rje lcags kyu
54b2(rgyud 'bum): bcing / / phyi rol rdo rje rigs spyan drang // bkra shis rdo rje'i lca gso kyu yis// byang chub sems dpa'i spyan drang bya// byang phyogs lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor pa rnams spyan drang
54b3(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / rin chen lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis// rdo rje 'dzin pa spyan drang bya// snying po'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis// phyag na rdo rje spyan drang bya// rdo rje lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis// kun la nyi shu rtsa
54b4(rgyud 'bum): gcig bzlas/ / bsnyems tshul sngags kyi phyag rgya yis// rnam snang yang dag spyan drang bya// sangs rgyas lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis// de bzhin kho nar sangs rgyas rnams// dam tshig lcags
54b5(rgyud 'bum): klu'i phyag rgya yis/ / dam tshig sems dpa' spyan drang bya// dgug pa'i sbyor ba byas nas ni// mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad gdon par bya// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad rdzogs nas ni// mchod pa'i sprin
54b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams yang dag sgrub/ / bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs pa'i// ji skad bshad pa'i brtul zhugs spyad// bshags dang gsol gdab mchod pa dang // bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs rnams//
54b7(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi bya ba rdzogs nas ni// phyag rgya bcing ba yang brtsam// brgya'am yang na stong dag gam// brgya phrag brgya ni bsdus pa yis// phyag rgya'i tshogs ni bcing byas nas// dkyil 'khor dag
55a1(rgyud 'bum): ni 'grub par 'gyur/ / de nas dkyil 'khor las byas te// ji srid skya rengs shar gyur pa'i// de srid phyag rgya yang dag bcing // nges par dngos grub ster bar bya//
55a2(rgyud 'bum): de nas langs te phyag rgya bcas// dkyil 'khor phyi rol byung nas ni// gdug pa la sogs kun bsdigs te// dkyil 'khor mchod phyir 'jug par bya// rang gis khrus byas lus dris byugs//
55a3(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar 'tsham pa'i rgyan gos ldan// shin tu mdzes pa'i gos gyon zhing // 'phreng ldan kha ni dri zhim pas// rdo rje gar gyi sbyor ba yis// me tog spyi bor bzhag byas te// rol pa'i rdo rje dga'
55a4(rgyud 'bum): pa yis/ / zhugs nas mgon la rab btud cing // de nyid 'dod chags rjes chags dang // de nyid bskul ba'i phyag rgya yis// dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba// sangs rgyas kun ni
55a5(rgyud 'bum): bskul bar bya/ / skyon dang bral zhing brtag pa te// 'dod chags kun la rjes chags pa// mchod 'os chen po rgyal po che// bcom ldan de nyid bdag grub mdzod// de nas dam tshig mchog gi ni//
55a6(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya cho ga bzhin bcings nas// rdo rje slob dpon bzhugs nas ni// lcags sgrog phyag rgya yang dag bcing // de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// de nyid rdo rje lcags kyu bcing // steng du se gol
55a7(rgyud 'bum): brdabs pa yis/ / sangs rgyas thams cad bstsu bar bya/ sangs rgyas bcu ba'i rdzag sa ri ra dang/ shar gyi sgo ru yi ge dza// de bzhin lho ru yi ge hUM// nub tu lcags sgrog chen po baM// byang du kun tu dbab pa a// rdo rje'i
55b1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor thams cad la/ / las 'di dag ni yang dag bshad// las ni kun tu rdzogs byas nas// de bzhin ngo mtshar mthong 'gyur ba// cho 'phrul chen po rmad byung che// sna tshogs brgya dang rtsa
55b2(rgyud 'bum): bcu ste/ / cho 'phrul rmad byung chen po rnams// rdo rje slob dpon gyis mthong 'gyur// dngos grub bdag nyid chen po kun// dkyil 'khor kun tu 'ong bar 'gyur// rdo rje can dang byang chub sems//
55b3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin rigs ni rnam lnga dang // rdo rje dbyings ni bdag nyid che// bcom ldan mchog kyang gshegs par 'gyur// rdo rje sems sogs sangs rgyas sras// ngo mtshar slob dpon gyis mthong 'gyur/
55b4(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa dang ni gtor ma nyid// ji bzhin cho ga bcas par 'gyur// de bzhin rdzu 'phrul dngos grub bdag/ mthong nas dkyil 'khor bya ba yin// ji ltar bkod pa 'khor lo dang // ji ltar yo byad
55b5(rgyud 'bum): zad pa dang / / ji ltar brtul zhugs spyod pa bzhin// de bzhin dngos grub thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen dang // sangs rgyas yang dag mthong bar 'gyur// ji ltar 'khor
55b6(rgyud 'bum): lo chen po byon/ / 'di ni ngo mtshar mchog yin no// ji ltar de rnams bzhugs pa bzhin// de bzhin 'khor lo yongs su gzung // ye shes bzang por khyab pa yi// rmad byung dam pa thob par
55b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / dkyil 'khor rmad byung thams cad ni// sa dag brtol nas mthong bar 'gyur// yang na dkyil 'khor bar sdang gyi// nam mkha' la gnas mthong bar 'gyur// yang na sangs rgyas kun
56a1(rgyud 'bum): gang ba'i/ / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong bar 'gyur// yang na phyogs rnams thams cad du// sangs rgyas sku ni rab mthong 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs bzhin du//
56a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje can gyis bdag nyid mthong // yang na gsang ba lnga zhes pa'i// yang na sangs rgyas mkhas pa'i mchog/ yang na dkyil 'khor gnas de ni// stong phrag gsum ni yongs su bzung // yang na/
56a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems gcig pu// dkyil 'khor bdag po zhes bshad do// de yi mtshan mo nyin mo mthong // nyi ma'i 'od kyis kun khyab pa'i// yang na nyi ma 'char ba ste// yang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro//
56a4(rgyud 'bum): dag pa'i zhing ni mthong nas su// sangs rgyas rol pa mthong bar 'gyur// 'dus pa shin tu dag pa yi// dbang bskur ba ni mthong bar 'gyur// rmad byung sna tshogs zhes bya ba// rnam 'phrul
56a5(rgyud 'bum): ngomatshar 'di mthong 'gyur/ / rdo rje slob dpon skal chen gyis// dkyil 'khor mchod pa sna tshogs 'gyur// yo byad tshogs par gyur kyang ni// gang zhig bsgribs par gyur pa yis// de bzhin
56a6(rgyud 'bum): ngo mtshar nyid mi mthong / / rnal 'byor gzhan ni yang dag rtsom// phyag rgya thams cad bcings nas ni// sdig pa bral ba yang dag bya// rmad byung sna tshogs 'di lta ste// la lar zhugs pa tsam
56a7(rgyud 'bum): gyis ni/ / 'grub pa nyid du gdon mi za// dang po'i thun la 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin la lar mtshan phyed na// gsum pa'ang skya rengs 'char na 'grub// de bzhin la lar nyi shar na// de
56b1(rgyud 'bum): ma thag tu mngon 'dod pa'i/ / sangs rgyas byang chub mchog 'grub 'gyur// skal ldan thar par 'dod 'gyur na// sa ni dang por 'dod pa ste// rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob nas// gang gis
56b2(rgyud 'bum): gnas med 'gro ba'o/ / yang ni rig pa 'dzin nyid dam// de bzhin rdo rje nyid du 'gyur// ji ltar mngon par 'dod par 'grub// sangs rgyas byang chub yongs su 'dzin// mtshams med lnga po byed
