56b3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / de bzhin sdig pa kun byed pas// gang tshe lan bdun byas nas ni// sgrub pas rnal 'byor 'grub par 'gyur// 'byung ba bzhi las gzugs can min// nam mkha'i gzugs su
56b4(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu 'gyur/ / chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur ba nyid// rdo rje'i bka' ni gzhan du man// gang gis lan bdun bsgrubs nas ni// sdig pa dge ba nyid 'gyur zhing // nyes par byas pa bsod nams
56b5(rgyud 'bum): tshogs/ / gzhan du 'grub par mi 'gyur te// dad pa med par gnas pa dang // gang tshe the tshom za 'gyur ba// de ni rnal 'byor nyams par 'gyur// byang chub sems ni yongs ma bzung //
56b6(rgyud 'bum): sngon du bsnyems pa nyams 'gyur te// rtag tu brtul zhugs nyams par 'gyur// de 'dra la sogs bgegs mang dang // nga rgyal 'di dag rnam par spangs// sdom pa yongs su ma bzung zhing //
56b7(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor de nyid tshul shes min// rdo rje smon dpon mi brtan 'gyur// 'grub pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro// de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis// gal te rdo rje slob dpon 'gyur// mkhas shing sdom
57a1(rgyud 'bum): pa blangs pa dang / / byang chub sems ni yongs su bzung // gang tshe 'tshe ba don yod cing // gal te skye ba 'bras bcas 'dod// 'bad pas thams cad nyid kyis ni//
57a2(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor chen po yang dag brtsam// byang chub sems dang ldan gyur nas// rig pa'i sdom pa 'dzin pa yi// de nas rnal 'byor yang dag brtsam// sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'grub 'gyur//
57a3(rgyud 'bum): yang zhus pa// rig pa'i rgyud ni rab 'grub byer// sdom pa ji ltar blang bar bgyi// ji ltar dam tshig bsrung bar bgyi// dam tshig nyams pa ji lta bu// sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir// byang sems yang dag bskyed nas ni//
57a4(rgyud 'bum): theg pa gzhan la 'dod mi bya// de nas rnal 'byor yang dag brtsam// dkyil 'khor gang na gnas kyang rung // slob dpon gyi ni mdun song ste// zhabs dag la ni btud nas brjod// dga' chen
57a5(rgyud 'bum): khyod bdag ston pa bas/ / slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol// byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa// mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo// dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol// sdom pa rnams
57a6(rgyud 'bum): kyang bdag la stsol/ / gtso bo dag la sdom pa gsol// slob dpon gyis ni nye bar brtag/ rnam pa kun tu dri bar bya// dam tshig brjod bya gang zhig ni// snod du rung ba de gzhug bya// bu dang slob ma ma
57a7(rgyud 'bum): yin min/ sdod dang ldan la sbyin par bya// gal te snod dang ldan par shes// srog dang bdog pa kun sbyin bya// sngon du dkyil 'khor rab 'jug cing // cho ga bzhin du bcug nas ni// de nas me tog
57b1(rgyud 'bum): bcas thal mo/ / lus btud dga' ba che rnams kyis// bshags pa dang ni gsol ba gdab// rjes su yi rang kun tu bya// rgyud dbang gsang ba las gsung bzhid// mchod pa dang bcas yongs
57b2(rgyud 'bum): su bsngo/ / phyogs rnams kun tu phyag bya zhing // sdom pa chen po blang bar bya// slob dpon la ni rab tu brjod// gtso bo bdag la sdom pa gsol// thub pa'i nyi ma ma lus pa'i// sangs rgyas bdag
57b3(rgyud 'bum): la dgongs su gsol/ / bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di// slob dpon dbang du gnas pa la// sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba// mi ldog 'khor lo'i 'byor par ldan// thar pa chen po'i grong khyer
57b4(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ gsang ba chen por 'jug par bgyi// gsang ba'i rig mtho thams cad du// slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug mdzod// mi ldog pa yi dbang skur ba// skal pa chen po bdag la stsol//
57b5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyas btab cing // dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ba// slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol// dbang bskur ba ni rmad byang che// sems can kun
57b6(rgyud 'bum): gyi don bgyid phyir/ / bdag ni rtag tu slob dpor 'gyur// slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol// gsang ba'i rigs las byung ba yi// rdo rje'i rigs bcas 'khor lo ste// rta babs bcas par
57b7(rgyud 'bum): yang dag ldan/ / slob dpor gyur par shes par bya// dag nyid nye bar zhi ba nyid// byang chub sems ni yongs su gzung // gsang ba yi ni 'khor lo ru// sdom pa dang bcas 'jug par bgyi//
58a1(rgyud 'bum): de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste// gsang ba chen po rigs dag pa// gsang ba yongs su 'dzin par ni// bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam// des
58a2(rgyud 'bum): kyang 'tshal zhes brjod par bya/ / yang slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song // 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs
58a3(rgyud 'bum): dag pa'i/ / dam tshig brtan par gyur pa'o// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang // blo chen gyis ni gzung bar bgyi// byang chub sems gang de rdo rje// shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do// slob dpon
58a4(rgyud 'bum): dag kyang gzung bar bya/ / bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// 'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i// sdom pa dam tshig yin par gsungs// rin chen rigs mchog chen po la// nyin dang mtshan mo lan
58a5(rgyud 'bum): gsum du/ / zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams// sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin// phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum// dam chos khyod kyis gzung bar bya// 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i//
58a6(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs// las kyi rigs mchog chen po la// sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi// mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya// de las gzhan
58a7(rgyud 'bum): pa bcu bzhi ni/ / phas pham par ni rab tu bshad// spang zhing dor bar mi bya ste// rtsa ba'i ltung ba zhes bshad do// nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du// nyin re zhing ni bzla bar byed/
58b1(rgyud 'bum): / gang tshe nyams gyur rnal 'byor pa// kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur// khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya// ma byin par yang mi blang ngo // 'dod la log par mi spyad cing // brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o// /
58b2(rgyud 'bum): phu krol kun gyi rtsa ba ni// chang ni rnam par spang bar bya// sems can 'dul phyir ma gtogs pa// bya ba ma yin thams cad spang // dam pa nye bar bsten bya zhing // rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen
58b3(rgyud 'bum): bkur bya/ / lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang // ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang // yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni// ci nus par ni rjes su skyongs// theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya// sems can don la
58b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyab phyogs min/ / 'khor ba dag kyang spang mi bya// rtag tu mya ngan 'das mi chags// lha dang lha min gsang ba pa// khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya zhing // phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang // mtshan
58b5(rgyud 'bum): ma 'gom par mi bya'o/ / 'di dag dam tshig yin par bshad// khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya// rjes mthun sdom pa rgya cher ni// gsang ba'i rgyud las rab tu bshad// de nyid kyis kyang brjod
58b6(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / 'dir ni slob dpon bdag la gson// gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa// de bzhin du ni bgyid par 'tshal// ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams// byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i//
58b7(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems ni bla na med// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la// tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang // dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang // sems can
59a1(rgyud 'bum): don byed tshul khrims gsum/ / bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// deng nas brtsams
59a2(rgyud 'bum): te gzung bar bgyi/ / rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang // yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi// slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi// rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi//
59a3(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la// nyin re zhing ni dus drug tu// sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin// byang chub chen po las byung ba// pad+ma'i rigs chen dag pa la// phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum// dam pa'i
59a4(rgyud 'bum): chos ni gzung bar bgyi/ / las kyi rigs mchog chen po la// sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi// mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi// byang chub sems ni
59a5(rgyud 'bum): bla na med/ / dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyis nas// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung // ma grol ba ni dgrol bar bgyi// ma brgal ba ni bsgral bar bgyi//
59a6(rgyud 'bum): dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing // sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// cho ga ji bzhin dbang bskur bya// rdo rje slob dpon dbang bskur ba// gsang ba'i rgyud
59a7(rgyud 'bum): las rab tu bshad/ / de lta bu yi cho ga yis// rtag pa nyid du spyod pa na// slob dpon rdo rje 'chang chen du// 'di ni 'gyur ba the tshom med// rdo rje slob dpon gyi las rdzogs so//
59b1(rgyud 'bum): / de nas slob ma gzhug pa'i las// yang dag nyid du bshad par bya// slob ma rdo rje slob dpon gyis// ji bzhin gsang ba chen por gzhug/ snod dang snod min brtag pa nyid// bdag nyid
59b2(rgyud 'bum): chen pos mi bya'o/ / 'di ni mthong ba tsam gyis kyang // sangs rgyas nyid ni 'grub par 'dod// gal te de ni sdod min na// de la gzhug pa sbyin par bya// yang na gang zhig don gnyer 'gyur// de la
59b3(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar bde ba nyid/ / ci ste gang zhig 'dug par 'gyur// mkhas pas gzhug pa sbyin par bya// gang phyir mthong ba tsam gyis ni// thams cad 'grub par gdon mi za// 'on kyang gang zhig 'dug
59b4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / de la las ni bya ba min// gzhug pa tsam zhig sbyin bya'o// rnam pa thams cad nyid mi bya// dga' zhing dad dang ldan gyur na// snod du rung ba brtag par bya// gsum la skyabs
59b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gro sngon song ba'o/ / de la gzhug pa sbyin par bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya ches// rdo rje slob ma la sbyin bya// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// sbyor bzhin su yin brjod par bya// dkar
59b6(rgyud 'bum): po dmar po dang ldan pa'i/ / gos kyis mig ni bkab gyur dang // rdo rje 'jug byed phyag rgya yis// rdo rje slob ma gzhug par bya// de nas sgo yi las bya ste// sngon la rdo rje lcags kyu yis//
59b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje lcags kyu dgug bya zhing / yi ge dza ni brjod par bya// badz+ra aM ku sha dza// rdo rje lcags kyus bkug nas ni// rdo rje chags pas gzhug par bya// lho yi sgor ni sbyor bya zhing //
60a1(rgyud 'bum): yi ge hUM ni brjod par bya// hUM badz+ra pA sha hUM// rdo rje zhags pas bcug nas ni// lcags sgrog ldan pas bcing par bya// nub kyi sgo ru bcings nas ni// yi ge baM ni brjod
60a2(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / badz+ra s+pho Ta baM// rdo rje lcags kyus yang dag dgug/ rdo rje zhags pas gzhug bya zhing // rdo rje lcags sgrog gis bcing bya// rdo rje dril bus yang dag dbab// badz+ra gar+b+he a/
60a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje gzhug pa'i phyag rgya yis// dkyil 'khor mchod phyir gzhug par bya// dam tshig phyag rgya chen po yis// rdo rje'i ye shes yang dag dbab// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dam tshig phyag rgya chen po
60a4(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / rdo rje'i sngags ni rab bskul bya// dam tshig bdag nyid chen po yis// sangs rgyas ye shes dbab par bya// sa ma ya hUM/ de nas mchod pa phyag rgyar bcas// spos dang me tog
60a5(rgyud 'bum): la sogs tshegs/ / phyag rgya dag ni thams cad bya// rdo rje'i sngags ni rab bskul bya// de nas cho ga ji bzhin bya// rdo rje slob ma mna' bsgag bya// badz+ra u da ka/ rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur
60a6(rgyud 'bum): bas/ / ji ltar 'dod pas dbang bskur bya// badz+ra a b+hi She ka/ rdo rje ye shes bla na med// de nas de la dbab pa sbyin// badz+ra A be sha a a/ bcu/ nyi shu/ sum cu/ bzhi bcu/ lnga bcu/
60a7(rgyud 'bum): drug cu/ bdun cu/ brgyad cu/ dgu bcu/ brgya/ rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis// thams cad du ni yang dag dang ba// de nas gdong g.yogs dgrol bar bya// rdo rje'i mig ni bla med pa/
60b1(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra ak+Shi/ rdo rje'i rigs ni skal ldan gyi// dkyil 'khor ltos shig ces brjod bya// badz+ra pA sha ho/ de nas de la bum pa bzang // rdo rje slob dpon gyis dbang bskur// gang ming bzung
60b2(rgyud 'bum): ba tsam gyis ni/ / sdig pa kun las rnam grol 'gyur// oM badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ snod ni yang dag brtag bya zhing // de yi ye shes yongs su spyad// gal te snod du rung shes na// rnam par dbye bar
60b3(rgyud 'bum): dga' bar bya/ / he badz+ra nA ma/ lnga/ cho ga bcu/ gzugs nyi shu/ chu sum cu/ rdo rje bzhi bcu/ rin chen lnga bcu// pheg rdob drug cu/ kha sbyar bdun cu/ bzhad pa brgyad cu/ dag pa
60b4(rgyud 'bum): dgu bcu/ sems pa brgya/ sangs rgyas stong / las nyis stong / gzugs sum stong / rnal 'byor bzhi stong / 'dzin pa lnga stong / gzungs drug stong / kha dog bdun stong / dbyibs brgyad
60b5(rgyud 'bum): stong / mtshan ma dgu stong / tshig 'bum/ a/ 'bum phrag gcig ni yongs rdzogs nas// 'khor lo'i mtshan nyid yang dag ldan// gsang ba yi ni spyod yul gzhan// de nas las ni
60b6(rgyud 'bum): rab bshad bya/ / slob ma'i cho ga ming gi dam tshig rdzogs so// // ye shes dag pa bdag nyid che// de nas gsang ba rab bshad bya// gang gis cho ga thams cad
60b7(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ / 'khor le chen po brtan 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas sems dpa' sems dpa' nyid// sa yi mtshan nyid yang dag ldan// gsang ba'i dam bcas yi rang bzhin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
61a1(rgyud 'bum): thugs dag pa/ / rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs// ye shes dag pa rdzu 'phrul che// rdo rje'i thugs 'dzin gyur nas ni// mtshan nyid dag ni yang dag brtag/ rdul
61a2(rgyud 'bum): 'byor dpe byad don ldan bya/ / mtshan nyid rjes su brtag par bya// rdo rje'i thugs kyi rjes sbyor bas// ye shes dag pa yang dag gzung // mchog tu gsang ba dam pa mchog/ ye shes bzhugs
61a3(rgyud 'bum): pa kun tu bshad/ / de nas ye shes dam pa yis// 'jig rten 'das pa rab gzhug bya// mtshan nyid chen po dang ldan pa'i// rtog pa'i sa la yang dag rten// rnal 'byor pa yi spyod yul mchog
61a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje chos ni yid 'ong ba'o/ / thim dang chos sku zhes bya dang // sdigs dang 'od zer lnga pa dang // glog dang chu zla zhes bya bas// sangs rgyas ye shes yang dag 'thob// chu yi zla ba bzang po yis//
61a5(rgyud 'bum): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor spang bar bya// nyi ma lnga dang yang dag ldan// rigs chos skar ma zhes bya ba// nyon mongs gnod pa 'joms byed pa// e ma'o gsang ba chen por bshad// gsang ba zhes bya/
61a6(rgyud 'bum): rdor 'od 'byung // gzhan yang zla ba phyed par 'dod// pho nya'i dkyil 'khor khA T+wAM ga/ bcing ba rtse gsum sbyor las byung // lcags kyu shin tu 'bar ba dang // gtum po rdo rje can gyi tshogs
61a7(rgyud 'bum): rtog pa'i gnas ni yongs 'gyur ba/ / thob byed rdo rje chen por 'dod // kun gyi gong ma'i 'og ma yis// nye che ba de spang bar bya// mchog tu gsang ba rdzogs so// / de nas
61b1(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu gsang ba rgya che ba/ / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul can/ zab pa/ tshul rgya che ba/ mkhas pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul las kyi tshogs ston pa// dga' ba chen po'i bkod
61b2(rgyud 'bum): pas kun khyab pa/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba la sogs pa rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod 'byung ba// rol pa'i 'khor lo chen po 'di las phyag
61b3(rgyud 'bum): rgya chen po'i rgyud mchog ces bya ba 'byung ste/ / gsang ba mchog tu rgya che ba// bsam gyis mi khyab las rnams ston// rol pa'i 'khor lo chen po ru// chos kyi mdzod ni 'dzin par bya// re zhig dang
61b4(rgyud 'bum): bor las kyi tshogs bstan par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ hUM/ 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gzung ba yi// sbyor thabs yi ge hUM brjod de// 'di yis kyang ni rgyal po dang // phyag rgya'i rgyal mo brgya
61b5(rgyud 'bum): ru 'gyur/ / gnyis pa ni byang chub chen po'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i tshul la 'jug pa yin no// 'di lta ste/ hUM/ 'dis ni phyag rgya zhes bya yis// yi ge
61b6(rgyud 'bum): hUM ni brtan par 'gyur/ / phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya'i rgyal mo rnam pa stong // gsum pa phyag rgya stong phrag ni// rgya yi tshogs su 'gyur ba yin// sangs rgyas 'khor lor 'jug
61b7(rgyud 'bum): pa yi/ / yi ge hU~M gyis brtan par 'gyur// hUM/ rnal 'byor bzhi pa'i dbye ba ni// brgya phrag khri ru 'dir 'gyur ro// rig pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba// phyag rgya'i rgyal mo kun hUM bcas/
62a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ji snyed yod// mngag gzhug pa ni bye bar 'gyur// rtse gsum la sogs mtshon ma ni// rtag tu phyag rgya'i rgyal po yin// dz+dza/ de nas sngags kyi chos
62a2(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ste/ / Tak+ki bcu/ maT nyi shu/ phaT sum cu/ raT bzhi bcu/ baT lnga cu/ riT drug cu/ khaT bdun cu/ waT brgyad cu/ taT dgu bcu/ taT bad+ma/ kA ta ni lan stong
62a3(rgyud 'bum): yin/ ta dang wa zhes bya ba dang // Da ni rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur// yi ge Da ni lan gsum sbyar// yi ge a yang rnam pa bzhi// yi ge ba ni rnam pa lnga// yi ge a nI lan drug sbyar//
62a4(rgyud 'bum): ka ni lan bdun yang dag sbyar// yi ge d+ha ni lan brgyad sbyar// yi ge sha ni phyed du 'gyur// khiT ni stong phrag brgya ru 'gyur// stong phrag brgya las rnal 'byor gyis// phyag rgya'i rgyud ni btu bar bya//
62a5(rgyud 'bum): rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa gsang ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i drug pa gsang ba'i tshogs chen po'i mchog de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po shin tu gsang ba rnal 'byor rdo rje
62a6(rgyud 'bum): rtse mo las/ byang chub pa'i tshul rgya chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i le'u gnyis pa rdzogs so// / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'ang rdzogs so//
62a7(rgyud 'bum): / de nas byang chub sems pa'i tshul rgya chen po 'di las dkyil 'khor chen po'i dang / phyag rgya dang / nye ba'i phyag rgya 'byung ba'i ye shes 'byung te/ gang tshe rdo rje sgob
62b1(rgyud 'bum): dpon dang / rdo rje slob mar gyur pa na// phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya bcing // gang phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas// gang tshe rdo rje sems dpa' 'ching // rdo rje khu tshur dam du 'ching // gang tshe rdo rje
62b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po 'ching / / rdo rje gnod sbyin rab tu 'ching // gang tshe rdo rje chags pa 'ching // rdo rje srin po rab tu 'ching // gang tshe rdo rje legs pa 'ching // rdo rje las ni rab tu 'ching // gang tshe rdo rje rin chen
62b3(rgyud 'bum): 'ching / / rdo rje sbu ba rab tu 'ching // gang tshe rdo rje gzi brjid 'ching // rdo rje rgyu ni rab tu 'ching // gang tshe rdo rje rgyal mtshan 'ching // rdo rje rnon po rab tu 'ching // gang tshe rdo rje bzhad pa 'ching // rdorje
62b4(rgyud 'bum): chos ni rab tu bcing / / de lta bu yi sbyor ba yi// phyag rgya'i lan ni yang dag sbyar// phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya yis// rdo rje'i phyag rgya brtan par 'gyur// mchod pa'i phyag rgya ji ltar lags// rdo rje'i
62b5(rgyud 'bum): lcags kyus bkug nas su/ / rdo rje'i mangs ni dgang bar bya// rdo rje'i mangs ni 'phang nas su// rdo rje khu tshur gyis bsgrub bya// phyag rgya ji bzhin bkrol nas ni// de ni bcing bar rab tu bya// mchod
62b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i cho ga 'di yis ni/ / rdo rje dkyil 'khor mchod par 'gyur// de bzhin g.yon pas gar bya zhing // g.yas pas khri tshur bcing nas ni// dpral bar yongs su bskor nas su// kha yi mdun du dgod
62b7(rgyud 'bum): b.rabya/ rdo rje mi ma bzhad pas bkang // mnyam ning chung bang gdangs te gnas// ral gri drim med snang bas// rdo rje ku ni thang bar bya// rdo rje mo ba'i mdzub mo ni// yang dag sbeng ba legs pa
63a1(rgyud 'bum): sgrub/ / de nas spyi gtsug kha dag tu// las byas dkyil 'khor mchod pa na// rigs kyi lha yi sbyor ba yis// legs par sgrub pas gtam bsgrub bya// dang por bdag
63a2(rgyud 'bum): nyid rdo rje sems/ / de bzhin lha nyid brtag par bya// brtul zhugs sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rigs kyi lha nyid bsgrub par bya// 'khor lo rnam pa du ru brjod// ji ltar rigs de bzhin 'khor lo//
63a3(rgyud 'bum): jiltar dgod pa de bzhin 'gyur// ji skad gsungs pa dgongs pa bzhin// mdor bsdus na ni rnam pa lnga// rdo rje rin chen de bzhin chos// pad+ma sna tshogs shin tu brtan// de bzhin sangs rgyas rnal
63a4(rgyud 'bum): 'byor gsang / / 'khor lo rnam pa lnga ru bshad// gsang ba rnam pa du ru 'gyur// gsang ba rnam pa lnga ru brjod// rgyas pa'i sgo nas rnam pa mang // sangs rgyas rdo rje rin chen dang // chos dang
63a5(rgyud 'bum): las ni grags chen no/ / cho ga rnam pa du ru brjod// mdor na rnam pa gsum du 'dod// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // mngon spyod kyi ni rtog pa la// rdo rje sbyor ba las byung du// rdo rje'i sbyor ba bla
63a6(rgyud 'bum): med pa/ / tshad med bgrang du med pa yis// ji ltar gdul bya rnams kyi khams// de bzhin rdo rje sbyor 'byung rnams// rtsa ba'i rgyud du ji ltar brjod// gsang ba lnga ldan gang yin pa'i// de ni
63a7(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya/ / dbang bskur phyag rgya chen po dang // rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor 'byung // ji ltar gsang ba'i rigs la byung // gang zhig sngon du chos nyid snang // yid la byed pa dang
63b1(rgyud 'bum): nug/ rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi thugs chen po// de bzhin gsang ba rab tu brtag/ 'di yi rtag tu de nyid rig/ rdo rje'i ye shes ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar bsgoms pas rdo rje can/
63b2(rgyud 'bum): mngon par sbyor ba de nyid rig/ de tshe ye shes rang bzhin sems// de nyid ye shes brtan par 'gyur// mchog tu gsang ba ci 'drar brjod// phyag rgya rnam pa lnga ldan pa// de ni mchog tu gsang
63b3(rgyud 'bum): ba bsgrags/ / phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya bsdu// nye bar bzhad pa'i mchod pa'o// de nyid kyang ni ji lta bu// rig pa'i sgom pa bstan pa dang // ting 'dzin sgo dang yang dag ldan// rig pa'i lha mo'i
63b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi mchog/ de nyid du ni rtag tu 'gyur// rdo rje phra mo ji ltar brjod// shes rab can gyis bdag bsam bya// nga ni su zhig bdag mi dmigs// 'byung ba bzhi yang rang bzhin lus/
63b5(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba rnams las ji ltar 'byung // de nas lus 'di thams cad ni// rnal 'byor spyi bo nas brtsams te// rkang pa yi ni mthil bar du// mi gtsang rdzas ni 'byung bar 'gyur//
63b6(rgyud 'bum): zla ba'i rdo rje dbus gnas par// yang na bdag nyid bsam par bya// yang na snying kha'i dbus su ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// yang na zla gnyis yang dag ldan// dbus su rdo rje
63b7(rgyud 'bum): rnam par sgom/ / yang na rdo rje'i dbus gnas pa// lus kun brtan par spro bar bya// yang na rdo rje bdag nyid sku// rdo rje'i dngos po rnam spangs pa'i// yang na mkha' mtshungs chos shes
64a1(rgyud 'bum): pA'i/ / rdo rje rnal 'byor yang dag gzung // lce ni rkan la sbyar byas te// sku yi rtse mor bsdu bya zhing // rdo rje rnga mo bde reg pas// sems ni mnyam par gzhag/
64a2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur// rdo rje phra mo'i bde reg la// rtag tu mtshan ma'ang 'byung bar 'gyur// mtshan ma de ni sgo byas te/ phyogs kun tu ni yongs su spro// s+pha ra Na badz+ra// ci ste sems ni spro bar 'dod
64a3(rgyud 'bum): phyogs rnams kun tu yongs su spro/ / sna yi rtse mor phyin par du// sems ni slar yang bsdu bar bya// saM ha ra Na badz+ra/ de nas brtsams te mnyam gzhag pas// gang zhig cung zad ci sgom pa'i/
64a4(rgyud 'bum): chos dang gang zag bdag med cing // gzung dang 'dzin pa spang ba'o// badz+ra badz+ra tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ sems can gang la byams pa ni// rtag tu brtan par dmigs nas su// sems ni spro ba'i spyod
64a5(rgyud 'bum): pa yis/ / phyogs rnams kun tu yongs su spro// mahA badz+ra mai tri s+pha ra Na/ sdug bsngal kun la yang dag gnas// sems can 'di rnams rab tu dka'// snying rje chen po'i sbyor ba yis//
64a6(rgyud 'bum): phyogs rnams kun tu yongs su spro// mahA ku ru Ni sa ra Na// mya ngan 'das la btang bsnyoms gzhag/ sems can don ni yang dab brtsam// kye ma sems can 'di gdul dka'
64a7(rgyud 'bum): phyogs rnams kun tu yongs su spro/ / mahA u pe k+ShaM s+pha ra Na// thams cad rang bzhin 'od gsal bas// gzod nas dag pa'i bdag nyid 'gyur// kun nas nyon mongs mi dmigs
64b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / mya ngan 'das pa'ang grol ba'ang med// sarba bud+d+ha pra mo da s+pha ra Na// mkha' 'am gzhan gyi phyogs dag tu// rdo rje phra mo'i sbyor ba yis// snying kha'i rdo rje byang chub sems//
64b2(rgyud 'bum): shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// rdo rje phra mo'i sbyor ba yis// go rims ji lta ba bzhin du// phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs chen po// dam pa'i chos nyid bsgom par bya// rnam pa mchog
64b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams kun ldan pa/ / sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam par sgom// rdo rje phra mo'i sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bya// bud+d+ha a nu s+thi t+ya bi sha/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rang
64b4(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya/ / rang gi snying kha'i dkyil 'khor du// zla sgom rmad byung rnal 'byor che// sa man+ta b+ha dra a b+hi sha/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rang bdag nyid ni rdo rje'i
64b5(rgyud 'bum): gzugs/ / rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' cho ga bzhin// badz+ra satwa/ rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid// snying kha'i
64b6(rgyud 'bum): / zla ba'i dbus su ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// badz+ra satwa sa mA d+hi dz+nyA na bi sha/ rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas gzugs su rang bdag nyid// sgom zhing snying
64b7(rgyud 'bum): khar zla ba'i dkyil/ / dbus su sems dpa' rnam par sgom// ta thA ga to tse/ rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rnam sgom pa// rnam pa brgya dang rtsa bcu ni// rgyas pa ru ni ci rigs par// gsang ba'i rgyud
65a1(rgyud 'bum): las rab tu bshad/ / rdo rje phra mo rdzogs so// / 'jig rten pa ni ji ltar 'dod// rdo rje'i gzugs ni gter gnas pa// snying khar yongs
65a2(rgyud 'bum): su bsgom par bya/ / sa yi gnas kyang bsgom na ni// gter dag rab tu mthong bar 'gyur// badz+ra nI d+hi/ rin chen chen po'i rdo rje'i gzugs// nam mkha' la ni yongs su sdom// gang du
65a3(rgyud 'bum): lhultung bar mthong ba ni/ / de na gter yod shes par bya// rat+na ni d+hi/ lce la pad+ma'i gzugs dag ni// shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas sgom// de na yod ces bcas nas ni// rdo rje lha nyid rang
65a4(rgyud 'bum): nyi sgra/ dza rma Ni d+hi/ lus kun rnal 'byor chen po yi// rdo rje'i gzugs su rnam par sgom// kun tu babs nas gar lhung ba// de na gter yod bstan pa yin// karma Ni d+hi/ gter shes pa
65a5(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs so/ / rdo rje dbab pa 'byung ba yin// chu ni rdo rje'i gzugs rang bzhin// sgom zhing rdo rje'i shugs kyis ni// chu yi stang du 'gro bar bya// badz+ra dz+wa la/ ji ltar 'dod
65a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gzugs su ni/ / rdo rje sems sogs 'dod pa rnams// rang bdag nyid ni bsgom bya ste// 'dod pa'i gzugs nyid thob par 'gyur// badz+ra rU pa/ chos kun mkha' dang mtshungs pa ste/
65a7(rgyud 'bum): bdag ni nam mkha' zhes rang nyid// de nyid dag pa bsgom bya ste// de ni mi snang ba nyid 'gyur// badz+ra A ka sha/ rdo rje'i skas la 'dug nas ni// 'dzeg pa ru ni bsgom byas na// ji srid du ni 'dzen
65b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gnas/ / de srid nam mkhar 'gro bar 'gyur// badz+ra ma haM/ mi snang ba dang / mkha' la 'gro ba dang / chu'i steng du 'gro bar bya ba dang / 'dod pa'i gzugs nyid shes pa rdzogs
65b2(rgyud 'bum): so/ / / zla ba'i gzugs la 'dug nas su// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom// lag na rdo rje bsgoms na ni// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// badz+ra d+ha ra/
65b3(rgyud 'bum): zla ba'i gzugs la 'dug nas ni// rdo rje rin chen bdag rang nyid// rab tu rin chen bsgoms nas ni// rin chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rat+na d+ha ra/ zla ba'i gzugs la 'dug nas
65b4(rgyud 'bum): su/ / rdo rje 'dzin pa rang bdag nyid// lag pa pad+ma dag tu sgom// pad+mo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// pad+ma d+ha ra/ zla ba'i gzugs la 'dug nas su// rdo rje'i las su yang dag brtan//
65b5(rgyud 'bum): lag tu las ni bsgom byas na// las kyi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// karma d+ha ra/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid rdzogs so// / phyag rgya kun gyi ting nge 'dzim
65b6(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha'i dbyings su kun bsams nas/ / rdo rje'i bdag nyid ji srid 'dod// de srid skad cig gis 'phar 'gyur// badz+ra/ dngos grub kyi ni ting 'dzin ni// nam mkha'i dbyings su kun
65b7(rgyud 'bum): bsams nas/ / mngon par shes pa lnga thob cing // myur du ye shes rang grub 'gyur// shud+d+ha shud+d+ha/ rin chen rdo rje'i rang bzhin kun// nam mkha'i dbyings su kun bsams nas//
66a1(rgyud 'bum): rjes su dran pa bstan pa yin// sbyar du rin chen 'dzin mtshungs 'gyur/ badz+ra badz+ra/ thams cad sangs rgyas gzugs rang bzhin// nam mkha'i dbyings su mos byas
66a2(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi ting 'dzin no// sangs rgyas nyid kyi ched du 'gyur// bud+d+ha praH/ mchog gi dngos grub rdzogs so// rang nyid rdo rje khu tshur ni// chags
66a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dga' bas mig gdangs pa/ / de yis gang la bltas pa ni// des kyang rdo rje can du mthong // oM badz+ra dr-iSh+Ti maT/ gsal zhing rab tu 'bar ba'i mig/ mig 'bras kun tu 'dren byed
66a4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / 'bar ba'i rtsa ba zhes su brjod// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs byed pa// dr-iT+Ta dza~M NA~M oM m+b+ha 4u0f7f/ khro gnyer bster ba rab 'joms pa// khros pas mig ni rab tu g.yo//
66a5(rgyud 'bum): lta ba la brten nas// 'jig rten gsum yang gzhom par bya// kro d+ha driSh+Ti ti/ rI rab ri bo man+da ra// brtan zhing mi 'dzums pa yi mig/ byams pa'i lta ba zhes bshad do// gdon dang
66a6(rgyud 'bum): rims dang dug 'joms pa'i/ / rdon+do rdoSh+NI ti// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / chang pas gcad pa dang / yongs su bsgrub pa'i las
66a7(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs so/ / / 'di pa gnas ni yod nyid min// rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ces// 'on kyang dgug pa bde ba ste// de ni kun las khyad par 'phags// dus 'diras
66b1(rgyud 'bum): ba chen po ni/ / dkyil 'khor chen po byed pa las// dngos grub med kyang bde ba gang // bde ba kun las khyad par 'phags// lha dang mi yi 'jig rten pa'i// bde ba bsdus par gyur pa yis//
66b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje slob dpon bde ba gang // bcu drug char yang mi phod do// yang na gang zhig dngos grub thob// sangs rgyas nyid du rab shes bya// rang gis rtogs pa gang yin pa// gzhan dang gang gis shes
66b3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / sar chud rgyal ba'i gnas dang ldan// gsang ba'i dngos grub ster mdzad pa// bde ba thob pa gang yin pa// de ni gsang ba 'dzin ji bzhin// gsang ba yi ni tshogs chen po//
66b4(rgyud 'bum): 'di la zhugs pa gang yin pa// sa thob par ni shes bya ste// mi ldog rgyal ba'i bdag nyid sras// rgyal ba'i gnas kyi sa thob kyang // yid ches par ni mi 'gyur te// de yi sa brgyad kyi bar du//
66b5(rgyud 'bum): theg pa dman pa spong mi 'gyur// gsang chen rtog pa 'di ru ni// zhugs pa bdag nyid rgyal ba'i sras// theg chen la ni gzhol ba rnams// yid ches par ni 'gyur ba ste// gsang ba yi ni phan
66b6(rgyud 'bum): yon ni/ / sangs rgyas kyis ni rab tu mkhyen// 'dir ni phan yon mdor bsdus pa// sangs rgyas bde ba thob par 'gyur// yon tan gyi dbang du byas pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// /
66b7(rgyud 'bum): / byed pa po dang skyed byed med// las dang 'bras bu gang las bshad// nga zhes ji skad bshad pa la// nga ni byed po skyed byed dang // nga ni skye dgu'i bdag po yin// nga ni sna tshogs bdag po ste//
67a1(rgyud 'bum): byed po skyed byed mes po yin// yang gsungs pa/ dag pa de bzhin gshegs snying po// sems dpa'i snying po zhes byar bshad// nga ni de bzhin gshegs snying po/
67a2(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad bdag dang mtshungs// mya ngan 'das bcas sa 'og steng // sa bla 'jig rten 'di sems can// ma lus srid pa dag gi gnas// sems tsam du ni rab tu 'jug/ sems
67a3(rgyud 'bum): can kun gyi sems gang yin/ / de ni byed po sbyin byed brjod// nga ni rgyal po sems dbang phyug/ ci phyir nga ni byed por bshad// ji skad gsung ba gzhan las gsungs// nga nyid rang las byung ba
67a4(rgyud 'bum): ste/ / mya ngan 'das bcas sa 'og skyeng // sa bla srid gsum 'jig rten gsum// gang zhig gnas zhes bya ba'i sems// gnas med las byung gang yin la// snying po de bzhin gshegs dag/
67a5(rgyud 'bum): pa/ de nyid rang byung nga nyid do// nga ni rdo rje can yang yin// sdug bsngal thams cad spangs pa dang // nyes pa thams cad zad pas na// nga ni byang chub sems rdo rje// nga nyid rang nyid byung ba'o//
67a6(rgyud 'bum): nga nyid yang ni khyab 'jug ste// bzung ba la sogs kun spang po'i// dag pa de bzhin nyid rnam shes// bdag dang nyon mongs med pa ste// de bas nga ni khyab 'jug bshad// nga ni de bzhin nyi ma ste//
67a7(rgyud 'bum): ci phyir de nyid ces bshad pa// zab mo'i chos ni ngas rtogs pa// de phyir rang byung ba nyid ni// nyi ma zhes ni bya ba brjod// nga ni zla ba ru brjod de// nga ni chos rnams thams cad kyi// zhi ba ru ni rtogs par
67b1(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / de bas zhi ba chen po yis// nga ni zla ba blo gros che// nga ni gshin rje ste/ ji bzhin chos rnams thams cad kyi// ye shes chen po lhag par bshad// de nyid rtogs pa gang yin pa// gshin
67b2(rgyud 'bum): rjeng ste gshin rje 'dzin/ / dbang po ste/ dbang po mig 'phrul zhes bya ba// 'khor ba las rgal pha rol phyin// ye shes nor ni bsgrubs pa yis// nga ni dbang byed dbang po yin// skye dgu yi ni
67b3(rgyud 'bum): bdag po ste/ / chos rnams kun gyi rnam pa ni// skye ba rtsa nas 'don byed pa// sdug bsngal chen po yongs su shes// de phyir nga ni skye dgu'i bdag/ nga bdag nyid ni mes po ste// nga yis bdud
67b4(rgyud 'bum): rtsi'i chu 'thung nas/ / thar pa'i grong khyer chen po ru// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sbrel bas// nga nyid kho na mes po yin// nga ni 'dod pa'i 'jig rten yin// ngo bo nyid dang longs spyod rdzogs//
67b5(rgyud 'bum): sprul pa'i sku ni rab 'jug byed// rol chen 'jig rten zhes bya ba// 'ji rten lta ba ston byed yin// srid pa'i 'jig pa las sgral yin// nyon mongs chen po rnam par spungs// srid par bshad/
67b6(rgyud 'bum): de/ srid pa'i zhags pa gcod byed pa// nga ni srid pa'i rgyal po che// khams gsum pa ni/ rgyud ni khams zhes rab tu brjod// byang chub sems zhes bya bar bshad// nga ni theg pa gsum 'dzin
67b7(rgyud 'bum): pas/ / nga ni khams gsum pa ru bshad// sa 'og ni/ yang dag de nyid rdo rje che// stong nyid de bzhin nyid ces bshad// ji ltar sa ni 'dzin pas mchog/ de bzhin nga ni chos 'dzin pa//
68a1(rgyud 'bum): sa steng ni// sa steng nam mkha' zhes su brjod// nga ni rang bzhin gyis mkha' mtshungs// chos dang gang zag bdag med pa// da ni sa steng de nyid bshad// me ni/
68a2(rgyud 'bum): nga ni gzod nas ma skyes 'byung ba med// bdag min bdag med nga ni skye dgu'i bdag/ srid pa'i khri shing gis bcings sems can gdungs// nga ni grol byed 'khri shing dag byed pa// rlung ni//
68a3(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ma rnam par bsgoms nas ni// mtshan ma med pa 'dus ma byas// byang sems 'khri shing zhags pa dag/ 'thor byed de bzhin rlung yin no// nga ni dbang phyug chen po ste// rdo rje tshigs
68a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi bdag po chen po byed/ / nga ni sangs rgyas dbang phyug gzhan ci smros// bdud rtsi chen po thar pa'i grong khyer che// nga ni dbang sgyur dbang phyug che// nga ni brtul zhugs zhes bshad de// nga ni nyon mong
68a5(rgyud 'bum): 'joms par bshad/ / nga ni rga dang 'chi ba las// nges par grol bas tshangs par bshad// 'jig rten gsum gyi lus su ni// zhugs pa zhe sdang gti mug ni// khams gsum 'jig/
68a6(rgyud 'bum): rten gsum yin no// da ni srung ma bran du 'gyur// de rnams 'byung bas khams gsum nga // gdong drug ni/ sangs rgyas rdo rje rin chen dang // chos dang las dang gsang 'dzin bcas//
68a7(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa drug ni 'khor lo che// nga ni gdong drug mchog chen po// gzhan yang / bza' dang tshogs sogs gang yin pa// nga bdag nyid ces ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// gang zhig gdon la sogs
68b1(rgyud 'bum): pa kun/ / sems las kun tu byung ba'i rlabs// nga ni thugs 'dzin rgyal po ste// des na da ni srid pa'i gnas// nga ni 'dod pa ste/ thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer che// dgongs pa mthar
68b2(rgyud 'bum): thug nga yis bshad/ / nga ni sems can kun la 'dod// de bas nga ni 'dod par bshad// thar pa nga ste/ nga nyid thar cing sems can kun// so sor yang ni grol bar byed// des na rang
68b3(rgyud 'bum): byung nga nyid ni/ / thar pa'i 'dzin pa'i rgyal po yin// nga ni dmyal ba ste/ nga ni bdag dang chos rnams min// nga ni chags sdang kun tu bral// nga yis 'chi med lam bstan pas// nga ni dmyal ba'i
68b4(rgyud 'bum): dmyal ba pa/ / nga ni yi dgas te// mngon par 'dod pa nga yis 'thob// sems can bsgom pa smin par byed// nga yis dka' ba'i gnas thob pas// da ni yi dgas yi dgas skyes//
68b5(rgyud 'bum): dud 'gro ba ste/ 'khor ba'i chu bo rgal dka' las// sems can dag ni thams cad gnas// ji ltar mi shes rmongs gyur pa// de bzhin nga yis dgrol bar byed// gzhan yang nga ni chags
68b6(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ / sems can grol ba rjes chags phyir// srid pa gcod phyir zhe sdang dang // gsang mdzod 'dzin pa ser sna can// sems can 'dod pas 'dod pa dang // sems can smin byed sems
68b7(rgyud 'bum): can nga/ / gsang ba 'dzin pa'i rgyal po gang // de ni nga yis 'jigs byed sras// des na gsang ba chen po yin// nga ni chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas byang chub gsang 'dzin po/
69a1(rgyud 'bum): de bas nga ni gsang ba'i bdag/ yang na byin gyis rlob pa dang // bsnyems bcas sgeg pa'i zhal mnga' ba// tha ni de yi steng sbyar nas// gung du gsang bar brjod pa'o//
69a2(rgyud 'bum): dar d+harma ra gsang // nga ni lnga lnga 'dzin pa yin// rma bya chen mo mdzod ldan ma'i// nga ni gsang ba'i bdag por bshad// rtsa dang pags pa nu mar ldan// mdzod sogs gsus pa 'phyang ba
69a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / zla ba'i steng na gar byed pa// de rnams gsang ba'i rgyal po yin// sa la bsnyems pa'i gar byed pa// rdo rje gar byed skra dkar 'joms// dra ba spus len gsus pa can// mdzod
69a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan dang ni gos 'dzin ma/ / yi ge ta 'don zla ba dang // mchog dang 'jigs byed bzhini ldan ma// sgra gcan rdo rje rjes 'thun sgra// mche ba 'byin pa myos pas khyab// de bzhin spyod pa yang
69a5(rgyud 'bum): dag ldan/ / 'phreng ldan gti mug 'joms byed ma// spyan 'dren 'dus byas thams cad ma// yun ring gar gyi tshogs ldan ma// rigs kyi gar ni spyod ma dang // 'jigs byed rnam par 'jigs
69a6(rgyud 'bum): byed dang / / gar gyi gnas byed ces bya dang // gar byed rdo rje'i gar byed ma// phul byung thams cad 'thor byed ma// lnga phung skyabs dang 'dzin byed pa// rkang gdub kyis ni bdud kyi tshegs 'joms byed//
69a7(rgyud 'bum): 'brug gi bdag po rkang gdub kyis 'dir byed// rkang gdub kyis ni yang yang bdag chen skye la// bskyod pa'i 'dar 'dar brten pa skyel byed pa// lag pa rked pa ji bzhin bskyod pa'o// gar gyi rol pa
69b1(rgyud 'bum): kun tu sdud byed ma/ / rdo rje gnyis ma sa yi gar// de bzhin ni da ki si ri// zas chen gar ma'i gsang ba ste// de bas nga ni gsang ba'i bdag/ hA hA hA thA ta pa kA sa ra mA ra hUM/ rnal 'byor chen
69b2(rgyud 'bum): po spyan 'dren ma/ / gus ldan ma dang sprul byed gzhan// 'phrog ma 'joms byed gzhu ma dang // snying po bdud ma sgra sgrog ma// pheg rdob 'dzin dang drag po dang // gzhan yang rdo rje ldan par
69b3(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / ta sga'i tshegs ni drug ldan ma// 'od tshogs kyis ni mtshan mo 'joms byed ma// seng ge yi ni nga ro sgra sgrog pa// rta yi sgra sgrog sgra gcan ma dang ni// gzhan yang gsang bstug
69b4(rgyud 'bum): pos khrus byed ma/ / sna tshogs ha ha sgra yis 'phrog bdag ma// spyan bzang yangs ma gsang ba ston byed ma// gzhan yang 'dab pas dga' ba nyid byed ma// gzhan yang spyan yangs ut+pal
69b5(rgyud 'bum): gyis brgyan ma/ / sprin 'joms byed cings rnams kun 'joms ma// seng ge'i bzhin rol gong nas go rims ldan// de 'dra'i 'khor ni dam pa dang ldan pa// gzhan yang gsang ba'i yid
69b6(rgyud 'bum): las gtam sgrog pa/ / de bzhin rim gyis dge legs nyid byed ma// n+ya hUM n+ya hUM d+ha ri d+ha ri ma hA shi ri sha ya na shra yi ra kaM ma ta sa twa sa ta sa ta tra kraM// de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba rdzogs so//
69b7(rgyud 'bum): / de yi dkyil 'khor zhugs nas ni// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga mchog gis// rnal 'byor pa ni rol byed na// des ni dngos grub thob par 'gyur// gsang ba'i mdo yi dbang
70a1(rgyud 'bum): bshad pa'i/ / sems can spyod pa ji lta bu// yang gsungs pa/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga bshad pa// gsang ba yi ni rab bsgrub pa// dang por de bzhin gshegs
70a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rigs/ / sgrub pa yi ni rol par bya// b+ha ga ci yin brjod par bya// 'joms pa b+ha ga zhes su brjod// gang du nyon mongs 'joms byed pa// shes rab lus 'joms nyon mongs pa//
70a3(rgyud 'bum): de bas shes rab b+ha gar brjod// de bas rtags ni ci yin brjod// rtags ni mtshan ma zhes byar bshad// blo ldan shes rab brtags las byung // byang chub sems ni thabs chen po// de ni
70a4(rgyud 'bum): rtags su rab tu bsgrags/ / b+ha gar ling ga bcug nas su// 'khor lo'i dngos grub bsgrub par bya// ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs gang yin// mkhas par sgo gnyis gzung bar bya// de
70a5(rgyud 'bum): ni bcug pa zhes bshad do/ / rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por 'gyur// de nas dgongs pa bshad pa yin// b+ha ga ru ni rdzas grub pa// gsang rgyud dbang po las gsungs bzhin// bsgrub pa dag ni
70a6(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar bya/ / b+ha gar gur kum phyung nas ni// mtshan ma yang ni gzhug par bya// rdzas rnams bzang po thob par 'gyur// rnam pa bzhi yang 'grub par 'gyur// b+ha ga pad+ma zhes byar brjod// mtshan
70a7(rgyud 'bum): ma rdo rje zhes bshad do/ / rdzas ni pad+ma'i steng gzhag nas// rdo rje srub mas bsgrub par bya// shin tu chags pas 'dod chags can// des ni gsang ba rab sgrub 'gyur// 'dod chags chags pa'i
70b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba yis/ / dngos grub chen por ji ltar 'gyur// 'dir ni chags can rab sgrub 'gyur// bden pa nyid du yang dag bshad// 'dod chags bral ba gsang ba med// des ni gsang ba
70b2(rgyud 'bum): 'grub mi 'gyur/ / dang ba'i dad pa chen po yis// gsang ba'i sbyor ba las byung chags// sgrub pa la ni 'jug 'gyur ba// de yis sgrub pa gdon mi za// chags dang bral ba'i sdig pa ni//
70b3(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig gsang ba chags bral 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub spong byed pa// sdig chen kha na ma tho che// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu spangad// chos la kha na ma tho med// de yis gsang ba rab
70b4(rgyud 'bum): 'grub 'gyur/ / rnam pa thams cad nyon mongs kun// 'joms pa 'dod chags mchog yin no// 'dod chags zhe sdang sogs nyon mongs// rtogs dang mtshungs pa'i chos med do// skye dgu kun
70b5(rgyud 'bum): bsad bsod nams ji lta bu/ / ji srid 'khor bar bcing bar du// srid pa zad par mi 'gyur ro// 'khor ba'i btson ra 'di ru ni// sems can kun gyis gzhom par bya// gang zhig gzhan
70b6(rgyud 'bum): gyi nor 'phrog pa/ / des ni gsang ba rab 'grub 'gyur// nor ni 'khor ba zhes bshad de// sems can de rnams nyon mongs 'gyur// gang zhig gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa// byang chub sems
70b7(rgyud 'bum): ni rab 'grub 'gyur/ / bud med rnams dang lhan cig rtse// des ni gsang ba 'grub par 'gyur// rang gi rigs kyi lha mo gang // rigs pa'i lha mo bla med dang // lhan cig rnal 'byor rol pa
71a1(rgyud 'bum): yis/ rol pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// gal te rigs ni 'grub 'dod na// brdzun pa'i tshig kyang smra bar bya// chos kun dngos po med pa ste// brjod min tshig gi
71a2(rgyud 'bum): spyod yul min/ / med pa gang zhig brdzun tshig ldan// rig pa'i bzlas pa bden pa yin// gal te dngos grub mchog ni sgrub 'dod na// sems can gsad bya de bzhin bza' bar bya// sem
71a3(rgyud 'bum): can chags pa zhes bshad de/ / ming dang gzugs la kun tu chags// bkug nas zos par gyur na ni// bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur// 'khor ba spangs kyang chos min 'gyur ba ni//
71a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor ba spong bar gang yin pa// sems can don la rgyab phyogs 'gyur// blo ldan theg pa dman dga' ba// de ni rtag tu nyes ldan yin// mya ngan 'das la mngon dga' na// sems can don
71a5(rgyud 'bum): la phyir phyogs 'gyur/ / blo ldan theg pa dman dga' ba// de ni rtag tu nyes ldan yin// sar sna can ni rigs sgrub 'gyur// tshul khrims rnam par dag 'gyur zhing // srog gi phyir yang
71a6(rgyud 'bum): gtong mi byed/ / rig pa'i brtul zhugs ldan 'gyur ba// des ni gsang ba rab sgrub 'gyur// drag dang ldan pa'i sems ldan pa// des ni 'grub par 'gyur bar 'dod// sdug bsngal thams
71a7(rgyud 'bum): cad gcod pa'i phyir/ / rtag tu drag po nyid du 'gyur// sdig pa sdang ba rnams spong na// nges ni gsang ba rab 'grub 'gyur// chos min spyod pa rnal 'byor mchog grub yin// gzung dang 'dzin pa chos
71b1(rgyud 'bum): shes pa/ / gang tshe spong bar gyur pa ni// rtag tu chos mchog spyod pa ste// des ni gsang ba rab 'grub 'gyur// srid gsum mngon par chags pas rnal 'byor sgrub// srid gsum la
71b2(rgyud 'bum): ni chags par 'gyur/ / sems tsam du ni rtogs pa'i phyir// do ni rnal 'byor sgrub pa yin// rtag tu 'dod pa'i 'dod chags rgyal 'gyur gang // gsang ba chen por brtan par sgrub pa yin//
71b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dod par bya ba 'dod pa ste// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags zhes bshad do// rab tu dga' la chags pa ste// blo ldan blo gros de la chags// gci ba khyor ba gang 'thungs nas// bshang ba cung zad bza'
71b4(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / thams cad dag pa'i brtul zhugs kyis// myur du dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur// gci ba rdo rje zhes bshad de// bshang ba pad+ma yang dag ldan// dga' ba'i chos la reg pas ni//
71b5(rgyud 'bum): denas thar pa'i grong khyer 'gro// rnal 'byor chen po b+ha ga 'thung // rnal 'byor rab tu sgrub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyis ye shes gang // b+ha ga yi ni sgra ru bsgrags// gang zhig bdud rtsi btung
71b6(rgyud 'bum): ba btung / / rdo rje 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur// bud med sdug dang lhan cig tu// dkyil 'khor chen po brtag par bya// rigs kyi lha mo rnal 'byor byung // rig pa sdug pa nyid yin te// dkyil
71b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gsang ba brtag byas na/ / skad cig de la rang grub 'gyur// khro zhing gtum pa drag po ste// rdo rje yi ni rigs su 'gyur// gang zhig sdug sngal rnam la khro// 'khor ba'i sbyor 'byung las sdang ba/
72a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rnal 'byor phun tshogs 'gyur// rigs ni nyams par 'gyur ba yin// dge ba thams cad spangs nas ni// chos min pa ni yang dag spyad// bya min byed pa'i rnal 'byor
72a2(rgyud 'bum): pas/ / las kyi dkyil 'khor 'a grub par 'gyur// rnam par rtog pa kun spangs nas// dge ba la ni rab tu 'jug/ chos la lta bar gyur pa nyid// chos min kun tu spyod mi spyad/
72a3(rgyud 'bum): bya min gang zhig dngos med de// de nyid brtag par byed par 'gyur// rnal 'byor chen po de lta bus// rtog pa chen pos rab 'grub 'gyur// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa'i drug pa gsang ba'i
72a4(rgyud 'bum): tshogs chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po shin tu pa'i rnal 'byor rdo rje rtse mo las/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i dgongs pa rnam par 'grel pa zhes bya ba rnam par bshad pa
72a5(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa rdzogs so/ / / rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba las// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos mchog gsang ba'i chos kyi mchog
72a6(rgyud 'bum): tu gsang ba'ang rdzogs so/ / / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// dus gsum gshegs pa sras bcas la// yang dang yang du phyug
72a7(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal nas/ mchog tu rmad byung rig pa'i rgyud// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// hUM a dza ka ra/ d+ha ra so d+ha ra sa/ oM a dran ha ha he wa ra/ d+hi d+ha d+ha/ d+hi d+hA ra Ni/ ma ho ho
72b1(rgyud 'bum): kakrA NaM/ ka ba tse d+hUH/ de la gsang ba mchog tu gsang // ye shes dam pa'i rang bzhin te// rgyal po gsang ba'i mdo dbang po// theg pa chen po kun tu bsdus// rigs 'byung blo
72b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan chen po dang / / sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ba dang // rdo rje kun dbang cho ga ni// shin tu rmad byung rab shad bya// ngo bo nyid kyi sku ru ni// sangs rgyas rdo rje can kun 'byung //
72b3(rgyud 'bum): rmad byung chos kyi rgyud chen po// thar pa mchog tu bstan pa ste// thub pa'i dbang phyug rnam snang mdzad// thugs ka'i nas ni rgyud 'di byung // kun tu bzang po'i rdo rje'i bdag/ phyag na
72b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i 'od po che/ / rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// don yod dbang phyug dam pa ste// theg pa chen po byang chub sems// bden pa dam tshig ces bya ba// thub pa chen po chos phung po// /
72b5(rgyud 'bum): stong phrag dag ni grangs med gsungs// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog chen gyis// chos kyi mngon par rtogs pa bshad// so sor rtog pa'i mngon rtogs dang // de bzhin mngon par byang chub dang //
72b6(rgyud 'bum): dpe byad mchog ni mngon du byung // de bzhin ye shes thob pa nyid// ye shes chen po'i chos 'di ni// sangs rgyas kyi ni mngon rtogs bshad// theg pa chen po mngon rtogs yin// shin tu
72b7(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i tshul chen po/ / rang sems so sor rtogs pa ni// byang chub sems dpa'i tshul chen po// pha rol phyin drug spyod pa mchog/ theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus// mthar thugs ste/
73a1(rgyud 'bum): sa chen po// sangs rgyas sa ni bla na med// theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs// ye shes thob par rtogs byed pa// spyod pa bcu yi byang chub che// pha rol phyin pa dam pa
73a2(rgyud 'bum): bcu/ / sa bcu kun tu rtogs pa ste// theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus// byang chub chen po rgya che ba// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i mchog/ kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs byang chub// theg
73a3(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po mngon par bsdus/ / mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga// sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med// theg pa chen po chos kyi mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // chos kyi gnas
73a4(rgyud 'bum): ni yongs su gyur/ / sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs kyi mchog/ tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu dag/ mkha' mnyam dang ni mtshungs pa yin// gnas ngan len ni kun las grol// rnam par rtog
73a5(rgyud 'bum): pa kun las grol/ / nyon mongs dri ma kun dag pa// dang por zla ba bzhin du mthong // thugs rje'i brtse ba yang dag byung // sems can yongs su 'dzin par byed// byang chub sems ni dag
73a6(rgyud 'bum): pa che/ / sangs rgyas zhing ni gos pa med// dge ba'i chos kyis kun tu gang // nyon mongs thams cad nges par 'joms// zla chen gang ba'i dbus su ni// byang chub zla ba gnyis pa ste// bas
73a7(rgyud 'bum): pa grangs med gsum byang chub/ / yang dag blangs las byung ba nyid// dam pa'i chos mchog grangs med pa// sbyin pa'i spyod pa mchog dang ldan// sa dang sa ru rtogs byed pa// ye shes dag pa dag
73b1(rgyud 'bum): pa med/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// de ni rdo rje shin tu brtan// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang yin// snang ba med cing gnas med pa// ma skyes ma byas dag pa ste/ skye dang 'jig
73b2(rgyud 'bum): pa rnam par spangs/ / mi tshig mi chod mi phyed pa// lhag ma med pa'i chos kyi sku// rdo rje'i bdag nyid yang dag byung // rdo rje'i sku ni bla na med// sku dang gsang ba de bzhin spyod// spyod yul kun
73b3(rgyud 'bum): tu rtogs pa dang / / lnga po de dag kun thun mong // sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid can// mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga// chos kyi ye shes bla na med// lnga po de dag gsang zhes bya// snying por
73b4(rgyud 'bum): yang ni de dag gsungs/ / gang phyir don kun grub pa'i phyir// sngon ni don kun grub par byed// bcom ldan kun tu bzang po dang // rdo rje'i las ni bla na med// rdo rje'i dbyings ni brtan pa'i bdag/
73b5(rgyud 'bum): rnam par snang mdzad bla na med// de dag gsung ba'i mtshan yin te// rnal 'byor gyi ni gnas skabs thob// de nas snying po ni/ oM tsit+ta pra ti bo d+haM ka ro mi/ oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pA da ya mi/
73b6(rgyud 'bum): / oM taSh+Tha badz+ra/ oM badz+ra At+ma ko haM/ oM ya thA sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sta thA a haM/ de nas sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// thub pa yi ni thugs kar bzhugs// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi
73b7(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / rdo rje'i rig pa 'di brjod do// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a b+hi saM bo d+hi dri D+ha badz+ra tiSh+Tha/ sangs rgyas grags chen thams cad kyis// rig pa 'di ni brjod pas na// rnam par snang mdzad
74a1(rgyud 'bum): thub chen po/ / de nyid ye shes mngon sangs rgyas// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad ni// nyid kyi thugs las byung bar gyur// chos bzhi'i rnal 'byor chen po ni//
74a2(rgyud 'bum): byin nas lha mo dbang bskur 'gyur// sems can don kun yang dag ldan// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed// mkha' mtshungs brjod las yang dag byung // rin chen chen pos
74a3(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes dang // shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// rnam kun mkhyen nyid ye shes che// 'jig rten dbang phyug chen po byin// bya ba kun la don
74a4(rgyud 'bum): yod pa/ / dga' ldan la sogs rnam par 'phrul// gdul bar bya ba thabs kyi las// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba gang // byang chub sems
74a5(rgyud 'bum): ni tshul chen po/ / nyon mongs kun las rnam par grol// sangs rgyas gtso bo chen pos byin// dbang bskur tsam gyis mod la ni// gsang ba'i ming ni yang dag byung // sangs rgyas kun bdag
74a6(rgyud 'bum): / rgyal po ste// kun mchog dbang bskur dam pa'o// de nas snying po ni/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta e shwa dz+ya a b+hi She ka hUM/ de nas sangs rgyas rgyal po che// chos ni mngon sum gyur mdzad pa//
74a7(rgyud 'bum): stug po'i gnas nas gshegs nas ni// sangs rgyas lhan cig sna tshogs che// rnal 'byor dang bcas bdag nyid che// rdo rje dbang po'i gnas su gshegs// de nas ngo bo nyid sku las//
74b1(rgyud 'bum): slar yang byung ba spros par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las chen po// ji bzhin sngon gyi rjes 'brangs nas// rdo rje'i dbus su bzhugs par 'gyur// sngon gyi sangs rgyas mdzad pa bzhin/
74b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi ni mdzad pa bstan// gsang ba rol pa'i 'khor lo ru// sku ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid che// sna tshogs rnal 'byor bdag nyid che//
74b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo thams cad bzhugs par 'gyur// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad du// ji bzhin sngon gyi rjes 'brangs nas// sangs rgyas rol pa yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas ston pa bzhugs
74b4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / dus gsum ye shes rjes mthun ni// sangs rgyas kyi ni rnal 'byor brjod// hUM badz+ra satwa/ oM badz+ra rAt+na/ d+hI badz+ra d+harma/ a badz+ra kar+m+ma/ bskul pa grangs med gsum sngon
74b5(rgyud 'bum): du/ / bcom ldan byang chub mdzad pa gang // rnal 'byor sems dpa' bzhir bcas pa'i// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor snang bar bgyi/ byang chub chen po chos kyi mchog/ byang chub sems ni tshul chen po// rdo rjes sra
74b6(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin gyi/ / zla ba yi ni dkyil 'khor snang // pha rol phyin pa spyad pa ni// sngon du bcom ldan spyad pa gang // rdo rje rin chen sbyar ba yis// zla ba yi ni dkyil 'khor snang // theg pa chen po
74b7(rgyud 'bum): mngon par rtogs/ / chos kyi mchog ni rab rtogs pa// rdo rje chos kyi sbyor ba yis// zla ba yi ni dkyil 'khor snang // sems can smin cing grol bar byed// sangs rgyas mdzad pa rab tu 'jug
75a1(rgyud 'bum): brtson 'grus dang ldan las chen po/ / zla ba yi ni dkyil 'khor snang // byang chub sems ni gsang chen po/ bsod nams tshogs dang shes rab dang // byang chub
75a2(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa rab sbyor ba/ / rgyal po bzhi ni rab tu 'byung // go cha'i sbyor ba gang yin dang // spyod pa de bzhin mngon rtogs te// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub che// rgyal po bzhi ni
75a3(rgyud 'bum): rnam par byung / / byang chub snying po mngon rtogs dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur dang // chos kyi 'khor los btul ba dang // rgyal po bzhi ni rnam par byung // chos mchog
75a4(rgyud 'bum): mngon par rtogs pa dang / / ting nge 'dzin sgo gzungs dang ni// sangs rgyas thams cad thabs chen po// rgyal po bzhi ni rnam par byung // rgyal chen rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang // de
75a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin chos ni mngon rdzogs dang / / chos mchog byang chub chen po dang // rnam pa bzhi ni yongs su byung // mgon po thugs ka nas spros nas// rgyal po bzhi ni rnam par byung // phyogs
75a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams thams cad kun nas ni/ / sa ni thams cad g.yos byas nas// phyogs rnams thams cad kun nas ni// 'od kyis snang bas gsal bar byas// mgon chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/
75a7(rgyud 'bum): ched du brjod pa ched brjod do// e ma'o gsang ba'i chos chen po// e ma'o ye shes bla na med// e ma'o rol pa'i 'khor lo'o// e ma'o sangs rgyas rmad byung che// e ma'o sangs
75b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas thabs chen po/ / e ma'o ngo mtshar ldan pa nyid// mi snang rang bzhin chos rnams ni// 'di ni gnang ba bcas par dmigs// rgyal po rnal 'byor che de rnams// phyogs rnams kun
75b2(rgyud 'bum): tu gsal byed cing / / chos kyi sku yi ting 'dzin brnyes// nam mkha' dang mtshungs rmad byung ba// gang zhig shar gyi phyogs cha ru// sangs rgyas grags pa chen po kun// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che//
75b3(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi dbyings su yang dag spros// chos kyi sku ru spros nas ni// chos kyi dbyings ni stug por 'gyur// gang phyir shar du yang dag byung // mi skyod pa ni bdag nyid byas// lho ru rdo rje rin chen te// nub tu
75b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje chos yin no/ / byang du rdo rje las nyid de// chos kyi sku ru ldan par gyur// ma lus mchog tu brtan pa yi// sangs rgyas thams cad phyogs bzhi ru// mi skyod rdo rje rin chen dbang // don yod grub pa rma
75b5(rgyud 'bum): na med/ / rgyal po bzhi ni phyogs bzhi ru// rdo rje'i steng du bzhugs par 'gyur// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams bzhi dag tu// mnyam par dmigs nas bzhugs par 'gyur// rdo rje rnal 'byor rgyal po
75b6(rgyud 'bum): che/ / sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag bsdus// chos dbyings bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid// gang ba kun tu khyab par bsdus// dbus su mgon po rnam snang mdzad// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang bskur ba//
75b7(rgyud 'bum): phyogs dang mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kun// bstan par mdzad nas rab tu bzhugs// gdug pa kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal// thub pa'i skyes mchog mi bskyod pa// sangs rgyas thams cad brtan mdzad nas//
76a1(rgyud 'bum): shar gyi phyogs su yang dag bzhugs// dbang bskur ba ni rgyal po che// nam mkha' thub pa'i skyes mchog ni// sangs rgyas thams cad brtan mdzad nas// lho yi phyogs su bzhugs par 'gyur// dag
76a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i chos 'dzin rgyal po che/ / chos 'dzin gtso bo chen po ni// sangs rgyas thams cad bstan mdzad nas// nub kyi phyogs su bzhugs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas mdzad pa 'dzin rgyal po// don yod grub pa
76a3(rgyud 'bum): bla na med/ / sangs rgyas thams cad brtan mdzad nas// byang gi phyogs su bzhugs par 'gyur// mi bskyod rdo rje sems dpa' ste// mkha' snying rin chen 'byung ldan yin// 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od dpag
76a4(rgyud 'bum): med/ / rdo rje las ni don yod grub// gsang zhing shin tu gsang ba mchog/ chos dbyings brtan pa gang yin pa// de nyid mgon po rnam snang mdzad// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag por bshad// sangs
76a5(rgyud 'bum): / rgyas thams cad phyogs bzhi ru// sbyin pa bzhi ni rab tu bshad// phyogs mtshams drug ni brtan mdzad nas// rnam par snang mdzad yang dag ldan// shar gyi sangs rgyas dbang phyug rgyal// rdo rje
76a6(rgyud 'bum): / sems dpa' 'jigs mi mnga'// thub pa mi skyong snang ba des// snying po bzhi ni gsung bar 'gyur// hUM badz+ra satwa/ dza badz+ra rA dza/ ho badz+ra rA ga/ sa badz+ra sA d+hu/ dam tshig sems dpa' zhes bya
76a7(rgyud 'bum): pab/ / de bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' sogs// 'jigs pa mi mnga' sems dpa' bzhi// mgon po yi ni thugs las byung // phyag na rdo rje bzang po mchog/ rdo rje lcags kyu chen po bsnams// rdo rje chags
76b1(rgyud 'bum): pa bdud chen po/ / rdo rje legs pa rdzu 'phrul che// rdo rje rgyal po bzhi thub pa// thub pa'i thugs ka nas byung ba// grangs bzhi dang ni ldan pa dag/ 'khor lo'i rim gyis zhugs par gyur// rdo rje rin chen
76b2(rgyud 'bum): skal ba che/ / rin chen 'byung ldan rab grags pa// lha yi bdag po sangs rgyas ches// snying po bzhi ni gsungs par gyur// oM badz+ra rat+na/ oM badz+ra te dzaM/ traM badz+ra ke tu/ ha badz+ra hA sa/ rdo rje rin chen stobs
76b3(rgyud 'bum): po che/ / grangs bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// rin chen rgyal po las byung ba// thub pa'i thugs ka nas byung ba// rdo rje rin chen rin po che// rdo rje gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul che// rdo rje rgyal mtshan shin tu mthong // rdo rje bzhad pa rdzu
76b4(rgyud 'bum): 'phrul che/ / de dag re re las kyang ni// rgyal po grangs med rab tu byung // g.yas dang g.yon dang rgyab dag dang // dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun du bzhugs// dag pa'i chos ni ye shes che// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag
76b5(rgyud 'bum): med/ / shes rab pha rol phyin dag pas// snying po bzhi ni gsungs par gyur// hrIHbadz+ra d+harma/ d+hIHbadz+ra tIk+Sh+Na baM badz+ra he tu/ raM badz+ra b+ha ta/ chos kyi rgyal po bzhi yang ni// mgon po'i thugs
76b6(rgyud 'bum): ka nas byung ba/ / sems can kun la phan don du// 'khor lo rim bzhin bzhugs par gyur// chos rnams kun la don yod pa// spyod pa yis ni slob dpon mchog/ don yod grub pa rgyal po che// snying
76b7(rgyud 'bum): po bzhi ni gsungs par gyur/ / kaM badz+ra karma/ haM badz+ra rak+Sha/ hUM badz+ra yak+Sha/ baM badz+ra muSh+Ti/ kun kyang 'khor lo yang dag ldan// ye shes dag pa mchog gi rnams// sangs rgyas rnam
77a1(rgyud 'bum): 'phrul 'khor lo na/ / chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mchog/ sngon gyi byang chub sems gang ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par byung // bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po ni// rdo rje
77a2(rgyud 'bum): rin chen nyid du 'gyur/ / shes rab pha rol phyin dag pa// de ni rdo rje chos mchog ldan// thabs la mkhas pas 'khor lo ni// rdo rje las su rnam par 'phrul// de nas chos ni rdzogs sangs rgyas// /
77a3(rgyud 'bum): chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rten// byung gyur byung dang 'byung bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas mdzad pa bla na med// byang chub sems ni mchog tu 'dzin// dag pa'i chos kyis 'dul mdzad pa// chos kyi
77a4(rgyud 'bum): dbyings kyi snying po che/ / dbu ma'i chos las rnam par byung // gzhan yang rjes su brtse dang de bzhin sbyin// shes rab thabs dang yang dag ldan// chos kyi rgyal po bzhi po de// rnam par snang mdzad thugs
77a5(rgyud 'bum): las byung / / 'du shes 'du shes med pa min// btags pa ma yin gnas pa med// bdag dang chos nyid lta ba min// rnam rtog las ni byung ba min// ngo bo nyid kyi sku ru ni// so sor snang ba yang dag
77a6(rgyud 'bum): byung / / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yis ni// chos kyi longs spyod 'di lta bu// thams cad brjod pa dang bral zhing // zhi dang phra ba blta bar dka'// sangs rgyas rnams ni dgongs mdzad cing /
77a7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mthong bar 'gyur// de nyid theg pa che rang bzhin// mdzod chen po yi rang bzhin mchog/ shes rab chen po thabs chen po// theg pa chen po'i mngon par bsdus// sangs
77b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas ye shes mngon par rtogs/ / sngon du bcom ldan mdzad gang yin// sems dpa' bzhi po de rnams te// theg chen mngon par rtogs par 'dod// byang chub kyi ni sems de las// thub pa mi
77b2(rgyud 'bum): bskyod rnam par byung / / sems de yang ni rnam pa bzhi// rnam pa bzhi ni yang dag byung // byang chub sems dpa' de rdo rje// rdo rje phyag na rdo rje yin// sgrol dang grol dang dbugs 'byin pa// lcags
77b3(rgyud 'bum): kyu 'dzin pa rab tu gnas/ / sems dpa' bstan pa don yod pa// ye shes de nyid shin tu chags// slar yang bstan par bya ba'i phyir// legs pa las ni yang dag byung // gang zhig mgon po thub 'byin
77b4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / sems can rjes su 'dzin mdzad pa// rin cher 'byung ldan zhes bya ba// de ni slar yang rnam pa bzhi// chos kyi sbyin pa rin po che// mi 'jigs gzi brjid yang dag gnas// byams pa rgyal mtshan
77b5(rgyud 'bum): yang dag brjod/ / zang zing bzhad par yang dag ldan// shes rab pha rol phyin rgyal po// tshe dpag med ni rnam pa bzhi// so sor rig pa mngon par rdzogs// ting nge 'dzin sgo pad+ma can// sdug bsngal
77b6(rgyud 'bum): gcod pa shin tu no/ / chos kyi 'khor lo tshe dang ldan// sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam 'phrul gzhan// brjod du med pa'i chos kyi mchog/ don yod grub pa mdzad pa ste// thabs de yang ni rnam pa bzhi/
77b7(rgyud 'bum): sems can la sogs 'dul ba las// rdo rje las ni mchod pa che// theg pa gzhan du mi 'jug pa// rdo rje srung bar rab tu brjod// gdug pa 'dul zhing nges byed pa// phyir mi ldog pa khu tshur yin//
78a1(rgyud 'bum): de nas 'di rnams kyi gsang ba'i mtshan ni rdo rje sems dpa'// rdo rje rgyal po/ rdo rje chags pa/ rdo rje legs pa/ rdo rje rin chen/ rdo rje gzi brjid/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan//
78a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje bzhad pa/ rdo rje chos/ rdo rje rnon po/ rdo rje rgyu/ rdo rje smra ba/ rdo rje las/ rdo rje srung ba/ rdo rje gnod sbyin/ rdo rje khu tshur/ de la dang po ni rdo rje sems dpa'/ rdo rje chos/ rdo rje rin chen
78a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje las/ de nas rnam grangs mi bskyod pa/ rin chen 'byung ldan/ 'od dpag tu med pa/ don yod par grub pa/ de nas 'di rnams gsang ba'i snying po ni/ hUM/ oM A ha/ rgyal po'i snying po
78a4(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / oM hUM hrIhaM/ bcu drug gi snying po ni/ hUM dza ho sa/ oM A traM ha/ oM d+ha~M maM raM/ kaM haM hUM baM/ shin tu gsang ba'i rgyud chen po 'di'i pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa rnam pa bcu drug tu yang dag par
78a5(rgyud 'bum): byung ba gang yin pa de ni rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa'o/ / byang chub spyod pa'i mthu yis ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyi pha rol byon// de nas pha rol phyin ldan pa// rdo rje sems mar brjod par bya// bsdu ba
78a6(rgyud 'bum): yi ni dngos po bzhi/ / so sor rtog pa mngon par rdzogs// chos bzhi gcig tu gyur pa ni// rdo rje rin chen ma ru brjod// gsang ba'i chos kyi ye shes ni// de nyid pha rol phyin pa mchog/ pha rol phyin pa
78a7(rgyud 'bum): che las byung / / rdo rje chos mar brjod par bya// sbyor ba yang dag shes pa gang / rdo rje las mar brjod par bya// rgyal po pha rol phyin bzhi ni// rdo rje pha rol phyin pa mchog/ gang phyir rnam par rol pa mchog
78b1(rgyud 'bum): sgeg mo sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin/ / rgyan pa'i lus can yid 'phrog pa// 'phreng ma tshul khrims pha rol phyin// ched du brjod pa ched du brjod// glu ma bzod pa'i pha rol phyin// myur du sangs rgyas ster byed
78b2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / gar ma brtson 'grus pha rol phyin// 'dod pa'i 'dam gyis ma gos pa// me tog bsam gtan pha rol phyin// kun tu mtshungs par 'gro ba yi// bdug pa shes rab pha rol phyin// dring mi dge las
78b3(rgyud 'bum): phyir phyogs/ / thabs ni dri dang yang dag ldan// phyogs rnams kun tu snang byed pa// smon lam snang ba chen mo yin// thob pa'i pha rol phyin zhes pa// stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa mchog/ mi shes mun pa 'jos
78b4(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ / lha mo ye shes pha rol phyin// bdud rnams thams cad pham byed pa// lha mo mi thub pha rol phyin// byang chub rdzogs pa'i byang chub che// rdo rje pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
78b5(rgyud 'bum): mdzad ma/ bdag med chos kyi rang bzhin mchog/ rdo rje'i lha mo yang dag byung // rdo rje pha rol phyin pa mchog/ de nas 'di rnams kyi gsang ba'i ming ni rdo rje sems ma// rdo rje rin chen ma/ rdo rje chos ma/
78b6(rgyud 'bum): rdorje las ma// rdo rje sgeg mo/ rdo rje 'phreng ba ma// rdo rje glu ma/ rdo rje gar ma/ rdo rje me tog ma/ rdo rje bdug pa ma// rdo rje dri ma/ rdo rje mar me ma/ rdo rje tho ba ma/ rdo rje ye shes ma/ rdo rje mi
78b7(rgyud 'bum): thub ma/ rdo rje las ma/ sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen po// rnam pa bzhir ni rab tu 'jug/ sems can dgug pa'i thabs chen po// rdo rje lcags kyu zhes byar bshad// byang chub spyod pa la spyod la/
79a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje zhags par rab tu bsgrags// theg pa gzhan la 'dod med pa// de ni rdo rje lcags sgrogs bshad// chos rnams thams cad skye ba med// rab tu 'ang gsal gzed nas na/
79a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje theg pa theg chen po// rdo rje dril bu zhes byar brjod// de nas 'di rnams kyi gsang ba'i ming dag ni rdo rje lcags kyu/ rdo rje zhags pa/ rdo rje lcags sgrog/ rdo rje dril bu/ de nas pha rol tu phyin pa'i
79a3(rgyud 'bum): thabs kyi 'khor lo de dag thams cad kyi snying po ni/ hUM traM hrI ho/ rdo rje pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi'o// dzaHhUM baM soH/ 'khor lo'i rol pa la gnas pa// sa sa rgyas rnal 'byor 'di yis ni/
79a4(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi longs spyod rdo rje can// chos sku bla na med par 'gyur// dbus kyi sangs rgyas sangs rgyas bzhi// 'khor lo lnga dang yang dag ldan// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun// rnal 'byer ting 'dzin thong
79a5(rgyud 'bum): / mdzad pa// re re zhing yang rdo rje ni// grangs med pas kyang yongs su bskor// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs las byung // dag pa'i chos kyi tshul chen po// de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni/ oM satwa badz+rA/
79a6(rgyud 'bum): oM rat+na badz+ri/ oM d+har+m+ma badz+r-IM/ oM karma badz+rI/ oM badz+ra lA s+ye/ oM badz+ra mA le/ oM badz+ra gI ti/ oM badz+ra nr-i ti/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe/ oM badz+ra d+hU be/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he/ oM badz+ra A lo ke/ oM badz+ra aM ku sha
79a7(rgyud 'bum): oM badz+ra pA sha/ oM bidz+ri sngoH/ oM badz+ra g+har+b+he/ de nas 'di dag thams cad kyi thun mong gi snying po ni/ hUM/ mgon po rnam par snang mdzad che// 'khor los sgyur ba chen po bzhi// sems dpa'
79b1(rgyud 'bum): chen po bcu drug dang / / gsang chen lha mo bcu gnyis dang // sgo srungs pa ni bzhi bdag ste// sum cu rtsa bdun las mi nyung // gsang ba'i lha mo bzhi po ni// phyis kyi pha rol phyin pa mchog
79b2(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i lha mo kun las ni/ / rjes thogs nyid du yang dag byung // byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid ches// sum cu rtsa bdun grangs mi bya// rnam par snang mdzad thugs ka nas// chos kyi rigs
79b3(rgyud 'bum): mchog yang dag byung / / byang chub sems las kun tu byung // mi bskyod la sogs tshogs chen po// nga yis rdo rje rigs su brjod// phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid che// sbyin pa'i spyod pa kun tu byung //
79b4(rgyud 'bum): rin chen 'byung ldan la sogs pa// nga yis rin chen rigs su bshad// rin chen rdo rje bdag nyid che// sbyin pa spyod pa kun tu byung // dag pa'i chos la kun tu byung // tshe dpag med pa la sogs pa
79b5(rgyud 'bum): de ni pad+ma'i rigs su bshad/ / rdo rje chos ni bdag nyid che// grub pa'i las las kun tu byung // don yod grub pa la sogs las// de ni las kyi rigs su bshad// nam mkha'i mdzod ni las chen
79b6(rgyud 'bum): po/ rdo rje ji bzhin lha mo yang // lha mo ji bzhin bstan te 'dra// ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin zhi// ji ltar zhi ba de bzhin byung // rdo rje sems dpa' mi bskyod mtshungs// shar gyi phyogs su yang dag
79b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs/ / rdo rje rin chen rin chen mchog/ lho yi phyogs su yang dag bzhugs// rgyal po 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon// nub kyi phyogs su yang dag bzhugs// bya ba kun la don yod pa//
80a1(rgyud 'bum): byang phyogs su ni bzhugs par 'gyur// dbus su mgon po rnam snang mdzad// kun mkhyen ye shes rnal 'byor che// zla ba gang ba bzhin du zhi// rdo rje 'khor lo bla na med/
80a2(rgyud 'bum): gang phyir kun tu sngon 'gro ba// rdo rje byang chub sems don ldan// de las spyod pa de las chos// de las spyod pa spyad dka' ba// sems dpa' chen po bla med pa// rdo rje rnal 'byor bzhugs par
80a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas kun gyis gsung gcig gis// mgon po la ni gsol ba btab// thub pa'i dbang phyug rdo rje sems// mgon po la ni gsol ba 'debs// rdzogs pa'i byang chub khyod rag
80a4(rgyud 'bum): lus/ / khyod la brten nas de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun// khyod la brten nas byung bar gyur// dang po'i thugs ni rnal 'byor che// byang sems shin tu rnyed dka' ba//
80a5(rgyud 'bum): kye ma sems can 'di sdug bsngal// sangs rgyas chos kyi snod min pa// sems can kun gyi don ched du// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dam pa gsungs// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// kun mchog
80a6(rgyud 'bum): gnas kyi dbang phyug gis/ / mgon po'i gsung ni gsan nas su// 'khor lo'i sbyor ba gsung bar 'gyur// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// 'khor lo chen po grong khyer che// sangs rgyas kun gyi
80a7(rgyud 'bum): thugs las byung / / snying po'i chos mchog rnal 'byor ldan// sangs rgyas rdo rje'i bstan pa yis// sems can 'di dag gdul bya min// de rnams bde ba'i don ched du// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ba/
80b1(rgyud 'bum): bar bya// rdo rje slob dpon cho ga'i tshul// bdag nyid ji bzhin rnal 'byor bras// sangs rgyas byang chub thob 'gyur ba// de la dang por rab bshad bya// de ru sems can thams can kun// shin tu/
80b2(rgyud 'bum): brtan par rab 'jug na// sangs rgyas byang chub rdo rje nyid// thob 'gyur de la the tshom med// theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus// sangs rgyas byang chub shin tu gsang // thar pa mchog tu bstan pa
80b3(rgyud 'bum): nyid/ / sngon du gzhung mchog mnyan par bya// bskal pa brgya phrag dag tu ni// ci ste mngon par brtson byas kyang // gang zag bzhi ni 'jig rten du// bsgrubs kyang 'grub pa nyid mi 'gyur// byang chub
80b4(rgyud 'bum): sems ni ma skyes dang / / the tshom ldan pa nyid dang ni// bka' bzhin du ni mi byed pa// dad pa med nyid 'grub mi 'gyur// ji ltar dus gsum gshegs de bzhin// byang chub tu ni sems bskyed nas//
80b5(rgyud 'bum): dkon mchog gsum la dad byas te// the tshom med par byed pa'i cho ga/ khyim pa dang ni rab tu byung // phyogs ni gnyis po 'dis bsgrub bya// ji ltar 'os shing 'tsham pa ru// go rims bzhin du
80b6(rgyud 'bum): rab bshad bya/ / byang chub sems ni lhur blangs nas// lha gzhan 'dod pa brtson mi bya// dkon mchog gsum la dang bya ste// de gsol ba la brtson par bya// srog gcod rku dang 'khrig pa dang /
80b7(rgyud 'bum): brdzun dang myos byed rnam par spang // khyim pa'i sdom pa la gnas nas// de tshe rig pa'i rgyal po bsgrub// gal te de ni rab byung gyur// sdom pa gsum la yang dag gnas// so so thar dang byang chub
81a1(rgyud 'bum): sems/ / rig 'dzin sdom pa mchog yin no// zla ba 'am yang na lo re'o// de bzhin yang na lo gcig tu// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// sngon du rig pa'i brtul zhugs bya/
81a2(rgyud 'bum): nyin re zhing ni ci nus par// thun gsum du ni che ga sgrub// rtog pa 'di ni thun bzhi ru// ji ltar 'os shing 'tsham par ni// sdig pa thams cad bshags par bya// bsod nams kun la rjes yi rang //
81a3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun la gsol ba gdab// de yi bsod nams byang chub bsngo// de bzhin phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi// sangs rgyas bla med thams cad la// gsol ba gdab cing rab btud nas//
81a4(rgyud 'bum): zhabs la mnyam gzhag phyag bya'o// ji skad gzhung rgya che las gsungs// phyag rgya bzhi ni sbyor ba yis// rgyud gzhan dag ni thams cad kyi// rdo rje'i sngags ni rab brjod bya// de la snying po ni 'di yin
81a5(rgyud 'bum): te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza pas+tha nA ya At+ma naM nir+yA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza a b+hi She kA ya At+ma naM nir+yA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa
81a6(rgyud 'bum): maM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza pra brta nA ya At+ma naM nir+yA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+harma pra bar+t+ta ya maM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza karma Ne At+ma naM nir+ya tra yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra karma ku ru mAM/ phyag rgya dang
81a7(rgyud 'bum): bcas cho gar ldan/ / yang dag nyid du rab bshad bya// sor mo thams cad sbyar ba ni// rdo rje thal mo rab tu brjod// sa phyogs gtsang mar 'dug nas ni// mkhas pas yan lag kun phyag bya/
81b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje thal mo brkyang nas ni// rgyal ba rnams la dbul bar bya// mgo bos de bzhin byas nas ni// mkhas pas dpral bas phyag bya'o// mgo bos nas ni phab byas nas// de bzhin kha yis phyag
81b2(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / de bzhin snying khar gzhag byas nas// spyi bo nas ni phyag bya'o// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rdo rje rnal 'byor pas phyag bya// slar yang cho ga la gnas te// mchod pas cho ga dang ldan
81b3(rgyud 'bum): pa/ spos dang me tog mar me dang // dri dang 'phreng ba byug pa ni// sangs rgyas rjes su dran byas nas// sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin// sbyin pa rnam bzhi'i sbyor ba yis// ci nus par ni
81b4(rgyud 'bum): mkhas pas dbul/ / gtsang zhing gtsang ma'i gos dang ldan// gtsang ma'i grogs dang lhan cig tu// rdo rje'i sdom pa bla med pa// bslab pa'i gnas ni blang bar bya// sbyin pa rnam bzhi'i sbyor ba yis/
81b5(rgyud 'bum): da cing de la rab gzhol bya// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang // slob dpon yang ni phyi ma yin// nyin re zhing ni ci nus par// khrus bzhi dag ni rab tu bya// rnal 'byor ji ltar khrus bya ba// gau rims
81b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du rab tu bshad/ / sdom pa gsum la rab tu gnas// dang po khrus su brjod pa yin// gnyis pa rgyud las gsung ba yi// bshags dang gsol ba 'debs la sogs// phyag rgya bcing
81b7(rgyud 'bum): ba gsum pa ste/ / bzhi pa chu ste tha ma yin// khrus kyi cho ga 'di yis ni// mkhas pas 'dir ni khrus bya'o// gos ni lan gsum brje ba yi// sgrub pa pos ni cho ga bya// sdom pa la ni legs gnas pa//
82a1(rgyud 'bum): gos ni dang por brje ba dang // gnyis pa cho ga sgrub pa dang // gsum pa ngo tsha khrel yod pa// gtsang ma'i gos ni gsum po dag/ lan gsum du ni brje bar bya// gang la
82a2(rgyud 'bum): kha na ma tho med/ / thams cad bza' zhing bsten par bya// sha dang chang dang sgog pa sogs// bza' ba min pa rnam par spang // dri nga ba dang mi gtsang nyid// bza' dang btung ba rnam par spang // bzhin la
82a3(rgyud 'bum): gnod pa dang ldan pa/ / lus kyi phyir yang bya ba min// 'khrig pa bdun dang yang dag ldan// mi sdug sgom pas spang bar bya// yid gzhungs mkhas shing gsal ba dang // theg pa chen po'i don sems
82a4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / byang chub sems dpa'i tshul rgya che// shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs// klog pa dang ni bsam pa dang // yang dang yang du gsol ba gdab// dgra dang grogs dang bar ma la// sems snyoms
82a5(rgyud 'bum): mi 'jigs rab tu byin/ / snyan cing bden par smra ba yis// zhe sdang 'joms byed byams pa sgom// chos dang gang zag bdag med cing // 'dus byas dang ni 'khrul pa tsam// blo ldan brtan pas
82a6(rgyud 'bum): brtag par bya/ / 'dus byas kun la rmongs mi bya// 'tsho ba'i srog gis phyir yang ni// byang chub sems ni dor mi bya// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya rnams// nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// byang chub ste//
82a7(rgyud 'bum): gang de rdo rje// shes rab dril bu zhes bya gzhan// slob dpon la ni brnyas mi bya// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// sbyor ba lhod par mi bya zhing // cho ga ston pa lhur blang bya// pha rol phyin drug spyod
82b1(rgyud 'bum): ba la/ / go rims bzhin du bslab par bya// sems can gyi ni don ldan pas// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad// kha na ma tho chung ngu yang // srog ni btang snyoms dor mi bya// khyim pa 'am rab tu
82b2(rgyud 'bum): byung ba'ang rung / / 'dris pa thams cad rnam par spang // bu dang chung ma dag la yang // srid pa'i bcing ba las grol bya// brkam zhing chags la snang ba dang // rmongs shing le lo ldan pa'ang min//
82b3(rgyud 'bum): bag yod shin tu brtson pa yis// rnal 'byor cho ga bsgrub par bya// lta ba kun las rnam par grol// de nyid las ni legs par mthong // dag zhing dgongs pa bshad pa yis// don shes don
82b4(rgyud 'bum): ni rtogs par 'gyur/ / rigs dang mi rigs cho ga shes// de nyid rnal 'byor shin tu mkhas// brtse ldan byang chub spyod par ldan// spyod pa rnams la rab tu mkhas// de 'dra'i tshul ni
82b5(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs dang / / de lta bu yi sgrub pa yis// dngos grub dang ni thar pa thob// dngos grub kun la the tsom med// gnas dang gos dang bza' ba yi// lhag pa thams cad rnam par spang // lha
82b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams bgom par mi bya zhing / / bya ba ma yin thams cad spang // le lo med par nyin re zhing // bsrung ba yi ni cho ga bya// bgegs med 'jigs par mi bya ste// rang sems 'di ni gdul bar
82b7(rgyud 'bum): dka'/ / pha dang ma ru 'dzin pa dang // bram ze dge slong de dag 'dra// dag cing dul la zhi ba dang // bsdams shing thar par shes pa dang // rgyal srid mtho ris longs spyod min// 'dod pa'i long/
83a1(rgyud 'bum): spyod 'phel phyir min// gzhan du sems can don gyi phyir// rdzogs pa'i byang chub nges byas pa// zas kyi tshod ni shes pa dang // mtshan mo gnyid kyang sad par bya/
83a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags skyon la sogs pa gzhan// sems kyis rnam par mi brtag go// sems ni rab tu dang byas nas// g.yo ba med cing nges byas pas// legs par smra zhing rab tu 'byed// chos ni nges par don
83a3(rgyud 'bum): gnyer byed/ / mngon spyod kyi ni bya ba bzhin// sems can gnod dang 'tshe mi bya// nyes ldan gdug pa'i sems can rnams// dkyil 'khor du ni gzhug mi bya// lha yi sku dang phyag mtshan dang // lha yi
83a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhon pa dag dang ni/ / dman ma lha yi grib ma dang // lha yi mtshan ma thams cad dang // bza' ba dag ni sna tshogs pa// mtshan ma'i gzugs su byas pa dang // bgom par mi bya bza' mi bya//
83a5(rgyud 'bum): nam yang brdzi bar mi bya'o// dkon mchog gsum dang 'brel ba'i zas// nam yang nye bar longs mi spyad// tha na phul dang dman ma yi// dri yang bsnam par mi bya'o// ri bo'am ni nags kyi nang //
83a6(rgyud 'bum): gtsang zhing yid 'ong dben pa 'am// chu bo'i 'gram mam skyed mos tshal// ne'u gsing shin tu yid 'ong ngam// lha khang gtsang ma nyams dga' 'am// khang pa gtsang ma dben pa 'am// gang du tshogs
83a7(rgyud 'bum): pa med pa ru/ / sangs rgyas la dmigs sems kyis ni// gtsang ma'i grogs dang lhan cig tu// de 'dra'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// thar pa mchog tu bstan pa nyid// rig pa'i brtul zhugs yang
83b1(rgyud 'bum): dag brtsam/ / thun bzhi dag tu sbyor ba yis// mgon po mchog la phyag bya zhing // sangs rgyas rjes dran sgom pa pos// bshags pa la sogs de bya'o// mchod pa nyid kyang ci nus bya'o//
83b2(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang phyag rgya yang dag bcing // mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad ni// phyogs kun tu ni yang dag spro// sa gzhi dag ni ma lus nyid// kun nas rin chen shing ldan dang // rnam pa sna
83b3(rgyud 'bum): tshogs mchog ldan dang / / rgyal ba rnams la dbul bar bya// me tog shing dang bdug pa dang // dri yi tshogs ni yid 'ong dang // rin chen rang bzhin rgya mtsho ni// thub pa'i dbang phyug rnams la
83b4(rgyud 'bum): dbul/ / de nas phyogs rnams thams cad du// me tog bdug pa la sogs sprin// rol mo'i tshogs ni yid 'ong ba// mchod pa'i sprin ni rnam par bsam// mchod pa thams cad rab byed
83b5(rgyud 'bum): pa/ rig pa'i rgyal chen 'di rnams dang // phyag rgya dag kyang yongs gsal ba'i// bsamra pa yi ni gzung bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM sarba ta
83b6(rgyud 'bum): thA ga ta thik+Sha pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+ha pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ya hUM/ gang du rgya chen me tog dang // bdug pa dang ni dr-i yi tshogs// de bzhin kun tu yang dag
83b7(rgyud 'bum): sbyar/ / tha na rgyan spel rnams kyang ngo // mchod pa'i phyag rgya tshul chen dang // phyag rgya chen po bslab par bya// theg pa chen po bsdus pa las// ji skad rgya chen gsungs de bzhin// sems can thams cad
84a1(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub pa dang / / bde ba chen po'i rgyu dang ni// 'gro ba gsum las grol ba'i phyir// de lta bu yi bsam pa bla// 'dir ni lha rnams thams cad kyi// bag med nye bar zhi ba dang /
84a2(rgyud 'bum): mi rnams sdug bsngal sna tshogs pa// rab tu mthar phyin de bzhin nyid// theg pa dman par 'dod byed pa// 'khor ba rnam par gzhol ba'i phyir// rdo rje rnal 'byor bdag nyid ches// 'di de bsam par
84a3(rgyud 'bum): bya ba yin/ / bdag gi bsod nams stobs dag gis// bde ba thams cad tshogs kyi mchog/ sems can thams cad bde chen ldan// ma lus par ni grub gyur cig/ sems can thams cad bde
84a4(rgyud 'bum): gyur cig/ 'byung po kun la byams par shog/ dud 'gro thams cad 'jigs med shog/ ngan song thams cad zhi gyur cig/ bde ba chen po 'di bsams nas// sdig pa dral ba bcing bar bya// sdig
