84a5(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad dral byas shing / / de bzhin ngan song thams cad du// phyogs rnams thams cad sangs rgyas kun// yang dang yang du rjes dran nas// gsang ba'i mdo sde ma lus pa// yang dang yang du bkrub
84a6(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' ru// gcig tu 'gyur 'dod sems kyis bya// rdo rje rnal 'byor bla na med// rnal 'byor chen po bsgrub par bya// zla ba 'am yang na zla ba drug/ lo gcig gam ni
84a7(rgyud 'bum): de las gzhan/ / rig pa'i brtul zhugs 'di 'drar bya// phyag rgya thams cad yang dag bcing // sangs rgyas rnams la nyin re bzhin// nges par lha bshos dbul bar bya// lha bshos snang ba ster
84b1(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ / de bzhin rig pa'i lha bshos la// rdo rje gnod sbyin khro bo che// thams cad du ni rjes dran bya// 'ching ba'i sbyor ba'i cho ga ni// rdo rje khu tshur gyis brtan bya// rdo rje go cha'i sbyor ba yis// dkyil
84b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor kun tu bsrung bar bya/ / de lta bu yi cho ga yis// rnal 'byor bya ba bsgrub par bya// bsrung ba byas shing brtson 'grus brtsam// stobs chen spro ba bskyed pa yis// nyin re zhing ni brtags nas
84b3(rgyud 'bum): su/ / rtog pa'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// sku mdog dkyil 'khor ji bzhin par// ji ltar bos shing 'tsham pa ru// dgug pa la sogs las rnams ni// thams cad mnyam par gzhag par bya//
84b4(rgyud 'bum): ci nus par ni nyin re zhing // rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang // lo gcig na ni rab 'grub 'gyur// theg pa chen po tshogs nang na// mchog 'gyur rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur
84b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyud gzhan gyi ni cho ga dang / / mdo sde dang bcas ji bzhin du// de nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs blang // sdom pa'ang dor bar mi bya zhing // kha na ma tho rdul tsam yang // 'gyod pa ru ni bya ba yin// gnas ni
84b6(rgyud 'bum): yang dag brtag par bya/ / tsher ma la sogs dang bral ba// ri bro 'am ni dgon pa 'am// lha khang skyed mos tshal dang ni// chu yi bgram dang 'brog dgon par// gang du phyogs ni phyogs gtsang mar//
84b7(rgyud 'bum): gseg ma gyo mo bong ba dang // rdo ba dag ni bsal bar bya// shin tu legs par dag bya ste// gang phyir lha rnams yongs su 'dzin// gal te de ni sbyor lhod gyur// rnam pa kun tu 'jigs mi bya//
85a1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad rgyal po che// chos kyi bdag po dgongs pa can// thugs rje snying por ldan gyur pa// sangs rgyas nyes par 'dzin mi 'gyur// gnas ni kun tu dag
85a2(rgyud 'bum): bya zhing / / dkyil 'khor yang ni ci nus par// myu ru dpag tshad tsam bya rtse// khru drug las ni dpa' ba min// sngon la phur bu gdab bya ste// rdo rje rtsa la sogs pas btsud // de nas yo byad thams/
85a3(rgyud 'bum): cad ni// cho ga mchog gis blang bar bya// rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid 'dir// dkyil 'khor dag ni bsgrub par bya// thal ba la sogs dus ji bzhin// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor brtag par bya//
85a4(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar nus shing spro ba dang // ji ltar rdzas ni 'byor pa dang // de bzhin rnal 'byor chen pos bya// yang na sems kyis brtag par bya// ci ste sgrub pa rgyal por 'gyur// cho ga gzhan gyis blo ldan pas/
85a5(rgyud 'bum): gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// dkyil 'khor dag ni dag par bya// tshon rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan// khru ni stong dang ldan pa mchog/ yang na rgyang grags tshad tsam du// sa yi cha ni thig gdab bya//
85a6(rgyud 'bum): gal te 'byor pa ldan pa min// khru bzhi mdo ru bsdus pas bya// yang na phyogs rnams thams cad du// khru brgyad dang ni yang dag ldan// in+d+ra nI la shin tu sngo// tshon rtsi sngon po rab tu bya// pan+d+ha
85a7(rgyud 'bum): rwa shin tu dmar/ / tshon rtsi dmar po zhes byar bshad// rdo rje mchu dang mchu chen po// ser po yang ni yang dag ldan// dag cing dang ba'i gser dang ni// khe dog ser por ldan par bya// shin tu
85b1(rgyud 'bum): dag pas shel dang bas/ / tshon rtsi dkar po rab tu bya// gang phyir rgyal po nor chen ldan// tshon rtsi 'di dag yang dag bshad// phyug cing nor dang yang dag ldan// gal te de ni khyim bdag gyur//
85b2(rgyud 'bum): khru brgya yongs su tshang bar bya// bcu drug las ni nyung mi bya// tshon rtsi dri dang yang dag ldan// gur kum la sogs dang bsres pa// tshon rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan// mkhas pa yis ni dkyil 'khor
85b3(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / phyug cing nor dang yang dag ldan// tshong dpon yang ni ded dpon nam// khyim pa 'byor pa dang ldan pa// gzhan dag dga' zhing 'ongs gyur na// rin chen phye ma dang bsres pa'i// tshon rtsi chen
85b4(rgyud 'bum): po rab tu bya/ / rams dang ba bla la sogs pa// tshen rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan// bdag nyid chung ba'am che ba'ang rung // de yi 'byor pa brtag bya ba// ji ltar rigs par nges par sbyar// rgyal po la
85b5(rgyud 'bum): ni tshad bshad pa/ / khyim bdag la yang de bzhin no// tshong dpon dang ni ded dpon gyi// khru ni lnga bcu nyid kyang ngo // gzhan dag dga' zhing phongs gyur na// khru ni nyi shur byas pa yin// gal te dngos
85b6(rgyud 'bum): grub sgrub 'dod na/ / khru drug las ni chung mi bya// mang po de bzhin nyung ba yang // dri dang kun tu yang dag ldan// rtag tu sna tshogs dri yis ni// sngon du sa gzhi dag par bya// phyi rol dkyil 'khor ngos
85b7(rgyud 'bum): dag gi/ grwa ni bzhi po thams cad du// shes rab can gyis bdug spos sreg/ gang phyir rdo rje can dag gshegs// de nas dkyil 'khor gnas de ni// sngags kyis bsangs pa'i dri chu yis//
86a1(rgyud 'bum): @rtag tu legs par chag chag gdag/ gang phyir rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'gyur// nyim zhag drug gam bdun brgyad dang // mar dang 'o ma 'bras tshan nyid// slob dpon pas ni dkar
86a2(rgyud 'bum): gsum bza'/ / yang na thun mong gyur pa'i zas// ci ste bzod ldan nyin mtshan du// mi bza' ba ni bsgrub par bya// gang phyir chos kyi rang bzhin zas// stobs ldan 'gyur bar the tshom med//
86a3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor mchog ni rgyal chen po// gang yin bsam pas bya ba'o// bco lnga la ni brtsams nas su// gnyis pa'i nyi la rdzogs par bya// yang na mar gyi ngo la ni// bcu bzhi la ni yang dag
86a4(rgyud 'bum): brtsam/ bco lnga la ni thub par dka'// legs pa ru ni rdzogs par bya// yang na tshes brgyad nas brtsams te// tha ma nya la kun tu bri// yang na bcu bzhi la brtsams te// nyin zhag gnyis
86a5(rgyud 'bum): par yang dag bri/ / yang na bco lnga de yi ni// snga dro de yi yang dag brtsam// tshul chen po dang mtshungs pa yis// dkyil 'khor shes rab can gyis bri// gang gi tshe nas brtsams nas su//
86a6(rgyud 'bum): ji srid rdzogs par ma gyur par// gal te kun nas mi bza' bar// brtson 'grus chen po brtsam par bya// dri dang bcas shing legs byas pa// yang na dkar gsum bza' bar bya// gang phyir rgyal
86a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rdo rje 'dzin/ / byin gyis brlab par mdzad par 'gyur// bsod nams che zhing bkra shis pa'i// nyin zhag dag pa gang yin pa// de la rdo rje slob dpon ni// skal pa chen pos dkyil 'khor brtsams
86b1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas/ / dbus kyi cha ru 'dug par bya// sangs rgyas thams cad la dmigs nas// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom// sems ni yongs su 'dzin byed pa// lus
86b2(rgyud 'bum): ni drang por byas nas su/ / bshags la sogs pa'i las rnams ni// thams cad sngon du bya ba yin// byang chub sems la brtson 'gyur zhing // rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad pa yis// phyogs bcu
86b3(rgyud 'bum): ru ni phyag byas nas/ / bdag nyid kyang ni spro ba bskyed// deng ni skye ba 'bras bur bcas// bdag gi 'tsho ba'ang 'bras bu yod// sangs rgyas rnams dang dam tshig gis// dang ni srid par mnyam par
86b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / byang chub sems dpa' rtse gcig po'i// sems kyis phyir mi ldog par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs 'byung ba'i// bdag 'gyur ba ni the tshom med// deng bdag nyi ma dam pa ste//
86b5(rgyud 'bum): deng ni bdag mchod bla na med// sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas// dang bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no// de ltar dga' ba dang ldan pas// de nas dbus su 'dug gyur nas// spos kyi reng bu
86b6(rgyud 'bum): lag thogs pas/ / sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya// sems ni dga' zhing mgu ba yis// tshig ni 'di skad brjod par bya// yan lag kun gyis rab btud de// sangs rgyas kun la gsol ba
86b7(rgyud 'bum): gdag/ ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol// rdo rje bdag ming 'di zhes bya// bdag ni dkyil 'khor 'dri bar 'tshal// sangs rgyas la sogs kun gshegs te/
87a1(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub 'di ni dag la gsol// tshig ni de skad brjod nas su// sems dpa'i skyil krung bca' bar bya// chos chen po la snyoms zhugs nas// bdag nyid ting 'dzin dang ldan
87a2(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / gal te nus na skal ba ches// yang na sems kyis bsgrub par bya// rdo rje'i dkyil khor rgyal po mchog/ ting 'dzin zhes bya ci 'dra dang // rdo rje'i gzugs dang ldan pa la// rnal 'byor pa yis
87a3(rgyud 'bum): snyoms 'jug bya/ / yang na rnal 'byor gang rung la// nus na snyoms par 'jug pa bya// sems ni mnyam par gzhag 'gyur ba// go rims bzhin du bshad par bya// bcom ldan sngon ni ci 'dra ba'i
87a4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' nyid 'gyur ba'i/ / de 'dra bar ni bdag rang nyid// rnal 'byor don sems bsam par bya// dka' thub sdom pa sna tshogs pa// bdag gis bya bar bsam par bya// sangs rgyas 'dus
87a5(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po ni/ / stong gsum pa ni bsam par bya// sangs rgyas bskul ba bla na med// shes rab can gyis bskul ba bsam// sangs rgyas kun la phyag byas shing // ci 'dod pa ni bka' nod bya// nges
87a6(rgyud 'bum): par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ / rang sems so sor brtag par bya// byang sems yang dag bskyed nas ni// dbus su zla ba btag par bya// de nas rang gi ye shes brtag/ zla ba'i dbus su rdo rje bzhin/
87a7(rgyud 'bum): rang lus rdo rje'i gzugs su ste// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rang bzhin nyid// de nas sangs rgyas mngon rtogs nas// rang bdag nyid ni dbang bskur bya// rang bdag sangs rgyas thams cad/ rdo rje rnal 'byor
87b1(rgyud 'bum): blta bar bya/ / ri rab ri yi rtse mo ru// stug po'i gnas las babs nas su// rdo rje'i gdan la 'dug nas su// sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam 'phrul bya// sems dpa' bzhi ni phyung nas su// phyogs rnams
87b2(rgyud 'bum): kun tu yongs su spro/ / chos kyi dbyings ni brtan byas nas// phyogs bzhi ru ni dgod par bya// mtshams su rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun// bdag nyid yang dag byin gyis brlabs// phyogs bzhi ru ni
87b3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi/ / 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po byung // 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang bcas nyid// dkyil 'khor thams cad blta bar bya// sems dpa' gsang ba'i lha mor bcas// sgo srungs
87b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams ni bsam par bya/ / 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dag pa ni// snying po chen po brtag par bya// rang gi 'khor lo yang dag bzhugs// 'khor lo lnga dang yang dag ldan// thabs chen sangs rgyas
87b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi/ / mtshan ni rjes su dran pa sgom// ting nge 'dzin las langs nas kyang // rdo rje'i lta bas blta bar bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzir gyis// slar yang snyoms par 'jug par bya// rnam
87b6(rgyud 'bum): par snang mdzad thugs dbus su/ / byang chub sems ni bsgom par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par ni// mgon po'i snying kha nas gzung bya// sems dpa' kun gyi spyan snga ru// bka' ni rim bzhin
87b7(rgyud 'bum): nod par bya/ / sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur gyis// rang bdag nyid ni dbang bskur bya// gsol ba btab pa bstan par bya// bdag ni rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ chos kyi sbyor ba 'di yis
88a1(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / ting 'dzin shin tu blan med// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas kun// kun gyis rlab pa mdzad par 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin las langs nas kyang // bka' ni nye bar nod bya ste/
88a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid// nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// skyil krung bshig ste langs nas ni// rang gis 'dren pa'i zhabs phyag bya// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho gang ba ru// phyogs rnams bani ni
88a3(rgyud 'bum): blta bar bya/ / theg pa cher po mngon par rtogs// rdo rje'i tshig ni brjod par bya// bdag nyid rang nyid rdo rje can// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid// bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che// bdag ni stobs
88a4(rgyud 'bum): chen rdo rje can/ / bdag ni rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal// bdag ni phyag na rdo rje mchog/ oM badz+ra satwa hUM/ rdo rje yi ni gsang sngags 'di// lan cig nyid ni brjod par bya// bdag ni gtso bo rdo rje che/
88a5(rgyud 'bum): byin gyis brlabs pa mi 'dor ro// sangs rgyas rgya mtshos kun tu gang // 'khor los lnga par yang dge gnas// bsnyems bcas rdo rje gsor nas ni// rdo rje bsnyems tshul ldan par bya/ slar yang
88a6(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid go bzo zhing / / bdag nyid dbang ni bsgyur bar bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad gcad par bya// lag nyed pa yi phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams
88a7(rgyud 'bum): cad rab tu mnye/ / rdo rje gtun shing nyid kyis ni// bgegs rnams thams cad brdung bar bya// rdo rje ral gri rab rnobs// bgegs rnams thams cad gtab par bya// rdo rje mche ba drag po yis/
88b1(rgyud 'bum): bgegs rnams thams cad dbug par bya// rdo rje bzang po'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad gzhom par bya// rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya/
88b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje mche ba rab grags pas// bgegs rnams thams cad bza' bar bya// rdo rje lcags sgrog phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bcing bar bya// rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis//
88b3(rgyud 'bum): bgegs rnams thams cad dgug par bya// rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad drang bar bya// rdo rje mdung thung phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad dbug par bya/
88b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams tham cad bsgyel bar bya// rgyas pa yis ni ci nus par// lus rnams thams cad dgug par bya// bgegs ni 'ga' yang yod min zhes// sems
88b5(rgyud 'bum): ni dag par gyur pa yin/ / rang sems bdud ces bya bar bshad// bgegs nyid kyang ni rang gi sems// rnam par rtog pa thams cad bsal// rnam rtog las ni bgegs rnams 'byung // gdul
88b6(rgyud 'bum): bar dka' ba'i sems gzung zhing / / 'dod pa lnga ni spang bar bya// sngon du rjes dran nas brtsams te// yang na rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur// bcom zhing nges par gcad nas ni// yi ge hUM gis bslad
88b7(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya yis// rdo rje ra ba bcing bar bya// hUM mdzad rdo rje bsdam bya zhing // de ni rdo rje ra bas bskor// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya ches// dkyil 'khor yang dag byin brlabs
89a1(rgyud 'bum): nas/ ci nus par ni rgyas parla// rab mchog ni bcing bar bya// rtog pa kun la nges sbyar nas// sems ni dag par 'gyur ba yin// dkyil 'khor dag gi mtshan nyid ni/
89a2(rgyud 'bum): mkhas pa yis ni gzung bar bya// grogs dag dang ni thams cad la// g.yel ba med par bsrung bar bya// gsar zhing legs par bkal ba dang // tshad dang ldan zhing mdzes pa dang // dri zhim
89a3(rgyud 'bum): reg bya 'jam pa dang / / legs par byas shing sra ba dang // dri bsung dang ni yang dag ldan// sna tshogs tshon gyis kun tu khyab// dri bcas tshon du spang bya zhing // chos kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab
89a4(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / de nas de ni yang dag bshad// dkyil 'khor mchog ni chen po ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che// dkyil 'khor kun gyi gsang ba che// sangs rgyas bstan pa'i rdo rje can// sems can
89a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di rnams gdul bya min/ / bsod nams ye shes rgya mtsho che// tshogs ni kun tu ma bsags pas// bsod nams tshogs dang mi ldan zhing // sangs rgyas 'byung la chags dang bral//
89a6(rgyud 'bum): sems can de rnams mos bya'i phyir// dkyil 'khor chen po bstan pa yin// sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang ldan pa// de nas dkyil 'khor 'dzin du 'jug/ yang na bsod nams ngag gi tshogs/
89a7(rgyud 'bum): de ni rang nyid kyis mthong 'gyur// gang phyir tshogs bcas longs spyod dang // chos kyi sgra ni bla na med// rdo rje'i dam chos las byung ba'i// sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'dzin du gzhug/ gal te de ni tshogs
89b1(rgyud 'bum): bsags gyur/ / sngon du sangs rgyas rjes su mthong // dkyil 'khor sbyor ba la gnas te// sangs rgyas thams cad des mthong 'gyur// tshogs ni bsags pa med pa dang // sangs rgyas
89b2(rgyud 'bum): mthong ba med pa ru/ / des ni thos pa rnyed mi 'gyur// dang por 'dir 'dug smos ci dgos// gang phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// 'di ni gsang ba mtshungs med pa// 'di ni theg chen snying po ste//
89b3(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med// bskal pa grangs med pa ru byung // sa yi pha rol phyin pa mchog/ gang phyir gsang ba mtho ba thob// rab tu dga' ba sgrub par 'gyur// gal te rnal 'byor pa de
89b4(rgyud 'bum): brtson/ / tshe 'di nyid la mya ngan 'das// rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob cing // rdo rje nyid ni the tshom med// yang na mthong ba tsam gyis ni// skye ba bcu drug mya ngan 'das// rab tu dga' ba thob pa dang /
89b5(rgyud 'bum): yang na rdo rje nyid kyang ngo // sa la 'i zla ltung byed cing // de ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin 'gyur// so so'i skye bos sangs rgyas nyid// 'grub par 'gyur te gzhan du min// rnal 'byor mchog ni bla med pa//
89b6(rgyud 'bum): de phyir rnal 'byor chen po sbyor// gA li te sangs rgyas nyid 'dod na// brtson 'grus chen pos bsdad mi bya// tshad ni ji skad bshad pa ru// de bzhin gzhung gi rjes 'brangs nas// phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig
89b7(rgyud 'bum): gdab bya/ / gang phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas// khur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta bas bzhis ni mdzes par bya// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// cha mnyam pas ni mdzes par gyur// dar gyi chun
90a1(rgyud 'bum): pos brgyar gyur cing / / rin chen dra bas rnam par brgyan// g.yer ka'i dra ba yang dag ldan// kha dog lnga pos rab tu mdzes// dril bu'i dra bas shin tu spras// rnga yab sna tsheb/
90a2(rgyud 'bum): kyis mdzes pa// 'phreng ba rnga yab bla re dang // nyi zla dag gis nye bar mdzes// kun nas phyi rol gnas dag tu// rdo rje kha khyer yang dag rten// kun tu kha khyer dang ldan pa'i// sgo ni kha khyer
90a3(rgyud 'bum): med pa'o/ / rtse mo rdo rje sngo rang bzhin// gzhan ni gser gyi mdog can dang // dmar po pad+ma lta bu dang // gzhan yang shel ltar dkar ba dang // rin chen rang bzhin mchog kun gyi// dkyil 'khor
90a4(rgyud 'bum): mdzes par bri bar bya/ / sna tshogs gzugs ni mdzes pa mchog/ rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod// rim gnyis sgo dang yang dag ldan// rta babs sna tshogs dang ldan pa// dkar zhing gsal dang rdo rje
90a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / / nyi zla dag gis rnam par spras// 'dab ma bzhi dang yang dag ldan// sgo bzhi dag ni mchog tu mdzes// mtho zhing yangs la mdzes pa ste// rdo rje rdo rjer yang dag ldan// rdo rje sgo srungs skal chen
90a6(rgyud 'bum): po/ / bdag nyid rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin// gtum po srung byed rnal 'byor pa// shar gyi sgo ru yang dag gnas// lho ru rdo rje zhags pa ste/ nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog go// rdo rje dril bu skal chen po// byang gi
90a7(rgyud 'bum): sgo ru yang dag gnas/ / 'jug pa dang ni 'byung ba'ang rung // rdo rje shugs ni brjod par bya// ri mo dman ma brdzis byas na// dam tshig de nyid mthong mi 'gyur// oM badz+ra be gA kra ma hUM/ gang gis dus su
90b1(rgyud 'bum): thig 'debs pa/ / rdo rje'i thig ni brjod par bya// sa yi cha ni ma lus pa// thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'gyur// oM badz+ra sa ma yA sU tra ma ti kra ma hUM/ sngon du tshon rtsi'i phye ma la// 'bar ba'i lha
90b2(rgyud 'bum): bas yang dag blta/ / badz+ra rA ga zhes brjod na// thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'gyur// oM badz+ra rA ga hUM/ mtshams kyi cha ni thams cad dang // sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen
90b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis spras/ / phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya// logs dang cha ni mnyam pa dang // kun nas cha ni rnam par phyed// dkyil 'khor cha ni rnam par gsal// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor thig
90b4(rgyud 'bum): gdab bya/ / de yi nang gi rim pa ru// zhugs nas 'khor lo de mtshungs pa// kun tu cha ni rnam par bri// ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes// rdo rje'i ka ba'i mdun gnas su// dkyil 'khor dag ni
90b5(rgyud 'bum): lnga yis brgyan/ / gnas lnga dag ni thams cad du// 'khor lo lnga ni dgod par bya// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// kun tu bri zhing dgod par bya// rdo rje bsnyems tshul gyis bltas nas//
90b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' gzung bar bya// oM badz+ra satwa hUM/ de la dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sangs rgyas rgyal po dgod par bya// gang gis thugs las nges byung ba// gsang ba'i tshogs ni stug cing bstan
90b7(rgyud 'bum): rnam par snang mdzad rnal 'byor che/ / phyogs rnams kun tu rnam par gsal// thub pa don yod grub pa dgod// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// las chen po dag yang dag bri// kun nas phyogs/
91a1(rgyud 'bum): ni bzhi dag tu// phrag na rang gi phyag mtshan mtshon// mdun du rdo rje las yin te// g.yas su rdo rje srung ba'o// g.yon du rdo rje gnod sbyin te// rdo rje khu tshur rgyab tu'o// de nas phyag/
91a2(rgyud 'bum): mtshan bcu drug dang // dbus ma ci shur rab bshad b+ha// bcu drug dbus su nyi shu ni// go rims bzhin du rab bshad bya// ji ltar rigs shing 'tsham pa la// rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa// rdo rje rin chen rin pa
91a3(rgyud 'bum): / / rdo rje pad+ma chen po dang // rdo rje rnon po dbus ma yin// phyag na rdo rje'i rdo rje che// de bzhin rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin// rdo rje chags pa gzhu nyid do// rdo rje legs pa'i rdo rje gnyis// rdo rje rin chen rin
91a4(rgyud 'bum): po che/ / rdo rje gzi brjid nyi ma ste// rdo rje rgyal mtshan rgyal mtshan bsgreng // rdo rje bzhad pa chos chen po// rdo rje chos kyi pad+ma ches// rdo rje rnon po ral gri bzang // rdo rje rgyu yi 'khor lo che// rdo rje sba
91a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i yi ge ste/ / rdo rje rnon po las chen po// rdo rje srung ba'i cho ga ste// rdo rje gnod sbyin mche ba che// rdo rje khu tshur bsdams pa ste// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrogs dang // dril bu dag ni sgo ba
91a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhi/ / rdo rje sems ma'i rdo rje che// de bzhin rdo rje rin chen nor// pad+ma rdo rje chos ma ste// rdo rje rnon po las ma yin// grwa bani dag tu gsang ba yi// phyag mtshan de rnams dgod par bya// 'khor lo
91a7(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i phyi rol gyi/ / zla ba'i dag ni thams cad du// gsang ba'i chos pa rnam pa bzhi// rdo rje lha mo yang dag bri// rdo rje sgeg ma rdor 'phreng ma// de bzhin rdo rje gru ma nyid// bsems pasas 'thong
91b1(rgyud 'bum): ba pi wang dang / / glu gar gsang ba'i lha mo rnams// phyi rol dkyil 'khor mtshams rnams su// mchod pa'i lha mo yang dag bri// me tog spos dang de bzhin dri// mar me nub byang mtshams su
91b2(rgyud 'bum): 'ong / / mar me la sogs par nyid kyis// phyi yi dkyil 'khor thams cad du// bskal pa bzang po'i sems dpa' che// skyong ni nges par dgod par bya// mtshan ma ji bzhin ci rigs pas// byam
91b3(rgyud 'bum): ba la sogs ma lus pa/ / ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa yi// sems dpa' chen po dgod par bya// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// kun tu bri zhing dgod par bya// rang gi snying pos kun dbab phyir/
91b4(rgyud 'bum): rang rang gi ni snying po yin// de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM badz+ra pA Ni hUM/ badz+ra aM ku sha dzaH/ badz+ra rA ga ho/ badz+ra swa d+hus/ dam tshig mchog gi snying po'o// oM badz+ra ma Ni/
91b5(rgyud 'bum): / oM badz+ra te dzo a/ badz+ra ke tu hrI/ badz+ra hA sa ha/ badz+ra tISh+Tha d+haM/ badz+ra he tu maM/ badz+ra b+hA Sha raM/ dbang gi sems dpa' dang / ye shes kyi sems dpa' chen po'i snying po'o// badz+ra karma
91b6(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra rak+Sha haM/ badz+ra yak+Sha hUM/ badz+ra muSh+Ti baM/ las kyi sems dpa' chen po'i snying po'o// de rnams ni rab tu gnas pa'i snying po yin/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi snying po ni/ badz+ra hUM/
91b7(rgyud 'bum): rat+na traM/ d+harma trI/ karma a/ lha mo rnams kyi sngar bshad zin to// sgo srungs rnams kyi yang de bzhin no// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad dgod par bya// de nas
92a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje slob dpon gyi las bshad par byaste/ kun nas rdo rjernal 'byor gyis// chos kyi blo can gyis ziza// dpal mchog dang po las gsus pa'i// sems pa'i phyag rgyab cing /
92a2(rgyud 'bum): par bya// theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs// lan bdun du ni brjod par bya// phyi rol dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la// lan bdun du ni bskor bar bya// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ni/
92a3(rgyud 'bum): mkhas pas thams cad blta bar bya// gal te chad dam lhag kyang rung // rdo rje shugs kyis dag par bya// 'khor lo chen po dag par byas// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor yang dag gzung // rgyal ba rnam
92a4(rgyud 'bum): la bdag nyid ni/ / dbul ba'i las ni kun tu bya// de nas yo byad thams cad kyis// dkyil 'khor la ni mchod par bya// ci 'byor pas ni bya ba ste// dman par gyur kyang nyes pa med// 'byor
92a5(rgyud 'bum): pa ji snyed yod pa kun/ / go rims bzhin du rab tu dbul// bum pa gang ba 'bum phrag gam// stong ngam yang na brgya yang rung // mar me 'bum phrag stong ngam ni// yang na stong ngam brgya yang rung //
92a6(rgyud 'bum): dri dang spos kyi snod 'jam mam// yang na slong ngam brgya yang rung // ga bur a ka ru nyid dang // du ru ka dang tsan dan sogs// mang sbyar dri zhim dang ldan pa// spos rnams 'di dag bsreg par bya//
92a7(rgyud 'bum): gser ram dngul gyi snod dag dang // sa las byas kyang nyes pa med// yo byad ji snyed yod pa kun// dkyil 'khor du ni gzhag par bya// de la kong bu stong phrag gam// mar me'i sdong bu shin
92b1(rgyud 'bum): tu 'bar/ / tha na mar me snod gcig ste// ma tshang gyur kyang nyes pa med// dar ni phyar ba bye ba bre// rnga yab 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// dra ba dra ba phyed pas spras// zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes//
92b2(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs gzhon pa brgya 'am ni// stong phrag gcig kyang nyes pa med// thams cad ma tshang gcig nyid kyang // bde bas rol mo mchog rnams bya// phan pa'i zas ni stong phrag dang // bye ba phrag ni rgya mtsho
92b3(rgyud 'bum): tshogs/ / bca' ba sna tshogs pa yang ste// gal te ma tshang nyes pa med// dri dang gos bzang thams cad dang // dri zhim pa yi byug pa dang // bya ba mchog ni snyoms par mdzes// bla re rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
92b4(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs dri yi chus bkang ba// bum pa shin tu yid 'ong dang // me tog shing ni brgya nyid dang // bzhi yang nyes par mi 'gyur ro// dri dang me tog thams cad dang // bdug pa yid du 'ong ba kun//
92b5(rgyud 'bum): gal te sbyor ba ldan gyur na// mchod pa rnam pa thams cad bya// mchod pa dang ni gtor ma nyid// ji bzhin sgrub pa pos de phul// de bzhin dngos grub rdzu 'phrul ni// mthong ba'i chos la thob par
92b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / sngar ni ji skad bsgrags pa bzhin// thams cad cho ga bzhin du dgod// sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing // mchod pa nyid kyang rab tu bya// de nas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yi// dbus
92b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'khor lo phyag byas nas/ / pus mo btsugs te 'dug nas ni// yang dag par ni dgug par bya// sems dpa' rdo rje lcags kyu bcing // rdo rje lcags kyu brjod par bya// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa
93a1(rgyud 'bum): yis/ de bzhin gshegs rnams kun tu gshegs// de nas sgo srungs bcings nas ni// yi ge dza ni yongs su brjod// rdo rje can ni thams cad dgug/ the tshom med par
93a2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs par gyur/ / rdo rje zhags pa bcings nas ni// cho ga ji bzhin nges par gzhug/ rdo rje lcags sgrog bcings nas ni// dbang du yang ni rtag tu bya// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yis// de dag nyid
93a3(rgyud 'bum): kyang dbab par bya/ / rdo rje gnas pa'i phyag rgya yis// gnas rnams kun ni dgod par bya// ci nus par ni rab tu bsgrags// de nas mchod pa rab tu bya// spos dang me tog la sog pa'i// phyag rgya'i
93a4(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor kun la sbyar/ / bdag nyid dbul dang mchod pa dang // bshags dang gsol ba btab la sogs// byang chub sems ni bskyed nas kyang // sdom pa yang dag spyad par bya// rdo rje sems
93a5(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i phyag rgya ches/ / bdag nyid la ni dbang bskur bya// se gol dag ni brdab bya zhing // sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun// bkug cing rab tu bcug nas
93a6(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / rdo rje lcags sgrog yang dag dbab// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya ches// dral nas de ni yang dag dbab// rdo rje ye shes bla na med// ye shes dag pa skye bar 'gyur// sems dpa'i ye shes dbang
93a7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / rdo rje dbab pa yang dag brjod// ci ste babs par ma gyur na// yi ge a yis dril bu dkrol// mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang // rdo rje slob dpon 'di lta bu// ye shes dam pa skye
93b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur zhing / / rmad du byung ba'ang 'dis mthong 'gyur// brgya las rtsa bdun lhag pa nyid// mtshan ma'ang de las lhag 'byung 'gyur// gzhan dag gang yang
93b2(rgyud 'bum): rung ba nyid/ / gal te bsod nams skal ba che// des ni sangs rgyas thams cad mthong // yang na byang chub sems dpa' 'am// yang na rdo rje 'dzin gang nyid// yang na 'od zer 'phros pa
93b3(rgyud 'bum): mthong / / hUM sgrog 'brug gi sgra dang ni// spos dang me tog dag gi bar// ba spu langs pa la sogs byung // de nas rdo rje slob dpon ni// dkyil 'khor phyi rol byung nas ni// sems ma'i phyag rgya ldan
93b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur pas/ / sor mo gnyis kyis 'phreng bas gzung // gar gyi tshul gyis zhugs nas ni// rdo rje gar ni rab bskor bas// dbus kyi 'khor lo rab zhugs nas// 'phreng ba nyid ni dor bar bya// 'phreng ba de ni gar babs pa// de
93b5(rgyud 'bum): dang de ni skad cig 'grub/ / sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas// phyag rgya thams cad bcing byas na// dngos grub thams cad nges pa ru// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// gzhan yang de la
93b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'chang / / byin gyis rlob pa mdzad par 'gyur// langs nas der ni bcom ldan 'das// yang na rdo rje 'dzin pa'ang rung // 'dar ba dang ni g.yo ba'ang rung // de bzhin yan lag 'khums pa
93b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / / yang na tshig ni byung ba dang // ci ste hU~M ni brjod pa'ang rung // nges par legs so zhes bya ba// cho 'phrul bde ba chen po ni// rmad byung bsam gyis mi khyab ste// rdo rje slob dpon skal ba ches/
94a1(rgyud 'bum): mthong 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni// de nas langs te brjod par bya// mgon po thub pa la btud nas// ci 'dod pa ni bka' nod
94a2(rgyud 'bum): bya/ rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis// sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir// slob ma rab tu gzhug par bgyi// rgyu dang mi rgyu khams gsum gyi//
94a3(rgyud 'bum): sems can kun gyi bde gang yin// des na rdo rje slob dpon de'i// bcu drug char yang mi phod do// rdo rje slob dpon gyi las rdzogs so// / de nas slob ma gzhug par
94a4(rgyud 'bum): bya ste/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po der ni ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad 'jug tu rung ngo // snod dang
94a5(rgyud 'bum): snod ma yin pa yongs su brtag par mi bya ste/ / gzhug pa la mngon par zhen pa yongs su gzung bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyis mthong ba tsam gyi mod la phyir mi
94a6(rgyud 'bum): ldog pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ / dad pa med pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags pa dang // rgyud yongs su ma smin pa dang // mos pa med pa mang du zin kyang 'on kyang mthong ba tsam gyis so// gang gi
94a7(rgyud 'bum): phyir gsang ba chen po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gsang bas 'dul ba'i thabs dang / 'khor lo'i tshul dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa dang / byang chub
94b1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa yin te/ de'i phyir mthong ba tsam gyi mod la ngan song thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// rgyal ba'i sras ni 'jigs pa med// ngan song sgo ni bcad pa
94b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / thams cad thar pa la gzhol dang // phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'gyur// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs song ste// byang chub sems ni bskyed du gzhug/ sems can kun gyi don
94b3(rgyud 'bum): bsams nas/ / sdom pa yang ni sbyin par bya// srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang // brdzun du smra ba dang / 'bru'i chang dang /
94b4(rgyud 'bum): bcos pa'i chang dang // myos par gyur pa dag de nas brtsams te spang bar bya'o// sngon la sdom pa 'di dag ni// ji ltar 'dod cing mos pa ru// mkhas pa yis ni sbyin bya ste// rang dbang
94b5(rgyud 'bum): med par sbyin mi bya/ / gal te de ni dad gyur na// de la sdom pa sbyin par bya// sdom pa gsum la bkod nas ni// de nas dkyil 'khor bstan par bya// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod
94b6(rgyud 'bum): na/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs song ste// bslab pa lnga la rnam par gnas// byang chub sems la mchog brtson bya// sems can shin tu gdul dka' gang // sdom pa 'dzin par mi byed
94b7(rgyud 'bum): cing / dad dang ldan pa med pa'ang // 'jug pa nyid ni dgag mi bya// ji ltar sangs rgyas thugs rje can// de dag gi ni sku ru 'gyur// mthong ba tsam gyi mod la ni// sdom pa dag par 'grub par
95a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / bdag nyid ngan pa'i sems can gang // khro zhing shin tu gshe ba dang // gzhad gad byed cing 'phyar yang rung // de nyid rgyu ru 'gyur ba yin// gzhug pa'i cho ga
95a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pa ru/ / de nas yang dag bshad par bya// ji ltar 'os shing 'tsham pa ru// rdo rje slob ma gzhug par bya// sbyor ba bzhi yis phyag bya zhing // rdo rje sngags kyang bsgom par bya// sngar bshad
95a3(rgyud 'bum): cho ga ji bzhin du/ / phyag bzhi dag kyang bya ba yin// stod g.yogs gos ni dmar po dang // dmar pos mig kyang dgab par bya// gos ni dmar po bskon byas te// gang phyir sangs rgyas sku 'dzin
95a4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che// shin tu gsal ba 'ching du gzhug/ snying po lan cig brjod bya zhing // sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes bya brjod// dga' zhing mgu la rangs pa yis// sor mo gnyis
95a5(rgyud 'bum): kyis 'phreng ba blangs/ / snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni// slob dpon chen pos gzhug par bya// sa ma ya hUM/ shar gyi sgo yi nang du ni// yi ge dza ni yang dag brjod// lho ru zhags pa'i yi ge hUM/
95a6(rgyud 'bum): nub tu lcags sgrog baM lhan cig/ byang du dril bu byang chub par// yi ge a ni brjod par bya// dus phyis rol pa dang bcas par// bkug ste phyag kyang btsal bar bya// bshags dang gsol
95a7(rgyud 'bum): gdab mchod pa dang / / yongs su bsngo dang rjes yi rang // bdag nyid dbul ba nyid kyang ni// go rims bzhin du byed du gzhug/ deng bdag ye shes rdo rje ni// the tshom med par bskyed par bya// khyod
95b1(rgyud 'bum): kyis brnyas par mi bya ste/ / khyod ni phung bar gyur ta re// brjod nas 'phreng ba dor du gzhug/ rdo rje'i 'phreng sbyin par bya// 'phreng ba de ni gang du babs// 'grub par 'gyur bar the tshom med// oM
95b2(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra mA la/ rdo rje'i tshig ni rab brjod cing // de nas gdong g.yogs dgrol bar bya// nges par yid ches sbyin bya zhing // dkyil 'khor ltos zhes brjod par bya// oM/ nga ni rdo rje sems rang nyid//
95b3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas snying po las byung ba// rdo rje mig ni dbye bar bya// kye rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ltos// dam tshig nyid ni sbyin bya zhing // sems ma'i phyag rgya steng du bcing // 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig 'joms// rdo rje
95b4(rgyud 'bum): tshig ni brjod par bya/ / oM ud ka tha/ rdo rje gsang sngags 'di yis ni// phyag na rdo rjes srung bar byed// dam tshig nyid ni nyams gyur na// 'bras bu 'di ni thob mi 'gyur// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal
95b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i chu/ / dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungs pas 'grub par 'gyur// 'thungs shig rdo rje bdud rtsi 'thung // rdo rje sems dpa'i mna' yi ni// snying po 'dis ni mnas bsgag go/
95b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid ni// de ring khyod kyi snying la zhugs// gal te tshul 'di spras na ni// skad cig de la dral nas gshegs// gang zhig sdom pa mi len cing // shin tu gdul dka' dang
95b7(rgyud 'bum): med la/ / gzhug pa tsam ni sbyin par bya// de la las ni mi bya'o// dkon mchog gsum la dad dang ldan// sdig la 'jigs shing rab tu bsdams// dad dang dang ba phun sum tshogs// de la dam
96a1(rgyud 'bum): tshig sbyin par bya/ / de la dam tshig gang zhe na// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang // gtso bo de dag lhur blang bya// 'tsho ba'i srog gi phyir yang ni// byang sems nges
96a2(rgyud 'bum): par dor mi bya/ / lha rnams la ni smad mi bya// sngags dang phyag rgya nam yang min// rdo rje slob dpon brnyas mi bya// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs// bzhon pa mtshon cha phyag mtshan dang /
96a3(rgyud 'bum): dman ma lus kyi grib ma rnams// gya nom du ni brdzi mi bya// nam yang bza' bar mi bya'o// bdag gis sngon ni ji ltar mthong // sems can gzhan la brjod mi bya// sngags dang phyag rgya bslab
96a4(rgyud 'bum): ba ni/ / nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// sems can gsad par mi bya zhing // theg pa gzhan la dga' mi bya// sems can don dang 'khor ba las// nam yang skyo bar mi bya'o// pha rol phyin
96a5(rgyud 'bum): drug spyod pa ni/ / nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// bya ba ma yin rtag tu spang // khyod kyi dam tshig sdom pa yin// gal te snod ldan mchog yin na// 'di 'dra'i dam tshig brjod par bya// ci ste min na
96a6(rgyud 'bum): btang snyoms gzhug/ ci ste 'dod pa bde bar bya// sbyor ba 'di dag thams cad kyis// dkyil 'khor thams cad bsdus pa ru// rgyud rnams kun gyi dam tshig mchog/ thams cad du ni sbyar
96a7(rgyud 'bum): pabar bya/ / cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rdo rje slob ma gzhug par bya// rdo rje chos ni sgrub pa yis// dngos grub mchog kyang sbyin par bya// gal te rdo rje can rang grub// mkhas pas gzhan la'ang
96b1(rgyud 'bum): / bslab par bya// rang nyid ye shes yang dag skyes// de bzhin gzhan la bskyed par bya// dkyil 'khor mthong zhing cho ga shes// dam tshig dngos grub dang ldan pa'i// dad dang ldan pa'ang 'grub
96b2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / 'dir ni slob dpon 'gyur ba yin// de yis mchod pa byas nas ni// the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur// mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang // lan bdun gyis ni 'grub
96b3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / rdo rje slob ma la brjod bya// 'di las 'jig rten gzhan du min// sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol// khyod 'dir rdo rje can du 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod sprul
96b4(rgyud 'bum): zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skye// 'khor ba'i gnas kyi btson ra ru// slar yang sdug bsngal 'gyur ba med// deng khyod skye ba 'bras bur bcas// sangs rgyas kun dang mtshung
96b5(rgyud 'bum): pa ru/ / de ring khyod ni gyur pa yin// nga la spyi bos gus pas gtugs// lus ni theg gsum pha rol phyin// mi khom par ni skye mi 'gyur// byang chub spyod pas nyes pa med// rab tu dga'
96b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sa thob 'gyur/ / rdo rje can khyod brtson par gyis// gzhan tshe bcu drug gis thob pa// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// rgyal ba'i sras kyi sa thob kyang // dkyil 'khor gsang ba mthong ma
96b7(rgyud 'bum): gyur/ / ji ltar khyod ni deng byung ba// de bzhin theg pa yid ches min// skye dang skye ba thams cad du// rdo rje can ni mngon brtson 'gyur// skye ba bcu drug mthar thug pas// zhi bar sangs rgyas
97a1(rgyud 'bum): nyid thob 'gyur/ / rgyal ba'i gnas kyis thob cing // bskal grangs med gnyis dka' ba spyod// gsang ba'i theg par ma zhugs par// bcu drug gis ni 'gyur ba yin// 'byung po
97a2(rgyud 'bum): kun gyis mthong mi 'gyur/ / khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba// lha tshogs gdug pa thams cad kyis// rdo rje can ni zil mi nor// rims gdon dug dang phyag rgya dang // mkha' 'gro la sogs
97a3(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa'i gdong / / nga rgyal dang bcas gzhan dag gis// slar yang khyod ni zil non min// de ni bskal pa brgya ru yang // rdo rje yon tan nyid brjod 'gyur// gsang ba'i snying po mchog mthong
97a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / nam yang 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// sems dpa'i rang bzhin phyag rgya bcings// brtson 'grus chen pos brtan par bya// ji skad du ni brjod par bya// dbab pa bla na med pa ste/
97a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni dam tshig rdo rje ni// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar bshad// rdo rje ye shes tha med pa// de nyid kyis ni dbab par bya// badz+ra a be sha a/ de nas dbab par gyur pa nyid// mngon par shes
97a6(rgyud 'bum): pa drug thob cing / / ye shes dam pa thang cig gis// sngon byung min pa'i dga' bde dang // dga' ba mgu ba mchog dag dang // rig pa thams cad mngon du 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul dag ni rdzogs par 'gyur
97a7(rgyud 'bum): snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni/ / rdo rjes phyag rgya snying khar dkrol// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// rtag tu snying khar zhugs par 'gyur// oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra dri D+ho me b+ha ba sha shwa te me b+ha ba/ hr-id yaM me a ni tiSh+Tha/
97b1(rgyud 'bum): sarba sid+d+him+me pra ya d+ha hUM ha ha sa sa ho/ de nas snying po 'di yis ni// 'phreng ba nyid ni dor bar bya// pra tIts+tsha ho/ gnas gang du ni 'phreng ba babs// de yi lha ni rigs de yi// go rims bzhin du dkyil 'khor
97b2(rgyud 'bum): gyi/ / gsang ba chen po bstan par bya// dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis kyang // sangs rgyas sa ni the tsom med// dri dang ldan zhing yid 'ong ba// bum pa'i chu ni blangs nas ni// snying po 'di yis dbang bskur
97b3(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / sdug bsngal rab tu 'khrud pa'i mchog/ oM badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ de nas phyag rgya gang rung bas// 'phreng ba byin nas dbang bskur bya// rdo rje'i ming ni dbang bskur la// ming gi sgra ni rab sbyar bya//
97b4(rgyud 'bum): / oM badz+ra satwa a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi// badz+ra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta he badz+ra nA ma// slo ma'i gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// / rdo rje ye shes bla na med// de la ye shes bslab par bya// bzhi las gang yang
97b5(rgyud 'bum): rung ba ni/ / skal ba ji bzhin dri bar bya// gal te nor gyi dngos grub smra// de ni rnam bzhir bshad par bya// nor gyi ye shes chen po bzhi// dngos grub rnams ni bslang bar bya// gang na gter ni yod re ga/
97b6(rgyud 'bum): der ni skyil mo krung bcas te// snying khar rdo rje bsgoms nas ni// gter gyi gnas ni rab mthong 'gyur// badz+ra ni d+hi/ nam mkhar rdo rje bsgom bya zhing // me long la ni yang dag blta// gang du lhung bar mthong
97b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba/ / de na gter ni yod par bstan// rat+na ni ni/ rang gi lce la rdo rje sgom// 'di na yod ces rang nyid smra// d+harma ni d+hi/ rdo rje las ni yang dag babs// gang du babs pa der bstan to//
98a1(rgyud 'bum): karma ni d+hi/ gal te rdo rje'i dngos grub smra// rnam pa bzhi ni bslab par bya// chu ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin mthong // shin tu mnyam gzhag dga' bar 'gyur// chu ni sdug pa'i rang
98a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin mthong / / chu yi steng du bcag par 'gyur// badz+ra dza la/ bdag nyid ting 'dzin dang ldan pas// yang dang yang du dga' bar bya// bdag nyid dga' ba'i gzugs su ni// bsgoms na de dang
98a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dra bar 'gyur/ / badz+ra rU pa/ bdag nyid nam mkha'i rang bzhin mtshungs// rang bzhin med pa nyid skoms shig/ rdo rje dbab pa bskyed byas na// myur du mi snang ba nyid 'gyur// badz+ra A kA sha
98a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i skas ni nam mkha' la/ / bsgoms zhing steng du 'dzeg byas na// ji srid du ni 'dzeg pa'i gnas// de srid mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur// badz+ra ma hA/ rig pa 'dzin pa 'dod smra ba// ye shes rnam bzhi/
98a5(rgyud 'bum): sbyin par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing // nam mkha' la ni bdag nyid gnas// lag na rdo rje dang ldan par// bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//
98a6(rgyud 'bum): gal te chos kyi phyag rgya 'dod// gnas sam yang na gzhan yang rung // bdag nyid gnas par bsgoms na ni// de ltar gnas shing lag pa ru// rdo rje pad+ma rab sgom zhing // bdag nyid rdo rje chos su ste//
98a7(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// badz+ra d+ha ra/ pad+ma d+ha ra/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug ste// bdag nyid las dang yang dag ldan// nam mkha' la gnas bdag nyid ni// las kyi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//
98b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid rdo rje rin chen dang // de bzhin du ni bdag nyid gnas// lag tu rin chen rnam bsgoms na// rin chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// karma d+hA ra/ rat+na d+ha ra// gal te sangs rgyas dngos grub smra/
98b2(rgyud 'bum): ye shes rnam bzhi brjod par bya// rtag tu nam mkhar bsgoms nas ni// lus ni yang ba nyid 'gyur zhing // rdzu 'phrul gyi ni gnas thob 'gyur// rdo rje'i bdag nyid myur du 'phar// badz+ra rit+ti/ stong gsum
98b3(rgyud 'bum): gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ / thams cad rdo rje rang bzhin bstan// rdo rje'i bdag nyid ji srid 'dod// de srid skad cig gis 'phar 'gyur// badz+ra badz+ra/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dag/ yan lag pad+ma dang
98b4(rgyud 'bum): ldan zhin/ / bdag nyid dag par rab bsgom nas// mngon par shes pa lnga thob 'gyur// shud+d+ha shud+d+ha/ nyin mtshan brtson 'grus dang bcas pas// rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' yi// dbyings su
98b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs par bsams na ni/ / rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur// khams gsum 'di dag thams cad ni// sangs rgyas gzugs su mos byas nas// brtan par rjes su dran grub na// sangs rgyas nyid
98b6(rgyud 'bum): du 'gyur ba yin/ / satwa satwa/ bud+d+ha bun+d+ha/ gang tshe gsang ba'i lha mor 'gyur// de yi rigs kyi lha ru 'gyur// ye shes dag pa brjod bya zhing // de la mna' yang bsgag par bya// ji skad gsang mdo
98b7(rgyud 'bum): dbang gsungs pa/ / de bzhin b+ha gar gzhug par bya// yid kyis thams cad bcug nas ni// de yi lus ni mnyam du spro// mi bskyod thugs ka nas byung ste// rnam par snang mdzad thugs ka nas// de t
99a1(rgyud 'bum): hugs kar zhugs nas ni/ / sangs rgyas kun ni mnyam du spro// ting 'dzin sbyor ba la gnas te// mnyam par gzhag pas pheg rdob bya// rdo rje thal mo'i pheg brdabs
99a2(rgyud 'bum): pas/ / dngos grub thams cad dbang du 'gyur// badz+ra pA sha/ rin dbang thugs ka nas byung ste// rnam par snang mdzad thugs ka nas// sangs rgyas kun ni bcug nas kyang // bdag nyid rdo rje'i
99a3(rgyud 'bum): lha mo ru/ / rdo rje thal mo byas nas ni// rdo rje bsdams pa'i mthil brdab bya// rdo rje rnal 'byor bsgrub bya zhing // rdo rje ye shes yang dag brdab// rdo rje dbab pa byas nas ni// de bzhin du ni b+ha gar
99a4(rgyud 'bum): zhugs/ / rdo rje thal mo byas nas ni// sor mo'i rtse mos mnyam du brdab// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // rtag tu nyon mongs dang 'brel ba// nyon mongs zhes bya'i sgrib pa dag/ skad cig
99a5(rgyud 'bum): gis ni rigs brgya 'joms/ / badz+ra ha na// de bzhin b+ha gar gnas nas ni// sangs rgyas sku ni mnyam du spro// rdo rje lha mo rang bdag nyid// rnam par snang mdzad thugs kar gnas// rdo rje lha mo btsi dra nas ni/ badz+ra badz+ra lan gnyis brjo// rdo rje bsdams pa
99a6(rgyud 'bum): nges bkrol na/ / sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms pa'i mchog/ badz+ra ha ra/ de nas rnam par snang mdzad sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni// sngar gyi ting 'dzin ji bzhin du// rdo rje dbyings ni
99a7(rgyud 'bum): rab tu bya/ / rnal 'byor lnga la'ang rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnyed dka' min// oM tsit+ta pra ti bo d+haM ka ro mi// oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pa ta yA mi/ oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ oM badz+ra At+ma ko haM/
99b1(rgyud 'bum): ya thA sarba ta thA ga ta ta thA a haM/ rnal 'byor lnga po 'di yis ni// phyag rgya lnga ni yang dag sgrub// rnam par snang mdzad rang dag nyid// dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gsheg
99b2(rgyud 'bum): ba thams cad kyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyag rgya rnams so/ / sems dpa'i skyil mo krung 'dug ste// rdo rje gsor la gzung bar bya// sku dang gsung thugs phyag rgya dag/ rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid
99b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / badz+ra satwa haM// sgrub pa dag gi mchog chen po// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// rang nyid rdo rje gsung gis bshad// rdo rje rnal 'byor bsgrub par bya// bsnams bcas rdo rje gsor nas ni//
99b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje bsnyems tshul yang dag gzung // rdo rje dbab par rang gyur nas// bdag nyid rdo rje zhes byar sgom// badz+ra satwa haM/ rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan zhing // dkyil 'khor ma lus ston mdzad
99b5(rgyud 'bum): pa/ 'phreng ba'i rnam pa 'od dang ldan// rgyan dang gos dang kha dog ldan// Ta ba ta ni brjod bya zhing // sems dpa' chen po rjes dran bya// ye shes sems dpa' gos pa med// dga' dag
99b6(rgyud 'bum): ji srid mthong bar du/ / badz+ra satwa dri sh+ye/ sems dpa' mdun du bltas nas ni// bdag nyid la ni yang dag dbab// oM badz+ra satwa a/ sdug cing che ba'i sku de ni// rdo rje ljags kyus yang dag dgug
99b7(rgyud 'bum): wa hUM baM bo/ rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis// bdag nyid chen pos blta bar bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs ka ru// slar yang de yi snying khar gzhug/ sa ma ya ma/ zhes brjod nas ni rnam
100a1(rgyud 'bum): 'byor pa/ / zla ba dang ldan steng du gnas// ci 'dod pa yi bya ba byed// sangs rgyas nyid kyang bsgrub par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' 'di ji bzhin// de nas sbyor ba 'di yis ni//
100a2(rgyud 'bum): rang gi phyag rgya yongs 'dzin pa'i// rdo rje can kun bsgom par bya// gang dang gang la mos gyur pa// de bzhin snying pos bzla bar bya// rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rdo rje can dang mtshungs par 'gyur
100a3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rjes dran rab bsgrubs nas/ / chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor bya// rang gi phyag rgya yongs 'dzin pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs grub pas// 'khor lo sgyur ba nyid thob 'gyur// rgyal po
100a4(rgyud 'bum): bya ba sngon 'gro bas/ / mnyes pa dang ni dbang bskur bya// thun ni yongs su rdzogs pa dang // chos kyi bzhad dang dga' bar gyur// ting 'dzin gzungs kyi 'khor lo dang // gsang ba'i mdzod ni tha
100a5(rgyud 'bum): na med/ / smin pa dang ni grol ba nyid// sangs rgyas byang chub bstan pa'i mchog/ rtog pa gsang chen 'di las ni// phyag rgya grangs med yang dag byung // rigs kyi dbye ba yang dag ldan// rgya cher
100a6(rgyud 'bum): rab tu bsgrags pa yin/ / go cha ma bgos snod mi 'gyur// le lo khro dang g.yeng bcas pas// nges par 'dzin par mi nus te// de bas nyung bar rab tu bsgrags// mdo sde'i dbang po
100a7(rgyud 'bum): gsang rgyal po/ / de nas phyag rgya rab tu bshad// theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs// rin chen snod du blta bar bya// ye shes kyi mngon par rtogs pa rdzogs so//
100b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'chang rnams kyi snying po// gang las 'khor lo yang dag byung // rnal 'byor thams cad kun 'byung ba// mchog tu gsang ba bshad par bya// dbus kyi 'khor lor yang dag bshad/
100b2(rgyud 'bum): rnam 'phrul zhes ni rab tu bsgrags// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul te// 'khor lo thabs ni rab ston pa// 'khor lo lnga ru yang dag bshad/ thabs ni rnam pa lnga yang yin// gsang ba yi ni dbye ba gnas/
100b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo yi ni rnam 'phrul ston// dbus ma gang yin byang chub sems// shar gyi bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi// lho yi tshogs su bshad pa ste// bsod nams tshogs dang yang dag ldan// ti nge
100b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin dang gzungs rnams dang / / chos su 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa// nub tu yang dag brjod pa yin// byang ni sems can smin byas te// phyi rol grwa bzhi gang yin pa// tshad med pa ni bzhi dang
100b5(rgyud 'bum): bcas/ / byams pa snying rje btang snyoms dang // dga' ba zhes ni bya bar bshad// gang zhig thig skud yang dag bshad// chos kyi rgyun gyi lam las byung // lta ba thams cad rnam dag 'di/
100b6(rgyud 'bum): theg pa gzhan ni rnam par spangs// gang zhig ga khyer zhes bya ba// ting 'dzin chos nyid dag pa ste// rdo rje lha mor yang dag bshad// gzungs kyi sgo zhes bya bar bshad// go ru yang dag bshad pa gang
100b7(rgyud 'bum): thar pa'i sgo ni bzhi po yin/ / rta babs dang ni dra ba nyid// chos mdzod rang bzhin grong khyer yin// dra ba dra phyed bla re ni// rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs rnam 'phrul pa// tshon rtsi yang dag bshad pa dang //
101a1(rgyud 'bum): de 'dra ba yi byang chub tshogs// gang zhig mar me yang dag bshad// de ni chos kyi snang ba mchog/ dri ru yang dag bshad pa gang // grags pa'i dri ni bla na med// rdzu 'phrul
101a2(rgyud 'bum): byug pa gang yin pa/ / tshul khrims dri yis byugs pa yin// bza' ba dag ni sna tshogs pa// chos kyi zas ni bla na med// rnam pa sna tshogs dga' bar bshad// rtog pa thams cad rnam par
101a3(rgyud 'bum): spangs/ / grong khyer du ni bshad pa gang // de ni thar pa'i grong khyer mchog/ gang zhig dkyil 'khor yang dag bshad// chos kyi snying po rang bzhin grong // nad med ces ni bya bar brjod// de ni dkyil 'khor
101a4(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya'o/ / dbus su rnam snang mdzad ces pa// chos kun gcig tu bsdus pa yin// sangs rgyas rgyal po gtso bo che// phyogs rnams kun tu rnam par gsal// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bshad//
101a5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin mchog/ de bas rgyal po byang chub sems// byang chub sems las yang dag byung // rdo rje rgyal por yang dag byung // sems ni rnam pa bzhi zhes bya// sgrol dang grol dang
101a6(rgyud 'bum): dbugs dbyung dang / / mya ngan 'da' bar lcags kyu'o// rdo rje chags par yang dag bshad// byang chub spyod pa la sbyor ba// rdo rje legs par yang dag bshad// rab tu sbyor ba ston pa nyid// rdo rje
101a7(rgyud 'bum): rin chen yang dag bshad/ / sems can bsam pa yongs rdzogs shing // rdo rje gzi brjid yang dag bshad// chos kyi sbyor ba 'od byed pa// rdo rje rgyal mtshan yang dag bshad// sems can
101b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor ba las grol byed/ / rdo rje bzhad par yang dag bshad// sems can the tshom gcod par byed// rdo rje chos su yang dag bshad// chos kyi ye shes bla na med// rdo rje rnon por yang dag
101b2(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / nyon mongs gcod cing 'joms byed pa// rdo rje rgyu ru yang dag bshad// 'khor lo rnam 'phrul ston byed pa// rdo rje smra bar yang dag bshad// rdo rje chos ni ston byed pa// rdo
101b3(rgyud 'bum): las su yang dag bshad/ / sems can 'dul bar byed pa'i mchog/ rdo rje srung bar yang dag bshad// sems can grol bar byed pa'i mchog/ rdo rje gnod sbyin yang dag bshad// 'khor
101b4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i zhags pa za byed pa/ / rdo rje khu tshur yang dag bshad// byang chub mchog ni brtan par byed// rdo rje sems ma rdo rje chos// rin chen las kyi rdo rje ma// rdo rje rin chen chos chen po// las kyi
101b5(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba las byung ba/ / rdo rje lha mo lhag pa brgyad// pha rol phyin mchog lhag ma brgyad// chos ma shes rab pha rol phyin// las ma thabs kyi mchog yin no// pha rol phyin bcu dag pa ni// sa bcu
101b6(rgyud 'bum): dag tu yang dag bshad/ / dam pa'i chos kyi grong khyer srung // byang chub sems dpa' zhes byar bshad// e ma'o ye shes e ma'o chos// e ma'o thar pa'i grong khyer mchog/ e ma'o rnam
101b7(rgyud 'bum): 'phrul 'khor lo ni/ / thub pa'i dbang phyug dag gis bstan// chos kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni// mgon pos thar par dgod pa mdzad// gang du sangs rgyas rgal gyur nas// sems can rnams
102a1(rgyud 'bum): kyang sgrol bar mdzad/ / 'di ni chos kyi rang bzhin grub// 'di chos rang bzhin shing rta ste// chos kyi rang bzhin snying po 'di// 'di chos rang bzhin grong khyer yin// de kho na
102a2(rgyud 'bum): nyid mchog tu gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po gsang ba'i rnal 'byor chen po rdo rje rtse mo las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mdo sde'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i rnam par bshad
102a3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang po rdzogs so/ / / dngos grub thams cad bla na med// de nas gsang ba bshad par bya// rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa ni// bdag nyid kyis ni sbyar bar bya// cho ga rnga
102a4(rgyud 'bum): lta bu bzhin du/ / phyag rgya bcing ba bshad par bya// ci rigs par ni bcing bya yi// gzhan du myur du 'grub mi 'gyur// thal mo mnyam pa bcing bya ste// sngon la thal mo mnyam par bya// de nas
102a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje thal mo bcings/ / rdo rje bsdams pa bcing bar bya// sor mo rdo rje bsdams bcings nas// snying po brjod cing dral bar bya// de nas phyag rgya dbang du 'gyur// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom
102a6(rgyud 'bum): med/ / badz+ra ban+d+ha tra tha/ 'di ni sngon du brjod bya zhing // de nas phyag rgya yang dag bcing // gang gi drung du bcings pa ni// bdag nyid yang dag byin gyis brlabs// sa ma ya satwa haM/ shes rab
102a7(rgyud 'bum): can gyis dbab pa bsam/ / bdag la sems dpa' dbab par bya// dam tshig phyag rgya bcings nas ni// snying po yang ni brjod par bya// a/ phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyi ni// yan lag
102b1(rgyud 'bum): kun la yongs su gnas/ / snying po brjod par bya ba ste// snying po 'di dag nyid yin no// sa ma ya haM/ de nas bdag nyid byin brlabs nas// rang lha yang dag rjes su dran// snying po 'di dag
102b2(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyis ni/ / snying po brjod par bya ba yin// sa ma yA sAtwa a d+hiSh+Tha swa maM/ phyag rgya sgrub pa lhur len pa// de nas shes rab can gyis sgrub// dam tshig sems dpa' chen po dag/ rnam
102b3(rgyud 'bum): pa bzhi ni bsgrub par bya/ / de la 'di rnams kyi gsang ba'i snying po ni/ ar+tha sid+d+hi/ badz+ra sid+d+hi/ badz+ra bIr+ya/ bud+d+ha sid+d+hi/ de nas phyag rgya brtan par byed pa ni/ oM badz+ra satwa sa
102b4(rgyud 'bum): ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badz+ra satwa twe no pa tiSh+Tha dri D+ho me b+ha wa/ su toSh+To me b+hA ba/ su po b+h+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to ma b+ha wa/ sarba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me/ tsiSh+Ti shwe
102b5(rgyud 'bum): 5ku ru d+h+r-i/ ta ha ha ha ho/ b+ha ga wA/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra mA me muny+dzu badz+ri d+hawa mahA sa ma ya satwa oM/ mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang // rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'drar
102b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / phyag rgya thams cad 'grub 'gyur zhing // thams cad 'grub par the tsom med// de nas thams cad grol ba ni thun mong yin no// phyag rgya thams cad bcings nas ni// tha mar
102b7(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid dbang bskur bya/ / sor mo'i rtse mos 'phreng ba che// rnam bzhi yang ni rnam pa gsum/ oM badz+ra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ shes rab can gyis go cha bcings// ci nus par ni dbang bskur
103a1(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni// phyag rgya thams cad brtan par bya// badz+ra ka ba tson pa/ gang nas byung ba der grol te// snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni// gnas
103a2(rgyud 'bum): de ru ni dgrol bar bya/ / gzhan du bya ba mi byed do// oM badz+ra muH/ mgon po thal mo mnyes bya zhing // rdo rje thal mo bcing bar bya// snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni// rdo rje can kun mnyes par
103a3(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / badz+ra tu Sh+ya ho/ cho ga 'di yis dgrol bya ste// phyag rgya dgrol ba mchog yin no// phyag rgya thams cad brtan 'gyur nas// rdo rje can ni mnyes par 'gyur// snga dro'i dus su nyin re zhing //
103a4(rgyud 'bum): shin tu bsdams shing gsang bar 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' ci 'dod bzlas// bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// badz+ra satwa/ gsang ba'i yi ge hUM bzlas pas// rnam pa lnga ni mthong
103a5(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / gsang ba'i sbyor ba'i cho ga yis// rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub par 'gyur// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// zla ba gnyis pa yongs su sgom// bdag nyid sangs rgyas dang ldan pa//
103a6(rgyud 'bum): rdorje'i dbus su bsgom par bya// mdor na rdo rje'i dbus su ni// yi ge hUM ni sbyar bar bya// rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// yi ge hUM ni bsgrub par bya// hUM/ de ltar rnam pa bcu drug ni// phyag mtshan
103a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rab tu sgom/ / zla ba'i dbus su rab sbyor bas// bdag nyid thams cad skad cig 'grub// yang na yi ge sbyor bas ni// dbus su sbyor bas bsgrub par bya// zla ba yi ni sbyor ba yis//
103b1(rgyud 'bum): yi ge dza sogs 'grub mi 'gyur// yi ge ho dang sa dang ni// yi ge oM sogs rab sbyor bas// zla ba la ni oM a traM// yi ge haM ni rab tu sgrub// hrI dang d+hi dang maM baM raM// ka haM hUM baM bsgrub par bya//
103b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i tshig ni 'di dag gis// rdo rje bzlas pas 'grub par bya// bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' 'am// bcu drug bdag nyid rab sbyor bas// rnal 'byor rgyud du bsgrub bya zhing // zla ba'i dbus su
103b3(rgyud 'bum): bsgom par bya/ / de kho na bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ni// nyi ma shar ba nas brtsams te// bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs pa// sangs rgyas kun la mchod par bya// rdo rje can rnams bzod par
103b4(rgyud 'bum): gsol/ / phyag rgya thams cad bcing bya zhing // rdo rje'i thal mos mnyes par bya// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni// thams cad byas nas gdon par bya// lan gsum dang ni lan bdun du//
103b5(rgyud 'bum): bskor ba dag kyang rab tu bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che// mkhas pa yis ni dral bar bya// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya che// 'khor lo'i dbus su steng du bcing // gang gis sems ni dag gyur
103b6(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / phyag rgya thams cad yang dag bcing // oM badz+ra muH/ snying po 'di ni brjod nas su// phyag rgya thams cad steng du bcing // sgo dang phyi rol mchod pa la// rdo rje mu ni brjod par bya// gsang
103b7(rgyud 'bum): ba 'di ni gsang ba che/ / rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa ni// shes rab can gyis kun mi bstan// sdom dang ldan pa mchog la sbyin// shin tu snod ldan pha rol la// de ni rig pa'i brtul zhugs te// lag pa/
104a1(rgyud 'bum): g.yas su rdo rje ste// g.yon du dril bu sbyin par bya// rdo rje'i brtul zhugs gsang chen po// snying po 'di ni sbyin par bya// de byin snying khar 'dzin du gzhug/ thams cad sgrub pa'i
104a2(rgyud 'bum): mchog yin no/ / 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // phyag na rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badz+ra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha
104a3(rgyud 'bum): e Sha s+t+waM d+ha ra yA mi badz+ra satwa/ hi hi hi hi hUM/ de nas thams cad mtshungs pa ru// phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor dgrol bar bya// badz+ra satwa muH/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi bya ba rdzogs so//
104a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo ltar cho gar rab ldan nyid// rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor te// rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po che// de bzhin kun tu bsgrub par bya// rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po che// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yis//
104a5(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor gyi ni rgyud bsdus pa// mchog tu gsang ba gsungs par gyur// e ma'o sangs rgyas mgon po che// spyod pa spyad phyir byung ba ste// chos kyi mgon po rnal 'byor che// rgyud rnams thams cad
104a6(rgyud 'bum): yang dag byung / / sangs rgyas med cing sems dpa' med// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor sgrub pa med// sa dang gsang ba mchog med de// de bzhin gdul ba'i don du byung // sangs rgyas mchog dang dam
104a7(rgyud 'bum): tshig mchog/ sems dpa' mchog gi sgrub pa dang // gsang mchog sems dpa'i spyod pa mchog/ rdorje rnal 'byor yang dag byung // yon tan mchog dran dam tshig rnams kyi mchog/ yon tan mchog dran
104b1(rgyud 'bum): dbu rgyan dam pa ste/ / grags chen dang ldan spyod pa mchog 'dzin pa// yon tan mchog ldan rnams kyi spyod pa mchog/ rdo rje chen po rab bsdams can// rnal 'byor chen po spyod pa chen po spyod/
104b2(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba chen po'i yon tan 'dzin mdzad pa// bde ba chen po yang dag 'byung ba gsol// yon tan mchog dran ldan pa cod pan mchog/ dam tshig tshogs mchog 'byung bas rgyan gyur pa// mi g.yo rab
104b3(rgyud 'bum): mchog ster dri ma med/ / spyod mchog spyod pa'i mchog ste dri ma med// tshogs kyis bskor bar shin tu bzhad mdzad pa// gnod byed 'joms pa tra Ta tra Ta sgrog/ g.yo byed bskyed pa'i bzhad cing bzhad
104b4(rgyud 'bum): par mdzad/ / yon tan mchog drag tsa la tsa la pa// ha da ha dA pa ya gnod mdzes 'joms// ha ra ha ra ha re ha re las mchog 'joms// gnas chen po ni stobs kyis grub mdzad pa// rigs mchog
104b5(rgyud 'bum): stobs kyis grol zhing sgrol mdzad pa/ / ha ha hA ha ha hA ha ha hA/ hi hi hI hi hi hI hi hi hI/ hi hi hrI/ hu hu hu hu hu hu hu hu hu hu/ rab mchog bdag nyid mkhas pas 'dren gyur pa// Ta Ta Ti Ta Ta Ti Ta Ta Ti Ta Ta Ti TaH
104b6(rgyud 'bum): Ti ma Ti Ta Ta TI/ tsu Tu n+ya n+ya/ n+ya n+yan+yan+ya Tu n+ya n+ya n+ya D+ha/ rgyan gyi spyod pa 'dar zhing 'dar bar mdzad// spyod pa spyod pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur// spyod pa spyod byed rab mchog bdag nyid can/
104b7(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig rgyan te rigs drug mchod gyur pa// bdag po chen po 'phrog byed 'joms par mdzad// 'phrog byed sgrub pa rnams ni grub mdzad pa// mchog gsol mchog gi bdag nyid yang dag byung /
105a1(rgyud 'bum): ta te ta te bstan pa'i spyan mnga' ba// yi ge dza las rab byung mchog ni ster ba hUM ni dang po las sbyor ba// ho ho 'dod chags mchog ldan bud med bstan byed sa ni len pa rab ster ba/
105a2(rgyud 'bum): oM ni dang po bla med Ta Ta Ta Tis a ni gzi brjid rab 'bar ba// tra tA rjes su chags pa'i rnal 'byor rdzogs byed ha ni bzhad pa yang dag sbyor// pri ni chos can byed cing rab rno dri med hi ni rgyu yi 'khor
105a3(rgyud 'bum): lo che/ / haM dang r-i ni mkha' dgyes smra ba'i sbyor ba 'ching byed a ni sna tshogs byed// haM ni srung ba trata 'ges byes ta Ta ta Ti sa ni hUM ni za zhing 'cha'// baM ni dga' byed dga' ste tsha ta tsha ti Ta ni rab dga'
105a4(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / so ni rdo rje bstan pa dang bcas bde brtan 'dod chags bcas pa dga' byed do// ho ni mgon po skye ba mchog gi rgyur gyur tri ni dga' ba bdag nyid can// so ni spyod pa 'god byed dul spyong
105a5(rgyud 'bum): mchog ste dus gsum mgon pos bskor gyur pa/ / gsang zhing gsang ba'i yon tan kun mchog dri med ho ni byang chub spyod pa mchog/ mchog gi mchog ste mchog gsol go 'phang mchog thob yi ge/
105a6(rgyud 'bum): hUM ni gsol ba mchog/ nyon mongs dri ma thams cad 'joms shing rab 'phro hUM gi mche ba'i mtshon char ldan// sna tshogs dga' ba mchog gis rnam par rgyan mdzes yi ge oM dang yang dag spel// he tsa
105a7(rgyud 'bum): ni yid bong hUM gis sna tshogs 'joms/ / gnod mdzes nges 'joms bdag nyid can// bde mchog glu dang rol mo dang bcas pa// gzugs bzang dang ldan lha mo rnams kyis mchod// zla ba ltar dkar
105b1(rgyud 'bum): 'phro ba'i zhal mnga' ba/ / rdo rje gsang ba'i yon tan brtsegs pas mtshan// rin chen kun gyis rnam spras yid 'ong ba// rin chen dra ba'i bla res rnam par mdzes// rdo rje lha mos tshogs kyis mchod cing
105b2(rgyud 'bum): mdzes/ / byang chub sems dpa'i gnas ni 'jigs med pa// sa rnams kun gyis rnam sbyang dri med pa// byang chub spyod pa yongs rtogs bdag nyid can// chos mdzad yongs su rtogs pa'i zas dang ldan//
105b3(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams de yis bskyed pa'i dga' ba che// tshangs pa'i rnal 'byor gru zhir yang dag gnas// chos mchog go rims bzhin du thig btab pas// 'khor lo mu khyud rab tu mdzes bris pa//
105b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la ni gtso bo bzhugs// ting 'dzin mchog rnams kha khyer gyis mdzes pa// gzungs kyi lha yi tshogs kyis mchod pa'i tshogs// thar pa'i theg pas byams pa'i sgo yis brgyan//
105b5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la ni 'dren pa bzhugs// pha rol phyin nas btsun mo gar byed pa// sems can smin byed rnam par 'phrul la dga'// bsam gtan zas ldan mngon shes mchog gis brgyan//
105b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la ni 'dren pa bzhugs// dkyil 'khor de ni gtso bo'i chos nyid can// chos nyid bstan pa'i snying po kun bzhugs pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshogs 'dus mdzes pa yis// bde
105b7(rgyud 'bum): bar gshegs pa'i gsang ba zhes byar bshad/ / rdo rje sems dpa' dbang phyug dam pa che// gsang ba kun 'byung ting 'dzin yang dag gnas// de ni rnam snang thub pa'i chos nyid gzigs// gzungs
106a1(rgyud 'bum): dang dam tshig yang dag 'byung ba mchog/ dga' ba'i chos bzhin rdo rje yang dag gnas// de ni rnam snang thub pa'i dbang phyug gtso// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po nges par
106a2(rgyud 'bum): phyung / / hUM shin tu dag pa'i chos nyid lta bur byung // sangs rgyas dbang phyug dam pa'i kun gyi mchog/ rtse gcig dang bcas e ma'o dga' ba che// sangs rgyas sku yang bud med gzugs can te//
106a3(rgyud 'bum): sems can khams ni gdul phyir yang dag gnas// bud med gzugs kyang chos nyid dag pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi gdung rgyur gnas gyur pa// rang gyi rigs chen byung ba nges byung mdzod//
106a4(rgyud 'bum): oM badz+ra d+hA tI shwa ri hUM// oM badz+ra badz+rI Ni hUM/ oM rat+na badz+rI N-i trAM/ oM d+harmA badz+rI Ni dz+haiM/ oM kar+m+ma badz+rI NitrAM/ mchog gi dang po rmad byung gsang ba lnga// sangs rgyas lngas byas bud med gzugs can te/
106a5(rgyud 'bum): rmad byung dang bcas dbang phyug dam par gnas// rdo rje gsang chos nyid kyi gsang ba mchog/ 'khor lo'i sbyor bas kyang ni bzhugs gyur pas// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis ni shar du bzhugs// de ni rigs
106a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor brjod/ / re re zhing yang rnal 'byor mchog dang ldan// rnal 'byor 'khor lor yongs su bshad pa mchog/ de yis mi bskyod mchog tu byung ba yi// mchog tu gsang ba yi ni
106a7(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gsungs/ / oM badz+ra satwa gu h+ya sa ma ye hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya badz+ra saM aM ku sha hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya rA ge rA ga ya hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya sad+d+hi shwa ri hUM/ rdo rje rin chen dkyil 'khor bstan kyar
106b1(rgyud 'bum): pa/ de yis slar yang snying po bzhi gsungs pa// oM badz+ra gu h+ya rat+na sa ma ya hUM// oM badz+ra gu N+ya bri baMg+h+nAM/ oM badz+ra d+hA dzA gra gu h+ya ts+tsha/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya hAs hUM/ rdo rje chos ni dbang phyug dam
106b2(rgyud 'bum): pa che/ / de yis slar yang snying po bzhi gsungs so// oM badz+ra d+harma gu h+ya sa ma ye hUM/ oM badz+ra g+ho Sha gu h+ye hUM/ oM badz+ra gu he maN+Da le hU~M/ oM badz+ra gu h+ye dza ba sa ma ya hUM/ rdo rje las ni yongs
106b3(rgyud 'bum): su dag pas mchod/ / 'khor lo thams cad la ni yongs gnas mdzes// chos mchog dbang phyug dam pa mchog gyur pa// de yi snying po bzhi ni gsungs par gyur// oM badz+ra gu h+ya karma sa ma ye
106b4(rgyud 'bum): hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya ka pa tsa hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ye daMSh+Ta d+hA ra Ni hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya muSh+Ti hUM/ sngar bzhin 'khor lo'i grong khyer yongs gnas pa// rdo rje'i gzugs yongs gnas mdzes gyur pa// de nyid
106b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas sras te rdo rjer bcas/ / 'on kyang de ltar bud med gzugs su sprul// de dag srid pa dag byed rab tu 'bar// thar pa'i grong du 'dod chags dag byed pa// rtog dang rnam par rtog pa bzlog
106b6(rgyud 'bum): pas dag/ chos la dga' zhing sku mchog 'byung 'gyur ba// bden dang mi bden rnam dag nyi shu dang // chos dang chos min dga' zhing dga' ba'i snod// byed dang byed min rdo rje tha dad gcig/ rdo rje
106b7(rgyud 'bum): tha dad bstan pa ho yis rab sbyangs yod/ / gsang 'byor rin chen las byas chos grong ste// rnam 'phrul 'khor lo 'di ni ma pham don// rdo rje bla re'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// gsang dbang rdorje
107a1(rgyud 'bum): chen po yis/ / thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer mdzad// sems can kun la phan don du// 'khor lo lnga ni yang dag byung // de bzhin gshegs rigs zhes bya dang // mi phyed
107a2(rgyud 'bum): brtan par byed pa dang / / byang chub spyod pa rab mchod mchog/ theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog/ gdul bya ji bzhin 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// gtso bo'i spyod pa ji bzhin lhan cig spyod//
107a3(rgyud 'bum): sems can gdul bya ma yin snod mchog min// mthu chen rnams ni dngos grub stsol mi mdzad// der ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin dag/ yon tan mang po yang dag byung // sems can rnams ni gdul bya'i phyir// /
107a4(rgyud 'bum): rdorje'i btsun mo dag las byung // de nyid sangs rgyas sras bcas pa// de nyid 'khor lo'i grong khyer che// mchod pa sgo srungs dang bcas pa// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag byung // mgon po rdo rje
107a5(rgyud 'bum): gsang dbang phyug/ rdo rje'i dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad// rdo rje chos kyi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje pha rol phyin pa mchog/ sngon ni ji ltar de bzhin phyis// de bzhin dbus su rab tu gnas// sangs
107a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kun gyi thabs yin te/ / gsang ba'i sbyor ba yang dag byung // rdo rje dbyings ni ji skad brjod// de nyid gsang ba zhes byar brjod// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa// rgyas pa phyag rgya dang bcas
107a7(rgyud 'bum): par/ / 'khor lo lnga yi dkyil 'khor mchog/ rgyas pa ru ni yang dag bshad// mdo sde'i gsang dbang rgyal po ni// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus las// gsang ba'i rgyud dang phyag rgya dang // dkyil
107b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor 'khor lo zla ba dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ni// de dag rnam pa lnga ru bshad// rdo rje dbyings kyi snying rab mchog/ mdor na drug tu bshad pa yin// dam chos spyod pa dang ldan pa//
107b2(rgyud 'bum): de nas bde bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// nus pa ji bzhin rigs pa bzhin// ji ltar spyod pa dkyil 'khor mchog/ ci rigs par ni cho ga bzhin// mchog tu rmad byung bshad par bya// sngon la de bzhin
107b3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs rigs kyi/ / sems dpa' nga yis dbye bar bya// nga yis mdo sde gsang dbang bshad// gang du byis pa dag rmongs pa// rdo rje slob dpon skal ba che// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/
107b4(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i phyag rgya bcu drug ni// gsang ba nges par bslab par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rkang lag thal sbyar rdo rje ni// kha gyes pa ni bsgom bya zhing // rdo rje can yang chags par bya// stong
107b5(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ / zla ba gcig tu yongs su bsdu// rdo rje'i dbang phyug lha mo nga// dbus ma la ni yongs su gzung // sgeg pa dang bcas 'gro bya zhing // rnam par 'phrul pas bzhin rmongs
107b6(rgyud 'bum): bya/ sgom pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rdo rje can yang mnyes par bya// sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas nas ni// spyi bor thal mo sbyar bar bya// phyag rgya 'di ni bcings nas su// bdag nyid yang dag byin
107b7(rgyud 'bum): gyis rlabs/ / sgom pa'i phyag rgya 'di yis ni// sku yi phyag rgya rnam par bcing // log ngar lcags kyur bskum bya zhing // bdag nyid yongs su bsgrub par bya// de bzhin sgom pa'i sbyor ba yis//
108a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i mda' ni kun tu dgang // lag pas legs so zhes bya zhing // dpung pas bdag nyid go bgo bya// slar yang gsang bar bya ba ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/
108a2(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid rdo rje gcig pu gnas// gsang ba lha mo'i dbang phyug mchog/ de bzhin lag ngar bkug bya zhing // spyi bor rdo rje bsam par bya// phyogs gcig tu ni nga 'dug ste// rdo rje gnyis kyi go cha
108a3(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / thams cad rdo rje'i lus yin te// rin chen mig ni yongs gsal ba// gdong dang tshig ni pad+ma dang // me tog kun dar bsgom par bya// byis pa bzhin du mig bskyod cing // bud med rgyu mtshan
108a4(rgyud 'bum): yang dag sgrub/ / sprin ma bskyod cing khro gnyer gtsigs// khro bo'i lta bas mig gdangs pa// khro mo'i lta ba 'dod chags che// 'dzum bcas mig ni btsum par bya// mig gdangs pa yi
108a5(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba yis/ / rdo rje'i lta bas bgrad par bya// slar yang tshig ni rnam pa bzhi// ho ni rkan dang lkog ma la// dza ni lce yi dbus dang rtse// oM ni lkog ma mchu dag la// mchu dang mchu yi rtse la baM//
108a6(rgyud 'bum): de rnams gsad pa rab rgyas pa// bskrad dang spros dang gcad pa dang // bcing ba rdo rje tshig gis bya// de bzhin kho nar zla dbus na// phyag na rdo rje'i rang bzhin nyid// rin chen chos dang de bzhin las
108a7(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ / cho ga thams cad rgyas pa ru// rdo rje gsang ba rjes su srung // ji ltar rnal 'byor yang dag gnas// de bzhin gsang mchog 'dzin pa gnas// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bla na
108b1(rgyud 'bum): med/ / de nas yang dag bshad par bya// rdo rje rnal 'byor yang dag gnas// rdo rje'i phra mo bsgom par bya// dpa' bo rdo rje'i sems dpa' ni// phyi rol las grol yang dag gnas// langs sam
108b2(rgyud 'bum): yang na 'dug kyang rung / / rdo rje'i rnal 'byor yang dag brtsam// theg pa chen po'i tshul dag pa// spyod pa chen po tshul chen po// bdag nyid chos chen rab bsgoms na// rdo rje'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur//
108b3(rgyud 'bum): 'du byed sdug bsngal chen po las// dga' ba'i spyod pas spro bar bya// snying rje chen pos dmigs nas ni// sems can btang snyoms dor mi bya// lce ni dkan la sbyar bya zhing // sna yi rtse mor bsgom par
108b4(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// sna yi rtse mor de bzhin gnas// snying kha'i spyi bo ci nus par/ u ni thams cad yongs su spro// rdo rje phra mo'i bde reg pas// sems ni mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur
108b5(rgyud 'bum): rdorje'i mdun du rdo rjeste/ / rdo rje'i dbus su bsgom par bya// rdo rje bsgoms pa'i sbyor po yis// rdo rje phra mo yongs su spro// rang gi lus kyi mdun du ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya/ rdo rje sems dpa'
108b6(rgyud 'bum): thugs dbus su/ / rdo rje kun gyi dkyil 'khor ro// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// lte bar sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje phra mo bsgom par bya// rdo rje rnam bsgoms sems gang zhig/ gsus
108b7(rgyud 'bum): med bstan du med pa dang / / rmongs pa med cing 'jigs pa med// rdo rje phra mor 'dir brjod do// dngos po med cing rdzas med pas// snang ba med par rab tu sgom// bdag med sems can med pa ru//
109a1(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor pas ni rnal 'byor sgom// lus ni rdzas lnga'i bdag nyid can// khams bzhi la ni yang dag brten// skye mched bcu gnyis nyid dang ni// gzhan yang khams ni bcob
109a2(rgyud 'bum): dag/ sha dang rus pa khrag nyid dang // rkang dang klad pas kun tu khyab// sna tshogs rdzas kyis kun tu khyab// bad kan mkhris pa la sogs tshogs// sna tshogs srin bu'i rigs kyis khyab// dri ngan mi gtsang 'byung ba ru//
109a3(rgyud 'bum): rang gi lus la so sor brtag/ sdug bsngal gsum ni kun 'byung bar// nyin dang mtshan mo rtag tu ni// lus ni rjes su dran pa sgom// rang sems so sor brtag bya ste// gang zhig de ru yang dag byung // 'gro
109a4(rgyud 'bum): ba med cing song ba med/ / de la 'pho ba yod ma yin// de la 'byung ba yod min pa// gang las sems ni yang dag byung // yang dag ma yin kun rtog 'di// brdzun bzhin sems ni rmongs par byed// sems med
109a5(rgyud 'bum): tsam yang yod ma yin/ / brdzun bzhin 'byung bar snang bar 'gyur// 'di la gnas dang mtshan nyid dang // rab gnas 'byung ba yod ma yin// gzung bar dga' ba gti mug che// rdo rje phra mor brjod par bya//
109a6(rgyud 'bum): de lta bu yi rnal 'byor gyis// sems sgom pa yi rnam pa bzhi// lus dang sems dang tshor ba dag/ phra mo'i rnam par bsgom par bya// suk+Sh+ma badz+ra/ rdo rje reg pa'i mtshan ma yi// gnas ni yang dag shes
109a7(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / de ni thung na spro bya ste// stong gsum du ni yongs su spro// s+pha ra Na badz+ra/ reg pas sbyor ba bsdu bya ste// skrag cing rmongs par mi bya'o// gnas gsum du yang bsdu bya ste/ blo yis so sor
109b1(rgyud 'bum): brtag par bya/ / saM ha ra Na badz+ra/ chos la dmigs pa'i sems nyid ni// rmongs shing gzhom par mi bya'o// rdo rje de ni btan bya zhing // rdo rje phra mo reg par bya/ badz+ra dr-i nA tISh+Tha/ rdo rje sems
109b2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' 'jigs med pa/ / rgyal po tshangs pa'i gtsug pud can// spyi bor sems dpa' bsgom bya zhing // sku ni thams cad yongasu spro// badz+ra At+ma ka/ dpral bar rdo rje rin chen ni// mnyam par gzhag
109b3(rgyud 'bum): pas bsgom par bya/ / mtshan ma dag ni spro bya zhing // sems dpa' kun yang spro bar bya// badz+ra rat+na kat+ma ka/ rdo rje chos ni shin tu dag/ sna yi rtse mor bsgom par bya// de yi mtshan ma spro bya zhing // lus rnams
109b4(rgyud 'bum): kun yang spro bar bya/ / badz+ra pad+ma At+ma ka/ lus kun la ni yang dag khyab// chos kyi dbyings ni yongasu sgom// de yi mtshan ma spro bya zhing // sems dpa' kun yang spro bar bya// sarba badz+ra at+mA ka/
109b5(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' de bzhin rin chen las// chos ni spyi bor bsgom par bya// de yi mtshan ma spro bya zhing // sku ni thams cad yongs su spro// sarba badz+ra/ sna la lcags kyu yang dag gnas// blo ldan ma
109b6(rgyud 'bum): yis bsam par bya/ / sangs rgyas thams cad gzhug bya zhing // rang gi lus ni brtan par bya// snying khe 'dod chags gnas sun// 'dod chags rnam par dag pa bsam// sangs rgyas thams
109b7(rgyud 'bum): cad mnyes bya ste/ / chos kyi dbyings ni brtan par 'gyur// legs so zhes pa gzung bya ste// spyi bor yang dag gnas pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes bya zhing // chos kyi dbyings ni yod/
110a1(rgyud 'bum): su spro// hrid badz+rA maM ku sha/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra rA ga hri da ye/ A di badz+ra duSh+Ti/ snying khar rdo rje nyi ma ni// blo ldan mi yis bsgom par bya// 'od kyi gzi brjid sprob zhing /
110a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten kun kyang spro bar bya// spyi bor 'khri shing 'od bcas pa// rgyal mtshan rtse mor rnam par bsam// rin chen char dag spro bya zhing // snod kyi sprin ni yang dag spro// bzhad pas bde ba bsams
110a3(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / shin tu sdug bsngal nges par sbyang // chos kyi char yang spro bya zhing // snang ba'i sprin yang spro bar bya// hri da ya badz+ra sUr+ya/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra d+h+wa dza gre/ hri da ya badz+ra hA sa// spyi bor rjes dran nas
110a4(rgyud 'bum): brtsams nas/ / ral gri gtso bo bsam par bya// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gcad bya zhing // sems dpa' thams cad spro bar bya// snying kha'i 'khor lo'i gnas su ni// chos kyi rgyu mthun bsgom par bya//
110a5(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' kun tu spro bya zhing // chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su spro// de yi rigs las byung ba'i sgra// shes rab can gyis lce rtser bsam// chos kyi tshig ni spro bya zhing // phyogs rnams kun tu yongs su
110a6(rgyud 'bum): spro/ / srid badz+ra g+ho Sha/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra hri da yaM/ pra be sha badz+ra wa gra/ spyi bor rjes dran nas brtsams te// mchod pa'i las ni rnam par bsam// mchod pa'i phyir ni rdo rje spro// phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar
110a7(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / snying khar rdo rje go cha ni// shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas bsam// sdug bsngal kun las grol byed pa// go cha'i rnam pa spro bar bya// spyi bo nas brtsams rkang mthil du// rdo rje bsdams
110b1(rgyud 'bum): pa bsam par bya/ / rdo rje'i snying po gzhug bya zhing // rdo rje'i rang bzhin thams cad sgo// yak+Sha pU dza krid badz+ra ka pa tsa badz+ra mAn+ti srim// grogs dang grogs min ma lus pa// 'byung po kun la
110b2(rgyud 'bum): byams pa ni/ / ma lus lus pa med pa ru// mnyam du khyab par spro bar bya// kye ma sems can 'di sdug bsngal// 'gro ba lnga ru kun tu 'khyams// nyin dang mtshan du rab sbyor bas// snying rje
110b3(rgyud 'bum): nyid ni spro bar bya/ / nyin mtshan dge dang zhe sdang med// sems can dge bden gnyer dang // rjes su yi rang bde chen po// sems can kun la yongs su spro// rgal bar dka' bo'i lam zhugs shing //
110b4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas byang chub la gnas pa// sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir// blo chen ldan pas btang snyoms bzhag/ ma hA mai tri s+pha ra Na// mahA ka ru Ni ka ya s+pha ra Na sar+b+ba bud+d+ha/ pra mo s+pha ra Na/
110b5(rgyud 'bum): ma so pak+Sha s+phA rAH// nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// rdo rje'i gzugs ni rnam par bsam// sems can mnyam par dmigs pa yis// nam mkha' kun tu yongs su spro// badz+ra muH
110b6(rgyud 'bum): b+ha ba/ / rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// snying kha rdo rje chos nyid brtan// don rnams thams cad bsgom par bya// chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su spro// sangs rgyas rjes dran nas brtsams te/
110b7(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa kus sna tshogs nyid// de ni rang gi bdag nyid nos// chos kyi dbyings ni yongs suso// rdorjem mo gzhan dang rnam// chos rnams thams cad nam gos pa/ myur phyogs kun yongs s+ho//
111a1(rgyud 'bum): snying khar rdo rje bsgom bya zhing // mahA bo d+hi sa twa bi shwa/ bud+d+ha a nu smr-i ti bi shwa/ badz+ra pA Ni dar sha ya swa rU paM/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// byang chub sems ni bsgom
111a2(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / sa man+ta b+ha dra bi shwa/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// bdag nyid rdo rje rnam par sgom// badz+ra satwa/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// rdo rje'i bsnyems pa rol bcas
