111a3(rgyud 'bum): pa/ badz+ra satwa sa ma ya sa mA d+hi dz+nyA na bi shwa/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas gzugs su rang bdag nyid// ta thA ga ta sa me saM/ dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pa// rdo rje slob
111a4(rgyud 'bum): dpon dag gis bya/ / gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// shes rab can gyis nges par bya// mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyis ni// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsam// ji bzhin mtshan gyis
111a5(rgyud 'bum): brgyan pa ru/ / rtag tu bdag nyid rnam par sgom// ji ltar sangs rgyas de bzhin bdag/ bdag nyid sangs rgyas rtag tu sgom// sangs rgyas gang yin de bdag nyid// sangs rgyas mang por yang
111a6(rgyud 'bum): dag gnas/ / bdag ni de bzhin gshegs dang mtshungs// rdo rje'i tshig ni yang dag brjod// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pa// sangs rgyas kun kyang mnyes par bya// oM sarba ta thA ga tas
111a7(rgyud 'bum): mo he/ / rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// ji ltar sku mdog cho ga bzhin// dbang po gnyis ni yang dag gnas// de bzhin bdag ni rtag tu nom// oM badz+ra sa tra sa mo he/ bdag ni rdo rje sems dpa'
111b1(rgyud 'bum): mtshungs/ / rdo rje'i tshig ni yang dag brjod// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// nges par 'jig rten pham par bya// khams kyi snying po gang yin dag/ de ni rdul bral dri med dag/ bdag
111b2(rgyud 'bum): nirdo rje chos nyid du/ / rtag tu bsgom par bya ba yin// badz+ra d+harmas mo u0f7f// bdag nyid rdo rje chos dang mtshungs// rdo rje'i chog ni yang dag brjod// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// rdo rje'i chos n
111b3(rgyud 'bum): i thob par 'gyur/ / rdo rje'i las ni bdag nyid de// tha dad med cing rtags gcig gis// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod de// rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya// oM badz+ra karma sa mo haM/ bdag ni
111b4(rgyud 'bum): rdorje las dang mtshungs/ / rdo rje'i tshig ni yang yang brjod// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// rdo rje las dang mtshungs par 'gyur// nga ni rdo rje rin chen nyid// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur
111b5(rgyud 'bum): nga/ / rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya// rdo rje rin chen mtshungs par 'gyur// oM badz+ra rat+na sa mo haM// bdag ni rdo rje rin chen mtshungs// rdo rje'i tshig ni yang yang brjod// rdo rje rin chen sbyor ba
111b6(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / sangs rgyas dbang bskur thob par 'gyur// gzugs gnyis 'brel ba ni dbang po gnyis zhes bya'o// bdag gi lus gang yin pa dang // sangs rgyas kyi sku gang yin pa gcig tu 'dres
111b7(rgyud 'bum): par gyur pa ni dbang po gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'o/ / stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di// rdo rje gcig tu mos byas shing // sangs rgyas gzugs dang mtshungs pa ru// dbus su
112a1(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ / nam mkha' la ni rdo rje bsgom// rdo rje gcig ni yongs gsal ba// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// dbus su bdag nyid bsgom par bya// skyong
112a2(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ / rdo rje gcig ni yongs gsal bas// rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis// dbus su bdag nyid bsgom par bya// ci nus par ni byin gyis brlab// rdo rje gcig ni rnam par sgom/
112a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzin gyis// rtag tu bdag ni bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom bya zhing // rin chen bdag nyid dbus su sgom// kun tu rdo rje'i dbus su ni// rtag tu bdag nyid las su
112a4(rgyud 'bum): sgom/ / gtso bo gang dang gtso dag gis// sku mdog cha byad ji bzhin du// rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya// sems can dam pa de nyid thob// bdag gtso rdo rje'i tshig brjod cing // rdo rje'i thugs su
112a5(rgyud 'bum): bsam par bya/ / dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// rdo rje 'dzin pa thob par 'gyur// yang na sgom pa'i sbyor ba ni// rlung dbang du ni rab bshang b+ha// ji ltar yid las byung ba bzhin// rdo
112a6(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor rnam par sgom/ / sna yi rtse mo la brten nas// sems kyi rgyun ni yang dag gnas// brgya las rtsa bdun lhag par ni// rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya// gal te bsgom pas dngos grub
112a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dod/ / rdo rje sgom pa bsgrub par bya// sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor ba yis// sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor yang dag gnas// sems dpa' rjes dran sbyor ba yis// gdon mi za bar nges par bya// gang dang gang la
112b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa nyid/ / bdag nyid rdo rjer bsgom par bya// sku mdog rnal 'byor ji bzhin du// ci rigs par ni sna tshogs bdag/ yang na rdo rje sgom gtso bo// grub pa yang ni bsgom par bya// e ma'o ngo
112b2(rgyud 'bum): mtshar rnam 'phrul 'khor lo byung / / e ma'o ngo mtshar spyod mchog dam pa sgrub// kye ma'o ngo mtshar gsang mchog gnas thob pa// bdag ni rdo rje'i rnal 'byor sgom pa'i mchog/ rnal 'byor mkhas pa
112b3(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa ste/ / rnal 'byor rig pa sgrub byed pa// mchod pa'i bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya yis// de nas mchod pa rab bshad bya// thun bzhi dang ni kha dog bzhi// dus bzhi yi ni rab sbyor bas// sangs rgyas
112b4(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor rjod byed cing / / sangs rgyas la ni mchod par bya// phyogs rnams kun tu yongs spros shing // mchod pa rnams ni yongs spro zhing // sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pas// rtag tu yang dag
112b5(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor sgom/ / mchod la spro ba yang dag sbyor// zhes bya chos ni yongs su spro// ting 'dzin sbyor ba la gnas te// chos kyi mchod pa rab tu bya// oM ta thA ga ta badz+ra satwa// a nut+tar pU dza s+phar
112b6(rgyud 'bum): Na sa ma ye hUM/ / rdo rje yi ni gsang sngags 'di// yang dang yang du rab tu bzlas// rdo rje dbyings ni sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya lnga ni rab tu bya// so sor rtogs dang mngon rtogs dang // rdo rje de bzhin rdo rje
112b7(rgyud 'bum): bdag/ rgyas pa ru ni sngar bshad pa// rdo rje dbyings ni rab tu bskyed// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ma lus pa// rang gi bdag nyid bsgoms nas su// rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis// thub pa dbang phyug
113a1(rgyud 'bum): dag la dbul/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// thub la mchod pa phul nas ni// bdag ni mgon po rnam snang mdzad// bdag gis khams ni rnam par spros// byang chub
113a2(rgyud 'bum): sems ni spros nas su/ / thub pa'i dbang phyug dag la dbul// rdo rje gsang sngags 'di yis ni// mchod pa thams cad rab tu sgrub// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra satwa a nut+ta ra pU dza s+pha ra Na sa ma ye
113a3(rgyud 'bum): hUM/ / sangs rgyas thams cad dbang bskur ba// rdo rje rin chen spros nas ni// bdag ni mgon po rnam snang mdzad// bdag gis khams ni rnam par spros// rdo rje'i sngags kyis 'grub par 'gyur//
113a4(rgyud 'bum): thub pa'i dbang phyug dag la dbul// rin chen mchod pa rab spro zhing // bsdams pa'i sbyor ba rab tu sgrub// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra rat+na a nut+tA ra pU dza s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM// snga ma ji lta ba bzhin du// rnam
113a5(rgyud 'bum): par snang mdzad ting 'dzin gyis/ / ji ltar sems dpa' 'phyang ba bzhin// de bzhin bdag ni bsgom par bya// rang bdag nyid ni bsgoms nas su// rmad byung chen po yongs spro zhing // sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya// rdo rje'i sbyor bas 'grub par
113a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ de lta bu la snyoms zhugs te/ rdo rje chos ni rab tu byung // phyogs rnams kun du sngo bya zhing // sangs rgyas rnams la dbul bar bya/ oM sarba trathA ga ta badz+ra d+harma/ a nut+pa ra pU dza s+pha ra Na sa ma ye ts+tsha/ ting 'dzin sbyor ba la gnas te/ rdo rje las rnam
113a7(rgyud 'bum): spro bya zhing / / sangs rgyas kun la dadul bya zhing / zas cad ni spobar bya/ oM rba Ag yang sardzas nud+har pU dza swa mas ma ye mchod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni thun pani ru sgom pa dug rtsod pa'i tshigs 'phrug gyur pa sdim pa can yang 'gyur
113b1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / mchod pa'i las ni bla na med// ci rigs par ni rab bshad bya// chos kyi phyag rgya'i rgyal por ldan// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba at+pa nir+yA ta na pU
113b2(rgyud 'bum): dzas+pha ra Na karma badz+ri a/ rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid// mnyam par gzhag par sgom par bya// bdag nyid yang dang yang du ni// sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba
113b3(rgyud 'bum): At+ma nirA ta na pU dza s+pha ra Na karmA thi dza/ / rdo rje lcags kyu rang bdag nyid// phyogs kun tu ni spro bar bya// sangs rgyas thams cad dgug bya zhing // thub pa dag la dbul bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga tA sarba
113b4(rgyud 'bum): at+ma nirA ta ni a nu ra ga pU dza s+pha ra Na karmA ba ni hUM b+h+yo/ rdo rje'i rigs ni rjes chags par// rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya// chos rnams dag la mnyes byas shing // 'di brjod nas ni spro bar bya// oM
113b5(rgyud 'bum): sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma nir+ya ta na sA d+hu ka ra pU dza~M s+pha ra Na karma duSh+Ti maM/ / rdo rje rin chen rnal 'byor che// bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya// rin chen mchod pa bla na med// phyogs rnams kun tu spro
113b6(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya a b+hi She ka rat+ne b+h+yo badz+ra ma ni oM// sangs rgyas thams cad rgyal po che// byang chub snying po dbang bskur ba// sems kyang de ltar bsam nas ni// rdo rje rin chen nyid thong
113b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / bdag nyid rdo rje gzi brjid ni// phyogs rnams kun tu snang byed pa// sangs rgyas thams cad bskul bya zhing // mchod pa gzi brjid yong su spro// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sur+ye b+h+yo/ badz+re te dzo ni dz+wa 'dra
114a1(rgyud 'bum): @rdo rje rgyal mtshan kun tu mthong / / shes rab can gyis rgyal mtshan bsgreng // sangs rgyas thams cad mchod bya zhing // rdo rje'i sngags kyis bskul bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga tAH
114a2(rgyud 'bum): shA pa ri su ni tsin t+ya ma Ni d+h+wa dza a gre traM/ grags chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dkyil 'khor shes rab can gyis blta// rtag tu bdag nyid dga' bya zhing // rdo rje'i sngags ni rab bskul bya// oM
114a3(rgyud 'bum): na maHsarba ta thA ga ta mahA pri ti pra mo da ka re b+h+yo badz+ra hA se hA sa/ / sems can thams cad chos chen po// bdag ni chos chen dag pa ste// sangs rgyas thams cad rab bskul bya// sangs rgyas thams cad
114a4(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid kun/ / dkyil 'khor grong khyer thams cad bdag/ shes rab can gyis bdag nyid bsam// rdo rje'i sngags kyis rab bskul bya// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+harmA tra sa to b+h+yo tu no mi ma hA d+harmA
114a5(rgyud 'bum): a gri hriH/ bdag ni shes rab ral gri rno// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// 'khor lo'i yi ge rab tu bskor// mdo sde thams cad 'dzin pa yin// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA b+hi ni ra ha re
114a6(rgyud 'bum): tu no mi mahA gu Sha nu ga d+h+waM/ / sems can dag ni kun gyi tshig/ bdag ni sems dpa' smra ba brtan// rdo rje smra ba gsang ba'i bdag/ sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta swa b+hA ba shud+d+haH
114a7(rgyud 'bum): gI ti b+hirka ya stu no mi badz+ra wa tserba/ / bdag ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor sbyin byed pa// rdo rje'i 'khor lo yongs su bsngo// mchod pa thams cad yongs spro bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta
114b1(rgyud 'bum): tsakra pa ri brte d+ha na sarba mu drA ni stu no mi sarba maN+Da le maM/ / bdag ni rdo rje las rgyal po// phyogs rnams kun tu rab mchod byed// me tog bdug pa la sogs dri// rdo rje'i sngags kyis bskul bar bya// oM sarba
114b2(rgyud 'bum): tathA ga ta d+hU pa me g+ha s+pha ra Na pU dza~M karma ka ra/ / cho ga bgos pa dang ldan pa// me tog mchod pa 'bul byed pa// bdag nyid rang nyid rgyal po ste// rdo rje'i sngags ni rab bskul bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta praH
114b3(rgyud 'bum): pra sa ra s+pha ra Na pU dza karme bA ro/ bdag ni rdo rje gnod sbyin te// nyon mongs za byed chos sgron 'bar// phyogs rnams kun tu spro bya zhing // snang ba 'bar ba yang dag spro// oM sarba ta thA ga ta A loka
114b4(rgyud 'bum): / dz+wa la s+pha ra Na pU dza karma b+ha ra b+ha ra/ rdo rje khu tshur yang dag nyid// dri yi snod dang yang dag ldan// phyogs rnams kun tu spro bya zhing // char rnams kun gyis rab mchod byed// oM sarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+has
114b5(rgyud 'bum): mu dra s+pha ra Na pU dza karma ku ru ku ru/ / sems can don ni yang dag ldan// byang chub sems ni bskyed nas kyang // sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya// mchod pa mchog ni rab sgrub pa// oM sarbatathA
114b6(rgyud 'bum): ga ta badz+ra a ma nir+yA ta na pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ / shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bri// yan lag kun gyis rab btud bya// sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing // phyogs rnams kun
114b7(rgyud 'bum): tu spro bar bya/ / oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya niru tan pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ rdo rje'i sems dpa' bsdus pas ni// rdo rje rin chen bla na med// rdo rje chos ni glur blangs pas// rdo rje las rnams
115a1(rgyud 'bum): byed par 'gyur/ / rdo rje yi ni glu 'di yis// rang bdag nyid ni dga' bar bya// sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing // rdo rje'i sngags kyang rab brjod bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA ka niR+Ya/
115a2(rgyud 'bum): ta na pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sA ma ye hUM// phyogs rnams kun tu mchod pa kun// mkhas pa yis ni bsam par bya// sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing // rdo rje'i sngags ni rab bskul
115a3(rgyud 'bum): bya/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta nir+ya tA na pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na saM ma ye hUM// phul nas shes rab can gyis ni// rdo rje btsun mo'i ting 'dzin bsam// rdzas mchog ldan pas spro bya zhing //
115a4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun la yongs su dbul// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+ta ra ha ra Sha ra ti pra ti su kha a nut+ta ra pradz+nyA pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas kun la
115a5(rgyud 'bum): rab mchod bya/ / rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches// bla med dngos grub thob par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor thams cad kun bsdus pa// shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bsam// mchod
115a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshogs ni bla med pas/ / sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya// rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// tshe dang mdog dang nad med nyid// phun tshogs bde bas thams cad thob// sdig pa thams
115a7(rgyud 'bum): cad rab 'joms pa/ / rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gang zhig gis// nyin re bzhin du mchod byas nas// the tshom med par dngos grub kun// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas thob 'gyur// rdo rje'i sngags
115b1(rgyud 'bum): kyis bslab pa dang / / phyag rgya thams cad bsam par bya// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus las// phyag rgya shin tu rgyas par bshad// rdo rje'i las kyi go rims bzhin// shes rab can gyis
115b2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor bslab/ / rdo rje dbyings dang rab mtshungs pa// slar yang rnal 'byor pa la bshad// 'jig rten mgon po rdzu 'phrul che// rtag tu de bzhin mchod bya ba// gsang mchog rnal 'byor pa
115b3(rgyud 'bum): dag a/ / de las gzhan yang rab bshad bya// gang tshe sngon du sems bskyed pa// rdo rje sems ni bla na med// byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed nas// mchod pa'i bya ba bslab par bya// rdo rje slob
115b4(rgyud 'bum): dpon gyis sbyor ba/ / rdo rje dga' ba bsam par bya// 'dod chags dga' bo bskyed nas ni// dga' ba'i mchod pa rab tu mchod// bdag nyid sangs rgyas bsgom bya zhing // bsgom nas mchod pa rab
115b5(rgyud 'bum): tu bya/ / dga' ba chen po'i bde don du// rig pa'i lha mo rab 'grol bas// bud+d+ha At+ma ko tsaM/ byang chub sems ni rang bskyed nas// bdag nyid sangs rgyas zhes bsam bya// stobs dang mi 'jin
115b6(rgyud 'bum): sogs rnams kyis/ / rang bdag nyid ni dbang bskur bya// bud+d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ byang chub sems ni rab bskyed nas// bdag ni sangs rgyas zhes bsam bya// rdo rje yi ni glu blang zhing // bdag nyid
115b7(rgyud 'bum): mngon par mchod par bya/ / bud+d+ha sid+d+hi ka ro mi/ byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed nas// bdag nyid sangs rgyas zhes bsam bya// rdo rje gar gyis gar bya zhing // mkhas pas bdag nyid mchod pan
116a1(rgyud 'bum): bya/ bud+d+ha pU dza/ sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje mchog/ sbyor bas de bzhin phyag byas shing // sangs rgyas thams cad mchod byas nas// nges par phyag ni byas par 'gyur// pra Na
116a2(rgyud 'bum): mA mi/ / rdo rje sku gsung thugs las byung // sangs rgyas bsod nams chen po kun// rjes su yi rang mchog bdag gis// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// a nu mo de// bdag nyid dbul
116a3(rgyud 'bum): ba la sogs pa/ / sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi// mchod pa kun gyis sangs rgyas nyid// mchod pa'i bdag nyid can gyis mchod// bud+d+ha pU dza/ rdo rje sku gsung thugs las byung // dge ba'i
116a4(rgyud 'bum): tshogs ni thams cad kun/ / yongs su bsngo ba'i mchod pa yis// sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs par 'gyur// pa ri NA maH/ chos kyi dbyings ni snying po che// 'dod pa'i 'dam gyis ma gos pa//
116a5(rgyud 'bum): gzod nas dag pas skye ba med// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pad+ma mtshungs// sarba shud+d+ha/ chos rnams thams cad ma skyes pa// gzod nas zhi zhing gos pa med// glo bur dri mas gos pa med// yi ge/
116a6(rgyud 'bum): a yis rnam par sbyangs// sa man+ta b+ha dra/ e ma'o 'khor lo bde rang bzhin// chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med// chos rnams thams cad nyid kyi ni// 'dir ni de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu// d+harma tsakra/
116a7(rgyud 'bum): sba brnyan dang ni mtshungs pa'i sgra// med de gzhan yang yong ma yin// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin du// bdag ces bya ba 'ga' yang med// nis pra pany+dza/ sngon du blo dang ldan pas bsam// @#
116b1(rgyud 'bum): par gzhag pas bsgom bya zhing / / de 'og rdo rje sna tshogs brjod// de nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i// rang gi lus ni phra rab dag/ rdo rje'i gzugs su bsgom bya zhing /
116b2(rgyud 'bum): rdorje'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya// badz+ra kA ya/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i// yan lag rnam pa ji snyed pa'i// sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom bya zhing // thams cad yongs su spro bar bya// d+harma kA ya/
116b3(rgyud 'bum): rang gi lus la gnas pa yi// phra rab rdul ni ji snyed pa// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya// don yod mchod pas rab mchod bya// satwa kA ya/ de bzhin lus ni thams cad kyi// rang gi phra rab rdul
116b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams ni/ / kun tu dgod pa'i bsgom byas te// de ni sangs rgyas mchod la bshad// bud+d+ha kA ya// sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su mnyes// byang chub sems dpa' slob gang yin// shes rab can gyis
116b5(rgyud 'bum): mchog gsang bslab/ / sangs rgyas sa ni thob par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// lus rnams thams cad yongs su bsdams// yan lag kun la chags pa dang // ting nge 'dzin dang bcas
116b6(rgyud 'bum): pa yis/ / lus kun la ni yongs su chags// bde ba'i mchod pa rang byung ba// e ma'o rjesu chags mchod padag/ rdo rje'i tshig ni brjod par bya// e ma'o yid 'ong e ma'o sdug/ e ma'o dga' ba
116b7(rgyud 'bum): rab tu mdzes/ / chos kyi chags pa 'dod chags che// gang la rab dga' chags 'gyur ba// chos dang gang zag bdag med pa// stong pa 'dod chags brjod par bya// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal spang
117a1(rgyud 'bum): bya zhing / sems can yang ni dor mi bya// sred pa dang ni chags dang spyod// rtog pa thams cad rnam par spang // ming dang gzugs ni shes bya zhing // mtshan nyid gsum ni
117a2(rgyud 'bum): rtogs par bya/ / theg chen bde ba zhes bya ba// 'dod chags chags par rab brjod par// lta ba thams cad mi gzung zhing // srid pa'i sdug bsngal rnam par spang // rtog dang rnam par rtog pa med//
117a3(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal thams cad nges par gcod// phung po dang ri skye mched khams// rtog pa rdul tsam yod ma yin// de la 'dus byas yod ma yin// 'dus byas min pa nyid kyang med// skyes pa bud med dag
117a4(rgyud 'bum): nyid med/ / bdag dang sems can rnam rtog med// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug med// nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs spangs// de lta bu yi chags pa yis// gang du rdo rje can chags 'gyur//
117a5(rgyud 'bum): de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje sems dpar rjes chags bya// kha yi 'o ni rlog dag pa// gsang ba'i sbyor bas rab bsgrub bya// oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa/ rjes su chags pa'i cho ga bstan//
117a6(rgyud 'bum): dpung pa dam por bsdam bya zhing // 'dod chags chags par bstan pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' rab 'grub 'gyur// chags pa lnga las rnam grol bas// 'dod la chags par mi bya zhing // blo ldan
117a7(rgyud 'bum): chos chags dga' ba yis/ / dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga yis// gsang ba thams cad rab bstan bya// zhi ba thams cad mnyes bya zhing // rdo rje sems sogs
117b1(rgyud 'bum): mnyes par bya/ / sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'am// rdo rje can dang dpa' chen po// 'dod chags chen po 'di lta bus// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// oM sarba rA ga ra ti su kha yA mi hU~M/
117b2(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu gsang ba dam pa mchog/ gang zhig byas nas gsang ba kun// brtags nas 'grub par 'gyur ba yin// lhag par shes rab can gyis bslab// mtshan ma brtan por rab 'grub nas//
117b3(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i lte bar 'dug bya zhing // mtshan ma mchod rten byin brlabs nas// rang bdag rdo rje mtshungs pa nyid// mdo sde gsang dbang rgyal po las// de yis shin tu gsang tshig gsungs// de ni dgongs pas
117b4(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa ste/ / de ni dgongs par shes par bya// mtshan ma phyag mtshan zhes byar brjod// brtan pa lhag pa nyid yin te// byang chub sems dpa'i phyag mtshan gang // mkhas pas lhag par bcang
117b5(rgyud 'bum): babarabya/ / pha rol phyin pa drug spyod pa// de yi mtshan mar rab tu bsgrags// gang phyir lhag par bsten par bya// blo ldan rnams kyi rigs 'byung 'dod// mtshan ma brtan par rang gyur pa// de dag kho nar
117b6(rgyud 'bum): rab tu bsgrags/ / pha rol phyin drug spyod pa ni// rdo rje'i rigs su brjod par bya// byang chub sems gang de rdo rje// rdo rje mtshan mar 'di brjod pa// byang chub sems kyi rab sbyor bas// mtshan ma brtan
117b7(rgyud 'bum): popor brjod par bya/ / pad+ma shes rab pha rol phyin// pad+ma'i lte bar 'dug bya ba// shes rab pha rol phyin pa yi// rnal 'byor yang yang snyoms 'jug bya// b+ha ga ling ga'i sbyor ba ni// yang dang yang du
118a1(rgyud 'bum): bsten byas nas/ / g.yo dang nyes pa rnams spangs par// gdon mi za bar yang dag byang // shes rab dang ni byang chub sems// yang dang yang du bsten byas nas// shes
118a2(rgyud 'bum): rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/ / byang chub gdon mi za bar 'gyur// bsgrub byar gyur pa'i chos 'di ni// lus can kun gyis rnyed par dka'// byang chub sems dang shes rab che// mchod rten mtshan ma'i
118a3(rgyud 'bum): rjes chags bya/ / rnal 'byor pas ni 'di sgom dang // 'di lta bu yi sgrub pa dang // spod pa gsang ba 'di yis ni// rdo rje gsang ba nyid thob 'gyur// gsang ba dgongs pas bsdus pa yi// mod
118a4(rgyud 'bum): las rgya cher ji skad gsungs/ / gsang ba'i rnal 'byor 'di yis ni// sems can thams cad rnam par sgom// rdo rje gsang dbang bsdus pa yi// sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor 'di yis ni// gsang ba chen po
118a5(rgyud 'bum): bsgrubs na ni/ / skad cig de la rab 'grub 'gyur// kha cig nyin zhag de nyid la// yang dang yang du 'grub par 'gyur// nyi ma gnyis gsum bzhi lnga 'am// drug dang bdun la the tshom med// mtsham
118a6(rgyud 'bum): med lnga po byed pa yang / / ci rigs pa yi cho ga yis// lo gcig tu ni rab sbyor bas// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// rdo rje gsang ba'i cho ga rdzogs so// // gsang ba yi ni
118a7(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor mchog/ rdo rje slob dpon cho ga ni// ji ltar rigs shing 'tsham pa ru// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// mdor na rig pa'i brtul zhugs ni// gong du dkyil 'khor las bshad bzhin//
118b1(rgyud 'bum): lhur spro zhing ci nus par// sngon du mkhas pas bshad par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' skal ba che// rgyal po kun tu khyab pa'i 'od// the tshom med par stong phrag brgya// rtag tu rdo rje'i tshig brjod pa/
118b2(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa'i rdo rje goms bya ste// rdo rje rnal 'byor goms byas te// chos rnams dag pa goms par bya// goms pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// nyon mongs rab spong nyon mongs bzlog par
118b3(rgyud 'bum): / rnal 'byor goms pa yis ni rnal 'byor sgrub// bzlas pa tsam gyis dga' chen 'grub 'gyur te// rnal 'byor cho gas sgrub pa sgrub par 'gyur// yang na bzlas pa tsam nyid ni// bzlas pa mchog
118b4(rgyud 'bum): gis bzlas par bya/ / rnal 'byor rig pa sgrub pa'i phyir// dngos grub cho gas bzlas par bya// de ni rnal 'byor cho ga yis// skad cig sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// rnal 'byor cho ga med par ni/
118b5(rgyud 'bum): 'grub min 'di la the tshom med// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi// gsang ba bzhi ni yang dag bshad// gsang ba chen po tshad med pa// bzhi po thams cad bsdus pa yin// bzlas brjod sbyir
118b6(rgyud 'bum): cho ga dang / / phyag rgya bcing ba lhur len pa// rig pa'i mchog gi cho ga ni// gsang ba bsdus pa dang po yin// gsang dang skem byed phur pas btab// gdeg pa dang ni mngon spyod dang // bgegs
118b7(rgyud 'bum): bskrad pa yi 'khrul 'khor 'di/ / gsang ba'i bsdus pa gnyis pa yin// go cha mi 'gyur bcing ba dang // spyod dang de bzhin rab bskyod dang // bdag nyid mngon par srung nyid dang // bgegs rnams bsal bar
119a1(rgyud 'bum): bya ba dang / / rdzas 'phrog pa dang gzhom pa dang // gdug pa thams cad mngon srung ba// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi// gsang ba bsdus pa gsum pa yin// sngags dang phyag
119a2(rgyud 'bum): rgya mchod pa dang / / de bzhin rig pa'i dngos grub nyid// bgegs rnams bsod nams nye bar bsdu// gsang ba bzhi par 'dod pa yin// gsang ba bzhi po thams cad ni// rang gzhan rdzu 'phrul kun
119a3(rgyud 'bum): bsdus pa/ / gsang ba mchog gi rgyud chen po// rgyud de las ni rab tu bshad// bzlas brjod sbyin sreg cho ga ni// de ni rgyud mchog las bshad bya// gang phyir rig pa 'dzin kun gyis// bzlas brjod sbyin
119a4(rgyud 'bum): sreg bsgrub par bya/ / bzlas brjod sbyor ba med par ni// rig pa'i dngos grub 'byung mi 'gyur// sbyin sreg tsam ni med pa ru// rig pa'i bya ba byed mi 'gyur// gang gis rnal 'byor brtson 'gyur
119a5(rgyud 'bum): pa/ bzlas pa'i rim pa bshad bya ba// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi// snying po 'di ni gsang mchog yin// gsang ba'i rigs 'dir bzlas pa ni// rnal 'byor nyi shu yang dag byung // bzlas
119a6(rgyud 'bum): pa rnam pa nyi shu ni/ / gsang ba'i rgyud du nyi shu gcig/ gnas ngan len gyi bag chags rtogs// rtog pa bags chags zhes bya ste// bzlas pa tsam gyis thim 'gyur te// bzlas pa tsam gyis brjod
119a7(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / nyes pa byas pa spong ba dang // de bzhin srid pa skyong byed cing // rmad byung sna tshogs mthong 'gyur te// de bas bzlas pa brjod par bya// byang chub spyod pa 'byung 'gyur zhing // tshul mchog
119b1(rgyud 'bum): mthong bar 'gyur ba ste/ / de bas bzlas pa'i cho ga ni// rnal 'byor pas ni nges par bya// gsang ba chen po'i rgyud 'di ru// hUM ni dang por rab tu bsgrags// gsang ba thams cad yang dag 'byung //
119b2(rgyud 'bum): hUM gi bzlas pa brjod par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso bo ni// de bzhin yi ge hUM rab mchog/ gsang ba thams cad 'khor lor bcas// rigs lnga dag dang bcas pa 'byung // 'dir ni yi ge hUM
119b3(rgyud 'bum): 'byung bar/ / sngon la shes rab can gyis brtag/ lce sogs thams cad khong steng du// lus kun la ni brtag par bya// sbyor ba bcu las 'byung mi 'gyur// so las rnam pa kun tu min// lce dang
119b4(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba las kyang min/ / dkan las rnam pa kun tu min// gnas gang las ni sbyar ba 'byung // snying kha nyid las 'byung mi 'gyur// khong stong dngos po thams cad la// skye ba nyid ni snang mi 'gyur//
119b5(rgyud 'bum): yi ge hUM gi sbyor ba yis// rang gi dbyings la yang dag sbyar// de nyid nyon mongs can mi 'gyur// kun gzhi sa bon thams cad pa// dkan dang lkog ma'i 'bad pa dang // lce yi tshogs las yang dag
119b6(rgyud 'bum): 'byung / / yi ge hUM gi sgra byung ba// de ni mi rtog yang dag byung // de ltar 'byung ba'i sbyor ba las// gnas kyi nyon mongs can mi 'gyur// tshig dang bcas pa'i ji bzhin sgra// 'dus byas thams
119b7(rgyud 'bum): cad dor bar bya/ / ji bzhin hUM gi sbyor ba las// chos rnams thams cad skye ba med// rnam par rtog las yang dag byung // de ni mi rtog yang dag 'byung // 'khor ba dag gi thog ma ni// ji ltar yang
120a1(rgyud 'bum): ni shes mi 'gyur/ / 'dir ni skye ba mi snang zhing // 'dus byas dag ni 'jig pa min// de bas yi ge hUM tsam gyis// 'dus byas so sor brtag par bya// dag cing mthar thug gnas
120a2(rgyud 'bum): nyid ni/ / hUM gis kyang ni sbyar bar bya// rang bzhin med par sgra 'di ni// yi ge hUM las yang dag 'byung // 'di la dngos po yod ma yin// rang bzhin med cing bdag med pa// de bzhin chos rnams tham
120a3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi/ / rang bzhin nyid ni yod ma yin// bdag gam sems can gso ba med// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// zag pa med cing 'dus byas min// gnas ni dag pa brtan par bya//
120a4(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub sbyor ba'i ye shes kyis// sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// yi ge hUM ni yang dag byung // ye shes dag pa yang dag 'byung // chos kyi dbyings kyis brtan
120a5(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po yang // 'dir ni nye bar mi dmigs te// gang phyir dus gsum gshegs snying po// sangs rgyas snying po tshogs su bshad// sangs rgyas sras bcas
120a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang / / rdo rje can ni rgyal sras bcas// hUM tsam gyi ni sbyor ba yis// kun tu yang dag dgug par bya// yi ge'i sbyor ba gcig gis ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po brtan// gang phyir
120a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ / 'di ni rang gi sbyor bas gnas// chos kyi rgyu mthun bag chags ni// byang chub sems ni ma rtogs par// thog ma med ldan 'khor ba las// 'byung ba cung zad yod ma yin// nyan
120b1(rgyud 'bum): thos dang ni rang rgyal dang / / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul ni// byang chub kyi ni sems med par// 'gas kyang mya ngan 'da' mi nus// gal te sangs rgyas 'byung med na// nyan thos dag ni
120b2(rgyud 'bum): ga las 'byung / / sangs rgyas 'byung ba yod min na// rang rgyal de ni 'byung mi 'gyur// gal te byang chub sems dpa' med// sangs rgyas rnams ni gang las byung // gal te byang chub sems
120b3(rgyud 'bum): med na/ / de bas 'khor lo 'di kun ni// byang chub sems las yang dag byung // byang sems gsang ba chen po ni// yi ge hUM las yang dag byung // sangs rgyas thams cad rab 'byung ba//
120b4(rgyud 'bum): yi ge hUM gi snang bar 'gyur// gang phyir mtshan ldan gzugs can ni// rtag tu sangs rgyas rab 'byung ba// hUM yig gi ni sbyor ba hUM// de nyid rdo rje yang dag byung // chos dbyings rab sbyor rdo rje ni/
120b5(rgyud 'bum): de las yang dag 'byung bar 'gyur// de las rdo rje rnal 'byor che// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bla na med// the tshom med par rnal sbyor kun// yi ge hUM gi sbyor bas 'grub// de lta bu yi bzlos pa yis//
120b6(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ni// sngon ni bsngo ba mdzad pa ltar// rnal 'byor las byas dge ba bsngo// byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yis ni// rang gi sems kyang bsngo bar bya// rdo rje chen po mthar phyin
120b7(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / byang chub sems kyis bsgral bar bya// chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po che// sems can thams cad gos pa med// thams cad de bzhin gshegs snying po// nyon mongs 'dam gyis gos pa med//
121a1(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar zla ba bzhin du dag/ zla ba gang ba'i 'od gsal ba// rtag tu yang dag rdzogs par gnas// rab tu dang ba 'grub par 'gyur// 'di ni dang po chos ye shes// de bzhin
121a2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i snying po yin/ / rtag tu dag par gnas pa ste// rang gi nyon mongs dag gis bsgribs// de bas rang sems rnam pa ni// zla ba gang bar shes par bya// bdag ni 'ga' yang yod ma
121a3(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / chos nyid 'di ni rgyal bas shes// ye shes sla ba gang ba min// gang phyir bdag ni yod ma yin// zla ba gang ba dang mtshungs rigs// gang phyir dag cing gos pa med// sangs rgyas ye shes
121a4(rgyud 'bum): skyon med pa/ / zla ba'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya// mthong nas shes rab can gyis bsam// 'di yang gang gi rtogs par 'gyur// yun ring dus su sdug bsngal ba'i// de bzhin gshegs pa bcom
121a5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das/ / nyon mongs pa yi bag chags kun// de bzhin sbyong bar byed par bsam// byang chub sems ni sems chen po// nyon mongs thams cad 'joms byed pa// chos kyi rgyu mthun bag chag
121a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi/ / gnyen po ru ni byung ba yin// de bas 'di yi mthu yis ni// sangs rgyas ye shes rnam par sbyong // gnas ngan len ni bag chags bcas// 'dod pa'i 'dam gyis gos pa med// nyi ma lha
121a7(rgyud 'bum): bu'i sems chen po/ / nyon mongs rtsa ni rab sreg byed// zla ba lta bu'i sems chen po// dge ba'i sman ni rnam 'phel byed// sos ka'i tsha ba'i zla ba bzhin// nyi ma'i gdung ba rab sreg byed// shar
121b1(rgyud 'bum): bar gyur pas zhi bar byed/ / nyon mongs gdungs pasam gdung shing // mi shes pa la nyi ma nyid// byang chub sems ni zla ba che// nyon mongs gdung ba zhi byed par// kun nas nyon mongs bag chags
121b2(rgyud 'bum): bcas/ / gnas ngan len ni 'joms pa'i mchog/ khab len gyis ni lcags bzhin du// nyon mongs bag chags 'dren byed pa// rdo rje'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor pas// byang chub sems de bsgom
121b3(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas de ru// slar yang zla ba rnam par sgom// byang chub sems kyi mthu yis ni// bag chags thams cad sreg byed pa// ye shes de ru 'byung 'gyur te// gzung ba
121b4(rgyud 'bum): dang ni 'dzin pa spangs/ / rnam par mi rtog mtshungs med pa// bdag med de bzhin stong pa nyid// mi shes ri bo 'joms par byed// rdo rje dang mtshungs khong stong med// rdo rje'i rang bzhin snying po che// 'jig
121b5(rgyud 'bum): tshogs ri bo brtan pa ni/ / rdo rje des ni 'joms par byed// de phyir rdo rje'i rang bzhin brtan// de bas rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas// zla ba'i dbus su zla ba mtshungs// zla ba gnyis dbus rdo rje yis//
121b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i ye shes brtan par bya// stong nyid de bzhin nyid de nyid// yang dag mtha' dang 'dus ma byas// skye ba med cing 'gag pa med// yi ge hUM ni sgom par bshad// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan pa
121b7(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs pa ni// zla ba'i dbus su bsgom par bya// hUM gi sbyor ba de yis ni// rdo rje'i mchog ni bsgom par bya// lus kun la ni spro bya zhing // stong pa nyid dang
122a1(rgyud 'bum): mtshungs par spyos/ / gzugs 'di nyid ni ming tsam ste// dngos po 'ga' yang yod ma yin// cha shas kyis ni rnam dpyad na// gzugs zhes bya ba yod ma yin// 'jig
122a2(rgyud 'bum): rten kun rdzob ces bya ste/ / dam pa'i don du yod ma yin// de lta bu yi rang bzhin du// gzugs zhes bya ba yod ma yin// de dag phra rab rnam brtag kyang // phra rab ces bya yod ma yin// 'jig/
122a3(rgyud 'bum): rten kun rdzob ces bya ste// dam pa'i don du yod ma yin// de lta bu yi rang bzhin du// gzugs zhes bya ba yod ma yin// gzugs de yod pa ma yin na// ji ltar yod ces bya ba yin// gal te/
122a4(rgyud 'bum): gzugs de yod min na// ming yang de la yod ma yin// ming ni gang las yang dag byung // ming zhes bya ba ci 'dra bar// dngos zhes bya ba de dang mtshungs// ming des so sor brtags byas na// gnas gang
122a5(rgyud 'bum): zhig na rab tu gnas/ / dngos po gcig ni rnam phye na// ming ni mang po yang dag byung // re re yi ni dbye ba yis// sngar gyi ming ni mnyam par 'gyur// de la ming ni yod min pa// ming ni yang dag 'byung ba
122a6(rgyud 'bum): med/ / gang la ming ni yod min na// ji ltar ming du brjod par bya// gang gis ming ni rab gnas pa// rnam pa kun tu dmigs mi 'gyur// gzugs ni nye bar mi dmigs la// de la gzugs ni
122a7(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar yod/ / 'di ni yang dag min rtog pa// bag chags dag gis kun nas dkris// gang du byis pa rab rmongs shing // mya ngan 'das pa thob mi 'gyur// ji ltar gzugs ni rnam sgom pa/
122b1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin tshor dang 'du shes dang // so so ru ni rnam phye na// de la snying po dmigs mi 'gyur// gang la snying po yod min pa// de la dngos po ji ltar yod// gang la dngos po mi dmigs pa//
122b2(rgyud 'bum): dam pa'i don ni ji ltar yod// gang zhig bstan par mi dmigs pa// de ni yod min dngos por med// chos rnams thams cad med pas na// skye ba med par brjod par bya// gang zhig ma skyes
122b3(rgyud 'bum): de yod min/ / gang zhig yod min ji ltar yod// mkhas pas chos rnams thams cad ni// 'gag pa med ces bya bar brjod// skye ba med cing 'gag pa med// de ni gzod nas zhi bar 'dod//
122b4(rgyud 'bum): de phyir rang bzhin mya ngan 'das// 'di ni stong pa nyid du brjod// 'di ni yang dag de nyid che// yang dag mtha' ru brjod par bya// chos kyi dbyings ni snying po che// theg pa chen por brjod par bya//
122b5(rgyud 'bum): de ni snying po khong stong med// rdo rje'i bstan pa bla na med// lus kun la ni spro bya ste// bdag gi lus ni 'di lta bu// rdo rje'i bdag nyid ces bya gang // yi ge hUM ni yongs su spro// sgom pa'i sbyor
122b6(rgyud 'bum): ba 'di yis ni/ / sangs rgyas nyid ni 'grub par 'gyur// 'di 'dra'i chos ni skye ba med// 'dir yang 'byung ba snang ba med// hUM zhes bya ba'i sbyor ba yis// skye bar yang ni snang mi 'gyur// chos
122b7(rgyud 'bum): nyid dag pa bden pa gang / / yang dag mtha' ni zag pa med// chos dbyings bstan pa dam pa ni// yi ge hUM 'dir rab bsgrags// rdo rje yi ge hUM de nyid// chos dbyings stug po bstan pa yin//
123a1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems gang de rdo rje// rdo rje gang yin de nyid hUM// chos nyid dag pa 'di lta bu// rdo rje ye shes yid 'ong ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che// rdo rje bdag gi
123a2(rgyud 'bum): lag na gnas/ / de bas rdo rje can kun gyi// gsang ba'i rnal 'byor thams cad dang // yi ge hUM la sbyor ba yis// spros med rnal 'byor bsam par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// snying
123a3(rgyud 'bum): kha'i dbus su bsgom par bya/ / zla ba de la zla ba gnyis// dbus su zla ba rab bsgom bya// zla ba'i dbus su rdo rje ni// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// rdo rje'i dbus su yi ge hUM// sangs
123a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas byang chub rab bsgom bya/ / de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// lus kun rab tu bsgom par bya// rdo rje hUM mdzad bzlas pa yis// rdo rje'i bdag nyid myur du thob// hU~M rdo rje hUM mdzad sgom pa rdzogs so//
123a5(rgyud 'bum): hUM gi sbyor ba ji bzhin du// yi ge thams cad rnam par sgom// sems dpa' chen po sbyor ba yis// yi ge bcu drug dag pa yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi yi ge hUM/
123a6(rgyud 'bum): gang phyir sangs rgyas rigs byung ba// rdo rje can dag kun gyi hUM// drag po gcod kun rab tu sgrom// oM ni rin chen yang dag ldan// hrI ni pad+mar yang dag ldan// yi ge a ni sna tshogs brjod/
123a7(rgyud 'bum): de lta bur yang bsgom par bya// hUM ni sangs rgyas rdo rje dag/ tri ni rdo rje snying po te// yi ge hrIHni rdo rje bstan// sna tshogs rdo rje yi ge a// hUM ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste// rdo rje rgyal po yi ge dza/
123b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje chags pa ste// rdo rje legs pa yi ges// oM ni rdo rje rin chen te// rdo rje gzi brjid yi ge sa// dz+nyAni rdo rje rgyal mtshan te// rdo rje bzhad pa yi ge sa// yi ge hrIHni rdo rje rdzun// rdo rje rnon po yis
123b2(rgyud 'bum): d+hI/ / maM ni rdo rje 'khor lo ste// rdo rje smra ba yi ge sa// yi ge shaM ni rdo rje las// rdo rje srung ba yi ge hUM// hUM ni rdo rje gnod sbyin te// rdo rje khu tshur yi ge baM// gang dang gang la 'dod pa nyid// snying khar
123b3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin bsgom par bya/ / yi ge hUM ni rnal 'byor pa// de ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa yis// gzugs gcig rnam par spro bar bya// yi ge hUM bzlas tsam gyis ni//
123b4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rang bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya// bdag nyid rdo rje'i gzugs su ste// rdo rje gcig ni rnam par sgom// rdo rje'i dbus
123b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi lte bar ni/ / de ru yi ge hUM bsgom bya// theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus// ji bzhin mdo yi rjes 'brangs nas// ji bzhin rgyal po skyes bur bcas// yi ge hUM ni dang por bcas// de bzhin yid
123b6(rgyud 'bum): kun rnal 'byor pas/ / snying kha ru ni bsgom par bya// bdag nyid rdo rje'i gzugs su ste// dbus su yi ge hUM bsgom bya// de bzhin yi ge thams cad kyang // rnal 'byor pas ni snying khar sgom// zla
123b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i gzugs la yang dag gnas/ / bdag nyid yongs su bsgom bya zhing // rigs kyi lha yi sbyor ba yis// rang bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' gang 'ga' zhig/ gang dang gang zhig
124a1(rgyud 'bum): mngon 'dod pa/ / rig pa de ni snying khar sgom// yi ge hU~M ni dang por sbyar// gang phyir de las rtog pa 'byung // de bzhin yid kun rnal 'byor pas// snying khar bsgoms
124a2(rgyud 'bum): pas bsgom par bya/ / yang na nam mkha'i sbyor ba yis// yi ge hUM ni dang por sbyar// nam mkha'i rang bzhin bsgom bya zhing // yi ge dag ni thams cad sbyar// yang na nam mkha'i zla dbus su//
124a3(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa'i yi ge hUM bsgom bya// bdag nyid rigs kyi lha mor bsam// skad cig de la rab 'grub 'gyur// hUM ni ji skad bstan pa bzhin// sngags kun rab tu bsgom par bya// rig pa kun
124a4(rgyud 'bum): gyi gsang ba ni/ / rgyud kun yang dag bsdus pa ste// bzlas pa'i gsang ba nges sbas pa// gsang ba 'di ni rnam pa drug/ rig 'dzin rnams kyi snying po dang // rnal 'byor rgyud ni bsdus pa dang //
124a5(rgyud 'bum): don yod shin tu rmad byung ba// gsang ba las kyang mchog gsang bshad// bzlas brjod tsam gyi sbyor ba yis// lta ba'i ri bo 'joms par 'gyur// rang gi snying kha'i dbus su ni// zla ba'i dkyil
124a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bsgom par bya/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de dbus su// zla ba gnyis pa bsgom par bya// dbugs 'byung rngub pa gang yin pa// rdo rje yi ge hUM du bsgom// me bsrubs pa yi sbyor ba yis// steng dang
124a7(rgyud 'bum): 'og tu rgyu bar bya/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag gnas// dbus su yi ge hrIHbsgom bya// steng 'og 'gro ba bsgom par bya// yi ge hUM ni da sbyar nas// ji ltar shing skam gtsub bstan pa// gtsub
124b1(rgyud 'bum): shing yang dag sbyor ba yis/ / rtsol ba byas pa tsam gyis ni// skad cig gis ni me 'byung bzhin// yi ge a ni gtsub stan te// yi ge hUM ni gtsub shing yin// rgyu ba'i rnal 'byor pa yis ni// skad cig gis ni
124b2(rgyud 'bum): ye shes skye/ / shes rab pha rol phyin ye shes// yi ge hrI ru 'dir brjod bya// byang chub sems ni yi ge hUM// me yi sbyor bas bsrub par bya// bsrubs pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// ye shes dam pa
124b3(rgyud 'bum): skye bar 'gyur/ / rdo rje de ni bsreg bya ste// rdo rje ye shes bla na med// b+ha ga sangs rgyas kun shes rab// ling ga rdo rjer brjod par bya// byang chub sems gang de rdo rje// b+ha ga ling gar rab tu sgrub/
124b4(rgyud 'bum): b+ha ga ling ga bcug nas ni// mdo sde gsang dbang las gsungs so// b+ha ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// mkhas pas ling ga gzhug par bya// gsang ba gzi brjid chen po 'di// me bsrubs pa yi
124b5(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba yis/ / 'ga' zhig gis ni 'di bsgrubs na// skad cig gis ni ye shes skyed// bzlas pa gsang ba rnam pa bdun rdzogs so// // sbas pa gsang ba rgyud chen po//
124b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di nyid rnal 'byor kun tu bsdus// de nyid chen po bsdus pa ni// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya// zla ba gang ba yang dag gnas// bdag nyid rdo rjer bsgom par bya// de yi dbus su rdo rje ste/ rdo rje
124b7(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bzlas pa bya/ / zla ba gang ba la gnas par// bdag nyid pad+mar bsgom par bya// de yi dbus su pad+ma de// pad+ma'i rigs kun bzlas par bya// zla ba gang ba la gnas par// bdag nyid nor bur
125a1(rgyud 'bum): bsgom par bya/ / de yi dbus su rin chen dang // rin chen rigs kyi bzlas par bya// bdag nyid rdo rje gcig pu ni// rdo rje rnon por rab tu sgom// de yi las kyi rigs mchog pa
125a2(rgyud 'bum): las kyi rigs kun bzlas par bya/ / sangs rgyas rjes dran nas brtsams te// sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam par sgom// de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni// sangs rgyas rigs kun bzlas par bya//
125a3(rgyud 'bum): rdorje sems dpa'i gzugs chen po// sems dpa' gcig ni rnam par sgom// de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni// rdo rje rigs kun bzlas par bya// pad+ma'i sems dpa' chen po'i gzugs/
125a4(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten dbang phyug rnam par sgom// de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni// pad+ma'i rigs kun bzlas par bya// nor bu rin chen skal ba che// rdo rje rin chen rnam par sgom// de yi thugs kar
125a5(rgyud 'bum): zhugs nas ni/ / rin chen rigs kun bzlas par bya// sems dpa' chen po rdo rje las// sems dpa'i gzugs ni rnam par sgom// de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni// las kyi rigs kun bzlas
125a6(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / bden pa dam tshig mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas thams cad rab grol byed// thos pa tsam gyis thabs chen po// yang na snying khar rdor rang bzhin// sna tshogs bdag po bzlas brjod mtshung
125a7(rgyud 'bum): shes rab can gyis gang bsams pa/ / phun sum tshogs kun bde bar thob// gsang ba yang dag bshad par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya// de yi thugs kar 'jug bya zhing // yid kyis
125b1(rgyud 'bum): / thams cad bcug nas ni// de yi sku ni mtshungs par spro// de yi thugs ka'i dbus su ni// rdo rje'i rigs ni rab tu bshad// ji bzhin sngon gyi rjes 'brangs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
125b2(rgyud 'bum): cad spro/ / de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzlas na// the tshom med par sangs rgyas kun// skad cig de nyid kyis 'grub 'gyur// rdo rje'i mda' ni zhi ba 'di// 'di lta bu
125b3(rgyud 'bum): yi gzugs bsgom bya/ / de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni// rdo rje'i gar dang mtshungs par sgom// de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje'i rigs can thams cad ni// the tsom med par dngos gru kun//
125b4(rgyud 'bum): ye shes bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur// pad+ma'i sems dpa' bsgom bya zhing // thugs kar ji bzhin 'jug par bya// sna tshogs thabs ni rab bsgoms na// pad+ma'i rigs can 'grub par 'gyur
125b5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rin chen bsgom bya zhing / / thugs kar ji bzhin 'jug par bya// rin chen mdzod ni bcug nas su// yang dang yang du spro bar bya// de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje rin chen dga' chen po// the tsom med par
125b6(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub kun/ / bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir// rdo rje las su rnam par bsam// de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni// sna tshogs rnam 'phrul spro bar bya//
125b7(rgyud 'bum): de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// sna tshogs mdzod ni rab spros nas// the tshom med par dngos grub kun// bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// shin tu gsang ba 'di lnga ni// bzlas pa gsang ba bla na med//
126a1(rgyud 'bum): de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// bzlas pa'i cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di// rgyud kyi snying po kun bsdus shing // nyon mongs thams cad rab 'joms
126a2(rgyud 'bum): shing / / rig pa 'dzin pas bzlas par bya// bzlas pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rig pa'i brtul zhugs nges par blang // gal te 'di ni dngos grub 'dod// rnal 'byor pa yis brtul zhugs bya//
126a3(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod sbyin sreg cho ga ni// rnal 'byor mchog tu brtson par bya// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa// bye ba gsum ni yongs su bzla// bye ba gsum ni bzlas byas nas// sgrub pa dag ni brtsam
126a4(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / byang chub sems ni dga' chen po// shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bri// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// sems can gcig gis yang dag bri// gang phyir rgyal po mchog gsang
126a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang / / rdo rje mchog ni rab sder byed// rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis// de ni sngon du yang dag brtsam// shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bri// khru ni bcu par yang dag bri// gru bzhi pa la sgo bani
126a6(rgyud 'bum): pa/ rba babs banis ni rnam par brgyan// ka ba brgyad dang yang dag ldan// dar gyi chun pos rnam par brgyan// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// khaM khyer dag gis shin tu smras// rin
126a7(rgyud 'bum): chen dra bas yongs su bres/ / gser skud dril bu g.yer khas brgyan// sgo khyud dang ni mtshams rnams su// rdo rje 'ching bas rab tu bcing // rdo rje rin chen rab tu bkod// rdo rje thig gis thig bang
126b1(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / dri yi sbyor ba'i cho ga dang // phur bus bgegs ni bsal bya zhing // tshon rtsi lnga yi srad du ni/ rdo rje gsang bas bsrung bar bya// rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis// phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gad /
126b2(rgyud 'bum): bya// ji skad sngar bshad de nyid ni// rdo rje gsang ba yongs su bkod// rdo rje gsang ba yongs bkod nas// phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya// rdo rje 'khor lo rab mdzes la// 'khor lo
126b3(rgyud 'bum): dbus su rab tu dgod/ / rdo rje chags pa yongs su dgod// tshon rtsi lnga ni rab tu dbye// ji skad gsang rgyud las gsungs bzhin// dkar po sna tshogs 'od 'bar ba// sngon po ser po shin tu
126b4(rgyud 'bum): 'bar/ / btsod sogs dang ni rab tu ldan// 'od zer dmar po sna tshogs ldan// sna tshogs tshen rtsis bri bar bya// 'od zer dmar po sna tshogs 'bar// rdo rje 'khor lo yongs bkod nas// zla ba
126b5(rgyud 'bum): gang bar rab bkod do/ / 'khor lo thams cad yongs su bzung // kha dog ji bzhin rigs pa bzhin// ji ltar mdzes shing shin tu dkar// ji bzhin zla ba nya ba mtshungs// zla ba gang ba yang dag
126b6(rgyud 'bum): bri/ / zla ba gang ba'i dbus su ni// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bri// gang gis mtshan ni bzung ba yis// skad cig gis ni sdig pa 'grol// 'dzum pa dang bcas zla ba'i mdog/ shin tu/
126b7(rgyud 'bum): chags pa dga' chen po// myur du rdo rje'i tshogs brjod do// rdo rje nyid kyi snying po yin// oM mahA su kha badz+ra satwa hU~M u0f7fdzub so/ rdo rje'i glu ni blang bya zhing // byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa che/
127a1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas byang chub rab ster byed// 'dod pa'i chags pa yang dag dran// thams cad rjes chags bde ba thugs mchog mnga'// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu dga' ba
127a2(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ kye khyod bde chen bstan pas 'phel mdzad pa// rab tu myur du sgrub pa 'grub par mdzod// rdo rje'i glu ni de lta bu// blang zhing 'khor lo spyan drang bya// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/
127a3(rgyud 'bum): rjes su chags shing rab 'grub 'gyur// sems dpa'i skyil krung yang dag gnas// rdo rje bsnyems tshul 'chang ba'i mchog/ rol pa dang bcas spyan g.yo ba// bsnyems tshul chen po dga'
127a4(rgyud 'bum): ba che/ / g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje ni// thugs ka ru ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/ g.yon pa dril bu yang dag ldan// slar yang bsnyems tshul dang bcas pa// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje che//
127a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po chen po thub pa che// spyod pa chen po theg pa che// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod// rin chen chen po rdo rje che// rgyal mtshan chen po dran pa che// sangs rgyas dran pa rdo rje che//
127a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod// 'dod chags chen po bde ba che// bde ba chen po bla na med// sa dang pha rol phyin bde ba// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod// shes rab chen
127a7(rgyud 'bum): po rdo rje che/ / rdo rje hU~M mdzad las byung ba// byang chub sems ni rdo rje che// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod// rdo rje chen po chags pa che// rgyal po chen po thub pa che// don yod rgyal po rdo rje mchog/
127b1(rgyud 'bum): / rdorje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod// chos kyi srid pa 'khor lo che// smra ba'i las ni bla na med// srung zhing bsrung ba drag po che// rdo rje khu tshur bdag grub mdzod// rdo rje yi ni glu 'di yis//
127b2(rgyud 'bum): de nyid mchog tu bskul nas nAM// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom bya zhing // rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal
127b3(rgyud 'bum): po che/ / mkhas pas dkyil 'khor dgod par bya// dkyil 'khor snga ma dang mtshungs par// dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag bri// de nas rdo rje langs nas ni// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad gdon par bya//
127b4(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi rig pa 'dzin pa ni// dbab dang gzhug pa la sogs pa// rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis// las rnams thams cad yang dag bya// bum pa la sogs yo byad dang // spos dang me tog la sogs
127b5(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis// las rnams tham ma sa dag bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i rig pa yis// bum pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas// de ni zhabs kyi drung bzhag na// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu ru
127b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis// cho ga ji bzhin 'jug bya zhing // rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya ches// bdag nyid la ni dbang bskur bya// hUM gis yang dag zhugs nas ni// rdo rje mchod pas yang dag
127b7(rgyud 'bum): mchod/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// ci rigs par ni bsgrub par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang bar gnas// phyag rgya chen po yongs su bzung // rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// rang bdag
128a1(rgyud 'bum): nyid ni bsgrub par bya/ / de nas gsang ba phyag rgya che// skad cig re re bsgrub par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po ni// brtan par 'gyur bar the tshom med// gsang ba'i rnal 'byor/
128a2(rgyud 'bum): bsgrubs nas ni// shin tu brten pa tha med pa// rjes chags sems dpa' chen po ni// skad cig gis ni bsgrub par bya// de 'dra'i mchog tu gsang ba mthar phyin pa// sems dpa' rgyal chen
128a3(rgyud 'bum): yongs su dag pa mchog/ dag pa'i tshul 'di cung zad mtshungs pa med// rjes chags 'dod chags yongs su dag pa mchog/ rdo rje rgyal mchog rab dag dri ma med// gsang ba las byung 'khor lo dam
128a4(rgyud 'bum): pa 'dzin/ / rig pa'i gsang sngags tshul 'di byang chub byed// snying rje dang ldan spyad pa spyod byed pa// de bzhin rab 'jigs sdug bsngal chen po'i pha rol phyin 'gyur ba// mchog tu mkhas shing phra la rgyud dang
128a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyud dag las byung ba/ / de ru srid pa dag gi dra ba chen po gcod mdzad pa// gsang sngags 'khor lo las byung ba yi 'khor lo ste// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis dgongs pa gcig/ sras kyi gtso bo
128a6(rgyud 'bum): dbang sgyur rgyal po ste/ / de yis thar pa'i grong khyer rab tu bshad// gsang ba rnal 'byor chen po de kho na nyid dam pa mchog tu gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdo rje rtse mo las// de bzhin gshegs
128a7(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi mdo sde gsang ba'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs zhes bya ba'i le'u gnyis pa rdzogs so/ / // de nas rnal 'byor gsang ba che// sangs rgyas thams/
128b1(rgyud 'bum): / cad kun bsdus pa// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan pa'i mchog/ nam mkha'i sna tshogs dngos ldan pa// ri dbang rgyal po chen po ste// sangs rgyas kyi ni sprul pa sprul// rdo rje dbang po chen po'i gnas
128b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag 'dus/ / rdo rje rgyal po rtse mo ste// gsang ba'i rnal 'byor yang dag byung // rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po che// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs par mtshungs// rdo rje kun gyis rab
128b3(rgyud 'bum): mdzes pa/ / mchog tu gyur pa'i gnas de ru// rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po che// rnal 'byor pa ni mi gsung bzhugs// sems dpa'i skyil krung yang dag bzhugs// gtso bos chos kun dbang du gyur// rol
128b4(rgyud 'bum): bcas rdo rje bsnyems tshul ldan/ / rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas gcig ste// chos chen po yi rnal 'byor mchog/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas ni// thub pa'i
128b5(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug la gsol btab/ / rdo rje rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che// byang chub sems dpa'i dga' chen po// sems dpa' byang sems las byung ba// rang gi rigs 'byung bshad du gsol// rdo rje
128b6(rgyud 'bum): 'chang ba rgyal po ste/ / rgyud kyi snying po gsang ba che// gsang ba chen po rigs kyi dbang // mdo sde gsang dbang rgyal po ste// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa// zhi bas byang chub 'grub 'gyur te//
128b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad yang dag bsdus pa min// gtum po thams cad rab 'joms pa// rang rigs rtag tu bshad du gsol// rdo rje 'chang ba rgyal po ste// kun tu mi gsung bzhugs par gyur// mi gsung gsang ba
129a1(rgyud 'bum): ma gsungs te/ / zhi ba'i bde ba la bzhugs gyur// gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa mchog/ sems dpa' chen po snyoms par bzhugs// rtogs shing gzigs par mi mdzad
129a2(rgyud 'bum): de/ gsang ba'i rnal 'byor bzhugs par gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas ni// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan par mdzad// sangs rgyas gcig bzhin yang dag 'gyur// don yod grub pa bla/
129a3(rgyud 'bum): na med// sangs rgyas thams cad rnal 'byor che// gsang ba bdun las yang dag byung // rdo rje'i sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje can la bskul ba gsungs// oM badz+ra satwa u tiSh+Thi/ rdo rje bskul ba
129a4(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa na/ / chos dbyings sangs rgyas gcig pu nyid// gsang ba'i rnal 'byor ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje sems dpa' bzhengs par gyur// thub pas mgon rnams la btud nas// tshig ni 'di skad
129a5(rgyud 'bum): gsungs par gyur/ / rnam pa kun tu ci zhig bgyi// bdag la sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs// phyag na rdo rje brtan pa la// de nas sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs// gsang ba rdo rje rigs zhes pa// rigs
129a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung thos nas// rdo rje dbang po'i gnas snang byed// rab tu btud nas tshig gsungs pa// mgon po rnal 'byor gzigs su gsol// bdag gi
129a7(rgyud 'bum): snod dang ldan pa'i mchog/ 'di na sems can 'ga' yang med// gang phyir mu stegs la chags shing // skye dgu lta ba'i dri mas khyab// sems can 'di dag 'dul bya min// sangs rgyas chos kyi snod
129b1(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / log pa'i lam du yang dag zhugs// mun pa stug po la gzhol ba// la la lha yi lta ba chags// kha cig brtul zhugs lta ba'i gnas// kha cig dka' thub gdungs pas 'khrul// nyon
129b2(rgyud 'bum): mongs pas ni 'khrugs pa'i sems/ / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la chags// skyo bar yang ni mi 'gyur te// rdo rje rigs kyi gsang 'di la// nam yang sbyor bar mi 'gyur ro// de dag 'dod chags che la
129b3(rgyud 'bum): chags/ / 'dod pa'i chags pa dag las rgyal// sangs rgyas byang chub chags bral ba// gsang ba 'di la sbyor mi 'gyur// lta ba'i chags pas rgyal bar 'gyur// 'dod pa'i chags pas lta ba
129b4(rgyud 'bum): can/ / srid pa'i zhags pas shin tu chags// sangs rgyas bstan pa la chags bral// nga rgyal lhag pa'i ngo rgyal zhing // gdug cing drag la shin tu khro// snying rje med cing brtse med 'gyur// de la
129b5(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba rung ma yin/ / rmongs pa kun mkhyen yin snyam pa// ye shes chen po la mkhas pa// gsang ba 'di ni rung ma yin// 'dren pa ji ltar bshad par bgyi// gnod sbyin dang ni srin po nyid//
129b6(rgyud 'bum): sha ba 'byung po gsang ba pa// lha la sogs pa gdug chen po// bstan pa la ni 'jug mi 'gyur// nga ni sangs rgyas rab tu zhi// byang chub sems ni dga' chen po// sems can 'di dag
129b7(rgyud 'bum): shin tu gdug/ bdag gi tshig ni 'grub mi 'gyur// nga ni rgyal chen theg chen la// nam mkha'i dbyings bzhin rab tu yangs// kye ma sems can 'di dag dman// bdag gi tshig ni 'grub mi
130a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / nga ni theg chem dag pa ste// nyon mongs 'dam gyis gos pa med// kye ma'o sems can 'di nyon mongs// bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi 'gyur// nga ni shes
130a2(rgyud 'bum): rang ye shes che/ / theg pa che la shin tu brtan// kye ma sems can shes rab ngan// bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi 'gyur// bsod nams chen po ye shes che// nga ni mchod pa chen po'i tshogs//
130a3(rgyud 'bum): kye ma'o sems can bsod nams chung // bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi 'gyur// sems can 'di dag nye bar 'tshe// 'jigs pa sna tshogs kun tu khyab// rnam rtog gis bskyod shes rab
130a4(rgyud 'bum): ngan/ / sangs rgyas chos kyi snod ma yin// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rter 'di// bdag po chen po dbang phyug kyang // rmongs pa kun sel nyid gyur pa// stobs chen rdzu 'phrul chen po ste/
130a5(rgyud 'bum): de la rgyal po grogs byed yod// sgyu ma'i sngags ni yongs su 'dzin// de ni mi rgyud ces bya ste// sems can rmongs byed lhur len pa// de ni rgyal po lha chen po// gtso bo rgyal po chen po mtshungs//
130a6(rgyud 'bum): de ni dbang phyug che zhes bya// gdug pa'i sems can 'joms byed pa// de yi gzugs can rgyal po che// skyed byed byed pa po bdag po// tshangs pa chen po rgyal po che// lta ba sna tshogs rab skor ba//
130a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa'i khams kyi rgyal po che// dbang po zhes bya sha tsi'i bdag/ brtson 'grus dbang phyug chen po'i bu// gdong drug rdzu 'phrul chen po can// dpung chen zhes bya'i ming che ste// gzhon nu mig
130b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'od can pa/ / rgyal po chen po 'di lnga ni// khams gsum gyi ni bdag por bshad// rgyal po lnga ni gzi brjid che// lus gsum gyi ni ngo mtshar che// skul byed dbang phyug chen po ni/
130b2(rgyud 'bum): pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// de yi lus can rgyal po che// dbang phyug chen po zhes grags pa// sems can gdug pa shin tu drag/ sngags bcas 'khor dang bcas pa yis// rgyal po
130b3(rgyud 'bum): lnga po de dag ni/ / sems can dag ni rnam rmongs byed// lta ba chen po 'dzin byed cing // bdud kyi dbang du gyur pa ste// nyon mongs chen pos rab nyon mongs// gzhan yang kun nas nyon mongs
130b4(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / sems can dag ni 'joms byed cing // bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi 'gyur// dbang phyug chen po bdag nyid che// bdag nyid dam pa'i yid chen po// de lta bu yi rnam rtog gis// sems
130b5(rgyud 'bum): can rnam par rmongs par byed/ / tshangs pa 'byin byed skye dgu'i bdag/ byed pa rang bdag byed pa po// lta ba chen po de lta bus// sems can dag ni rnam rmongs byed// khyab 'jug kun song khyab byed pa//
130b6(rgyud 'bum): khyab 'jug rang bzhin grong khyer kun// de ltar yang dag mi 'dzin pa// lta ba'i 'ching ba rab ster byed// rgya cher rgyal po 'di rnams ni// lta bar smra la nges par ston// rmongs pa mkhas pa yin
130b7(rgyud 'bum): sems shing / / sems can 'ching bar byed pa yin// sems can de rnams gzhan gyis bskul// lta ba smra bar nges par bsten// khyab 'jug tshangs pa la sogs pa// dbang phyug chen po phyag byed
131a1(rgyud 'bum): de/ sangs rgyas ye shes rnam kun tu// bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi byed// sems can 'di rnams rmongs par gyur// de la gsang ba rung ma yin// de lta bu yi rnam pa yis//
131a2(rgyud 'bum): rdorje sems dpa' dga' chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyis mkhyen nas ni// rnal 'byor pa ni mi gsung bzhugs// mgor po chen po sangs rgyas kun/ thub pa nyi ma ma lus pas// gsung gcig gis ni
131a3(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba che/ / rdo rje yi ni tshig gsungs pa// kye ma'o sems can 'di gdul dka'// gdug cing drag la shin tu gtum// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi 'dul ba// de phyir bdag cag gsol ba 'debs//
131a4(rgyud 'bum): mgon khyod shes rab chen po ste// de ni thabs chen brjod par bya// byang chub sems ni thabs ring po// nyon mongs thams cad nges par 'joms// gdug pa thams cad rab gdul ba// mgon po
131a5(rgyud 'bum): khyod la gsol ba 'debs/ / gdug pa 'dul byed rnam 'phrul pa// thabs chen po ni rab tu gsungs// sangs rgyas kAr gyis sems can 'di// 'dul bar mi 'gyur snod min la// thabs chen khros
131a6(rgyud 'bum): chen po ni/ / thub pa chen pos bstan du gsol// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshig gsan nas// phyag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che// tshig dag gis ni zhus gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun la 'di skad gsungs// e ma'o
131a7(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba 'khor lo che/ / thabs chen bdag nyid chen po ste// chos kyi dbyings ni bstan pa'i dngos// thabs kyi 'khor lo rab ston pa// ji skad du ni bka' stsal pa// de bzhin du ni bdag gis bgyi//
131b1(rgyud 'bum): sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir// drag po nyid ni bstan par bya// de skad gsungs nas sems dpa' che// byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che// mi gsung bzhugs nas rnal 'byor gyis// drag po nyid la
131b2(rgyud 'bum): snyoms par zhugs/ / drag po'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje mchog/ ces bya'i ting 'dzin de lta bu// drag po chen po snyoms par zhugs// de bzhin thugs ka nas byung ba// drag po 'jigs rung yi ge hUM/
131b3(rgyud 'bum): / khro bo chen po brjod par gyur// rdo rje hUM mdzad khro rgyal po// mgon po thugs ka nas phyung gyur// sa gzhi ma lus g.yos gyur cing // sa 'di dag ni sgra sgrog gyur// stong gsum ma lus 'di dag ni// dz+dza
131b4(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya brjod par gyur/ / tshad med gzhal du med pa yi// khro bo'i rgyal po byung gyur pas// phyogs rnams kun tu gdug chen dag/ skad cig de la gtum par gyur// slar yang gcig nyid gyur nas ni//
131b5(rgyud 'bum): gong bur byas nas rab bsdams te// khro bo'i rgyal po sku chen po// 'jigs su rung ba zhig tu gyur// de ni khro bo'i rgyal po che// sangs rgyas kun gyi grags chen po// khro rgyal mdun du 'dug nas ni/
131b6(rgyud 'bum): slar yang snying po rab tu brjod// d+hU t+ya hUM t+yaH/ 'jigs su rung ba'i spu langs byed// gnod sbyin kun bdag gnod sbyin te// rdo rje gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul che// khro bo chen po brjod pa yin// stong gsum
131b7(rgyud 'bum): gyi ni 'jig rten 'di/ / 'bar ba'o 'phreng ba'i 'od kyis khyab// rdo rje me ni drag po che// ma lus gsal zhing me 'bar gyur// phyi rol gyi ni gdug pa can// ma lus dkyil 'khor las byung ba// rdo rje
132a1(rgyud 'bum): me ni rab 'bar bas/ / g.yo ba med cing shi bar gyur// lha chen la sogs gdug pa rnams// gang dag rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams// rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis gdungs nas//
132a2(rgyud 'bum): g.yo ba med cing 'bar bar gyur// de ni rdo rje gnod sbyin che// drag po'i gzugs can rab 'jigs byed// khro gnyer bsnyer ba'i gdong can te// de bzhin gnag dang sngo bar gyur// mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal
132a3(rgyud 'bum): mnga' ba/ / dbu skra gyen brdzes shin tu skrag/ spyan dmar spyan dang ldan pa ste// de bzhin rdo rje bstan pa'i zhal// drag po rdo rje drag tshogs 'dzin// gcig pu 'bar ba rab ldan pa// zhags pa lcags kyu
132a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje bdag/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs byed pa// sa rnams ma lus g.yo bar byed// sa 'di yang ni g.yo bar byed// gnod sbyin chen po 'byung po sogs// g.yo ba med cing 'og tu 'gyel// de ni
132a5(rgyud 'bum): drag po gnod sbyin che/ / sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs par byed// de yi spyan sngar 'dug nas ni// ched du brjod pa yang dag brjod// e ma'o byang chub kyi ni sems// kun tu bzang po kun dge ba// sems
132a6(rgyud 'bum): can 'dul ba'i thabs su ni/ / brtse med khro bo nyid du gyur// sngar ni rdo rje sems dpa' gang // zhi ba'i gzugs su rnam gnas pa// rdo rje gnod sbyin 'dzin gyur nas// rdo rje drag po zhes byar grags// de
132a7(rgyud 'bum): ni drag po rdo rje 'dzin/ / 'jigs rung ba spu langs par byed// yi ge hUM bzhi'i phyag rgya yi// snying po gtum po nyid kyang gsungs// oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha ni hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ihAts+tsha/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hU~M/ An
132b1(rgyud 'bum): ya ho b+ha ga bAn badz+ra hUM phaT/ shin tu gtum zhing cher grags pa// de bzhin thugs ka nas byung ste// zhal bzhi dang ni phyag brgyad pa// bskal pa yi ni me ltar drag/ rdo rje dus kyi me ltar byung // nyon
132b2(rgyud 'bum): mongs phyogs ni rab sreg byed/ / smin ma bskyod pas gtsigs pa'i zhal// de bzhin rnam par 'jigs pa'i gdong // 'jig rten gsum sreg dam tshi ba ste// rdo rje can kun sreg par byed// 'bar
132b3(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng kun tu 'khrigs pa'i sgra/ / rdo rje bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya ni// phyag gnyis kyis ni yongs su bzung // rdo rje bsdams pa 'dzir rgyal po// lcags kyu dang ni zhags pas
132b4(rgyud 'bum): brgyan/ / rdo rje yi ni lu gu rgyud// phyag gnyis na bsdams 'jigs rung zhal// sangs rgyas thams cad sdigs byed pa// rdo rje gtum pos yang dag byung // drab po bka' ni nod par byed// myur ba ru ni
132b5(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsol cig/ min na sangs rgyas khyed rnams kun// the tshom med par bza' bar bya// de nas sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs// Tak+ki hUM dza hUM shin tu drag/ rigs dang bcas par lha chen po/
132b6(rgyud 'bum): stobs chen po yis dgug par gyis// de nas rig pa'i mchog rgyal po// bsnyems pa'i tshul gyis bshad byed cing // khro bo drag po rnga sgra sgrog/ rdo rje zhags pa bskul bar bya// rdo rje zhags pa drag
132b7(rgyud 'bum): po che/ / dpung bcas grogs dang bcas pa dang // de bzhin rigs dang dkyil 'khor bcas// song la dbang phyug chen po khrag/ badz+ra pA sha hUM/ dbang ldan rgyal po chen po ni// sna tshogs rang gi 'khor
133a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / 'jigs byed ma dang lhan cig tu// 'dod pa can ni mchog tu rol// rdo rje zhags pa der song ste// khro bo'i dgra yis bsdigs par gyur// dbang ldan rgyal po la spras
133a2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ khyod la ston pa spyan 'dren mdzad// skrag cing khros nas lha chen pos// 'jigs pa yis ni tshig brjod pa// nga ni 'jig rten gsum rgyal po// nga la ston pa gzhan yod dam// rdo rje zhags
133a3(rgyud 'bum): pa khro bo ches/ / tshig ni lan gsum brjod par gyur// rdo rje khro bo rgyal po che// khyod la shin tu spyan 'dren mdzad// lha chen dbang phyug chen po yis// slar yang lan gsum smras pa ni// nga ni kho na
133a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po rang / / nga la spyan 'dren gang zhig yod// de nas zhags pas bka' bzhin byed// khro bo drag po rab 'jigs pas// yan lag thams cad bcings nas ni// dbang phyug chen po bkug par
133a5(rgyud 'bum): gyur/ / 'jigs shing skrag nas lha chen po// shin tu smre sngags 'don cing ngu// skyabs ni gang yang yod ma yin// 'jigs pa chen po kun tu byung // stobs dang de bzhin nga rgyal gyis// stobs
133a6(rgyud 'bum): dang shugs ni bstan nas su/ / zhag pa bcad nas bros par gyur// rang gi gnas su song gyur nas// 'jig rten gsum gi lha rnams bos// lha dang lha min dri zar bcas// skad cig gis ni 'dus

139a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor du ni dgug par gyur/ / rdo rje can dang bcas kun gyis// rdo rje lcags sgrog yang dag brjod// oM badz+ra s+pho Ta ban d+ha hU~M phaT// sna tshogs gdug pa de dag ni// 'chang ba lnga yis bcings par
139b1(rgyud 'bum): gyur/ rdon lcags sgrog / khro bo ches// 'ching ba brtan par bcings par gyur// khro bo na rnga rgyal po ni// shin tu gtum pa stobs po ni// sbyar yang snying po yang dag dram/ lag snying po yang da/
139b2(rgyud 'bum): brjod// hUM snying po drag po brjod pa yis// gdug pa de rnams rab tu 'gyel// g.yo med shi ba bzhin du gyur// 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal nye bar thob// de nas rgyal po rnam snang mdzad// chos kun dbang
139b3(rgyud 'bum): phyug dbang dang ldan/ / rdo rje khro bo rgyal po che// rdo rje 'chang la bos par gyur// sems dpa' chen po mnyan par gyis// 'di rnams sems can rab 'jigs byed// 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo

140a1(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ / khyed cag yongs su bsgrub pa dang // phan gdags par ni ngas mi nus// 'di ni drag po rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag por bka//

140a4(rgyud 'bum): rab tu zhi/ / de ni byang chub de dang mtshungs// brtse dang byang chub sems las byung // de 'dra'i drag po ga las byung // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'di ni thabs kyis 'dul ba ste//

145b1(rgyud 'bum): byas te/ 'on kyang bden par smra mi bya// rdo rje sems dpa' drag po che// rang bzhin gyis ni sangs rgyas bdag/ stobs chen gsang ba'i dbang po yi// bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen pas
145b2(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / oM ni sun+ta ha na da ha pa tsa gr-i ska ban d+ha hU~M phaT// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas bka' la rab gnas pas// rdo rje khro bo rab pa byed// snying po drag po brjod par gyur// oM ma
145b3(rgyud 'bum): hA badz+ra kro d+ha pA da sarba duSh+Ta maN+Da la b+hi Sha sha ya/ sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya yan bi ki ra mi d+h+waM sa ya s+pho Ta ya/ b+haM dza ya b+haM dza ya/ sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu dAM ban+d+ha gr-ih+Na/ ha na da ha pa tsa sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya satwa sa ma
145b4(rgyud 'bum): ya hUM phaT/ de nas 'di ni brjod tsam gyis// rdo rje khro bo bdag nyid che// gtum po drag po shin tu 'jigs// rdo rje khro bo rab tu byung // rigs bcas dpung bcas dang ldan pa// dam tshig sdang ba
145b5(rgyud 'bum): bzung nas ni/ / shin tu 'jigs pas skrag gyur cing // rgya mtsho yang ni rab tu sprul// phyag rgya rab 'jigs de dag gis// rnam par bcom zhing zil gyis mnan// rdo rje me yis bsregs nas ni// thams
145b6(rgyud 'bum): cad du ni thal bar byas/ / byang sems las byung rdo rje can// ji ltar sems can sreg par byed// 'di ni gzhug pa'i tshig yin te// phan pa'i rigs can rgyal bdag skyes// 'dod chags skyon la sogs
145b7(rgyud 'bum): lta ba/ / nyon mongs dri ma gang shes nas// rdo rje can gyis dri ma 'di// bzung nas ye shes me yis bsregs// sems can shin tu 'jigs te skrag/ byang chub spyod pas byang chub gnas// mi bskyod/
146a1(rgyud 'bum): @#pa yi gnas skyes shing // rdo rje can ni mchog tu gyur// phyag na rdo rje sems dpa' che// rdo rje chen po phyag rgya 'gugs// zhes bya de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la// 'jigs pa med par rtsom
146a2(rgyud 'bum): pabar zhugs/ / mkha' 'gro ma ni rjes sbyangs phyir// rgyal ba la ni bka' nod gyur// phyag na rdo rje spobs chen la// de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa// oM ha na ha na badz+ra hUM phaT// de nas rdo rje 'dzin drag
146a3(rgyud 'bum): pos/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung thos nas// 'jigs pa 'gugs pa'i rdo rje ni// rang nyid kyi ni sngags 'di brjod// oM badz+ra A kaR+Sha yaSh+TaM shre/ sarba duSh+Ta ga ne badz+ra d+ha sa t+yen hUM dzaM// de nas brjod
146a4(rgyud 'bum): pa tsam gyis ni/ / mkha' gro ma ni mdangs 'phrog pa// rnal 'byor sngags dang phyag rgyar bcas// ri rab tu ni kun tu 'dus// rdo rje lcags kyus bkug nas ni// 'bar ba dang bcas 'bar bar gyur/
146a5(rgyud 'bum): spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas tshig/ smras pa rdo rje 'dzin pas skyobs// skal chen rdo rje can gyis gsungs// kye/ gdug pa'i tshogs chen myur ba ru// gsod pa spongs la bka' nyan gyis// de dag
146a6(rgyud 'bum): re re zhing smras pa/ / bdag cag 'di rnams sha ba ste// gang zhig rtag tu gson gyur pa// bdag cag la ni thabs bstan gsol// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'chang // de yis thabs ni 'di gsungs so//
146a7(rgyud 'bum): bla gcig lon nas shi ba gang // de ni baba' ba blang bar gyis// byang chub sems la chags bral nas// gsang ba smod pa lhur len pa// khyod dang lhan cig yang dag sbyor// de bza' ba ni gnang bar gyis/
146b1(rgyud 'bum): phyuphyag rgya yi ni snying po 'di// rtag tu bcang bar bya ba ste// phyi rol thams cad spang nas ni// sangs rgyas bstan pa srung bar gyis// oM badz+ra pra ti gr-i h+Na hr-i da ya A kaR+Sha ya// tsAr+ya yaM me sa d+ho d+ha na mi ni ya te hAH
146b2(rgyud 'bum): ri d+ha yaM nil+lAm du sa ma ya hU~M dza/ de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rang gi sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan// khro bo spyi gtsug rgyal po ni// rnal 'byor pa ni de yis spros// gal te dam tshig las 'das na// khri
146b3(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid chen po yis/ / rtag tu mgo bo 'gas byed cing // rigs dang bcas pa nges par sreg/ bdud rtsi sman gyi rgyal po zhes// bya ba de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la// sems dpa' chen po snyoms zhugs
146b4(rgyud 'bum): nas/ nad kyi don du 'tshol bar gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// oM badz+ra hUM phaT/ de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// sems can thams cad 'jigs byed pas// nad rnams thams cad
146b5(rgyud 'bum): bkug nas ni/ / 'gugs pa yi ni snying po brjod// oM badz+ra sa ma ya A na ya sarba duSh+Ta dz+wa ra na de nI sha ya hUM phaT// de nas brjod pa tsam gyis kyang // nad dang gdon gyi tshogs kun dang // rims sogs
146b6(rgyud 'bum): kyis ni de thos nas/ / steng du rkang pa 'og tu mgo/ 'bar ba'i me dang yang dag ldan// sa ha zhes sgrog 'jigs par byed// bdag cag rims ni ma gzhom par// khro bo chen po bka' stsol cig/
146b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rnal 'byor chen pos gsungs// nga yi bka' ni rab tu nyon// sems can nye bar 'joms pa spongs// mdangs kyang 'phrog par ma byed cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa// kye/ rgyal po rdo rje bdag
147a1(rgyud 'bum): @cag gi/ srog gi srung ba mdzad du gsol// bdag cag kun ni gzi brjid pa// thabs ni cung zad sbrul du gsol// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// de nas stobs chen gyis/

147a3(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / mdo sde gsang ba rgyal po las// yongs su bshad pa thams cad kun// sngags dang phyag rgya gnas gang na// rtag par rab tu spyod byed pas// gnas de ru yang rtag pa ru// khyed rnams
147a4(rgyud 'bum): shin tu gnod ma byed/ / de skad gsungs pas gdon kun ni// hi hi zhes ni sgrog par gyur// spyi bo'i rnal 'byor pa la ni// gnod po byed pa thams cad gtang // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//

148a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyangs sems can bde ba bskyes par gyur/ / rdo rje bde ba yang dag ldan// mchog chen po yi zhing 'di ni// dag pa'i zhing du rab tu grags// sems can dag pa kun tu khyab//

149a1(rgyud 'bum): po rnam par 'byung / / dril bu'i dra ba rnam par 'phyang // zhing ni kun tu rab tu smras// me tog sna tshogs kun tu bkram// sna tshogs sprin gyis rab tu g.yogs// sna tshogs

150b6(rgyud 'bum): sems g.yengs pa/ / sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul 'di ci zhig/ bdag cag gis na sngar 'jigs mthong // drag cing bkug nas thal bar byas// ri rab ri yi rtse mo ru// sdug bsngal chen pos gzir bar gyur//

151a1(rgyud 'bum): gsum 'di yang mi snang ste/ / bdag cag 'jig rten gzhan du phyin// de ltar brjod pa sna tshogs pa// gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed// mi s+thA bar ni gnas gyur nas// rdo rje can/
151a2(rgyud 'bum): la lta bar byed// gnod sbyin 'byung po sha za sogs// gdug pa kun dang gdon sogs kyis// mun par khyab pa bzhin du ni// stong gsum 'di ni mthong bar gyur// gzhan ni cung zad ma mthong ste//
