151a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor la min/ / bdag cag rnams ni mun par gyur// rang gi gnas kyang ma mthong zhing // ri rab nyid kyang mthong ma gyur// mtsho dang rgya mtsho dag kyang min// skar ma zla ba nyi ma min// bdag cag
151a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad gang nas 'ongs/ / yul gang zhig tu 'gro bar byed// 'gro ba lnga yang yong ma yin// 'jig rten med cing ma mo med/ ma yin pa dag/ rnam pa kun tu mthong ma gyur/ sngon
151b1(rgyud 'bum): de ltar de bzhin gyiH/ / rmad du byung ba nyid ma gyur// gzhan dus ni g.yos par gyur// rlung dag gis ni rnam par spyod// 'brug gi sgra dang grog chen po// sdug bsngal thams cad yang dag ldan/
151b2(rgyud 'bum): bkres skom la sogs sdug bsngal dang // bral min kun tu sdug bsngal gyur// der ni lha chen rdzu 'phrul dag/ cung zad kyang ni mthong ma gyur// dmyal ba yi dgas dud 'gro dag/ rnam par nyams
151b3(rgyud 'bum): shing bshig par gyur/ / sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya yis// ngan song gsum ni nye bar zhi// lha gang 'du shes med pa dang // gzugs med pa na spyod par gnas// phung po lnga ru rang bdag nyid// ngo
151b4(rgyud 'bum): mtshar de bzhin mthong gyur nas/ / rang bdag nyid la'ang rtog par byed// gcig la gcig kyang lta bar byed// de bzhin thams cad skrag cing 'jigs// ngo mtshar gyur pa 'di ci zhig/ tshad med bskal
151b5(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po ru/ / bdag cag dag par gnas par gyur// bdag mchog las ni bdag cag grol// slar yang bdag tu 'dzin par gyur// sngon gyi bag chags mngon 'dod la// srid gsum gnas
151b6(rgyud 'bum): ni mthong bar gyur/ / srid pa gsum yang mthong ma yin// de bzhin 'gro ba lnga yang med// gzhan du shin tu dag par gcig/ chos dang longs spyod rdzogs par sprul// sangs rgyas lnga nyid mthong
151b7(rgyud 'bum): bar gyur/ / srid gsum gnas ni gzhan dag min// tshogs la thams cad mnyes par gyur// gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed// 'di ni su zhig bdag cag gang // bdag cag 'jig rten gzhan du phyin//
152a1(rgyud 'bum): sngon ni bdag gis 'jig brten 'di// bgro ba lnga bcas de bzhin du// ri rab dang ni rgya mtshor bcas// lha rnams drug ni 'khor bcas mthong // srid pa gsum gyi lha rnams ni/
152a2(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig 'di ni mthong ma gyur// gzhal yas khang dang sems can ni// gtso bo ji bzhin mthong bar gyur// de 'dra'i ngo mtshar sna tshogs la// gnas chen 'di ru mthong bar gyur// byang chub sems kyi
152a3(rgyud 'bum): rnam 'phrul 'di/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi rol pa yin// gang zhig stong gsum 'di yi ni// rang rgyal bdag nyid mchog gyur pa// de yang kun tu rmongs gyur nas// rnam par 'phrul pa'ang mthong ma
152a4(rgyud 'bum): gyur/ sangs rgyas nyid kyang mthong ma yin// rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras kyang min// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan zhi ba// gnas ni de ru mthong ma gyur// gzhan du stong ni gsum po 'di// rnam pa kun tu ma
152a5(rgyud 'bum): mthong nyid/ / sa dang me dang chu khams min// gser gyi dkyil 'khor dag kyang min// 'gro ba lnga yi sems can min// zla ba nyi ma dag kyang min// skar ma gza' dang rgyu skar min// sems can dag
152a6(rgyud 'bum): kyang khams gsum min/ / 'di dag thams cad stong par gyur// gzhan du nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor min// de dag thams cad 'jig skrag nas// mya ngan 'das pa nye bar thob// gang yang phyogs
152a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams bcu po yi/ / nyan thos 'jigs pa med pa rnams// byang sems can ni chen po yis// de dag kun ni skrag par gyur// rang rang gi ni zhing dag tu// sangs rgyas nyid kyang mthong ma gyur// 'dus pa
152b1(rgyud 'bum): chen po dag dang ni/ / chos rnams ston pa dag kyang min// zhing de yi ni sems can min// lha dang mi rnams dag kyang min// khang pa med cing zhing yang med// sa dang me dang rlung yang med// rang gi
152b2(rgyud 'bum): zhing yang ma mthong zhing / / rdo rje sems dpa' 'jigs par gyur// skad cig gis ni mi dgar gyur// thang cig tu ni rmongs par gyur// de lta bu yi rnam 'phrul du// byang chub sems ni rab tu snang //
152b3(rgyud 'bum): snod kyi bskal pa chen po la// 'khor lo rnam par 'khrul pa bstan// bcom ldan rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas// de lta bu ni byin gyis brlabs// sems can gang dag 'di na gnas// nyin dang mtshan
152b4(rgyud 'bum): mo mi shes gyur/ / de nas de nyid gsang ba che// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan pa'i tshogs// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sangs rgyas// de lta bu yi rnam 'phrul byung // stong gsum yongs su bsdus pa
152b5(rgyud 'bum): yi/ / lha yi gnas ni bkod par gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gnas gcig pu// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa// la lar sngon po sngon po ni// rdo rje sngon pos rab tu mdzes//
152b6(rgyud 'bum): phyogs ni rab tu spras// rdo rje sngon pos rab tu brgyan// la lar gser gyi mdog tu snang // kha dog ser pos rnam par brgyan// sa yi cha yang rab tu sbas// rdo rje ser pos rab tu brgyan// la lar kha dog
152b7(rgyud 'bum): dmar po ni/ / b+ha ru lha bus rab tu mdzes// sa yi cha yang rab tu sbas// rdo rje dmar pos rab tu brgyan// la lar btsag gi mdog can gyi// bai nun mtshungs rab tu mdzes// sa yi cha yang rnam
153a1(rgyud 'bum): par spras/ / rdo rje brjod kyis rnam par mdzes// la lar shel gyi mdog can gyi// shin tu snang bas rab tu mdzes// sa yi cha yang rnam par spras// rdo rje shel gyis rnam par
153a2(rgyud 'bum): brgyan/ / shar du sngon po chen po ste// lhor ni ser po yang dag ldan// nub kyi cha ni dmar po ste// byang ni btsod dang yang dag ldan// dbus kyi sa yi cha dag ni// shel gyi mdog can bla na med// rdo rje
153a3(rgyud 'bum): chen pos shin tu dag/ chen rtsi lnga yi rang bzhin bshad// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis rab tu mdzes// cha mnyam legs par bgos pa ste// go rims dang ni yang dag ldan/
153a4(rgyud 'bum): kun nas phyi rol gnas dag na// rdo rje kha khyer yang dag ldan// kun nas kha khyer dang ldan zhing // sgo yi kha khyer ngag gis spras// ri mo rdo rje sngo rang bzhin// gzhan yang gser gyi mdog can
153a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / / kha dog dmar po mchog dang ni// gzhan yang shel ni bzang po dag/ rin chen kun gyi rang bzhin mchog/ dkyil 'khor sna tshogs mdzes gyur pa// sna tshogs gzugs ni 'dzin pa'i
153a6(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ rdo rje lha mo tshogs kyis mchod// dra ba dra ba phyed pas spras// zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes// g.yer ka'i dra bas kun tu khebs// dril bu'i mchog ni kun tu 'phyang // sna tshogs
153a7(rgyud 'bum): shing ni yid 'ong ldan/ / dpag bsam shing ni yid 'ong ldan// spos dang me tog de bzhin dri// snang ba'i shing mchog yang dag ldan// sna tshogs bkod pa nye bar ldan// sna tshogs rdo rje bdud rtsi'i/
153b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyu/ mchog mchog rngu yi gang bar gyur// rdo rje rgya mtsho rgya chen ldan// me tog sna tshogs kun tu bkram// sna tshogs bdug pa dag gis bdugs// sna tshogs dri yi chu yis gtor// sna tshogs
153b2(rgyud 'bum): dr-i yis kun tu khyab/ / drag po chen po sras bcu dag/ de nas nyams dga' ba dag byung // shing dang pad sogs thams cad las// chos rnams 'byung ba thos par gyur// phyogs rnams kun tu rnam phyung
153b3(rgyud 'bum): / nas/ dag pa'i zhing du stong nyid bcas// rnam par sgra ni gang zhig grag/ chos kyi bde ba 'byung bar gyur// yaM/ laM shaM/ baM oM badz+ra satwa kro d+ha ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya hU~M
153b4(rgyud 'bum): phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha rA gA ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra duSh+Ti kro d+ha ya sA d+hu sA d+hu hUM phaT/ khro bo rdo rje rin chen mchog/ 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba bkod dga' bas// khro bo rdo rje bla na med// mchog tu gsang ba
153b5(rgyud 'bum): gsungs par gyur/ / oM badz+ra b+h+r-i ku nI kro d+hA san hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra sUr+ya ma hA dz+wa la mA la kro d+ha dz+wA la ya sarba hUM phaT// oM badz+ra ke tu ma hA kro d+ha d+he ni hUM phaT/ oM an+d+ra hA sa badz+ra man+d+ha hA sa kro d+ha ha ha ha ha hUM phaT/
153b6(rgyud 'bum): khro bo chen po rdo rje chos// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas khyab gyur pas// khro bo'i rgyal po rab bzod dka'// mchog tu 'jigs su rung ba smras// oM badz+ra d+harma bi sho d+hi ya hUM phaT/ oM tik+Sh+Na kri b+hin+d+ha hUM phaT/
153b7(rgyud 'bum): oM badz+rab tu kro d+ha pra be sha ya maN+Da laM sarba hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha b+hA Sha Na pA ta hUM phaT/ rdo rje las ni rgyal po che// gsang ba thams cad kun bsdus pas// 'bar ba gsal bas khyab pa byung /
154a1(rgyud 'bum): zla brgyal pos brjod par gyur// oM badz+ra ka lo drA pa/ oM badz+ra ka bats+tsha krod+ha rmA/ mardu/ s+t+wa~M bAH ya/ k+ShoN+Da dz+wal/ oM badz+ra kron ma hU~M swA d+hA mAs m+b+ha
154a2(rgyud 'bum): phaT/ sems dpa' 'di rnams gsang ba che// zhi ba'i gzugs las rnam par gyur// rdo rje khro bo drag po che// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs gyur// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//
154a3(rgyud 'bum): / khro bo chen po stobs po che// gsang ba 'di rnams yongs su brjod// mchod pa'i lha mos gsungs par gyur// oM badz+ra lA s+ye rA gA ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsA ya hUM sa// oM badz+ra ki
154a4(rgyud 'bum): Ni ga ta ya swA phaT/ oM badz+ra naM te ba sha~M ku ru hU~M phaH/ oM badz+ra prASh+pa pU dza s+phA ra Na sa ma ye hUM pha/ oM badz+ra gar+N+Na pU dza swa ra Na sa ma ye dz+dza saM// oM badz+ra d+hU pa pU dza kA ra Na sa~M ma ye hU~M pha/ oM badz+ra
154a5(rgyud 'bum): / A lo ke pU dza s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM phaT/ de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// khro bo drag po shin tu gdug/ rdo rje khro bo rab gtum pa// sgo srungs dag ni kun tu byung // oM aM ku sha mahA kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya
154a6(rgyud 'bum): sarba sa ma ye hUM phaT/ / oM badz+ra pA sha many+dzu kro d+ha pra be sha ya sarba sa ma ya hUM hUM/ oM badz+ra s+pho Ta maH kro d+ha ban+d+ha ya sarba sa ma yats+tsha baM/ oM badz+ra A ba sha mahA kro d+ha A be sha ya sarba sa ma ya b+h+yaH
154a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo yongs su zlum por ni/ / rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por gyur// khro bo nini pa'i tshogs kyis khyab// dkyil 'khor chen po yang dag ldan// gnas chen po dang yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor/
154b1(rgyud 'bum): chen po kun bsdus pas// shin tu gsang ba chos chen po// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa// de nyid snying po gsang ba che// thar pa chen po grong khyer mchog/ dkyil 'khor rgyal po chen
154b2(rgyud 'bum): po ste/ / sems can don kun yang dag ldan// chos nyid rdzogs par byang chub po// 'di 'dre chos dang longs spyod rdzogs// rigs lnga'i gsang ba gang yin pa// gdon mi za bar byed pa yi//
154b3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs zhi ba// gang phyir dag pa'i tshogs chen po// de bzhin rdo rje'i rigs dag pa// gang phyir lha chen rab 'dul byed// lha chen la sogs sprul byed pa// de bzhin pad+ma'i
154b4(rgyud 'bum): rigs mchog ste/ / gang phyir gdul bya'i sems can rnams// sprul pa sna tshogs yang dag byung // sprul pa'i 'khor lo zhi ba ste// drag po'i mchod pa rab bskor ba// sna tshogs rigs can 'khor
154b5(rgyud 'bum): lo ste/ / rigs bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs mchog ni// shar gyi 'khor lo yang dag byung // de nas rdo rje'i rigs drag po// sems can don du yang dag 'jigs/
154b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i rigs mchog chen po 'di// dkyil 'khor tshogs ni kun bsdus pa// gsang ba'i dbang phyug rgyal po che// gang phyir gsang ba'i bdag por bshad// rdo rje thams cad kun bsdus pa/
154b7(rgyud 'bum): rang gi rigs mchog bshad nas ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po ches// dkyil 'khor chen po kun tu sprul// lha la sogs pa gdug pa kun// skad cig de la yang dag bkug/ sngar ni bcug par
155a1(rgyud 'bum): byas nas kyang / / skad cig gis ni dam tshig phog/ rdo rje mtshan ma'i dbang bskur ba// dam tshig ldan pa byin nas ni// bkug ste rab tu bcug nas kyang // de bzhin bcings
155a2(rgyud 'bum): te dbang du byas/ / dam tshig la ni brtson byas te// dam tshig sdom pa de bzhin no// mi rnams la ni phan pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor mchog ni gsungs par gyur// 'khor lo chen po grong khyer che//
155a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rigs mchog chen po ste// khams gsum rnam rgyal zhes bya ba// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// 'jig rten gsum tshogs pham byas nas// lha la sogs pa rab bcug gyur// de nas khams
155a4(rgyud 'bum): gsum rnam rgyal gnas/ / 'khor lo chen po grong khyer che// gang ming bzung ba tsam nyid kyis// sems can rab tu bcom nas ni// gdon la sogs pa 'bros par byed// rims dang gdon dang dug/
155a5(rgyud 'bum): ngag dang // drag po gdug pa dam tshig dang // mtshan bzung ba yi mod nyid la// skrag pa dang ni g.yo bar gyur// sku ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mchog/ mi gang dag ni gdul bya min// de bas rdo rje
155a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin rgyal ni/ / dkyil 'khor chen po sprul par gyur// rdo rje slob dpon skal ba ni// shin tu byang zhing rab tu mkhas// dgongs pa yis ni cho ga shes// gzhung rnams thos shing don la mkhas
155a7(rgyud 'bum): rab tu dang zhing blo ldan brtan/ / rigs dang rigs min rab tu shes// byang chub sems la brtson par gyur// lha gzhan dag la 'dod ldan min// gsang ba'i snying po mchog mthong ba// snying rje
155b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid brtser ldan pa/ / dag cing des la rnam par dul// rang gi ngang gis rnam par gnas// zhen cing chags la gdug pa min// rmongs pa med cing le lo med// brtse ldan phan pa'i bsam
155b2(rgyud 'bum): pa can/ / rtag tu rnam par dgod la dga'// gzugs sogs 'dod pa'i yon tan la// chags shing lhag par rgyal gyur nas// srid la sems ni skrag par byed// srid la mngon par chags pa med// theg pa chen po'i tshul la brtson/
155b3(rgyud 'bum): theg pa gzhan la 'dod ldan min// sems can rnams kyi don la brtson// dkon mchog gsum gyi mchog byung ba// nyon mongs kun tu chags pa spangs// gnyen po dag ni rab tu sgom// 'dod chags/
155b4(rgyud 'bum): la sogs nyon mongs che// mi sdug pa la sogs pa sgom// rigs dang rigs min cho ga shes// sngags dang phyag rgya shin tu mkhas// dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // dbang du bya dang gshegs
155b5(rgyud 'bum): gsol dang / / ji skad rdo rje dbyings bshad bzhin// sngon du rig pa'i brtul zhugs bya// kha na ma tho rdul tsam la// kun tu 'dzem par bya ba yin// tshad dang tshen rtsi srad bu dang // yo byad cho ga yang dag
155b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan/ / bcing dang phur bus gdab pa nyid// sngar bshad rdo rje dbyings bzhin du// bza' ba dang ni mi bza' ba// rdo rje snyems tshul ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du// sngar ni ji ltar
155b7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin bya/ / de nas yang dag rab bshad bya// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// rdo rje dbyings dang rab tu mtshungs// dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i mchog/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rba babs
156a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ / thig pa ni dang ni yang dag ldan// dar gyi chur pos rnam par brgyan// rgya cher ji ltar rigs pa ru// ji bzhin rdo rje zong khyer che// rdo rje byings
156a2(rgyud 'bum): dang rab tu mtshungs/ / rdo rje 'dzin pa'i grong khyer bri// 'khor lo lnga dang yang dag ldan// ka ba brgyad dang yang dag ldan// de dbus rang bzhin 'khor lo yi// dbus su sangs rgyas dgod par bya/
156a3(rgyud 'bum): rnam par snang mdzad ston pa che// rdo rje sems dpa' 'od po che// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po che// sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs dkyil 'khor// sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdo rje ni// 'bar ba'i
156a4(rgyud 'bum): dbus su dgod par bya/ / rdo rje me ltar 'bar nyid ni// phyag rgya 'jig rten gsum 'joms pa// g.yas su rin chen phyag rgya ni// 'bar ba'i dbus su dgod par bya// g.yon du pad+ma'i phyag rgya bri//
156a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyab tu rdo rje rnon po ni// 'bar ba'i dbus su dgod par bya// phyag rgya yi ni rgyal po bzhi// 'bar ba'i me dang rab tu ldan// rnam par snang mdzad dkyil 'khor che// chos dbyings grong khyer chen po la/
156a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor los sgyur ba bzhi po yi// phyag rgya dang kyang dgod par bya// gang dang gang gis thig gyur pa// dkyil 'khor shes rab can thig gdab// rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis// rdo rje'i thig ni yongs su
156a7(rgyud 'bum): bzung / / oM dz+ra sa ma ya swA waM ma si kram hA/ dkyil 'khor chen po bsdus pa yi// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs bsdus pa// rgyal po bri ning dgod par bya// oM badz+ra
156b1(rgyud 'bum): gA kra ma hUM/ tshon rtsi thams cad yang dag ldan// 'bar ba'i lta bas thams cad blta// rdo rje tshon rtsi bkye bya zhing // rdo rje sngags ni rab tu bskul// oM badz+ra tsita tra sa ma ya hUM/ phyag rgya gang zhig dgod par/
156b2(rgyud 'bum): du// snying po thams cad dgod par bya// sngar ni dgod pa gang yin pa// rdo rje gzugs ni skor byed pa// rdo rje hUM mdzad dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po//
156b3(rgyud 'bum): mi bskyod shin tu mnyam gzhag pa// zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa// mche ba dag ni cung zad gtsigs// khro bo'i rgyal po 'bar bas khyab// phyag na phyag rgya dang bcas mtshon// rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya
156b4(rgyud 'bum): / steng du phyag gnyis yang dag ldan// de bzhin kho nar phyag gnyis dag/ lcags kyu 'phyar ba yang dag ldan// phyag gcig gis ni zhags pa bsnams// gcig gis rdo rje yang dag bsnams// mnga'
156b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gengs pa yi phyag rgya dang / / phyag gnyis dag ni shin tu ldan// rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya ste// dbang phyug chen po kun tu mnan// g.yas pas lha mo u ma yi// nu ma'i bar du gnon par byed// de yi phyogs
156b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams thams cad du/ / rdo rje khro bo dgod par bya// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas khyab cing 'bar// khro bo 'jigs par byed pa mchog/ mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' ste// g.yas su rdo rje rgyal po'o// g.yon du
156b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje chags pa ste/ / rgyab tu rdo rje legs pa'o// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // lho ru khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ni// khro bo'i rgyal po khro gnyer can// khro bos yongs su bskor ba bri// thams cad 'a/
157a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i 'phreng bas khyab// gdong ni khro bcas bzhad ldan pa// rdo rje dbang phyug phyag rgyar ldan// khro gnyer can ni yongs su brjod// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/
157a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje khro bo bdag nyid che// sngags dang phyag rgya yongs su bsdu// rang gi gnas su yang dag bri// mdun du rdo rje rin chen te// g.yas su khro bo gzi brjid do// g.yon du rgyal mtshan drag po ste// rgyab
157a3(rgyud 'bum): tu khro bo bzhad pa po/ / rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // nub kyi phyogasu dkyil 'khor ni// khro bo chen po rdo rje ste// khro bdag chen po rnams kyis bskor// rdo rje chos ni mdun du ste// rdo rje rnon
157a4(rgyud 'bum): po g.yas su'o/ / de bzhin g.yon du rdo rje rgyu// rgyab tu rdo rje smra ba'o// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // dkyil 'khor dag ni mchog bzhi pa// rdo rje dbab pa las chen po// khro bo chen pos
157a5(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bskor/ / rdo rje las ni mdun du ste// g.yas su rdo rje srung ba'o// g.yon du rdo rje gnod sbyin te// rgyab tu rdo rje khu tshur ro// dbus kyi 'khor lo'i mtshams bzhi ru// lha mo bzhi ni yang dag
157a6(rgyud 'bum): mtshams su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ / rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs bri// phyi rol dkyil 'khor mtshams rnams su// rdo rje me tog la sogs bri// rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du// ji skad sngar
157a7(rgyud 'bum): bshad cho ga bzhin/ / sgo bzhi dag ni thams cad du// sgo srungs rnams ni dgod par bya// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang // dril bu dbab pa bla na med// rang gi phyag rgya snying khar gzhag/ rang rang
157b1(rgyud 'bum): gi ni snying po yis/ / rdo rje dril bu yid 'ong ldan// rnam par snang mdzad rnam par dgod// bdag nyid rdo rje khro bo ni// gtso bo rdo rje rig pa mchog/ rdo rje rgyal po mchog byin rlab// rang nyid rdo rje dkyil 'khor
157b2(rgyud 'bum): mchog de yis dkyil 'khor de bris nas/ / rdo rje ti rin ti ri 'jug/ yang dag par ni brtag byas la// lan bdun du ni bskor ba bya// chad pa gang yin yongs su dag/ mkhas pas lhag par dbri
157b3(rgyud 'bum): babar bya/ / rdo rje dril bu rtogs par bya// grub par 'gyur te nyes pa med// rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs kun// mnyam par bzhag pas las rnams bya// 'khor lo'i dbus su zhugs nas ni//
157b4(rgyud 'bum): mkhas pas sgo ni dbye bar bya// yid kyis rdo rje ri mo ni// bteg cing kun tu phye nas kyang // rdo rje sgo ni bzhi po dag/ yid kyis dbye bar bya ba yin// de la snying po ni 'di yin te// oM badz+ra d+hA
157b5(rgyud 'bum): ra ud g+ha Ta ya pra be sha ya sa ma ya hUM/ dkyil 'khor phyi rol gnas rnams su// phyi yi rdo rje rigs dag bri// khyab 'jug la sogs lha rnams ni// kha khyer gyi ni phyed la gnas// 'khor lo
157b6(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas rigs bcas te/ / sems can gdug pa gdon la sogs// rims dang 'byung po sha za dang // mkha' 'gro 'byung po ma mo dang // lha mo mtshon cha dang ldan kun// ji ltar mngon par
157b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa bri/ / phyi rol kha khyer gnas su ni// rdo rje kha khyer mdzes pa rnams// de nas sngon la slob dpon ches// dkyil 'khor dbus su 'dug nas ni// rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas te// ting nge 'dzin la

163b7(rgyud 'bum): po rigs mchog brtan pa gsungs par gyur// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dbang dang ldan pa mchog/ 'od dpag med pa'i gsang mchog bstan pa ste// snying po bskul ba'i mchog ni gsungs par gyur
164a1(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba chen pos mtshan ma dag kyang phyung / / don yod grub pa bud med gzugs gyur pas// las la shin tu bskul ba dang ldan te// 'khor gyi srin mo dag ni bzhi po gsungs//
164a2(rgyud 'bum): oM sarba mu khe karma badz+ri Ni ma hA kro d+ha ku ru sarba Ni/ oM badz+ra ka ba tsa kro d+he rak+Sha ma Ni/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA yak+Shi Ni badz+ra daMSh+Ta ka rA le bi la ba ga sarba Ni/ oM badz+ra muSh+Ti badz+ra kro d+hi ni// de nas las kyi dkyil 'a
164a3(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs dag/ mchog tu gsang ba bsdus pa dga' chen po// dbus kyi gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor skul byed pa// las kyi btsun mo'i snying po mchog 'di gsungs// hUM/ dbus kyi gsang ba sna tshogs 'byung
164a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba/ / gtso bo 'di dag rnam par snang mdzad gsungs// oM badz+re shwa rI hUM/ oM rat+ne shwa ri hUM/ oM pad+me shA rI tsU/ oM karme shwa rI hUM/ rdo rje rgyal po dang bcas bskul ba las byung gang
164a5(rgyud 'bum): yin pa/ / rdo rje btsun mo rnal 'byor bzhi yi dbus kyi dbang phyug nyid du gnas// rdo rje rin chen chos ldan btsun mo yan lag mdzes pa dang ldan pa// 'di ni gsang ba'i tshogs las gzhan du rnal 'byor
164a6(rgyud 'bum): mchog ni 'ga' yang med/ / rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu 'jigs mi mnga'// de ni rang gi 'khor tshogs dbus na bzhugs// des ni brtse dang phan pa'i sems kyis ni// rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil
164a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor mchog gsungs gyur/ / de nas 'khor lo'i grong khyer bstan byas nas// khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i bdag nyid de// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug btsun mo yi// dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i
164b1(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor yang dag bri/ / grong khyer rnam pa gnyis su yang dag bri// 'khor lo rnam pa gnyis su sbyar bar bya// de bzhin grong khyer 'di ru yang dag 'ong ba dang // yang na ji ltar 'dod bzhin yang dag
164b2(rgyud 'bum): bri/ / de yang phyag rgya dag gi tshogs dang bcas// sgom par 'os pa rdo rje yang dag bri// yang na gsang ba'i chos kyis mchod gyur pa// nga ni gzugs dang ldan pa yang dag bri// dbus kyi rim par rdo rje
164b3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' bzhugs/ / zhags pa dang ldan 'khor gyi phyag rgya bcas// rdo rje 'bar ba nor bu pad+ma las// 'bar ba dang bcas me dang ldan par gzhag/ shar gyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo lnga yi bdag nyid che//
164b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gang du mi bskyod gtso// rdo rje'i phyag rgya che dang rol par gyur// dbang phyug chen po rtse gsum ldan non mchog/ de nas phyogs bzhi'i gnas dag dang // rdo rje lcags kyu mda' dang dga' ba
164b5(rgyud 'bum): dag/ 'bar ba'i me yi 'od zer yang dag ldan// 'bar ba'i dbus na gnas pa'i phyag rgya lnga// de nas rin chen rigs ni yid 'ong ba// rdo rje'i dbus na rdo rje rin chen bzhugs// de nas phyogs bzhi yi
164b6(rgyud 'bum): ni gnas dag tu/ / rin chen gzi brjid rgyal mtshan bzhad phyag rgya// de bzhin pad+ma'i rigs ni yid 'ong la// rdo rje pad+ma'i phyag rgya ste// de nas phyogs bzhi'i mtshams dag tu// pad+ma ral gri 'khor lo
164b7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin smra/ / de bzhin las kyi byas pa'i rigs de las// rdo rje rnon po me chen dang ldan pa// de yi phyogs bzhi'i mtshams ni brtan pa ru// las dang gnod sbyin srung ba khu tshur rnams// de lab rgya cher btug
165a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi tshogs dag la/ / rdo rje btsun mo'i mchog drag mkha' 'gro ma// 'bar ba'i mche ba chen po 'jigs rungs// dbus na rdo rje nyi ma 'bar bar ldan// sa dag srung ba'i rtsa
165a2(rgyud 'bum): gar bcas/ / rgya cher gzhung mchog rtag tu blta bar bya// sbyang dang dbab pa'i las rnams thams cad ni// yan lag mchog ldan dam pa nas gzung bya// de nas phyag rgya phyag rgya'i yan lag bslab//
165a3(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa'i phyag rgyas mchod pa'i phyag rgyar brjod// de nas sgo dang mtshams bcas dkyil 'khor du// btsun mo dag pas gnam lcags gnod sbyin mchog/ de nas sgor 'jug pa yi tshogs la ni/
165a4(rgyud 'bum): badz+rA dza dza/ dgug pa'i pheg rdob sprin ni rgya che ba// badz+ra hUM trAM/ de bzhin 'ching ba'i chos ni sder byed pa// badz+ra baM baM/ de nas ye shes chos nyid sna tshogs pa// badz+ra a a/ de nas gsang
165a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sgeg pa dang bcas mchog/ badz+ra hUM wa/ de nas yan lag 'phreng ba sna tshogs ldan// badz+ra hUM g+h+raM/ de nas glu blang ba dang rol mo dag/ badz+ra hUM taM/ de bzhin gzhan ngag dkyil 'khor
165a6(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug mchog/ badz+ra hUM/ de nas phyi rol me tog rgya chen po// badz+ra ti te/ de bzhin rol cha stong phrag dag brdungs pa// badz+ra Ta taM/ spos dang dri ldan rim pa dag bri ba// badz+ra d+hA tu/ de nas
165a7(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer snang ba rab tu spro/ / badz+ra kro d+ha/ de nas rdo rje lcags kyu'i tshogs kyis dgug par bya// dga' bas mnyes bya rdo rje yang dag ldan// oM sid d+hi ya badz+ra/ u na ya badz+ra/ de nas chags pa'i
165b1(rgyud 'bum): sa dang 'dod chags pa/ / rA ga ya badz+ra/ a hi badz+ra/ de bzhin nyi ma la lta ba dz+wa la ya badz+ra/ rgyal mtshan gyi ni de tsi badz+ra/ bzhad pa'i ni hA sa badz+ra/ de bzhin rjes su chags pa nI ka/
165b2(rgyud 'bum): ma ya badz+ra/ ral gri gzung bar bya ba ni ts+tshe nga ya badz+ra/ gzhan yang bskor ba yi ni b+h+ra mA ya badz+ra/ de nas tshig gi tshogs dbyung ba bru hi badz+ra/ las kyi mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i tshogs
165b3(rgyud 'bum): nitri badz+ra/ de nas go cha'i ni rak+Sha badz+ra/ de bzhin du bza' ba'i ni khA hi badz+ra/ yid 'ong lus ni brtan par bcing bar bya// ban d+ha ya badz+ra/ de nas ye shes kyi ni de bzhin brkyang //
165b4(rgyud 'bum): de nas khros pa'i yid kyis bskul bar bya// so dag gis ni ma mchu bsdum par bya// de bzhin mig dag kyang ni btsum par bya// de nas khro bo'i ting 'dzin sgom// gsang ba'i phyag rgya dag gis
165b5(rgyud 'bum): bdud bzhi bcom/ / de nas rdo rje'i tshig gi snying po brjod// phyag rgya'i tshogs ni rnam pa sna tshogs bslab// lus kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs dag ni// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus las// rdo rje sems dpa'i
165b6(rgyud 'bum): bka' bzhin du/ / rgyas pa ru ni yongs su brjod// gsang ba mchog rdzogs so// / de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// kun mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug ni// rdo rje rnga mo la bzhug
165b7(rgyud 'bum): nas/ rdo rje phra mo brjod par gyur// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra kro d+ha kra ma hU~M phaT// bdag nyid sangs rgyas gzugs su ni// phan pa'i don du rnam pasam bya// rdo rje phra mo 'di yis ni// sems rdorje
166a1(rgyud 'bum): pa nyid du gyur/ / oM sak+Sh+ma ba kro d+ha krA man+d+ha/ rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po// bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya// rdo rje phra mo 'di yis ni// rang sems skad cig gis
166a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dul 'gyur/ / oM suk+Sh+ma badz+ra rat+na kro d+ha kra ma hUM phaT/ rdo rje rim chen rang bdag nyid// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas chos ni myur thob cing // rin chen kun mchog gtso bor 'gyur/
166a3(rgyud 'bum): oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra d+harma kro d+ha kra mo hUM phaT/ bdag nyid dag ni rdo rje chos// gzod nas dag pa rnam par sgom// gsung gi phyag rgya 'di yis ni// rdo rje chos dang mtshungs par 'gyur// oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra karma kro d+ha
166a4(rgyud 'bum): kra ma hUM phaT/ / bdag nyid rdo rje las su ni// yang dang yang du bsgom bya zhing // rdo rje sngags kyis bskul nas ni// rdo rje las dang mtshungs par 'gyur// dbang bskur ba yi sems dpa' tshe// 'khor los
166a5(rgyud 'bum): / rgyusgyur ba bzhi po ru// rtag tu bdag nyid sgom byas na// dbang bskur ba yang thob par 'gyur// hUM/ oM suk+Sh+ma dz+nyA na kro d+ha hUM phaT// rdo rje rgyal po rang dag nyid// rnam par bsgoms na rengs par 'gyur//
166a6(rgyud 'bum): snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni// sangs rgyas thams cad kun tu dgug/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra aM ku sha a kaR+Sha ya ma hA kro d+ha hU~M phaT// mda' 'gengs pa yi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje chags pa bsgom par bya// snying po 'di
166a7(rgyud 'bum): ngag nyid kyis ni/ / sangs rgyas thams cad rjes chags pa// oM sUk+Sha badz+ra lo d+hi oM nu rA ga ya hUM phaT/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byas shing // bdag nyid kyang ni rnam par sgom// rdo rje dga' ba bdag nyid de/
166b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje dngos grub thob par 'gyur// oM sur+m+ma badza rbaSh+Ti kro d+ha hUM phaT/ rdo rje rim che rgyal po nga// bdag bskur ba ni btang pa'i mchog/ rdo rje sngags kyis bskul byas nas// rdo rje rin chen mtshungs par 'gyur/
166b2(rgyud 'bum): oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra d+hi kuTI kro d+ha sar sar hUM phaT/ rdo rje gzi brjid ting 'dzin gyis// rtag tu bdag nyid 'bar bar bya// phyogs rnams kun tu yongs spros nas// rdo rje sngags ni rab tu bskul// oM sUr+yA dz+wa la maN+Da
166b3(rgyud 'bum): la kro d+ha sUr+ya dz+wa la hUM phaT/ sbyin pa rin chen rgyal mtshan du// rtag tu bdag nyid rnam par bsam// sems can thams cad dag bya zhing // rdo rje sngags ni rab bskul zhing // oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra d+h+wa dza kro d+ha sarba AH
166b4(rgyud 'bum): hUM me pra ya huM hUM phaT/ / chos chen po yi bzhad pa bzhad// rdo rje bzhad pa bdag brtan pa'i// rdo rje sngags kyis bskul bya zhing // bdag nyid kho na chos kyi gsung // oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra hAs kro d+ha haHhUM phaT phaH/
166b5(rgyud 'bum): gzod nas zhi ba skyi ba med// chos rnams thams cad rnam dag pa// bdag nyid rdo rje chos rgyal po// rdo rje tshig gis lan cig brjod// oM s+yAk+Sha badz+ra kro d+ha ya sho d+ha hUM phaT// shugs can ral gr-i dag gi tsog/
166b6(rgyud 'bum): rdorje rnon po shin tu brtan// oM sUm+b+ha badz+ra ts+tshe kro d+ha ts+tshin dats+tshin da hU~M phaT/ chos kyis 'khor lo bskor byas nas// rdo rje 'khor lo dang mtshungs 'gyur// oM badz+ra swak+Sh+ma badz+ra n+ta ka ra kro d+ha tsakrats+tshin da pA ta ya shwa ri/
166b7(rgyud 'bum): pra be shakring la snying hU~M u0f7f/ nga ni brjid byed brjod byamin// bdag ni rdo rje smra ba bstan// chos 'dod pa nyid brtan byas nas// rdo rje rdzab thob par gyur// oM su~M b+hu badz+ra hUM kA ra kro d+ha pa ra pa~M rtsalangs tshus s
167a1(rgyud 'bum): angs rgyas thams cad mchod bya zhing / / rdo rje las ni brtan par brtag/ rdo rje tshig gis chos bshad na// rdo rje las ni thob par 'gyur// oM swAk+Sh+ma badz+ra karma kro d+ha sarba kar+ya hr-i da ya hUM
167a2(rgyud 'bum): bdag ni rgyal po byams pa che/ / rdo rje srung ba brtan pa'i bdag/ rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom byas nas// ngan 'gro thams cad nyams par 'gyur// oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra ka ba tsa kro d+ha rak+Sha hUM phaT/ sdig pa thams cad bza
167a3(rgyud 'bum): bya zhing / / rdoHsrung ba bsgom par bya// rdo rje sngags ni bskul byas na// rdo rje nyon mongs thams cad 'joms// oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra yak+Sha har b+hak+Sha sarba duk+Sho badz+ra yak+Sha hU~M phaT/ rdo rje khu tshur rgyal po bdag
167a4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems ni rjes su dran/ / bgegs rnams thams cad bcing byas na// rdo rje khu tshur dang mtshungs 'gyur// oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra muSh+Ti ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/ sna yi rtse mo'i sems de ni// brtan par byas
167a5(rgyud 'bum): nas yang dag brtsam/ / yi ge hUM nyid sbyor byas na// nyon mongs thams cad rnam nyams 'gyur// hUM/ dang po snying kha sna rtse ru// brtan par byas nas de rang bzhin// mtshan ma de ni spro byas na// nang sogs/
167a6(rgyud 'bum): dgra ni 'jigs par 'gyur// nA sha ya badz+ri hU~M/ sems de brtan par byas nas kyang // rnal 'byor 'dzin pas spro bya zhing // shes rab can gyis khro bdag brtsam// gnas ngan dag ni nges par 'jig
167a7(rgyud 'bum): bi nA sha ya sarba badz+ra hUM/ rnal 'byor rig pas ji srid 'dod// mtshan ma de ni bsdu bya na// ma lus sdig pa thams cad ni// nyams shing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra pra t+ya shI b+ha~M hUM/
167b1(rgyud 'bum): gsal bar phyogs rnams ma smras par// sems can kun la byungs pa'o// jisrid rdo byas pa/ mas can bde bar 'gyur/ zer ba'ang tho sa/ skye 'o ma gon med sems
167b2(rgyud 'bum): can ni/ / 'jigs pa las ni skyob pa dag/ snying rjes sems de spro bar bya// rdo rje ye shes thob par 'gyur// ka ru NA badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun snying po// sems can thams
167b3(rgyud 'bum): cad gzong nas dag/ e ma'o bde ba e ma'o chos// phyogs rnams kun tu yong su spro// hUM kA ra bi shud d+ha hUM phaT// 'khor ba'i sems can la dmigs nas// bde ba dang bcas btang snyoms
167b4(rgyud 'bum): bya/ btang snyoms sbyor ba 'di yis ni// sems can rnams la yongs su spro// oM bi sho d+ha badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ rdo rje'i gzugs ni yang dag bris// gang gi steng du nges bzhag pa// de nyid kyis ni
167b5(rgyud 'bum): dri ma'i tshogs/ / thams cad rnal 'byor pa yis 'joms// hUM badz+ra pra brta/ gang la byang chub sems nyid ni// rjes su dran pas rab phab nas// sems can de yis sangs rgyas kyi//
167b6(rgyud 'bum): / byang chub nyid ni thob par 'gyur// hUM bo d+hi satwa pra brta// phyag na rdo rje rjes dran nas// dag pa'i chos nyid phab byas nas// sems can de yis bde ba ni// dam pa thob 'gyur the tsom med//
167b7(rgyud 'bum): hUM badz+ra d+ha ra pra brta/ rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam par sgom// sangs rgyas chos rnam pab byas na// 'jigs pa nges par 'byung mi 'gyur// hUM bud d+ha pra
168a1(rgyud 'bum): bat+ta/ thab rdo rje rang bzhin dngos// bskyed pa bzhin du bsgom byas na/ blo bzang zab rdo rjes rgyas// myur du mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur// bung d+ha pra bar+Na ya hUM/
168a2(rgyud 'bum): zla ba'i dbus su rang bdag nyid// sgom zhing gang la phab byas pa// sems can de rnams mi ldog par// 'gyur ba ru mi the tsom med// satwa pra brta ya hUM/ phyag na rdo rje rang bdag nyid// mkhas pa
168a3(rgyud 'bum): yis ni bsgom bya zhing / / gang du phab pa'i gnas de ni// dpal dang bde ba 'phel bar 'gyur// myur ba nyid du the tsom med// badz+ra satra pra brta ya hUM/ sangs rgyas gzugs su rang bdag nyid// mnyam par
168a4(rgyud 'bum): gzhag pas bsgom bya zhing / / rdo rje de ni gar phab pa// rdzu 'phrul rgya ni chen por 'gyur// bud d+ha pra brta yahUM/ rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug pas// rang gi lus ni rab bskor ba// gang gi ming gis byas pa de/
168a5(rgyud 'bum): the tshom med par byang chub thob// oM badz+ra ba li ta kro d+ha mA ra ya hUM/ dbugs ni 'byung dang rngub pa la// yi ge hUM mi ba byor zhing // rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug pas// 'dod chags la sogs nyes pa gnas
168a6(rgyud 'bum): oM badz+ra shA pa pi pa ta la hUM phaT/ rdo rje lnga bas blta bya zhing // rdo rje khro bo rab sbyor bas// sems can gang la blta byas na// de ni 'khor ba las grol 'gyur/ oM badz+ra dziSh+Ti bi na sha ya hU~M phaT/
168a7(rgyud 'bum): ngag gi ni bdag nyid gnas// rang sems 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang // byang chub sems ni rjes dran na// nges kyang sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// hUM rbi ya A kaR+Sha ya badz+ra kro d+ha sru~M phaT/ rdo rje rig pa mchog
168b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal por/ / mkhas pa yis ni bdag nyid sgom// 'bar ba yis ni khyab pa'i sku// rdo rje sgom pa 'grub par 'gyur// hUM/ gsang ba'i bdag po kun gyi snying po'i sngags ni gsungs par gyur// de
168b2(rgyud 'bum): nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i rnal 'byor dbang po rtog par mdzad/ / gdul bya min la shin tu 'phrog cing 'dul bya la chags spro// sa 'dzin mchog gi dbang po bslab pa rnam par rol pa'i sa// suk+Sh+ma rdzogs
168b3(rgyud 'bum): sod/ / gsang ba skar ma nyi zla ste// rdo rje dam tshig brjod par bya// rnam rtog gis brtags mdzes gyur pa// de nas mchod pa'i cho ga bshad// bdag nyid sangs rgyas gzugs
168b4(rgyud 'bum): dang ni/ / sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul rab tu sgom// dang po sbyor byung ji skad bshad// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra karme shwa ri hUM/ rang gi snying khar byang chub sems//
168b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun gyi tshogs bsams nas// mchod pa yi ni mchog 'di yis// 'dren pa thams cad mchod par bya// hUM dbang phyug chen po dang bcas pa// lha rnams thams cad dgug bya zhing //
168b6(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid rdo rje khro bo yis// khro bo'i mchod pas rab tu mchod// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza karma sa ma ya bi d+hi bistA ri trai lo kya bi dza ye shwa ra sarba duSh+TA na mahA sa ma ya badz+ri trAM/ khro gnyer can kun nga bdag
168b7(rgyud 'bum): nyid/ / khro bo rin chen gyis bsgom bya// sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs bya zhing // rin chen mchod pas rab tu mchod// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ka pA sha sa ma ba s+pha ra Na ma hA pU dza A kaR+Sha ya bi d+hi biSh+Tha
169a1(rgyud 'bum): ra sa ma ya hUM/ / chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par snang // rdo rje chos ni brtan pa bdag/ chos kyi mchod par rab mchod pas// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya/
169a2(rgyud 'bum): oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma d+hA tu s+pha ra NA ma hA pU dza bi d+hi bistA ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ bdag nyid rdo rje lag nyid ni/ sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ba sgom par bya/ ngas rgyas thams cad mchod bya zhing // khas gyi mchod pas rab tu mchod/ oM sarba ta thA ga~M tA lo
169a3(rgyud 'bum): kad+hA tu dzI bi ta ma hA karma pU dza bi d+hi bistA ra sa ma ya hUM/ / phyag na rdo rje bdag rdo rje// de bzhin gshegs rnams dgug par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' rab mchod pas// mchod pa ru ni bsgom par bya/
169a4(rgyud 'bum): oM badz+ra satwa sid+d+hi dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM dza/ rdo rje lcags kyu brtan pa'i mchog/ rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya// sgom pa bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas thams cad dgug par bya// oM
169a5(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra A kaR+Sha dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM dza/ rdo rje chags pa bdag nyid de// bkug pa rnams ni mnyes par bya// rdo rje chags pas ra'i mchod pas// bsgrub par bya zhes yang dag sbyar// oM badz+ra ra ti rA ga sa
169a6(rgyud 'bum): ma ye hUM dza/ rdo rje legs pa rang bdag nyid// sgom zhing rgyal ba mnyes par bya// rdo rje legs pas rab mchod pas// sangs rgyas thams cad dgug par bya// oM badz+ra sA d+ha karma dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM dza/
169a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rin chen rgyal po che// rang bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya// de bzhin gshegs rnams dbab bya zhing // rin chen char ni kun tu dbab// oM badz+ra b+h+r-i ku TI ba shI ku ru hUM/ rdo rje nyi mar rang dag nyid/
169b1(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer 'phreng ba dang ldan sgom// sangs rgyas rnams ni dbang bya zhing // phyogs rnams su ni 'od zer spro// oM badz+ra sUr+ya maN+Da la ba shI ku ru hUM/ bdag ni rgyal mtshan sbyor ba che// de bzhin gshegs
169b2(rgyud 'bum): / rnams dbang bya zhing // sems can bsam kun rdzogs par bya// rin chen rgyal mtshan rab tu mchod// oM badz+ra d+hA dzA grA ke yU re ba shI ku ru hUM/ ha ha zhes dgod bzhad bya zhing // rdo rje bzhad pa
169b3(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid de/ / sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du bya// bzhad pa'i mchod pas rab tu mchod// oM badz+ra aT+Ta hA se na ba shi ku ru hUM/ bdag ni pad+ma'i rgyal po nyid// btsun mo brtan pa rang byung ba/
169b4(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis sangs rgyas rjes chags bya// 'dod la chags pas rab tu mchod// oM badz+ra pad+ma rA ga ya hUM/ bdag ni rang nyid rnon po ste// shes rab pha rol phyin pa brtan// bdag gis nyon
169b5(rgyud 'bum): mongs gtsang bya zhing / / de bzhin gshegs rnams chags par bya// oM badz+ra tIk+Sha rA ga ya hUM/ lha mo rdo rje sgrol ma dag/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba// bdag gis rdo rje can gnyis bya/
169b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags brtan pas rab tu mchod/ oM badz+ra maN+Da la rA ge rA ga ya hUM/ nam mkha'i lha mo ches smra ba// brjod du med pa'i bdag nyid bstan// dag pa'i chos la dga' bya zhing // de bzhin
169b7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs rnams mnyes par bya/ / oM bA ga rA ge rA ga ya hUM/ bdag ni rang nyid las yin te// phyogs rnams kun tu rab tu grags// bdag ni nam mkha'i mdzod kyang yin// mchod
170a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i char gyis rab tu mchod/ / oM brda ka mas ma ye pU dzahUM/ bdag ni rang nyid srung bste// sangs rgyas byams pa brtan pa bdag/ bdag gis sangs rgyas mchod par
170a2(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / chos kyi mchod pas kun tu mchod// oM badz+ra ka pa tsa banaHrak+Sha hUM// bdag gis nyon mongs bza' bar bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin brtan pa bdag/ bdag gis sangs rgyas mchod par bya//
170a3(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi mchod pas rab tu mchod// oM badz+ra yak+Sha mA ra ya badz+ra daMSh+Ta hUM phaT// da ni sangs rgyas byang chub yin// rdo rje khu tshur rang bdag nyid// phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor le ste// las kyi mchod
170a4(rgyud 'bum): pas rab tu mchod/ / oM badz+ra karma muSh+Ta sid d+h+ya sid d+h+ya hUM phaT/ 'di 'dra'i sna tshogs mchod pa kun// ye shes gsang ba rab thob byed// ma lus lha mo sems dpa' kun// rgyal po ji
170a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin rang snying hUM/ / sgeg mo 'phreng ba de bzhin glu// gar ma me tog sogs sbyor bas// sems dpa' la sogs lha mo dag/ shin tu srung ba'i mchod pa yin// mchod pa'o//
170a6(rgyud 'bum): / de nas las ni thabs chen po// gang gis myur du rab grub 'gyur// gang gis dga' ba la sbyor ba// sbyin sreg las kyi cho ga'o// ji ltar sbyin sreg dngos grub kyis// las ni bla na med pa
170a7(rgyud 'bum): ltar/ de bzhin rig pa'i las rnams kun// de lta bu ni byed pa min// sbyin sreg rnam pa mang ldan pa// mdo ru bsdu na rnam pa lnga// rgyas par rnal 'byor chen po yi// gsang ba'i mdo las
170b1(rgyud 'bum): rab tu bshad/ / rig pa 'dzin pa'i rnam 'phrul pa// ji ltar sbyin sreg rnam pa yis// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub 'gyur ba// mdor bsdus rab tu bshad par bya// sbyin sreg las ni
170b2(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa lnga/ / re re zhing yang rnam pa mang // zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa nyid// mngon spyod kyi ni gsum pa ste// dgug pa yang ni bzhi pa yin// sde pa dbang dang
170b3(rgyud 'bum): dag ldan/ / sbyin sreg lnga po de rnams ni// dbang du byed pa mchog yin no// de nas thab khung rab bshad bya// sbyor ba ji bzhin sbyor bar bya// zhi la thab khung zlum po ste// kun nas yongs su
170b4(rgyud 'bum): zlum po yin/ / rgyas pa la ni gru bzhi ste// mngon spyod la ni gru gsum yin// thab khung rdo rje'i rnam pa can// kun tu dgug par byed pa'i mchog/ de bzhin thab khung ring por bya// dbang
170b5(rgyud 'bum): du byed pa'i mchog yin no/ / de dag rnam pa lnga ru bshad// thab khung las ni bla na med// srod kyi dus su zhi ba bya// snga dro'i dus su rgyas pa'i las// nyi ma phyed na mngon spyod kyi// drag ngo
170b6(rgyud 'bum): las ni nges par bya/ / dgug pa dus rnams thams cad du// mtshan mo dbang du bya ba yin// sbyor ba lnga po 'di yis ni// mnyam par bzhag pas las rnams bya// shar du kha bltas zhi
170b7(rgyud 'bum): don du/ / rgyas pa byang du yang dag gnas// lho ru kha bltas gyur pa yis// mngon spyod kyi ni las rnams so// steng du kha bltas de bzhin dgug/ phyogs rnams kun tu bltas dbang bya//
171a1(rgyud 'bum): phyogs mtshams thams cad mnyam sbyor bsam// yang na nub kyi phyogs su bshad// zhi la sangs rgyas phyag rgya ste// rgyas la nor bu'i mtshan mas so// rdo rje khro bo mngon
171a2(rgyud 'bum): spyod la/ dbang la pad+ma'i rigs kyis so// shin tu dgug pa dang ldan pa// rdo rje lcags kyu dgug pa la// sbyor ba lnga po 'di yis ni// sbyin sreg las ni rab tu sgrug/ zhi ba'i shing ni mngar ba ste/
171a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pa de bzhin 'bras bur cas// tsha ba mngon spyod las dag la// dgug pa la ni tsher ma can// dbang la me tog bcas par bshad// de rnams yam shing go rims bzhin// sngon la yam shing rnam
171a4(rgyud 'bum): pa lnga/ rnal 'byor pa yis yang dag sbyar// de la 'dam gyis byugs pa yis// shing la zhi ba rab tu bsgrags// gang du sdig pa rnam 'jig cing // kun tu 'khrug par bsregs 'gyur ba//
171a5(rgyud 'bum): bud shing mngar ba dag gi me// mnyam par bzhag pas rab sbar nas// til mar gyis ni sbyin sreg byas// sdig pa thams cad sreg par 'gyur// oM sarba pA paM da ha na badz+ra ya swA hA//
171a6(rgyud 'bum): bud shing mngar ba dag gis ni// shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas sbar// 'bras kyi sbyin sreg byas na ni// bsod nams tshogs ni 'phel bar 'gyur// oM badz+ra puSh+Ta ye swAhA// bud shing
171a7(rgyud 'bum): mngar po dag gis ni/ / mnyam par bzhag pas me sbar nas// mar bsnyugs dur ba'i sbyin sreg gis// rdo rje tshe ni mngon 'phel 'gyur// oM badz+ra A yu She swA hA// yam shing de dag nyid kyis
171b1(rgyud 'bum): ni/ dge ba 'byung bas me sbar nas// ku sha'i myu gu til mar gyis// 'jig rten gsum yang srung bar 'gyur// oM a pra ti ha ta badz+ra ya swA hA// sngon la zhi ba sbyar bar bya// dbus kyi gnyis
171b2(rgyud 'bum): la rgyas de bzhin/ / zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa yi// sbyin sreg las ni dang bar 'gyur// shing ni tsha ba'i yam shing gis// mngon spyod kyi ni las dag la// mngon spyod dang ni bcas pa yi// dgug pa
171b3(rgyud 'bum): la yang de nyid kyi/ / rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis// sngo la tsha ba'i yam shing gis// khros pas me ni rab sbar nas// mkhas pas tsher mas sbyin sreg bya// tsher ma dang bcas shing dag kyang // tsher ma
171b4(rgyud 'bum): can gyis nges par dgug/ gang dang gang ni 'dod gyur pa// sangs rgyas rnams ni nges par 'gugs// oM badz+ra A kaR+Sha ya dzaH/ bud shing me tog dmar sogs kyis// rab tu 'bar ba'i me sngar
171b5(rgyud 'bum): nas/ me tog 'bras bu dmar po yang // sbyin sreg byas na dbang byed mchog/ hUM badz+ra pA sha ya dza/ tsha ba'i yam shing dag bya zhing // rab tu drag pa'i me sbar nas// 'bras bu kha ba bsregs
171b6(rgyud 'bum): byas na/ / mngon spyod kyi ni mchog yin no// hUM badz+ra mA ra ya phaT// gsang ba'i sbyin sreg thams cad ni// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya// sbyin sreg 'khor lo cho ga yi// de nyid du ni ji bzhin
171b7(rgyud 'bum): sbyar/ yam shing tsha ba dag gis ni// shin tu drag pas me sbar nas// 'jigs rung lcags kyus sbyin sreg bya// gdug pa thams cad rab 'jigs 'gyur// oM badz+ra ban d+ha ya phaT/ me tod
172a1(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas shing me la/ / rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis// sngags sogs 'bras bu'i sbyin sreg ni// dbang du byed pa'i mchog yin no// oM badz+ra ba shaM ka rA ya swAH// kha ba dang ni
172a2(rgyud 'bum): mngar ba nyid/ / yam shing mngar po sbyar bya zhing // 'dod pa'i me tog 'bras bsregs na// 'dod pa'i gzugs can mchog tu 'gyur// oM badz+ra kA ma rU pa Ne swA hA// de nas bud shing de dag nyid
172a3(rgyud 'bum): kyis ni/ / rab tu khros pas me sbyar nas// smyug ma'i 'bras bu phra mo bsregs// myur du mi snang nyid du 'gyur// oM badz+ra a tri sha ya swAhA// shes rab bud shing de nyid kyis// drag po'i me ni rab sbar
172a4(rgyud 'bum): nas/ nam mkha' stobs kyi me tog dgo/ bsregs na nam mkhar 'gro bar 'gyur// oM badz+ra khe tsa ri ni swA hA// de nas mngag gzhug pa dang g.yog/ bka' bzhin byed pa rab tu bskul/
172a5(rgyud 'bum): cinas kyang ni byur 'grub pa'i// go rims bzhin du rab bshad bya// shing ni kha bos bud shing bya// thab khung rdo rje'i dbyings su brko// khros pas rdo rje me tog sreg/ yi ge dza ni yongs su brjod/
172a6(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rdo rje'i sngags ni rab tu bskul// rdo rje me tog dag bsregs na// bka' byed mchog ni rnyed par 'gyur// oM badz+ra A dz+nyA kA ra ya dza// yam shing de dag nyid dang ni/
172a7(rgyud 'bum): thab khung ngo nyid brko bya zhing // byang chub sems dpa'i dman ma gang // bsregs na bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur// oM badz+ra so ri ba shaM ka rA ya dza// bud shing de dag nyid kyis me// kun tu thab
172b1(rgyud 'bum): khung de kho na/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i dman ma ni// bsregs na bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur// hUM badz+ra pA Ni ba shaM ka rA ya dza/ yang na sangs rgyas dman ma 'am// yang na bdag dang mtshan ma dag/ sgrub
172b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sbyor bar sbyin sreg bya/ / sangs rgyas bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur// oM bud d+ha sha ka ra ya dza/ tshig gi sbyor ba 'di yis ni// sbyin sreg bya zhing myur du 'grub// rdo rje'i sbyor bas dngos
172b3(rgyud 'bum): grub kun/ / the tsom med par 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje rigs la sogs kun kyang // de nas gsang ba phyag rgya che// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rab sgrub phyir// rnal 'byor cher po bsgrub par bya//
172b4(rgyud 'bum): rig pa gang zhig yid 'ong ba// sring mo'i rigs ni thob bya'i phyir// rig pa'i lha mo dang ldan par// shin tu rnal 'byor bsgrub par bya// bud med sdug dang lhan cig tu// mkhas pas 'dug pa
172b5(rgyud 'bum): bsten par bya/ / mdo sde gsang dbang rgyal po las// de nyid du ni ji skad bshad// kun tu gur kum phye ma dang // b+ha gar mig sman bcug nas ni// de yi sems dpa' shes par bya// gang phyir
172b6(rgyud 'bum): dgongs pa rab tu bsgrags/ / sdug pa de yi rig pa ni// mngon par 'dod pa gang yin 'ong // rang gi rigs kyi lha mo gang // de ni bud med ces byar grags// rig pa'i sbyor ba de yis ni/
172b7(rgyud 'bum): rang gi rigs kyi lha dag sgrub// mig sman la sogs gzhug pa ni// pad+ma'i steng du yang dag dgod// b+ha ga pad+ma zhes bshad de// gzhug pa dgod par bshad par bya// b+ha ga'i sbyor ba
173a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di yis ni/ / mig sman dag ni bsgrub par bya// b+ha gar mig sman gzhug pa ni// pad+ma'i steng du yang dag dgod// pad+ma dang ni lhan cig dgod// rnam pa bzhi ni 'grub par
173a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ oM gu h+ya ra ti badz+ra shaM ka ri sid+d+hi hUM/ dro dang du ba 'bar dang rdul// rnam pa bzhi ni 'grub par 'gyur// oM gu h+ya badz+ra sid+d+hi hUM/ b+ha gar gi'u wang bzhag nas ni// gsang ba'i phyag rgya
173a3(rgyud 'bum): gzhag par 'gyur/ / mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi dag gis// dngos grub rnam pa bzhi ru bzhad// oM gu h+ya badz+ra sid+d+hi hUM/ rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya yis// b+ha gar gur kum bcug nas ni// dag cing
173a4(rgyud 'bum): / de ni 'bar 'gyur na// rnam pa bzhi ni 'grub par 'gyur// oM badz+ra d+ha ra gu h+ya sid+d+hi hUM/ rdo rje bya ba'i sbyor ba dang // rdo rje phyag rgya bsdus pa dang // rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug dang // rdo rje khu tshur sbyor ba
173a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / dam tshig mchog ni 'di dag dang // hUM gi ser mo'i sbyor ba dang // chos kyi phyag rgya de bzhin 'dir// oM la sogs pa'i yi ge dang // sbyin sreg cho ga 'di yis ni// ye shes phyag rgya rab bsgrub
173a6(rgyud 'bum): bya/ rgyas pa ru ni thams cad dag/ gsang ba'i rgyud du rab tu bshad// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches// tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas ni// mchog nyid sgrub par 'gyur
173a7(rgyud 'bum): ba yin/ rdo rje rigs chen yid 'ong ba// rgyud chen kun las btud pa las// gang zhig mngon par brtson 'gyur ba// de ni yod pa'i dngos grub 'gyur// tshogs ni bsags pa med pa dang // sangs rgyas
173b1(rgyud 'bum): mthong ba med pa ru/ / gsang ba'i snying po chen po 'di// thos pa tsam du'ang mi 'gyur ro// gsang ba'i rnal 'byor gyi cho ga rdzogs so// / de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya bzhi/
173b2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor mkhas pas bslab par bya// ye shes de nyid gsang ba yang / yongs su sgrub pas rab tu bskor// shin tu gsang ba chen po ni// dngos po thams cad khyab la dgod// 'di ni rdo rje
173b3(rgyud 'bum): drag po bzhi/ / rang nyid lnga pa dang bcas pa// gsang ba'i brjod du med pa mchog/ ye shes mchog gi tshul thob byed// bde ba chen po rab grub don// dga' ba chen po shin tu brtan// oM sarba ta
173b4(rgyud 'bum): / thA ga ta badz+ra sa ma ye hUM/ hUM badz+ra ma Ta/ oM badz+ra pra ta b+h+ri ku nI badz+ra ra ta/ oM pad+ma badz+ra ti ta/ oM badz+ra karma a tri kro d+ha/ shar dang lho yi phyogs cha dang // nub dang byang gi phyogs cha dang // dbus
173b5(rgyud 'bum): dang phyogs bzhi dag tu ni/ sbyor bar phyag rgya dgod par bya// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// thams cad bri zhing dgod par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// mthong 'gyur 'di la the tsom
173b6(rgyud 'bum): med/ ji skad bshad pa'i rnal 'byor bzhin// rdo rje rnal 'byor rjes sbyor skyes// rnal 'byor dag ni lhag ma dag/ de dag thams cad brtan par bya// shin tu gsang ba de nyid che// mchog tu gsang ba de
173b7(rgyud 'bum): nyid mchog/ gsang ba chen po gsang ba 'dzin// rdo rje gsang ba brtan pa che// rig pa mngon par 'dod gyur pa// rang gi lag gis yang dag dri// rgyal mo chen mo brjod byas na// dkyil 'khor du ni

174a6(rgyud 'bum): chags chen po rab sgrub phyir/ / rol cing rab tu dga' bar bya// bde ba chen po grub don du// spyod pa chen po tshul chen po// de nyid rnal 'byor kun bsdus pa// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// rdo rje hUM mdzad
174a7(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor gyis/ / rnal 'byor bya ba bsgrub par bya// ji ltar yi ge hUM las byung // gsang ba rgyal po chen po byed// rdo rje hUM mdzad sbyor ba yis// rnal 'byor bya ba bsgrub par bya// de ltar mi na phyag rgya/
174b1(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig ces bya gtan mi 'grub// phyag rgya chen po mdor bsdus nas// rdo rje phyag rgya yongs su gzung // de nas grub pa'i phyag rgya che// grub pa cho ga yang dag gis// myur du rab tu 'grub 'gyur ba/ rmang
174b2(rgyud 'bum): byung chen po rab bshad bya/ / oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa ma ye hUM/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang bar bzhugs// phyag rgya chen po yongs su gzung // rdo rje sngags kyis bskul bya zhing // sangs rgyas byang chub
