200a4(rgyud 'bum): lon pa'i lus phyag na rdo rje dang mtshungs pa'i gzugs dang / stobs dang / mdog tu gyur te/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad dang ldan pa/ bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// tshe 'jal
200a5(rgyud 'bum): stong phrag brgyar 'gyur ro/ / de nas ral gri sgrub pa 'byung ste/ rdo rje khu tshur gyis ral gri bzung la lo gcig gi bar du bzlas na rig 'dzin thams cad kyi bdag po rig 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor lo sgrub pa
200a6(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ste/ 'khor lo'i dkyil 'kho bris la lcags kyi 'khor lo thogs nas/ nam rdo rjer gyur cing slar yang 'khor lor gyur gyi bar du bzlas so// de nas de thogs pas na rig 'dzin thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskor
200a7(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / de mas kyo btang sgrub par 'dod pas phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar gser gyi kyo btang byas te lag pa g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la/ grub pa rnam gsum du gyur gyi bar du dazlas la dros pa
200b1(rgyud 'bum): tsam gyis thams cad kun 'gugs nus par 'gyur ro/ / dud pa byung ba tsam gyis thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro// 'bar bas ni thams cad 'gugs nus pa dang / dbang du bya nus shing rig 'dzin gyi rgyal
200b2(rgyud 'bum): por 'gyur ro/ / de nas lha la sogs pa 'gugs pa 'byung ste/ lha chen po la sogs pa lha rnams gang yang rung ba'i cha lugs rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings te/ bsdigs shing
200b3(rgyud 'bum): zla ba gcig gi mtha'i bar bzlas na lha thams cad lhags te/ las thams cad byed pa'i g.yog tu 'gyur ro// klu dbang du bya bar 'dod na klu'i mtshor lte ba man chad chu'i nang du bcug la lo gcig tshun chad klu thams
200b4(rgyud 'bum): cad rang gi gzugs su ston cing las thams cad byed pa'i g.yog tu gyur kyi bar du bzlas so/ / gnod sbyin dbang du bya bar 'dod pas gnod sbyin gang la gnas pa'i gnas der rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcings la gnod
200b5(rgyud 'bum): sbyin de dag lhags te bka' ci stsal ces smra ba'i bar bzlas so/ / de phyin chad bka' thams cad byed pa'i g.yog tu 'gyur ro// de nas ma rnams thams cad dbang du bya bar 'dod pas ma'i gnas su song nas khro
200b6(rgyud 'bum): mo'i snying khar rdog pas mnan la zla ba gcig lon gyi bar du bzlas/ tshes nyi shu dgu la 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra chen po 'byin par byed do// de nas dbang du gyur nas bka' bzhin byed pa'i g.yog mor 'gyur
200b7(rgyud 'bum): phrag pa la khyer nas mtho ris su 'khrid ngo do/ / slar yang khrid de 'ongs nas tshogs kyi bdag por bcug cing de dag gis mchod de/ sngon ma byung ba'i don thams cad dang / 'dod pa thams cad dang / na chung
201a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'gug go/ / 'di lta bu'i rnal 'byor yang ster te/ rnal 'byor gang gis khro bo 'jig rten du'ang 'gro zhing phyir yang 'ong ngo // de la sus kyang cung zad kyang byed mi nus so//
201a2(rgyud 'bum): denas dpa' chen mo grub par 'dod pa des phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar bzlas pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i sku las lha mo'i lus mthong gi bar du ste/ de las ma 'gul ces bsgo'o// de phyin chad don thams cad sbyor bar 'gyur
201a3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas pa'ang ster ba'i bar du'o/ / de nas mtsho dbyangs ma dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ de nas phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar yi ge 'phreng bar byas la/ 'phreng ba'i yi ge bkod cing mthar phyin pa'i bar du bklag
201a4(rgyud 'bum): te/ nyin re zhing dus gsum du las byas la/ de nas brgyad stong bzlas na zla ba gcig lon pa dang mtsho dbyangs ma mthong ngo // de phyin chad thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten
201a5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtsug lag thams cad dang / / bshes gnyen can du bya ba thams cad dang / bzo thams cad kyang ma bslabs par des rab tu shes so// de nas lig bu mig dang / gur kum
201a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / ldong ros dang / ba bla rnams la sgrub pa 'byung ste/ lig bu mig blangs la/ 'jom pa'i steng du bzhag nas lag pas mnan te grub pa rnam gsum byung gi bar du bzlas so// gcig gis ni mi snang
201a7(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / gnyis pas ni gzugs mang por 'gyur ro// gsum pas ni gnas gong mar 'dzeg pa nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gur kum la sogs pa bzung ste/ 'jom pa'i bu gar bcug
201b1(rgyud 'bum): la rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas mnan nas 'dod pa thams cad kyi bdag po dang / rig 'dzin dang / thams cad du 'gro ba dang / tshe lo stong du thub par 'gyur ro// de nas sA la b+hany+tsi ka sgrub pa 'byung ste/ gnas
201b2(rgyud 'bum): gang na sA la bAny+tsi ka ri mor bris pa 'am/ gzugs su byas pa de'i 'jom pa la sor mo bzhag ste/ zla ba gcig gi bar du zlos shig/ de nas zla ba gcig mthar mtshan thog thag zlos shig/ de nas nang
201b3(rgyud 'bum): par rang gi gzugs su bstan nas 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa'i chung mar 'gyur ro/ / gnod sbyin ma sgrub par 'dod pas gnod sbyin ma gang na 'dug pa'i gnas der 'dug la/ rang gi gzugs su 'ongs kyi bar
201b4(rgyud 'bum): du bzlas na de la 'dod pa thams cad ster ba'i bran mor 'gyur ro/ / de nas sha za mo sgrub par 'dod pas phyag dar phung po mes btang ste/ lag pa g.yon pas rang gi mtshan ma de bzung la g.yas pas gzegs ma bsres
201b5(rgyud 'bum): pa ni phyag dar gyi phung po de las ji tsam du sha za mo gdeng mangs gzugs mi sdug pa 'ongs te rang gi gzugs su gnas so/ / de'ang de bzhin du bran mor 'gyur ro// de nas ci bgyi sgrub par 'dod pas nyin zhag gcig
201b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyasna ba byas la/ tshes nyi shu dgu la brgyad stong bzlas te/ de nas zla ba gcig slong mo la za zhing grangs med par bzlas te/ zla ba gcig lon pa dang nub gsum sbyang nas mtshan thog thug bzlas so// de nas nang par
201b7(rgyud 'bum): tsaM kyi 'od nas des mi 'jigs par byas te/ de nas de rang nas 'grub bo// de byin cad 'dod pa thams cad 'bral ba'i g.yog tu 'gyur te/ mtho ris kyi lha mo 'di 'grub cing 'dul lo// de yang skyel zhing slar yang
202a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gug go/ / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi thams cad kyang smra'o// gzhan gyi nor thams cad kyang phrogs nas 'bu'o// de nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs bya bar 'dod pas dngos
202a2(rgyud 'bum): grub med pa gang yin pa des zla ba drug gi bar du nyin zhag bcu bcu zhing spyad pa snga ma rjes la slong mo'i kha zas la sogs pa nas rlung bza' ba'i bar du'o/ / de nas mjug tu mtshan thal byung bzlas na nang par sangs rgyas
202a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'ang sbyin par 'gyur ro/ / de nas nyin re zhing bco brgyad kyi bar du sngon gyi sprad pa rnam byas la/ de'i mjug tu mtshan thal byung bzlas na nang par las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba ni hUM zhes thang cig brjod pas kyang ngo //
202a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas ro langs sgrub pa 'byung ste/ ma smas ma nyams pa'i mi ro blang la legs par bkrus nas byug pas legs par byugs te/ me tog gi 'phreng bas btags nas rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la dbugs byung
202a5(rgyud 'bum): bar du bzlas na de ldang ste langs pa dang / de zhon na thams cad du 'gro zhing tshe'ang lo stong phrag brgyar 'gyur ro// de nas ro langs kyi grub pa mchog sgrub pa 'byung ste/ ma smas ma nyams pa'i mi ro blangs nas b
202a6(rgyud 'bum): zhin du rab tu brgyan pa zhon te langs shing yang 'gyel ba'i bar du bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur 'gyur ro/ / de phrag pa la khyer na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsrel ba'i rig 'dzin 'jig rten gyi kham
202a7(rgyud 'bum): rab 'byams thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang / tshe rang bskal par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de nas ma bsgrubs kyang dkyil 'khor mthong ba nyid kyis las su 'gyur ba ni/
202b1(rgyud 'bum): 'di lta ste/ thang cig brjod pas ni bdag dang / gzhan dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / rgyal po la sogs pa srung bar 'gyur ro// mtshams bcad pa la sogs pa ni brtan par blta bas mtshams bcad pa de bzhin
202b2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyang mi 'da' na gzhan lta ci smos/ sa'i dkyil 'khor dang / nam mkha' dang / phyogs bcings pa'ang lta ba des so// dbab pa ni reg pa dang ma reg pas ral gri dang / me long dang /
202b3(rgyud 'bum): snod dang / mthe bong dang / shing ljon pa dang / bris pa dang / cha lugs dang / gzhu dang / mda' dang / rdo rje la sogs pa dbab pa'i phyag rgya gos kyis g.yogs la bcings te/ gu gul gyi gdug pas dbab
202b4(rgyud 'bum): bo/ gdon zhi bar bya ba ni hUM zhes pas so// hUM zhes pa'i phyag rgyas ni sems can thams cad 'phungs par byed do// rdo rje lcags sgrog gi phyag rgyas ni byad ma'i gdon las thar par 'gyur ro// he ru ka rdo rje'i phyag
202b5(rgyud 'bum): rgya bstan pas ni byang mas bsad pa las slar gso bar bya'o/ / rdo rje'i phyag rgya bzung bas sgra las bzung ste bslangs pas ni dug mnan pa dang / dug bslang ba dang / dug zhi bar bya ba dang / dug spo ba dang / dug
202b6(rgyud 'bum): gzhig par bya ba dang / dug gis shi ba las gso bar bya'o// rdo rje hUM zhes pa gcig gis so// gter dbyung ba ni zangs kyi ril ba chus bkang la/ rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i mdzub mo dang gu gul gyis bdug pa byas
202b7(rgyud 'bum): tebazlas na gal te gter yod na ni chu de ldud do/ / de ste med na ni 'khyil lo// de nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i hUM zhes pa bzlas te blang ngo // snang ba dgug pa ni dong ka'i ljon pa'i yam shing
203a1(rgyud 'bum): gis medus te/ zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyi la ra dza ko sha te ka'i me tog la bzlas nas stong phrag brgya bsregs na snang ba thob bo// 'og gi gnas su rdo rje 'og gi phyag rgyas
203a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khrul 'khor thams cad bcom nas rdo rje hUM zhes pa bzlas te zhugs na de la sus kyang gtse bar mi 'gyur ro/ / gtogs 'dod kyi 'khor los kyang ci'ang byed par mi 'gyu ro// phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rdo rje 'am/
203a3(rgyud 'bum): nor bu ma ra ga ti 'am/ pad+ma rA ga 'am/ mu tig gam/ gser ram/ dbyig gam/ gzhan ci'ang rung ba 'am/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs la lo gcig gi
203a4(rgyud 'bum): bar du dus gsum du brgya brgyar bzlas nas/ de nas lo gcig lon na brgya 'gyur du 'gyur ro// de snyed du brgyar bzlas na de snyed gyi brgyar 'gyur ro// de nas stong du bzlas na'ang stong du 'gyur ro// longs
203a5(rgyud 'bum): skyed dgug pa ni stong phrag brgyar bzlas so/ / dgug pa ni rdo rje kyo ba tang gi phyag rgyas zla ba bzhis khugs so// dbang du bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas so// sems can thams cad gtan 'pho
203a6(rgyud 'bum): ba ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcings te stong phrag brgyar bzlas na/ sems can thams cad yid kyis dmigs pa bzhin gtan 'pho'o// chu mnan pa ni rdo rje phyag rgya bcings la chu'i steng du 'gror rung ba'i bar du
203a7(rgyud 'bum): bzlas so/ / me maman pa ni thang cig bzlas pas so// lo tog srung ba ni rdo rje blta bas te/ de la srog chags rnams gang gis kyang gnod par mi 'gyur zhing / byi ba la sogs pa'ang 'da' bar mi byed do//
203b1(rgyud 'bum): rdeg pa spyong ba ni khro bo'i lta bas te/ gang du bltas pa der 'pho'o// bza' ba dang btung ba thams cad spong ba ni 'bar ba'i lta bas rang gi snod du 'pho'o// sdig pa dang sbrul thams cad med par bya ba ni thang cig brjod
203b2(rgyud 'bum): pas so/ / gcan gzan thams cad la thang cig bzlas pas med par 'gyur ro// rkun po thams cad pham pa ni rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pas so// dmag las sgrol ba ni rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas so//
203b3(rgyud 'bum): gzhu dang / mda' dang / mdung dang / rgyal mtshan mnan nas 'gul gyi bar du bzlas te/ de thogs na dmag thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// zhal che la ni thams cad gcig brjod pas rtsod pa'i la
203b4(rgyud 'bum): @thebs par 'gyur ro/ / zhi ba thams cad ni til gyi sbyin sreg gis so// rgyas pa thams cad ni yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg gis so// gtan 'pho ba thams cad ni tsher ma'i sbyin sreg gis so// 'tshe ba dang /
203b5(rgyud 'bum): gnam ngal dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad gzhil ba ni til dang 'bras kyi sbyin sreg gis so// gzhom pa thams cad ni hUM zhes pas so// dgod du gzhug pa dang / myos par bya ba tham cad la phaT ces
203b6(rgyud 'bum): bya bas so/ / thams cad gnyid log tu gzhug pa ni bskum la mig btsums te brgya bzlas pas thams cad gnyid log par bya ba yin no// sems can thams cad rgyas gdab pa ni rdo rje khro bo'i lta bas bltas na
203b7(rgyud 'bum): chas btab par 'gyur te/ nyin bdun las lhag par mi gson no// ngag dbrog pa ni rang gi lce sos bzung nas hUM zhes bya ba'i bar du sbyar ba'o// snying drang ba ni rdo rje sor mo'i phyag rgya dpung pa bsnol te/ rang gi mam
204a1(rgyud 'bum): khang du tho shing snying po bzlas nan bdun tshun chad 'pho bar 'gyur ro/ / gling gcad pa ni rdo grangs cigacad par bya'o// snying dbye ba ni rdo rje thugs phur gyis btab ste/ ming nas
204a2(rgyud 'bum): shing gzugs so/ / snying spo ba ni lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje blangs te/ mtshan bdun du rab tu sbyor nga byas pas 'pho bar 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya 'di rnams las thar par bya ba bshad de/ ngas rgyas 'debs pa
204a3(rgyud 'bum): la mi bu tshur dam pas so/ / ngag dbrog pa la ni rdo rje ngag gi bzlas pas so// snying 'dren pa la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya snying khar dgrol lo// bcad pa la ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa bzlas nas 'o mas khrus shig/ bye ba la
204a4(rgyud 'bum): phur bu phyung nas rdo rje dris skus shig/ snying spos pa la ni rdo rje snying por thar par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byad ma'i phyag rgya'ang spo bar 'gyur ro// snying sgrub par 'dod na bud med kyi snying khar bzlas na de'i snying kha nas sgra
204a5(rgyud 'bum): thos par 'gyur ro/ / skyes pa'i snying khar yang de bzhin du bya ste/ snying kha thams cad du'ang de ltar ro// de nas pha rol gyi sems shes pa sgrub par 'dod pas ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa brgyar bzlas na pha rol gyi sems shes
204a6(rgyud 'bum): so/ / sngon gyi gnas shes par bya ba ni rdo rje hUM zhes bzlas pas so// rmi lam mthong bar 'dod pas ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas shing bdug pas ka pi tsas bdugs te gnyid log na/ de nas bcom
204a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi shes pa ston to// tshig sgrub par 'dod pas na rdo rje tshig gi stong phrag brgya bzlas na rdo rje tshig gis rang gi lces smras pa thams cad bden par 'gyur te
204b1(rgyud 'bum): bslang pa de stsol to/ / cho 'phrul ston pa ni rdo rje bzlas pa tshig gis brgyad brgya bzlas na rang gi lul la cho 'phrul du gyur pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rdo rje 'dzin dang / lha dang /
204b2(rgyud 'bum): klu dang / gnod sbyin la sogs pa sems can thams cad gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du ston to// rang gi gzugs ci dga' bar bsgyur bar 'dod pas rdo rje tshig gis rdo rje bzlas pas stong phrag brgya 'azlas na gzugs gang
204b3(rgyud 'bum): dang gang 'dod pa de dang / bdag sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su'ang byed par 'gyur ro// mi snang bar 'dod pas rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje bzung la/ rdo rje bzung bas mi snang bar 'gyur ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas so// btang
204b4(rgyud 'bum): bas ni 'grol lo/ / khri'u la 'dug nas rdo rje lag tu blangs te nam 'phar gyi bar du bzlas so// gdon gyis 'dzin du 'jug na rdo rje hUM zhes pas so// gdon gar byed du 'jug pa ni hi zhes pas so// gdon bskyod pa ni rtag
204b5(rgyud 'bum): ces pas so/ / gdon gzhom pa ni phaT ces pas so// gcer bar bya ba ni mi'i sgra'i skud pas rang gi dpung pa bcings na gcer bar 'gyur te gos brje bar 'gyur ro// sdang bar bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya
204b6(rgyud 'bum): bsgral bas so/ / bskrad pa ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis 'phang ngo // dgos pa bskyed pa ni mtshan thog thag sha chen rang gi khrag gis bskus te sreg go// gzhan gyi bud med dgug pa ni rdo rje bzung nas snying po bzlas shing dgug gas
204b7(rgyud 'bum): yang na thams cad du khyab pa hUM zhes pa thams cad bya'o/ / bud med thams cad dga' bar spyod pa ni rang gi rtags rdo rje bcings pas bzung la nyin bdun dus gsum du langs kyi bar du slob bo// de nas mjug tu rnam
205a1(rgyud 'bum): phyed bar du bslabs na rtag tu ldang la mi snyoms shing bcud mngal rtags shugs drag por 'gyur ro/ / bu mo spyad pa ni rdo rje bzung nas thams cad du khyab pa hUM zhes bya ba byas nas spyang ngo do// drang
205a2(rgyud 'bum): med thams cad dbang du bya ba ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcings la stong phrag brgya bzlas na bud med thams cad mgu bar 'gyur ro/ / phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings
205a3(rgyud 'bum): la stong phrag brgya bzlas na bud med thams cad mgu bar 'gyur ro/ / sems can thams cad dbang du bya bar 'dod na rdo rje khu tshur gyi bcings pas rdo rje bzung la nam 'gul gyi bar du bzlas so// snang ba la dbang du bya bar
205a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dod na rdo rje blangs te rang gi spyi bor bzhag la spyi bor rdo rje brtan par gyur kyi bar du bzlas so/ / de nas snang ba'i mdun du 'dug na des snang bar rang gi dbang bskur ba yang stsol to// nor dgug pa ni rin po che'i gtso
205a5(rgyud 'bum): bo'i phye mas sbyin sreg bya bas so/ / char dbab pa ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa stong bzlas pas so// char gcad pa ni hUM zhes pa'o// ser ba bcad pa ni rdo rje gsor ba'i phyag rgyas so// gdon dgag pa yang phyag rgya de nyid
205a6(rgyud 'bum): kyis so/ / sprin dgag pa ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa brgyar bzlas pas so// rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag nas me tog dang bdug pas mchod de/ rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas mnan la rdo rje langs kyi bar du bzlas so
205a7(rgyud 'bum): de thogs nas sa bskor na ci 'dod pa bzhin du rgyu'i las rnams ston te/ / rdo rjes bskor bas dus ma yin par shing la 'bras bu dang me tog mthong ngo // nam mkha' la me tog gi 'phreng ba chags par bya ba
205b1(rgyud 'bum): ni dbugs bsdams la rdo rje khu tshur bcings te gtor na 'chags so/ / cha lugs bzhud par bya ba na rdo rje'i phyag rgyas so// gar byed par bya ba ni rdo rje 'dzin mas so// smra bar bya ba ni hU~M zhes pas so//
205b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyug par bya na rdo rje dgug pa'i phyag rgyas so// smin ma 'bul bar bya na rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'dzin pas rdo rje thogs la rang gi smin mtshams su bskul bas so// sa g.yo bar byan rkang pa g.yon pa brdabs pas so//
205b3(rgyud 'bum): khyim bskul ba ni rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgyas so// khang pa dgug pa ni rdo rje khros pa'i kyo btang gi phyag rgya bcings pas so// sprin med par char dbab pa ni rdo rje hUM zhes bzlas pas so// skad cig tu sprin 'du zhing
205b4(rgyud 'bum): ston pa ni rdo rje bskor bas so/ / zla ba dang nyi ma dbab cing bstan pa ni rdo rje 'dra bas pas so// nyi ma dang zla ba mang por bstan na rdo rje bzhi nam mkha' la gtor bas so// dmag rnam bzhi bstan na rdo rje bskor
205b5(rgyud 'bum): bas so/ / mtshan mo nyin bar du bya na rdo rje 'bar ba bskor bas so// zin par mtshan mor byan mig btsums la rdo rje bskor bas so// thams cad nas rdo rje bstan na brgya bzlas te rdo rje bskor bas so// khams
205b6(rgyud 'bum): cad nas byang chub sems dpa' bstan na stong bzlas te rdo rje bskor bas so/ / phyag na rdo rje thams cad la bstan na stong phrag brgya bzlas te bskor bas so// thams cad nas sangs rgyas bstan na rdo rje la bye ba bzlas so//
205b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje traM zhes bya ba'i rtog pa chen po rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
206a1(rgyud 'bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungs so// ngas kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir gang 'jig rten gsum las rnam
206a2(rgyud 'bum): par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir brtson par 'gyur ba la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'di sbyin no/ / de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas tsog tsog pur 'dug
206a3(rgyud 'bum): ste mnos pa/ oM badz+ra bid swA hA/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis stong gsum gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu g.yos/ sems can thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos nas phyag 'tshal zhing
206a4(rgyud 'bum): dbang du gyur to/ / de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal na rdo rje rig pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po
206a5(rgyud 'bum): tshul du dkyil 'khor thams cad brtags te/ de'i dbus su nus phul bzhi la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te/ de'i spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje yid kyis kyang tsog cog bur bzhag go// de nas de bzhin du gzhug go//
206a6(rgyud 'bum): grags nas 'di skad du khyod deng nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid do// de ste dang na de bshang de zhes smos shig/ des smras pa/ gsungs shig ces pa dang / de nas khyod deng phan chang de bzhin gshegs pa
206a7(rgyud 'bum): gyur to zhes spros shig/ des spras pa/ ci'i phyir/ dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i phyir zhes des spros shig/ gang dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa de de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du blta ste/ des sangs rgyas kyi byang
206b1(rgyud 'bum): chub kyang tshe 'di nyid dam pha rol la thob par 'gyur ro/ / zhes smras nas phyag rgya spobs shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal
206b2(rgyud 'bum): nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bshad do/ / dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris nas bcug la rdo rje'i sgrub pa sgrub bo// lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje bzung la rang gi phyag rgya sgom mo// rdo rje zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/
206b3(rgyud 'bum): snying po sgom pa ste/ rdo rje chog gis bzlas na des de bzhin gshegs pa'ang che 'di 'am gzhan la thob par 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro// thams cad dam tshig chen po'i tshul du bas la 'di
206b4(rgyud 'bum): spros shig/ dad brtan phyag na rdo rje la// de bzhin gshegs rigs de bzhin no// sems can thams cad mgu ba ru// khyod kyis de ltar brtag par bya// deng nas khyod kyis de ltar ma byas na sems can
206b5(rgyud 'bum): dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/ / dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// yang dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris la bcug nas las rnam bzhi yang bslab po// lus thams cad kyis gtugs te de bzhin gshegs pa
206b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas/ / de nas langs te yan lag lngas phyag byas te sdig pa thams cad bshags so// de nas langs nas thal mo sbyar te pus mo gnyis sa la gtugs nas bsod nams thams cad
206b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi rjes su yi rang ngo / / de nas langs te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs la/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas phyag 'tshal to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i tshig gi badz+ra bi
207a1(rgyud 'bum): rjod cig/ des ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / phyag na rdo rje la phyag bya ba dang / bkur m+b+hi dang / mchod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa
207a2(rgyud 'bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / mchod pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas phyag na rdo rje'i rig pa sgrub pa 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor mthong nas ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bris
207a3(rgyud 'bum): la de'i g.yas su spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po/ g.yon du rdo rje khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bya'o// de nas gso sbyin can dus gsum du khrus byed pa/ dus gsum du bkrus pa'i gos gyon
207a4(rgyud 'bum): la stong phrag brgyar bzlas so/ / de'i mjug tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur bcings nas mtshan thal byung bzlas na nang par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gshegs te zhal ston to//
207a5(rgyud 'bum): mchog ci 'dod pa stsol te/ sangs rgyas pa'i bar du'ang stsol to// de nas yang cho ga bzhin te/ ras la de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs par byas la/ de'i spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje thal
207a6(rgyud 'bum): mo sbyar te co ga tsog pur 'dug nas/ / bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs su phyag na rdo rje ya gcig gis rdo rje gsor g.yon pa na pad+ma'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon
207a7(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su rdo rje khu tshur te khu tshur gnyis kyis rdo rje bsdams par byas la/ de nas chos gcig nas brtsams te zla ba gcig de bzhin du bzlas la tha ba tshang nas mtshan thal byung ba zlas ma/ de ltar de bzhin
207b1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa byon nas mchog ci 'dod pa stsol to/ / yang chog gzhan ni ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bris la de'i spyan sngar zla ba drug de bzhin du bzlas te/ mjug la nyin mtshan gas
207b2(rgyud 'bum): du sbyangs te phyag na rdo rje byon nas phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid byin gyi bar du bzlas so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du stong phrag brgya bzlas na mjug tu de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo // nas
207b3(rgyud 'bum): mkha' la bltas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ngo / / des de la phun sum tshogs pa thams cad nyin gcig bzhin stsol to// sangs rgyas kyi spyan
207b4(rgyud 'bum): sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na mchog 'thob bo/ / phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na phyag na rdo rjes 'dod pa thams cad stsol to// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i spyan sngar stong
207b5(rgyud 'bum): phrag brgya bzlas na spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos lag nas bzung ste/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du khrid cing slar yang khrid de 'ong ngo // 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i
207b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtogs pa rdzogs so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpas yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
207b7(rgyud 'bum): l dan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir snying po gang brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje'i ri ltar mi g.yo ba'ang bskyod cing 'dren
208a1(rgyud 'bum): rnasems can gzhan sa kyi smom ci 'o/ / gang dran pa tsam gyis mang 'jig pa thams cad rnam par dgrol bar 'gyur ro// gang brjod pa tsam gyis kyang mtshams med pa tham cad sngags su rnam
208a2(rgyud 'bum): par byang bar 'gyur ba dang / thams cad la srung bar 'gyur ba dang / phyag na rdo rjes kyang 'dod pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ba dang // mchog stsol ba dang / don thams cad sgrub pa dang / dgos pa
208a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad byed cing rtag par phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ba dang / gang bslabs pa tsam gyis grub pa thams cad mngon par 'gyur bar byal bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems
208a4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad ces bka' sprul to/ / phyag na rdo rje khyod kyis legs par spros shig/ ngas kyang gzung ngo // de nas phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje sems pa dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor te/ rang gi
208a5(rgyud 'bum): snying khar bstod pa'i tshul gyis bzung nas rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so/ / Tak+ki hUM dza/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g.yos so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
208a6(rgyud 'bum): g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ 'phar/ rab tu 'phar/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bskyod/ rab tu bskyod par gyur to// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang ma rung bar gyur to// byang chub
208a7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sa'i snying por gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis brtan par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i grub pa'ang sra bar gyur to// bdud dang mi bgrungs pa'i phyogs
208b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyang brtag par byas so/ / gdon thams cad bcos bsad bcom sde 'dar bdabang nas/ bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag skyobs/ bde bar gshegs pa
208b2(rgyud 'bum): bdag cag skyobs shig pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de dag la bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje 'di nyid la skyabs su deng zhig dang / 'di nyid kyis khyed la skyob par byed do// phyag na rdo rje'i snying
208b3(rgyud 'bum): kha nas kun tu 'bar bas bskor bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phreng ba la sogs pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'dzum zhing khro ba/ phyag gnyis kyis me tog gi gzhug 'gengs pa
208b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje hUM zhes pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dod pa'i khro bo phyung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can kun 'dod pa'i khro bos sbyangs nas phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar 'dug ste bka' nod ngo //
208b5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga ji lta ba de bzhin du khyod kyis kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyis shig ces so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungs so//
208b6(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rje de bas na khyod snying po gang gis sems can 'di dag thams cad brgyal ba dang / bcos pa dang / bcom pa kun 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhan dag kyang rdo rje'i lus thob par 'gyur ba de spros shig/
208b7(rgyud 'bum): oM TuM/ rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya 'dis bdag nyid go bgos na rdo rje'i lus dang rdo rje'i tshe thob cing srung bar yang 'gyur te/ nam 'tsho'i bar du thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// de nas phyag na rdo rje
209a1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpas rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so/ / de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor che// gru bzhi pa de sgo bzhi
209a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / rta babs bzhi dang bcas pa ste// bcu drug cha dang ldan par ro// rdo rje'i ra bas mdzes pa ste// grwa dang sgo yi zur dag dang // de bzhin rta babs mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen
209a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan par bya/ / ba dan 'phreng ba dril gyis brgyan// dang po'i phyi yi dkyil 'khor 'di// snying po bzlas shing bri bar bya// de yi nang gi 'khor lo yang // rdo rje srad bu mnyam ldan pa'o// rdo rje'i ka
209a4(rgyud 'bum): ba brgyad ldan zhing / / rdo rje'i ka ba mdun gnas su// dkyil 'khor brgyad kyi tshul du ste// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bzhag pa'o// de yi dbus su sems dpa' che// phyag na rdo rje bzhugs par bya// sangs
209a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas rin chen thams cad dag/ dbu rgyan du ni rgyan thogs pa// cung zad tsam du bzhad pa'i zhal// rdo rje snyems par mdzad pa ste// me tog mda' gzhu 'chang ba'o// de las gzhan pa phyag bzhi pa/
209a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs nyid de// khro gnyer bzhad pa'i zhal ngo can// gnyis kyis me tog gzhu 'gengs shing // gnyis kyis rdo rje hUM mdzad pa'o// rdo rje can gyi g.yas phyogs su// rdo rje
209a7(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba bri bar bya/ / snying khar rdo rje bstan 'dzin cing // 'khyud pa lta bu'i sbyor bas so// phyag na rdo rje'i rgyab tu ni// chu srin rgyal mtshan 'chang ba ste// sems dpa' rdo rje dpal can te// rin chen
209b1(rgyud 'bum): char pa rab tu 'bebs/ / rdo rje can gyi g.yon bris pa// rdo rje skems pa dmar po ste// gnyis kyis rdo rje sems pa 'dzin// sgeg pas mchod cing 'dud pa'o// dkyil 'khor gA yi gnas rnams su/
209b2(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa'i lha mo bri bar bya// dpyid kyi rdo rje rdo rje'i sprin// ston ka'i rdo rje rdo rje kha ba mo// phyi yi dkyil 'khor gla dag tu// 'dod pa'i gzugs la sogs pa bri// sgo yi dpung rnams thams cad du// rdo rje
209b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa'i kyo ba sogs/ / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po der// rdo rje slob dpon nyid rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya bcings la zhugs la 'di skad du smros shig/ sems can kun gyi yid khyab cing // sems can
209b4(rgyud 'bum): kun la bde ba stsol/ / sems can kun gyi phar gyur pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag dang 'grub// Tak+ki hUM dza/ de nas de skad smras pa dang 'bab par 'gyur te/ de ltar babs pa tsam gyis phyag na
209b5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i gzugs mthong ngo / / bcom ldan 'das mthong bar bstan pas grub pa thams cad kyang stsol te/ la la ni rdo rje 'dzin/ la la ni 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas slob ma gzhug ste snying po'i phyag
209b6(rgyud 'bum): rtsa bcings la/ des 'phreng ba bzang nas gos dmar pos yan lag bcings la/ ras dmar pos mig gnyis bka' ste bcu ga nas 'di skad ces smros shig/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong
209b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i mi mkhas pa su la 'ang gsang ba 'di dag mi bsnyad par byos shig/ 'byung po'i gdon dang / 'phra men ma la sogs pa'i gdon gyis bsad par gyur ta re/ shi nas kyang dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes
210a1(rgyud 'bum): bsgo nas gdong khrol cig/ de nas 'di skad ces smos shig/ gang dpung na pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rje/ 'di ni dang po'i sems dpa' 'dod pa'i bdag po 'dod pa'i dbang
210a2(rgyud 'bum): po kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems dpa' 'o/ / gang mdun na ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'di'i thugs yin te 'dod pa'i khro bo'o// gang g.yas na ba 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi reg pa'i bde ba ste/ rdo rje dag
210a3(rgyud 'bum): ba zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'o/ / gang rgyab na ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid che ba'i rgyal mtshan te/ sems dpa' thams cad kyi byams pa slong ba dang nor sbyin pa'o// gang g.yon phyog
210a4(rgyud 'bum): nab 'di ni bdag nyid che ba'i bdud de/ / sems can thams cad chags par byed pa'o// gang gA'i bzhi po 'di rnams ni dus kyi mchod pa me tog dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / dri'i lha'o// gang
210a5(rgyud 'bum): phyi'i grwa'i gnas na ba de dag ni gzugs la sogs pa 'dod pa'i yon tan no/ / gang sgo srungs de dag ni mig dang / 'dod chags pa dang / mdza' ba dang mi mdza' ba ste/ kyo btang dang / zhags pa dang /
210a6(rgyud 'bum): zlog dang / 'bebs pa dag ni rgol bar mi 'gyur ro// khyod kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa thams cad kyi bdag po la smod par ma byed cig/ gang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la sems can thams cad rnam
210a7(rgyud 'bum): par dag par bya ba'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba 'chad de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mu stegs can gyi rnams 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos des thar pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chags pa rnams ni
210b1(rgyud 'bum): sa na nam chu la chags pasam tha ldan/ / byang chub ma dpa' rnams bdag gi rlung sang sems ca rjud par byed/ spyod dru byu nag bstan pa zhas /
210b2(rgyud 'bum): de nas snying po byin cig/ Tak+ki hU~M dza/ 'di bsgrubs na bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i mchog 'grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das grub pas na 'dod pa'i khro bo 'grub par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir
210b3(rgyud 'bum): na/ / snying po 'di bdag nyid che ba ste/ Tak+ki zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'o// hUM zhes pa ni khro bo'o// de nyid dgug pa'i phyir dza zhes bya ba ni 'di khyod kyis bsgrub par bya'o// de nas phyag rgya chen po shes par
210b4(rgyud 'bum): slobs shig/ de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje'i thugs bsgrubs nas lag pa gnyis su rdo rje sbyin pa'i snying po ni 'di'o// oM badz+ra d+ha ra badz+ra pra tang d+hA ra ya sid d+hi Tak+ki hUM dza/ de nas 'phreng ba
210b5(rgyud 'bum): / phyag na rdo rje la phul bas de'i mgo la bskon no// de nas rdo rje ming gi dbang sbyin pa snying po 'dis so// oM badz+ra oM b+hi Shiny+tsa sar+b+ba karme shwa rad tra i daM badz+ra nA ma na ma a d+hiSh+NI ti dID+ho s+ya b+ha ba/ oM Tak+ki hUM dza/
210b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas der 'dug ste/ phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rdo rje tshig gis brgyad stong bzlas na/ de nas sa g.yo ste grub pa thams cad lan cig bzlas pas 'grub bo// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la brgya
210b7(rgyud 'bum): bzlas na de'i thugs dbang du 'gyur ro/ / de phyin chad sems can thams cad kyi snying shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi snying la dbang byed do// thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur ro// thams cad kyi brtan
211a1(rgyud 'bum): par chags so/ / snying thams cad las tshig thos par 'gyur ro// gyur pa dang / 'gyur ba dang / da ltar gyi tshig bden par 'gyur ro// bdag gi snying las kyang cho rdum/
211a2(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa bzhi mthong zhing gzhan la'ang ston to// de'i snying las rdo rje 'byung bar 'gyur ro// des na sems can thams cad kyis mi sod pa dang / mi tshugs pa dang / mi gcod pa dang / mi phyed pa'i rdo rjes
211a3(rgyud 'bum): lus su 'gyur ro zhes/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa bya ste/ rdo rje'i thugs bstod pa'i glus bstod do// de phyin chad grub pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur
211a4(rgyud 'bum): te/ 'dod pa thams cad dang gsang ba'i mchod pa thams cad myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas mchod pa thams cad kyis 'dra bar mchod nas/ ji snyed pa'i zas dang / ro dang / spyad pa thams cad
211a5(rgyud 'bum): kyis tshim par byas nas 'byung ngo / / rdo rje 'khor lo chen po'i tshi ga rgyas pa'o// de nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du rdo rje 'dod pa khro bo la sogs pa'i phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin bris te zhugs nas
211a6(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa'i lha rnams kyis gar gyi mchod pas snyim pa ma stongs par byas te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rdo rje'i glu'i rdo rje'i bzlas pas 'bum
211a7(rgyud 'bum): bzlas so/ / de nas rdo rje de lci bar 'gyur ro// de nas slar yang bar 'gyur ro// de nas de ltar mtshan gcig thal byung du bzlas na nang par rdo rje 'dzin tam/ rdo rje khro bo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
211b1(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bdag po lha'i gzugs dang / mdog dang / rgyun dang / spyan gsum pa la phyag bzhi pa rdo rje 'dod pa'i mdangs dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ rdo rje 'dzin gyi tsher 'gyur
211b2(rgyud 'bum): ro/ rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa'o// / de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor te/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i srad bus thig btab ste/ de nas lha mo rnams bris la/ de'i dbus su bcom
211b3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das ji lta ba bzhin du gzhag nas 'di skad smos shig/ ho badz+ra satwa su ra ta s+t+waM/ de'i spyan sngar rdo rje gzhu 'gengs pa'i gzhu bris te/ de'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o// badz+ra a shwe hUM/ g.yas su rdo rje dga'
211b4(rgyud 'bum): mgu 'khyud par bya'o/ / de'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o// badz+ra ke li hUM/ rgyab tu chu srin rgyal mtshan 'chang ba byams ma'i rdo rje bri/ de'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o// badz+ra a gri ho/ g.yon du rdo rje snyems ma bris te/
211b5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje g.yon du sbyor bar bya/ de'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o// badz+rag r+b+he tsi ni/ de nas grwa dang sgor yang rang gi lha mo br-i/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon nyid shin tu chas la rdo rje lag tu thogs bud med kyang brgyan te/ lag pa gas
211b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje khu tshur bcings la/ dpung pa gnyis kyis 'khyud de zhugal 'di skad brjod do// sa ma ya s+t+waM a haM/ su ra ta po Tak+ki hUM dza/ de nas brjod pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das ston par mdzad de/ phyag rgya thams
211b7(rgyud 'bum): cad 'grub pa dang / dam tshig thams cad 'grub pa'ang stsol to// de nas slob ma'ang de bzhin du sring po'i rdo rje de nyid kyis bcud nas 'di zhes smos shig/ khyod kyis dam tshig 'di las ma 'da' zhig/
212a1(rgyud 'bum): mi bde ba ma spangs por myur du shi zhing du 'bod chen por skyes par gyur ta re/ de nas dam tshig brjod do// bdag che kun gyi phyag rgya ni// 'dod pa bsam las yang dag 'byung // de bas rtsod//
212a2(rgyud 'bum): kyis sdig med pa'i// 'dod dang bsam pa ma gtang zhig/ 'di ni dam tshig srung ba'i sngags so// oM Takri hUM phaT/ 'dis rdo rje'i chu blud do// gang dngos po gzhan thams cad kyi phyir yang mnas bsgag ste/ de dag
212a3(rgyud 'bum): la'ang rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'dzin pas blud do/ / gang gis 'di las 'das na zla ba phyed kyis snying 'gas so zhes/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dam tshig chen pos gsungs so// de nas phyag rgya bcing ba bslab bo// de nas de
212a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du 'byung ngo / / shin tu dga' ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris nas nyid kyi sku'am mtshan ma gzhag go// der btsud nas las rnam bzhi bslab
212a5(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / de la dang po nyid du 'dod pa thams cad stsol bar gyur te/ phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rdo rje 'dzin phyag bzhi pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phreng ba la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i
212a6(rgyud 'bum): skur bdag nyid mthong ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas so/ / da phyin chad 'dod pa thams cad nus par 'gyur ro// de nas khro bo'i las bslab ste/ rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings la bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams
212a7(rgyud 'bum): cad thang cig bzlas te/ hUM zhes pas bsdigs na de bzhin gshegs pa'ang 'gyel bar 'gyur ro// de phyin chad 'gro ba gnas pa thams cad kyang 'gyel nus par 'gyur ro// de nas phyag na rdo rje'i las 'byung ste/
212b1(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad 'dod pa dang / khro bo gnyis kyis 'dul bar 'dod na/ rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas me tog la sogs pas mchod pa byas te/ rdo rje thugs kyi phyag rgya bdag gi snying khar bcings la/
212b2(rgyud 'bum): phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rdo rje 'dzin thob pa de srid du bzlas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las byed par 'dod pas/ phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar byang chub tu sems bskyed la sbyin pa sbyin/ tshul
212b3(rgyud 'bum): khrims bsrung / bzod pa bsgom/ brtson 'grus brtsam/ bsam gtan la snyoms par gzhag/ shes rab yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ ci 'dod ci nus kyis bya zhing rtag tu bzlas pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i sku 'am
212b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur mthong gi bar du bya'o/ / de nas sa bcu po 'thob ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i las byed pa'i byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro// las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o//
212b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas bsgrub pa 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs par// dam tshig shes pa ma yin dang // slob ma ma yin gzhan rnams la// mi zad snying po 'di mi sbyin// dkyil 'khor mthong bas sgrub pa ni phyag na
212b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na sar bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ / de nas ras la bris te/ ras kyi dbus su ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bri// de'i g.yas su phyag na rdo rje phyag bzhi pa'i thugs
212b7(rgyud 'bum): ka nas thugs 'byung ba de bzhin du bri/ g.yon du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po phyag bzhi pa ste/ gnyis na ni pad+mo'i ting nge 'dzin 'chang / gnyis kyis ni me tog gi gzhu 'gengs pa kha dog dmar po bri/
213a1(rgyud 'bum): spyan sngar de bzhin du rdo rje 'dod pa'i khro bo za'o// steng du nam mkha'i snying po bri/ zar mchod pa'i lha rang gi mchod pas bkram pa dang mgo bor ro// de nas ras la bris pa'i spyan sngar zla ba bzhir/
213a2(rgyud 'bum): dus bzhir stong bzlas shing bsgrubs na/ de nas zla ba tshang ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa'ang stsol bar 'gyur ro// ras la bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bris la/ sems dpa' chen po dang lha mo'ang
213a3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du bya'o/ / de'i spyan sngar zla ba gcig tu grangs med par bzlas shing 'dod pa thams cad zos la bsgrubs te/ de nas zla ba gcig lon pa dang / phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la/ mtshan thal byung
213a4(rgyud 'bum): bzlas na nang par rdo rje 'dzin 'thob bo/ / ras la bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin du bris la/ de'i spyan sngar zla ba phyed kyi bar du rtag par bzlas pa mi nyal mi mnal bar bzlas te/ de nas zla ba phyed lon pa dang
213a5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan mo thal byung du bzlas na nang par phyag na rdo rje dang mtshungs pa dang / 'dod pa'i longs spyod chen po dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad kyang 'thob cing thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ras la bcom
213a6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das khro bo de bzhin du bris la/ de'i spyan sngar rdo rje shugs kyi phyag rgya bcings te/ stong phrag brgya bzlas na des 'grub par 'gyur te/ bsgo ba bzhin las thams cad byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
213a7(rgyud 'bum): cad du'ang khyer zhing slar yang khyer te 'ong ngo / / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i bde ba thams cad khyed te 'ongs nas de la sbyin no/ des kyang longs spyod par nusan lha'i bu mo tham cad lta ci spos 'am byin yang stsol to// phyagan rdo rje 'dzin pa nas sa rgyas kyisas
213b1(rgyud 'bum): bsgo bas stsol bar 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bkug ste dbang du byed do// phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rdo rje thugs kyi phyag rgya bcings nas stong phrag

213b3(rgyud 'bum): spros shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes te ci 'dod pa'i mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// grub pa thams cad kyang 'grub bo// spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na spyan ras gzigs
213b4(rgyud 'bum): dbang pos mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro/ / nam mkha'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na dbang stsol bar 'gyur te/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad do// rdo rje gzhog ste de'i mdun
213b5(rgyud 'bum): du 'bum bzlas na de nas las thams cad yid bzhin du grub par byed do/ / phyag rgya chen po bcings nas 'bum bzlas na phyag na rdo rje 'dzin gyis mchog stsol to// dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas
213b6(rgyud 'bum): na rdo rje 'dzin mngon du mthong zhing phyag rgya'i las kun grub pa'ang stsol bar 'gyur ro/ / rdo rje lag tu thogs nas 'bum bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje bzung ba tsam gyis mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor lo thogs te
213b7(rgyud 'bum): 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / kyo ba btang thogs te 'bum bzlas na kyo btang nges thams cad 'gugs nus par 'gyur ro// zhags pa thogs te 'bum bzlas na zhags pa des thams
214a1(rgyud 'bum): cad drang rus par 'gyur ro/ / lag pa gnyis rdo rjes bcings pa bsdams te 'bum bzlas na sems can thams cad bcing nus par 'gyur ro// rdo rje dbang ba'i phyag rgya bcings
214a2(rgyud 'bum): nas 'bum bzlas na gnas pa dang 'gro ba thams cad dbab nus par 'gyur ro/ / rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na hUM zhes bya ba gcig gis gnas pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad skad cig
214a3(rgyud 'bum): gis ltung bar byed nus par 'gyur ro/ / lha chen po rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na/ zla ba gcig tshun chad kyis der 'ongs te dbang
214a4(rgyud 'bum): du 'gyur ro/ / mthu bo che rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo thob ste/ 'khor lo de thogs na 'grub par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa mnan te 'bum bzlas na tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro//
214a5(rgyud 'bum): brgya byin rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te 'bum bzlas na rdo rje sbyin par 'gyur te/ rdo rje bskor bas char gcad pa dang / dbab pa dang / thang cig gis ni gnam lcags dang ser ba 'bebs so// sa nad
214a6(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nu mnan te 'bum bzlas na gzhon nu ma thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro/ / las thams cad kyang byed par 'gyur ro// nyi ma la bltas te 'bum bzlas na bdud rtsi rna cha sbyin par 'gyur te/
214a7(rgyud 'bum): des na lha'i lo stong 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// zla ba la 'bar ba'i lta bas mgu bar bltas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na zla ba gnyis su mthong ste/ de phyin chad zla ba dang mtshungs pa'i 'od dang mdangs su 'gyur te/
214b1(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad kyi mig tu mdzes shing / sems can thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur ro// gapa' chen po'i gzugs la bltas te 'bum bzlas na de nas be con thob ste/ be con des

216a1(rgyud 'bum): zla ba gcig tshun chad kyis grong de thob bo/ / gtsug lag khang du 'bum bzlas na gtsug lag khang na gnas pas nor thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro// lha'i rten du 'bum bzlas na lngas nor/

218a1(rgyud 'bum): 'das la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par
218a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ba rtog pa chen pa'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po 'di stsal to/ / gang brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon du grub pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / gnam dal dang / 'tshe ba dang

218a4(rgyud 'bum): ras gzigs kyi dbang po khyod kyis smros shig/ de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi del po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so// A ro li ka/ de nas

218a6(rgyud 'bum): papaspyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i dkyil 'khor du gyur te zhugs so/ / de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di
218a7(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so/ / de nas yang dag par bshad pa// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// 'jig rten gsum rgyal tshul bzhin du// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de dbus srad bu mnyam pa ru// zla ban
218b1(rgyud 'bum): bar ni gdab pa ru/ / gnyis pa'i grwa ni sgor bstan te// dkyil 'khor mchog ni bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor brgyad kyi tshul du ste// dbus su thig ni bzhi yang bri// tshon rtsi dmar po dag gis ni/
218b2(rgyud 'bum): pad+mo 'dab brgyad bri bar bya// de yi snying po'i dbus su ni// 'jig rten mgon po bzhugs par bya// 'dab ma kun gyi steng rnams su// sangs rgyas cha lugs byi bar bya// pad+ma che mchog
218b3(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya yis/ / der ni slob dpon zhugs nas kyang / dkyil 'khor gnas su 'dug nas ni// rnal 'byor snyoms par 'jug par bya// ji ltar pad+mo chu rnams dang // nyes pa'i bab chags mang po yis//
218b4(rgyud 'bum): chags par mi 'gyur de bzhin 'dir// 'gro ba chags pas dag par gyur pa yin// 'di lan cig brjod nas sgom ste// de nas mdzub mo gnyis kyi kyo ba btang gis kun drangs la pad+mo chen po de spyan ras gzigs
218b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi dbang po'i spyan sngar grol lo/ / de la pad+mo chen po'i kyo ba btang ni 'di'o// oM mahA pad+ma hUM dza hriH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po nyid byon te/ slob dpon la zhal
218b6(rgyud 'bum): ston par mdzad nas yang na 'od zer yang 'gyeng ngo / / de nas phyag rgya de nyid kyis slob ma gzhug go// dkar pos g.yogs la gos dkar po bgos lo// thod dkar pos mgo la gtsug tor byas nas bcug
218b7(rgyud 'bum): ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod nas don yang bstan par bya'o// de nas lag pa g.yon par pad+mo byin/ g.yas par sngags kyi nor bu bskur la 'di skad smos shig/ sangs rgyas thams cad pad+mo na/
219a1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// rtag pa ru ni brtag par bya// khyod ni deng nas spyan ras gzigs// de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing ba dang / ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa bsgrub bo//
219a2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po pad+mo zhes bya'o// de nas pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris la// dbus kyi snying po la 'dug nas de bzhin gshegs
219a3(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la pad+ma 'dab ma kha 'byed pa'i tshul gyis lta zhing stong phrag brgya bzlas na 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po thob bo/ / pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dam tshig
219a4(rgyud 'bum): gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor de bzhin du byas la de'i dbus su pad+mo stong bzhag ste/ de nas pad+mo re re zhing bzang po thang res bcom ldan 'das la pad+mo stong 'bul lo// de nas slob ma bcug ste dam
219a5(rgyud 'bum): tshig brjod do/ / slob min bu min ma yin te// dam tshig can la dam tshig bstan// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad ni// dag pa nyid ni pad+ma bzhin// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas las
219a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin bris la mchod pa rnam pa bzhis mchod do/ / sangs rgyas thams cad yid kyis te// phyag na rdo rje'i tshig gis so// lus kyis 'jig rten mgon po ste// nam mkha'i snying po las kyis
219a7(rgyud 'bum): so/ / las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang pos sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di gsungs so// ras la bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang po ri rab ri'i rtse mo na rang
219b1(rgyud 'bum): gi ting nge 'dzin du zhugs shing / de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad mtha' kun tu bzhugs par dri/ de nas zla ba yar gyi chos zhag gcig nas brtsams nas rtag tu thams cad dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyun du/
219b2(rgyud 'bum): bzlas te/ nam spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i zhal nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byung nas sgrub pa po'i pad+mo'i dbus su bzhugs te/ yang de las gzhan pa'i sku byung nas sgrub pa po'i dbang bskur ba'i
219b3(rgyud 'bum): gnas su brtan par 'gyur gyi bar du bzlas so/ / de nas spyan ras gzigs kyi skur kun gyur te/ skad cig gcig gis bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro zhing ldog go// sems can thams cad
219b4(rgyud 'bum): kyang mthong ste/ tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// de nas sgrub pa 'byung ste/ 'bum bzlas na sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// nyis 'bum bzlas na mtshams med pa la sogs
219b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sdig pa thams cad ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ / sum 'bum bzlas na bsod nams thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// de nas dngos grub thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs
219b6(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / bshes gnyen thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya chen po bcings te stong phrag brgya bzlas pa'i mjug tu mtshan thal byung bzlas na/ de'i
219b7(rgyud 'bum): nang par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byon nas de'i snying khar zhugs te/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thob bo// yang na khar zhugs na spyan ras gzigs dbang po thob bo// de nas ma bsgrubs
220a1(rgyud 'bum): kyang las su 'gyur ba ni dang po brjod pas bdag srung ngo / / gnyis brjod pas ni gzhan dang / grong dang / grong khyer srung ngo // gsum pa brjod pas ni las thams cad byed do// dpang
220a2(rgyud 'bum): pa ni tsan dan gyi bdug pas so/ / gdon thams cad zhi bar bya ba ni hrIHzhes bya bas so// sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba ni rdo rje me tog bzlas te byin no// sems can thams cad mnan pa ri sa ser
220a3(rgyud 'bum): pos so/ / bud med dbang du bya ba ni su ma na'i me tog la bsngags pas so// chom rkun mnan pa ni yung kar gyi sbyin sreg gis so// ri dgas dang bya mnan pa ni yungs kar gtor bas so// sgyu ma
220a4(rgyud 'bum): mnan pa ni rma bya'i chang bus so/ / rmi lam mthong bar bya ba ni dus gsum du bzlas pas so// rmi lam ngan pa gzhil ba ni til gyi sbyin sreg gis so// sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba ni khyim bya'i
220a5(rgyud 'bum): sgrosgo'i sbyin sreg gis so/ / bu mo thor bu ngabang du bya ba ni bu mo'i skra'i sbyin sreg gis so// yugs sa mo dbang du bya ba ni bud med kyi me tog gi sbyin sreg gis so// bud med thams cad dbang du bya ba ni
220a6(rgyud 'bum): bud med kyi dbang po'i sbyin sreg gis so/ / 'dod pa thams cad dbang du bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang po la mchod pa byas nas nub gsum rangs par bzlas na/ de nas 'dod pa tham
220a7(rgyud 'bum): cad rtag tu thob par 'gyur ro/ / spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i spyan sngar nyin re zhing dus gsum du lan gsum bzlas na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba gsum gyis re ba ci 'dod pa'i mchog stsol
220b1(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar zla ba gsum gyi bar du nyin mtshan gsum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pas mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i
220b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po las/ spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rtog pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di
220b3(rgyud 'bum): skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal por rang gi snying po 'bul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol
220b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dis sems can thams cad dbang skur ba thob pa la sogs pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems
220b5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' la/ skyes bu chen po smos shig ces bka' stsal te/ de nas 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so// traM bA bA Ta Ta ha ha/
220b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas 'di brjod pas nam mkha' la dbang bskur ba thams cad la sogs pa rin po che'i rgyan thams cad dang / gos dang / gser dang / nor rin po che'i dbyig la sogs pa thams cad kyi char bab
220b7(rgyud 'bum): po/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi sku kun tu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te bzhugs so// de nas nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpas dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin
221a1(rgyud 'bum): te/ / rdo rje rin chen mnyam ldan zhing // grwa brgyad shin tu mnyam par bya// rin chen kun dang ldan par bya// der slob dpon zhugs te rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya dbang bskur ba'i gnas
221a2(rgyud 'bum): su gzhag la zhugs nas 'di zhes brjod do/ / re ba thams cad grub pa yi// nam mkha' grub pa mchog yin te// grub cig grub cig sems chen po// bcom ldan thams cad grub par ro// de nas
221a3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' byin gyis rlob par mdzad do/ / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su nam mkha'i snying po'i cha lugs gzhag la/ de'i thad 'khor kun tu phyag na
221a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa brgyad gzhag par bya'o/ / de nas slob ma rdo rje khu tshur gyis gzhug go// bcu ga nas 'di skad ces brjod do// sems can kun la phan phyir dang // bsam pa thams cad rdzogs
221a5(rgyud 'bum): bya'i phyir/ / don zhes bstan pa gang yin de// byang chub sems ni bstan pa yin// de nas sbyin pa rnam pa bzhi bslab bo// de la dbang bskur ba sbyin pa dang / nor sbyin pa dang / zas sbyin pa dang / chos sbyin pa'o/
221a6(rgyud 'bum): / del dbang bskur ba sbyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la'o// nor sbyin pa ni sems can thams cad la'o// zas sbyin pa ni byol song thams cad la'o// chos sbyin pa ni sems can mi snang ba thams cad la
221a7(rgyud 'bum): 'o/ / de nas snying po byin la rin po che thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur te 'di zhes brjod do// oM badz+ra rat+na b+ha kI She a b+hi Shi ny+tsa sarbA nA bi t+ye hUM bA bA Ta Ta saH/ de nas rdo rje
221b1(rgyud 'bum): / nor bu'i khu tshur gyis phyag rgya bslab ste/ sngags ni 'di'o// hUM bA taH/ de nas rdo rje rin po che phyag rgya bcings te/ sngags ni 'di'o// oM bA bA ta mu baM/ de nas mchod pa rnam bzhi bya ste 'byung ngo //
221b2(rgyud 'bum): dbang thams cad bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas rdo rje rin po che'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ rdo rje rin po che dbus su bris la/ lag tu nor bu thogs nas rdo rje rin po che langs kyi bar du bzlas so//
221b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa byon te dbang bskur bar mdzad do// dbang bskur ba des na thams cad kyi dbang por 'gyur ro// rin po che'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor te/ nam mkha'i
221b4(rgyud 'bum): snying po'i cha lugs bris la/ spyan sngar nor dang / gser dang / mu tig dang / nor bu rin po che la sogs pa gang yang rung ba bzhag la/ de nas de btsud de thams cad bstan nas dam tshig 'di sbyin
221b5(rgyud 'bum): no/ / sangs rgyas la sogs sems dpa' dag/ gal te nyin re mchod stong na// khyod kyis nor dang don bsags pa// tshe rabs kun tu 'jig par 'gyur// de la 'di ni mna'i snying po'o// oM bA ha
221b6(rgyud 'bum): TaT ya swA hA/ de nas chus dbang bskur ro// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// las kyi dkyil 'khor bris la de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya ste/ de'i dbus su bzhag nas der
221b7(rgyud 'bum): btsud de/ de nas las rnam pa lnga bslab pa ni// 'di lta ste/ dbang sbyin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa bya'o// de nas nor sbyin pa ni dge sbyong dang bram ze la sogs pa la ci nus kyis
222a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyin no/ / de nas pas sbyin pa ni byol song rnams la sbyin no// de nas mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa ni gyod khrid thams cad la sbyin no// de nas chos sbyin pa ni mi snang ba'i sems can rnams la
222a2(rgyud 'bum): sbyin no/ / las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas sgrub pa 'byung ste/ ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa// rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba bris te/ de'i g.ya
222a3(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po bcom ldan 'das la dbang bskur ba'i 'phreng bas dbang bskur ba'o/ / g.yon phyogs su bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o//
222a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas ras la bris pa de'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas pa'i 'jug tu nyi ma shar ba nas brtsams te/ phyi de nyin gyi nyi ma shar gyi bar du bzlas na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po ras la bris pa de
222a5(rgyud 'bum): las byung nas sgrub pa po de la rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro/ / dbang bskur ba de nas de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de nas ma bsgrubs par yang las su 'gyur ba ni 'bum
222a6(rgyud 'bum): bzlas na don thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ / phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na gter chen po rnyed do// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na spyan
222a7(rgyud 'bum): ras gzigs dbang pos phun sum tshogs pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ / nam mkha'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na rgyal srid thob bo// rdo rje khu tshur gyi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na
222b1(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' la khu tshur bcings pas gser gyi dong tshe 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpal gzhon nu la bltas te 'bum bzlas na chos kyi nor dang gzungs thob bo// des nor yang skye bar byed do// rdo rje 'khor lo
222b2(rgyud 'bum): srin lag gi sor mos mnan te 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo skor bar 'gyur ro/ / nam mkha'i mdzod kun nas 'khyud de 'bum bzlas pas nam mkha' las nor thams cad dang zas thams cad kyi yo byad
222b3(rgyud 'bum): zad mi shes par 'gyur ro/ / byams pa la bltas te 'bum bzlas na bcom ldan 'das byams pa byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan rnams kyi dbang mchog byin nas slar yang 'ong ngo // de phyin chad 'dod
222b4(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi nor gyi bdag por 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ nam mkha'i snying po'i rtog pa'o// // de nas rdo rje khu tshur
222b5(rgyud 'bum): gyis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'dus pa'i 'khor thams cad bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa
222b6(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul bar bgyi ste/ bdag gis bskal pa stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la rdo rje'i ri rab de bzhin gshegs pa las blangs te/ des 'jig rten gyi khams thams
222b7(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi sems can rnams grub pa thams cad grub par byas te/ de'i bskyed pa nas de bzhir gshegs pa rdzogs kyi bar du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rdo rje khu tshur byang chub
223a1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so legs so// rdo rje khu tshur khyod kyis smros shig/ de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
223a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g.yos par byas nas rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so/ / oM ru Tu ru Tu hUM ma tha/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
223a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'dzin dang / 'khor thams cad dang bcas nas ri rab ri'i rtse mor bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/ lag pa gnyis kyis rang gi khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcings nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
223a4(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi byang chub la dmigs shing / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor chen por gyur nas bkod do// de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyag rgyas btab nas dkyil 'khor
223a5(rgyud 'bum): chen po 'di gsungs so/ / de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'dra ba ni// rdo rje khu tshur zhes gsungs so// de yi dbus su sems chen po// rdo rje khu
223a6(rgyud 'bum): tshur gzhag par bya/ / rdo rje khu tshur rdo rjer bcas// lag pa gnyis ni btsir bar bya// de yi ngos ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas gzugs rnams gzhag par bya// de dag gi ni grwa kun tu// byang chub sems
223a7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' kun bri'o/ / de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir rdo rje slob dpon gyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te zhugs la 'di rjod cig/ hUM da k+Shi Ni sma ra Na dzaT/ de nas bcom
223b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur slob dpon la grub par gyur te/ de la phyag rgya'ang brtan par 'gyur zhing sus kyang dbye bar mi nus so// de nas snying po 'dis bdag gi snying khar dgrol lo// oM badz+ra muSh+Ti muH/ de nas
223b2(rgyud 'bum): slob ma gzhug pa ste/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdo rje dang bcas pa/ 'phreng ba dang bcas par bya ste/ de bzhin du ras dmar pos mig gnyis bkab ste/ de nas 'di zhes brjod do//
223b3(rgyud 'bum): deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyas btab pa ni chos kyi phyag rgya dang // rdo rje 'dzin gyi rdo rje'i phyag rgyas kyang btab bo// khyod chos dang rdo rje las gang 'dod/ des smras pa/
223b4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis ka'o zhe na/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i cha lugs blangs nas 'phreng ba de'i mgo la bzhag ste/ dgrol ba'i snying po de nyid kyis phyag rgya snying khar dgrol lo//
223b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas lag tu sbyin pa ni lag pa g.yon par rdo rje'o// g.yas par de bzhin gshegs pa'o// de ste de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes zer na/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid sbyin no// de ste rdo rje'o zhes
223b6(rgyud 'bum): zer na/ de'i lag pa g.yon par rdo rje byin la 'di skad sgo zhig/ 'di gnyis ni khyod kyi grub par dmigs la rtag tu mchod pa gyis shig/ de nas gdong g.yogs pa bkrol la dkyil 'khor ston la 'di smos
223b7(rgyud 'bum): shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje rnams// bsdus pa khu tshur zhes bya ste// bcings na rdo rje khu tshur bshad// de nas snying po byin la phyag rgya bcing ba slobs
224a1(rgyud 'bum): shig/ dam tshig gi khu chur zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khod chen po rdul bzhin du/ kyil 'khor thams cad yang dag pri ni le ma tshigs
224a2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas sku lus gzhag par bya/ / thams cad rgyan gyi brgyan pa yi// rdo rje khu tshur kun 'dzin pa'o// de yi ngos ni thams cad du// phyag rgya bzhi ni bri bar bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus rnams su//
224a3(rgyud 'bum): rdorje rin chen yang de bzhin// de bzhin rdo rje pad+mo'i dbus// rdo rje rgya gram bri bar bya// grwa yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// mchod pa rnam bzhi bri bar bya// de nas btsud nas phyag rgya kun// bcing
224a4(rgyud 'bum): ba yang ni bslab par bya/ / sgrub pa gsang ba dag dang ni// bskul ba gsang ba bslab par bya/ 'di rnams thams cad kun bris nas// sgrubs shig ces ni brjod par bya// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor ro//
224a5(rgyud 'bum): de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ de bzhin du mtshan ma bzhag nas 'di zhes brjod do// ci ste dkyil 'khor ma mthong na// phyag rgya shes pa bstan pa ni// rdo rje rin chen rgyal ba dang //
224a6(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs pas khyod gsod par 'gyur// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste// dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris la/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi spyan sngar phyag
224a7(rgyud 'bum): rgya'i las bslab bo/ / de la phyag rgya bcings pa ni 'di'o// rdo rje bcing ba kun byas la// sor mo thams cad dgug bya ste// rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya dang // rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya bcing // de nas lag
224b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyag rgya bcing ngo / / de lta bur mi ldan na 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pas ni dam tshig chen po yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi snying po thang cig bzlas pas phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya ste/ thams
224b2(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi ni ma yin no/ / las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi sgrub pa 'byung ste/ 'o ma 'thung zhing rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na sngar
224b3(rgyud 'bum): bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ / de nas ras la bri bar bya ste/ ras la bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rdo rje khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bris la/ phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rdo rje
224b4(rgyud 'bum): khu tshur bcings pa rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i dar gyis bcings la/ / de'i thad 'khor thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang phyag
224b5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis ka de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khu tshur du bcing bar bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin du snyoms par zhugs par bya'o// de nas de'i spyan sngar de bzhin
224b6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur bcings la/ stong phrag brgya bzlas pa'i mjug tu zhag bdun sbyangs nas bdag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur bsgoms la mtshan thal byung du bzlas so//
224b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas nam phyed nas 'dod kyi las sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'di rjod cig/ oM badz+ra maSh+Ti san phan sarba mA ra Na phaT/ de nas nang par gyi dus na bcom ldan 'das thams cad byon te lus kun
225a1(rgyud 'bum): tu 'jug go/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// yang ras kyi cho ga 'byung ste/ ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
225a2(rgyud 'bum): pargyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bris te/ de'i g.yas phyogs su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ sku mdog sngo bsangs ut+pal sngon po lta bu/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag g.yon
225a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje bsnams pa/ g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa ste/ de'i g.yas su bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje'i dam tshig gi khu tshur can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gzhon nu ma dam tshig gi lu
225a4(rgyud 'bum): tshur gyis rdo rje dam du 'tshir ba mdog dmar por bya'o/ / de'i thad du rdo rje'i gsal phur ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ spyan gsum pa/ lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje gsal phur thogs pa'o// bcom ldan
225a5(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyi g.yon phyogs su spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po thor tsugs kyi dbu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ pad+mo dang mchod sprin gyi phyag tu byas la/ de'i g.yon du pad+mo chen po'i rdo rje byang chub sems
225a6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' rdo rje'i sde zhes bya ba'o/ / de'i g.yon du rdo rje'i dpal mo dang / rdo rje pho nya mo'o// rdo rje dpal mo ni gser gyi sku mdog go/ dpal gyi gzugs 'chang ba phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje ponya mo na
225a7(rgyud 'bum): mdog sngon mo la rdo rje khar ba 'chang ba'o/ / de nas zla ba yar gyi ngo tshos gcig nas brtsams te/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ gzugs kyi ras de las phaT
225b1(rgyud 'bum): ces bya ba thos na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje 'grub par 'gyur te/ de phyin chad nam mkha'i dkyil na spyod cing 'dod pa'i ma snang bar yang 'gyur/ dpag tshad stong du phar yang 'gro zhing
225b2(rgyud 'bum): gyen du'ang 'gro'o/ / ci 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur ro// kun tu 'khyil pas 'khyil pa'i skra can lo bcu drug lon pa'i lus su gyur nas 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la ci 'dod pa bzhin longs
225b3(rgyud 'bum): spyod par 'gyur ro/ / rdo rje khu tshur bcings pas sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang / chad pas gcad pa la sogs pa thams cad nus par 'gyur ro// gzugs bzang po bskal par gnas
225b4(rgyud 'bum): shing / rga ba dang shi bar yang mi 'gyur ro// yang cho ga gzhan te/ ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bris la// de'i g.yas phyogs su phyag na rdo rje rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa
225b5(rgyud 'bum): sku mdog ut+pal sngon po'i kha dog/ phyag na rdo rje dang bcas pas rdo rje khu tshur bcings te sbyar la bcom ldan 'das la 'dud par bya/ de'i g.yon phyogs su bcom ldan 'das ma dam tshig gi khu tshur rgyan
225b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis brgyan pa yid tsam 'dud pa/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal ba/ lag pa g.yas pa na a mra'i 'bras bu 'bul ba/ g.yon pa na rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje 'dzin to// de nas ras
225b7(rgyud 'bum): la bris pa'i spyan sngar zhag gsum sbyangs la/ gu gul gyi ril bu sran ma tsam du ru ka'i 'bru mar la bsnyugs pa brgyad stong dub med pa'i mdag ma la sreg go// de nas gzugs de 'gul te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal
226a1(rgyud 'bum): nas 'od zer 'byung ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyis mchog stsol ba ni/ rgyal po 'am/ 'khor lo bskor ba 'am/ lha ma yin pa dbang ba 'am/ sa brjod pa 'am
226a2(rgyud 'bum): sa'i 'og brjod pa 'am/ khams brjod pa 'am/ 'dod pa'i khams mi snang ba 'am/ nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// yang sgrub pa gzhan gyi cho ga ste/ ras la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur rgyan thams cad
226a3(rgyud 'bum): kyis brgyan pa bris la/ de bzhin du rdo rje dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa ut+pa la sngon po'i mdog tu byas la/ de'i spyan sngar dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur bcings te/ stong phrag brgya bzlas pa'i
226a4(rgyud 'bum): mjug nyin mtshan gsum thal byung bzlas na nam phyed nas bcom ldan 'das nyid byon te mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro/ / ras sam/ shing le ba bam/ rtsig ngos la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur de bzhin du
226a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje dang a mra'i 'bras bu thogs par byas te/ de'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa tsam gyis las thams cad gdon mi za bar byed par 'gyur ro// de nas ma bsgrubs pa'i
226a6(rgyud 'bum): las rnams 'byung ste/ / rdo rje dam tshig gi khu tshur bcings nas 'bum zlos na khu tshur bcings pas nam mkha'a' 'gro bar 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yon pas rdo rje nga a pa dong khu tshur bcings na phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i gzugs 'byung bar 'gyur
226a7(rgyud 'bum): bani 'bum bzlas so/ / lag pa g.yon pas rdo rje khu nur bcings te stong phrag brgya bzlas mkhu tshur bcings pa des mi snang bar 'gyur ro// phral na snang bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje bcing ba'i khu tshur byas la
226b1(rgyud 'bum): 'bum bzlas ma bu tshur bcangs pas bcing ba dang / nges par bya ba dang / gnyid log par bya ba thams cad nus par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la rdo rje khu tshur bcangs te 'bum bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur bung
226b2(rgyud 'bum): pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la nor dang / gser dang / mu tig dang / rgyan dang / rin po che dang / gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / me dang / chu dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / myu gu
226b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / yi ge dang / 'thab cha dang / ston skyobs dang / mtshon cha dang / glegs bam dang / rtog pa dang / mdo sde dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku la sogs pa dngos po gnas pa dang / 'gro ba ci
226b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa dgug par byed do/ / g.yas pa rdo rje khu tshur bcangs la 'bum bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur bstan pas gnas pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad dgug pa dang / 'dren pa dang / 'gyel bar nus
226b5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / khu tshur bsgyur bas thams cad gtan 'pho nus par 'gyur ro// g.yas pas rdo rje khu tshur bcangs la stong phrag brgya bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur byabs pas thams cad las nor dang / gser dab
226b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyan dang / gos dang / mtshon cha dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa dngos po thams cad 'gug go/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya las dam pa thams cad
226b7(rgyud 'bum): kyang 'gug go/ / bud med kyi num dang / mngal phyogs dang / mig dang / sna dang / mchu dang / rna ba dang / mgo dang / brla dang / ska rags dang / gsang khru la sogs pa dngos
227a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyang 'gug go/ / bkrol na thar bar 'gyur ro// nyin zhag gcig sbyang la lag pa gnyis rdo rje kha tshur bcangs te/ stong phrag brgya bzlas na de phyin chadang khu tshur bcas
227a2(rgyud 'bum): pas las thams cad byed do/ / de la las rnams ni dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / rengs par bya ba dang / rmugs par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang /
227a3(rgyud 'bum): gnyid log pa dang / bslang ba dang / drang ba dang / bsgyel ba dang / brdabs pa dang / bskrad pa dang / dbye ba dang / go bzlog pa dang / gtan 'pho ba dang / gso ba dang / sgyu ma thams
227a4(rgyud 'bum): cad bstan pa dang / dus tshig bsgyur ba dang / sa la sogs pa g.yo ba dang / thams cad la dbab pa dang / dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang / gar byed pa dang / glu len pa dang / sngon ma byung ba
227a5(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba dang / so sor lung ston pa dang / 'khrul 'khor thams cad gzhom pa dang / sgo thams cad dbye ba dang / gdon thams cad 'jug pa dang / dug thams cad bslang ba dang / ma rung
227a6(rgyud 'bum): par bya ba dang / thams cad spo ba dang / thams cad kyi phyag rgya gzhom pa dang / thams cad 'gebs pa dang / gas pa sbyar ba dang / sbrul bslad pa dang / gzung ba dang / gtang ba dang
227a7(rgyud 'bum): ser ba dang / char dbab pa dang / glog dbyung ba dang / thams cad slar gcad pa dang / sngan chad med pa'i gos dang / rgyan dang / rin po che dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / skyes pa dang
227b1(rgyud 'bum): bud med dang / bya dang / ri dgas dgug pa dang / gtong ba dang / gzugs mang po ston pa dang / mi snang ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba bstan pa la sogs pa 'dod pa bzhin las thams cad
227b2(rgyud 'bum): byed par 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi rtog pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur
227b3(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rang gi snying po 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa 'dir stsal bar bgyi ste/ gang brjod pa tsam gyis
227b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzod brjod par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis smros shig ces gsungs so// de nas
227b5(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/ a ra pa tsa na/ de nas 'di brjod ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid las yi ge mnyam pa nyid sems can thams
227b6(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i grub pa thob par 'gyur ba bshad do/ / de nas dkyil 'khor 'byung ba ste/ 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor yar gyi ngo tshas bcu bzhi 'am bco lnga la bris te/ de'i dbus
227b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi lte bar 'jam dpal bzhugs par bya'o/ / rdo rje ral gri dang glegs bam thogs par byas la/ de'i thad 'khor thams cad yi ge a ra pa tsa na la sogs pa'i 'phreng ba bri bar bya'o// de nas slob
228a1(rgyud 'bum): dpon gyis rdo rje ral gri dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la zhugs te/ niSh+Ta pany+tsa gra/ zhes pa'i yi ge 'di lnga brjod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis slob dpon la thogs
228a2(rgyud 'bum): pa med pa'i spobs pa'ang stsol te/ de phyin chad bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' la yi ger bris te thams cad gsung ngo // de bzhin du slob ma bcug ste 'di zhes smros shig/ deng khyod kyis de bzhin
228a3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i chos thob par 'gyur gyis/ snying po 'di khyod kyis su la'ang ma smra zhig/ de la gsang ba'i yi ge 'di rnams so// a ra pa tsam zhes bya ba ste/ 'dod pa thams cad thob bo// de ci
228a4(rgyud 'bum): phyir zhe na/ a zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'o// ra zhes bya ba ni chags pa'o// pa zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'o// tsa zhes bya ba ni spyod pa'o// na zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin med pa'o// de ltar 'dod pa dang /
228a5(rgyud 'bum): chags pa dang / don dam pa dang / spyod pa dang / rang bzhin med pa nyid kyi snying po 'di bsgoms te bsgrubs na 'dod pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dod pa thams
228a6(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi snod yin te/ de bas na snying po 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin kyang myur du thob par 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya bcing ba bslab bo// spros pa med pa'i mchog ces bya'o//
228a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas ral gri'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ de bzhin du rdo rje dkyil 'khor bris la/ de'i dbus su ral gri bzhag ste/ mdun du snying po 'di bsgrubs na/ des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bsgrubs par 'gyur
228b1(rgyud 'bum): ro/ rdo rje ral gri'i dkyil 'khor ro// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ni dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul bzhin du bIl zhugs nas 'di zhes brjod do// a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM/ A d+ya nud pan na twAta/ a we u0f7f b
228b2(rgyud 'bum): a ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste thog ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ro/ / zhes nang par langs nas nyin re lan re brjod na mtshams med pa thams cad kyis mi gos so// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas
228b3(rgyud 'bum): las kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag nas mchod pa rnam pa bzhis mchod pa ni 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / sgom pas
228b4(rgyud 'bum): so/ / las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas sgrub 'dod pas dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ras la bris nas/ yi ge 'phreng ba thams cad brjod de 'di skad du/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyi sgrub pa'o zhes
228b5(rgyud 'bum): kyang brjod nas/ yi ge 'di 'bum bzlas na spobs pa mi zad par 'jam dpal dang mtshungs pa dang / nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas ma bsgrubs kyang las su 'gyur ba ni lan cig bzlas
228b6(rgyud 'bum): pas sdug bsngal thams cad las grol lo/ / gnyis bzlas pas mtshams med pa thams cad lhag ma ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro// gsum bzlas pas ting nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur ro// ba
228b7(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pas dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / lnga bzlas pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la yi ge 'phreng
229a1(rgyud 'bum): ba g.yas phyogs nas a zhes bya ba'i drung du na zhes bya ba phyin gyi bar du bri'o/ / de nas bskor zhing yi ge 'bum bzlas te/ yi ge re re 'bum rdzogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg+sa
229a2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / phyag na rdo rje cig car 'grub ste/ nyin re zhing mthong bar bstan nas chos bshad de slar gshegs so// tshe 'di nyid las sangs rgyas pa man chad kyang stsol to//
229a3(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i rtog pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rdo rje 'khor lo byang chub
