229a6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das la rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM badz+ra tsakra hUM/ de nas 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor de nyid du zhugs
229a7(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de nas rdo rje 'khor lo byang chub sems dpas dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// rdo rje 'khor lo bzhin bris la// rdo rje 'khor lo bdag che ba// rang gi lag na phyag rgya thogs// de yi dbus su gzhag
229b1(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ de yi thad 'khor thams cad du// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshogs rnams bri// de yang sems can chen po rnams// de dag nyid ni legs par bri// de nas blo ldan thog ma ru// rdo rje 'khor
229b2(rgyud 'bum): los 'jug par bya/ / zhugs nas snying po 'di bzlas so// dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes brjod na// des bcom ldan 'das dgyes te grub pa thams cad du stsol to// de bzhin du slob ma bcug nas de nyid du bsgrub
229b3(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ rdo rje 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bya ba'o// rdo rje 'khor lo'i dbus su rdo rje bris/
229b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du bzlas na rdo rje 'dzin du 'gyur ro// rdo rje dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris nas mtshan ma bzhag ste 'di zhes brjod do// rdo rje 'khor lo 'jug pa yis// mthong dang de bzhin
229b5(rgyud 'bum): bsgrubs na ni/ / rtog pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// de bas brtags te bsgrub par bya// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor bris pa de nyid do// phyag rgya shes pa sgrub pa'i phyir//
229b6(rgyud 'bum): brtson 'grus brtan pas thams cad kyi// bla na med pas bslab par bya// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam gyis ma sgrubs par las thams cad byed de/ ji ltar dga'
229b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i cho ga 'am rtog pa las bshad pa sgrubs shig/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje 'khor lo'i rtog pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan
230a1(rgyud 'bum): 'das la nam mkha'i mdzod byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i
230a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po skul bar bgyi ste/ snying po gang brjod pa tsam gyis mchod pa thams cad kyi gnas su 'gyur ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis smros shig ces gsungs so// de nas nam
230a3(rgyud 'bum): mkha' mdzod kyis gsungs pa/ oM ga ga na saM b+ha ba badz+ra pA tsa ho/ de nas de'i dus bcom ldan 'das kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad la nam mkha' las mchod pa kun 'byung bar byas so// de nas dkyil
230a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor 'byung ste/ rdo rje 'khor lo bzhin du bri// de yi dbus su nor chen te// nam mkha' dang por bzhugs par bya// rgyal ba kun gyis bskor ba bya'o// dang por slob dpon 'jug pa ni// mchod
230a5(rgyud 'bum): pa kun mchog phyag rgyas so/ / dkyil 'khor de ru zhugs nas ni// rdo rje thams cad brjod par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'grub ste// de bzhin du slob ma'ang bcug nas rdo rje thams cad
230a6(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig gi snying po 'di brjod la phyag rgya'ang spobs shig/ mchod pa thams cad ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ste// yid kyis dkyil 'khor bris la der zhugs
230a7(rgyud 'bum): shig/ zhugs nas 'di skad rjod cig/ 'di dag thams cad ni nam mkha' nyid de/ bden pa gang gi nam mkha' gzugs med pa las gzugs 'byung ba des na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
230b1(rgyud 'bum): / la mchod pa dang / yid la 'dod pa'i grub pa thams cad nam mkha' las 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas nas 'dug ste/ rdo rje kun gyi phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na/ de nas nam mkha' las
230b2(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa'i rnam pa thams cad dang / don thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor bris nas btsud de 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig
230b3(rgyud 'bum): go zhes rjod cig/ 'byung ba kun las nam mkha' ni// 'byung ba chen po lnga pa'o// nam mkha' la ni 'dod pa 'byung // 'dod pa'i mchod pa grub gyur cig/ ces smras nas/ 'dis khyod kyis de bzhin
230b4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad mchod cig ces sgo zhig/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// slob ma nam mkha' la yid kyis dkyil 'khor 'drir bcug la/ der slob ma yid kyis mchod pa'ang slobs shig/
230b5(rgyud 'bum): yid kyis 'di skad rjod cig/ nam mkha'i mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod do zhes nyin re zhing byas na 'grub bo// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i
230b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po las/ nam mkha' mdzod kyi rtog pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'phags pa byams pa byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
230b7(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po sgrol bar bgyi ste/ gang brjod pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems
231a1(rgyud 'bum): skye bar 'gyur ba'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu smros shig ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das byams pa byang chub sems dpas rang gi ming po 'di gsungs
231a2(rgyud 'bum): so/ / oM me tri dr-i n+ta tsi ta tiSh+Tha ho/ de nas 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te bzhugs so// de nas dkyil 'khor 'byung
231a3(rgyud 'bum): ste/ 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bris pa der byams pa gzhag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi dang / byang chub sems dpa' bzhi bya ste/ cho ga bstan pa'i phyag rgyas zhugs la 'di zhes brjod
231a4(rgyud 'bum): ngo/ badz+ra dr-i D+ha tiSh+Tha/ de nas byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas slob ma de bzhin du dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad du 'jug pa'i tshul gyis btsud do// btsud nas byams pa chen po'i phyag
231a5(rgyud 'bum): rma bslab ste/ de nas go chas bskon no// bstan pa chen po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas byams pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ byams pas zhugs la byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgrubs shig/
231a6(rgyud 'bum): byams pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor du bcug la 'di zhes brjod do// rangs sam yang na khros kyang rung // mdza' dang sdang ba de bzhin te// 'gro las gal te rgyal 'dod na// byam
231a7(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po sgom par gyis/ / dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor du btsud la 'di bslab bo// sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can thams cad dge bar gyur cig
231b1(rgyud 'bum): 'byung po thams cad la byams pa dang / byol song thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin no// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// byams pa bsgoms pas grub pa thams cad ci 'dod pa'i sgrub
231b2(rgyud 'bum): pas sgrub bo/ / las rnams kyang yid kyis ci dad pa'i cho ga dang byams pas sgrubs shig/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ byams pa'i rtog pa'o// /
231b3(rgyud 'bum): / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la rdo rje rig pa'i dam tshig la sogs pas mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po
231b4(rgyud 'bum): phul ba/ oM dri/ oM b+hin+da badz+ra shU la/ oM ts+tshin+d+ra hUM tsakra phaT/ oM b+hur b+hu ba swa swA hA/ oM ha na b+hin+da badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM la la la la a b+hi shi g+har+b+ha Tan/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/
231b5(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor zlum po'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwa'i srad bu'i dbus su dbang phyug chen po bri/ der gzhan dag kyang rim gyis thams cad bri ba 'am/ gzhag pa 'am/ mthar ni tshon gyi thig le'ang gzhag
231b6(rgyud 'bum): go/ / de nas thog mar slob dpon gyis gsal phur gsum pa'i rtags kyi phyag rgya bcings la 'dug go// g.yon logs nas rdo rje'i slob ma'ang bcug ste/ de nas phyag rgya'ang bslab bo// de phyin chad tham cad
231b7(rgyud 'bum): 'grub cing 'jig rten thams cad kyi rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rig pa'i blon po chen po'i rtog pa'o// / de nas rdo rje 'khyil ba la
232a1(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa rdo rje khro bos 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM a mri ta kuN+Da li kha kha kha kha kro d+ha dzA lA ma la hUM phaT/ oM mahA
232a2(rgyud 'bum): pra ba sbon la c+doMs oMgs da nyan tan tshu Ta/ oM kA la pA shakra A kAT+Ta hU~M phaT/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor gruba'i pa bris la/ de'i dbus su rdo rje gzhag go// phyogs bzhir ni khro bo rnams de bzhin
232a3(rgyud 'bum): du bar chad du byas la dgod do/ / de nas slob dpon bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgyar zhugs nas phyag rgya bcing ba bslab bo// de nas thams cad dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / gtan 'pho ba dang /
232a4(rgyud 'bum): spang ba 'grub bo// rdo rje khro bo'i rtog pa'o// de nas rdo rje srin po la sogs pa tshogs kyi gtso bos snying po 'di rnams phul lo// oM ma hA pA la ka ma hA ga Na de bi ba pi ba ru hrIHran sarba duSh+TAn
232a5(rgyud 'bum): nA phaT/ oM mA la d+ha ra tsa la tsa la ya hUM/ oM d+ha nu ru d+ha ra ba shI ku ru sarba satwA na swA hA/ oM dza ya bi dza ya hUM phaT/ de nas dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ gzhu lta bur dkyil 'khor bris la der rdo rje gzhag
232a6(rgyud 'bum): ge/ g.yas su'ang gnyis/ g.yon du'ang gnyis so// de nas rdo rje srin po'i phyag rgyas btsud do// de nas phyag rgya bslabs nas cho ga bslab pa ni/ gang dge ba dang drin gzo dang / lha yi 'khor mthong
232a7(rgyud 'bum): ma gtogs par/ / gzhan rnams de dag thams cad kun// mi dge ba rnams gtan 'phor bya// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ tshogs kyi gtso bo'i rtog
232b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / / de nas rdo rje gtun shing la sogs pa'i pho nyas rang gi snying po smras pa/ oM lAng ga lI b+h+rUM/ oM ma hA pa tahUM/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la ya swAhA/ oM bi ka Ta b+hai ra ba de hi me sa ra brtu
232b2(rgyud 'bum): phaT/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba ni shing rta dang 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bris te/ dbus su rdo rje bzhag nas rdo rje gtun shing gi phyag rgyas bcug la las 'di bslab bo// mi dge ba'i sems
232b3(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad 'thungs shig/ phrogs shog/ sregs shig/ bo zhig/ de nas phyag rgya bcing ba bslab bo// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ pho nya'i
232b4(rgyud 'bum): tshogs kyi rtog pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rdo rje kyo btang la sogs pa bran rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang 'jig rten gsum las
232b5(rgyud 'bum): / rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// oM bA ra hA daMSh+To da ka Ta ba ga to d+ha ra sarba na kha na kha na hUM phaT/ oM sarba mA ra da Da hUM phaT/ oM bi ka te ka daMSh+Ti b+hin+da hUM phaT/
232b6(rgyud 'bum): oM ma hA ma Ni ha ra ha ra hUM phaT/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'di'o// gru gsum par bris la/ mngon sum par phyag rgyas zhugs nas gar gyi phyag rgya bcing ba bslab ste/ gar gyi mchod pas ni dbus kyi
232b7(rgyud 'bum): / rdorje la mchod do// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ bran gyi rtog pa'o// / de nas ma thams cad kyis ku tsa'i sgra bton te/ gar gyi mchod pa chen
233a1(rgyud 'bum): pos bcom ldan 'das la mchod nas rang rang gi snying po phul lo/ / de nas rdo rje'i blon po chen mo dag gis smras pa/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ra li hUM Ta/ oM badz+ra tsakra tshin+d+ra hUM phaT/ oM
233a2(rgyud 'bum): hUM/ oM badz+ra muSh+Ti phan shin d+ha ha na hUM phaT/ oM ku mA ra ha bi sha g+ha Na ti ke ra Na ti na tsA lA ya sarba duSh+TA na hUM phaT/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa de'i sgor 'khor la sogs pa bri'o// de'i bus su rdo rje dro mar
233a3(rgyud 'bum): memilagan rdo rje rigs la phur chen gzhag go/ / dam tshig gi cho ga ni de bzhin no// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo rnams kyi rtog pa'o//
233a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas rdo rje khro mo rnams kyis rang gi snying po smras pa/ oM a mr-i te hU~M phaT/ oM so mya kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM daN+Da d+hA ri Tha san hUM phaT/ oM paM ga le hUM phaT/ dkyil 'khor rdzar brgyad pa bris te/
233a5(rgyud 'bum): dbus su rdo rje gzhag go// rwa bzhir bgos pa rnams la bzhi po rim gyis gzhag go// 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga ni de nyid do// 'di ni khro mo'i dkyil 'khor ro// 'jig rjen gsum las rnam par rgyal
233a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje khro mo rnams kyi rtog pa'o// / de nas tshogs ma mo rnams kyis smras pa/ oM kharba ma ri NAdz+dza/ oM a sha si ba dz+re sir maho/ oM pA sha sa
233a7(rgyud 'bum): yeng+ga/ oM sarba ra ma Ner ti pri ye po/ de nas de ngag gi dkyil 'khor ni zlum po ste/ sgo bzhi pa dbus su sa ral srang bu byas te/ theg bzhi btab la rim pazhir bri'o// gsan yang phyi'i dkyil ma
233b1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du zlum por thig bzhi rim du btab la/ de'i dbus su gnod sbyin gyi gdong bri'o// ngos bzhir ni rim gyis te/ shar phyogs nas bri ba 'am gzhag par bya'o// sgo bzhir rdo rje'i mngag gzhug
233b2(rgyud 'bum): ma bri ba 'am gzhag par bya'o/ / de'i snying po ni 'di'o// b+hi tsi ri Ti b+h+yo b+h+yo/ de ltar rig pa'i blon mo chen mo la sogs pa thams cad du gyis shig/ 'di thang cig bzlas pas thams cad khugs so//
233b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas gdong g.yogs nas lag pa gnyis kyis rkang pa'i mthe bong gzung ste phyag 'tshal nas skyil mo krung gis gar byed cing zhugs la dbab bo// bcangs nas dam tshig byin cig/ sarba mA ra kha da pi ba de hib
233b4(rgyud 'bum): ras ma ya ho/ de nas de bzhin du dam tshig sbyin no// glu gar dang / sil snyan dang / zas dang / skom gyis thams cad tshim par byas la dril bus phab pa ste/ de nas dngos grub thams cad dang
233b5(rgyud 'bum): bde ba thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rnyed nas/ rnal 'byor dang nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa'ang thob bo zhes smros shig/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa
233b6(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje'i tshogs ma mo'i rtog pa'o// de nas rdo rje pho nya mo rnams kyis smras pa/ oM b+h+yoHoM ka la~M ma ri Ni/ badz+ra rak+Sha sa ha na sa rban TI ma/ oM pU Ta Ne thA/
233b7(rgyud 'bum): ma saka ra bA ka tre hUM phaH/ dkyil 'khor grwa lnga par bris te/ rdo rje grwa'i dbus su gzhag go// bzhi ni rdo rje'i pho nya mo bzhag ste/ ngo cho ga de bzhin du bya'o// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen
234a1(rgyud 'bum): po'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje pho nya mo'i rtog pa'o// / de nas rdo rje bran mo rnams kyis smras pa/ oM dA ra hi badz+ra mu khi dri to ta rA pa ta la sa ma ya ma nu sma ra A bi sha hUM
234a2(rgyud 'bum): phaT/ oM kA li kA pa li mA la d+ha ri Ni ka Ta ka Ta ma Ta ma Ta bi mA ra ya sarba mA ra Ni hUM phaT/ oM pu ta ni u tsusma ru drA khA da sarbA na sho Sha ya swA hA/ oM ma ka ra mu khi ha ra ha ra hUM/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi la
234a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhir bris nas/ de'i dbus su rdo rje bris te/ de bzhin gar gyis mchod do// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ bran mo'i dog pa'o// na
234a4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas/ phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'dzin pa khyod yin no// de bas na rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir ngon yod
234a5(rgyud 'bum): cing myur du grub par bya ba'i phyir gang gis sems can tham cad dngos grub dam pa bde blag tu thob par 'gyur ba'i phyi ma'i rgyud shod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can 'di rnams ni brtson 'grus kyis 'dul
234a6(rgyud 'bum): rang pa dang mi ldan pa/ sdig pa byed pa/ brdzun smra ba/ le lo tsam/ dka' ba spyad pa mi bzod pa/ 'dod chags dang bral bas 'dul ba/ rtag tu chags pa de dag gi don gyi phyir gang gis
234a7(rgyud 'bum): sems can de dag bya ba thams cad byed bzhin pa dang / brtson 'grus med pa dang / dka' ba spyad pa'ang med par bde brag tu tshe 'di nyid la myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba de de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs
234b1(rgyud 'bum): kyis shong cig/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi 'di dag ni yul la mngon par dga' zhing / bdag gi grogs po dang / pha dang / ma dang / bu dang / chung ma rnams mthong 'dod cing / de'ang sred pas 'khol ba ste/
234b2(rgyud 'bum): phyogs nas phyogs su'ang 'gro mi nus na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang rig 'dzin gyi gnas su lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag na rdo rjes phyag 'tshal te phyi ma'i rgyud bshad do// de nas
234b3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa ga la byung // phyag na rdo rje ga las skyes// rdo rje yang ni ga las byung // phyag rgya snying po'i rig pa dang // sngags rnams khyad par ci zhig yod// gsang ba sgrub pa
234b4(rgyud 'bum): ji lta bu/ / phyag rgya bcing ba ji lta bu// de rnams kyi ni de nyid gang // byin gyis brlabs sogs ji lta bu// sgrub pa rnams kyang ji ltar mthong // dngos grub 'dod pa ji lta bu// ras la ri mo ji ltar bri/
234b5(rgyud 'bum): sku gzugs tshad ni ji tsam zhig/ ji ltar bzlas pa bya ba gsungs// ci 'dra bar ni mchod par bgyi// bsod nams med pas ji ltar 'grub// ji ltar grub pa myur bar 'gyur// slob dpon du yang ji ltar 'gyur//
234b6(rgyud 'bum): las rnams bsgrub pa ji ltar bya// de dag gi ni de nyid gang // thams cad bdag la bshad pa'i rigs// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba bstan te/ sems dpa' thog ma tha ma med// nam mkha'
234b7(rgyud 'bum): skye ba'i mtshan nyid do/ / kun tu bzang po thams cad bdag/ 'dod pa 'gro ba bdag po yin// sems can kun sems gang yin pa// brtan pas sems dpa' zhes pa'o// mnyam par gzhag pas ting nge
235a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin/ / nges par rdo rje nyid du 'gyur// de la smras pa/ sems gzugs med pa la ji ltar na sra ba'i rdo rjer 'gyur/ smras pa/ ji ltar rnam par shes pa la sems can skye ban sha
235a2(rgyud 'bum): rus pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba bzhin te/ sdug pa dang / chags pa dang / bde ba dang / rnam par shes pa gzugs med pa rnams 'dus pa las sems can skye ba dang / ji ltar klu rnams khros pas
235a3(rgyud 'bum): sems kyi ting nge 'dzin nges pas nam mkha' la gnam lcags 'byung ba 'am/ glog dang bcas pa 'byung ba de bzhin du nges pa chags pa dag las rdo rje nyid du 'gyur te/ sems dpar byin rlabs sbyor ba yis//
235a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpar yang 'gyur ro// bcom ldan rdo rje de nyid ni// bsgoms pas sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// de la sems dpar byin gyis rlob pa'i sbyor ba gang zhe na/ sems dpa' kun gyi bdag che ba
235a5(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid la yang gnas so zhes/ / byin gyis brlabs nas sems dpa' bdag/ yin zhes nga rgyal bsgom par bya// de nyid bcom ldan sems dpa' ste// rdo rje sems dpa' 'am rgyal ba yin//
235a6(rgyud 'bum): rang sems so sor brtags pa ni// sangs rgyas byang chub de nyid yin// de nyid phyag na rdo rje sde// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis so// 'jig rten dbang po nam mkha' snying // de ltar gzhan yang de nyid do//
235a7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rigs kyang de nyid de// de ni rdo rje 'chang ba'i rigs// de nyid spyan ras gzigs kyi rigs// de nyid nor bu'i rigs yin te// khams gsum de nyid yin zhes gsungs// 'jig rten gsum
235b1(rgyud 'bum): po'ang de nyid do/ / de nyid byed dang 'byin pa po// sems can kun gyi mes po ste// de nyid sems can gnas yin te// 'byung ba che rnams de nyid do// de nyid 'gro ba'i mgon po ste// gnas pa dang ni 'gro ba
235b2(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de kho na chen po zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa dang po'o// / de nas snying po dang / phyag rgya
235b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / sngags dang / rig pa'i khyad par gyi rab tu bya ba ste/ snying po'i khyad par ni gsang ba dang ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// de la sems can gyi don gyi phyir gsang ba brjod pa dang smra ba ni snying po brjod de/ snying
235b4(rgyud 'bum): po brjod pas ni snying gis bsam pa'i grub pa thob ces bya ba ni snying po'i khyad par ro/ / de nas phyag rgya'i khyad par ni// rdo rje'i sku gsung thugs rnams kyi// gzugs brnyan sbyor ba 'di dag ni// phyag rgya
235b5(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi khyad par te/ / 'byung ba yang ni de yis bstan// ji ltar jo bo'i rgyu mthong na// bran rnams 'gal bar mi byed pa// de bzhin rgyal ba nyid rnams kyang // phyag rgya 'da' bar yong mi mdzad// rdo rje'i sku dang
235b6(rgyud 'bum): gsung dang thugs/ / ji ltar gnas dang mthun byas la// mtshan ma'i phyag rgyar ldan pa yi// sems dpa' chen por bdag nyid bsgyur// de ni phyag rgya chen po'o// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// sor
235b7(rgyud 'bum): bsnol bstan pa dam tshig ste/ sems kyi shes rab ldan pa las// gnyis phye las kyi phyag rgya yin// de dag dam tshig rtsa ba ste// rtsa byung bcing ba rgyu yi mchog/ gang gis thams cad lus brtan
236a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / de phyir phyag rgya brjod pa yin// gang gis thams cad rgyas btab pa// chung mi za zhing rab sbas te// mnga' bdag gzugs brnyan 'chang bas na// sgrub pa po
236a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams myur du 'grub/ / gang dag mthong na sangs rgyas dang // sems dpa' la sogs mthong bar 'gyur// dam tshig nyams pas gzir bas na// 'da' bar mi 'gyur grub par 'gyur// phyag rgya
236a3(rgyud 'bum): khyad par de yin te/ / don dam pa'i de kho na nyid kyang phyag rgya chen po zhes bya'o// de la sngags kyi khyad par ni 'di yin te// ngag tsam spros pa med pa ste// sangs rgyas bka' yis grub pa nyid//
236a4(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi tshig gis bskul ba ste// de dag sngags zhes bya ba yin// de la rig pa'i khyad par ni/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa ni med par byed// rig pa de bzhin chud par byed// don rnams rtogs par gyur
236a5(rgyud 'bum): pas na/ / rig pa zhes ni de phyir bya// snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig pa'i rab tu bya ba gnyis pa'o// // de nas phyag rgya bcing ba'i rab tu bya ba bshad do zhes bcom
236a6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das bla na med pa'i phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ / de la phyag rgya chen po de ni de nyid bskul ba'i snying pos bcing ngo // dam tshig dang las kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje bcing ba dang gdab
236a7(rgyud 'bum): pa la sogs pa byas nas bcing ngo / / dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid bskul ba'i snying pos phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgyabs cad bcing po// de'ang ma chags pa dang // slob ma ma yin pa dang / snod ma yin pa
236b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / dad pa meng pa la mi sbyin no// yun du sbyang na de dag kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// de la de kho na nyid bskul ba'i snying po 'di'o// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de la dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid bskul ba'i snying po ni 'di yin
236b2(rgyud 'bum): no/ / sa ma ya ho su ra ta s+t+waM/ rdo rje khro bos phyag rgya thams cad rang gis bcing ngam/ gzhan la bcing du gzhug na ni hUM zhes bya ba thang cig tsam gyis so// de nas rdo rje bcing ba la sogs pa bcing ba 'byung ste/ badz+ra
236b3(rgyud 'bum): ban+d+ha/ zhes brjod la rdo rje bcing ba snying khar chings shig/ de nas snying po 'dis sor mo thams cad brdab par bya'o// oM badz+ra ban+d+ha tA Ta/ 'dis ni phyag rgya thams cad dgug cing dbang du byed do// de nas rdo rje
236b4(rgyud 'bum): ye shes dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ngo / / badz+ra A be sha/ zhes brjod la snying po 'dis rdo rje dbab par bskyed par bya'o// aH/ thams cad dbab pa'i snying po 'di ni gdon mi za ba'o// de nas
236b5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba ni/ badz+ra muSh+Ti/ zhes brjod la bcing ngo // de ste de ltar ma byas na yang / sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes brjod la phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcing
236b6(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi snying po don yod pa 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa ste/ stong bzlas pas phyag rgya bcing ba thams cad
236b7(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya lan cig bzlas na grub pa thams cad la gces par 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya bcing ba 'byung ste/ thal mo sbyar la sor mo phan tshun bsnol ba ni rdo rje'i thal
237a1(rgyud 'bum): 'o/ / de nyid sor mo'i bar rnams su shiH bsdams pa ni rdo rje bcing ba'o// de nyid las mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug ste/ mthe'u chung dang srin lag gi rab du btsugs la bcum
237a2(rgyud 'bum): pa 'di ni rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las mthe bong gnyis gzhibs la nang du gzhug la/ de bzhin du mthe'u chung dang srin lag gi bar du btsugs te/ mdzub mo shin tu bkug pa ni rdo rje wa
237a3(rgyud 'bum): tshur dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las gnyis su byas pa ni las kyi phyag rgya gzhan du 'gyur te/ dam tshig chen po de kho na nyid lan cig brjod la snying kha 'am/ nam mkha' la so sor bcing ngo // ngag
237a4(rgyud 'bum): gi phyag rgya yang / badz+ra dzi hwA/ zhes brjod la phyag rgya bcing ngo // lta ba'i phyag rgya ni snying po'i don gyis bcing ngo // so'i phyag rgya dang / mchu'i phyag rgya dang / mig bsgul ba'i phyag rgya dang / snying dang /
237a5(rgyud 'bum): lus g.yo ba'i phyag rgya ni/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes brjod na bcing ba grub par 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba 'byung ste/ rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub mo ni rdo rje khu tshur du byas la mdzub mo brkyang na
237a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje khro bo zhes bya ba yin no/ / rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub mo gnyis// lag ngar bsnol te bcings nas kyang // mthe'u chung lcags kyu sbrel byas la// hUM zhes pa ni bsdigs par byed// de nyid g.yas pakyo ba tang du
237a7(rgyud 'bum): byas pa ni rdo rje khro bo'i kyo btang ngo / / de la 'di ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// lag mthil dag tu rdo rje bcing // mthe bong gshibs pas bkab pa yis// khu tshur byas pa dam tshig gi/ phyag rgya rdo rje khro bo ste/
237b1(rgyud 'bum): ti rin ti ri zhes bya'o// b+h+rUM ni ngag gi phyag rgya'o// ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni thams cad gsod pa'i khro bo'o// rdo rje'i sa gzhi bcing ba ni rdo rje bcing ba sa la brkyang ste bzhag pa 'dis rdo rje'i sa gzhir 'gyur te/ de la
237b2(rgyud 'bum): sus kyang grags mi rnyeng ngo / / de la 'di ni rdo rje 'dod pa'i khro bo'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bcing ba bcings la mdzub mo rdo rje ltar byas pa ni thams cad la dbang byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje'i dam tshig rdo rje bcings la mdzub
237b3(rgyud 'bum): mo gnyis mnyam par gshibs pas snying khar gtugs shig/ gal te de las 'da' bar byas na snying gas te 'chi'o// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcing la// mdzub mo kyo ba tang du bcings la// dkri zhing phyir dkri byas
237b4(rgyud 'bum): pa ni/ / lha rnams dgug pa'i mchog yin no// rdo rje bcings pa brtan byas la// mdzub mo bkug pa shin tu btsir// mthe bong gnyis ka gshibs pa yis// dbus su btsir ba bar snang gi/ rdo rje khu tshur
237b5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis bcangs la/ / mthe'u chung gnyis ka spel nas su// mdzub mo yi ni rgyab sbyar te// bzlog pa nam mkhar rgyu rnams kyi'o// rdo rje bcing ba brtan byas nas// khu tshur gyis ni sa mnan pa/ 'di ni sa
237b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dam tshig ste/ / thams cad byed pa 'da' bar dka'// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te// g.yon pa'i mdzub mos mdzub mo bcing // mthe'u chung sor mo mnyam brdab pa// 'di ni 'og ma rnams dgug
237b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / mdzub mo gnyis ka brtan po ru// rdo rje bcings pa sbrel bar bya// gung mo mthe bong rdo rjer bya// rgyan rnams thams cad 'joms pa'o// rdo rje dkri ba dang / rdo rje btsir ba dang / rdo rje 'phreng ba dang /
238a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rjes dang / rdo rje sa'i 'og dang / rdo rje he ru ka'o// de la rdo rje shugs kyi phyag rgya ni 'di'o// dkyil 'khor dag ni byed pa na// srad bu 'am yang na ri mo la// 'jug pa dang ni 'byung
238a2(rgyud 'bum): ba ni/ / sgrub pas yid kyis bteg nas so// de la ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i snying po ni 'di'o// oM badz+ra be gahUM/ 'dis ni dam tshig ma nyams par 'gyur ro// gzhan du dam tshig nyams pa grub pa med par
238a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o// dpung pa gnyis rdo rje bcings te rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis su byas la// pus mo btsugs te mgo bo sa la btsugs
238a4(rgyud 'bum): te phyag bya'o/ / phyag na rdo rje la ni de nyid kyis ngang pa'i stabs kyis gnas par byas la/ 'dzum zhing bskyod pa dang / smin ma 'gyed pa dang bcas pa'i mig gis phyag btsal lo// gzhan rnams la ni pus mo
238a5(rgyud 'bum): btsugs pa'o/ / de la rdo rje 'dzin ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba ni 'di yin te/ lag pa gnyis kyi rgyab sbyar nas// mthe bong mthe'u chung sbrel bar bya'o// rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya 'di// sangs rgyas
238a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dbang du byed/ / pra tits+tsha badz+ra/ snying po 'dis me tog gtor ro// rdo rje kyo btang gi phyag rgya ni rdo rje 'dzin ma'i mdzub mo gnyis kyo btang gi tshul du bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs
238a7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / sems can thams cad dgug pa'i dam tshig 'da' bar mi bya ba ste/ dam tshig lcags kyu yin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba 'byung ste/ rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis
238b1(rgyud 'bum): bcings nas/ / g.yas pas bsdams par bya ba ni// rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub mo g.yon// sangs byang chub mchog bsam pa'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni 'di'o//
238b2(rgyud 'bum): mthe bong gnyis ka'i skyil mo krung // mdzub mo gnyis ka dgug par bya// rdo rje thal mo 'od dkyil 'khor// gung mo gnyis ka kha 'byed pa// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya ste/
238b3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dbang du bya ba las 'da' bar mi 'gyur zhing / 'di mthong bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas
238b4(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra bid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ sems ni rnam dag shes bya ba// brtan pas sems dpa' zhes bya'o// mnyam par gzhag pas ting nge 'dzin// nges pas rdo rje nyid du 'gyur// sangs rgyas ngo bo'i
238b5(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid de/ / sems nyid sangs rgyas nyid yin no// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pas// nges par sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur// phyag rgya chen po bcings nas de sgom mo// de nas de bzhin gshegs
238b6(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyis rang gi sems so sor brtags pa la sogs pas sangs rgyas su yongs su sbyar ba byas nas/ ji ltar tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas pa thob par 'gyur te/ de ltar byin gyis rlob pa mdzad do//
238b7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur ni las kyi phyag rgya'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po ni 'di yin no// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// phyag na rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur// rdo rje 'gying ba rab/
239a1(rgyud 'bum): 'byed cing // 'gying dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor// 'di yis kun 'gro skad cig gis// 'ong dang gyen du 'gro bar 'gyur// 'dod pa kun dbang thams cad pa// phyag na rdo rje
239a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dra bar 'gyur/ / de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bcing ba bcings nas kyang // gung mo nang bcug snying khar gzhag/ mthe bong mthe'u chung kha phye mnyam// rdo rje chen po de ltar bcing // sems
239a3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' kun gyi ting 'dzin gyis/ / 'di ni snying khar bcings pa yis// phyag rgya kun gyi dngos grub pa// dam pa dag kyang thob par 'gyur// de la ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni 'di'o// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus
239a4(rgyud 'bum): su ni/ / lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// phyag na rdo rje bdag gi lus// bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis byas la// 'gying bcas rdo rje gsor byas na// 'gying zhing gyen
239a5(rgyud 'bum): du bstan tshul gyis/ / snying khar gzung na 'grub par 'gyur// de la bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni 'di yin no// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la// g.yon pa gzhu 'dren sbyor ba
239a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / / mda' 'phen pa yi tshul gyis su// kun la bsnun na chags par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang bskur ba'i 'phreng ba'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phyag rgya gtsug tor
239a7(rgyud 'bum): du gzhag go/ / de nas phab sde gung mo rdo rjer byas ste/ de las bskor te gung mo nor bur byas la g.yas phyogs su gzhag go// lhag par gung mo'i rdo rje'i pad+mo gzhag go// de las bskor te gung mo
239b1(rgyud 'bum): dang mthe'u chung gyes par byas la g.yon du gzhag go/ / de nas mdzub mo gnyis mdud pa byas te/ 'phreng ba bcing ba'i tshul du lhag par mdud pa byas la/ sor mo thams cad mthe'u chung nas mthar/
239b2(rgyud 'bum): gyis 'jig pa'i tshul gyis dgrol ba ni cod pan gyi tshul bzhin dgrol lo// phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i sems dpa' sgrub par 'dod pas lha mo'i dkyil
239b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor byas te/ de nas nyin gcig cing bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas/ ji lta bu'i dus su ci nus pas ci 'dod pa bde bar byas la// phyag rgya chen po'i tshul gyis glu dbyangs kyis rdo rje'i tshig tu rdo rje sems
239b4(rgyud 'bum): / dpa' bzlas te/ de nas snying po 'di ci 'dod pas bzlas so// oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa dzaHhUM baM ho su ra ta s+t+waM/ de ltar zla ba gcig bzlas te sgrub bo// zla ba gcig lon pa'i mjug tu tshes bco lnga la
239b5(rgyud 'bum): ngal na phyag rgya bkrol la/ rdo rje'i thal mo brkyang nas lus thams cad kyis phyag bya'o// cung zad gnas nas ji ltar ngal bar mi 'gyur bar byas te/ de ltar mtshan rangs par bzlas na de'i nang par bcom
239b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das zla ba'i kha dog zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang mtshungs pa'i 'od can byon te/ sgrub pa po 'khyud nas de'i lus kun tu zhugs so// de nas sgrub pa po'ang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'i 'od can dang /
239b7(rgyud 'bum): zla ba'i 'od can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phreng ba la sogs pa dang / lha'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje 'dzin gyi lus dang / ngag dang / sems rdo rje thams cad dang 'dra bar
240a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / bdag gi rigs dang / gnyen dang / grogs po dang / gnyen pa shes la sogs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis gzugs bzang po mthong na'ang 'chi bar mi
240a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / lta bar byed do// mchod par byed do// bstan par byed do// don thams cad byed do// de'ang rang gi khyim de nyid na gnas bzhin du lha'i cho 'phrul byed do// de bzhin gshegs par
240a3(rgyud 'bum): yang gyur nas rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul thams cad byed do/ / rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis kyang 'dul bar byed do// sems can de dag gis kyang mthong ngo // ma btul ba rnams kyang 'dul
240a4(rgyud 'bum): lo/ / ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur ba dang / thams cad du 'gro ba dang // phyir 'ong ba dang / gyen du 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams
240a5(rgyud 'bum): cad la mchod pa byas nas phyir 'ong ba'i bar du'o/ / don thams cad la longs spyod pa dang / 'dod pa thams cad la dbang ba dang / 'dod pa thams cad spyod pa'i tshe nam mkha' dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro zhes
240a6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ / de nas rdo rje 'dod pa khro bo'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis bcangs pa las/ mnga' 'phen pa'i tshul gyis me tog gi gzhu 'dren pa ni thams
240a7(rgyud 'bum): cad dga' bar byed pa yin no/ / rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis kyis snying khar rdo rje hUM zhes pa ste/ g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi baben pas rdo rje 'phangs pas ni thams cad gtan pa po'o// de nas 'di ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o//
240b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te// de ltar kyo ba mthe'u chung mjug/ mdud nas mthe bong gshibs pa yis// bsdams te snying khar gzhag par bya// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa nges
240b2(rgyud 'bum): par dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / 'dren par byed pa'o// rdo rje khu tshur gyis 'khyud pa ni rdo rje dga' ba'i phyag rgya'o// dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'byung ste/ rdo rje bcing ba
240b3(rgyud 'bum): bsdam pas nas/ / g.yon pa'i mdzub mtheb mo mtshan du// mthe bo'i rtags ni btsud nas su// de bskyod par du bsdam par bya// 'dis ni bud med thams cad dga' bar byed do// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis
240b4(rgyud 'bum): kyis rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'i tshul du bya'o/ / rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan no// dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'byung ste// rdo rje bcing ba bsdam byas nas// mdzub mo gnyis ni dgug par bya// srin lag gshibs la mthe/
240b5(rgyud 'bum): chung bkyeng // de ltar mthe bong gnyis kyang bkyed// 'di bstan pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang byams pa bstan par mdzad na// gzhan lta ci smos/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis snyems
240b6(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa ni rdo rje snyems pa'o/ / dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'byung ste// rdo rje bcing ba kun byas nas// rtsib logs gnyis su bskor nas su// 'dzin pas bskyod pas 'dud pa ste// khro bo thams cad mgu
240b7(rgyud 'bum): bar byed/ / rdo rje sems dpa' mchog bcas dang // rdo rje gar gi rab sbyor bas// mdor na me tog la sogs pa'i// gsang ba'i mchod pa myur du 'grub// rtog pa gzhan gyi gsang ba'i mchod pa dang yang sbyar
241a1(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / de nas rdo rje gar 'byung ste// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcangs nas// 'dzum pas mtha' nas brtsams te dgrol// glog bzhin bsgyur te bskor zhing dgrol// 'gram pa dang ni
241a2(rgyud 'bum): gtsug tor gzhag/ rdo rje gar zhes bya ba ste// bdag che'i mchod pa thams cad do// mchod pa 'di ni gsol bas na// dngos med nyid kyang myur du 'grub// de nas rdo rje gzugs la sogs pa'i phyag
241a3(rgyud 'bum): rgya bcing ba ni rdo rje bcing ba brkyang la mthil du blta'o/ / rdo rje bcings pas g.yon pa'i mdzub mo ni pi wang gi shing ngo // g.yas pa bkug pas ni len te/ brkyang ba'i lag mthil gyis rang gi snying khar byug
241a4(rgyud 'bum): go/ me tog gi thal mo'i tshul gyis rdo rje ro btung bar bya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcangs te// g.yon pa'i mthe'u chung ni g.yas pa'i kyo btang gi gzung ngo // kyo btang de g.yas pas sems dpa'i dam
241a5(rgyud 'bum): tshig thams cad dang sems can thams cad kyang dgug go/ / rdo rje bcings la mthe bong 'dud pa ni zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo sbrel ba ni thams cad bcing ngo // rdo rje 'bebs
241a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyag rgyas ni thams cad 'bebs par byed do/ / de nas go cha'i phyag rgya 'byung ste/ khu tshur bcing ba gnyis snying khar 'dud pa'i tshul du bya'o// spos nas yang lhag par yang de bzhin no// spros nas snying
241a7(rgyud 'bum): khar yang de bzhin no/ / yang bar du'ang 'dud do// yang spos nas snying kha dang lhag par yang de bzhin no// mgo la'ang de bzhin dbang bskur ba'i gnas su'o// 'phreng ba bcing ba'i 'dud pa'i tshul gyis mthe'u chung
241b1(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa'i sor mo thams cad dgrol ba'i cod pan gyi tshul du bya'o/ / de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni// pad+mo zum pa'i thal mo sbyar// pad+mo chen por grags pa
241b2(rgyud 'bum): ste/ / mthe'u chung mthe bong gnyis 'gyed pa// sdig pa rnams ni sel ba'o// de nyid mdzub mo kyo btang du byas pa ni thams cad 'gugs pa'o// de nas pad+mo 'byung ste/ rdo rje bcings pa'i mdzub mo gnyis
241b3(rgyud 'bum): bkug la mthe bong mnyam pa'i steng du gung mo gnyis gzhag go/ / de gnyis su byas nas g.yon pa la g.yas pas pad+mo 'byed par bya'o// de nas pad+mo dag gi phyag rgya ni hrI/ ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni
241b4(rgyud 'bum): pad+mo 'byed pas 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri ma sbyong bar gsung ba nyid do/ / de nas nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni nor bu'i khu tshur gnyis ka sa dbang bskur ba'i 'phreng ba bcing ngo // de nas
241b5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya ni/ / rdo rje bcing ba kun byas nas// mdzub mo mnyam nas mtheb dang sbyar// de dag ngos su sprad pa ste// dbang bskur gnas su dbang sbyin no// de nyid kha yar bstan la snying khar
241b6(rgyud 'bum): gzhag pa ni nor bu'i khu tshur zhes bshad de/ / don thams cad 'phrog pa'o// de nyid las mthe bo'i rdo rjes mdzub mo mnyam pa mnan te/ rgyab bskum pa ni rdo rje'i nor bu'o// traM/ chos kyi phyag rgya'o//
241b7(rgyud 'bum): ye shes kyi phyag rgya thams cad nam mkhar sgom pa'o// de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni de ltar sngar bshad pa nyid do// bAM/ ngag gi phyag rgya'o// byams pa'i bcing ba ni bcing ba'i nang na mchog
242a1(rgyud 'bum): ste/ ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o// mdun du ni rdo rje chen po'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas su ni rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya bstan pa nyid do// rgyab tu ni rdo rje bcing ba snying khar bkan nas mthe bong
242a2(rgyud 'bum): sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis dgug par bya'o/ / rdo rje padz+ra mchog gi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bcing ba'i mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis snying khar brkyang ba ni rdo ste/ rdo rje thams cad do// rigs thams cad kyi dang
242a3(rgyud 'bum): tshig gi phyag rgya ste/ grub pa thams cad stsol ba phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du bri'o// de nas 'jam dpal gyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni rdo rje khu tshur mdzub mo'i rtse mo bkug pa 'di ni ral gri'o// gnyis pa ni gles
242a4(rgyud 'bum): bam mo/ / dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa'i glegs bam bcangs pa'i mthe'u chung ni g.yas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pas gzung ngo // A/ chos kyi phyag rgya'o// chos thams cad la yi ge med ces bya ba/
242a5(rgyud 'bum): ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o// de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni/ rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis bcangs te// mthe'u chung mdzub mo'i rdo rje bcing // rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bshad de// dkyil 'khor thams
242a6(rgyud 'bum): cad sgrub pa po/ / 'di mthong bas dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du dbus su kha bzhag ste bzlas na dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur zhing de bzhin du sgrub par
242a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / hUM/ chos kyi phyag rgya'o// de nas nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni rdo rje nor bu'i phyag rgya las mthe'u chung dang srin lag mnyam pa'i rgyal mtshan gleng ba'i tshul du bya'o// chos kyi
242b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya ni/ traM/ 'phags pa byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya'o// ngag gi phyag rgya ni/ oM/ de nas rtogs pa thams cad spyi'i phyag rgya shes pa 'byung
242b2(rgyud 'bum): ste/ de la lus kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni// 'di lta ste/ 'greng yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / rkang pa bsnams te brkyang ba dang / lag pa sgreng ba ni rdo rje'i phyog rgya'o// mchog bsgrub
242b3(rgyud 'bum): pa la rdo rje dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro/ / langs nas g.yon pas rdo rje khu tshur bcangs nas g.yas pa bkug pas drangs pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ste/ thams cad 'dren pa'i phyag rgya yin
242b4(rgyud 'bum): no/ / langs la pus mo bkyed de bkug nas lag pa gnyis bsdams te gyen du brkyang ba ni thams cad gtan 'pho ba'i ral gri'o// dpung pa gnyis kyis rang gi snying khar 'khyud pa ni go cha ste mi phyed
242b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / de nas rang gi phyag rgya bcing ba ni/ a ho he hUM/ dbab pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / bsrung ba dang / gtan 'pho ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nas lta ba'i phyag rgya 'byung ba ni/ myur 'gyur
242b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i lta ba ste/ / bgrang de btsums pa 'dren pa yin// khro bo'i lta ba khro gnyer te// brtan par lta ba mi g.yo ba'o// de nas 'di dag gau las 'byung ba ni rdo rje'i lte bas skye 'gro thams cad mgu
242b7(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ / bgrang ba'i lta bas ni thams cad dkrug pa dang // rims dang / gdon dang / dug dang / byad ma la sogs pa dang / nad thams cad sel to// khro bo'i lta bas ni thams cad gtan 'pho'o//
243a1(rgyud 'bum): brtan par lta bas ni thams cad byung ngo // de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// 'adz+ra u0f7fsarba/ dIp+ta hrI a ng+ku shang/ oM bo d+ha dr-ir+tha ya/ dr-i d+hadzad+haH/ so'i phyag tu 'byung /
243a2(rgyud 'bum): so bca' bas ni gtan 'pho'o// mur bas ni dbang du byed do// snying po bzlas shing khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin bzlas te phyag rgya'i las byed do// g.yas nas gtsu ba ni 'gugs pa'o// g.yon pas gtsu ba ni dbang du
243a3(rgyud 'bum): byed pa'o/ / ma mchu sos mnan pas ni gtan 'pho'o// mchu gnyis ka bsdams pas ni srung ngo // sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa rjes su dran pa dang / rdo rje khro bo rjes su dran pa dang / rdo rje rjes
243a4(rgyud 'bum): su dran pa ni thams cad sgrub pa ste/ mchu'i phyag rgya'o// mig g.yas pa bskyod pas dbang du byed do// mig g.yon pa bskyod pas rjes su chags so// gnyis ka btsum pas ni gtan 'pho'o// gnyis ka
243a5(rgyud 'bum): bgrang pas ni srung ngo / / thams cad kyi snying po bzlas te gyen du bltas na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// thur du bltas na sa'i dbang por 'gyur ro// g.yas nas bskor ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
243a6(rgyud 'bum): cad la mchod do/ / g.yon nas bskor ba ni phyag na rdo rje la mchod de// thams cad kyi snying po stong bzlas nas sgrub bo// de nas phyi rol gyi rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba 'byung ste/ de la 'jig rten pa'i
243a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya rnams ni 'jig rten pa'i khu tshur las 'byung ste/ rdo rje khu tshur ni rdo rje bcing ba las g.yon pa'i mthe bong nang du bcug nas mthe'u chung dang srin lag gi bar du btsir la bsdam par bya ste/ de nyid la phyag
243b1(rgyud 'bum): rgya'i snying po 'di 'bum bzlas te sgrub bo/ / oM badz+ra mu drA hUM/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis su byas te/ g.yas pas mtshan ma ji ltar byas pa bzhin du gzung ngo // ma rnams thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni 'di bzhin du
243b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i khu tshur las g.yon pa rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub mo sgreng ba ste/ dur khrod dam tshogs kyi gnas su rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub mos mi khrag thigs pa gsum khar blangs te myangs nas/ mi ro ma smas shing ma nyams pa rkang
243b3(rgyud 'bum): pa g.yon pas mnan te brgya bzlas na nam mkhar 'gro ba dang / mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / byad ma thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// tshogs de dag thams cad kyi dbang por 'gyur ro// thag 'jug pa dang phan
243b4(rgyud 'bum): dongogs nus par 'gyur ro/ / mkha' 'gro ma'i bde ba'i mchog thams cad dang / rtog pa thams cad dang / las thams cad dang / phyag rgya thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas khro bo'i khu tshur sgrub
243b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i snying po ni 'di yin no/ / oM badz+ra A ra li/ phyag rgya bcing ba'i bar du'o// de nas de'i rjes la phyag rgya thams cad kyi gsang ba'i bsgrub pa'i skabs bshad par bya ste/ de nas de bzhin gshegs
243b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyag rgya gsang ba sgrub pa ni dkyil 'khor bri ste/ der 'di skad brjod do// bcom ldan phyag rgya btsun mo 'di// rtag tu bdag la skul bar stsol// sems can kun gyi don grub phyir// grub pa mchog
243b7(rgyud 'bum): ni bsgrub par bgyi/ / phyag na rdo rje dkyil 'khor nas 'di zhes brjod do// su ra te sa ma ya s+t+waM ho/ badz+ra satwa Ad+ya sid d+ha nan/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya sgrub pa
244a1(rgyud 'bum): ni/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che// rtag tu bdag la grub pa stsol// de nas phyi rol gyi rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba bsgrub pa ni phyag na rdo rje khro bo ni thams cad byed pa yin no zhes
244a2(rgyud 'bum): deskad brjod la bsgrub par bya'o/ / ma rnams kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya sgrub pa ni dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas ts+tsha b+h+yo zhes rjod cig/ gsang ba bsgrub pa'i rab tu bya ba'o// / de nas phyag rgya'i de khon
244a3(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya'i de kho na ni sems las sangs rgyas kyi chos 'byung ngo // yang dag par na 'di dag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo'i thugs la gnas pa yin no//
244a4(rgyud 'bum): bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yin pas bdag gi chung ma yin no zhes sngar bsgoms la phyag rgya sgrub bo// phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i de kho na ni// rab dga' bcing ba kun gyi mchog/ de bas phyag rgya rnam
244a5(rgyud 'bum): su byas/ / 'dod pa rdo rje sems dpa' yis// grub brtan myur du stsol bar mdzad// de nas gzhan dag ni/ bcom ldan rtag pa 'dod pa ste// de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'o// de las thams cad bdag
244a6(rgyud 'bum): nyid gzugs/ / bdag kyang phyag rgya grub par shog/ de nas phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs kyi phyag rgya yis// de kho na ni phyag na rdo rje lha thams cad dbang du byas nas rdo rjer byas te/ de dag gi phyag rgya'ang rdo rje'i phyas
244a7(rgyud 'bum): rgya nyid do/ / de nas ma rnams kyi phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid ni// ma rung thams cad za ba'i phyir// lha rnams kun gyis byas pa ste// phyag rgya 'bebs pas de yi phyir// bsgoms nas kyang ni bsgrub par bya//
244b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i de kho na rab tu sbyor bas thog mar bsgoms nas sgrub bo// phyag rgya'i de kho na'i rab tu bya ba'o// / de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i las
244b2(rgyud 'bum): bshad do zhes nas/ / bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa/ nyin re dang po dus bzhin du// rdo rje che mchog phyag rgya yis// snying kha smin mtshams lkog ma gtsug/ bdag nyid byin gyis
244b3(rgyud 'bum): brlab par bya/ / de la byin gyis brlab pa'i snying po ni 'di yin no// badz+ra satwa/ badz+ra rat+na/ badz+ra d+harma/ badz+ra karma/ de la 'di ni rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i snying po yin no// oM sarba ta thA
244b4(rgyud 'bum): ga a b+hi She ka ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ snying po 'dis rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya smin mtshams su bzhag ste/ mdzub mo gnyis kyis 'phreng ba'i tshul du bcings la/ lhag par mdud pa'i tshul du byas nas bskor
244b5(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / mthe'u chung nas brtsams te bkrol bas sor mo thams cad bkrol te dar sbyangs pa ltar bya'o// de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes bskyod pa na rdo rje bcing ba bkan te phang par bzhag nas sgom pa'i snying po
244b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dis rang gi snying khar rdo rje bsam mo/ / oM badz+ra At+ma ka/ rdo rje'i bzlas pas ci 'dod pa bzlas so// de nas rdo rje mchod pa'i rab tu bya ba ni/ rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis bcangs nas// rdo rje 'gying
244b7(rgyud 'bum): legs par bya/ / rdo rje 'phreng ba de bzhin gru// rdo rje gar yang spyi bo nas// der bstod pa'i rdo rje'i glu blang zhing mchod par bya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa'o// rdo rje rin chen bla med de/ rdorje
245a1(rgyud 'bum): chos ni glur blangs pas/ / rdo rje las ni mdzad par gsol// dga' ba dang / dbang bskur ba dang / glu dang / mchod pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyang rnyed par mi dka'
245a2(rgyud 'bum): na grub pa gzhan lta ci smos/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar sems dpa'i bde ba 'di dang mtshungs pa med do// de nas phyag rgya rdo rje sa'i byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa 'byung ste/ nyin re dang por dus
245a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du/ / rdo rje'i byin gyis brlab tshul gyis// bdag gis bdag nyid byin brlabs nas// sems dpar byin brlabs rnal 'byor ldan// rdo rje dang bcas rdo rje bcing // rdo rje 'bebs la sogs tshul
245a4(rgyud 'bum): gyis/ rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje bcas// gnyis byas phyag rgya'i mchog gis su// bdag nyid byin gyis brlab par bya// 'dod pa bdag nyid ces kyang sgom// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi// gas
245a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i snying po bzlas par bya'o/ / de la gsang ba'i snying po 'di rdo rje'i glus ci 'dod pa bzlas so// Tak+ki dza ho/ de nas sgrub pa gzhan yang rdo rje bcing bas rtags bzung ste 'bum bzlas na 'dod pa thams
245a6(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi dbang phyug dang / 'dod pa'i gzugs dang / 'dod pa'i tshe dang / 'dod pa'i bdag po dang / kun tu 'gro ba thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// de nas phyag na rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i rab
245a7(rgyud 'bum): tu bya ba 'byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba ji lta ba bzhin du snying po 'dis sbyin no/ / oM sarba ta thA ga ta rat+na a b+hi She ka a/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tham
245b1(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi ye shes bskyed pa ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pa ni/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad nyid yin pa ni de bzhin du/ bdag kyang thams cad nyid do zhes nas snying po 'dis tham
245b2(rgyud 'bum): cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas te sgom mo/ de la snying po ni 'di'o// oM satwa dzaHhUM baM hoH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gsang ba'i mchod pa
245b3(rgyud 'bum): bya ba ni byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa thams cad byed de/ / rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcangs la// rdo rje gar dang sbar nas su// me tog la sogs dbul ba ni// gsang ba'i mchod pa phyag rgya
245b4(rgyud 'bum): dbul/ / gzhu 'dren pa yi tshul gyis su// rdo rje mda' ni 'phen par bya// kun nas 'khyud dang rgyal mtshan bsgreng // gnyis snyems 'dzin pas 'dud pa'o// rdo rje'i bstod pa 'dis rdo rje'i glu blang
245b5(rgyud 'bum): zhing mchod do/ / gzugs la sogs pa 'dod pa dag gi bde ba dang / shin tu yid bde bcom ldan rab dga' khyod la 'dud/ khyod kyis bdag la deng du dga' bde kun mchod la// mchog gi bdag
245b6(rgyud 'bum): nyid grub pa'ang myur du tshul bzhin sgrol/ / bstod pa'i snying po 'dis thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la nyin rer lan rer bstod na bcom ldan 'das las thams cad thob
245b7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / slob dpon de rang gi lce las kyang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi thams cad dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' dang / rtog pa thams cad dang / tshig gi rgyud thams cad
246a1(rgyud 'bum): kyang smra bar 'gyur ro/ / lha'i glu sngon ma byung ba len to// rdo rje'i glus 'bum bzlas na rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de ltar lan cig byin gyis brlabs la/ de nas phyis sgrubs shig
246a2(rgyud 'bum): de nas nyin gcig bzhin byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa nyin rer lan rer byas na grub pa thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / dbang bskur ba la sogs pa dang / shes pa thams cad dang
246a3(rgyud 'bum): las thams cad 'grub bo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa dang / sems dpa' rnams der lhags nas phra mo la sogs pa ston te tshig sgra'o// byams par byed/ mchod do/ de'ang de
246a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim gro thams cad kyis mchod do// sems can thams cad la tshar gcad pa dang / phan 'dogs nus par 'gyur ro// 'jig pa med pa
246a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / zad pa med pa dang / 'god pa med pa dang / 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / sdug bsngal thams cad
246a6(rgyud 'bum): sel te/ cho 'phrul thams cad ston to// bdag nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa sems dpa'i gzugs man chad dang / bdag gi lus thams cad dang / nam mkha'
246a7(rgyud 'bum): dang sa dang / shing dang / ri dang / chu rnams las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa'i gzugs thams cad ston par byed do// 'od zer ston pa la sogs pa'i cho 'phral
246b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad ston to/ / rang yang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la sogs pa dang / thams cad kyi gzugs su 'gyur ro// mig gis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi shes pa thams cad
246b2(rgyud 'bum): yi ge rnams las mthong ngo / / thams cad las thos shing rang gi lces smra'o// sngon ma byung ba'i rtog pa dang mdo sde thams cad 'chang ngo do// ston skyo ba thams cad dang / sil snyan dang / 'phong dang /
246b3(rgyud 'bum): mtshon 'debs pa dang / bshes gnyen dang / bzo dang / sgyu rtsal thams cad lhun gyis grub par shes par 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin du gzugs chen po dang / mdog dang / stobs
246b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / dpa' ba dang / tshe dang / nad med pa dang / dngos grub thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa dang / sgra skad dang / tshig shes shing
246b5(rgyud 'bum): mthong ngo / / nyin gcig bzhin thams cad mngon par shes par 'gyur ro// mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa dngos grub thams cad ma bsgrubs par tshe 'di nyid la
246b6(rgyud 'bum): thob par 'gyur ro/ / byin gyis brlabs la sogs pa'i rab tu bya ba'o// / de la bsgrub pa'i rab tu bya ba 'byung ste// de bzhin gshegs pa sgrub pa ni mdun du bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi sku
246b7(rgyud 'bum): rjes su dran pa sgom zhing snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig pa rnams sgrub bo// phyag na rdo rje sgrub pa ni sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa'i rnal 'byor ram/ 'dod par sgom pa 'am/
247a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran pa 'am/ bdag gi snying khar rdo rje sgom pa 'am/ bdag gi mdun du sangs rgyas rjes su dran par byed bzhin du snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang /
247a2(rgyud 'bum): rig pa rnams sgrub bo// sems dpa' chen po thams cad ni bdag nyid kyis rang gi sems dpa' rjes su dran pa 'am// snying khar rdo rje chen po sgom zhing snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig pa rnam
247a3(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub par bya'o/ / phyi'i rdo rje'i rigs sgrub pa ni khro bo'i tshul gyis snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig pa rnams sgrub bo// rdo rje ma rnams sgrub pa ni sems can thams cad za ba'i rjes su dran
247a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'am/ bdag nyid rdo rje srin por gyur to/ de'i phyir bdag nyid kyang sems can thams cad bza' 'o zhes khros te snying po dang // phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig pa rnams bsgrub par bya'o// bsgrub
247a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rab tu bya ba'o/ / / de nas sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rab tu bya ba 'byung ste/ ji ltar 'jig rten 'dul 'gyur ba// de ltar sgrub par gsungs pa ste// grub pa thams cad byed pa'i mchog
247a6(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rab tu bya ba'o/ / / de nas ras kyi rab tu bya ba 'byung ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ras ni sgra med par byas la dkyil 'khor zlum por thig gdab bo// phyag na rdo rje'i
247a7(rgyud 'bum): ras ni ngos thams cad par gru bzhi po dar ram ras la bri'o/ / sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ni ji lta bur 'dus pa'i 'khor bzhin du'o// phyi'i rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyis ma bsdus pa la 'dus pa'i 'khor
247b1(rgyud 'bum): ji lta ba bzhin du dgod do/ / rdo rje ma rnams kyi mnyams pa la kha tshar ma bcad pa ste/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyin can gyis sbyin med pa'i tshon rtsi snod gsar par bzhag pas bri/ ras kyi rab tu bya ba'o//
247b2(rgyud 'bum): de la cha lugs kyi tshad rab tu bya ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtho gang tsam du bya ba'o// phyag na rdo rje'i ni mtha' med pa'i phyir ji ltar 'dod pa'i tshad du bya ba'o//
247b3(rgyud 'bum): de la rdo rje'i tshad ni ji tsam du 'gyur zhe na/ rang gi mthe bo'i tshigs kyi sor mo bcu drug tu bya'o// de la rdo rje'i dbyibs ci 'dra bar bya zhe na/ zur bzhi la rtse lnga pa 'od zer gyi 'phreng ba can sum char bya'o//
247b4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po thams cad ni mthe bo'i tshigs kyi sor bcu drug gi tshad du bya ste/ thams cad kyang pad+mo la bzhugs par bya'o// de bzhin du sku gzugs kyi tshad las dkyil 'khor gyi tshad kyang de dang 'dra
247b5(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ / de la 'di ni bzlas pa'i rab tu bya ba ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ni dgongs pa'i gsung ting nge 'dzin gyi tshig ste/ rdo rje rnams kyi'ang de bzhin no// de la rtog pa thams cad kyi spyir ni
247b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i tshig gis bzlas te sgrub bo/ / phyag na rdo rje'i ni rdo rje tshig gi glu dang sbyar te bzlas so// rdo rje hUM zhes pa la sogs pa rdo rje'i khro bo rnams ni rdo rje'i khro bo'i tshig gis bzlas so// phyi'i rdo rje'i rigs rnams
247b7(rgyud 'bum): richochos kyi tshig gis khro ba'i sgra chen po gsal bar byas te khro bo dang bcas pas bzlas so/ / rdo rje'i ma rnams ni rdo rje'i tshig phra mos bzlas so// de la ting 'dzin gyi ngag ni yid kyis bzlas so// de la rdo rje
248a1(rgyud 'bum): ngag ni/ lce thog rab tu mi g.yo bar// so mchu gnyis ka sgyur ba ste// rtog pa kun la rig pa ni// rdo rje'i ngag ni sgra spangs pa'o// de la rdo rje'i glu'i tshig ni// Sha Ta pa la sogs pa'i
248a2(rgyud 'bum): glu/ / grong dga' ba rnams blangs pa yis// rdo rje'i tshig bzlas rtog pa ru// rdo rje'i glu zhes grags pa'o// de la rdo rje khro bo'i tshig ni 'di'o// hUM zhes pa yi 'brug sgra 'dra// de bzhin phra zhing sgra dang ldan//
248a3(rgyud 'bum): khro bo gsal ba rdo rje che'o// khro bo'i tshig ces grags pa'o// tshig gi rab tu bya ba'o// / de la 'di ni bzlas pa'i cho ga rab tu bya ba yin te// rtog pa dag ni kun la yang // sems dpa' gang
248a4(rgyud 'bum): dang gang dag gi/ snying po phyag rgya sngags sgrub pas// de yi bdag nyid spyan drang grub// gnas dang srog chags thams cad ni// rang gi tshul gyi cho ga thams cad sgrub bo// rdo rje bzlas pa ni rtog pa thams
248a5(rgyud 'bum): cad sgrub pa'o/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i bzlas pa 'byung ste/ phyag na rdo rje'i snying po dang / phyag rgya sngags rig de bzhin te// bzlas pa'i don gyis mgon po bzlas// rtog pa kun la'ang bsgrub
248a6(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / phyi yi rdo rje rigs rnams kyi// khro bo'i mnyam par 'jog pa'o// rdo rje ma rnams thams cad kyi// yid kyis su ni snying yang gzung // bzlas pa'i don zhes bya ba la// phyag na rdo rje'i 'dod pa
248a7(rgyud 'bum): sgom zhing bzlas pa ste/ 'di ltar oM zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa ste bde ba chen po'o// 'dod pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya'o// 'dod pa ni thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang
248b1(rgyud 'bum): du byed pa'i phyir ro/ / dzaHhUM baM hoH/ 'dod pa ni shin tu dga' ba'o// 'dod pa ni bzlas pa'i don to// gsang ba'i bzlas pa 'di bzlas na bsod nams chung ngu'ang 'grub par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
248b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis kyang bslu bar mi nus so/ / thal mo khong stong du sbyar la mchod pa bya ste/ de la me tog gi mchod pa ni me tog gi thal mo gyen du phye bas so// bdug pa'i mchod pa ni thur du brkyang bas so// mar
248b3(rgyud 'bum): me'i mchod pa ni mthe bong bsnyams pas g.yogs pa'o/ / dri'i mchod pa ni rab tu brkyang ste stong pa 'am gang bas so// phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis yang dag pa nyid du mchod par 'gyur ba ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
248b4(rgyud 'bum): cad dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / dam tshig sems dpa' thams cad dang / snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig pa dang / lha rnams thams cad la 'ang ngo // mchod pa'i rab tu
248b5(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'o/ / // de la bsod nams med pa'i sems can gyi bsgrub pa'i rab tu bya ba 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor gang yang rung ba zhig nyin re zhing ji tsam 'dod pa'i tshad du nyi ma bzhir bris nas/
248b6(rgyud 'bum): lta ba bzhin du der zhugs la phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rang gi lhag pa'i lha lan brgya bzlas so// bsod nams med pa'i sems can gyi bsgrub pa'i rab tu bya ba'o// / de la myur du 'grub par
248b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba'i rab tu bya ba ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba ni/ ting 'dzin chos sbyin la sogs dang / rgya chen tshul rnams klog pa dang / dad la gnas te de bzhin mchod// dngos
249a1(rgyud 'bum): grub myur sbyin chen po yin/ / de la phyag na rdo rje'i myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba ni/ 'dod la chags dang bral min dang / 'dod la chags pa'i dam pas mchod// 'dod la ci nus chag
249a2(rgyud 'bum): bya ba/ / myur du dngos grub sbyin pa yin// de la 'di ni sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi myur du 'grub pa ni/ sbyin dang tshul khrims de bzhin bzod// brtson 'grus bsam gtan de bzhin blo// ci nus kyis
249a3(rgyud 'bum): kyang bya ba ni/ / nyin gcig bzhin du ci 'dod par// phyi'i rdo rje'i rigs kyi grub pa myur ba ni/ sangs rgyas mchod cing de bzhin dang // phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan// rdo rje rtag tu lag na
249a4(rgyud 'bum): gzung / / mi 'grungs thams cad tshar gcod mchog/ de nas rdo rje ma rnams kyi grub pa myur du bsgrub pa'i rab tu bya ba ste/ sems can dag la dad pa dang // mchod cing dam tshig srung ba ste/ phyag rgya'i
249a5(rgyud 'bum): gar gyis mchod pa dang / / sems can ma rung drag shul bya// grub pa myur ba'i rab tu bya ba'o// // de la slob dpon gyi rab tu bya ba 'byung ste/ de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil
249a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi slob dpon du grub pa ste/ dkyil 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar badz+ra bid ces bya ba'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ slob dpon rang gis dam tshig gi phyag rgya stong bzlas te
249a7(rgyud 'bum): / slob ma dbang bskur ba'i snying po ni 'di'o// badz+ra satwa/ badz+ra rat+na/ badz+ra d+harmA/ badz+ra karma/ oM a nu kha ma d+hi tiSh+Tha sarba ta thA ga a d+yad te swAhA/ 'di brgya bzlas pa ni snying kha la sogs par phyag rgya
249b1(rgyud 'bum): / bzhag nas spyi bor thams cad bzlas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi slob dpon sbyin no// phyag na rdo rje'i cha lugs spyi bor bzung nas snying po 'di brgya 'am brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas shing /
249b2(rgyud 'bum): brgya bzlas pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i slob dpon du 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rdo rje slob dpon du 'gyur ro// de la snying po ni 'di'o// oM mahA su kha badz+ra satwa dzaHhUM
249b3(rgyud 'bum): hoHsu ra ta s+t+waM/ de nas de'i lag tu rdo rje sbyin no/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi ste/ lag pa gnyis su rdo rje byin nas rdo rje rigs kyi rdo rje'i dri chus bsres pa'i bum pas dbang bskur to// snying po 'di'o// oM
249b4(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra a d+hi pa d+hi tAM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi dr-iD+ho b+ha ba dzaHhUM baM ho hUM phaT/ de nas pad+mo rigs kyi slob dpon du sgrub pa ni pad+mo lag tu byin nas stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te pad+mo'i 'phreng bas mgo bcing ngo // snying po 'di
249b5(rgyud 'bum): brjod do/ / oM pad+ma mA la a b+hi Shiny+tsa lo ka shwa ra tre swa ma hrIHrdo rje rin po che'i slob dpon du sgrub pa ni rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya slob ma dbang bskur ba'i gnas su bzhag nas snying po 'di stong bzlas so//
249b6(rgyud 'bum): oM badz+ra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa rat+na d+hi pa ti twe b+ha ba TaT/ slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor thams cad du bcud de dbang bskur ro// phyag na rdo rje slob dpon du bya ste/ yang bdag nyid kyis dkyil 'khor bris la/
249b7(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid la bdag gis slob dpon du dbang bskur ro// de la slob dpon gyi brtul zhugs ni/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i slob dpon ni zla ba gcig gi bar du rab tu byung la bslab pa thams
250a1(rgyud 'bum): cad bzung ste/ rang gi lhag pa'i lha dus gsum du sgrub bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi slob dpon gyi brtul zhugs ni zla ba phyed kyi bar du nyin re zhing bcom ldan
250a2(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyi spyan sngar byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas phyag na rdo rje'i sku 'am/ rang gi lha nyid la mchod nas kyo ba tang gis bkug ste mi skyo bar bzlas te/ lam dang lam ma yin pa'i skabs
250a3(rgyud 'bum): mi dbye'o/ / de nas phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs 'byung ste/ nyin re zhing nang par langs nas bdag nyid byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas te/ bkrus la dri zhim po dang / gos 'tsher ba dang /
250a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyan gyis chas te/ glu dang / sil snyan dang / bkod pa dang / sgeg pa rnams dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das la me tog la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas/
250a5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das dang bdag nyid la 'dod pa'i dngos pos mchod pa bya ste/ dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid ci 'dod pa bzlas te/ phyed yol gyi bar du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga spyad nas/ de bzhin du
250a6(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa byas te/ ci 'dod par bzlas so// de nas yang mtshan rangs par 'dod pa lnga rnams la brten cing bzlas par bya ste/ de ltar zhag bzhi'i bar du bya'o// de nas rdo rje rigs kyi brtul
250a7(rgyud 'bum): zhugs ni zla ba phyed kyi bar smyon par bsgyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal zhing phyag na rdo rje mchod de/ mgo sa la gtugs nas sgren mor byung ngam gos gyon yang rung ste/
250b1(rgyud 'bum): mgo bo rdob cing mi 'o cog la gshe zhing rgyal phyag rgya rnams kyis gar byas te/ yid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa bsams nas mtshams bcing ba la sogs pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la dza
250b2(rgyud 'bum): lta ba bzhin du mchod pa byas te brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ / de nas pad+mo'i rigs kyi brtul zhugs ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ ba'i gcin rngubs gang 'thungs la/ ba'i lci ba cung zad
250b3(rgyud 'bum): zos na dag pa'i brtul zhugs thams cad 'grub bo/ / de nas zhag bdun du ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag nas stong rtsa brgyad bzlas so// de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi brtul zhugs ni nyin re zhing rang
250b4(rgyud 'bum): la dbang bskur nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang / sems dpa' chen po rnams mchod de rgyal po lta bur sgom zhing rgyal po'i pho brang du song nas rgyal po'i mdun du brgya brgya zhag brgyad kyi bar du bzlas so//
250b5(rgyud 'bum): de ltar na slob dpon gyis grub pa thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / shes pa thams cad dang / kun gyis mchod pa la sogs pa dang / las thams cad thob par 'gyur ro//
250b6(rgyud 'bum): slob dpon gyi rab tu bya ba'o// / de nas las grub pa ni snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te las thams cad byas na thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rdo
250b7(rgyud 'bum): rje'i bzlas pa brgyad stong bzlas na/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las thams cad la phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa tsam gyis bdag dang pha rol gnyis ka 'grub par 'gyur
251a1(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / sngags ni rdo rje tshig gis stong phrag brgyar bzlas na sngags thams cad thang cig bzlas pas las kun byed do// rig pa stong phrag brgyar bzlas na/ de nas rig pa thams
251a2(rgyud 'bum): cad thang cig bzlas pas las thams cad byed do/ / de nas snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig pa rnams 'byung ste/ badz+ra satwa ni snying po'o// satwa badz+ra ni phyag rgya'o// oM ni sngags so//
251a3(rgyud 'bum): / khi ti ni rig pa'o// de nas snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig pa thams cad sgrub pa'i snying po 'byung ste/ oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa dzaHhUM baM ho/ su ra ta s+t+waM/ 'di bcom ldan 'das
251a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi spyan sngar rdo rje sems dpas bzlas pas glu dang rdo rje'i tshig gis stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes/
251a5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ phyi ma'i rgyud bshad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das
251a6(rgyud 'bum): la/ phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshang lags na/ de bas na bcom
251a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams grub pa de sems can 'dul ba'i slad du yul gzhan du 'chi 'am/ dbul por 'gyur ba 'am/ 'khrug pa 'am/ phrag dog gam/ sma dbab pa
251b1(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ 'dod pa chung ba 'am/ 'dod pa la chags pa 'am/ rab tu byung ba sems dpa' 'am/ gnod pa mang ba 'am/ nyes pa mang ba 'am/ mya ngan nam/ nad ngam/
251b2(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa mang po la sogs pa gzhan yang dad pa med par 'gyur ba de lta bur mi 'gyur bar lhag pa'i bsam pa'i chos skye ba dang / sgrib pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlab par gsol/
251b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungs so// dam tshig chen po de kho na nyid sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje thams cad pa mthul ba 'dul ba 'di khyod kyis de bzhin
251b4(rgyud 'bum): du bshad pa de dag gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs so/ / de nas sgrub pa po de dag gis dang por re zhig de brgyad stong ji lta bar bzlas nas de nyid dam gzhan dag gi'ang rung
251b5(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub par bya'o/ / gang dag 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos kyis 'dul ba de lta bu dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag la'ang snying po 'di sbyin no/ oM b+h+ya sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra satwa ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/
251b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di'ang brgya stong du bzlas nas de nyid dam gzhan yang bsgrub par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag na rdo rjes phyag 'tshal te tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// sems can kun la phan
251b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyir/ / rtog pa'i dam pa rab bshad pa// 'jig rten gsum rgyal zhes bya ba// grub pa thams cad rab stsol mchog/ gang gis brjod pa tsam gyis na// sdig pa kun las rnam par grol
252a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten kun na mchod pa ste/ / grub pa thams cad thob par 'gyur// gang dag 'dri zhing klog pa dang // 'dzin cing smra pa de bzhin te// de yang tshe 'di nyid la ni// grub pa thams
252a2(rgyud 'bum): cad thob 'gyur na/ / dad pa brtul zhugs brtan pa yis// grub par byed pa ci smos te// sangs rgyas phyag na rdo rje nyid// tshe 'di nyid la de yis thob// rtog pa kun kyang sbyar yang rung // rang gis
252a3(rgyud 'bum): byas pa'ang de bzhin te/ / rtog pa'i rgyal po nyid bsgrubs na// dad pa med kyang myur du 'grub// bdag gi khyim du gnas pa yang // de la bdag kyang kun 'grub phyir// de la bdag ni srung bar gnas
252a4(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub dang ni 'dod kun dang / / 'phel ba dang ni 'tshe med dang // shes pa rnams dang tshe dang stobs// gzugs mchog nges par stsol bar bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan las bzhengs te/
252a5(rgyud 'bum): khams gsum mtha' dag lus dang / ngag dang / sems rdo rje'i rdul phra mo rnams kyis khyab nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so legs so sems
252a6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa la mngon par dgyes par gyur to// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po kun rdzogs so//
252a7(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha na te dzo rA dza ta thA ga ta ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+ha s+ya kalpa nA ma/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa
252b1(rgyud 'bum): ma pas dag par ga la smras rgyas dan ma 'a yongs pa spyod lags pa / 'an yo / ra
252b2(rgyud 'bum): mas dpa' la thug 'tsham lo/ / 'di gang bdag gi thos pangs gcigs/ bcom ldan 'das lnga'i tshogs thams cad kyi dpa' ba rnas mtshas tu me 'ong bas/ nor bu dang /
252b3(rgyud 'bum): gangasalan da byugapa nas pa dang / nga sel ba dang / shAn dang / tog ka mA la dang / sa dang / k+Sha dang / bas pa dang / /
