253a1(rgyud 'bum): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros tshad med pa dang / blo gros mi g.yo ba dang / blo gros yangs pa
253a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / kun tu blo gros dang / blo gros mtha' yas dang / blo gros ka ma la dang / blo gros chen po dang / blo gros lha rdzas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros sna tshogs
253a3(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge 'dun mtha' thug pa med pa rnams kyis bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ mchod cing rjed la rab tu mchod cing
253a4(rgyud 'bum): spel te/ 'khor mang po'i dbus na tshangs pa chen po pad+mo'i gdan la bzhugs te/ ngan song gi rgyud thams cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ ngan song
253a5(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyi rgyud las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi 'od zer 'phro ba dang / sdud pa mang po'i 'phreng ba nyid kyi dbu'i mdzod spu nas byung nas/
253a6(rgyud 'bum): des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad kun tu snang bar byas so// kun tu snang bar byas nas sems can thams cad kyi sems nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba las
253a7(rgyud 'bum): rnam par grol te/ bde ba so sor thob nas dga' ba'i tshal thams cad kun tu snang bar byas pas mchod pa'i sprin sna tshogs kyis mngon par mchod de/ lan brgya phrag stong du bskor ba byas nas/
253b1(rgyud 'bum): mgo bos lan brgya phrag stong du phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar nor bu dri ma med pa'i steng du 'khod de 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma 'o sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas// kye ma'o satwa
253b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas mdzad pa legs/ / gang phyir ngan song bdag cag sbyang // byang chub spyod pa nyid la bkod// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya phrag stong du bskor ba byas te
253b3(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer kun tu snang bas ngan song gi rgyud las rnam par grol zhing / rnam par grol
253b4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i lam la bkod pa ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags so/ / bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po 'di ni ngo mtshar mi che'o// lha'i
253b5(rgyud 'bum): dbang po 'di ni ngo mtshar mi che ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni tshad med pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs rnams yang dag par bsags pa'o// lha'i dbang po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
253b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas ni tshad med pa'i yon tan rin po che'i 'byung khungs su gyur pa'o/ / lha'i dbang po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni tshad med pa'i thabs yang dag par rdzogs pa'o// lha'i dbang
253b7(rgyud 'bum): po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shes rab tshad med pa bsags pa'o/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyod pa ni tshad med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gdul ba'i
254a1(rgyud 'bum): skye bo tshad med pa rnams snod du gyur par mdzad pa'o/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa sangs rgyas
254a2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i smon lam gyi stobs dang ldan pa ste/
254a3(rgyud 'bum): lha'i dbang po de lta bas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni snod ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi don mdzad pa dang / ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa dang / mos
254a4(rgyud 'bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi don mdzad pa yin par rig par bya ste/ 'di la the tshom dang / som nyi dang / yid gnyis ma byed cig/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'dul bar
254a5(rgyud 'bum): mi 'gyur ba'i gnas ni med do/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin rang gi stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa che ba rgya che ba byas te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
254a6(rgyud 'bum): skad ces gsol to/ / sems can thams cad la phan pa nyid du bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba nyid du bgyi ba dang / snying brtse ba can nyid du bgyi ba dang / snying brtse ba can chen
254a7(rgyud 'bum): po can du bgyi ba dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar bcom ldan 'das bdag spobs pa skyed par gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag spobs pa skyed par gsol/ bcom
254b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i ris 'dis nyid nas lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bgyi ba zhig shi 'phos te/ dus las 'das nas dgung bdun lon lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de gang du
254b2(rgyud 'bum): skyes/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni ci zhig myong bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das lung bstan du gsol// bde bar gshegs pa lung bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i
254b3(rgyud 'bum): dbang po de'i dus la bab par shes na nyon cig/ lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dus ni 'di lags so/ bde bar gshegs pa dus dang tshod ni 'di lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
254b4(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de 'di nas shi 'phos nas mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes nas/ des der lo stong phrag bcu gnyis kyi bar du sdug
254b5(rgyud 'bum): bsngal ma rungs shing mi bzad pa myong nas sems can dmyal ba chung ngu rnams su 'ang lo brgya phrag brgyar sdug bsngal myong ngo / / byol song dang yi dgas kyi skye gnas su'ang lo brgya phrag brgyar sdug bsngal myong
254b6(rgyud 'bum): ngo/ / de nas yul mtha' 'khob kyi mir skyes nas kyang 'on pa dang / rig pa dang / lkugs pa'i rang bzhin can dang / smra ba mi gsal bar lo stong phrag drug cu'i bar du myong nas/ lo stong phrag brgyad cu
254b7(rgyud 'bum): rtsa bzhir nang rnag khrag 'dzag pa dang / mdze dang / phol mig rnams kyis gzir ba dang / skye bo mang pos smad pa dang / yongs kyis spangs pa dang / rigs dman pa'i rigs can rjes su myong zhing
255a1(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal ba dang / sdug bsngal brgyud pa dang / gzhan la gnod pa byed pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa bar chad med pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa dang / gzhan yang sdug bsngal gcig nas gcig tu
255a2(rgyud 'bum): brgyud pa myong zhing myong bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i bu thams cad kyis thos nas shin tu sngangs shing skrag ste skyo nas kha sbub tu 'gyel to// de nas yang langs nas 'di skad ces gsol
255a3(rgyud 'bum): to/ / bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal brgyud pa 'di las ji ltar na 'di thar par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa ji ltar thar par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'di
255a4(rgyud 'bum): las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba 'di skyab tu gsol/ / bde bar gshegs pa 'di sgrub tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa
255a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhis kyang bshad pa 'di ngas kyang bshad kyis nyon cig/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis yang bcom ldan 'das la me tog man+da ra ba dang / man+da ra ba chen po dang / me tog rnam pa sna tshogs
255a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang / phyag gdub dang / dpung rgyan dang / snyan cha dang / do shal dang / be mo do la sog pa'i rgyan gyi khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mngon par mchod de/ lan brgya
255a7(rgyud 'bum): stong phrag du mar bskor ba byas shing phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das legs so// bde bar gshegs pa legs so zhes bya bas mnyes par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig
255b1(rgyud 'bum): rten la phan pa dang bde bar bgyi ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams ngan song gi rgyud gsum las rnam par thar par bgyi ba'i slad du legs par bshad du gsol/ de nas yang tshangs pa la sogs
255b2(rgyud 'bum): pa lnga mang po rnams kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das legs so// bde bar gshegs pa legs so// ci nas kyang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyis mtshan tsam thos
255b3(rgyud 'bum): pas kyang ngan song gsum gyi lam las rnam par grol te/ bde 'gro lha'i 'jig rten las mi'i 'jig rten du skyes nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bgyi ba'i slad du bshad du gsol
255b4(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir/ / don yod gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje'i byin gyi
255b5(rgyud 'bum): rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / de nas yang thugs ka nas sngags 'di phyung nas lha de dag dam tshig can du byin gyis brlabs so// oM sarba bid+yA badz+ra a d+hiSh+ThA na dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM
255b6(rgyud 'bum): d e ltar ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas kyang gdon mi za bar mi choms pa'i rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
255b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / / oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni shud+d+he bi shud+d+he sar+b+ba kar+m+ma A ba ra Na bi shud d+he swAhA/ rig pa chen mo 'di bshad ma thag tu sems can thams cad kyi ngan song
256a1(rgyud 'bum): gi rgyud kyi bcing ba thams cad rnam par chad do/ / ngan 'gro thams cad rnam par sbyangs so// sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rnams rab tu zhi ste/ skye bo mang po rnams bde ba dang ldan par gyur to//
256a2(rgyud 'bum): / de nas gzhan yang gsang ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ya sar+b+ba a pA yaM sarba satwe b+h+yo hUM/ lha'i dbang po gzhan yang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'o// oM sarba a pA ya bi sho d+ha ne
256a3(rgyud 'bum): hUM phaT/ lha'i dbang po gzhan yang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o// oM traT/ lha'i dbang po gzhan yang 'di ni ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'i snying po'o//
256a4(rgyud 'bum): haM/ lha'i dbang po gzhan yang mdor na dran pa tsam gyis kyang bsod nams chung ba'i sems can rnams ngan song gi rgyud thams cad las bde blag tu rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba ni 'di yin no// oM na mo b+ha ga ba te
256a5(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba dun ti pa ri sho d+ha na rA dza ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ arba te sa myaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni/ bi sho d+ha ni bi sho d+ha ni/ sar+b+ba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni shud+d+he bi shud+d+he/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma A ba ra Na bi shud+d+he swAH
256a6(rgyud 'bum): oM sar+b+ba bid+yA sar+b+ba A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ya han hU~M phaT/ oM sar+b+ba bi hU~M/ oM satwa bid phaT/ oM sar+b+ba bid a/ oM sar+b+ba bid traT/ oM sar+b+ba rid mo/ oMs rkA bid mo/ oM sar+b+ba ding swa/ oM sar+b+ba bid a/ oM saH
256a7(rgyud 'bum): bid+yA trAM/ oM sar+b+ba bid traH/ oM ba/ oM b+ha/ lha'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i gsang ba'i snying po 'di rigs kyi bu 'am/
256b1(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang yang rung bas ming tsam yang nyan tam/ bcangs sam/ bklags sam/ bris nas kyang mgo bo 'am/ gtsug pud dam/ dpung pa 'am/ mgul du btags te 'chang na tshe 'di nyid
256b2(rgyud 'bum): la dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad dam/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang 'brel ba rmi lam gyi rnam pa 'am/ ngan song dang 'brel ba'i mtshan ma de dag thams cad rmi lam tsam du'ang mi 'byung na/ dkyil 'khor du ji
256b3(rgyud 'bum): lta ba bzhin du zhugs la/ zhugs nas kyang dbang bskur la snying po'ang bzlas/ sngags kyi don yang sgom pa gang yin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de dag la ni sdig pa gang yang nye bar mi 'gyur/ ngan song
256b4(rgyud 'bum): du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ / skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ byol song ngam/ yi dgas sam/ sems can dmyal ba la sogs te/ gang yang
256b5(rgyud 'bum): rung ba shi ba'i lus dkyil 'khor du bcug ste dbang bskur na/ de sems can dmyal bar skyes na'ang de ma thag tu rnam par thar nas/ lha'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro// lha'i rigs der skyes nas kyang de bzhin gshes
256b6(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi chos nyid mngon sum du byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsnyen bkur la sogs pa'ang byed/ phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur/ rgyud nges pa can du'ang 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs
256b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rigs su 'ang skye/ sgrib pa rnams rab tu spangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs sam/ lha'i rigs sam/ gzhan gang yang rung bar bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po 'dor
257a1(rgyud 'bum): na 'jig rten nam 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phan pa dang bde ba thams cad myong bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin du bskor ba byas te phyag
257a2(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ngan song thams cad kyi dbang du gyur pa rnams la phan pa dang bde bar bgyi ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can de dag ngan song thams cad la rgyab kyis phyogs par
257a3(rgyud 'bum): bgyi ba dang / bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde blag tu rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/ rje cig bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas de bzhin
257a4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i gzi
257a5(rgyud 'bum): brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems// bla na med pa rtogs gyur pa// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i ye shes gang // de ni dkyil 'khor snying por gsungs//
257a6(rgyud 'bum): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du phyi'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// gtsug lag khang dang skye mos tshal// mchod rten lha khang kun dga' sogs// ji bzhin pa yaM
257a7(rgyud 'bum): cho ga yis/ / gnas ni byin gyis brlab pa brtsam// byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas der ni// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa dang // them skas bzhi yi
257b1(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba dang / seng ge ba glang rnams kyis brgyan// ngar dang lnga ldi do shal 'phreng // dril bu dang ni rnga mas brgyan// rdo rje rin chen pad+mo dang // rgya gram pa yi phyag rgyas brgyan// srad bu brgyad dang ldan pa dang /
257b2(rgyud 'bum): phyi yi sgo khyud rnams kyis brgyan// dgu yi char ni bgos pa las// sgo dang sgo khyud sum char bya// rdo rje srad bus thig gdab bo// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra ba la// lte bar
257b3(rgyud 'bum): bcas shing rtsibs bcu drug/ rim pa gsum dang ldan pa la// rtsibs ni nyis 'gyur nyid du bya// dbus kyi phyogs su kun rig ni// dung dang kun+da zla 'dra la// zhal bzhi pa la rdo rje yis// seng ge'i
257b4(rgyud 'bum): gdan la bzhugs pa dang / / ting 'dzin phyag rgyar ldan pa dang // rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan par bri// de yi spyan sngar ngan song kun// sbyong ba'i rgyal po bri bya ste// phyag gnyis ting 'dzin tshul du bsnol//
257b5(rgyud 'bum): zla ba rgyas dang pad+ma'i mdog/ rgyan rnams kun gyis legs rdzogs la// rgyal mchog skyes bus gang bar bri// rgyab tu shAkya'i rigs dbang po// gtso bo thub pa bri bar bya// g.yon dang g.yas kyi phyogs char ni/
257b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal mchog rin chen me tog gnyis// lo tsa nA dang mA ma kI// de bzhin dkar mo sgrol ma rnams// rang gi rigs kyi mtshan ma bzhin// grwa yi phyogs ni kun tu bri// rtsibs kyi nang ni thams cad du// rdo rje sems
257b7(rgyud 'bum): sogs sems dpa' mchog/ rdzu 'phrul chen po'i sems dpa' rnams// go rims bzhin du bri bar bya// mkhas pas lA s+ye la sogs pa// mchod pa grwa yi phyogs su bri// sgo yi phyogs ni thams
258a1(rgyud 'bum): cad du/ sgo ba bzhi ni bri bar bya// rta babs khyams ni thams cad du// byams pa la sogs bri bar bya// nyan thos rgyal ba thams cad dang // de bzhin rang rgyal gtso bo rnams//
258a2(rgyud 'bum): khro bo mngag pa pho nya sogs// bri bya yang na ming yang rung // phyi yi dkyil 'khor phyi rol du// gling bzhi po ni bri bar bya// 'dzam bu'i gling du tshangs pa bri// byang phyogs su ni dbang phyug che// shar dang nub kyi
258a3(rgyud 'bum): gling du ni/ / brgya byin gtogs 'dod thams cad ni// 'khor dang bcas pa bri bar bya// gzhan dag rnams kyang de bzhin te// lha min dri za nam mkha' lding // gnod sbyin srin po lto 'phye na// 'byung po yi dgas/
258a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dre rnams dang // klu dang grul bum ri rnams dang // rgyal po bzhi rnams bri bar bya// gza' dang skar ma rgyu skar dang // khro bo ma rung 'tshe ba yin// bgegs dang bi nA ya ka rnams// sems can kun la phan byed
258a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i/ drang srong skal ba chen po rnams// 'phra men ma dang bud med bri// de bzhin sring mo rnal 'byor ma// 'byung ba bzhi yi lha chen po// khyim dang ri la gnas pa dang // shing dang kun dga'i nags la sogs/
258a6(rgyud 'bum): dur khrod grong khyer gnas pa'i rnams// ming dang brda'am yang na ni// thig le rnams kyang bri bar bya// de nas mkhas pas dkyil 'khor la// bla re rgyal mtshan lhab lhub dang // gdugs dang rnga ma lnga ldi dang /
258a7(rgyud 'bum): 'phan dang sna tshogs na bzas mchod// gser las byas pa'i bya rnams ni// brgyad dam bcu drug lhag kyang rung // dbang bskur rin chen chus bkang ba'i// bum pa lnga ni gnag par bya// mar me gtor ma bum pa
258b1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / mdzes pa'i bshos rnams gzhag bya ste// bza' ba btung ba sbyar legs dang // bca' ba sna tshogs gzhag par bya// gnod sbyin srin po'i kha zas su// gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag/
258b2(rgyud 'bum): 'byung po dag dang klu dag dang // mi dang mi min de bzhin te// me tog dri rnams sna tshogs dang // 'o ma mar dang kha rar bcas// rnam rgyal bum pa dri yi chus// rab tu bkang ba gzhag par bya// de nas khrus
258b3(rgyud 'bum): la sogs byas la/ / dri dang 'phreng mchog 'phreng ba can// dri zhim kha bkang mchog mdzes pa// rdo rje 'dzin mas zhugs nas kyang // me tog thogs te sgo phyogs 'dug/ gtso bo rgyal ba sras kyi 'khor/
258b4(rgyud 'bum): mang po rnams ni spyan drangs te// phyag rgya sngags dang bdag ldan zhing // lcags kyu la sogs rnal 'byor gyis// dzaHhUM baM hoHthugs rje bdag/ tshur gshegs zhes ni brjod nas kyang // gsang ba'i bcing
258b5(rgyud 'bum): pab bcangs nas ni/ / mdzub gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul du bya// zhags pa bzhin du sbyar nas kyang // de nyid lcags sgrog tshul du bya// mtheb gnyis nang du bkug nas ni// bskyed par gyur nas dbang
258b6(rgyud 'bum): du 'gyur/ / de nas mtshan ma skyes nas ni// thog ma med pa mngon sum mthong // a r+g+ha mchog brtags bsad la sogs pa yi// dbyangs rgan pa yis bstod dang lha rdzas kyi// mchog gi dam pa rnams
258b7(rgyud 'bum): kyis legs par mchod/ / de nas 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma bya// sems can bkres shing skom pas gdung pa dang // phyogs na gnas pa rnams la rnam par brtags// de yi gtor ma ji ltar mthun
259a1(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / de nas sngags pas bla med byang chub kyi// gnas su slob ma yongs su smin bya ba// 'gro la phan phyir myur du byang chub par// de dag byang chub sems mchog bskyed du
259a2(rgyud 'bum): gzhug/ de rnams byin brlabs byang chub smon lam gdab// zab cing rgya che ba yi chos bsgrags la// bsrung bar byas nas brtul zhugs sdom gnas pa// rang gi kha nas sngags brjod gzhug par bya//
259a3(rgyud 'bum): dar la sogs pas mig gnyis g.yogs nas ni// rdo rje 'dzin ma dpal gyi lag gnyis bya// me tog rin chen la sogs de brgyan la// yon gyis lag pa bkang ste gzhug par bya// sngags ni 'di
259a4(rgyud 'bum): rnams yin no/ / oM badz+ra a d+hi tiSh+Tha sa hUM// oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra pra be sha hUM/ a sa me tri sa me ma hA sa ma ye hUM/ de nas sngags 'dis me tog la sogs pa dor bar bya'o// sangs rgyas
259a5(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub thob bya'i phyir/ / bdag la thugs brtser dgongs nas ni// 'gro la phan phyir gtso chen gyis// dman par dgongs nas bzhes su gsol// oM badz+ra pra ti gr-ih+Na hA/ oM pra tIts+tsha/ badz+ra sa ma
259a6(rgyud 'bum): ya s+t+waM/ me tog rin chen la sogs gang // bab par gyur pa rigs kyi lha// gtso bo'i rigs de bsgrubs na ni// dngos grub 'gyur te the tshom med// de nas sngags pa mkhas pa yis// sngags 'dis
259a7(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig sbyin par bya/ / oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya hr-i da ya me pra be sho dr-i D+ha tiSh+Tha hUM/ de nas 'dis dam tshig bsgrag par bya'o// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig 'das na sreg par
259b1(rgyud 'bum): byed/ dadam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub/ ci ste dam tshig 'das na ni// de ma thag tu bkas nas gshegs// rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros nas kyang // bdun brgyud rigs ni
259b2(rgyud 'bum): rlag par mdzad/ / de bas rtag tu bu khyod kyis// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i dam tshig dang // sdom pa dang ni bla ma'i bka'// shin tu mos pas bsrung bar bya// khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya// ma byin par yang
259b3(rgyud 'bum): blang mi bya/ / brdzun dang 'dod la spyod pa rnams// dngos grub 'dod pas bya ma yin// chang 'di btung bar mi bya zhing // sha la sogs pa bza' mi bya// sems can gnod pa sbyor ba ni// nams
259b4(rgyud 'bum): kyang bya ba ma yin te/ / dkon mchog gsum ni yong mi spang // dus kun tu ni byang chub sems// snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang // lha dang bla ma de bzhin no// sdig la sogs pa gang yin dang // bla ma'i
259b5(rgyud 'bum): bka' las 'da' mi bya/ / lha la phul ba'i rnying pa dang // de yi grib ma 'gom mi bya// phyag rgya'i gzugs la'ang de bzhin te// sngags dang lha la'ang smad mi bya// gdon gyi las sogs bya ma yin//
259b6(rgyud 'bum): mu stegs can la'ang smang mi bya// mdor na yid gnyis som nyi the tshom mi bya ste// bdag gi de nyid dang ni sngags sogs de bzhin no// mos pa brtan dang ldan pas dam bcas nas// sarba bi d+has ji bzhin
259b7(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur te/ / bum pa la sogs ji snyed mang thogs pas// bcu po rnams kyis dbang bcu ci dgar bskur// de nas lag tu dril dang rdo rje byin// 'khor lo la sogs rin chen bdun thogs la// mi dbang dbang
260a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'khor lo thob pa dang / / sdig pa gzhom phyir dbang ni bskur bar bya// sngags sgrub phyir ni mos ldan slob ma la// sngags pas bka' ni rab tu bsgo bar bya// des kyang mos pas
260a2(rgyud 'bum): spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ / ci ste nor yod tha mar dbul bar bya// nor dang gter dang 'bru dang dbyig dang gser// bzhon dang khyim gdan bu pho bu mo rnams// skyes pa dag dang bud med yang na ni// grong dang
260a3(rgyud 'bum): grong khyer de bzhin ci bzhed rnams/ / rang gi sems ni rab tu dad pa yis// yon gyi mchog nyid dbul ba nyid du bya// myur du 'grub phyir mos pas bla ma la// mdor na rang gi lus kyang dbul bar bya// tshe 'di'i
260a4(rgyud 'bum): bde ba ma lus dang / / 'jig rten phyi ma'i bde mchog dang // sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob 'gyur na// lha yi bde ba smos ci dgos// sangs rgyas kun dang bla mar mnyam// rdo rje slob dpon brnyas na ni//
260a5(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu sdug bsngal 'thob 'gyur bas// cung zad tsam yang brnyas mi bya// rdo rje spun dang sring mo dang // rdo rje ma rnams nyid la ni// rnal 'byor can gyis brnyas ma yin// rtag tu khon gyis gcugs mi bya//
260a6(rgyud 'bum): dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang // bla ma smod byed ma rungs pa// dam tshig las ni 'das pa dang // de la sogs pa'i gnod byed la// bzod pa bsgom par mi bya ste// de ltar gyur na kun rig gis//
260a7(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sems can kun la phan pa dang // brtser ldan dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin
260b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / lha'i 'jig rten du bcas pa rnams kyi don dang // phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di gsungs so// ras la bcom ldan 'das thams cad rig pa de bzhin du bris la// g.yas su ni de
260b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po/ g.yon phyogs su ni shAkya thub pa/ ngan song thams cad sbyong ba'i 'og tu ni kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdog zla ba
260b3(rgyud 'bum): pra phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ / shAkya thub pa'i 'og tu ni phyag na rdo rje/ de gnyis kyi bar du sman gyi bla mdog sngon po phyag gcig na 'bras bu a ru ra bsnams// phyag gcig ni mchog sbyin du bya/ rta mgrin
260b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba ma rungs pa 'joms la brtson pa gnyis ni rang gi lha la brten par bri// de gnyis kyi dbus su lo tsa nA dang / mA ma kI dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma
260b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams rang rang gi mtshan ma phyag na bsnams par bri/ / de dag gi 'og tu pad+ma'i rdzing bu chu dang / chu srin dang / nya dang / rus sbal dang / sbal pa dkar po dang / nya khar ba la sogs par bcas pa dang / chu
260b6(rgyud 'bum): las skyes pa'i me tog rnam pa du mas yongs su gang bar bri/ bdug pa dang / mar me dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / bshos dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa bri/ de'i 'og
260b7(rgyud 'bum): tu sgrub pa po nyid thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug par bri/ de nas ri mo'i sku gzugs de mngon par mchod de/ bdag nyid kyis spyan dbye ba bya zhing bden pa la byin gyis brlabs par dmigs par bya'o//
261a1(rgyud 'bum): de nas ci ste mtshan ma zhig mthong na ni myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// 'on te ma mthong na ni ring mo zhig nas dngos grub tu 'gyur te/ bzhad pa dang ni rnga sgra dang // dril bu'i sgra
261a2(rgyud 'bum): dang 'brug sgra dang / / dge slong bram ze pho mo dang // 'bras bu mthong na myur du ni// mchog dang bar ma tha ma 'grub// de nas gzugs de gsang sngags dang // phyag rgya mngon par byin brlabs nas// ci bdog
261a3(rgyud 'bum): pas ni mchod par bya/ / rtag tu mngon sum 'dug nas kyang // 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal gyis// bdag srung la sogs byas nas kyang // bdag gi de nyid bsam nas su// dngos grub mtshan ma byung
261a4(rgyud 'bum): bar du/ / 'bum phrag gsum mam drug 'bum bzlas// de nas dben pa'i gnas su ni// brgyad brgya nyid du tshang bar bya// sngags ni 'khrul pa med par bzlas// de nas bzlas pa'i mjug tu ni// dkyil
261a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor snga ma bzhin bsams la/ / mchod pa rgya chen byas nas kyang // mtshan gcig thog thag bzlas par bya// ci ste gtso 'am de yi sras// yang na lha rnams mthong gyur na// bsod nams snod la ci dag
261a6(rgyud 'bum): bar/ dngos grub mchog ni gsol bar bya// lha ni dngos grub 'bras bu ni// de la rtag tu dgyes nas stsol// phyag 'tshal dngos grub la sogs blang // dkon mchog gsum dang bla ma la// skal ba re re
261a7(rgyud 'bum): phul nas ni/ / de nas rtag tu bdag spyod cing // med na mkhas pa bdag nyid kyis// blangs nas bdag nyid spyad par bya// sems can kun la phan brtson par// bskal pa du mar gnas par 'gyur/
261b1(rgyud 'bum): ci ste dngos grub ma gyur na// las rnams thams cad nus par 'gyur// gnod sbyin skar mda'i gdong la sogs// chad pas bcad cing bka' tsam gyis// zhi ba la sogs las kun ni// bran bzhin
261b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad byed par 'gyur/ / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sdig pa bgyis pas sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i
261b3(rgyud 'bum): dbang du gyur pa rnams ji ltar sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i sdug bsngal spang ba'i slad du bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po nyon cig/ sems
261b4(rgyud 'bum): can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems can sdig pa'i byed pa/ sdig pa chen po byed pa de dag ci nas kyang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal las thabs sla bas grol bar 'gyur ba nyon cig/
261b5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// snga ma bzhin du bum pa la// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas ni// dbang bskur ba ni rab tu brtag/ de nas sdig pa kun sbyangs te// dmyal ba la sogs sdug bsngal las/
261b6(rgyud 'bum): de ni myur du rnam par thar// sdig las rnam grol bdag nyid de// dag par gyur pa'i lha rnams kyi// rigs su skyes par gyur nas kyang // de ni rtag tu sangs rgyas dang // chos bgro ba ni thos par 'gyur// de yi/
261b7(rgyud 'bum): gzugs brnyan bri ba 'am// gur kum gyis ni ming yang rung // ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal las// sems can rnams ni grol ba'i phyir// sngags mkhan gzhan la phan brtson zhing // snying rje can gyis
262a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur ro/ / de nas rnal 'byor can gyis ni// sngags dang phyag rgyas de dbang bskur// lha yi gzugs su brtags nas kyang // mchod rten dbus su gzhag par bya// rang
262a2(rgyud 'bum): gi lha 'am lha gzhan gyi/ / snying po snying khar bris nas kyang // lha 'dra bar ni sems bskyed de// khyim gyi nang du gzhag par bya// de yi ming yang smos nas ni// gur kum bzang pos sngags bris la//
262a3(rgyud 'bum): rim gyis 'bum ni tshang tsam du// mchod rten las ni rab tu bya// sdig can sdig ni zad bya'i phyir// bye ba snyed ni tshang bar bya// de ltar byas na nges par ni// dmyal ba las ni grol bar gyur// yi dgra
262a4(rgyud 'bum): byol song sdug bsngal las/ / grol te lha yi gnas su skye// de nas ming yang brjod nas ni// ji skad gsungs pa'i sngags bzla zhing // 'bum phrag stong ngam yang na ni// brgya phrag stong du tshang ba dang /
262a5(rgyud 'bum): bye ba stong du rab bzlas na// lha yi gnas su nges par skye// de yi ming nas brjod nas kyang // mkhas pas 'bum phrag brgya'am ni// yang na brgya phrag stong snyed du// sbyin sreg byas par gyur na ni/
262a6(rgyud 'bum): dmyal ba chen por gyur pa yi// sdig pa de las thar par 'gyur// ji srid mtshan ma shin tu ni// 'bar ba'i gnas na skyes gyur par// til dang yungs kar 'bras rnams dang // ra yi 'o mar ldan pa
262a7(rgyud 'bum): dang dri yi bskus pa'i yam shing gis/ / cho ga bzhin du sbyin sreg bya// de nas de ni nges par yang // lha yi gnas su skyes gyur nas// de yi mtshan ma ston par byed// yang na lha yis mchog tu 'gyur/
262b1(rgyud 'bum): yang na ho khung nang du ni// me yi lhas ni ston byed cing // lha yi gnas su skyes pa dang // sdig pa bcom pa'i mtshan mar ni// dkar po nyid dang g.yas su 'bar// gyen du 'bar zhing dri ma med// zlum zhing rnam
262b2(rgyud 'bum): bar mi 'phro la/ / brtan la grol bzhin dri ma med// yang na me lha nyid kyis ni// bdag nyid de bzhin ston byed de// zla ba dri med dkar 'dra la// bzhin mdog dkar zhing lam mer 'bar// de ni mtshan ma 'di dag
262b3(rgyud 'bum): gis/ / dmyal ba la sogs rnam grol zhing // sdig pa bcom nas bde 'gror ni// skyes pa yin par shes par bya// khru bzhi pa yi tshad du ni// cho ga bzhin du khung brkos la// rdo rje mtha' ma bskor ba yi//
262b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo dbus su bri bar bya// rigs lnga yi ni phyag rgya rnams// ji bzhin pa yi phyogs su bri// de bzhin sems dpa' rnams dang ni// 'jig rten gtso la sogs pa bri// bya dang bum pa gang ba dang // gtor mas
262b5(rgyud 'bum): snod rnams bkang ba dang / / brgyad snyed tsam du gzhag pa 'am/ yang na bcu drug snyed du gzhag/ bza' ba dang ni bca' ba'i bshos// me tog 'phreng sogs de bzhin te// bla re rgyal mtshan dar la sogs// gdugs
262b6(rgyud 'bum): mchog rnams kyis legs par brgyan/ / sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor dam par ni// sbyin sreg rab tu bya ba ni// cho ga shes pas bris nas kyang // lha rnams mang po spyan drangs la// sngags shes pas ni sngags phyag
262b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas arga phul bas shes nas kyang / / mdor na mchod pa byas nas ni// lha yi sbyor bas rab gnas la// ga pur gur kum la sogs pas// mar dang 'o ma til bgos la// til dang yungs kar 'bras
263a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / / dri yi chus ni legs bkang ste// 'bras chan yos dpal du dang // sbrang rtsi sha ka rar ldan pa// brgya phrag du mar yongs bzlas la// yam shing la ni de bzhin te// rang gi sngag
263a2(rgyud 'bum): kyis btab pa'i shing / / khong bu nang du gzhag par bya// ro la sngags kyis btab nas kyang // chu mchog gis ni bkrus nas su// bzlas pa'i dri yis byugs par bya// gos dang rgyan gyis klubs nas kyang // sngags
263a3(rgyud 'bum): kyis btab pa'i bdug pas bdugs/ / me tog 'phreng la sogs pas mchod// gtsug phud dpung par de bzhin du// sngags bris nas ni gdags par bya// snying kha lkog ma kha phyogs su// sarba bid+yas byin
263a4(rgyud 'bum): gyis brlab/ / dpral ba mdzod spu rtsab gnyis// mgo bo gtsug pud dpung pa gnyis// sna dang rkeng pa pus mo bol// long bu sna yi rtse mo dang // mig gnyis dang ni gsang ba yi// dbang po rnams kyi gnas
263a5(rgyud 'bum): la ni/ / de ltar gzhan du yi ge sngags// mchog tu dge ba rnams gzhag go// de nas ngan song sbyang ba'i phyir// stan dang bcas te thab dbus su// gzhag pa nyid du bya ba yin// de nas sngags 'chang sngags/
263a6(rgyud 'bum): kyis ni// btab pa'i gos kyis g.yog par bya// de nas byin za dge ba rab sbar la// me lce stong gis 'khrigs shing 'bar ba'i lus// zla dkar kun da'i zhi la zhi ba'i lus// mtha' yas pa yi gzugs kyis
263a7(rgyud 'bum): me bkug la/ / arga dbul bar brtags nas de bzhin du// blo mchog ldan pa'i mdun gzugs sogs gzhag/ de bzhin gshegs tshogs de bzhin spyan drangs la// arga la sogs btags te de bzhin du//
263b1(rgyud 'bum): bde gshegs gsungs pa'i mchod pa la sogs bya// de nas byin za la ni brtag bya la// sreg byas bkang ste de yang sbar ba'i phyir// de nas sreg byas bkang ste rim gyis ni// rgyal la sogs la rgya rtsa brgyad
263b2(rgyud 'bum): du brtag/ de nas sbyong ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po la// bsreg par bya ba nyi shu rtsa gcig brtag/ de nas spyan drangs yo byad lan gsum dang // arga la sogs pad+ma'i dkar zhal mchod// phyag na rdo rje pad+ma zhags
263b3(rgyud 'bum): bsnams pa'i/ / 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs// zhabs kyi pad+mas sdig mnan cing // rgyan rnams kun ni rab rdzogs la// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi dbu rgyan mtho// bsams sam
263b4(rgyud 'bum): yang na bris kyang rung / / de yi snying pos de bzhin du// brgya phrag stong ngam yang na ni// bye ba'i tshad du sbyin sreg bya// ci ste mtshan ma la sogs 'byung // de bzhin sdig can rgyud ces bya// de nas thal bar gyur pa dang //
263b5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje bsdu ba'i sngags kyis ni// cho ga bzhin du bsdu bar bya// thal ba de dang rus pa'i rdul// sngags kyis btab pa'i dri chu dang // ba skyes 'o ma la sogs lngas// sbyong ba'i sngags kyi blo ldan gyis// 'bum
263b6(rgyud 'bum): du bzlas pas brdzis nas ni/ / ga bur dri dang bsgos pa yis// 'jim pa dang ni bsres nas kyang // gzugs su bya ba'am yang na ni// mchod rten gyi ni ltar byas la// gcig gam gnyis sam gsum mam
263b7(rgyud 'bum): lnga/ yang na brgya rtsa brgyad bar du// sngags dang phyag rgyas btab nas su// 'bum phrag gnyis kyi bar du bzlas// de nas mchod rten 'bar gyur tam// yang na gzugs kyis zhal 'dzum mam// dri dang bdug
264a1(rgyud 'bum): pa 'od kyang rung / / snang ngam yang na dad ldang ngam// lha la sogs pa'i rnam pa ni// sna tshogs par ni snang gyur tam// rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dang // me tog la sogs
264a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dor ba dang / / dung dang rdal sogs pa'i sgras// gling bu pi wang la sogs rnams// ci ste mtshan ma 'di dag ni// sdig can thos ni ma mthong na// 'bum gyi phrag ni brgyad stong ngam// ji srid mtshan ma byung
264a3(rgyud 'bum): bar du/ / de bzhin gshegs pa mchod nas ni// mnyam par bzhag pas bzlas par bya// de yi mthar ni mkhas pas kyang // mtshan gcig thog thag mi nyal bzlas// de nas de yi sdig pa ni// dag pa nyid
264a4(rgyud 'bum): du nges par mthong / / lha yi lus kyi gzugs gyur la// rang gi rgyud du ngo shes 'gyur// mtshan ma 'di dag shes nas ni// rnam par mi rtog sems kyis kyang // byams dang snying rjer ldan pa yis// las rnam
264a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad byed par 'gyur/ / yang na med par gyur na yang // bzlas shing sgom pa'i tshul gyis ni// ming tsam legs par bris nas kyang // mchod rten 'phreng ba bya ba dang // yang na gzugs su bris kyang
264a6(rgyud 'bum): rung / sbyin sreg mngon par dbang bskur na// gdon mi za bar bde 'gror skye// thal ba yungs kar bye ma sogs// rang gi ming smos sngags btab nas// bzlas pa byas te song nas kyang // rgya mtshor 'bab
264a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i klung du dor/ / de lta na ni sdig can yang // ngan song las ni thar 'gyur na// dge ba'i mchog ni bskyed pa dang // byang chub sa bon bskyed pa'i bdag/ sangs rgyas 'bras bu'i rgyu ldan pa// sbyin pa'i pha
264b1(rgyud 'bum): rol phyin par ldan/ / tshul khrims rgyud dang rab ldan pa// bzod pa brtson 'grus mnyam gzhag dang / shes rab rnams kyis rgyu sgom pa'i// 'jig rten bsod nams ldan ci smos// myur du de yi ngan song
264b2(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / bcom par gyur te the tshom med// dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed la// med par lta ba gang yin dang // byang chub lam las rnam log pas// bstan pa zhe sdang gnod byed cing // sdig pa'i rang bzhin ma mthong
264b3(rgyud 'bum): la/ ma dang pha la snying ring zhing // byang chub sems la brten pa dang // 'dod chags bral ba bsad pa rnams// ci ste lha rnams med gyur tam// sangs rgyas dge 'dun chos de bzhin// sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshogs
264b4(rgyud 'bum): la sogs/ / shes rab thabs rnams med na ni// sdig can de dag mi thar zhes// bde gshegs rgyal ba nyid kyis gsungs// de nas brgya byin la sogs lha// pad+ma lta bu'i mig phye nas// legs shes bya bas
264b5(rgyud 'bum): mnyes byas te/ / rab tu mgu nas mchod byas nas// brgya byin gzhan la phan brtson pas// ji skad gsungs pa'i bka' bzhin du// shAkya'i gtso bos bka' stsal pa// bden pa nyid du byas gyur nas// de
264b6(rgyud 'bum): nas de ni dmyal ba yi/ / sdug bsngal las ni thar nas kyang // dga' ldan gnas su sems can kun// phan phyir bde gshegs 'dra bar skyes// de nas dbang por bcas pa yi// grags chen lha rnams gar
264b7(rgyud 'bum): byed cing / / mchod pa'i sprin ni mtha' yas pas// de bzhin gshegs la mchod bya'i phyir// lha yi tshogs kyis mdun byas te// tshe 'di nyid la mchod pa'i phyir// byang chub tu yang sems bskyed nas// lha rdzas
265a1(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa sna tshogs kyi/ / me tog bdug pa byug pa dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan 'phan la sogs// rgyan la sogs pa rab mdzes dang // na bza' rin chen char la sogs// dga' ba'i
265a2(rgyud 'bum): tshal ni gang bar byas/ / de nas ya mtshan cher gyur te// lha rnams kyis kyang phyag 'tshal nas// dga' ba'i tshal ni yid 'ong ba// kun nas gang bar gyur pa yin// sna tshogs 'byung ba 'di ci lags// bcom
265a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ / grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/ rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa 'di ni lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de yin no// mtshams med pa'i dbang du gyur pa'ang myong
265a4(rgyud 'bum): zhing mthong ba chos 'di nyid la bde 'gro'i dbang du gyur pa gang lags pa de ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags so/ / bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar lags so// de nas brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i bu thams
265a5(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis mgrin gcig tu tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ / sangs rgyas 'dra ba'i ston pa med// chos dang 'dra ba'i dge ba med// dge 'dun 'dra ba'i snod med de// sngags dang 'dra ba'i 'dren pa med//
265a6(rgyud 'bum): de nas lha'i bu de dag gis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyi rlabs kyis dga' ldan gyi lha'i rigs su skyes pa'i lha'i bu de ci 'dra ba zhig/
265a7(rgyud 'bum): de'i rdzu 'phrul dang mthu ni ji lta bu lags pa/ lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bgyi ba de bdag cag lta bar 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha thams cad kyi snying skul bar byed pa zhes
265b1(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i 'od zer gyi 'phreng ba nyid kyi zhabs kyi mthe bong gnyis las phyung ngo / / phyung nas kyang nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i lus thams cad snang bar byas nas snying khar zhugs te bskul nas yang de nyid
265b2(rgyud 'bum): du mi snang bar gyur to/ / de nas lha'i bu de nyid rab tu dga' bar gyur nas lus kyi 'od zer gyis dpag tshad brgya phrag stong tshun chad kyi nam mkha'i ngos thams cad gsal bar byas te// lha'i bu stong phrag du ma'i
265b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyis bskor cing mdun du byas nas/ lha'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos mi snang bar byas te 'ongs nas dga' ba'i tshal thams cad gsal zhing snang bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang brgya byin gnyis ma gtogs
265b4(rgyud 'bum): pa lha rnams kyi 'od zil gyis mnan to/ / de nas lha'i bu des/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// kye ma shAkya mgon po yi// sangs rgyas mdzad pa ya
265b5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan cha/ / gang phyir ngan song lhung ba yi// sems can myur du glog bzhin grol// de nas skad cig ma de nyid kyi tshe shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam gyi pad+mo thams cad rin po che las byas pa/ dpag tshad brgya phrag stong
265b6(rgyud 'bum): du dri'i ngad ldang ba/ / lha'i glu snyan pa'i sgra grag pa/ ya mtshan du ma yang dag par ston pa/ lha rdzas kyi glu dang / gar dang / brdung ba dang / gling bu dang / rnga dang / ker ko rnams kyi sgra snyan
265b7(rgyud 'bum): pa 'byin pa zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar byung ste/ de mthong nas kyang shin tu ya mtshan skyes te 'di skad ces smras so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ni bsam mi khyab// sngags kyi yon tan sna
266a1(rgyud 'bum): tshogs bsam mi khyab/ / byang chub rten pa rnams kyang bsam mi khyab// tshangs spyod tshul khrims dri med skye bsam yas// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis blta bar 'dod nas/ yang bcom
266a2(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / lha'i bu de dang de'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams blta bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das blta bar 'tshal lo// bde bar gshegs pa blta bar 'tshal lo// de nas bcom
266a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis yang mthe bong gnyis nas 'od zer phyung ste/ 'od zer dri ma med pa des lha'i 'khor de dag kun snang bar byas te bskul nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de
266a4(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das dang brgya byin gnyis kyi gdan ma gtogs par dga' ba'i tshal thams cad g.yos par byas te/ lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba
266a5(rgyud 'bum): byas shing / bskor ba byas nas yang 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma'o sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni// sngags kyi byin rlabs ya mtshan che// gang phyir mtshams med lhung ba yi// sems can lha gnas myur du
266a6(rgyud 'bum): skyes/ de nas lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba la sogs pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la nor bu dang / gser dang / dngul dang / do shal dang / se mo do dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang /
266a7(rgyud 'bum): snyan cha la sogs pa rgyan gyi khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs du ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 'phan dang / lda ldi dang / rnga ma la sogs pa yo byad kyi khyad par sna tshogs pa dang / seng ge'i gdan
266b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / gzims cha dang / pho brang dang / gzhal med khang dang / khang bu brtsegs pa la sogs pa gnas kyi khyad par sna tshogs pa dang / me tog dang spos la sogs pa mchod pa'i khyad par sna tshogs pa
266b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / rang gi lus dang / ngag dang / sems rnams kyang phul te/ ba lang dang / rta dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / sme'u dang / rko ba dang / thug re dang / ma he dang / bong bu dang /
266b3(rgyud 'bum): rnga mo dang / chu srin dang / phag dang / ra dang / glang dang / ba dang / 'dod pa'i ba bzhon la sogs pa bzhon pa'i khyad par du ma'ang phul nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams
266b4(rgyud 'bum): kyang mngon par mchod/ / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyang mngon par mchod de legs so zhes bya ba gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang brgya byin gnyis la bla ma dang
266b5(rgyud 'bum): bsti stang du byas te phyag 'tshal nas de bzhin du song ngo / / de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la yang dang yang du legs so zhes bya bas
266b6(rgyud 'bum): bstod cing mchod de/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du ma 'ongs pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams 'chang ba dang klog pa la spro bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ de bzhin
266b7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i mtshan brjod pa'i yon tan bshad du gsol/ / brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams ngas bshad kyis legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig/ lha'i bu rnams dge ba bcu dang ldan
267a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du thos par 'gyur gyi/ sems can ma rabs rnams kyis ni ma yin no// pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du
267a2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gro bar 'gyur gyi/ sems can phal pa ma rabs kyis ni ma yin no// sems can bsam pa nges pa rnams dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i yon tan mang po la mngon par 'dod pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna
267a3(rgyud 'bum): lam du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ mdor na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la brten pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha'i bu de dag
267a4(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par dga' ba skyes nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni snod du gyur pa'o// bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag ni snod du gyur pa ste/ gang gi slad du bdag cag gis de bzhin /
267a5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bgyi ba'i mtshan brjod pa 'di bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i zhal nyid nas thos
267a6(rgyud 'bum): pas/ bdag cag ni ngan song gyis 'jigs par mi 'gyur// dus ma lags par 'chi bas 'jigs par mi 'gyur/ 'chi ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa la
267a7(rgyud 'bum): sogs pas 'jigs par mi 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni gdon mi 'tshal bar sangs rgyas nyid 'grub pa'i snod du gyur pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das brtag pa'i rgyal po 'dis sems
267b1(rgyud 'bum): can rnams kyi don bgyid pa gang lags pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag gi 'bras bu ni cir 'gyur/ rnam par smin pa ni cir 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lnga'i dbang po de dag ni
267b2(rgyud 'bum): skyes bu dam pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du blta bar bya ste/ lha'i dbang po gang gi phyir 'jig rten pha rol tu song nas mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i sems
267b3(rgyud 'bum): can dmyal ba chen por skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu spong bar byed pa dang / byang chub la gdon mi za bar rten par byed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa'i sa phyir mi
267b4(rgyud 'bum): ldog pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phyir te/ lha'i dbang po dper na khyod kyis lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes pa'i don byas pa bzhin no//
267b5(rgyud 'bum): lha'i dbang po de ltar gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'i sems can de dag ci so so'i skye bo yin snyam sems sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//
267b6(rgyud 'bum): bde bar gshegs pa ma lags so// lha'i dbang po sems can de dag ni skyes bu dam pa chen po gzhan la phan 'dogs pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang phyag bya ba/ mchod pa//
267b7(rgyud 'bum): rjed pa/ bsti stang du bya ba/ phrag la bskur bar bya ba yin na/ lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams dang / rgyal po chen
268a1(rgyud 'bum): po bzhi dang / phyogs skyong ba bcu dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin chen po nor bu bzang po dang / nor bu bzang po chen po la sogs pa byang chub sems
268a2(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i sa la rab tu gnas pa rnams dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo gnyis dang / 'phrog ma bu lnga brgyas bskor ba rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po pAny+tsi ka dang / pany+tsi ka
268a3(rgyud 'bum): chen po la sogs pa dang / gang gzhan dag kyang rgya che zhing rgya che ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / me 'am ci dang / lto 'phye
268a4(rgyud 'bum): chen po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / 'dre dang / rims dang / gdon dang / dug dang / skar ma la sogs pa thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
268a5(rgyud 'bum): bdag cag 'dus shing tshogs pa thams cad kyis skyes bu dam pa chen po de'i rkang pa gnyis mgo bos blang bar bgyi'o/ / mdor na rtag par rgyun du dus thams cad du bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar
268a6(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das gang du brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pas 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par 'chad par 'gyur ram/ gdugs dang /
268a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas mchod par 'gyur ram/ rgyal rigs sam/ bram ze'i rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan yang rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i
268b1(rgyud 'bum): bu mo 'am/ rgyal po'i btsun mo 'am/ rgyal po'i 'khor po 'am/ rgyal po'i 'khor mo 'am/ gang su'ang rung bas 'chang zhing klog pa dang / gzhan pa rgya cher yang dag par 'chad cing ston pa'i
268b2(rgyud 'bum): bar du bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'dus shing tshogs pa thams cad de'i bran du gyur pa lags so// rang gi skye bo dang / gnyen gyi skye bo dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang /
268b3(rgyud 'bum): ljongs dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ dus dus su char dbab par bgyi/ 'bru la sogs pa bskyed par bgyi/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du bsgrub
268b4(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi/ pha rol gyi phru ma mang po gzhom par gyi/ sems can ma rungs pa gnod cing 'tshe ba pos de la mi phan pa'i sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de dag brlag par bgyi ba'i slad du bsgrub par bgyi/
268b5(rgyud 'bum): ma rungs par bgyi/ de la bdud kyi las kyang bgyi/ gnod par bgyi ba la'ang nye bar gnas par bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das mdor na ma 'ong ba'i sems can rnams la brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di ni sangs rgyas
268b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi mdzad pa lta bur gnas pa lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis bu bzhin du bskyang bar bgyi'o// lha'i dbang po khyod kyis ji ltar smras pa de de bzhin te/ brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di ni de
268b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du blta bar bya'o/ / lha'i dbang po legs kyis/ 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i sems can sdig pa'i chos la kun tu spyod pa/ sems can dmyal ba'i dbang du gyur pa/ 'khor ba mi gtsang ba'i
269a1(rgyud 'bum): dong du bying ba'i sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir yun ring por bag yod par byos la sgrubs shig/ / bam po gnyis pa/
269a2(rgyud 'bum): / de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus brtag pa'i rgyal po brtag pa phyi ma 'di bshad do// dpa' bo gdan las bzhengs nas mi
269a3(rgyud 'bum): dgyes shing rdo rje gsor nas kyang / / shAkya'i dbang po dgyes mdzad pa// thub pa'i gtsol phyag 'tshal nas// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
269a4(rgyud 'bum): nas/ ngan song thams cad las rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba rang gi snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba pA pa da ha na badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba pA pa bi sho d+ha na badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba kar+m+ma A ba ra
269a5(rgyud 'bum): NA ni basmi ku ru hUM phaT/ oM b+h+rUM bi na sha ya A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ oM hUM bi sho d+ha ya A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ ha na ha na/ sarba a bA ra Na ni hUM phaT/ oM suM sa ra sa ra pra sa
269a6(rgyud 'bum): ra pra sa ra A ba ra NA ni hU~M phaT/ oM hU~M ha ra ha ra sar+b+ba A ba ra Na ni hU~M phaT/ oM hUM phaT sar+b+ba A ba ra NA ni s+pho Ta ya hUM phaT/ oM b+h+r-i ta b+h+r-i ta sar+b+ba a ba ra Na ni hU~M phaT/ oM tAT taT sar+b+ba A ba ra NA ni hU~M trAT/ oM ts+tshin+da
269a7(rgyud 'bum): ts+tshin+da sarba a ba ra Ne ni hU~M phaT/ oM bau dra ba bi dra ba sar+b+ba A pA ya tAd+hA NA ni hU~M phaT/ oM da sang ha sa rba na ra ka ga tiHhU~M hU~M phaT/ oM pa tsa pa tsa sar+b+ba pre ta ga to sa~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM ma the ma tha sar+b+ba tid+ya ga shi ti he hU~M hUM phaT
269b1(rgyud 'bum): / de nas de dag rnams kyi yo byad bshad do// oM sar+b+ba pA paM bi sho d+ha na d+ha ma d+ha ma d+hu pa ya hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba durga ti bi sho d+ha na puSh+pa bi lo ki hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ni dz+nyA na A lo ka ka ri hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba a
269b2(rgyud 'bum): / pA ya ga ti gan+d+ha sha na ga na d+ha ba ti hUM phaT/ sgo ba rnams kyi sngags la/ oM sar+b+ba na ra ka ga ti un+ma ni hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba a pA ya ban+d+ha na bi mo tsa ni hUM baM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba a pA ya b+han+d+ha na mo tsa na hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba a pa
269b3(rgyud 'bum): ya ga ti ga ha na bi nA sha ni hUM ho phaT/ de nas dkyil 'khor bshad de/ 'khor lo 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la// shin tu mdzes pa'i rtsibs brgyad can// lte bar bcas shing rtsibs rten ldan// rang gi rim pa
269b4(rgyud 'bum): bris nas ni/ / lte ba'i nang du shAkya yi// bdag po thub pa gzhag par bya// lag na rdo rje stobs chen ni// dpa' bo de yi spyan sngar bri// rgyab tu 'khor los sgyur ba bri// g.yas phyogs rgyal ba'i gtsug
269b5(rgyud 'bum): tor la/ g.yon par rnam par rgyal ba bri// gzi brjid phung po me yi phyogs// dbang po'i phyogs su gdugs dkar po// rnam par 'thor ba rlung gi phyogs// rnam par 'joms pa nai raM t+ya ra/
269b6(rgyud 'bum): bris nas phyi rol bri bya ste// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// seng ge rta babs brgyan par bya// dpa' bos lcags kyu zhags pa dang // lcags sgrog dril bu snyan rnams gzhag/ grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad
269b7(rgyud 'bum): du/ / bdug pa la sogs bri bar bya// de nas dri zhim dri la sogs// rang gi lus ni bskus nas kyang // rdo rje 'dzin ma zhugs nas ni// oM dzaHhUM baM hoHp+la ga ban/ e hi ma hA kA ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya
270a1(rgyud 'bum): sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes pas lha rnams thams cad spyan drang ngo // de nas gshegs par mos pa bskyed de mchod pa byas nas/ de bzhin du bcug ste dbang bskur na ngan song thams cad las rnam
270a2(rgyud 'bum): par grol te/ bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dang / gong nas gong du sa rnams su'ang skye bar 'gyur ro// dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas su'ang gdon mi za bar 'grub par
270a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / snga ma bzhin du las thams cad kyang byed cing thams cad la thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// byab pa byas pas ni rims nad thams cad dang / gdon dang / dug la sogs pa las thar par 'gyur
270a4(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / phyag na rdo rje'i hUM zhes bya bas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// brtag pa gzhan gyi cho ga thams cad kyang sgrub par 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po la sogs pa ngan
270a5(rgyud 'bum): song gi rgyud kyi dbang du gyur pa rnams kyi shi ba'i ro 'am/ gzugs brnyan nam/ ming la sogs pa bris te bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / dbang rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du ngan song thams cad las yongs
270a6(rgyud 'bum): su grol bar byed do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes seng ge'i lha lhangs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya dam pa'i
270a7(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid bshad par bgyi'o/ / thugs rjes bskul ba'i thugs gsang ba'i// rgyal ba kun gyis byin gyis rlobs// mnyam par gzhag pas dpral bar ni// phyag 'tshal ba yi thal mo sbyar// sangs rgyas
270b1(rgyud 'bum): bde gshegs skyes rnams kyi/ / phyag 'tshal ba yi phyag rgyar bshad// rnal 'byor rig pas mgrin phyogs su// thal mo snyim par sbyar ba ni// rtag tu pad+ma'i rigs nyid kyi// pad+ma'i phyag rgya yin par
270b2(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas kyang // snying khar gung mo'i mtha' sbyar ba// rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya 'di// dam tshig thams cad 'dzin byed pa'o// lag pa g.yon pa'i thal mo gan rkyal du pang du bzhag
270b3(rgyud 'bum): la/ / de'i steng du g.yas pa bzhag ste/ mthe bo'i ngos gnyis smad la zhi ba'i lta bas lta ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ste/ dam tshig yin par bshad do// de nyid las
270b4(rgyud 'bum): bzlog ste lha 'og bsnol la mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis gcig la gcig lu gu rgyud kyi tshul du bsnol te snying khar bzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ / thal mo rdzogs par sbyar ba
270b5(rgyud 'bum): las mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis bsnyams la lhag ma rnams brkyang ba 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ / rdo rje bsdam pa bsdams pa las gung mo gnyis rdo rje 'dra bar bsnyam la mthe bong dang mthe'u
270b6(rgyud 'bum): chung gnyis brkyang ba 'di ni phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis de bzhin du byas la mdzub mo gnyis dang srin lag pad+mo 'dra bar bkug pa ni ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong
270b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rgyal po'i thams cad sbyong ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las mdzub mo dang srin lag gnyis rin po che 'dra bar byas pa ni dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o// mthe'u chung dang mthe bong so sor bsdams la lhag ma
271a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams brkyang ba ni sdig pa thams cad sreg pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / lag pa g.yon pas de bzhin du bsgyur zhing bya ba ni lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// snyim pa bzed la gyen du 'thor ba ni bdug
271a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / de las 'og nas gyen du 'thor ba ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mthe bong gnyis gyen du bsnyams la mdun du 'dzin pa ni mar mo'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las dung 'dra bar byas pa ni dri'i phyag
271a3(rgyud 'bum): rgya'o/ / de nyid las rab tu brkyang ste 'dzin pa ni gtor ma'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las gung mo gnyis nang du bcug pa ni arga'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bcings pa las gung mo gnyis bstan te tshigs dang po bcag la sor mo
271a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad brkyang ba ni rnam par 'thor ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis bkug pa ni rnam par 'joms pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las 'od zer 'bar ba 'dra ba ni gzi brjid phung
271a5(rgyud 'bum): po'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las spyi bor bskor ba ni gdugs dkar po'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las mdzub mo gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis bsnol te mdud la gyen du bskor ba ni 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o//
271a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje bsdams pa las gung mo gnyis rdo rjer byas la mdzub mo gnyis rin po che lta bur byas te lhag ma rnams 'od zer 'dra bar byas pa ni rgyal ba'i gtsug gtor gyi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis
271a7(rgyud 'bum): rdorjer byas la sor mo lhag ma rnams bsdams nas rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni rnam par rgyal ba'i'o/ / g.yas pa mchog sbyin du byas la g.yon pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yin no//
271b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mdzub mo g.yas pa bkug pa ni lcags kyu'i 'o// de nyid las me tog 'dra bar byas pa ni mda'i 'o//
271b2(rgyud 'bum): de nyid las slar bkug ste mthe bong gnyis rtse mo sprad pa ni blo gros legs pa'i 'o// de nyid las tshigs par ma bcag pa ni rin po che'i 'o// de nyid las sor mo las 'od zer 'dra bar 'gyed pa ni gzi
271b3(rgyud 'bum): brjid kyi'o/ / de nyid las spyi bor bzhag pa ni dpal gyi'o// de nyid las mdun du bzhag pa ni bzhad pa'i 'o// de nyid las pad+ma 'dra bar byas pa ni pad+ma'o// de nyid las rtse mo gnyis bkug pa ni ral
271b4(rgyud 'bum): gri'i 'o/ / de nyid las gdu bu 'dra bar byas pa ni 'khor lo'i 'o// de nyid las pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar byas pa ni lce'i 'o// de nyid las rtse mo yid tsam bkyed pa ni rgya gram mo// de nyid las shin tu bkyed
271b5(rgyud 'bum): pa ni srung ba'i 'o/ / de nyid las rtse mo gnyis slar bkug pa ni gnod sbyin gyi'o// dam du bkug pa ni bsdams pa'i 'o// bsdams pa nyid mdun du bkug pa ni bdug pa'i 'o// de nyid gyen du bstod pa ni
271b6(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba'i 'o/ / mdun du mthe bong gnyis bsdams te bskor ba ni mar me'i'o// de nyid byug pa ltar byas pa ni dri'i 'o// de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa ni lcags kyu'i 'o// de nyid las rtse mo
271b7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis sprad pa ni zhags pa'i 'o/ / de nyid las gcig la gcig mdud pa ni lcags sgrog gi'o// de nyid las bskyod pa ni mnyes pa'i 'o// sku gzugs kyi cho ga'ang 'dir de bzhin du byas te cung zad du
272a1(rgyud 'bum): sa bcom ldan 'das 'dig rten gsum la snyarnas par rnal ba'i gzugs rdzog/ mngan su gzugs ni kyis 'khor gyi tshul du rnaMs la ma rtog la sogs mas mdzod/
272a2(rgyud 'bum): spyan sngar 'bum tsam zhig sngar bsnyen pa byas nas las thams cad bya'o// de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i tshogs rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
272a3(rgyud 'bum): las kyi rnam par smin pa gang gis lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bgyi ba de dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi dbang du gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i
272a4(rgyud 'bum): byin gyi rlabs kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / lha'i dbang po nyon cig/ 'di ni sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yin te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi ris 'di nyid na mtha' 'khob pa'i rigs ngan du gtogs pa'i
272a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po lus mi bde ba zhes bya ba zhig tu gyur te/ des mi shes pa'i dbang gis mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pas rgyal po 'dod pa'i phyir rang gi pha 'tsho ba dang phral bar gyur pa dang / ma de'i
272a6(rgyud 'bum): mya ngan gyis gzir bas ma'ang dus las 'das so/ / lan cig ci zhig gi rkyen gyis nags tshal stug po gzhan zhig tu rtse zhing dga' ba'i phyir nye bar song ngo // de na drang srong dgos pa med par byams
272a7(rgyud 'bum): ba zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de mthong ba dang rgyal po shin tu ya mtshan skyes nas/ kye ma 'di lta bu seng ge dang / stag dang / ri dgas dang / phag rgod dang / ba lang dang
272b1(rgyud 'bum): ma he la sogs pa dang / sbrul dang / srin mo dang / brang bu dang / sbrang bu mchu rings dang / sbrul gdug pa can rnams kyis gtse ba/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang
272b2(rgyud 'bum): go ba dang / longs spyod rnams dang rnam par bral ba/ rlung dang grang bas yongs su gdung zhing 'tshe ba ngan bdag nyid chen po 'di gnas so snyam par sems kyis brtags nas de'i drung
272b3(rgyud 'bum): du nye bar song ste phyin pa dang / de la 'di skad ces smras so// drang srong chen po khyod ci'i phyir na rlung dang tsha ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis bdag la gnod par byed/ drang srong
272b4(rgyud 'bum): gis smras pa/ skyes bu chen po bskal pa brgya stong phrag du mar sgrib pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba las sdug bsngal gyi khur bu cung zad tsam zhig blangs nas bla na med pa yang
272b5(rgyud 'bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bas 'di ni sdug bsngal ma yin gyi/ skad cig tsam mam yud tsam zhig yul gyi bde ba rjes su myong
272b6(rgyud 'bum): bas bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma mtha' thug pa med par dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rjes su myong bar 'gyur ro/ / yul gyi bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir pha ma la sogs pa'ang
272b7(rgyud 'bum): gsod par 'gyur na srog chags gzhan lta ci smos te/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun yongs su mi shes pa'i phyir sdig pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// drang srong gis smras
273a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshig de skad ces thos pa dang shin tu 'jigs skrag skyo ste/ sdug bsngal thams cad kyis gzir nas 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun
273a2(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba de ci zhig/ de'i rang bzhin ji lta bu yin pa dka' thub chen po smros shig dang / de la kho bo'ang skyabs su 'chi'o// pha ma la gtses pa dang / srog chags rnams kyi srog bcang na sdig
273a3(rgyud 'bum): pa ji lta bu zhig 'thob par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun zhes bya ba ci zhig/ de'i rang bzhin ji lta bu yin pa yongs su shes na bsod nams ci 'dra ba zhig yongs su 'thob// pha ma
273a4(rgyud 'bum): ma bsad pa dang / srog chags rnams kyang ma bsad na bsod nams ci 'dra ba zhig 'thob// 'bras bu ji lta bu zhig 'thob/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod spangs na bsod nams dang 'bras bu ci 'dra ba zhig/
273a5(rgyud 'bum): 'thob/ de nas drang srong des de la 'di skad ces smras so// ci ste sems can chen po khyod/ nga yi tshig 'di nyan 'dod na/ thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal la/ gus par nyon dang bshad par bya'o// de bzhin
273a6(rgyud 'bum): bgyi zhes bsgrubs nas ni/ / ci bdog pas ni mchod byas te/ sangs rgyas spyod yul sangs rgyas kyi// zab mo'i chos ni nyan par gyur// sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs dag la// thos nas kyang ni skyabs
273a7(rgyud 'bum): su song / / sangs rgyas rnams kyi sgrib med chos// rgyal pos thos nas dga' bar gyur// yi dgas byol song dmyal ba rnams// sdig pa kun gyi 'bras bu ste// yul spyod pa dang srog chags
273b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ gsod cing shin tu mi bzad dang // pha ma gtses pa'i rgyu las byung // bskal pa du mar rab sdug bsngal// dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa// mgon med skyabs kyang med pa ste// thos nas
273b2(rgyud 'bum): mya ngan zug rngu yis/ / rang gi yid la gdungs pa na// ji ltar rlung gis mar me bzhin// de nyid du ni dus las 'das// las kyi rnam smin de yis ni// dga' dang ldan pa'i lhar skyes na// brgya byin lha yi
273b3(rgyud 'bum): dbang po yis/ / blon po gzugs dang ldan pa la// lha rnams kun dang yid mthun zhing // rab dga' bde dang ldan par skyes// bde ba'i mchog ni myong gyur nas// ngan song du yang ltung bar 'gyur// de nas/
273b4(rgyud 'bum): da ltar lha dbang po// khyod kyi mthus kyang de nyid ni// dga' ldan gnas ni dga' ba'i mchog/ bde mang kun gyi gnas su skyes// lha yi dbang po nyon cig dang // gang gi tshe byung po de'i dus na byung ba'i
273b5(rgyud 'bum): drang srong du gyur pa de ni gzhan yin par khyod kyis shes par mi bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid do// de'i phar
273b6(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan yin par khyod kyis shes par mi bya ste/ lha'i dbang po de'i tshe de'i dus na khyod de'i phar gyur to// ma gang yin pa de gzhan yin par mi blta ste/ de'i tshe de'i dus na sha tsi ka nyid
273b7(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa de ni gzhan yin par mi blta'o// lha'i 'khor 'di dag nyid yin no// / de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams yid rab
274a1(rgyud 'bum): tu mgu zhing rangs te/ ba spu'i bu gnas spu rnams langs shing rgyal ba rgyal ba zhes skad chen por bos nas/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la ming bcu pa 'dis mngon par
274a2(rgyud 'bum): bstod de gsol ba btab bo/ / ko Ta ko Ta k+Sha/ kon+da/ koHko Ta ba sh+tsa ka Ti ra ka/ ko la kA ko la baHko la ko lA ba sh+tsa/ ko lasta tha i ti/ zhes byas nas/ brgya byin la sogs lnga mchog rnams

274b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / yi dgas rnams su skyes pa'i sems can thams cad grol bar bdag nyid kyis yang dag par shes so// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu snang bar byas te/ snang bar byas nas kyang sangs
274b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kyi mdzad pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul du byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi chos kyi yi ge de nyid du zhugs par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dpag tu med

274b5(rgyud 'bum): / be/ a mi ta saM b+ha be/ a mi ta bi krAn+te/ a mi ta bi krAn+ta/ gA mi ni/ sar+b+ba karma kle sha k+Sha yaM ka re swA hA// de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi'o//
274b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za bar sgrib pa rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i
274b7(rgyud 'bum): snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / / oM kaM ka ni kaM ka ni/ ro tsa ni ro tsa ni/ troT ni troT ni/ trA sa ni tA sa ni/ pra ti ha na pra ti phan/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma pa raM pa rA Ni me sar+b+ba satwA nAny+tsa sAsa?
275a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di bshad ma thag tu yang thams cad de bzhin du gyur to/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrib pa thams cad dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge na la snyoms par

275a3(rgyud 'bum): rat+na mA lA bi shud+d+he sho d+ha ya/ sar+b+ba pA pa ni hUM trAH/ de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu bdud kyi gnas thams cad bcom rnam par bcom par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za bar mi choms

275b1(rgyud 'bum): pa bri bya ste/ / rtsibs bzhi dag dang ldan pa la// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor ldan par bya// de yi dbul su gtso bo ni// phyag na rdo rje stobs chen po// phyag na rdo rje dril bsdams shing // zla ba rgyas pa'i

275b3(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni// 'khor los sgyur ba chas pa dang // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mdog 'dra zhing // rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa dang // phyag ni mchog sbyin mi 'jigs pa/

277b7(rgyud 'bum): gzhan du med/ / de nas bra la 'anag pa yi// zam pa bzhis ni dbang bskur te// dang po phyag na rdo rje yi// phyag rgyas dbang ni bskur bar bya// de la sogs pa go rims kyis// dkyil 'khor

278b3(rgyud 'bum): gi gzugs dang gnyis gzhag ste/ / sgo ba rnams kyang de bzhin no// de nas spyan drangs de kun la// mchod pa kun gyis mchod par bya// de nas bdag nyid zhugs nas kyang // slob ma rnams ni

278b6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor 'dir zhugs te dbang bskur ba thob pa 'am/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rtag par dus thams cad du bsrung ba dang //
