285a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor la kun tu gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag g.yos/ yang dag par g.yos/ 'gul/ yang dag par 'gul/ 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ yang dag par
285a7(rgyud 'bum): rab tu 'bar/ dgod/ rab tu dgod/ yang dag par rab tu dgod/ rtse/ rab tu rtse/ yang dag par rab tu rtse zhing rmad kyi ya mtshan du ma 'jig rten du yang dag par rab tu snang bar gyur to//
285b1(rgyud 'bum): de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i tshogs rnams shin tu rngam par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems
285b2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' rnams ni rgyu ma mchis par mdzum pa mi mdzad na/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags lung bstan du gsol// de nas bcom ldan
285b3(rgyud 'bum): 'das phyag na rdo rjes lha rnams kyis gsol ba'i tshig gsan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bshad pa'i 'chi bdag zhi bar byed pa'i rig pa
285b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bdag 'joms par byed pa'i rig sngags gzi brjid chen po gang yin pa thos sam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha
285b5(rgyud 'bum): chen po de dag yang dag par rab tu mgu ste ba spu langs nas legs so zhes bya ba 'di dag gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// rdo rje 'dzin pa legs so legs so// gang gi slad
285b6(rgyud 'bum): dutshe thung ba'i sems can rnams tshe bsring bar bgyi ba dang / dus ma lags pa'i 'chi bdag gis nyes pa rnams gang gis dus ma lags pa 'chi ba las rnam par grol bar bgyi ba dang / ngan seng du skyes
285b7(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams ngan song gi rgyud thams cad las ci nas kyang rnam par grol bar bgyi ba dang / 'khor ba'i 'jigs pas skrag pa'i sems can rnams bde brag tu 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par bgyis nas/ myur du
286a1(rgyud 'bum): bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ gzi brjid chen po'i stobs dang mthu chen po'i rig pa bshad du gsol/
286a2(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis gsol ba'i tshig gsan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang /
286a3(rgyud 'bum): thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / oM pu N+ye pu N+ye/ mahA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yuHpu N+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te swA hA/ snying po'i rig pa'o// oM d+h+r-i swAhA/ nye ba'i snying po'i rig pa'o// oM b+h+yAM swA hA/
286a4(rgyud 'bum): nye ba'i snying po'i rig pa'o// oM kruM swA hA/ snying po yang dag par bskul ba'i rig pa'o// oM traM swAhA/ snying po dam pa'o// oM d+hI swA hA/ gsang ba'i snying po'o// de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor
286a5(rgyud 'bum): bshad de/ dkyil 'khor rtsibs bzhi par byas la/ de'i dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dang / gzi brjid tshad med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba gzhag
286a6(rgyud 'bum): s+ye/ b+h+rUM zhes bya ba'i snying po'o// de'i spyan sngar ni phyag na rdo rjeH/ hrIHzhes bya ba'i snying po'o// g.yon par ni khro bo ste/ bruM zhes bya ba'i snying po'o// g.yas par ni nam mkha'i snying po rtse/
286a7(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i snying po'o// rgyab tu ni 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ste/ hrI/ zhes bya ba'i snying po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la rig pa
286b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams bri'o/ / bum pa lnga dang brgyad 'khor los sgyur ba'i sngags kyis btab la gzhag go// bdug pa la sogs pa las thams cad pa'i khro bo'i sngags kyis btab pa dang / mchod pa la sogs pa gzhag
286b2(rgyud 'bum): ste/ sgo ba thams cad kyang de bzhin no// de nas sngags mkhan bdag nyid zhugs la/ bde bar gshegs pa dam pa sras dang 'bangs su bcas shing 'khor gyis bskor te rig pa dang lhan cig spyan drang ngo //
286b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas bdag nyid dbang bskur te skyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug la stong phrag brgya bzlas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ rdo rje 'dzin pa 'am/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug kyang rung /
286b4(rgyud 'bum): mngon sum du mthong nas de 'dod pa'i mchog so sor thob par 'gyur ro// ci ste mnyam par ma bzhag na de'i tshe yid kyis las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings
286b5(rgyud 'bum): la/ oM badz+ra d+ha ra/ rat+na d+ha ra/ pad+ma d+ha ra/ b+hi shwa d+ha ra/ ta thA ga ta sa ma ya/ mA ti kra ma/ ta thA ga ta sa ma ya d+ha ra kod+ha haM/ zhes nga rgyal bskyed la slob ma rnams gzhug par bya'o// de nas
286b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dis me tog dor bar bya'o/ / oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta pra tIts+tsha ho sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas 'phreng ba de nyid kyis mgo la bcings la dbang bskur bar bya'o// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shany+tsa d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya hUM traM/ oM badz+ra
286b7(rgyud 'bum): a b+hi Shany+tsa hUM b+h+rUM/ oM rat+na a b+hi Shany+tsa traM/ oM pad+ma a b+hi Shany+tsa hUM hrIH/ oM kar+m+ma a b+hi Shany+tsa hUM a/ de nas dam tshig dang bka'i dbang bskur bar bya'o// de nas dam tshig ni/ dkon mchog gsum dang
287a1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems/ / bla ma dam pa rnams mi spang // srog chags rnams ni gsad mi bya// ma byin par yang mi blang zhing // brdzun du smra bar bya ma yin// pha rol bud med spyad mi bya//
287a2(rgyud 'bum): bla ma smad par mi bya ste// de yi grib ma mi bgom zhing // slob dpon ma yin mi gzung la// rdo rje slob dpon mtshan mi brjod// sngags dang phyag rgya mi smad de// lha rnams la lnga smos ci dgos// ci ste glen pas
287a3(rgyud 'bum): smad na ni/ / nad kyis nges par 'chi bar 'gyur// rnying dang lha yi grib ma dang // 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa pa// phyag rgya yi ge'i mtshan ma rnams// gom pas bgom par mi bya'o// glen pas
287a4(rgyud 'bum): dkon mchog gsum sogs dang / / sangs rgyas bstan la gnod byed dang // bla ma smod par brtson pa rnams// mkhas pas bsgrims te gsad par bya// chos min ldan dang sdig sprod dang // rtag tu sem
287a5(rgyud 'bum): can gnod brtson dang / / dam tshig ldang rnams snying brtse ba'i// sngags mkhan gyis ni sngags kyis gsad// 'jungs pa rnams kyis nor blangs la// sems can 'phongs la sbyin par bya// bla ma la
287a6(rgyud 'bum): ni mchod pa dang / / de ltar dam tshig sgrub pa dang // dkyil 'khor phyir dang dam tshig can// phan phyir rgyal ba'i sras rnams la// mchod phyir mi yi dbang po dang // phyug po rnams kyi nor dbrog go//
287a7(rgyud 'bum): sems can rnams la phan spyod pas// rtag tu dam tshig bla ma'i nor// srog chags srog ni srung ba'i phyir// brdzun du yang ni smra bar bya// sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes bya dang / dam tshig rnams ni krung
287b1(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / sngags rigs pas ni sgrub pa'i phyir// gzhan gyi bud med bsten par bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas 'dug nas// thams cad byas shing kun zos kyang // 'grub 'gyur zhes par mi 'gyur ma
287b2(rgyud 'bum): snying rjer ldan pas smos ci dgos/ / de nas 'dis bka'i dbang bskur bar bya'o// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta A dz+nyA ya de dA s+ya mi gra hA badz+ra su sid d+ha ye/ oM badz+ra tiSh+Tha nAM/ 'dis rdo rje lag tu byin la las kyi dbang
287b3(rgyud 'bum): bskur bar bya'o/ / oM sar+b+ba kar+m+ma Ni ku ru bud d+hA nAM hUM/ de nas bla ma bla ma'i phyir// khyod kyi lus mchog sbyin par bya// nor dang dbyig dang 'bru rnams dang // stan dang bzhon pa de bzhin te// bran gyi
287b4(rgyud 'bum): mchog dang khang pa dang / / rgyal po rgyal srid de bzhin te// bu dang bu mo chung ma dang // ma dang sring mo tsha mo dang // gzhan yang ci bzhed thams cad ni// phan par bsams phyir bla mar dbul//
287b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas byang chub bar du ni// sangs rgyas nyid dang gzhan dag dang // 'jig rten pa yi mthu chen rnams// gang 'dod pa dag sgrub 'dod pas// dngos grub rnams ni gsol bar bya// de nas bu la phan
287b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyir/ / sngags mkhan ser sna med sems dang // dad pas dad pa'i sems ldan la// dngos grub rnams ni sbyin par bya// chos rnams thams cad dngos med par// sems kyis bsgom par byas
287b7(rgyud 'bum): nas kyang / / a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam// rang gis sa bon de dbus su// bsams nas dam tshig phyag rgya yang // bsam zhing de bzhin de nyid du// sgrub pa po ni bsgyur bar bya// lha yi
288a1(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor tshul du bsgyur/ / de nas rang gyi sa bon dang // phyag rgyas phyag rgya de byin rlab// lha 'og go rims ji bzhin du// sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ro// de nas
288a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal bskyed nas kyang / / mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub byas na// de bzhin gshegs kyang 'grub 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// / de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lho chen po rnams kyis//
288a3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal po'i blon po dang // rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang /
288a4(rgyud 'bum): dmangs rigs dang / gzhan yang dman zhing kho re chung ba phyag bdar pa dang // mtha' 'khob pa'i rigs ngan gyi skye bo rnams dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'dir zhugs na de dag gi rnam par smin pa ji
288a5(rgyud 'bum): lta bur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir nga la zhus pa de ni legs so legs so// lha'i bu rnams dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po
288a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dir gzhug pa dang / dbang bsgyur ba dang / bris pa dang / 'drir bcug pa dang / rjes su yi rangs pa dang / phyag byas pa dang / mchod pa rnams kyi 'bras bu dang rnam par smin pa nyon cig/
288a7(rgyud 'bum): lha'i bu rnams mdor na nga la'ang de'i yon tan bshad par spobs pa med de/ nga'i bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa de brgya phrag stong du mar bsgyur kyang grangs su'ang mi chog/ bgrang bar yang mi chog/
288b1(rgyud 'bum): dper yang mi bzod de/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung pos kyang mi bzod do// dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'bras bu dang rnam par
288b2(rgyud 'bum): smin pa gang lags pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar che'o// rdo rje 'dzin pa ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis dkyil 'khor la sogs par 'jug par spro'o// bcom ldan
288b3(rgyud 'bum): 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa spro'o/ / // de nas lha de dag gis de bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can bsod nams chung zhing tshe thung
288b4(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / ngan song gi rgyud dang ldan pa dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / byol song rnams su skyes pa dag kyang mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de dag la bdag cag gis ji ltar bsgrub
288b5(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi/ kye lha'i bu rnams sems can de dag ni dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du chug cig/ chos kyi yi ge'ang zlos su chug cig dang / des sems can de dag tshe ring bar 'gyur/ bsod nams dang bral
288b6(rgyud 'bum): ba rnams bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur/ ngan song las kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// kye lha'i bu rnams ngan song du skyes zin pa gang yin pa de dag gyi ming la'ang dbang bskur cig/ gzugs brnyan la'ang
288b7(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur bar byos shig/ mchod rten la'ang dbang bskur bar byos shig/ rang gi lha'i sku la'ang dbang bskur bar byos shig/ chung ngun de dang rigs mthun pa dang / de'i bu dang / de dang rus mthun pa dang /
289a1(rgyud 'bum): de'i ming 'dzin pa 'am/ bran la'ang dbang bskur cig dang / zhag bdun du dkyil 'khor du bcug sde dbang bskur na/ gdon mi za bar zhag bdun gyis ngan song gis sgrib pa las rnam
289a2(rgyud 'bum): par grol bar 'gyur ro/ / lha'i bu rnams de ni ming nas smos te 'bum phrag gnyis sam/ 'bum phrag gsum mam/ 'bum phrag bzhi nas/ 'bum phrag brgya phrag stong gi bar du bzlas pa byas na
289a3(rgyud 'bum): mtshams med pa lnga byas pa 'ang rnam par thar par 'gyur na/ sdig pa chung ngu byas pa rnams lnga smos kyang ci dgos/ lha yi bu rnams zhi ba yi// hom khung tha ma bar ma mchog/ khru gang khru do khru
289a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa'i/ / zlum po nyid du byas nas ni// de yi ming yang yungs kar gyis// brgya phrag stong du bsreg byas na// ngan song kun las rnam par thar// de yi sha dang rus pa dang // skra dang thal ba la sogs
289a5(rgyud 'bum): pas/ cho ga de dang 'dra bar ni// sbyin sreg byas na ngan song yang // kun las rnam par thar par 'gyur// de yi dbus su 'khor lo ni// rtsibs brgyud 'od zer dkar 'bar bri// khor yug rdo rje rtsa
289a6(rgyud 'bum): lnga pa/ 'od zer dkar dang ldan par bri// de nas rdo rje rgya gram dang // rdo rje rin chen chu skyes mchog/ de nas sdig pa gzhom pa'i phyir// phyag rgya sna tshogs gzhag par bya// phyi yi rdo rje rigs rnams kyi//
289a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya rnams ni phyi rol bri// gza' dang skar ma'i mtshan ma dang // de ltar 'jig rten skyong ba rnams// gtso bo ri mo lugs ma'ang rung // rdo rje can dang lhan cig gzhag/ bya dang bum pa bkang ba dang /
289b1(rgyud 'bum): gtor ma lha bshos rab dkar gzhag/ mdor na thig ni btab nas kyang // cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya// dkar po'i gos ni bgos nas kyang // sangs rgyas gzugs can mi 'jigs pas// ngan song
289b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyud na gnas pa yi/ / sems can rjes su dran byed cing // sdig pa'i sgrib pa zhi ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyin sreg ni// mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsi can// 'bras yos yungs kar bsres pa dang //
289b3(rgyud 'bum): de yi rus pa sha la sogs// yang na ming nas smos te bya// de nas bde 'gror skyes nas kyang // mkhas pas rgyas pa bya dgos te// khru do pa 'am khru bzhi pa// de ltar mchog ni khru brgyad par// byas
289b4(rgyud 'bum): nas com khung gru bzhi pa/ / kun tu mu ran ldan par bya// de dbus pad+ma rin chen can// 'od zer ser po ldan par bri// khor yug tu ni rin chen dang // mu ran rnams la chu skyes bri// phyi rol du ni rig
289b5(rgyud 'bum): lnga yi/ / so so'i phyag rgya bri bar bya// de ltar phyi yi lha rnams dang // lcags kyu la sogs bri bar bya// gos rnams ser por bsgyur nas kyang // mtho ris gnas pa rjes dran zhing // de la phan phyir
289b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pa'i phyir/ / rgyas pa yi ni las byas na// lus can de yi tshe dang dpal// gzi brjid bde ba'i longs spyod 'phel// de nas phan phyir nges par yang // dbang du bya ba'i las bya na// hom khung gzhu
289b7(rgyud 'bum): yi dbyibs 'dra la/ / khru gang pa 'am khru do pa// khru bzhir byas la de'i dbus su// pad+ma dmar po bris nas kyang // de yi dbus su mda' bcas pa'i// gzhu yang de bzhin bri bar bya// khor yug tu
290a1(rgyud 'bum): yang mda' bcas pa'i/ / gzhu ni kha dog dmar por bri// sngags rdzogs pas ni rtag par yang // phyi rol de dang 'dra bar bya// sems can de yang dran byas te// dmar por
290a2(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa'i gos gyon la/ / me tog dmar ram pad+ma 'am// 'bras bu dmar ram tshon bskus pa'i// mar dang gur kum bsres pa dang // tsan dan dmar po'i phye ma yis// sprin sreg byas na lha la sogs
290a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad de yi dbang du 'gyur/ / de la gdon rnams gzhom pa'i phyir// mngon spyod kyang ni brtsam bya ste// phyed dang gsum mam khru gsum mam// de ltar dam pa khru dgur bya// gru gsum pa dang ldan
290a4(rgyud 'bum): par ni/ / dbus su rdo rje rtse dgu pa// rtse gsum pa dang rgya gram pa'o// rdo rje rnams dang dbyig pa dang // mgo ni rdo rje rtse gsum dang // dgra sta rtse gcig mu khyud bskor// phyi rol tu yang rim gsum du/
290a5(rgyud 'bum): snga ma bzhin du brgyan par bya// bya dang gtor ma bum pa dang // bshos cha rnam pa yang du gzhag/ sha dang khrag gis bkang ba yi// mgo yi thod pa kun tu gzhag/ de yis lus can sdig sogs dang //
290a6(rgyud 'bum): bgegs rnams gzhom par bya ba'i phyir// gos nag bgos shing khros nas kyang // 'jig rten gsum rgyal bdag nyid bsam// de nas de yi sdig bcom lus// bgegs dang phral te ci bde bar// mtho
290a7(rgyud 'bum): ris 'jig rten mi yi nang / / khams gsum pa ni ci bder spyod// go rims 'di dag nyid kyis ni// tshe 'di'i gnas la'ang bya ba ste// de nas gang gi phyir byas pa// de yi phyir yang de bzhin 'gyur//
290b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhan dag kyang ni las rnams kun// snga ma ji bzhin de ltar bya// des ni sems can tham cad la'ang // myur du bde skyid myong bar 'gyur// de nas tshangs pa la sogs lnga rnams
290b2(rgyud 'bum): yid mgu nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ngan song du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i slad du brtag pa'i
290b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po 'di 'dri ba dang / / 'drir 'jug pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams bdag cag tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis bu bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi// gang rgyal po dang /
290b4(rgyud 'bum): blon po dang / rgyal po'i blon po rnams ji ltar gsungs pa'i rjes su slob na de'i rgyal srid 'phel bar bgyi/ yul dang / phyogs dang / rang gi skye bo dang / yongs kyi skye bo dang / bran la sogs pa bsrung
290b5(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyi/ / nor dang 'bru rnams mang du 'byor par bgyi/ bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams dang ldan par bgyi/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / lo legs pa dang / zhi ba rnams su
290b6(rgyud 'bum): bgyi na/ ji ltar bshad pa la mi rtog par bgyi ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ gang gis brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di dad pas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te grong dang grong khyer du btsugs la/ bdag nyid kyis bsu
290b7(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / glang po che'i steng du bzhag la grong dang grong khyer la sogs pa thams cad bskor na/ nad dang gnod pa thams cad ma mchis par 'gyur la/ sems can chen po de'i drung na bdag cag bran gyi tshul
291a1(rgyud 'bum): lam/ bu'i tshul du gnas par bgyi'o// gang du 'di rab tu spyod pa de na bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid rdzogs longs spyod pa'i skus rdo rje sems dpa'i skur zhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi
291a2(rgyud 'bum): ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu bzang po re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba de nyid brtag pa'i rgyal po'i gzugs su bzhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor
291a3(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas te bzhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ / sa phyogs de mchod rten du gyur par 'tshal bar bgyi ste/ mchod par bgyi/ phyag 'tshal bar bgyi/ kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// bdag cag tshangs pa la sos
291a4(rgyud 'bum): pabalha rnams kyis brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di kun la rgyas par 'chad pa'i rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub chen po de'i g.yog bgyi'o/ / bran gyi tshul du gnas par bgyi'o// bka' nyan pa'i tshul du gnas par bgyi'o//
291a5(rgyud 'bum): bsgo ba thams cad mnyan par bgyi'o// phan pa dang bde ba thams cad bgyi'o// dngos grub thams cad kyang stsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das mdor na de'i rkang pa'i rjes mgo bos blang bar bgyi'o//
291a6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das phyag 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das mchod par bgyi'o// bdag cag de'i phyi bzhin du rjes su 'brang ngo // bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor du zhugs te dbang bskur ba gang lags pa de dag kyang
291a7(rgyud 'bum): bdag cag gi dpon po lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ / phyag na rdo rje lags par 'tshal bar bgri'o// rdo rje sems dpa' lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bde ba chen po kun tu bzang po lags par
291b1(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes/ tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa

297a3(rgyud 'bum): snying khar mnan nas bsdigs byed cing / / zhal ni shin tu 'jigs 'jigs lta// phyag ni brgya phrag du mar ldan// sbrul dang mi sdug mgos brgyan la// stag lpags kyi ni smad g.yogs bgos//
297a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyu ma thogs shing dbu mtha' yas// mgo thod shas gang phyag na thogs// de ltar bris nas phyi rol du// srin mo'i tshogs rnams gzhag par bya// sgo ba rnams ni ji bzhin du// rang gi phyag rgya'i lag
297a5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan can/ / de nas bdud rtsis gang ba yi// bum pa bcu drug gzhag par bya// bdug pa me tog dri zhim dang // mar me dang ni zo snod dang // kha zas bkang ba'i gtor ma dang // bza' dang bca' dang
297a6(rgyud 'bum): bdud rtsi zhes/ / mgo thod gang bar gyur pa rnams// dkyil 'khor du ni mang du gzhag/ de nas slob dpon bdag nyid kyang // mgu nas mgo thod phyag rgyas 'jug/ phyag rgya de dang de yi ni// sha rnams
297a7(rgyud 'bum): kun gyis dam tshig stsol/ / de nas 'dod ldan rnyed nas ni// hUM zhes bya bas bsgrub par bya// de nas sngags mkhan sgo sgor yang // de nyid dran byed snyan par byed// de ni nges par dngos grub ste// yud tsam
297b1(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gsum dbang 'gyur/ / dkyil 'khor du ni tshogs rnams dang // rang gi lha yi tshogs rnams la// rgyud las 'byung ba'i dam tshig brjod// de nas mchod de langs nas kyang // tshogs can
297b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ / tshul du gnas nas 'byung bar bya// de nas slob ma bsdus nas ni// lag na rin chen thogs te gzhug/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra rak+Sha si hUM phaT/ oM ban+d+ha
297b3(rgyud 'bum): / kro d+ha a na lArka s+phu Ta ra pra tIts+tsha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha na ni rak+Sha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha pA sha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya ni bI ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya mA tI kra ma hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro
297b4(rgyud 'bum): d+ha ri ti sa ma ya a b+hi Shany+tsa hU~M phaT/ / 'dis dbang bskur la de bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya'o// de nas de dag gi sgrub pa bshad de// bdag nyid khro bor snyoms zhugs la// de nas snying khar nyi ma bsgom
297b5(rgyud 'bum): rang gi chos kyi yi ge las/ / khros nas yang dang yang 'phro zhing // de gnyis gcig tu bsgom par bya// de nas 'grub 'gyur gzhan du min// khro bo'i rgyal po'i las dngos su// gsod pa yin par
297b6(rgyud 'bum): bshad mod kyi/ / zhi dang dbang dang rgyas pa rnams// de dag byed 'gyur gdon mi za// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom byas na// gdug pa'i sems can 'dzin
297b7(rgyud 'bum): byed cing / / mdor na dug rims gdon la sogs// de bzhin de dag thams cad ni// thabs la sogs pas 'joms byed pa// khros nas snying las 'byung 'gyur bar// gsad pa'i las la
298a1(rgyud 'bum): bsam par bya/ / khros par gyur pa'i rgod ma'i khas// sha dang khrag rnams 'jib byed cing // de dag 'tsho ba 'phrog byed par// bsams na nges par rlag par 'gyur// khro bo
298a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gsum snang mdzad/ / zla ba 'dra ba'i dge bsam zhing // 'od zer 'byung ba mang po yis// khyab par gyur par rnam bsams la// rims dang gdon dang dug la sogs// 'od zer des ni
298a3(rgyud 'bum): phyung nas kyang / / de yi nad rgas gnod pa rnams// zhi bya'i phyir ni ring du dor// de nas hUM gi tshig bzhag la// rdo rje lta bu'i lus bsam zhing // haM gis 'khor los go char bya// 'od zer chu yis dbang
298a4(rgyud 'bum): bskur ro/ / de nas de yis ming smos shing // bzlas pas tshul bzhir bsam par bya// de nas khung bu gsum la rnam gcig ni// zla ba rgyas shing 'od zer 'phro 'dra la// khru gang tsam mam yang na khru do
298a5(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / mi rgyal mchog rnams kyis ni gnyis su bsgyur// de yis sa rnams rnam par sbyang byas te// 'khor lo'i dkyil na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi// dbus su rdo rje rtse lngar gyur pa gcig/ 'od zer dkar po 'phreng
298a6(rgyud 'bum): bskor gzi can gzhag/ phyag rgya'i tshogs rnams thams cad bri bya ste// rig so rgyal sogs phyag rgya zur phyin cing // rgyal po bzhi yi ji bzhin phyag mtshan rnams// phyogs kyi bdag po rnams kyang phyogs
298a7(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su/ / lha chen la sogs phyag rgya khyab 'jug dang // 'khor lo lta bu nyid du bri bar bya// dri zhim chus bkang mdog 'od dkar gyur la// dkar pos shin tu dkrigs pa'i bum pa brgyad// dkar gsum
298b1(rgyud 'bum): gang ba'i gtor ma lha bshos dang / / bdug pa mar me me tog rnams kyang gzhag/ mchod pa bya ba'i phyir na bla re dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan rnga ma la sogs gzhag/ nang re ga pur bcas pa'i dri zhim pa/
298b2(rgyud 'bum): tsan dan la sogs pa yis byugs// kha ni shar phyogs bltas te sbyin sreg bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan la 'dug bya 'am// yang na rnal 'byor ldan zhing sems dpa'i gdan// gos la sogs dkar 'phrang
298b3(rgyud 'bum): ba dkar gyis brgyan/ / mar gyi sbrang rtsi 'o ma dang // nas kyi thug pa la sogs dang // til mar dang ni til nyid dang // yungs kar dang ni 'bras yos dang // 'bras chan nas dang gro rnams dang // me tog shin tu dri zhim
298b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / ga pur dang ni bsres nas kyang // tsan dan dkar pos bsgos pa dang // 'dab bdun me tog 'bras bu rnams// zho dang ldan pa'i yam shing la// de dag khung bu'i khyad par las// rang gi sor gyis gzhal
298b5(rgyud 'bum): bya zhing / / nyi shu rtsa bzhi yan chad mchog/ sor bcu drug ni bar ma ste// tha ma bcu gnyis nyid du shes// shin tu chung na sor brgyad de// bud shing zho dang ldan pa la// dri chus bskus pa shes par bya// bud shing
298b6(rgyud 'bum): nga las byung ba'i ma/ / sbyar nas dri chus gtor nas ni// pad+ma dkar po zhal 'dra dag/ pad+ma nor bu ril ba thogs// lag na dbyug pa mchog thogs pa// pad+ma dkar po'i stan snying 'dug/ de lha'i me lha bkug nas
298b7(rgyud 'bum): kyang rdza.an blangs te dbul bar bya/ / de nas bla rgyas dkar po la// bzhugs pa'i 'gro phan spyan drangs te// pad+ma dkar po shar phyogs su// bsams nas steng du gzhag par bya// de nas de ltar bsams nas
299a1(rgyud 'bum): kyang / bsgrub bya rtag tu mdun bzhag ste// de yi nyes pa drangs nas ni// shin tu bsrings te sba bar bya// nang par sngar ni gtsang 'gyur zhing // shin tu dri zhim lus byugs la// bdud
299a2(rgyud 'bum): rtsi bzhin bsams sbyin sreg bya/ / dam tshig 'di ni 'da' bar dka'// lha rdzas bdud rtsi bro lnga 'di// dang por me lha brtag byas la// khro bo de ni de lus su// spyan drangs nas ni bzhugs par bsams//
299a3(rgyud 'bum): denas dang po khro bo lo// bsreg bya lan gsum dbul bar bya// de nas dkon mchog gsum la gsum// de nas me lha nyid la gsum// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' la// de nas lha rnams re re la// de nas
299a4(rgyud 'bum): bgegs la sogs la dpral/ / de yid 'ong ba'i rtswa yang rung // de nas dang po khro bo yi// sngags kyis yam shing sbyin par bya// de nas gcig tu bsregs nas kyang // bdud rtsi sngags kyis btab nas
299a5(rgyud 'bum): ni/ de bzhin sbyin sreg byas 'og tu// brgya stong snyed dam yang na ni// brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du ni// khro bo nyid la dbul bar bya// de yi lus la dbang bskur zhing // mnyam par bzhag pas bsrung
299a6(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / mjug tu mngon par mchod nas ni// lha rnams thams cad gshegs par gsol// 'dis ni ni ba'i las rnams kyang // 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// tsi s+t+rai de ni sdig can nam// ga
299a7(rgyud 'bum): te mnyam par ma bzhag pas/ / de tshe dngos grub ma gyur na// stong pa nyid du rnam bsgoms la// de nas de bzhin byas nas ni// gdon mi ma bar dngos grub 'gyur// zhi ba'i las so// / 'bras bur
299b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa'i nags tshal lam/ / yang na nags sam rgyal po 'am// rgyal rigs khyim du rgyas pa ni// dga' ba'i sems kyis bya ba ste// khru do yang na khru bzhi pa'am// de ltar mchog ni khru brgyad de// chu
299b2(rgyud 'bum): mchog bar ma rnams las gcig/ rgyas pa'i las ni bya ba yin// mdor na hom khung bya ba ni// stegs bu brtsigs te dkyil 'khor ni// chung ngu la ni khru brgyad de// bar ma la ni bcu gnyis nyid // mchog la
299b3(rgyud 'bum): bcu drug yang na ni/ / nyi shu rtsa bzhir shes par bya// mu khyud sor brgyad bcu drug gam// sum cu gnyis su bya ba yin// phyi yi 'khor lo de yi phyed// pad+ma rnams kyis brgyan par bya// dkyil 'khor dbus su
299b4(rgyud 'bum): rin chen dang / / pad+ma sna tshogs brgyan par bya// de yi dbus su brko ba ni// legs par bltas te phyed kyi tshad// khru bzhi pa 'am khru brgyad pa// yang na dpal bskyed pad+ma 'dra// mdor na 'jib ser po yi//
299b5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin khung mchog brkos nas ni// gur kum la sogs bskus nas kyang // de yi dbus su bris nas ni// tshon mchog ser pos bskus nas kyang // gser 'od 'dra bar bsgom par bya// de nas tshon ni
299b6(rgyud 'bum): dmar ser gyis/ / rin chen pad+ma la sogs pa'i// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'khor yug tu// gnas pa nyid du bri bar bya// rim gnyis yang na rim bzhi 'am// yang na rim pa brgyad ldan par// der ni sgo ba
299b7(rgyud 'bum): de dag nyid/ / phyag rgya'i gzugs su brtag par bya// bum pa kha dog gser 'dra zhing // dri chus rab tu bkang ba la// rab tu mdzes brgyad bcu gnyis sam// sum cu gnyis sam bcu drug ste// dkri ba'i
300a1(rgyud 'bum): @dar ni ser po la/ / kha rgyan yal ga me tog can// dri zhim me tog bdug pa dang // 'phreng ba mar me rgyan rnams dang // rgyal mtshan 'phan la sogs pa dang // tha re gdugs rnams ser
300a2(rgyud 'bum): pos brgyan/ / bdag nyid dgos dang rgyan rnams dang // me tog la sogs ser pos brgyan// byang phyogs kha bltas 'dug nas ni// 'jig rten gsum 'dul khro bo yi// nyid kyi rnal 'byor rjes dran
300a3(rgyud 'bum): zhing / / lha yi yid bzhin nor rgyal mtshan// btsom gser gyi 'od dang 'dra// de bzhin nyi zla ku be ra// gnod sbyin dang ni dzam+b+ha la// gser gyi char ni rab 'bebs shing // yid kyi 'dod pa skong mdzad la/

300a5(rgyud 'bum): na de bzhin stong phrag ni/ / brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya// de nas sbyin sreg rab bya ste// byang phyogs su ni seng ge yi// gdan gyi steng na rin chen dang // pad+ma nyi zla gdan stengs na// rdo rje rin chen rin chen mchog/
300a6(rgyud 'bum): rin chen dpal dang gzi brjid mchog/ rdo rje bzhad dang rgyal ba yang // rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan nas ni// phyag ni mchog sbyin gzhol ba dang // rin chen char yang 'bebs brtson zhing // 'od zer ser 'phro
300a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis/ / de la shin tu khyab byed bsam// dung dang pi lang cang te'u dang // sil snyan glu dang gar mchog gis// mdor na mchod pa byas nas ni// de yi 'og tu las brtsam mo// khung bu'i khyang
300b1(rgyud 'bum): par nyid las kyang / / yam shing bud shing khyad par dbye// mdzub gang khu tshur bcangs khru gang // chung ngu nyid du bshad pa yin// bar ma khru dor shes par bya// khru bzhi pa ni mchog yin te// me tog
300b2(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bur bcas rigs kyi/ / ya tog ma tog sbrang rtsir gzhug/ 'bru rnams thams cad 'byor pa dang // me tog 'bras bu ser por ldan// mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres nas ni// phal cher dpal gyi 'bras
300b3(rgyud 'bum): bur ldan/ / me lha gser dang 'dra ba la// phyag bzhi pa ste 'dir de bzhin// pad+ma gdan bzhugs rnam brgyan pa// spyan drangs bsreg bya sbyin sreg bya// de yi lus su khro rgyal po// byin can legs par bcug
300b4(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ sngon bzhin dran byed de zhal du// sbyin sreg yongs su brtag bya ste// 'bum mam nyis 'bum tsam gyis kyang // don ni nges par rab tu 'grub// 'bum phrag brgyas ni rgyal srid dam// longs spyod
300b5(rgyud 'bum): phun sum tshogs pa 'grub/ / de nas mjug tu 'od zer gyis// de la dbang bskur bsrung bar bya// de nas de ni rgyal 'gyur te// phyag na rdo rje'i bka' bzhin no// rgyas pa'i las so// / dbang
300b6(rgyud 'bum): ni chags pa'i sems kyis kyang / / chags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bya// chags pa bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje chags pa de las byung // khams gsum chags par byed pa'i phyir// pad+ma sems dpa' rtag tu
300b7(rgyud 'bum): chags/ de bas 'dis ni de dag ni// las grub par ni bshad pa yin// chags dang mthun pa'i sa phyogs sam// chags par byed pa'i khyim du shis// btso blag can nam zla mtshan can dag gi/ khyim du
301a1(rgyud 'bum): @chags pa'i las rnams bya ba yin/ / rdo rje chags pa'i gnas kyang rung // phyag na pad+ma'i gnas nyid du// rtag tu rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas// bde chen gyi ni gnas chen dang
301a2(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma ut+pal rdzing bu dang / / ban du ka yi me tog gnas// me tog 'bras bu dmar tshal ni// yid 'ong sems ni chags byed pa// der ni stegs bu khru brgyad dam// de ltar bcu gnyis bcu drug rnams/
301a3(rgyud 'bum): byas nas de yi dbus su yang // hom khung dkyil 'khor bya ba ni// khru gang yang na khru do 'am// de ltar khru ni bzhi par bya// gzhu 'dra ba 'am pad+mo 'am// yang na rdo rje 'dra bar bya// mnga' 'dra
301a4(rgyud 'bum): zla ba kham 'dra dang / / de ltar pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra// zheng du mchu yi phyed kyi tshad// zheng gi phyed kyi tshad tsam du// hom khung zab su brko bar bya// mu khyud sor ni bzhi par bya// nyes 'gyur ba ni nyis
301a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur bya/ / tha ma mchog gi khyad par las// yam shing so sor nges par bya// yang na yam shing sreg shing ni// tshad ni zhi ba'i las su gsungs// shin tu dmar ba'i tsan dan nam// yang na shing dmar gzhan
301a6(rgyud 'bum): yang rung / / me tog 'bras bu dmar po 'am// btsug dang tsan dan rgya skyegs sogs// le brgan rtsi dang gur kum gyis// mdor na bud pa'i shing dang ni// yam shing la yang bskus nas ni// yungs kar
301a7(rgyud 'bum): dog dmar po dang / / btsag gam mtshal yang de bzhin du// zangs kyi phye dang yungs kar du// ske tshe 'bru dang lan tshwa dang // til dang dri zhim thig le'i 'bru// la phug yungs rdog de bzhin ste// khrag dang
301b1(rgyud 'bum): rdul ni chen po rnams/ / bsreg bya phyir ni bsdus nas kyang // sngar bshad 'bras bu la sogs pa'i// khu bas yang dang yang bskus nas// khro bo'i sngags kyis byin brlabs te// ba dang ra las bzhos pa yi//
301b2(rgyud 'bum): bshigs ma thag pa'i mar gsar dang // mar dang til mar rnams kyis dgang // ga pur la sogs bsgos nas kyang // bdud rtsis btab ste gzhag par bya// de nas hom khung dmar po la// byu ru'i sdong po
301b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dra bar yang / / bsams nas spos dmar la sogs dang // kur kum dmar pos byugs par bya// de nas kha dog dmar po yis// stug po nyid du bskur bar bya// gur kum ser pos bsreg pa yi// rlon
301b4(rgyud 'bum): gyi ri mo bri ba ni/ / hom khung nang du pad+ma bri// de yi steng du mda' bcas gzhu// rtag tu hom khung khor yug tu// pad+ma nyid ni bri bar bya// gzhu yi dbus su rdo rje nyid// khor yug tu ni mda' nyid bri// gzhu yi phyi
301b5(rgyud 'bum): rol pad+ma nyid/ / bris nas de yi steng du mda'// de yi phyi rol rdo rje dang // lcags kyu mdar bcas gzhu bris la// lho phyogs rgyal mtshan rin chen dang // gzi brjid dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// pad+ma ral gri 'khor lo
301b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ nub phyogs nyid du bri bar bya// rdo rje mche ba go cha mchog/ byang phyogs su ni bri bar bya// grwa rnams su ni spos la sogs// phyag rgyas gzugs su bri bya zhing // me tog dmar po la sogs pas/
301b7(rgyud 'bum): shin tu snga ma bzhin mchod de// dpal lan gos dang 'phreng ba dang // dmar po'i dri ni bskus nas kyang // rtag tu thub pa nub ltas la// dmar thag ma chad las bya ste// pad+ma dmar po'i gdan bsams la/
302a1(rgyud 'bum): rab chags phyag na pad+ma bsnams// g.yon du rdo rje chags pa la// g.yas su bde ba chen po ste// bsams na de yi dbus su ni// chu srin rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa gzhag/ rdo rje gnu dang g.yon
302a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gying ma/ / me tog dmar rgyan rab mdzes ma// dri dmar la sogs rab mchod de// mda' dang gzhu thags de bzhin du// pad+ma dmar po dbyig bsnams pa'i// me yi lha ni bkug nas kyang // de yi lus su
302a3(rgyud 'bum): khro rgyal po/ / legs par bcug ste gzhag par bya// 'od zer chags pas bsgyur nas ni// de lus rdo rje lcags kyu dang // zhags pa bcings pas bkug nas ni// spyi bo zhabs kyi drung du gzhag/ de ltar
302a4(rgyud 'bum): bsams te snyoms zhugs pas/ / las byas pa ni gang yin pa// des ni lha yang dbang 'gyur na// mi dang lha min smos ci dgos// las rnams zin par gyur pa dang // chagaso pa'i sems su byas nas ni// de yi
302a5(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer spyi bor dgang / / de ni bsrungs nas gtang bar bya// de nas rdo rje 'dod pa yi// lha rnams mchod de gshegs par gsol// de nas bsrung ba byas nas ni// rdo rje 'dod pas rtag tu bzlas// dbang gi las so//
302a6(rgyud 'bum): / de nas brgya byin tshangs sogs lha// phyag 'tshal yang dang yang du ni// rin chen gdugs la sogs mchog gi/ mchod pa sna tshogs byas nas kyang // phyag na rdo rje rgyal can la// dga' ba'i bsam pas bstod
302a7(rgyud 'bum): byed pa rdzas sa rgyas kun pas sngar sangs rgyas/ / mi shes dri ma kun com pa// rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// rdo rje rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin/ rdo rje sku sti sku che ba// phyag na rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje yan lag rdo rje'i mchog
302b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'bar ba cher 'bar ba/ / rdo rje shugs te shugs che ba// rdo rje mtshon cha mtshon chache// phyag na rdo rje phyag chen po// rdo rje mda' ste rab 'jigs pa// rdo rje rnon ngo rno ba che/ che ba'i che ba rgya mtsho che// rdo rje u0f7f b
302b2(rgyud 'bum): yang chub che/ / byang chub sangs rgyas rab byung ba// rdo rje rgya chen rgya chen te// rdo rje sgyu ma rnam sbyong ba// rdo rje chu ste gnod sbyin che// rdo rje pad+ma rnam sbyong ba// rdo rje khro bo drag po che// rdo rje dgra sdang 'joms pa'i gtso/
302b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje srung ba srung ba che// rdo rje lcags kyu don yod byed// rdo rje ro langs ro langs che// rdo rje srin po za ba po// rdo rje gnod sbyin gnod sbyin che// rdo rje gdon te gdon che'i mchog/ 'jigs byed dga' byed drag po
302b4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ rdo rje 'jigs byed sngags byed pa// sgrub dka' sgrub pas legs pa ste// rdo rje legs pa dgyes mdzad pa// rdo rje dga' ba dga' ba che// dga' ba'i rdo rje dbang byed pa// rdo rje gzi brjid gzi brjid
302b5(rgyud 'bum): che/ / 'bar 'od gshin rje mthar byed pa// rdo rje drag po drag po che// 'od sdug pas na stug pa che// nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa'o// re ba thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa// rdo rje dbang bskur rin chen mchog/ rdo rje
302b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal mtshan yon tan mchog/ rdo rje ye shes ye shes che// rig pa bye ba'i tshogs kyis mchod// ha la ha la nag po che// dgra che zhing ni 'joms pa can// rdo rje 'dod pa 'dod pa che// rnyogs pa'i dus ngan rnam
302b7(rgyud 'bum): sbyong ba/ / skad cig g.yo ba'i the tshom gcod// glog bzhin zhal gyi ljags las 'phro// rdo rje me ste drag po'i zhal// drag po rab sdang snang mdzad pa// nyi ma stong gis gdungs pa'i zhal// spyan dmar 'jigs par mdza
303a1(rgyud 'bum): @pa bo/ / khro bo dum 'od bzhin 'phro// phyag rnams dus mtshon cha brgya// du ma'i zhal la sku yang stong // 'khyil cing rgyan yang 'khyil ba la// sems kyi chos pas sku mi mnga'/
303a2(rgyud 'bum): rnam par rtog pa ma lus spangs// ma rig 'joms pa'i tshangs pa ste// 'dod chags zhe sdang dri mthar mdzad// sgyu ma gtogs 'dod rdo rje can// rtse gsum rtse gsum 'chang 'phrog pa// 'dod chag
303a3(rgyud 'bum): zhe sdang gti mug che/ / srid dang srid min rnam sbyong ba// zhi zhing dul la dga' ba ste// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas rab rtogs pa// sangs rgyas bdag nyid sangs rgyas sku// rdo rje rab skyes rdo rje sems//
303a4(rgyud 'bum): kun tu bzang po cher bzang ba// mtshan rnams dam pas rnam par brgyan// khams gsum bdag nyid khyab pa po// thams cad rdo rje bdag nyid gtsang // gang gi 'di bris bklags gyur tam// rtag tu de don

303b1(rgyud 'bum): tsa ba ban d+he dza ya rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus/ A tsAr+ya rin chen mchog gis skad gsar bcad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ @rgya gar skad du/

304a1(rgyud 'bum): pa na'o/ / brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha thams cad dang / rig pa 'dzin pa dang / lha'i bu mo 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgya stong rnams dang / gnod sbyin

304b1(rgyud 'bum): des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu snang bar byas so// kun tu snang bar byas pa des sems can thams cad kyi sems nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba las bkrol te/ yang dag pa so so so
304b2(rgyud 'bum): sor thob pa thob par byas shing dga' ba'i tshal yang kun tu snang bar byas te/ mchod pa'i sprin sna tshogs pa rnams kyis mngon par mchod nas lan brgya phrag stong du bskor ba byas te mgo bos phyag 'tshal

309a1(rgyud 'bum): bde bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar sems can rnams ngan song thams cad la rgyab kyis phyogs par bgyi ba dang / tha nam mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde brag tu rtogs par bgyi ba'i slang du
309a2(rgyud 'bum): chos bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas ngan song thams cad yongs su skyong ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngan song
309a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po gsungs te/ de mgon po shAkya thub pa nyid kyis gsungs pa ni/ dang po re zhig rnal 'byor pas skye bos dben pa'i yid dang rjes
309a4(rgyud 'bum): su mthun pa'i sa phyogs su 'jam zhing shin tu 'bol ba'i stan la 'dug ste/ dri bzang pos maN+Dal byas nas nye bar spyod pa lnga'i mchod pa bya'o// de nas chos thams cad bdag med par bsgoms la/ bdag nyid yi
309a5(rgyud 'bum): ge hUM gis rdo rje 'bar ba me nyi mar bsgoms te/ de'i mgrin par yi ge hrI las pad+ma dang / de'i steng du 'dab ma'i rtse mor yi ge a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / de'i steng du yi ge hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang / rdo rje de lce la

314b1(rgyud 'bum): bskyang bgyis shing / / sdom pa ma lus bzung bgyis nas// ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi// ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol// dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung bgyi// sems can mya ngan 'das la

314b3(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyi yon tan bsngags par byed de/ e ma'o sangs rgyas e sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas mdzad pa mchog legs so// ngan song thams cad legs sbyangs nas// sems can byang chub thob mdzad phyir/
314b4(rgyud 'bum): zhes pa'o// de nas badz+ra any+dza li zhes pa dang / rdo rje bsdams pa snying khar dral bar bya ste/ oM sarba bid+yA badz+ra ban d+ha trAH/ ces brjod bcing ngo // rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya bcings la/ oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra dr-in+ta
314b5(rgyud 'bum): me b+ha ba shA shwa d+ha me b+ha ba hri da yaM me a d+hi tiSh+Tha sarba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha hUM/ ha ha ha haho/ zhes bya'o// oM badz+ra muSh+Ti baM/ sems ma rdo rje bcings nas oM sarba b+hi na sho d+ha ne sarba pA paM a na ya hUM/ rdo rje bsdams pa
314b6(rgyud 'bum): bstan bcings nas/ / rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bar nas// myur du gyen du legs 'phen la// ltung ba spong bar byed pa'i mchog/ ces pa'o// oM sarba bid+yA sarba a pA ya bi sho d+ha ne hUM phaT/ sdig pa thams cad rnam
314b7(rgyud 'bum): par spyod pa'i sngags so/ / rdo rje bsdams pa brtan byas nas// gung mo dag ni kha sbyar te// mtha' ma bzhi po kha spras pa/ myur du sdig pa dral bar 'gyur// oM sarba bid+yA tAnahUM/ sems ma rdo rje bcings
315a1(rgyud 'bum): la/ oM sarba bid+ha sarba A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ne mu ne hU~M phaT/ 'don pa'i mtshan nyid do// de nas de'i rjes la rnal 'byor pas snying pa'i dbus su yi ge a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang s
315a2(rgyud 'bum): teng du/ oM mu ne mu ne mahA mu na ye swAhA/ oM na maHsarba durga ti sho d+ha ne/ sho d+ha ne sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ne/ shud d+he bi shud d+he/ sarba karma A ba ra Na bi shud d+heska/ de dag gis ngan song thams cad yongs su stong pa'i
315a3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / de nas rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas bkug nas bcug ste bcings nas dbang du byas nas/ nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la gzhug ste/ dkyil 'khor gnyis kyis
315a4(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gcig tu 'gyur ro/ / rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor du gyur pa las dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bdag nyid kyi dngos po 'khor los
315a5(rgyud 'bum): sgyur ba'i gzugs shAkya seng ge sgom mo/ / de nas kya thub pa'i thugs yi ge a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sgom zhing / zla ba'i kyil 'khor gyi dbus su/ oM mu ne mu ne ma hA mun ye swAhA/ de nas rdo rje rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor
315a6(rgyud 'bum): sprul te/ oM sarba bid+yA badz+ra tsakra hUM/ zhes pas so// sems ma rdo rje bcings nas/ de nas de nyid kyi sor mo dbus ma gnyis kyis 'phreng ba thogs la/ sa ma ya hUM/ zhes pa 'dis yid kyis 'jug go/
315a7(rgyud 'bum): 'phrang ba de'ang rang gi mgo bor bzhag ste/ pra tIts+tsha badz+ra hoHzhes pa 'dis so// de nas rang gi mgo bor bcings te/ oM pra ti gr-ih+Na s+t+waM i maM satwa mahA ba la/ zhes pa 'dis so// gdod pa bcings la yang
315b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dis dgrol lo/ / oM/ rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid kyi// khyed kyi mig ni 'byed par brtson// rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med// thams cad mig ni bye bar 'gyur// zhes pa dang / he badz+ra pa shwa/ zhes pa'o//
315b2(rgyud 'bum): de nas dkyil 'khor chen por ji srid bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de srid du blta'o// yang sems ma rdo rje bcings la thugs kar dgrol zhing rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa nas dbang bskur ba rdo rje khu tshur gyis
315b3(rgyud 'bum): sbyin pa'o/ / oM sarba bid+yA badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ zhes pa'o// yang rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas gdab ste/ oM sarba bid+yA badz+ra d+ha ra tiSh+Tha badz+ra Ni hUM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ oM sarba bid+yA rat+na badz+ri Ni hUM/
315b4(rgyud 'bum): a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ oM sarba bid+yA d+har+m+ma badz+ri Ni hUM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ oM sarba bid+yA kar+m+ma badz+re Ni hUM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ oM TuM badz+ra du Sh+ya ho/ yi ge gnyis kyi go chas go bgos la/ de nas rang nyid rdo rje'i
315b5(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur ba gzung bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje yis// dbang gis de ring khyod dbang bskur// 'di ste sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// rdo rje rab tu grub phyir gzung // oM badz+ra a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM a b+hi ShaH
315b6(rgyud 'bum): mi tiSh+Tha badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ badz+ra nA ma a b+hi Sha ka ta/ oM badz+ra satwa s+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ 'di ste sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu gzung // phyag ni rdo rje'i
315b7(rgyud 'bum): brdal zhugs brtan/ / oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badz+ra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha s+t+rai d+hA ra yA mi badz+ra satwa hi hi hi hi hUM/ zhes pa'o// oM sarba bid+ya badz+ra a d+hiSh+ThA na sa ma ye hUM/ bdag nyid byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so//
316a1(rgyud 'bum): rngos za chur gnyis bcings nas mthe bong dang / phung mo dang / mthe'u chung chen du bsgreng gyi kha rgyur nas mdzub mo dang ming med sems pa'i skyil grang byas pa na rdo rje'i phyag bya ste/ ming kha dang /
316a2(rgyud 'bum): mgrin pa dang / dpral ba dang / mdzod spu dang / smin mtshams dang / sna dang / rna ba dang / dku dang / pus mo dang / rkang pa dag dang / byin pa dang / mig gnyis dang / gsang bar byin gyis
316a3(rgyud 'bum): brlab pa'ang bya'o/ / de nas rang gi lus la/ sa ma ya aH/ yi ge a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sa bon las byung ba'i mtshan ma thams cad kyi snying po'i rgyal bskyed cing oM sarba dId+hA d+yA sh+ya dzaHd+hU
316a4(rgyud 'bum): sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ sa ma ya hoH/ oM mu ne mu ne mad+hA mu na le swA/ zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o// thun mong ba'ang ngo // de nas rang gi lus la rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcings te/ dzaHhUM ba~M hoH/ brjod cing
316a5(rgyud 'bum): gnas ji lta ba rnams su bkug nas bcug ste bcings la dbang du bya'o/ / rang gi thugs kar hU~M yig ni// sbyor bas rdo rje rtse lnga pa// shAkya seng ge'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rab tu bshad par bya// dbus su ting
316a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin mchog gis ni/ / bzhugs pa dam tshig phyag rgyar bshad// rdo rje bcings pa dam byas la// gung mo gnyis kyi rtse mo sbyar// rdo rje phyag rgya ma bcas pa// rdo rje gtsug tor phyag rgya'o// de nyid gung mor
316a7(rgyud 'bum): chen dang / gung mo pad+ma'i rnam pa dang // de nyid gung mo rdo rje las// sor mo lhag ma 'bar byas nyid// sor mo de nyid 'bar byas la// gtsug tor gzi brjid phyag rgya'o// de nyid las ni srin lag dang // ma
316b1(rgyud 'bum): chung gnyis ni ma'am ste bsgreng / / mdzub mo pad+ma'i 'dab ma las// gung mo rdo rje bsgreng ba dang // de nyid mdun du bzhag nas ni// rdo rje dra ba'i tshul du bya// snying khar yang ni mthe bong mnyam// rab tu
316b2(rgyud 'bum): brkyang ba 'phreng ba ma/ / thal mo sbyar ba kha nas dbyung // gar byed spyi bor thal mo sbyar// rdo rje bsdams pa thur du sbyin// thal mo legs sbyar gyen du gtor// mthe bong mnyam ste rab tu bsdams//
316b3(rgyud 'bum): rab tu brkyang ba byug pa'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// mdzub mo mthe bong gung mo rnams// re re zhing yang phan tshun du// mngon du phyogs pa gzung bar bya// mdzub mo gcig ni cung zad bkug
316b4(rgyud 'bum): mthe bong gnyis ni mdud pa bcing / / mthe bong mdzub mo bsnol ba bcing // rdo rje khu tshur rtse mo bsdams// mgrin par pad zla'i dkyil 'khor du// chos kyi phyag rgya rnam par bsgom// sngar gyi 'byin pa'i
316b5(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyis ni/ / chos kyi phyag rgya yin par bshad// thugs kar sna tshogs rdo rje ni// bsams te las kyi phyag rgya bya// ji skad bshang ba'i chos 'khor lo// shAkya'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// sa gnon mchog
316b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin ring 'dzin dang / / mi 'jigs sbyin sogs rim pa bzhin// ting 'dzin mchog tu gnas pa ni// gtsug tor gzi brjid phyag rgya'o// g.yas pa'i lag ngar dbyug pa dang // g.yon pa snying khar
316b7(rgyud 'bum): ral gri 'phyar/ / g.yon pa sdigs mdzub bsgreng bya ste// g.yas pa bteg ste brkyang bar bya// lag pa gnyis ka gar bsdoms nas// gdugs kyi rnam par gzhag par bya// chos kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga gang //
317a1(rgyud 'bum): @rdzogs sangs rgyas skyob min pa'i yang // rdo rje bsgyings pa'i sbyor ba yis// brtags pa'i bsam pas mdud par bya// 'phreng ba bcing dang kha nas dbyung // bar gyis yongs su bskor ba
317a2(rgyud 'bum): nyid/ / rdo rje khu tshur sbyor ba yis// bdug pa la sogs de bzhin sbyar// mdzub mo lcags kyu bcing ba yis// mthe'u chung la ni lcags sgrog che// mkhrig ma mdud cing mdzub gnyis bsnol// rgyab dag kyang

317a4(rgyud 'bum): tshun lhan cig gshibs nas ni/ / mdzub mo dang ni gung mo dgug/ me tog rnam par gzung bar bya// byams pa'i phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa khu tshur dkur bzhag la// g.yas pa'i dpung pa'i thad kar ni// mdzub
317a5(rgyud 'bum): mo gung mo brkyang nas ni/ / mig gi tshul du gzhag par bya// mthong ba don yod kyi'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// mdzub mo dag ni brkyang nas su// g.yas pa lcags kyu legs bzhag pa// ngan song
317a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad spong ba'i yin/ / g.yon pa khwa tshur dkur bzhag la// g.yas pa dbyig pa lta bur ni// gyen du bsgrengs la gzhag par bya// mya ngan mun pa kun 'joms kyi'o// g.yon pa khra tshur lte bar gzhag
317a7(rgyud 'bum): lag pa g.yas pa glang po che'i/ / sna yi tshul du bzhag pa ni// spos kyi glang po'i phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa khu tshur dkur gzhag ste// g.yas pa ral gri thogs pa yi// tshul du 'jog par byed pa ni/ dpa'
317b1(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gro ba'i phyag rgya yin/ / g.yon pa khu tshur snying khar gzhag/ g.yas pa steng bskor mkha' mdzod kyi// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings pa// rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa lta bur ni// g.yas kyi logs su 'jog
317b2(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ ye shes tog gi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis kyis bum 'dzin ltar// bzhag pa 'od dpag med pa'i 'o// g.yon pa'i khu tshur brla stengs gzhag/ g.yas pa'i khu tshur gzhogs su ni// mthe bong mthe'u
317b3(rgyud 'bum): chung brkyang byas la/ / zla tshes rnam pa zla 'od kyi'o// lag pa gnyis ni snying kha ru// pad+ma'i rnam par rnam phye la// rtse mo phan tshun sbyar ba ni// bzang skyong gi ni phyag rgya yin// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings
317b4(rgyud 'bum): la/ go cha 'dzin pa lta bur ni// nub ma gnyis su legs bzhag pa// dra ba can 'od phyag rgya yin// g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur bzhag la// g.yas pa snying khar bzhag nas ni// sor mo dbus
317b5(rgyud 'bum): ma bsgrengs byas la/ / rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya yin// g.yon pa khu tshur snying khar gzhag/ g.yas pa mi 'jigs sbyin rnams la// blo gros mi zad pa yi'o// g.yon pa'i khu tshur lte bar gzhag/ g.yas
317b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i se gol gtogs pa ni/ / spobs pa brtsegs pa'i phyag rgya yin// g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur bzhag ste// g.yas pa'i rin chen khu tshur bya// kun tu bzang po'i phyag rgya yin// mtshan ma dang bral cho ga
317b7(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / las kyi phyag rgyar bshad pa yin// snying khar rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i// gzugs can yang dag gzang bya zhing // 'byin pa rnams su ji ltar bzung // phyag rgya mtshan ma bsnams pa dag/ rdo rje dril bu
318a1(rgyud 'bum): bzung nas ni/ / thugs kar rdo rje 'dzin pa ni// phyag rgya che zhes byang chub gang // byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che'i// 'byin pa rnams su ji ltar bzung // phyag rgya mtshon cha bsnams/
318a2(rgyud 'bum): parnams/ bdag nyid chen po gang gang gis// phyag rgya gang dang gang bcings nas// snying po don gyi bzlas pa dang // rang gi bdag nyid bsgom par bya// phyag rgya bzhi rnams sgrub byed pa// lha rnams thams cad
318a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas btab dang / / kun mkhyen yon tan rdzogs pa dang // sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir// ngan song thams cad legs sbyangs nas// sems can byang chub thob bya'i phyir// de nas sngags rab bshad bya
318a4(rgyud 'bum): ste/ ngan song kun sbyong dkyil 'khor du// phyag rgya sngags kyis rab sbyor gyis// bya ba thams cad nus par 'gyur// so so so sor rdo rje gar// byas nas sngags rnams brjod par bya// oM na mo b+ha ba ba ti//
318a5(rgyud 'bum): sarba durma ti pa ri sho d+ha no rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ ar+ha te samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya~M/ tad+ya thA/ oM sho d+ha ne sho d+ha na/ sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ne/ shud+d+ha bi shud+d+he sarba karma A ba ra Na bi shud+d+he swAhA// g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis
318a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje dril bu blangs la/ lag pa g.yas pas rdo rje 'gying ba dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor zhing 'di skad ces brjod do// badz+ra bA tsan Tagyi hUM dzaHdzaHdza/ rang gi snying khar bsgreng ste gsal ba'i sbyor bas gzung zhing
318a7(rgyud 'bum): Tak+ki dzaHho/ zhes brjod de/ de nas yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya ste/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa'i dbang phyug dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// de rnams bltas la mchod pa thams cad kyis rab tu mchod
318b1(rgyud 'bum): do/ de nas de rnams kyis bstod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod par bya ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad pa// khams gsum pa yi 'gro kun gyi// ngan song thams cad stong mdzad pa// shAkya
318b2(rgyud 'bum): seng ge khyod phyag 'tshal/ / chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin las// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// rang gi de nyid ston mdzad pa// rdo rje gtsug tor khyod phyag 'tshal// mnyam nyid de nyid bsgoms pa
318b3(rgyud 'bum): yis/ khams gsum la gnas thams cad la// dbang bskur rab tu gsol mdzad pa// rin chen gtsug tor khyod phyag 'tshal// so sor kun rtog rang bzhin can// chos kyi bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs
318b4(rgyud 'bum): pas/ sems can dbugs 'byin mdzad pa po// pad+ma'i gtsug tor khyod phyag 'tshal// sems can sdug bsngal zhi bya'i phyir// bya ba rjes sgrub rang bzhin can// 'phrin las sna tshogs mdzad pa po//
318b5(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs gtsug tor khyod phyag 'tshal// khams gsum 'od kyis gsal mdzad nas// sems can kun gyis 'phags pa yi// bden pa mthong bar mdzad pa po// gtsug tor gzi brjid khyod phyag 'tshal//
318b6(rgyud 'bum): yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnams// sbyin pas sems can thams cad kyi// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa// gtsug tor rgyal mtshan khyod phyag 'tshal// nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs dag
318b7(rgyud 'bum): gcod cing bdud bzhi'i stobs bcom nas/ / sems can byang chub thob mdzad pa// gtsug tor rnon po khyod phyag 'tshal// khams gsum 'gro ba thams cad kyis// gdugs dkar gyis ni brgyan pa yi//
319a1(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi rgyal po thob mdzad pa// gtsug tor gdugs dkar khyod phyag 'tshal// sgeg mo 'phreng ba de bzhin rdza/ gar mkhan lha mo bzhi po dang // spos dang me tog mar me ma/ tri yi l+h+wa
319a2(rgyud 'bum): khyod phyag 'tshal/ / dad sogs ngo bo las byung ba// sgo bzhi'i dbus na gang bzhugs pa// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// sgo skyong khyed rnams la phyag 'tshal// sgo bzhi yi ni logs dag na// khyams rnams
319a3(rgyud 'bum): su ni bzhugs mdzad pa/ / rab dga' la sogs bcu gnyis gnas// byang chub sems dpa' khyed phyag 'tshal// tshangs dbang drag po zla ba sogs// phyogs bzhir 'jig rten skyong ba rnams// me dang srin po rlung lnga
319a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'byung po'i bdag po khyed phyag 'tshal// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// dkyil 'khor mdun du kun bsdod nas// sngags pa rdo rje dril 'chang bas// bstod pa 'di dag yang dag brjod// phyi nas rang gi
319a5(rgyud 'bum): lus la ni/ / bdag nyid dkyil 'khor rab tu gzhug/ de ltar nges par sgom bzhin pa'i// dkyil 'khor dang po sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// / de nas dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ces bya ba
319a6(rgyud 'bum): rab tu bshad par bya ste/ / oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA Na a d+ha nu pan+d+ha tAta/ de'i don ni rnam par thar pa las phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad stong zhing bcu drug tu lhag par mos par bya ste/ ngar 'dzin
319a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bdag nyid stong pa nyid du blta'o/ / de nas yi ge hrI las rdzogs pa'i rdo rjes rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang / yi ger gyis me'i dkyil 'khor dang / de'i steng du yi ge baM las chu gtar chen po dang / de'i steng du yin
319b1(rgyud 'bum): kaM las gser gyi dkyil 'khor dang / de'i steng du dbus su hUM suM hUM zhes bya ba ste/ de las ri rab gru bzhi pa rin po che'i rang bzhin rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa bskyed la/ oM badz+ra dr-iT+Ta/ zhes pa la sogs pa dang rdo rje
319b2(rgyud 'bum): bsdams pas byin gyis brlab bo/ / de'i steng du rdo rje rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas yi ge b+h+rUM dkar po las byung ba'i rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che'i rtse mo can gzhal yas khang / gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs pa ni
319b3(rgyud 'bum): yis rnam par brgyan/ / grwa bzhi rnams ni thams cad du// sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su// zla ba mtshan ma rdo rjes spras// dra ba dra phyed kyis brgyan cing / thig le dang ni yang dag ldan// dar dang me tog 'phreng
319b4(rgyud 'bum): bas brgyan/ / nang gi dkyil 'khor ni 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa rdo rje 'phreng bas yongs su bskor ba'o// de'i lte ba'i steng du seng ge'i gdan no// de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad
319b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i nang rnams su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te lha rnams kyi gnas so/ / phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi gnas ni snams bu rnams la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa brgyad blta'o// seng ge'i gdan gyi steng gi b+ha
319b6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dkyil 'khor yi ge a la sogs pa dang / yi ge ka la sogs pa shes rab dang thabs kyi yi ge zhu bar gyur pa mkha' khyab kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa/ byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin rgyu
319b7(rgyud 'bum): sems can can gyi don gyi rgyu rdzogs pa'i sngags kyi gzungs su gyur te/ oM mu ne mu ne ma hA mu na ye swAhA/ sngags 'dis dpal shAkya'i rgyal po rdzogs par 'gyur te/ sgrib pa thams cad sel ba'i ting 'dzin
320a1(rgyud 'bum): la snyoms par zhugs pa'o/ / de nas ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de'i phyag rgya dang sngags bshad par bya ste/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings
320a2(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / rim gyis rnam par dbye bar bya// chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ni// 'khor ba thams cad gcod byed yin// de yi dpe ni 'di lta ste// ji ltar pad+ma la chags pa'i// bung ba la sogs bsdams pa rnam/
320a3(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i 'dab ma kha phye na// bcings pa'i sdug bsngal las thar byed// de bzhin 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi// srid gsum 'khor bar bcings pa 'di// thugs rje'i bdag nyid shAkya yi// seng ges bcings pa las
320a4(rgyud 'bum): grol mdzad/ / de nas dpal shAkya thub pa'i thugs kar yi ge a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sngags thams cad kyis bskyed par bya ste/ rdo rje gtsug tor nas brtsams te
320a5(rgyud 'bum): ji srid rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thugs pa 'byung ba yin no/ / de nas sngags rnams 'byung ste/ oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha na rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samya ka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/
320a6(rgyud 'bum): / sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ne/ sar+b+ba pA paM bi sho d+ha ne/ bi shud+d+he bi shud+d+he sar+b+ba karma a ba ra Na bi shud d+he swAhA/ sngags 'di nges par brjod do// de nas/ de'i phyir go rims bzhin yang dag/ rim bzhin yang dag rab bshad
320a7(rgyud 'bum): bya/ oM badz+ra hUM phaT/ kha yi sgo nas byung nas ni// kun nas 'od zer lnga par 'thon// kun nas phyogs bcur snang byas nas// sems can rnams ni thams cad kyi// sdug bsngal rnams ni thar mdzad de/
320b1(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer rnams ni slar log nas// thugs kar zhugs te de rjes la// sngags dang 'od zer gnyis 'dres pa// las byung sku ni yongs rdzogs pa// nang gi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rtsibs// shar phyogs
320b2(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma zla bar bzhugs/ / rdo rje gtsug tor de bzhin gshegs// sems can kun la phan don du// thugs ka las byung bzhugs pa ni// sku mdog dkar zhing 'od zer 'bar// sa non phyag rgya yang dag bzhugs/
320b3(rgyud 'bum): de ltar 'od zer spro bsdu ni// sngar bshad pa yi thams cad kyang // spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// sngags dang 'od zer legs 'dres dang // sku ni bskyed cing yang dag rdzogs// ji bzhin gnas su bzhugs
320b4(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / oM rata nota ta ma tAM/ zhes bya bas dbyung bar bya'o// lho yi rtsibs su yang dag bzhugs// pad+ma zla ba'i dbus su ni// rin chen gtsug tor de bzhin gshegs// thugs ka nas ni nges bton nas//
320b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas mtshan gyis yang dag brgyan// sku mdog sngo zhing shin tu mdzes// 'di yi phyag rgya mchog sbyin nyid// khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa'i// sems can kun la dbang bskur mdzod// sngar bzhin
320b6(rgyud 'bum): spro dang bsdu ba dang / / gzugs bskyed pa yi rim pa yis// oM pad mod ta ma hrIH/ zhes dbyung bar bya'o// de nas nub kyi rtsibs gnas pa'i// pad stengs zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// sa bon 'od zer
320b7(rgyud 'bum): gyis rdzogs pa'i/ / pad stengs gtsug tor de bzhin gshegs// thugs ka las ni phyung gyur nas// rjes su sngon mdzad bzhugs pa ni// pad+ma rA ga'i 'od 'bar la// bsam gtan phyag rgyas rnam
321a1(rgyud 'bum): par bzhugs/ / maM bi sho d+ha ma aH/ zhes srung ngo // byang phyogs rtsibs gnas padam yi// steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// thugs gnas bton sangs rgyas nA~M// rdzos
321a2(rgyud 'bum): gtsug tor de bzhin gshegs/ / sgra mdog ljang khu 'od 'bar ba// 'di yi phyag rgyas mi 'jigs sbyin// phyag rgyas 'phrin las sna tshogs mdzad// sems can 'khor ba las sgrol ba'o// yi ge oM gyis
321a3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dbyung / / gtsug tor gzi brjid de bzhin gshegs// me yi mtshams gnas pad+mar gnaso// yang dag zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// g.yas pa nyi ma yang dag snams// phyag g.yon pa ni dku la
321a4(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ sku mdog dkar dmar 'od kyis ni// khams gsum pa ni snang bar mdzad// hUM gi sa bon las byung ba// gtsug tor rgyal mtshan de bzhin gshegs// thugs ka las byung phyung nas ni// bden thal
321a5(rgyud 'bum): rtsibs la bzhugs nas ni/ / bad gnas zla ba'i gzugs la yang // sku mdog dmar zhing gnag pa la// yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshal bsnams// sems can ser sna skyong mdzad pa// hrIHyig sa bon las
321a6(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa'i/ / gtsug tor rnon po de bzhin gshegs// nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs rnams// gcod mdzad rlung gi rtsibs su phyung // pad+ma zla ba la bzhugs shing // 'di yi phyag mtshan g.yas ral gri/
321a7(rgyud 'bum): g.yon ma glegs bam bsnams pa ni// sku mdog mkha' ltar sngo ba'o// pad+ma la gnas zla bar bzhugs// kr-i yig sa bon las byung ba'i// gtsug tor gdugs dkar de bzhin gshegs// sems can
321b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi chos kyi rje/ / dbang ldan rtsibs su dbyung bar bya// kun da lta bu'i mdog lta bu// 'di yi phyag mtshan gdugs bsdams pa// de kun sna tshogs pad+mar gnas// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs
321b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i/ / oM traM hrIHaH/ sngags de rnams su brjod nas su// thugs ka nas ni dbyung ba dang // mtshams kyi gnas ni bzhi po ru// pad+ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// sgeg mo la sogs lha mo bzhi// rigs
321b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi sku mdog 'dzin pa ste/ / dkar ser dmar po sna tshogs mdog/ de nas phyag rgya bcings pa ni// sngar bshad ji skad bshad bzhin du// bsngags pa nyid ni brjod nas su// thugs ka nas kyang dbyung bya ste// gdug
321b4(rgyud 'bum): pa la sogs lha mo bani/ / pad+ma la gnas zla ba yi// dkyil 'khor du ni mtshams bzhi'o// thams cad du yang sku mdog ni// rigs kyi rim pa nyid kyis so// oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+ha d+har+m+ma te/ ga ga na sa mud ga te

321b6(rgyud 'bum): cad sems dpa'i skyil gung can/ / phyag rgya sku mdog rim pa yang // byams pa thugs ni rnam dag pa// sku mdog ser po 'od zer bzang // g.yas pa klu shing me tog can// g.yon pas spyi blugs bsnams pa'o//
321b7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa mthong ba don yod ni// sku mdog ser po 'od zer 'bar// phyag g.yas pad+ma spyan can te// g.yon pa'i phyag ni dkur bzhag pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' gsum pa yang // mtshan ni ngan song spong 'jom
322a1(rgyud 'bum): pa/ sku mdog dkar po 'od 'bar zhing // phyag rgya lcags kyu bsnams pa can// bzhi pa mya ngan mun pa kun// nges 'joms blo gros de bzhin te// dkar ser 'dres pa'i mdog tu snang /
322a2(rgyud 'bum): de yi phyag rgya dbyug pa bsnams// g.yon pa khu tshur dkur bzhag cing // sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs// byang chub sems dpa' ba'i rnams kyang // lho sgor rab tu bzhugs pa'o// dang po spos kyi zang po yang /
322a3(rgyud 'bum): dkar po sngo ba'i sku mdog can// 'di yi phyag rgya phyag g.yas na// dri yis dung ni rab tu bkang // g.yon pa khu tshur dkur bzhag la// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong // gnyis pa dpa' bar 'gro ba mchod// nyon
322a4(rgyud 'bum): mongs thams cad rab grol mdzad/ / shel gyi mdog can 'od bzang ba// 'di yi phyag rgya ral gri bsnams// g.yon pa'i phyag ni dkur bzhag nas// sems can sdug sngal zhi mdzad pa'o// gsum pa nas mkha'
322a5(rgyud 'bum): mdzod nyid de/ / rgyan ni thams cad kyis brgyan pa// dkar ser bsres pa'i sku mdog 'od// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par spangs// 'di yi phyag rgya phyag g.yas na// pad+ma la gnas chos kyi mdzod// g.yon pa'i phyag
322a6(rgyud 'bum): ni dkur bzhag la/ / nam mkha' nor kun 'chang ba po// bzhi pa yang ni ye shes tog/ bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs mdzad// sngon po'i mdog can yang dag gsal// yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnam/
322a7(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa khu tshur dkur 'jog cing // dbul ba'i sdug bsngal dgrol mdzad pa// nub sgo'i drung du pad+ma la// gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dang po bdud rtsi 'od ces bya// khra ba'i mdog gis rnam par mdzes/
322b1(rgyud 'bum): bdud rtsi'i bum pa legs par bsnams// cod pan rin chen phyag gis so// g.yon pa khu tshur dkur 'jog cing // rgya chen tshe ni stsol ba po// gnyis pa'i mtshan ni bla ba'i 'od// mi shes pa yi mun pa

323a1(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa la chur dkur gnas pa'o// rgyal ba'i sras po bzhi po ni// kun tu bzang po zhes bya ste// sku mdog ser zhing 'ong 'ab ga/ g.yas pa'i drug gi phyag d+ha ni// rin chen ma
323a2(rgyud 'bum): bsdams pa la/ / g.yon pa khu tshur dkur brten pa'o// de lta'i gzugs dang yang dag ldan// byang chub sems dpa' brtse bdag nyid// dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//

323a4(rgyud 'bum): A ba ra Na bi shud+d+ha swAhA/ sngags 'dis shAkya'i rgyal po la sogs pa lha sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su rdzogs par bsgom mo// de nas de'i rjes la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drang bar bya'o// sngags dang bya/

323b5(rgyud 'bum): gi phyag rgya rnams bcing ngo / / de nas sngar bshad pa'i sngags kyis chos kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga bya'o// de nas las kyi phyag rgya'i sngags kyis las kyi phyag rgya ba cing ngo // de nas phyag rgya chen po'i sngags

324a4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sdug bsngal sel/ / yon tan dngos grub thams cad mtha' yas sbyin mdzad pa// dri med mi g.yo mnyam med mchog rab chos can rnams// yon tan mchog ni phra mo'i cha la'ang mtshams med do//

325b5(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba kar+m+ma a dA ra Na ni b+hasmiM ku ru hUM phaT/ oM b+h+rUM bi na shA ya a dA ra NA ni badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM d+hU bi sho d+ha ya A ba ra Na ni hUM phaT/ oM dz+wa la dz+wA la d+ha ka d+ha kA ha na ha na A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ oM sr-i sa ra sa ra pras
325b6(rgyud 'bum): rA pra sa ra a ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ oM hUM ha ra ha ra sar+b+ba A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ i hUM phaT sar+b+ba oM ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ oM ts+tshatab+h+r-i ta sar+b+ba A ba raNA ni hU~M phaT// oM trA Ta trA Ta sarba A be ra NA ni hUM phaT/ oM ts+tshin da

326a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams spyad de/ oM sar+b+ba ba pa bi sho d+ha ni d+ha ma d+ha mad+hA pa ya dz+nyA phaT/ oM sar+b+ba dun ti bi sho d+ha ni pun+da waM lo ki ni dz+nyA phaT/ oM sarba sa prA ya bi sho d+ha ni dz+nyA nA lo ka ka ri hU~M phaT/ oM sad+d+h+ya a hA
326a2(rgyud 'bum): ya ga ti gan+d+ha nA sha ni gan+d+ha ba ti hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba na ra ka ga ti a kaR+Sha Ni hU~M dza~M phaT/ oM sar+b+bA na ra ka ud+hA ra Ni hU~M phaT/ oM sar+b+ba a pA ya ban d+ha na bi mo tsa ni hUM baM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba a pA ya ga ti ga hanA bi nA u0f7f n
326a3(rgyud 'bum): ihUM hoHphaT/ de nas dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ nang gi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ni// rtsibs brgyad pa yis shin tu mdzes// lte ba mu khyud yang dag ldan// nang gi rim pa bris nas ni// lha
326a4(rgyud 'bum): shAkya'i dbang po yi/ / bdag po thub pa bri bar bya// phyag na rdo rje stobs chen ni// dpa' bo de yi spyan sngar bri// rgyab tu 'khor lo sgyur ba yang // legs par mngon par bri bar bya// g.yas su rgyal
326a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i gtsug tor bri/ / g.yon du rnam par rgyal ba bri// gzi brjid phung po yang ni mer// dbang ldan du ni gdugs dkar po// rnam par 'thor ba rlung nyid du// rnam par 'joms pa bden bral bri//
326a6(rgyud 'bum): de nas phyi rol yang dag bri// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi pa shin tu mdzes// dpa' bo lcags kyu zhags pa dang // lcags sgrog dril bu brnyan rnams gzhag/ grwa yi phyogs ni thams
326a7(rgyud 'bum): cad du/ / bdug pa la sogs bri bar bya// de nas me tog 'phreng ba dang // dri sogs rang gi lus la byugs// slob dpon 'jug par bya ba ste// rba hUM ba~M hoH/ b+ha ga d+ha~M/ e h+ye hi mahA kA ru Ni ka dr-i rtsa
326b1(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya bas lha thams cad spyan drang ngo / / de bzhin du bcug ste dbang bskur na ngan song thams cad las rnam par grol te bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dang sa gong ma rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// dngos
326b2(rgyud 'bum): grub thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang gdon mi za bar thob par 'gyur ro// snga ma bzhin du las thams cad kyang byed cing thams cad la thogs pa med dang gyur
326b3(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / bya ba byas pas rims thams cad dang gdon la sogs pa rnams las thar par 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas las thams cad byed do// brtag pa gzhan gyi tsho gas kyang las thams cad 'grub
326b4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po la sogs pa ngan song gi dbang du gyur pa rnams 'gro ba thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan la sogs pa mngon par bris pa las bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / dbang
326b5(rgyud 'bum): bskur ba rnams kyi ngan song thams cad las yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas seng ge'i lta stangs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas te/ phyag 'tshal nas
326b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya mchog gi mtshan nyid dam pa bshad par bya ste/ thugs rje'i gdung ba'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems kyi rgyal ba thams cad kyi byin gyis brlab par bya'o//
326b7(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin du gnas pas dpral bar thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyal rnams kyi phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya'o// rnal 'byor rig pas mgrin pa'i phyogs su thal mo kha bye ba pad+ma'i rnam par bya'o//
327a1(rgyud 'bum): thugs kar rdo rje thal mo byas sor mo dbus mu rtse mo sbyar ba 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa gan rgyal du pang bar bzhag la/ de'i steng du g.yas pa bzlog sa
327a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhag la mthe bong gnyis sbyar te zhi ba'i lta bas blta'o/ / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gau ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid yongs su bskor te phan tshun sbyar te mthe' chung dag dang mthe bong
327a3(rgyud 'bum): ngag lu gu rgyud kyi rnam par bcings la snying khar gzhag go/ / 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// thal mo gang bar sbyar nas mthe'u chung dang mthe bong sbyar te gzung zhing lhag ma rnams rab tu brkyang
327a4(rgyud 'bum): ba'o/ / 'di ni pad+ma rigs kyi pad+ma'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams par brtan par byas nas gung mo gnyis rdo rje rtse mor byas la mthe'u chung dang mthe bong rab tu brkyang ba'o// 'di ni phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// denyi
327a5(rgyud 'bum): kyis mthe'u chung dang mthe bong gnyis de bzhin du byas la mdzub mo dang ming med pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i rnam par bya'o/ / 'di ni ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid kyi mdzub mo dang ming
327a6(rgyud 'bum): med dag rin po che'i rnam par bya'o/ / 'di ni dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o// mthe'u chung dang mthe bong so sor sbyar nas lhag ma rnams rab tu brkyang ba ni mtshon cha thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa de
327a7(rgyud 'bum): na bzhin du rab du 'jug pa ni las thams ca pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / snyim pa gyen du 'thor ba ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o// de nyid 'og nas 'thor ba ni bdug spos kyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid mthe bong gnyis gyen du bsnams la 'dzin
327b1(rgyud 'bum): pa ni mar me'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid dung 'dra bar byas pa ni dri'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid rab tu brkyang ste 'dzin pa ni gtor ma'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid gung mo rnams nang du bcug pa ni arga'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bcings pa las
327b2(rgyud 'bum): gung mo gnyis bsnyams te tshigs bar ma bcag nas sor mo thams cad brkyang ba 'di ni rnam par 'thor ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis bkug pa ni rnam par 'joms pa'i phyag rgya'o//
327b3(rgyud 'bum): de nyid kyi snyim pa 'od zer gyi rnam pa ni gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid spyi bo'i gnas su bskor ba ni gdugs dkar po'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud
327b4(rgyud 'bum): du bcings la bskor ba 'di ni 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o/ / rdo rje bsdams pa las gung mo gnyis rdo rjer byas la mdzub mo gnyis rin po che ltar bya ste/ lhag ma 'od zer 'dra bar byas pa ni rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi phyag
327b5(rgyud 'bum): rgya'o/ / de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis rdo rjer byas la sor mo lhag ma rnams bsdams nas rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas pas mchog sbyin dang g.yon pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa ni de bzhin
327b6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i yin no/ / rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mdzub mo g.yas pa bkug pa ni lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las rA 'dra bar byas
327b7(rgyud 'bum): pa ni mnga'i phyag rgya'o/ / denyid kyi phyag rgya dang mtho ngong rtsa spang pa ni blo gros legs pa'i'o// de nyid kyi tshigs par ma bcag pa ni rin po che'i'o// de ning sor mo rnams 'od zer 'dra ba ni gzi brjid kyi'o/
328a1(rgyud 'bum): nyid spyi bor bzhag pa ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o// de nyid mdun du bzhag pa ni band pa'i 'o// de nyid pad+ma 'dra bar byas pa ni pad+ma'i 'o// de nyid krung mo dang mdzub mo bkug pa ni ral gyi
328a2(rgyud 'bum): 'o/ / de nyid gdu bu 'dra bar byas pa ni 'khor lo'i'o// de nyid pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar byas pa ni lce'i 'o// de nyid bskyed pa ni sna tshogs kyi'o// de nyid shin tu bskyed pa ni srung ba'i 'o// de rtse mo gnyis
328a3(rgyud 'bum): slar bkug pa ni gnod sbyin gyi'o/ / de nyid dam du bkug pa ni bsdams pa'i'o// de nyid mdzub mo gnyis pa ni lcags kyu'i'o// de nyid rtse mo gnyis spang pa mi nagaso pa'i'o// de nyid phan tshun mdud pa ni
328a4(rgyud 'bum): lcags sgrog pa'o/ / de nyid bskyod pa ni dril bu'i'o// de nas tshangs pa dang brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
328a5(rgyud 'bum): 'das tshe thung ba dang skal ba chung ba rnams kyi don dang / / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / tshe ba sring ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/ bdag la gsang ba'i bdag po bshang du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
328a6(rgyud 'bum): byag na rdo rjes/ byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de dag la gcigs nas legs so zhes bya bas mgu bar byas te/ brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i grwa rnams gang khyed la 'di snya d+ha
328a7(rgyud 'bum): spobs pa yang dag par skyes pa de ni legs so legs so/ / legs par sgrubs shig dang bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes thams cad tshe dpag tu med par khyab par 'byung ba'i
328b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ tshe dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa 'phel ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs
328b2(rgyud 'bum): ka nas phyung ngo / / oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yuHpu N+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te ya ka ri Ni swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs 'di bshad pa tsam gyis ngan song thams
328b3(rgyud 'bum): cad rab tu zhi ste/ sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / byol song gi 'gro ba rnams su skyes pa'i sems can thams cad grol bar bdag nyid kyis rab tu shes so// 'jig rten gyi khams
328b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad snang bar byas shing / snang bar byas nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bcu gnyis byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i chos kyi yi ge de nyid du zhugs par gyur to//
328b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas slar ying bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshe dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya
328b6(rgyud 'bum): / ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di bshad do// oM a mai te a mi te/ a mi tong d+ha be/ a mi ta saM b+ha be/ a mi ta bi krAn+te/ a mi ta bi krAn+ta gA mi ni/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma kle sha k+Sha yaM ka ri swAh+ma/ de nas 'di bshang
328b7(rgyud 'bum): pa tsam gyis de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu ni ba'o/ / de nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za bar sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya
329a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka ras phyung ngo // oM kaM ka ni kaM ka na
329a2(rgyud 'bum): / ro tsa na ro tsa ni/ tro Ta ni tro tsa ni/ trA sa ni trA sa ni/ pra ti han pra ti sa ma sar+b+ba kar+m+ma pa raM pa ra Ni me sar+b+ba satwA nany+tsa swAhA/ 'di bshad pa tsam gyis tham cad de kho na bzhin du 'gyur ro// de nas slar yang bcom ldan
329a3(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis sgrib pa thams cad dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa ma lus pa rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i
329a4(rgyud 'bum): / snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // oM rat+ne rat+ne/ mthar t+ne rat+na saM b+hA be/ rat+na ki ra Ni/ rat+na mA la bi shud+d+he sho d+ha ya/ sar+b+ba pA paM hUM trAr+tha/ de nas 'di bshang ma thag tu bdud kyi gnas thams cad bcom
329a5(rgyud 'bum): zhing rnam par bcom par gyur to/ / de nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi gdon mi za bar mi choms par sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
329a6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // oM a mo g+ha a pra ti sata sar+b+ba a ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ni ha ra ha ra hUM phaT/ 'di bshad ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams
329a7(rgyud 'bum): 'di thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ yang dag par rab tu g.yos/ bskyod/ rab tu bskyod/ yang dag par rab tu bskyod/ bskul/ rab tu bskul/ yang dag par rab tu bskul cing
329b1(rgyud 'bum): ngo mtshar che zhing rmad du byung ba du ma 'jig rten du snang bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor ni 'di yin te/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// logs bzhi dang yang yang dag ldan// rta babs pa'i dang
329b2(rgyud 'bum): kun tu ldan/ / kha khyer dang ni sgo khyud bcas// de yi dbus su 'khor lo yi// dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bar bya// rtsibs bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog yin no//
329b3(rgyud 'bum): de yi dbus su mgon po ni// phyag na rdo rje stobs che zhing // phyag na rdo rje dril bu can// zla ba rgyas zhal 'dzum pa bri// shar gyi rtsibs kyi dbus kyi char// gtso bo ma bskyod pa nyid bri// lhor ni rin chen dri
329b4(rgyud 'bum): zhing / nub tu chu skyes pad+ma ste// byang du gdon mi za zhes grags// dpa' bo stobs chen bri bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni// 'khor los sgyur ba'i ma lugs mdzad// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mdog
329b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dra zhing / / rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa rnams// phyag na mchog sbyin mi 'jigs pa// rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs pa thi// zla yi cha rnams thams cad du// de bzhin bdug pa la sogs bri// sgo skyong
329b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyang khro bo dang / / mchog tu khro bar gzhol ba bri// de nas rnal 'byor rang nyid zhugs// sngags kyis lha rnams spyan drangs te// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ b+ha ga baM/ badz+ra e h+ye hi sa ma ya g+h+raM/ de nas mgon
329b7(rgyud 'bum): po byon pa la/ / mdor na mchod pa byas nas ni// 'chi bdag nyid dang sprul 'jigs pa'o// 'chi bdag gzhom phyir gzhug par bya// oM badz+ra sa ma ye hUM/ rdo rje ti rin ti ri bcing // lag na rin chen thogs
330a1(rgyud 'bum): pa gzhug/ yang na me tog 'phreng ldan pa// de dag dkyil 'khor nyid du dor// oM pra tIts+tsha badz+ran+tu/ de nas dam tshig sbyin te/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya n+tu/ de nas 'di gdong g.yogs dkrol bar bya'o//
330a2(rgyud 'bum): oM badz+ra r+thas+ya ud g+ha Ta ya hUM/ de nas 'dis brtan par bya'o// oM badz+ra dr-i sh+ya so// de nas dbang bskur ba sbyin te/ oM badz+re a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM bu a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM rat+na a d+hi Shiny+tsaN+DaM/ oM pad+ma a d+hi Shi.Adz+dza/
330a3(rgyud 'bum): oM kar+m+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa aH/ de nas bum pa'i dbang skur byin te/ oM badz+ra ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM prad+d+ha ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM rat+na ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa d+h+waM/ oM pad+ma kA la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH/ oM kamu ka la shA
