330a5(rgyud 'bum): Shiny+tsA traM/ oM pad+ma mu drA a b+hi Shits+tsha hrI/ oM kar+m+ma mu drA a b+hi Shiny+tsa aH/ oM badz+ra nA ma a d+hi Shiny+tsa trUM/ oM hUM trAM hrIHaH/ oM badz+ra karmA a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM aH/ oM badz+ra tsakra a b+hiShiny+tsa hUM bruM/ oM badz+ra tsakra a d+hi pa d+his+thA
330a6(rgyud 'bum): a d+hI Shiny+tsa b+h+rUM hUM hUM/ oM a e trA~M dz+dzatAM/ hrIHhrIHhrIH/ aHaHaHoM badz+ra d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shim+pA d+h+waM/ oM ti thAg ta d+hA ra Ni a dz+haiM Sha~Mr+g+haM oM/ oM rat+na d+hA ra Ni a b+hiShiny+tsa traM/ oM pid+mi d+hA ra Ni a d+hi ShiSh+Thad+hIH/ oM k+Sha
330a7(rgyud 'bum): d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa aH/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM rat+na gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa traM/ oM pad+ma gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH/ oM kar+m+ma guh+ya a d+hi Sha~M k+Sha a/ oM dra dzI pA ya sa ma
330b1(rgyud 'bum): yo ga a b+hi Shi ny+tsa trUM aH/ de ltar dbang bskur nas tshe 'phel ba'i rig pa 'di yin no// oM badz+ra A yu She hUM a/ 'di'i sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje tshe dpag med zla ba'i 'od can/ zla ba'i dkyil
330b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor la bzhugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag gnyis mi 'jigs pa dang mchog sbyin mdzad pa las bdud rtsi 'dzag pa bri'o// de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po lag pa thal mo sbyar ba brkyang ba gdong gyen du
330b3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la lta ba bris la/ mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod pa byas te/ de'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas so// de nas zla ba nya la mchod pa chen po byas la/ ba dmar ser gyi mar snod gsar par gtsug
330b4(rgyud 'bum): la g.yon pa'i rdo rjes mnan te/ bcom ldan 'das la rab tu sems shing mtshan thog thag bzlas pa bya'o// de nas dri bsnam zhing sngon ma byung ba'i dri'i ngad kyang ldang ngo // dro ba dang / du ba dang / me'ang 'byung
330b5(rgyud 'bum): ngo/ / 'od zer gyi snang ba rab tu 'phros te/ de la sogs pa'i mtshan ma byung na mar de mar gsar pa 'am/ til mar ram/ chu 'am/ 'o ma 'am/ 'o 'am/ chang ngam/ khrug gam/ zhan pas/ klad pa 'am/
330b6(rgyud 'bum): sha 'am/ gang yang rung ba dang lhan cig tu rab tu bsgrubs te nang par sngar srung ba la sogs pa byas nas bdag nyid sbyangs te 'thungs sam zos na/ mtshan ma ji lta ba nyi ma ji srid pa'i tsher 'gyur zhing / rdo rje sems dpa'i
330b7(rgyud 'bum): tsher 'gyur ro/ / tha mas ni dngos grub tha mar 'gyur te 'di la the tshom med do// mtshan ma ma byung na'ang 'jig rten na nad med pa dang yid gzungs pa dang ldan zhing / skra dkar dang gnyer ma med pa dang lus brtan zhing tshe lo brgya par
331a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / gzhan yang bzlas pa byas pa tsam gyis zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang la sogs pa'i las rnams brtag mi dgos par 'grub ste the tshom med do//
331a2(rgyud 'bum): / de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i
331a3(rgyud 'bum): slad du rang rang gi snying po bshad par 'tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' gnang bar zhu/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' gnang ba zhu/ rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs so shod cig dang / ngas rjes
331a4(rgyud 'bum): su yi rang zhing rang gi dam tshig gi byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ / de nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po ngal bso pos bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang zhing rjes su yi rang ste byin gyis brlabs pas rang gi snying po rang gi snying kha
331a5(rgyud 'bum): nas phyung la/ oM be/ de nas dri za'i rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung gis de kho na bzhin rang gi snying po bshad pa/ oM d+hI/ de nas grul bum gyi rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos de kho na bzhin du rang gi snying po
331a6(rgyud 'bum): bshad pa/ oM bi/ de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis de kho na bzhin du rang gi snying po bshad pa/ oM k+Sha/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ gru bzhi pa la sgobazhi pa// dkyil 'khor lngas ni
331a7(rgyud 'bum): brgyan pa ste/ / de yi dbus su mgon po ni// phyag na rdo rje 'gyings bcas bri// de yi g.yon pa'i logs su ni// ngal bso dge ba lag pa na// be con dang ni ne'u le// rin po che yi rgyan gyis brgyan// sdom zhing seng
331b1(rgyud 'bum): ge'i gdan la bzhugs/ / gser mdog gzi brjid ldan pa bri// mkhas pas bum pa bzang la sogs// rin chen tshogs char 'bab pa bri// mdun du yul 'khor skyong nyid ni// pi wang sgrog par yang dag
331b2(rgyud 'bum): brtson/ rol cing kha dog ljang khu nyid// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa bri// g.yas su dpa' bo lus 'phags po// ral gri phyag na bsnams pa bri// nub tu yang ni mig mi bzang // rdo rje zhags pa 'dzin
331b3(rgyud 'bum): cing mchog/ sbrul mgo mdun gyis yongs su bskor// mig ni dmar zhing shin tu 'bur// sgo yi phyogs ni thams cad du// sgo skyong rnams kyang de bzhin no// de nas sngags pa rang nyid 'jug/ 'khor lo'i phyag
331b4(rgyud 'bum): rgya zhes grags pa'i/ / bcom ldan de nyid spyan drang zhing // de nas rgyal po spyan drang ngo // spyan drangs nas ni mkhas pas mchod// mchod yon zhabs bsil cho ga bzhin// de nas slob ma rgyal rigs sam
331b5(rgyud 'bum): rje'u rigs bram ze la sogs kyang / / me tog 'phreng bas rnam brgyan pa// sngags shes pa yi sngags 'di dang // rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas gzhug/ oM badz+ra sa ma ye hUM/ de nas me tog gam rin po che 'dis
331b6(rgyud 'bum): kyang dor bar bya'o/ / oM badz+ra pra tIts+tsha d+ha ma ho ta ta ma/ gang la lhung ba'i rgyal po de// 'di yis 'grub 'gyur gzhan du min// de nas gra na gnas pa yi// bum pa bzhis kyang dbang bskur te// lnga pa phyag na
331b7(rgyud 'bum): rdorje'i'o/ / phyag rgya nyid kyis dbang bskur bya// de la sogs pa'i go rims bzhin// dkyil 'khor bris nas dbang bskur bas// rgyal po ma yin rgyal por 'gyur// rgyal po yin na cher por 'gyur
332a1(rgyud 'bum): @'dzam bu gling dbang dpal dang ldan/ / gling bzhi po yi bdag po mchog/ lan bzhir dbang ni bskur ba dang // lan pazhir rab tu zhugan ni/ de la rdo rje 'dzin rgyas dag/ rang gi bu bzhin bskyang bar bya// bdag cag
332a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal chen bzhi pos kyang / / 'bangs dang 'khor du bcas pa dang // yul 'khor pho brang bcas pa yi// rgyal pos rtag tu bskyang bgyi ste// de yi ma rungs pa rnams dang // de yi pha rol sde dang nad//
332a3(rgyud 'bum): 'chi bdag 'jigs pa mu ge dang // yams dang nyer 'tshe gzhom par bgyi// ngal bso pos ni rgyas par bgyid// yul 'khor srung gis zhi ba nyid// phyugs dang gnyen bcas dus min pa'i// 'chi bdag
332a4(rgyud 'bum): lus 'phags po yis 'joms/ / mig mi bzang gis bde bar byed// mu ge la sogs rnam par 'joms/ mdor na bdag gis de yi ni// re ba kun dang bsam pa kun// bgyi ste gal te ma nges na// phyag
332a5(rgyud 'bum): na rdo rje bslus pa yin/ / / de nas phyogs skyong bcus/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang sems can thams cad la
332a6(rgyud 'bum): phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du rang rang gi snying po rab tu dbul lo/ / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams legs so legs so// de legs par smros shig/ de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan la sogs pas rang rang gi
332a7(rgyud 'bum): snying po rnams phul ba/ oM I/ oM i/ oM a/ oM ya/ oM ra~M/ oM baM/ oM yaM/ oM ku/ oM aM/ oM bA/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la// sagon
332b1(rgyud 'bum): po dbus su de bzhin bzhag/ phyogs skyong rang gi phyogs kyi char// gzhag bya spyan sngar rnam pa gnyis// nyi ma dang ni phag gi gzugs// sgo skyong rnams kyang de bzhin no// de nas de kun spyan drangs la// mcho
332b2(rgyud 'bum): pa kun gyis mchod par bya/ / de nas rang nyid zhugs nas kyang // slob ma rnams ni gzhug bya zhing // phyogs skyong la sogs sngags bzlas pa'i// bum pa rnams kyis dbang bskur ro// de nas phan par 'dod pa
332b3(rgyud 'bum): yis/ sgrub phyir snying po sbyin par bya// phyogs skong rang gi phyogs gnas rnams// brtag mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur// de nas de dag mgu nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang su zhig/
332b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur bas dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs te dbang bskur ba 'dzin pa dang / gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am// rigs kyi bu mo dad pa de dag bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kun
332b5(rgyud 'bum): nas bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / snga bar bgyi'o// pha rol gyi sde rnams gzhom par bgyi'o// dus dang dus su char dbab par bgyi'o// 'bru dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams bskyed par bgyi'o//
332b6(rgyud 'bum): / de nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po chen po de'i tshe bsring bar bgyi'o// dus ma yin/
332b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'chi ba brgyad po so sor dgag par bgyi'o// / srin po rnams kyi bdag po chen po bden bral gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po chen po de dang / rgyal po chen
333a1(rgyud 'bum): po'i bu dang / zam ze 'am/ rje'u rigs sam/ mi gzhan gang yang rung ba dag la nad med pa dang / yi dgas dang / 'dres 'jigs pa med pa dang / srin po la sogs pa'i 'jig
333a2(rgyud 'bum): pa med pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa med par bgyi'o// dus thams cad du bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// // de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po chu bdag gis 'di
333a3(rgyud 'bum): skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dus thams cad du rgyal po re dang / yul thams cad kun nas so sor bskyang bar bgyi'o// kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// 'bru rnams kyang bskyed par bgyi'o//
333a4(rgyud 'bum): klu'i nyes pa rnams mi 'byung bar bgyi'o// dug dang thog kyang mi 'byung bar bgyi'o// me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// 'jigs pa thams cad kyang so sor dgag par
333a5(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / de nas rlung gi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can chen po de dag la dus thams cad du rlung gi 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar bgyi/ dus
333a6(rgyud 'bum): ma lags pa'i rlung mi 'byung bar bgyi/ 'bru dang / me tog dang / 'bru thams cad kyang yongs su bskyed par bgyi'o// / de nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po lus ngan pos/ bcom ldan 'das
333a7(rgyud 'bum): la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po brgyad cu dang lhan cig tu mchis te/ stobs dang ldan pas sems can chen po de la dus thams cad du
333b1(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa thams cad so sor dgag par bgyi'o/ / nor dang 'bru thams cad legs par 'byor par bgyi'o// rang gi skye bo dang / yongs kyi skye bo dang / yul dang / gnas dang / bran dang / snag gi gnyen dang /
333b2(rgyud 'bum): grogs dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma la sogs pa'ang bsrung bar bgyi'o// glang dang / ba dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / lug dang / ma he dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / ra la sogs pa'ang
333b3(rgyud 'bum): bsrung bar bgyi'o/ / / de nas 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag po dbang ldan gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po de dang
333b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze rnams 'di dang pha rol tu yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bkra shis pa dang chad pa yongs su spangs pa dang / dug gzil ba dang /
333b5(rgyud 'bum): dug gzhom pa dang / mtshams bcings pa dang / sa bzhi bcing ba dang phyogs bcing ba dang / rdo rje'i ra ba dang / rdo rje'i phur bus gdab pa dang / rdo rje'i gur yang bgyi'o// dgos pa
333b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la nye bar gnas par bgyi'o/ / bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa rnams kyi mtshan ma nye bar bstan par bgyi/ dge pa dang dge ba ma yin pa thams cad rmi lam du'ang bsgo bar bgyi/ grub pa thams cad la
333b7(rgyud 'bum): bgegs ma mchis par dngos grub thams cad kyang stsal bar bgyi'o/ / / de nas yang nam mkha' la sprod cing nam mala'al 'gro ba'i drag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'dis
334a1(rgyud 'bum): ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dus thams cad du rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal po'i blon po dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs lam la gnas pa thams cad la
334a2(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid 'khor thams cad dang bcas pa mchis te bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba kun nas bsgrub par bgyi'o// bgegs kyi gnas thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi'o// nad thams cad bsal bar
334a3(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / dus thams cad du phyi bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o// / de nas sa'i 'og gi bdag po phag chen pos kyang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
334a4(rgyud 'bum): gis mi'i bdag po dang / / rje'u rigs dang / bram ze dang / dmangs rigs dang / gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dad pa rnams kyi dus thams cad du don bsgrub par bgyi'o// 'jigs
334a5(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad las kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o/ / gzhan yang yongs su bskyab par bgyi'o// / de nas gza' chen po brgyad 'khor rgyu skar dang bcas pa rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
334a6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi snying po rnams 'bul bar 'tshal na/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ legs so legs so//
334a7(rgyud 'bum): ngas byin gyis brlabs kyis/ gza' chen po rnams shod cig/ de nas nyi ma la sogs pa'i gza' chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ oM a/ oM so/ oM a
334b1(rgyud 'bum): oM bu/ oM bri/ oM shu/ oM sa/ oM rA/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ dbus su bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs su bri'o//
334b2(rgyud 'bum): mtha' rnams su ni rgya mtsho chen po bzhi bri'o// de yi mdun du pa wa sangs// zla ba rgyab tu bri bar bya// g.yas su phur bu br-i bya zhing // g.yon du lhag pa bri bar bya// me yi gnas su mig dmar nyid
334b3(rgyud 'bum): rlung gi phyogs su nyi ma ste/ / dbang ldan du ni spen pa nyid// srin po'i phyogs su sgra gcan bri// dkyil 'khor phyi rol khor yug tu// rgyu skar thams cad bri bar bya// sgo sgor de bzhin sgo ba rnams// khros pa'i
334b4(rgyud 'bum): yid du bri bar bya/ / rdo rje 'dzin pas 'jug bya ste// rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas// thams cad kyang ni spyan drang ngo // de nas slob ma rnam gzhug ste// oM badz+ra ha na hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra gra sa sa ma ya ts+tsha/ oM badz+ra gra sa pra tIts+tsha ts+tsha
334b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas gza' brgyad sngags ni bsngags pa yis/ / bum pa brgyad po rnams kyis dbang bskur ro// de nas rdo phyag rgyas dbang bskur te/ de nas gza' rnam tham cang bsgrub par bya'o// de nas gza' chen po de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'as
334b6(rgyud 'bum): phyophyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gza' chen po brgyad kyis rgyal po chen po de dang / rgyal po'i bu la kun tu dus thams cad du de kho na bzhin du thams cad bgyi'o//
334b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas rgyu skar dang / skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud tsam rnams so// tshes dang / sbyor ba dang / khyim dang / dus sbyor dang / 'jug phong la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin du phyag
335a1(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang dus thams cad du sems can chen po'i bka' mi bcag cing dpon po bzhin du bskyang bar bgyi'o// grong khyer
335a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang gi gnas thams cad so sor bsgrub par bgyi'o// 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba'i tshe na'ang nges bdag cog mchod na gdon mi 'tshal
335a3(rgyud 'bum): bar 'jigs pa de mi 'byung ngo / / de nas klu chen po brgyad kyis phud ces bya ba'i sbas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par byas te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyi
335a4(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i snying po rnams 'bul lo/ / klu chen po rnams legs so legs so// gsang ba'i snying po rnams phul cig/ de nas de dag mgu nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol
335a5(rgyud 'bum): ngo/ oM pu/ oM phu/ oM baM/ oM phuM/ oM bI/ oM paM/ oM dza/ oM pheM/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa// kha dog dkar po legs par thi/
335a6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor de yi dbus bzhugs pa// phyag na rdo rje rab tu nag/ sbrul mgo mtha' yas gdengs ka bdun// ltos 'gro chen po bsdigs pa bri// mtha' yas 'jog po de bzhin du// stobs kyi rgya
335a7(rgyud 'bum): dang rigs ldan dang / / nor rgyas bu dang dung skyong dang // pad+ma chu bdag de bzhin du// mdor na 'dab ma re re la// de dag sbrul mgo 'bar ba bri// sbrul mgo bdun bdun chung ma yis// mgul nas 'khyung
335b1(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas pa bri/ / bum brgyad rnams bzhag bya ste// gtor ma lha bshos mdzes pa dang // mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsir bcas// bcos pa'i dbye ba rnams kyang ngo // rdo rje'i bdag nyid bzhugs pa ni// sbrul
335b2(rgyud 'bum): mgos sbrul mgo can rnams dgug/ phud ces bya ba lhan cig ste// dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes brjod do// de nas rgyal po 'am rgyal rigs ni// de dag thams cad bcug nas su// dug gi nyes skyon bsal ba'i phyir/
335b3(rgyud 'bum): phud ces bya bas dbang bskur ro// de nas ming tsam bzung bas kyang // klu rnams de dag thams cad 'grub// de nas de dag kun mgu nas// bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te// spyan sngar thal mo sbyar 'khod
335b4(rgyud 'bum): nas/ smon lam rab tu 'debs par gyur// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dga' ba gang dag dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa de dag bsdus par gyur na/
335b5(rgyud 'bum): de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid la bsdus par gyur cig/ de'i tshe bdag cag bye tshan gyis bsregs par gyur cig/ rdo rje kun tu 'bar bas bdag cag gi mgo 'gems par gyur cig/ rtag par dus thams
335b6(rgyud 'bum): cad du sems can chen po de bsrung ba dang / / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// gzi byin chen po dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus bskyed par bgyi'o// de'i dug rnams dug ma mchis par bgyi'o//
335b7(rgyud 'bum): dus dang dus su char dbab par bgyi'o// me tog thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// pha rol gyi g.yul thams cad la dus dang dus ma yin pa'i char dbab par bgyi'o// 'jig rten pa thams cad bskyed
336a1(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi'o/ / rgyal ba'i bka' dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' rab tu bsgrub par bgyi'o// de nas sgrub pa bshad de/ lha rdzas 'od 'phro dkar po can// klu rnams 'dud pas gnas
336a2(rgyud 'bum): pa yis/ / rdo rje 'dzin gtso bsams nas ni// phud ces bya ba 'bum du bzlas// de nas dug gis zin pa la// phud ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// lha rdzas 'od zer 'phreng ba 'khrigs// bsams
336a3(rgyud 'bum): nas de la phung yig bsam/ / lag pa sbrul mgo nags 'dra dang // phud kyi rlung gis pakas pa sha// rus gnas phud kyi rnam pa'i dug/ mtha' dag drangs te gso bar bya// de nas las rnams kun byed cing /
336a4(rgyud 'bum): dug rims dug sbyar la sogs pa// khu tshur gyis kyang kun selan// sbrul mgo'i phyag rgyas smos ci dgos// de nas lto 'phye chen po'i bdag po 'jigs byed chen po'i ma mo chen po brgyad kyis
336a5(rgyud 'bum): bskor bas/ / bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi 'jigs pa dang ma mo rnams kyi 'jigs pas/ lha dang klu la sogs pa kun tu skrag rnam
336a6(rgyud 'bum): par skrag ste kha sbub tu 'gyel nas gos dang bral te/ sems stor nas kun tu 'phyan pa dag la phan gdags pa'i slad du bdag cag gi snying po 'bul bar 'tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de legs
336a7(rgyud 'bum): par byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ / 'jigs byed chen po legs so legs so// rab tu 'jigs par byed pas rang nyid dang lha'i bu mo thams cad kyi snying po rnams shod cig/ de nas 'jigs byed chen pos
336b1(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs par byed pa'i sgra phyung nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / oM b+hai ra ba b+hai ra swA hA/ oM b+ha swAr+tha/ oM b+hi swAH/ oM b+hu swAhA/ oM b+he swAhA/ oM b+he swAhA/ oM b+ha~M swAhA/ oM b+haM swAH/ oM b+haHswAhA/ bcom
336b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'jigs byed chen po ni/ / brgyad po de dag gdam ngag nyan// de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de// 'khor lo chen po rtsibs brgyad bri// dbus su phyag na rdo rje ni// khro bo chen po 'jig rten gsum
336b3(rgyud 'bum): rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya gzhag/ de yi zhabs 'og ma rungs pa// 'jigs byed rnams kyi bdag po che// 'jigs byed pa dang bcas pa bri// rtsibs kyi nang rnams thams cad du// gzhan yang
336b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs byed brgyad po ni/ / ma mo rnams dang ldan pa ni// khros pa'i bzhin dang yid khros par// ci bde bar ni bri bar bya// 'dir ni sgo sgor de bzhin du// sgo ba shin tu khros ldan bri// de nas lcags
336b5(rgyud 'bum): klu la sogs pas/ / bkug ste mgo bo'i thod pa ni// khrag gis gang bas mchod nas su// sha chang gtor ma bzang po dang // snod rnams khrag gis bkang ba dang // mgo thod mgo yi dum bu dang
336b6(rgyud 'bum): khrag gam chang bkang bum pa brgyad/ / dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gzhag par bya// de nas 'jig rten gsum rnam rgyal// mchog gis slob ma rnams gzhug bya// thod pa dang ni bum pa yang // brgyad po rnams
336b7(rgyud 'bum): kyis dbang bskur ro/ / de nas las rnams sbyin par bya// ma mo'i khyim mam mtshan gcig par// 'jig rten gsum ni 'dul ba'i mchog/ tshul bzhin du ni mchod byas nas// 'bum phrag bzhir ni
337a1(rgyud 'bum): @bzlas par bya/ / de nas 'jigs par byed pa'i sgra// bdag nyid chen pos thos gyur te// mi 'jigs pa ni thod pa ru// khrag mchog bkang ba'i arga dbul// de nas khro bo 'jigs byed
337a2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ ma rungs yid can ma mo ni// tshogs kyis bskor cing 'jigs byed ni// brgyad kyis bskor ba mthong bar 'gyur// de mthong 'jigs pa med byas la// hUM zhes bya ba dran byed cing // sha'am yang
337a3(rgyud 'bum): nachang mchog gis/ / thod pa bkang ste dbul bar bya// de nas 'jigs byed ma rungs 'joms// mgu zhing rab tu 'grub gyur nas// ci 'dod spros shig ces bya ba// mgu ba'i yid kyis de sbyin byed/
337a4(rgyud 'bum): sa rnams sbyin pa ma gtogs par/ ro dang bcud len rdzas dang ni// ral gri 'khor lo rtse gsum dang // mtho ris sa stang sa 'og dang // gling dang gling bzhi'i rgyal srid dang // brgya byin nyid dang gnod sbyin
337a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang / / srin po nyid dang rig 'dzin nyid// rig 'dzin 'khor los sgyur ba nyid// 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po nyid// bka' nyan nyid kyang rang nyid dam// ma mo'i tshogs rnams ster bar 'gyur/
337a6(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub gang yang rung ba ni// ji ltar 'dod pa blang bar bya// hUM gi rnam par mngon phyogs shing // byin nas dgod cing 'gro bar byed// skrag na de ma thag du gsod// de nas tshangs
337a7(rgyud 'bum): pa la sogs pa lha chen po rnams kyis/ / bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' gnang na rang gi rtog pa
337b1(rgyud 'bum): bshad par 'tshal gyis/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse bar dgongs te byin gyis brlab par gsol// de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis rang rang gi snying po rnams bshad do//
337b2(rgyud 'bum): oM a/ oM bi/ oM ru/ oM i/ oM kaM/ oM ga/ oM bri/ oM ka/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de// dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la/ dbus su 'jig rten gsum 'dul
337b3(rgyud 'bum): ba/ de yi mdun du dpa' bo ni// dbang phyug lag na rtse gsum bri// rgyab tu tshangs pa'i rnam par bri// g.yon du lag na 'khor lo bri// g.yas na dbang po rang nyid kyi// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma lag thogs
337b4(rgyud 'bum): bri/ sgo sbyong rang bzhin 'dir de rnams// chung ma rang gi dkyil 'khor du// bum pa bum pa bkang ba yang // phyi rol dkyil 'khor du ni bzhag/ stobs bzang la sogs mthu chen yang // de nas 'jug
337b5(rgyud 'bum): bya lnga rnams yin/ / mkhas pas kun nas spyan drangs shing // dzaHhUM dzaM hos lha thams cad// pho brang dam par 'jug par mdzod// de nas de rnams gshegs bltas nas// dga' ba chen po mchod

337b7(rgyud 'bum): nas mngon par bsngags pa yi/ / bum pa'i chu yis dbang bskur ro// de nas lha rnams gang 'dod pa// dngos grub rab tu sbyin par bya// 'bum phrag gcig gam 'bum phrag gnyis// sngon du bsnyen pa byas
338a1(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ dbang phyug la sogs lha mchog ni// de rnams sgrub pa po yis 'grub// mtshan ma gcig pa la sogs su 'am// yang na phyag na rdo rje'i gnas// de bzhin gshegs
338a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i pho brang ngam/ / ring bsrel ldan pa'i mchod rten du// lha rnams thams cad cho ga bzhin// sgrub pa po yis rtag tu sgrub// de nas nam byed na ni lha// 'ongs nas khyod kyi 'dod pa ci// ji ltar bde
338a3(rgyud 'bum): zhing phan pa ni/ / sbyin zhing nges par go bar byed// bzang po myur du sems te spros// gang phyir mchog ni khyod la sbyin// de nas sngags shes dngos grub dang // mchog gi lha la gsol ba gdag/ lha rdzas

338b4(rgyud 'bum): thob pa'i rgyal po che bar bgyi'o/ / gling gcig dang / gling gnyis dang / gling gsum dang / gling bzhi pa dang / bde 'gro dang / sa stengs dang / sa 'og gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnams

339b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba gzhag ste/ b+h+rUM/ zhes bya ba'i snying po'o// de'i spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje ste/ badz+rI/ zhes bya ba'i snying po'o// g.yon du ni khro bo ste/

341a1(rgyud 'bum): sems can rnams kyi srog smyung phyir// rtag tu brdzun ni smra bar bya// sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes bya dang // dam tshig rnams ni srung ba dang // sngags rig pa yis grub pa'i phyir/

343a1(rgyud 'bum): po'i gos ni gyon nas su/ / sangs rgyas gzugs can mi 'jigs pas// ngan song 'gro bar gnas pa yi// sems can de rjes dran byed cing // sdig pa sgrib ba zhi pa'i phyir// rgyud dag pa

343a4(rgyud 'bum): yug tu ni rin chen dang / mu ran la ni chu skyes bri// phyi rol ta ni rigs lnga yi// dbye bas phyag rgya bri bar bya// de bzhin phyi yi lha rnams dang // lcags kyu la sogs bri bar bya// na bza' ser po gyon byas nas/

343a6(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i las bya ste/ / thab khung gzhu yi dbyibs 'dra ba// khru gang pa 'am khru do pa// khru bzhi byas la de dbus su// chu skyes dmar po yang dag bri// de yi dbus su mdar bcas pa'i// gzhu nyid kyang ni
343a7(rgyud 'bum): bri bar bya/ / khor yug tu ni mngar ba yi// gzhu ni kha dog dmar po bri// sngags 'dzin pa yis rtag par yang // phyi rol de yi lha yi bya// sems can de ni dran byas la// na bza' dmar pos brgyan pa
343b1(rgyud 'bum): yi/ me tog dmar zhing pad+ma yang // 'bras bu dmar dang khams bcas pa// mar dang gur kum bsres pa dang // tsan dan dmar po'i phye ma dang // sbyin sreg byas nas lha la sogs// thams cad de yi dbang
343b2(rgyud 'bum): du 'gyur/ / de yi gdon rnams rnam gzhom phyir// mngon spyod yang dag brtsam par bya// khru do phyed bcas khru gsum mam// de bzhin mchog ni khru dgu pa// zur gsum dang ni ldan par bya// dbus su
343b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rtse dgu pa/ / rtse gsum pa yi mu ran bya// sna tshogs rdo rje yang byas la// dbyug pa mgo dang rtse gsum rnams// rdo rje dgra sta rtse gcig gis// phyi rol du yang mtshan par bya// rig pa gsum pa sngar
343b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin brgyan/ / bum pa gtor ma bum pa yang // zhal zas mang po gzhag par bya// sha dang khrag gis bkang ba yi// thod pa rnams kyang kun tu yang // de nas gos nag bgos shing khros// rang nyid
343b5(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gsum rnam rgyal/ / lus can de yi sdig la sogs// de nas de yi sdig bcom zhing // bgegs dang bral te ci bde bar// mtho ris 'jig rten mi rnams nyid// ji snyed khams gsum 'jig
343b6(rgyud 'bum): rten spyod/ / myur du go rims 'di nyid kyis// tshe 'dir gnas pa rnams la bya// de nas gang gi phyir byas pa// de yi phyir ni de bzhin 'gyur// gzhan dag kyang ni las rnams kyang // snga ma ji bzhin de bzhin
343b7(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / de ni sems can rnams la yang // myur du bde ba sgyid 'grub par 'gyur/ de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams yang dag par dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la bya
344a1(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das gang ngan song du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi don dang / phan yon dang / bde ba'i slad du brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di 'dri
344a2(rgyud 'bum): ba dang 'drir 'jug pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bdag cag tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis bu bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ste/ yang ji ltar bshad pa ma tshang ba med par bgyid pa lta
344a3(rgyud 'bum): ci smos/ gang yang rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal po'i blon po ji ltar gsungs pa'i sngags rjes su slob pa de'i rgyal srid 'phel bar bgyi'o// yul dang / phyogs dang / skye bo'i gnas dang /
344a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi skye bo'i lo tog la sogs pa'ang bsrung bar bgyi'o// nor dang 'bru rnams mang du 'byor par bgyi'o// bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams phun sum tshogs par yang bgyi'o//
344a5(rgyud 'bum): 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / lo legs pa dang / bde bar bgyi'o// gang zhig brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di la dad pas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te grong dang grong khyer la sogs par 'jug pa bdag nyid
344a6(rgyud 'bum): kyis bsdu bar yang bgyi'o/ / glang po che'i steng du bzhag la grong dang grong khyer la sogs pa thams cad du bskor bar bya ste/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// sems
344a7(rgyud 'bum): can chen po de'i drung na bdag cag bran gyi tshul lam bu'i tshul du gnas pa shes par bgyi'o/ / gang na 'di rab tu spyod pa de na bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rang nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus rdo rje sems dpa'i
344b1(rgyud 'bum): skur bzhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ / bcom 'das rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu bzang po re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba de nyid brtag pa'i rgyal po'i gzugs su bzhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o//
344b2(rgyud 'bum): sa phyogs de rang mchod rten du gyur par 'tshal bar bgyi ste/ mchod par bgyi/ phyag 'tshal bar bgyi'o// kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// gang yang brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di rab tu spyod pa'i rdo rje slob
344b3(rgyud 'bum): dpon dka' thub chen po la bdag cag tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyis g.yog bgyi'o/ / bran gyi tshul du gnas par bgyi'o// mngag gzhug pa nyid du gnas par bgyi'o// bsgo ba thams
344b4(rgyud 'bum): cad mnyan par bgyi'o/ / phan pa dang bde ba thams cad bgyi'o// dngos grub thams cad stsal bar bgyi sde/ bcom ldan 'das mdor na de'i rkang pa'i rdul mgo bos gzung bar bgyi'o// bcom
344b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ / de'i phyi bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang dkyil 'khor du ruk+sha te dbang bskur ba de kho bo cag gi mnga' ba dag tu 'tshal bar 'gyi'o//
344b6(rgyud 'bum): phyag na rdo rje lags par 'tshal bar gyi'o// rdo rje sems dpa' lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bde ba chen po kun tu bzang po lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa lags par 'tshal
344b7(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyi'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes/ tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams gang chos la rim gro gcig gnyis byas pas de
345a1(rgyud 'bum): ltar yang dag pa'i dam bca' ni legs so legs par sgrubs shig/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje sngags dang / rig pa dang / sring po thams cad
345a2(rgyud 'bum): brtan par bya ba'i phyir rang gi snying po 'di bshad do/ / oM b+h+rUM druM badz+ra pA Ni dr-i D+ha tiSh+Thats+tsha/ oM hU~M AH/ oM badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM dri D+ha badz+redz+dza/ oM badz+ra hUM sa/ oM badz+ra hUM aH
345a3(rgyud 'bum): de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ dkyil 'khor snga ma be zhen bris// dbus su rdo rje bri bar bya// yang na rdo rje sems dpa' 'am// kun tu bzang po bde ba che// spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje nyid// g.yas su phyag na rin chen
345a4(rgyud 'bum): spyan/ / phyag na pad+ma nub phyogs bri// byang du phyag na sna tshogs bri// phyi rol du ni zlum por bskor// sangs rgyas thams cad dgod par bya// de yi phyi rol sems dpa' rnams// go rims bzhin du bri bar bya// de yi phyi
345a5(rgyud 'bum): rol sems dpa' yang / / byams pa la sogs mchog chen bri// de phyir de bzhin dge slong ni// kun dga' bo sogs thub pa bri// rang gi chung ma bus bskor ba'i// tshangs pa la sogs phyi rol bri// gza' dang
345a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyu skar nyi ma dang / rgyal po bzhi po rnams dang ni// phyogs skyong 'jig rten skyong ba rnams// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni yang dag bri// phyi rol du ni dmyal ba sogs// klu la sogs pa dud 'gro'i dpe// sgo dang
345a7(rgyud 'bum): sgor ni de bzhin du/ / sgo skyongs stobs kyi dam pa rnams// dkar po 'dod pa'i nyi ma la// rab tu 'bad pas dkyil 'khor bri// gang bsngags nag po'i phyogs la yang // dkyil 'khor 'gal ba ma yin no// lnga pa
345b1(rgyud 'bum): de rjes bdun pa dang / / nya gang ba ni khyad par ni// bsngags te phyag na pad+ma yi// dkyil 'khor bya ba'i cho ga la'o// gang yang drag po'i las rnams la// de ni nag po la yang bri// khro bo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor
345b2(rgyud 'bum): yang / / zla ba nye ba khyad par du// rgyal ba rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bsngags// gzhan yang rang gis 'dus byas pa'i// dkyil 'khor la brtson gdab bya zhing // shar nas 'char ba'i dbang bya ste/
345b3(rgyud 'bum): phyogs kyi cha ni brtag par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor dgod pa ni// yid kyis yongs su brtag par bya// sngags dang rgyud ni dang por byas// 'jam zhing sngags gzugs dge zhing zhi// rjes mthun rang gi
345b4(rgyud 'bum): slob nyid kyi/ / slob ma lhan cig tsam gyis spyad// de nas nang par rab sngar langs// legs bkrus gos dkar 'chang zhing gtsang // blo ldan bla ma slob mar bcas// dkyil 'khor drung du kun nas 'gro//
345b5(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor phyogs nyid shin tu yang // nye bar byugs shing legs par mnyed// khro bo chen po bzlas pa yi// dri yi chu yis bsams pa yis// dbus su rigs rnams snying po yis// lhag par gnas
345b6(rgyud 'bum): par bya ba nyid/ / dkyil 'khor gyi ni gtso bo yi// sngags kyi las rnams thams cad bya// sa la sor ni bcu gnyis pa'i// dkyil 'khor dri yis byas nas su// dkyil 'khor rig pas las bdun du/
345b7(rgyud 'bum): lhag pa de nas bzlas par bya// de rjes lha rnams nyid kyi yang // byang chub chen po zhes bya ba'i// snying pos skal ba ji lta bar// dri dang me tog sogs mchod pa// byas ras gtor ma dbul bya zhing /
346a1(rgyud 'bum): mngon par bsngags pa'i spos kyang ngo // de nas tsan ngan la sogs pa// bsres pa'i chu la mngon par bsngags// de la dbul ba'i me tog dang // bdug pa la yang cho ga bzhin// so shing u
346a2(rgyud 'bum): dum ba ra dang / / a shwad tha sogs rma med cing // shin tu phra min sbom pa min// sor mo bcu gnyis tshad tsam ni// dri yi chu yis rab bskus shing // me tog 'phreng ba yis kyang bcings// dri bzang la sogs byugs
346a3(rgyud 'bum): shing bdug/ lag pas reg na snying po ni// mang po yang ni bzlas bya zhing // rigs nyid kyis ni lan bdun nam// slob ma rnams kyis tshad gzhal bar// so shing la sogs yang dag gzung // gcig la sogs pas
346a4(rgyud 'bum): go rims bzhin/ / rtse mo nyid nas bca' bar bya// de nas mkhas pas bdag nyid kyis// slob ma srung ba brtan byas nas// sbyin sreg las ni mar byugs pa'i// yam shing rnam ni mar dang bcas// sbrang rtsi mar
346a5(rgyud 'bum): dang bsres pa dang / / mar gyi sreg blugs bsreg bya zhing // zho zan gyi yang sbyin sreg bya// dang por bgegs ni zhi bya'i phyir// de nas thugs kyis rjes 'dzin phyir// de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg cing // sdig pa zhi bar
346a6(rgyud 'bum): bya phyir ram/ / de nas slob ma rnams brtags nas// cho ga yi ni lhag gnas bya// de yis ji ltar nus pa yis// de bzhin sdom pa gzung bar bya// de rnams cho ga 'di yin te// gtsang zhing dkar ba'i gos
346a7(rgyud 'bum): can ni/ / mdun du bltas te 'dug pa la// lhag par gnas pa brtsam par bya// bla mas dang por skyabs gsum sbyin// de yi rjes la byang chub sems// ma bskyed pa ni bskyed bya zhing // bskyed pa slar
346b1(rgyud 'bum): yang rjes dran bya/ / de nas khro bo mngon bzlas pa'i// chu yis spyi bor bsang gtor bya// mgo bor kun tu reg nas ni// mnyam par bzhag par lan bdun bzlas// rig pa'i rgyal po snying po ni/
346b2(rgyud 'bum): lag pas dri bzang sbags pa las// 'jigs pa bzlog la mkhas pa yis// lan bdun rtag tu bzlas par bya// 'khor los sgyur ba rgyal po yis// rig pa'i rgyal po yi ge gcig/ rta mgrin nu
346b3(rgyud 'bum): skyes rigs la ni/ / rig pa'i rgyal po yi ge bcu// sum b+ha zhes bya rdo rje'i rigs// rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che// yi ge hUM bzhi rnams dang ldan// las kun rab tu spros pa la'o// rigs gsum
346b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams la thun mong ba/ / khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba nyid// bgegs kun rnam par gzhom pa'i phyir// gsang ba pa yi bdag po gsungs// las ni thams cad pa yi sngags// spyi bor reg cing bzlas de nas//

346b6(rgyud 'bum): mngon par bsngags/ / cho ga bzhin du lhag gnas bya// dri yi chu yis mchod yon sbyin// me tog kyang ni gzhug par bya// bdug pa yis kyang bdug par bya// dbang bskur ba ni bum pa bcas// mkhas

347a1(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / slob ma rnams ni go rims bzhin// bzung zhing shar du kha bltas te// phyi rol nyid du so shing bca'// ma gas par ni 'chos nas su// logs ma yin par dor bya
347a2(rgyud 'bum): ste/ / so shing mdun du dor byas pa// gang tshe mdun du rtse mo lhung // de tshe dngos grub mchog shes bya// gang zhig steng du bltas pa yang // de bzhin shar du rtse mo bstan// dngos grub 'bring du yongs su grags//
347a3(rgyud 'bum): byang du bltas na thad ka nyid// rig pa'i dngos grub 'jig rten pa// so shing dor ba brgya lam du// gang tshe 'on du kha bltas pa// de tshe sa 'og dngos grub ni// 'byung ba 'di la the tshom med// slob ma
347a4(rgyud 'bum): nye bar reg pa ni/ / snga ma bzhin du bzung byas la// thams cad las byed sngags kyis ni// bla mas dri bzang chu sbyin no// re re la yang btung ba'i phyir// khyor ba gsum ni sbyin par bya// de nas blo ldan
347a5(rgyud 'bum): langs nas su/ / 'di dag kun tu sprad par bya// de nas mchod pa yang byas nas// lag pas spos ni bteg nas su// blo ldan gus pas lha rnams la// gsol ba gdab cing gus gnas bya// dang por
347a6(rgyud 'bum): sngags ni snyan gsan dbab/ / de yi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa// de yi rim pa'i sbyin pa yis// lha rnams spyan 'dren pa yin no// bcom ldan che ge mo zhes bya// rig pa'i rgyal po khyod la 'dud//
347a7(rgyud 'bum): slob ma rnams la brtse phyir dang // khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir// nyid kyi dkyil 'khor thugs rje yi// bdag nyid kyang ni bri bar 'tshal// bcom ldan de ni bdag gus la// bka' drin mdzad
347b1(rgyud 'bum): pa rigs lags so/ / 'jig rten mgon po brtse ba can// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // dgra bcom gang gzhan sngags kyi lha// lha dang 'jig rten skyong rnams dang // 'byung po

347b5(rgyud 'bum): / tholdan shar du mgo bstan te// dge ba'i gnyid kyis nyal du gzhug/ de nas sngo dro nyid du ni// mtshan mo'i rmi lam mthong ba bri// gang tshe dge ba'am mi dge ba// ngogs med nyin par thos nas su/
347b6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pas ni// rigs bdun rnams kyi dam tshig kyang // de nas bu khyod dam tshig dang // sdom pa rgyal ba yis gsungs pa// dad pas bla ma'i bka' yang bskyang // khyod kyis srog chags gsang
347b7(rgyud 'bum): mi bya/ / ma byin mi blang 'dod log dang // dngos grub 'dod pas mi bya'o// chang mi btung zhing sha la sogs// bza' ba nam yang ma yin nyid// sems can kun la gnod mi bya// dkon mchog gsum yang

348b2(rgyud 'bum): slob dpon smad mi bya/ / rdo rje spun dang sring mo dang // gang yang smad par mi bya zhing // khon par yang ni mi bya'o// dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang // bla ma smod byed ma rungs rnams// dam tshig

349a1(rgyud 'bum): gi dbus su lo tsan+da dang / mA ma kI dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma dag phyag na rang gi mtshan ma can bri'o// de rnams kyi 'og tu rdzing bu chu srin dang / nya dang / rus sbal dang

349a4(rgyud 'bum): pas mchod par bya'o/ / de nas gal te mtshan ma mthong na myur du 'grub bo// gal te ma mthong na ring mo zhig na 'grub pa'o// bzhad pa dang ni rnga sgra dang // dril bu'i sgra dang 'brug sgra nyid
349a5(rgyud 'bum): srong bram ze bu mo dang / / 'bras bu mthong na dngos grub ni// mchog 'bring tha ma myur du 'grub// de nas sku gzugs phyag rgya dang // sngags rnams kyis ni byin gyis brlabs// ji ltar bskyed pas thob
349a6(rgyud 'bum): bya zhing / / 'jig rten gsum ni rnam rgyal gyis// bdag srung la sogs byas nas su// bdag gi de nyid kyang bsgoms nas// ji srid dngos grub rtags 'byung ba// 'bum phrag gsum mam drug 'bum
349a7(rgyud 'bum): bzlas/ / de nas dben pa'i gnas su ni// sngags kyang chang lhag bkang bya ste// brgya phrag brgyad rnams bzlas par bya// de nas bzlas pa de yi mthar// dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bsams la/
349b1(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa rgya chen yang byas nas// mtshan mo gcig ni bzlas par bya// de nas gal te gtso bo 'am// sras sam lha rnams mthong gyur na// de tshe snod 'dod ji lta bar// dngos grub mchog ni gsol ba gdab// lha rnam
349b2(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu dgyes pa yis/ / dngos grub 'bras bu de la stsol// phyag byas kyang ni dngos grub ni// mchog la sogs pa blang bar bya// bla ma dkon mchog gsum po la// rang rang skal ba phul nas ni// de nas rtag tu bdag nyid
349b3(rgyud 'bum): spyad/ de rnams med na shes rab can// blangs nas rang nyid spyad par bya// sems can kun la phan brtson zhing // bskal pa du mar gnas par 'gyur// legs par bsgrub na thams cad byed// gnod sbyin rgyu skar

349b5(rgyud 'bum): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das sems can sdig pa bgyis pa dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa rnams kyis dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rab tu spang ba'i phyir ji ltar rab tu bsgrub par bgyi//
349b6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems can sdig pa chen po byed pa de rnams dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams las tshegs med
349b7(rgyud 'bum): par grol bar 'gyur ba nyid de bzhin du nyon cig/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// brgya rtsa brgyad ni bzlas pa yi// bum pa rnams ni snga ma bzhin// dbang bskur ba ni brtag par bya// de nas sngon
350a1(rgyud 'bum): gyi sdig byang zhing / / dmyal ba la sogs sdug bsngal ni// kun las myur du rnam grol 'gyur// sdig las rnam grol bdag nyid che// de yang gnas gtsang lhar skyes nas// rtag tu sangs
350a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas chos bgro thos/ / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas// rim gyis byang chub mngon sum byed// de yi gzugs brnyan dang ni ming // bur kum gyis ni bris nas su// ngan song gsum gyi 'jigs chen las//
350a3(rgyud 'bum): sems can rnams ni thar pa'i phyir// sngags pa gzhan la phan brtson zhing // brtse bas mngon par dbang bskur ro// de nas rnal 'byor can gyis ni// sngags dang phyag rgyas dbang bskur te// lha yi
350a4(rgyud 'bum): gzugs su brtags nas su/ / mchod rten dbus su gzhag par bya// rang gzhan lha yi snying po ni// snying kha de yi phyogs bris nas// lha mnyam par ni sems bskyed de// khyim du yang ni gzhag par
350a5(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / de yi ming dang spel ba'i sngags// gur kum bzang pos bris nas ni// 'bum ni yongs su rdzogs bar du// mchod rten las ni rab tu bya// sdig chen sdig ni zad bya'i phyir// bye ba yang ni rdzogs
350a6(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / de ltar byas na de nges par// dmyal ba las ni grol bar 'gyur// de bzhin yi dgas byol song las// grol te lha rigs rnams su skyes// de yi ming nas spel nas ni// ji ltar gsung/
350a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sngags stong bzlas// gal te brgya phrag stong yang tshang // bye ba'i bar du rdzogs par bya// lha rigs rnams su skye bar 'gyur// de yi ming nas spel ba yi// mkhas pas 'bum phrag brgya 'am/
350b1(rgyud 'bum): ni// yang na brgya phrag stong snyed du// sbyin sreg byas na dmyal ba ni// chen po'i sdig pa las grol 'gyur// ji srid mtshan ma 'bar ba yi// gnas su yang dag skye bar 'gyur// nyungs kar dkar po
350b2(rgyud 'bum): til dang 'bras/ / ra yi 'o ma yang dag ldan// de bskus yam shing de srid du// cho ga ji bzhin sbyin sreg bya// de nas de ni nges par yang // lnga rigs rnams su skyes pa yi// mtshan ma nye bar mthong
350b3(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / gal te lha yi mchog skyes dang // yang na thab khung nang du ni// dkar po g.yas bskor 'bar ba dang // gyen du 'greng zhing dri ma med// 'phro ba sdoms bzhin 'bar ba dang // glog bzhin
350b4(rgyud 'bum): dri ma med 'od brtan/ / me rtags 'di rnams mthong bar 'gyur// yang na me lha bdag nyid ni// de bzhin kho nar ston 'gyur te// zla ba bzhin du dri ma med// dkar po bzhin mdog 'bar ba'o// mtshan/
350b5(rgyud 'bum): ma 'di dag mthong ba la// de nas dmyal sogs rnam grol zhing // sdig pa bcom nas bde 'gror ni// skyes pa yin par shes par bya// khru bzhi pa yi tshad du ni// cho ga ji bzhin thab khung brko//
350b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rjes mtha' ma bskor ba yi// 'khor lo dbus su bri bar bya// rigs lnga yi ni phyag rgya rnams// ji bzhin rang gi phyogs su bri// ji bzhin sems dpa' rnams dang ni// 'jig rten la sogs
350b7(rgyud 'bum): phyi nas bri/ / de nas bum pa gang ba dang // gtor mas sdod rnams bkang ba ni// brgyad dam bcu drug dag tu gzhag/ bza' dang bca' ba zhal bas dang // me tog 'phreng sogs de bzhin te/
351a1(rgyud 'bum): sngar rgyal mtshan dar la sogs// gdug sogs rnams kyis legs par brgyan// de ltar sbyin sreg thab khung ni// mchog tu yang dag sbyin sreg bya// cho ga shes pas de bris napa/
351a2(rgyud 'bum): lha yi tshogs ni spyan drangs te// sngags shes pas sngags phyag rgya yis// arka la sogs phul nas ni// mdor bsdus mchod par byas nas su// lha yi sbyor bas rab gnas la// ga pur gur kum la sog
351a3(rgyud 'bum): bas/ mar dang 'o ma til bsgos la// til dang nyungs kar 'bras rnams dang // dri yi chus ni legs bkang ste// 'bras chan spos dang la dug/ sbrang rtsi sha ka rar ldan la// brgya phrag du mar yongs
351a4(rgyud 'bum): su bzlas/ / yam shing la yang de bzhin te// rang gi sngags kyis btab pa'i shing // khung bu'i nang du gzhag par bya// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za sogs su gnas pa yi// ro la sngags
351a5(rgyud 'bum): kyis btab nas su/ / mu mchog gis ni bkrus nas ni// sngags bzlas dri yis byugs par bya// gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan bya zhing // sngags kyis btab pa'i bdug pas bdug/ me tog 'phreng ba
351a6(rgyud 'bum): la sogs mchog/ gtsug pud dpung par de bzhin du// sngags bris nas ni gdags par bya// snying kha mgrin pa kha phyogs su// sarba bid+yas byin gyis brlabs// dpral ba mdzod spu rna ba gnyis//
351a7(rgyud 'bum): mgo bo spyi gtsug dpung pa gnyis// rna ba dgu dang pus mo bol// sna yi rtse mo long bu dang // mig gnyis dang ni gsang ba yau// dbang po rnams kyi gnas dang ni// de ltar gzhan du'ang gnas yi ge/ mchog tu dge
351b1(rgyud 'bum): ba de dag bzhag/ de dag ngan song yongs sbyang phyir// stan dang bcas te thab dbus gzhag/ de nas sngags pas sngags kyis ni// mngon par bsngags pa'i gos kyis g.yogs// de nas byin za yang dag rab spar
351b2(rgyud 'bum): la/ / me lce stong gis dkrigs shing 'bar ba'i lus// zla ba kun nga bzhin du zhi ba'i yid// dpag med kun la mchod yon yongs su brtag/ de bzhin ji ltar gsungs pa'i mchod pa bya// de nas dang po de yi sbyin
351b3(rgyud 'bum): sreg ni/ / rdzogs par byas shing 'bar ba nyid la ni// yongs brtags nas ni rgyal ba las// sogs pa rnams kyi brgyad ni lhag pa dang // bcas pa'i brgya ni yongs su brtag par bya// de nas sbyong ba'i
351b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi rgyal po yang / / bsreg bya nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su brtag/ de nas zhal ras dkar po spyan drangs la// yo byad rnams sam mchod yon sogs gsum mchod// phyag na rdo rje pad+ma zhags pa
351b5(rgyud 'bum): bsnams/ / rgyan rnams thams cad kyis ni rab brgyan cing // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbu rgyan can// bsam par bya zhing yang ni bri bar bya// de yi snying po brgya phrag stong dam ni// ji srid bya ba'i bar du/
351b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg bya// yang na mtshan ma yang dag byung na ni// de bzhin sdig rgyun spangs par shes par bya// de nas thal bar 'gyur ba cho ga bzhin// rdo rje bsdu bas thal ba rus pa bsdu// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i
351b7(rgyud 'bum): dr-i chu dang / / ba yi rnam lnga dang bcas la// sbyong ba'i sngags ni 'bum bzlas te// gong bu byas nas ga pur drir// sa dang legs par bsres byas la// sku gzugs mchod rten lhar bsam zhing //
352a1(rgyud 'bum): lan cig gnyis gsum bzhi lnga 'am// yang na lan grang brgya rtsa brgyad// sngags dang phyag rgyas byin brlabs la// 'bum phrag gnyis ni bzlas par bya// de nas mchod
352a2(rgyud 'bum): rten 'bar gyur tam/ / yang na sku gzugs zhal 'dzum mam// dri spos ngang ldang 'od snang ngam// lha la sogs pa sna tshogs pa// rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dang // me tog la sogs 'dor ba
352a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / dung dang rnga dang gling bu dang // pi wang la sogs sgra thos 'gyur// gal te lha yi mtshan ma de// sdig mang nyid kyis ma mthong ba// de tshe 'bum phrag brgya stong bzlas// ji srid mtshan ma
352a4(rgyud 'bum): byung bar du/ / de bzhin gshegs pa mchod nas ni// mnyam par bzhag pas bzlas par bya// de mthar cho ga shes pa yis// mtshan gcig thog thag mi nyal bzlas// de nas de yi sdig pa ni//
352a5(rgyud 'bum): rnam dag bdag nyid nges par mthong // lha yi lus kyi gzugs dang ni// de yi rgyud du ngo shes 'gyur// mtshan ma 'di dag shes nas su// rnam par mi rtog sems kyis ni// byams dang snying rje ldan
352a6(rgyud 'bum): pa yis/ / las rnams thams cad rab tu bya// gal te de yang med gyur na// de tshe bzlas bsgom tshul gyi bya// de yi ming tsam bris nas su// mchod rten 'phreng ba bya ba dang // sku gzugs kyang ni byas nas
352a7(rgyud 'bum): su/ / sbyin sreg dbang bskur byas gyur na// gdon mi za bar de 'gror skye// thal ba nyung kar bye ma sogs// ming spel sngags ni mngon btang nas// rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung dor// de ltar byas na sdig pa
352b1(rgyud 'bum): can/ / yin yang ngan song rnams las ni// rnam par thar par gyur nas kyang // dge ba mchog gi sa bon ni// bskyed dang ldan pas sangs rgyas nyid// 'bras bur yang dag ldan pa yi// sbyin pa tshul khrims
352b2(rgyud 'bum): bzod pa dang / / brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab rgyu// rab tu bsgoms pa'i bsod nams ldan// 'jig rten ngan song bcom pa ni// 'di ltar lha yang ci zhig smos// 'di la the tshom med pa yin//
352b3(rgyud 'bum): gang yang dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang / gang yang med pa'i lta ba can dang / gang byang chub kyi lam las rnam par 'das pas bstan pa la zhe sdang gis gnod pa byed pa dang / sdig pa'i rang bzhin mi shes
352b4(rgyud 'bum): pa pha dang ma la sems mi brtse ba dang / byang chub kyi sems la mi brten pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba bsad pa dang / lha dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / sngags
352b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / phyag rgya'i tshogs la sogs pa rnams la med pa nyid du lta ba la sogs pa'i sdig pa can rnams la de lta bu'i shes rab can dang thabs med na grol ba med do zhes pa/ bde bar gshegs pa rgyal ba
352b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis gsungs so/ / de nas brgya byin la sogs pa spyan pad+ma rgyas pa rnams legs so zhes bya bas mnyes par mdzad do// mnyes par mdzad nas mchod pa mdzad do// brgya byin gzhan la
352b7(rgyud 'bum): phan par brtson pas kyang ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin du byos so/ / 'bras bu de bzhin du thob par gyur to// dbang ldan du mgrin pa sngon po glang khyu mchog la zhon pa/ sku mdog dkar po phyag bzhi
353a1(rgyud 'bum): ba/ / g.yas pa'i dang po gnyis pa rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang mchog sbyin du bcas pa/ g.yon pa'i gcig gis rtse gsum pa 'dzin cing gnyis pas ral gri 'dzin pa/ sbrul gyi
353a2(rgyud 'bum): mchod phyir thogs pa can bris te/ oM pa shu pa ti nI la kar+N+Na u ma pri ya swAhA/ zhes pa 'dis so// de nas phyag rgya 'di yin te/ lag pa rdo rje khu tshur byas la mthe'u chung mthe bong gis mnan
353a3(rgyud 'bum): te sor mo lhag ma rnams rdo rje'i mtshan nyid du byas shing ming med dang mdzub mo'ang rdo rje'i rnam par cung zad mdud par bya'o/ / 'di ni phyugs bdag gi phyag rgya'o// khyab 'jug lhung la zhon pa
353a4(rgyud 'bum): mdog nag po phyag bzhi pa/ phyag g.yas pa dag na dbyug to dang rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pa dag na dung dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o// gser gyi rdo rje ma khyab 'jug lta bu gser gyi mdog can du
353a5(rgyud 'bum): shes par bya'o/ / rdo rje dril bu rma bya la zhon pa zhal drug pa dmar po g.yas pa dag na shag ti dang rdo rje/ g.yon pa dag na khyim bya dang dril bu 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje gzhon nu ma rdo rje dril bu lta bur
353a6(rgyud 'bum): shes par bya'o/ / mi smra ba rdo rje ngang pa la zhon pa/ gser mdog can zhal bzhi pa phyag bzhi pa/ phyag g.yas pa dag na rdo rje dang bgrang 'phreng 'dzin cing / g.yon pa dag na dbyug to dang
353a7(rgyud 'bum): bluthugs 'dzin pa'o/ / rdo rje'i ba ma tshangs pa lta bur shes par bya'o// rdo rje mtshor cha glang po che dkar po la zhon pa/ phyag g.yon pas rang gi rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yas pas 'jig rten las
353b1(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ / rdo rje khu tshur ma rdo rje mtshon cha ltar shes par bya'o// rdo rje 'khyil pa khro bo'ang shing rta la zhon pa/ mdog dmar po/ g.yas pa dang g.yon pa na pad+ma dang
353b2(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o/ / rdo rje bdud rtsi ma ni rdo rje 'khyil pa khro bo lta bu nyid do// rdo rje 'od zer khro bo dkar po ngang pa la zhon pa/ g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas pad+ma dang
353b3(rgyud 'bum): zla ba 'dzin pa'o/ / rdo rje 'od zer ma rdo rje khro bo lta bu'o// rdo rje dbyug pa khro bo rus sbal la zhon pa/ mdog sngon po/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas dbyug pa 'dzin pa'o//
353b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje mchog ma rdo rje dbyug pa khro bo lta bu'o// rdo rje dmar ser khro bo glang po che la zhon pa/ mdog dmar po/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas mi bzung nas za zhing gnas pa'o// rdo rje sku
353b5(rgyud 'bum): rags ma rdo rje dmar ser khro bo lta bu'o/ / rdo rje tshogs bdag glang sna glang po che zhon pa can/ phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas gshol 'dzin cing gnas pa/ mdog dkar po'o//
353b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'dul ba ma rdo rje glang sna lta bu'o// 'di ni khyad par te/ gang zhe na/ phyag g.yon gyis kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje 'phreng ba tshogs kyi bdag po mdog ljang khu/ bya ku li ka'i shing rta zhon pa
353b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag g.yas kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas me tog gi 'phreng ba 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje gdan ma rdo rje 'phreng ba lta bu'o// 'di ni khyad par te/ gang zhe na/ phyag g.yon gyis shag ti 'dzin pa'o//
354a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang can na tso'i shing rta lon pa/ mdog dkar ser/ phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan bsdams pa'o// rdo rje dbang can ma rdo rje dbabacan
354a2(rgyud 'bum): ste/ 'di ni khyad par ro// gang zhe na/ mdog dmar po'o// rnam rgyal rdo rje tshogs kyi bdag po sbal bzhon pa/ mdog dkar po'o// phyag g.yas na rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas ral gri 'dzin pa'o/
354a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje gdengs pa ma rnam rgyal rdo rje lha dra'o// rdo rje gtun shing pho nya mo me tog gi shing rta'i khang bu zhon pa/ mdog dkar ser/ phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas gtun shing 'dzin pa'o//
354a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje gtun shing pho nya mo rdo rje gtun shing lta bu ste/ 'di ni khyad par ro// gang zhe na/ g.yon gyis kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje rlung gi po nya mdog sngon po ri dgas non pa/ phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin
354a5(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / g.yon pas ngar 'dzin pa'o// mgyogs pa'i rdo rjes rdo rje rlung gi pho nya lta bu'o// rdo rje me'i pho nya mo ra skyes zhon pa/ mdog dmar po gyen du 'bar ba'i 'od rtse gsum pa 'bar ba'i phyag g.yas
354a6(rgyud 'bum): pa dag na rdo rje dang go cha 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa dag na dbyug pa dang spyi thugs 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje 'bar ba ma rdo rje me lta bu'o// rdo rje 'jigs byed po nya sngon po ro langs zhon pa/ phyag g.yas
354a7(rgyud 'bum): pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas rtse gsum 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje gtsigs pa pho nya mo rdo rje 'jigs byed lta bu ste/ 'di ni khyad par ro// gang zhe na/ g.yon pas 'gas pa 'dzin pa'o// rdorje
354b1(rgyud 'bum): lcags kyu bran klu lhag pa la zhon pa/ sngon po phag gi gdong pa can/ g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje nag po bran mo ro langs kyi zhon pa can phyag g.yon//
354b2(rgyud 'bum): gyis kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa/ phyag g.yas kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa mdog nag mo/ rdo rje log 'dren phran dra ba byi bzhon pa/ mdog dkar po glang po che'i gdong pa can/ phyag g.yas dag na rdo rje dang dgra
354b3(rgyud 'bum): sta 'dzin pa/ g.yon dag na rtse gsum dang dbyug pa 'dzin pa/ sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa'o// rdo rje srul mo bran mo mdog sngon mo/ g.yas na rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa phyags ma
354b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa/ bra ba byi bzhon pa'o// klu rdo rje'i chu srin la zhon pa/ gdengs ka brgyad pa mdog dkar po/ g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas klu'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje
354b5(rgyud 'bum): chu srin ma bran mo chu srin la zhon pa/ mdog dkar mo/ gdengs ka brgyad ma/ g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas rdo rjes mtshan pa'i chu srin 'dzin pa'o// 'jigs mdog ma ldang
354b6(rgyud 'bum): khu g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas ral gri phe Ta ka 'dzin pa'o// dpal mo mdog dkar ser/ g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// dbyangs can
354b7(rgyud 'bum): ma mdog dkar mo/ phyag g.yon pas rba dang / g.yas pas rdo rje ma'o// bgrod dka' mdog ljang khu seng+ge la zhon pa/ phyag g.yas pa dag na rdo rje dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa dag
355a1(rgyud 'bum): na lde men dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ / ma mo thams cad dang / drag po la sogs pa dang / chu bdag gi mthar thug pa rnams kyi dang / gang phyag g.yas su rdo rje gsungs pa de ni rdo rje
355a2(rgyud 'bum): rtse gsum par shes par bya'o/ / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha thams cad rnam par snang mdzad la mngon du bltas pa'o// de nas mthun mtshams kyi dus su rdo rje ti rin ti ris
355a3(rgyud 'bum): dag par bcings te/ me tog sngon po'i 'phreng ba bzung la dkyil 'khor du 'jug go// yi ge hUM bzhi pa brjod cing rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad la bskor ba bdun dang / dung dang dril bu'i sgra bsgrag par bya'o//
355a4(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi yang lhag pa dang chad pa'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i nges par bltas te 'phreng ba bcom ldan 'das la phul nas/ rdo rje'i gar byas la blangs te yi ge hUM bzhi pa nyid kyis rang gi
355a5(rgyud 'bum): mgo bor bcing ngo / / ji ltar cho ga bzhin du yang // gang zhig chad pa yongs su bskang // mkhas pas lhag pa rnams spang phyir// rdo rje dril bu kun rtog bya// 'grub 'gyur nyes pa spang mi bya// zhes
355a6(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so/ / de nas 'dug par gyur pa yaM// rdo rje slob dpon mnyam gzhag pas/ rdo rje sgo ni bzhi po rnams// yid kyis dbye bar bya ba nyid// oM badz+ra ut+pa g+hA Ta ya sa ma ya pra be shaD+D+h+ya/
355a7(rgyud 'bum): bya'o// phyag rgya'ang 'di yin te// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis gshibs te// mdzub mo gan rgyal yang dag bzung // legs par drag tu rnam par dbye/ sgo dbye ba yi cho ga yin// zhes pa'o//
355b1(rgyud 'bum): de nas lcags kyu la sogs pas las rnams byas la// rin po che bdun las byas pa'am// sa las byas pa'i bum pa nag po la sogs pa med pa/ mgrin pa ring ba/ mchu 'phyang ba/
355b2(rgyud 'bum): lto ba che ba/ lha rdzas kyi dri'i chu dang / rin po che dang / sman thams cad dang / 'bru thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs pa/ yal 'dab dang bcas pa/ mgrin pa la gos dam pas legs par
355b3(rgyud 'bum): bcings la bsrung ba byas pa/ phyi rol kun tu lha rdzas kyi dri rjes su byugs pa/ me tog gi 'phreng ba btags pa'i rdo rjes steng du mtshan pa/ rdo rje chen pos byin gyis brlabs pa/ khro bo ti rin ti ris
355b4(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bzung ba'i rdo rje dang me tog gi yal 'dab kyis/ oM badz+ra u da ka hUM/ zhes bya ba 'di stong rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa'i yi ge hUM bzhi pa brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas la/
355b5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi spyan sngar legs par gzhag go/ 'jug pa'i sgo la mngon par phyogs pa'i phyi rol du bum pa gnyis pa la yi ge hUM bzhi pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa gzhag go// de'i
355b6(rgyud 'bum): chus bdag nyid dang slob ma dbang bskur ba bya ste/ gzhug pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas sam bcings pa'ang ngo // byu ru de bzhin sa le sbra ma// dung dang de bzhin nor bu ni// rin chen kun te sing ha
355b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / / bya g+h+ri gi re be be re// sman kun til dang sran ma sha/ 'bras dang gro ni lnga pa ste// sman lnga 'bru kun sgras mtshon pa'o// de'i rjes la phyag bzhi la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i sdom pa
356a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin du bcug nas/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gos sngon po la'ang yongs su bzlas te/ sems dpa'i gtsug tor gyis sgo skyong gi gdong bcings pa dang / rdo rje go chas stong
356a2(rgyud 'bum): g.yogs dang / gtsug tor la sogs pa can gyi slob dpon gyis khro bo ti rin ti ris me tog sngon po'i 'phreng ba bzung nas/ oM badz+ra sa ma yaM pra be shA mi/ zhes brjod cing zhugs la/ de bzhin
356a3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gda' ste/ bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pas so// de nas rdo rje'i chu 'thungs nas bdag nyid 'jug par byas la/ 'phreng ba de dkyil 'khor chen
356a4(rgyud 'bum): por dor la rang rang gi mgo la bcings te gdong bcings pa bkrol la/ ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor la bltas te/ tin+t+ra badz+ra/ zhes pa la sogs pas gzhug pa'i phyag rgya dgrol ba'ang byas

361b7(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su bzhag ste g.yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus spyan drang ngo / / de'i mdzub mo lcags kyu dang bral ba ni brgya byin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// g.yon brkyang gi gom pas 'dug la spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las
362a1(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nas de'i sngags ni/ na mo badz+ra s+ya di shi di shi badz+ra pA Ni rak+Sha rak+Sha sAhA/ me'i phyogs su bltas te lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub ma
362a2(rgyud 'bum): zlum po'i rnam par bkug ste gung mo bsgreng ba'i tshigs gsum par btsugs la mthe bong lag mthil du bzhag pa ni me lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bong mdzub mo'i gzhogs
362a3(rgyud 'bum): la bstan pa ni me lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya de nyid lag pa'i dbus su mngon du phyogs te gcig tu sbyar ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// de'i sngags ni/ ag+na ye hi/ oM hi ka pI la dz+wa la
362a4(rgyud 'bum): dz+wa la ha ha shi khi ti la bi rU pak+Sha swA hA/ gshin rjer bltas te lag pa mdun du phyogs par byas la nang du rdo rje bsdams pa'i dbus su mthe bong gnyis dang phyi ru ming med gnyis sbyar zhing bsgreng ste slar nang du bzung ba
362a5(rgyud 'bum): nigashin rje spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / srin lag gnyis kyang phyi rol du gzhibs te bsgrengs pa snying khar bzung ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las srin lag sgyur ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// de'i
362a6(rgyud 'bum): sngags ni/ ya mA ya swAhA/ bden bral du bltas te mnyam pa'i gom pas 'dug la lag pa g.yas pa'i khur tshur bcangs pa mdzub mo dang gung mo bkug ste bzung zhing gri'i rnam par bzhag la/ lag pa g.yon pa sta phur
362a7(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug nas bzhag pa ni bden bral spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya de nyid lag pa g.yon pa lta zur phyogs su gnas par ral gri'i phyag rgya ni bden bral gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o//
362b1(rgyud 'bum): spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// de'i sngags ni/ sarba b+hu ta b+ha yaM ka ra ku ru ku ru swA hA/ chu lha'i phyogs su mnyam pa'i gom pas bdug la lag pa g.yas pa'i
362b2(rgyud 'bum): khu tshur bcangs nas mthe bong dang mdzub mo gcig tu sbyar te g.yon pa'i khu tshur snying khar bzhag la g.yon pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus spyan drang ba ni chu bdag spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya de nyid g.yon pa'i
362b3(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo khu tshur la sbyar te bzung ba zhags pa'i phyag rgya chub dag gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ / spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// de'i sngags ni/ tri tri su Da tri tri
362b4(rgyud 'bum): shi khi to li bi rU pAk+Sha swA hA/ rlung lha'i phyogs su bltas te 'dug pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs te gung mo bsgreng ba'i tshigs gsum par mdzub mo bkug pa'i rtse mo btsugs la mngon du phyogs te brkyang ngo // lag
362b5(rgyud 'bum): pa g.yas pa'ang de bzhin du byas te sta zur logs su bzhag cing mthe bos bskul ba ni rlung lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid mthe bong snga ma bzhin du bzhag pa ni rlung lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i
362b6(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya las mthe bong brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / sngags ni/ oM swA sa khA kha khu kha swA hA/ ku be ra la mngon du bltas te 'dug nas lag pa gnyis kha sbyar la rdo rje bcing ba nang du byas la mthe'u
362b7(rgyud 'bum): chung gnyis gshibs te brkyang / de'i rgyab tu srin lag gnyis so sor bzhag nas gung mo dag bsgreng ba rdo rje'i mdud pa bya ba ni ku be ra spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyog rgya de nyid kyis gung mo gnyis nang du
363a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje gung mo bcing ba'i sbyor bas bzhag pa ni ku be ra'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ / spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las gung mo gnyis brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// de'i sngags ni
363a2(rgyud 'bum): oM ku be rA ya swA hA/ dbang ldan gyi phyogs su bltas te 'dug la lag pa dag gcig tu sbyar te thal mo sbyar ba bya ste/ srin lag dang mthe'u chung lag mthil du rdo rje bcing ba byas te mthe bong zung dag gzhan la
363a3(rgyud 'bum): brten cing nang du bkug sde bsnol la/ gung mo gshibs te bsgreng ba'i rgyab tu mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje'i rnam par bzhag la de nyid bkug ste seng du phan tshun sen mo sprad par bya ba ni dbang ldan spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o//
363a4(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyi mdzub mo sngar bzhin rdo rje'i rnam par bzung ba ni dbang ldan gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags ni/ dz+ra dz+ra shi ba
363a5(rgyud 'bum): swA hA/ g.yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas 'dug la lag pa thal mo khong stong du sbyar te bzhag la steng du bltas te mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyu ni tshangs pa la sogs pa spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid kyi mdzub mo
363a6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis snga ma ltar bzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ / spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// de rnams kyi sngags ni/ U ra d+haM brah+ma Ne swAhA/ sUr+ya gra ha a d+hi pa
363a7(rgyud 'bum): ta ye swAhA/ oM tsan+da nak+Sha tra a d+hi pa ta ye swAhA/ mnyam pa'i gom pa'i gnas pas 'dug la lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar ba te sor mo'i rtse mo rnams bar mtshams med par phan tshun sbyar te mthe bong zlum por byas
363b1(rgyud 'bum): la/ 'og tu bltas te sa'i lha mo la sogs pa mdzub mo lcags kyus spyan drang ba ni 'og gi lha spyan drung ba'i phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las sngar bzhin du mdzub mo dag bzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o//
363b2(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo dag brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags rnams ni/ a d+ho mr-i thi byai swAhA/ A su re d+hi swAH/ nA gi b+h+yaHswAhA/ de nas rang gi sngags kyis thams cad la 'thor 'thung phul la
363b3(rgyud 'bum): bdag dang slob ma'i tshogs su bcas pa la bgegs med par mdzod cig/ las kyi dngos grub kyang bdag la stsol cig ces brjod la thams cad gshegs su gsol lo// yang na dpung bzang
363b4(rgyud 'bum): gi ched du gsungs pa'i tshigs bcad rnams kyis gtor ma dbul te/ lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul// nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzang lus srul po// dri ma srin po gdon gyi tshogs rnams dang // gang du
363b5(rgyud 'bum): sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can/ / bu smad bcas shing g.yog 'khor bcas pa la// bdag gi pus mo sa stengs 'dir btsugs nas/ thal mo sbyar nas khyod la gsol 'debs kyis// gsan nas phan gdags
363b6(rgyud 'bum): slad du 'dir spyon cig/ 'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang // dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang // shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim gnas dang // ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang // chu bo kun
363b7(rgyud 'bum): dang chu bo'i mdo rnams dang / / rin chen gnas na lhag par gnas pa dang // mtsho dang rdzing bu lteng ga chu ngogs dang // g.ya chu sil ma can dang khron par gnas// grong dang phyugs lhas grong khyer stong pa dang // khang sdong
364a1(rgyud 'bum): dang ni lha yi khang par yang / / gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten gnas dag dang // dka' thub gnas dang grang chen bres dang ni// rgyal po'i dkor khang dag na gang gnas dang // lam srang
364a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhi mdo dag dang sum mdo dang / / gang dag lam po che dang shing gcig drung // dur khrod chen po nags tshal chen po dang // seng ge dred dang gcan gzan gnas ngag dang // 'brog chen 'jigs su rung bar
364a3(rgyud 'bum): gang gnas dang / / gang dag gling mchog dag na gnas pa dang // lhun po dur khrod dag na gang gnas rnams// dgyes shing mgu bas 'phreng ba byug pa dri// bdug pa gtor ma mar me bstod pa 'dis// gus
364a4(rgyud 'bum): 'bul snoms mdzod gsol mdzod 'thung mdzod cig/ las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// de ltar gdon la mchod byas nas/ rtse gcig yid kyis phyogs skyong mchod par bya// dbang po
364a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje can gyi lha tshogs 'khor dang bcas/ / gtor ma khyad 'phags 'di dag bzhes su gsol// me dang gshin rje bdan bral srin po'i bdag/ chub dag rlung bdag nor gyi bdag po dang // dbang ldan lha ste 'byung po'i
364a6(rgyud 'bum): bdag po dang / / steng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang // lha rnams kun dang sa yi klu rnams gang // ri yi lha dang gsang ba'i tshogs 'dus rnams// dpung bcas sde bcas bu dang bshes gnyen bcas// rang gi skye
364a7(rgyud 'bum): bo'i tshogs shing mnyes pa rnams/ / so sor so so'i thugs dgongs gcig mdzad nas// rang rang phyogs su legs par byon nas ni// rang gi bu smad mdza' bshes gnyen 'dun dang // nang mi dmag dang
364b1(rgyud 'bum): dpung bcas thabs cig tu/ / me tog dri dang byug pa mar me dang // zhal zas gtor ma 'di dag bzhes nas kyang // gsol mdzod snoms mdzod legs par 'thung mdzod cig/ las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu
364b2(rgyud 'bum): mchis par mdzod/ / de la 'di ni phyi dang nang thams cad du gtor ma rab tu dbul ba'i sngags te/ a ka ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM a d+ya nuta pan na tA ta/ ces pa'o// de nas nye reg bya ste shar sgor mngon par phyog
364b3(rgyud 'bum): te gnas pa la/ las thams cad pa'i thab khung gi dbus su dpal 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi sngags brjod cing / me tog dmar po nges par bkod la sbyin
364b4(rgyud 'bum): / sreg gi tsho gas dpal rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi sngags kyi sa ba'i mar gyis sreg thugs brgya rtsa brgyad dbul lo// dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags rdo rje 'bebs pa khro bo'i mthar thug par
364b5(rgyud 'bum): yang sreg blugs bdun bdun slar yang ngo / / de nas ji lta ba bzhin du thab khung gi rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams me tog kho nas spyan drangs la// rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags kyis
364b6(rgyud 'bum): bris pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang gi gnas su dgod do/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas la/ bdag ming che ge zhes bgyi ba'i// rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che// sems can kun
364b7(rgyud 'bum): la phan pa'i phyir/ / slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bgyi// 'dir yang dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa la snod dang snod ma yin pa brtag par mi bya ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems
365a1(rgyud 'bum): can kha cig ni sdig pa chen po bgyid pa de rdorje rbu mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di mthong ste zhugs nas ngan song thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das nor dang / @#
365a2(rgyud 'bum): baM dang / btung ba dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la chags pa dang / dam tshig las mi 'da' ba dang / sngar spyod pa la sogs pa 'dod cing mi nus pa'i sems can dag mchis te/ de dag kyang 'dir ji ltar
365a3(rgyud 'bum): bya bar 'dod pa bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das sems can kha cig ni gar dang / glu dang / gad mo dang / rtsed mo dang / kha zas la spyod pa la dga' ba
365a4(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po chos nyid khong du ma chud pas lha'i rigs dang dkyil 'khor gzhan du 'jug par 'gyur gyi/ de bzhin du rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor re ba thams cad
365a5(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par rdzogs par 'gyur ba bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs pa rnams 'byung bar mdzad pa der ni bslab pa'i gnas la 'jigs shing skrag nas mi 'jug pa dag kyang mchis te/ ngan
365a6(rgyud 'bum): song gi dkyil 'khor lam du ji ltar gnas pa'i bde ba'i bdag nyid kyi gnas skabs can de dag kyang dga' ba dang / mgu ba dam pa dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bgyi ba dang / ngan song gi rgyud
365a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du 'jug par kha bltas pa'i lam las bzlog par bgyi ba'i slad du rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug tu rung ngo / / bcom ldan 'das chos ldan gyi sems can de bzhin gshegs pa thams
365b1(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dam pa 'grub pa'i thabs kyis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tshol ba na/ bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa la sogs pa dang / sa rnams la 'bad/
365b2(rgyud 'bum): pas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba dag kyang mchis te/ de dag kyang rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa nyid thams cad kyang rnyed par dka' ba'ang ma lags
365b3(rgyud 'bum): na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci 'tshal zhes gsol bar bya'o// de nas slob ma gzhug par bya'o// de la bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yongs su bzung ba'i dge bsnyen nam/ dge sbyong ngam/ dge slong
365b4(rgyud 'bum): gi sdom pa yongs su bzung zhing slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pa/ slob dpon gyi zhabs dag la phyag byas te 'di skad ces brjod de/ bdag gi ston pa dga' chen khyod// byang chub chen po'i tshul
365b5(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa/ / mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo// dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol// byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol// skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol// zhes pa'o// de nas slob ma la rdo rje
365b6(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i gos dmar po'i stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang / rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sgo skyong bzhi bzlas pa'i gdong g.yogs bcing bar byas la phyag bzhi byed du gzhug go// yang
365b7(rgyud 'bum): lag na me tog thogs pa'i slob mas slob dpon la phyag byas la/ lag na me tog thogs pa nyid kyis gshegs pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / bskul ba dang / gsol ba gdab pa byas la 'di skad ces brjod
366a1(rgyud 'bum): @do/ gtso bo bdag la sdom pa stsol// thub pa'i nyi ma ma lus pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs// bdag ming che ge zhes bgyi ba// slob dpon dbang du gnas pa la// sangs rgyas
366a2(rgyud 'bum): rol mo 'byung ba yi/ / phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun can// thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog/ gsang ba chen por 'jug par bgyi'o// gsang ba thams cad rigs bsdus pa// slob dpon bdag ni 'jug par mdzod//
366a3(rgyud 'bum): phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur ba// skal ba chen po bdag la stsol// mtshan rnams rjes su gsol btab pa// dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ba// slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol//
366a4(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur ba ni rmad byung che// sems can kun gyi don bgyid phyir// bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon gyur// slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol// de nas slob dpon gyi rigs thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/
366a5(rgyud 'bum): che ge zhes bya 'di nyid ni// byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin pa// gsang ba yi ni 'khor lo 'dir// 'jug cing byang chub sdom pa 'tshal// de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod do// sangs rgyas chos dang dge
366a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dun te/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song // 'di ni sangs rgyas rig dag pa'i// dam tshig sdom pa brtan por gyur// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang // blo gros chen po khyod kyis zung // byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/
366a7(rgyud 'bum): shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do// slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar gyis// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// 'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i// sdom pa dam tshig yin par gsungs// rin chen rigs ni bsdus pa ni// nyin
366b1(rgyud 'bum): mo gsum dang mtshan mo gsum/ / zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams// sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab sbyin bya// phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum// dam chos khyod kyis gzung bar bya// 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i// dam tshig sdom pa yin par
366b2(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / las chen rigs ni bsdus pa la// sdom pa gsum po yang dag ldan// mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bzhin// yang dag nyid du nges gzung gyis// de las gzhan pa bzhi po yang // 'di dag pas pham par ni bshad// mi spang dor bar
366b3(rgyud 'bum): yang mi bya/ / rtsa ba'i ltung bar 'di bshad do// nyin mo gsum dang mtshan gsum du// nyin re zhing ni brjod par bya// gang tshe nyams na rnal 'byor pa// lhung ba sbom po dag tu 'gyur// khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya// ma byin par yang mi blang ngo //
366b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa log par mi spyad cing // brdzun yang smra bar mi bya'o// phung krol kun gyi rtsa ba yi// chang ni btung ba rnam par spang // sems can gdul phyir ma gtogs pa// bya ba ma yin thams cad spang // dam pa'i drung du gnas bya zhing // rnal 'byor
366b5(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya/ / lus kyi las ni rnam pa gsum// ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang // yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni// ci nus pas ni rjes su bskyang // theg pa dman la dga' mi bya// sems can don la rgyab phyogs min// 'khor ba
366b6(rgyud 'bum): dngag kyang yong mi spang / / rtag tu mya ngan 'das mi chags// lha dang lha min gsang ba pa// khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya zhing // phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang // mtshan ma 'gom par yang mi bya// 'di dag dam tshig ces bshad do// de dag ni
366b7(rgyud 'bum): blo gros khyod kyi bsrung bar bya/ / des kyang 'di skad brjod par bya// slob dpon khyod ni bdag la gsom// gtso bo ji ltar bka' bsgo ba// de ltar bdag ni bgyid par mtshal// ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams// byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i
367a1(rgyud 'bum): zhes pa nas/ sems can mya ngan 'das la 'god// ces bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o// gang zhig sdom pa mi 'dzin pa de la ni gzhug pa tsam sbyi ba bya zhing // deng khyod bya ba la sogs pa brjod par mi bya ste/ slob dpon/
367a2(rgyud 'bum): du dbang bskur ba 'ang mi bya'o// de nas/ oM sarba yo ga tsit+taM ud pA da yA mi// zhes pa 'dis/ byang chub sems ni bla na med// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// de yi snying khar snying pos ni// rdo rje rab tu gzhag par bya// su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM
367a3(rgyud 'bum): hoH/ badz+ra sid+d+hi ya thA su khaM/ zhes pa 'dis so// de nas rdo rje hUM mdzad du byin gyis brlabs la dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod de me tog gi 'phreng ba gdags shing / gdong dri zhim pos byugs la yon gyi mchog bzung ste/ phyi rol na gnas
367a4(rgyud 'bum): pa la bum pa'i chus dbang bskur la/ oM grih+Na badz+ra sa ma ya hUM baM/ zhes pa 'dis khro bo ti rim ti ri rang nyid bcings la slob ma 'ching du gzhug go// rdo rje bsdams pa nang byas la// mthe bong rdo rje dam po yis// yid kyis khro bas dga'
367a5(rgyud 'bum): bya bas rnga khro bo ti rin ti ri dran/ / de nas de nyid kyi mthe bong dag gis me tog gi 'phreng ba 'dzin du bcug la snying po 'dis gzhug par bya ste/ badz+ra sa ma yaM pra ti sh+ya mi/ zhes pa'o// shar gyi sgor yang rdo rje lcags kyus de dgub cing / lhor
367a6(rgyud 'bum): zhags pas gzhug go/ / nub tu lcags sgrog gis bcing zhing / byang du rdo rje 'bebs pas dbab bo// yang shar gyi sgo nas de bzhin du bcug la 'di skad ces brjod do// deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rigs kyis
367a7(rgyud 'bum): deng nas ngas khyod la rdo rje'i ye shes bskyed par bya/ / ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur na/ dngos grub gzhan rnams lta ci smos khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du
367b1(rgyud 'bum): smra bar mi bya'o/ / khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid rba ba ta rin ti ri ba gyen du blta ba dang bcas pas bcings la/ rdo rje slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag ste 'di skad ces smras te/ 'din
367b2(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje yin te/ gal te khyed 'ga' zhig la smras na spyi bo 'gems par 'gyur ro// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang / mona'i snying po lan cig bzlas pa'i chu rdo rje slob ma de 'thung ngu
367b3(rgyud 'bum): gzhug go/ / de la mna'i snying po 'di yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi// snying la yang dag zhugs par mdzod// gal te tshul 'di smras na ni// de ma thag tu dral te gshegs// badz+ra ud ka thaH/ zhes bya'o// de nas slob ma la 'di skad
