373a5(rgyud 'bum): zhugs shig/ 'di ru mgon po rtag bzhugs nas// byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang // 'di zhes bya ba'i don slad du// bdag gi 'byor pa nyid kyis ni// ci 'byor pa yi mchod pa rnams// me tog la sogs 'di bzhes
373a6(rgyud 'bum): shig/ bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la// rjes su brtse bas dgongs su gsol// kun gyis 'di la byin brlabs shing // de nyin du ni bzhugs par rigs// sku gzugs sta gon legs byas la// de nas
373a7(rgyud 'bum): brtag pa mnyam par brtsam/ / slob ma smyung bar gnas pa yis// de ltar thams cad dbang bas la// sngags pas mchod pa'i cho ga sogs// bla ma yis ni gang bsgo ba// ma 'tshogs pa kun bsgrub
373b1(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / mchod yon 'bras bu chen por 'gyur// de nas sngags pas snyan gsan dbab// gdan la bstim byas mchod yon dang // mchod pa spos dang me tog dang // de bzhin du ni mar me dang // sngags dang ldan pas dbul bar
373b2(rgyud 'bum): bya sku gzugs mdun du phyogs byas la/ / na bza' ser pos g.yogs bya zhing // de nas sngags pas 'du bya ba// khyad par du ni bdug par bya// de nas grub phyir de la ni// de la lan cig gtor bya ba// de nas de la
373b3(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'di ni/ / me dang de nas chu la ni// oM sarba pA paM da ha na badz+ra ya swA hA/ zhes bya bas so// de nas/ rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i// don bzhin du ni bsgom bya ste// de nas gsum gnas rnams su bstim// oM hUM AH
373b4(rgyud 'bum): yi ge gsum/ / oM yig spyi bor bstim bya zhing // snying khar hUM gi yi ger 'gyur// ngag gi phyogs su AHyig go/ sku gsung thugs ni bsgrub par bya// yang na gang gi sa bon gang yin pa// de yi thugs kar de dgod
373b5(rgyud 'bum): do/ / phyag rgya sngags kyis rab bskul zhing // ci rigs par ni snyan gsan dbab// gser ram dngul lam zangs ma 'am// rdo dang de bzhin shing dang ni// yang na shing lo'i 'dab ma rnams// mchod yon du ni sbyar bar bya//
373b6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin bum pa gser la sogs// zangs ma'i snod kyi mchod yon ni// mchod yon snod la rab tu shis// gal te nus pas ma rnyed na// ji ltar rnyed pas kun tu bya// de nas de yi til mar sogs// dur ba'i bon gyi pir
373b7(rgyud 'bum): gyis sbyang / / bkra shis rnga la sogs pa'i sgras// na chung rnams kyis de bzhin brjod// til mar la sogs pa'i sngags ni// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bi sho d+ha ni swAhA/ bum pa lnga 'am yang na brgyad//
374a1(rgyud 'bum): tsan dan la sogs rnams kyis byugs// sna tshogs dri chus dgang ba dang // 'khor lo byas la mngon par bsngags// bu mos bkal ba'i srad bu 'am// yang na gso ma'i skud pa'ang
374a2(rgyud 'bum): rung / tshon chen po yis bsgyur byas la// de la sngags kyis dkri bar bya// sman lnga rin chen lnga dang ni// me tog 'bras bur ldan pa ste// sku gsum pa dang yungs kar ldan// bum pa mngon par bsngags par bya// gtsu
374a3(rgyud 'bum): tor rnam rgyal zhes bya ba/ / gzi brjid gzhan gyis mi brdzi dang // bkra shis zhi rnams sngags kyis ni// khrus kyi ched du mngon par bsngags// 'jam pa'i til mar dag dang ni// u dum ba ra'i lcug ma bzang /
374a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khar ba'i snod kyi nang dag tu// bkod la rab tu dbul bar bya// dri lnga yis ni de nas byugs// sa bon lnga ni gtor bar bya// slob ma tshogs dang bcas pa yi// sngags kyi gtsang sbras bkru bar bya// bkra shis zhes
374a5(rgyud 'bum): bya yid 'ong ba'i/ / blo dang ldan pas tshigs bcad brjod// rig ma spyan ma ji bzhin du// cho ga bzhin du mngon dbang bskur// sngags ni/ ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni// lha yi chu ni dag pa yis// de bzhin gshegs
374a6(rgyud 'bum): kun khrus gsol ltar/ / de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo// zhes bya ba la sogs pas so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ta sa ma ya shri hUM/ lugs ma la ni dngos su bkru// ri mo rnams ni me long la'o//
374a7(rgyud 'bum): dag byed lngas ni sngon du bsgo// dur ba yis ni med par bya// ras sam lag pa dag gis ni// blo dang ldan pas sku lus phyi// gur kum mar dang bcas pa bsku// gos bzang dag kyang sku la
374b1(rgyud 'bum): gsol/ / blo dang ldan pas sngags 'di yis// dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhugs su gsol// oM d+hi badz+ra bA sa se swAhA/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he swAhA/ oM badz+ra A ba ra Na ba su Sha Ne swAhA/ blo ldan gyis rang dam tshig bskul/
374b2(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya sngags kyis dbang bskur la// ji ltar 'os par mngon dbang bskur// oM hUM aM dz+riM khaM/ de ltar cod pan bcing ba byas la bzhugs su gsol te/ brtag pa las gsungs pa'i tshul gyis so// mdun
374b3(rgyud 'bum): gyi phyogs ni ma nub cing / / yo ba min zhing drang ba yis// de lngar sku gzugs mdzes par dgod// de ltar min na skyon 'byung 'gyur// me tog sogs dang de bzhin dri// mar me na bza' sogs sbyor gang // de
374b4(rgyud 'bum): kun sngags dang ldan pa yis/ / lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// oM badz+ra puSh+pe AHhUM/ zhes bya ba 'di dag la sogs pas so// mchog gi me tog 'di dag ni// chu dang thang las de bzhin skyes// mchog tu dang
374b5(rgyud 'bum): pas khyed la 'bul/ / ci bde bar ni so sor bzhes// lhan cig skyes dang sbyar las byung // mchog gi bdug pa 'di dag ni// bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyis// ci bde bar ni banas su gsol/
374b6(rgyud 'bum): lhaldan cig skyes dang sbyar las byung // mchog tu gyur pa'i dri 'di ni// mchog gi dad pas 'bul lags kyis// ci bde bar ni so sor bzhes// mun pa 'joms byed snang ba'i mchog/ mar dang til gyi
374b7(rgyud 'bum): mar me 'di/ / yang dag ye shes spyan dbye phyir// dad pas bdag gis 'bul bar bgyi// bza' dang bca' ba phun sum tshogs// kha dog dri ro rnams dang ldan// thams cad ldan pa lnga yi bshos// bdag gis dngul gyis so sor
375a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhes de la sogs pa gang yang rung / / cung zad ci 'byor sku gzugs la// de dag thams cad 'di nyid kyis// rim pa yis ni dbul bar bya// sngags kyi gtsang sbra tsA ru bya// der ni gser gyi rang bzhin
375a2(rgyud 'bum): gyi/ / thur mas spyan ni dbye bar bya// zhal zas der dbul blo ldan pas// oM tsak+ShuHtsak+ShaHsa man+ta tsak+Shu ra bi sho d+ha ni swAhA/ oM d+hi bya a ne sa mA d+hi d+h+yA na pri Na me swA hA/ de ltar byas te de nas yang // slob ma rab tu bcug byas la/
375a3(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyis nga la gong gsol ba'i// sku gzugs dag ni khyad par du// ji ltar gsungs par rab gnas par// de dag don ni ngas byas te// de rnams don ni grub zin gyis// ci bde bar ni mchod par byos// de
375a4(rgyud 'bum): nas dam tshig dbang bskur bas/ / khyod la byas kyis sreg blugs ni// stong ngam yang na de yi phyed// mngar gsum btags la 'bru rnams kyis// 'o ma can gyi bud shing la// sregs khung gru bzhir sreg
375a5(rgyud 'bum): blugs bya/ / de nyid mar dang 'o ma yis// lhag pa'i tsA ru phul byas pas// bdag dang slob ma thams cad ni// zhi dang rgyas pa 'phel bar bya// oM badz+ra A yu She swAhA/ A gats+tsha ha ri ping ga la dIp+ta k+Sha de hi de hi dA pa
375a6(rgyud 'bum): ya i dan tsa me kAr+yaM ku ru swA hA/ oM badz+ra puSh+pa ye swA hA/ de ltar byas la 'bad pa yis// khri yi steng du bzhugs par bya// sku gzugs kyi ni sum 'gyur cha'i// tshad tsam du ni rab tu bsgrags// oM su pra tiSh+Tha badz+re swA hA/
375a7(rgyud 'bum): me tog spos sogs sngon 'gro bas// phyogs skyong rnams kyang mchod par bya// oM in+d+ra ya swA hA/ zhes bya ba dbang ldan la thug gi bar du rol mo'i sgra la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de/ gshegs su gsol
375b1(rgyud 'bum): bar bya ba ni/ / rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de yi sras// tshangs sogs lnga yi tshogs rnams dang // gang dag cho ga ma tshang bas// de dag bzod pa mdzad par rigs// kun tu zhi dang rgyas pa ru// yon bdag tshe la rab
375b2(rgyud 'bum): mdzad nas/ sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas ni// slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol// sa dang chu dang me rlung gi/ lha rnams kun gyi sku gzugs la// bskal pa brgya ru srung gnas mdzod// dgyes shing yid
375b3(rgyud 'bum): bzang 'gyur ba yis/ / slob dpon bla mar bcas pa yi// bu dang tsha bo bsrung mdzad nas// rang gnas dge bar gshegs su gsol// dpyid bla ra ba'am dpyid zla 'bring // dgun dang dpyid kyi tha chung ngam/
375b4(rgyud 'bum): dbyar zla de bzhin dbyar 'bring ngo po// nyi ma byang du gnas pa yi// dkar po phyogs kyi gnyis pa 'am// rim bzhin de ltar gsum pa 'am// gang tshe gza' dang rjes mthun na// nag po'i phyogs la'ang
375b5(rgyud 'bum): brtsams par bya/ / gang tshe thams cad mthun gyur na// mi rnams yun du 'phel bar byed// bco lnga de bzhin brgyad pa dang // bcu gsum pa yang de bzhin no// gnam stong dang ni de bzhin du// bcu
375b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa la'ang bya ba min/ / thams cad du ni chu smang dang // snar ma gro bzhin de bzhin te// lag pa snrubs dang sngon dang ni// rgyal dang chu smad de bzhin no// khrums sbrang dag kyang de bzhin du// rgyu skar 'di rnams thams cad du// skye dgu
375b7(rgyud 'bum): 'phel zhing de yi ni/ / rab tu gnas pa mchog tu byed// yid la 'dod pa ci yang rung // dngos grub mo bzhis ster bar 'gyur// lung las shes pa'i yang dag pa// khrums sam yang na gro bzhin gyis// lag gis
376a1(rgyud 'bum): skal bzang snar mas ni/ / gzhan dag las ni rgyal bar byed// mgo yis zhi ba nye bar ston// chu stod kyis ni bu dag gson// rtag par dngos grub khrums smad kyis// rgyal gyis rtag
376a2(rgyud 'bum): par tshe ring 'gyur/ / snron gyis mchog tu bde bar byed// lha mtshams kyis ni mchog sngar 'gyur// phur bu lag dang pa wa sangs// zla ba'i gza' sogs shes bya ste// 'di rnams bzang ldan la byas na// rab tu gnas pa mchog tu dge/ gsum
376a3(rgyud 'bum): pa drug pa bdun pa la/ / bcu dang bcu gcig la zla ba// gnyis pa bzhi pa de bzhin brgyad// bcu dang bcu gcig rnams la lag/ gnyis dang bdun dang de bzhin dgu// de bzhin phur bu bcu gcig pa// dus sbyor bzhi pa la
376a4(rgyud 'bum): brten nas/ / de la lhag par gnas par bya// drug bdun bcu pa dor ba yi// pa wa sangs nyid dge ba yin// de ltar gza' rnams thams cad kyis// stobs ldan mi ldan der shes bya// gang tshe zhi ba'i gza'
376a5(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / / zhing rnams zhi ba dge ba yin// dang po lnga pa gsum de bzhin// nor rnams 'joms pa spang bar bya// rjes su mthun par byed pa pos// skad cig de la yongs grub cing // ji ltar gsungs bzhin
376a6(rgyud 'bum): kun byas na/ / rab tu gnas pa mchog 'gyur zhing // 'khor los sgyur rgyal dbang phyug ni// thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// gza' dang rgyu skar 'dir med de// bgegs dang log par 'dren pa'ang med// gza' rnams thams cad rjes
376a7(rgyud 'bum): mthun phyir/ / bgegs dang rgyu skar lha rnams nyid// de ru sgrub par kun gnas shing // gzugs brnyan mchod rten la sogs kyis// dngos grub dag ni ster bar mdzad// yid kyis cung zad gang bsams pa// skye dang skye ba 'grub par
376b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / rgyan rnams ma lus pa yis ni// phyi nas bzo bo rnams la mchod// gang dag de la grogs byed pa// gzhan dag kyang ni mchod par bya// de nas de dag thams cad la// dga' bas 'di skad brjod par bya// ji

376b3(rgyud 'bum): dag ni/ / zos shing sdig pa byang bar 'gyur// zhes bya bas so// glang po rta glang shing rnga nor// yon gyi dam pa dbul bar bya// de nas de la nan tan gyis// longs spyod g.yo ba dbul bar bya// gal te lha nyid dgyes 'dod ma

376b5(rgyud 'bum): yang dbul/ / dung ngam rol mo sgra la sogs// bzang ba'i glu dang gar rnams kyis// gnyen dang rigs brgyud 'khor rnams kyis// rol mo chen po mtshan mo dbul// de ltar thams cad phul zin nas// gang rung mchod sbyin

376b7(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor byugs byas te/ / ba yi lci bas byugs byas shing // rdul tshon chu bor rab dor ro// de yis yang dag legs par 'gyur// rab tu gnas pa mdor bsdus pa'i rgyud rdzogs so//
377a1(rgyud 'bum): dur khrod dag dang shan pa yi// khyim dang srin po'i gnas rnams su// mngon spyod kyi ni las bya ba// thab khung tha ma bar ma mchog/ phyed dang gsum mam// khru dgu ba ni byas pa las/
377a2(rgyud 'bum): stegs bu de yi tshad brtsigs te// gru gsum pa 'am mdung rtsi 'dra// lugs phye sol phye dug gis ni// bskus pas thab khung nag por bya// dbus su rdo rje rtse dgu pa// nag po shin tu 'bar ba bri// su ran sdeng du rtse
377a3(rgyud 'bum): gsum dang / / rgya gram pa yi rdo rjes mtshan// de yi phyi rol mu khyud la// dbyug pa dang ni dgra sta dang // ral gri shin tu 'bar ba bri// de yi phyi rol keng rus te// bde gshegs la sogs phyag rgyas mtshan// dud sprin
377a4(rgyud 'bum): mdog 'dra drang srong mchog/ ro yi steng bzhugs rtse gsum dang // gzar bu 'phreng ba ril bar ldan// de lta'i me lha spyan drangs nas// lhor bltas khros pa'i sems kyis bsregs// shin tu gdug cing tsher mar
377a5(rgyud 'bum): bcas/ sreg shing yam shing byas nas kyang // sha dang khrag dang lcags phye dang // rus phye dug dang ske tshe dang // dri chen dri tshu la sogs pa'i// rdzas rnams kun la dug gis ni// bsgos pas lan grangs 'bum
377a6(rgyud 'bum): bsregs nas/ / de yi longs spyod 'byor pa dang // gnyen dang 'khor dang bran rnams dang // bu dang chung mar bcas pa rnams// spangs te srog dang bral nas ni// sdug bsngal mi bzang myong bar 'gyur// mngon
